2b1(rgyud): las rgyul// rdo rje dbang drug gas pa'i rgyal// rnam rgyus
2b2(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po'i spyan// pad+ma ram du rgyas pa'i zhal// rang gi lag
2b3(rgyud): gi rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byud pa/ khro gnyer
2b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs// lA ke ni rdo rje mtha' yas pa/ 
3a1(rgyud): gzugs can dang // rnge rje ru ro rab 'phen// rang gi lug gi
3a2(rgyud): gser bong pa// shes rab thabs dang snying rje che// 'ge de byed pa rnams kyi mchog
3a3(rgyud): dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsams pa can// khre bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// 
3a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa la sa byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams kyis ldan
3a5(rgyud): cig tu// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin ga shegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas
3a6(rgyud): la ngag 'tshal te// thal me sbyar ba byas gyur nas// spyar sder 'dug sde'
3b1(rgyud): skad gsol// khyab padag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgra 'phrul dra
3b2(rgyud): bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ji ltar bdag thob bgyi// nyon mongs pas ni sems bkrugs
3b3(rgyud): shing // mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob
3b4(rgyud): pa'i phyir// bcom ldan sngon pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i blams bri shad du
3b5(rgyud): gsol// dam tshig tshe na po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/ de
3b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug gtor chen po tshig gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes
4a1(rgyud): // sems dpa' yi// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// don zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi pa/ 
4a2(rgyud): thogs ma bar dang mthar dge ba// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma
4a3(rgyud): 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang yang yang yang gsung ba gang // rgyud chen sgyu
4a4(rgyud): 'phrul dra ba 'dir// rdo rje 'chang che/ na gsang sngags 'chang // dpag med rnams/ kyis dgyes pa yi// gang yang
4a5(rgyud): yang dag rab gsungs pa// bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// bsam pa brtan pos ngas 'byung bar// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas
4a6(rgyud): kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi// nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shas ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sem
4a7(rgyud): can rnams kyis bsam pa yi// khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshe
4b1(rgyud): lade skad du// gsol bta ba thal mo sbyang byas te// lus btung nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rbA
4b2(rgyud): gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas lhogs bzang dge/ ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi
4b3(rgyud): ngag rnams 'dul byed pa// 'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 
4b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag na rdo rje stob sa po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// lag so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khong
4b5(rgyud): legs so// 'gro la phan pa'i dron du khyod/ snying rje che dang ldan gyur te// 'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan// yang dag brjod pa
4b6(rgyud): don che ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag po khong le gas so// de phyir 'di ni ngas bshad pa// khong
4b7(rgyud): ni rtse gcig yid kyiso nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thob// gsang sngags mtha' dag rigs chen bo/ 
4b8(rgyud): gsang sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs/ rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jog rten 'jog rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang bad rigs
5a1(rgyud): chen dang // dag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // gtog tor chen po'i rigs chen no// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // g+hanyis/ 
5a2(rgyud): su med par 'byung ba dang // skye bo med pa'i chos can 'di// tshig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad gsungs// a A/ i I/ u U/ a e/ o au/ e
5a3(rgyud): / rmAHdz+ra de/ dz+nyA mU d+hi hi bad+d+ho bud+ha n+de N+ya d+ya baN+Di ni oM badz+ra g+h+nA d+ha kharjed// brA dz+nyAn rbu r+d+ha me/ dz+nyAn kAyA/ wA hI shwa / a ri pa tsan la te na
5a4(rgyud): 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung // ayig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen
5a5(rgyud): 'gyur med dam pa yin// srog chen po skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa te// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog
5a6(rgyud): tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags cha// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod
5a7(rgyud): ba chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ 
5a8(rgyud): mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dag tsho ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che/ chags pa thams cad sel bar byed
5b1(rgyud): 'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ dga' ba chen po dgu pa che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ kha dog che zhing lus bong tshwa/ ming yang che
5b2(rgyud): zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab chen po mtshon 'chang ba// nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog
5b3(rgyud): grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don
5b4(rgyud): sgrub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas de ga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phro lan// sbyin bdag che na po gtso bo
5b5(rgyud): ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chung ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa ste// brtson 'grus chen po pha rol
5b6(rgyud): gnon// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon
5b7(rgyud): lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo
5b8(rgyud): chen ldan// thabs chen byed po chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste/ 
6a1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ stobs chen pha rol gnom pa po// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mu khregs
6a2(rgyud): shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// 
6a3(rgyud): bla ma gsang sngags che ba mchog zag pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad cha/ 
6a4(rgyud): thub pa chen po thub ldan// gsang sngags chu la chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu
6a5(rgyud): thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon
6a6(rgyud): bo ste/ sa bcu li ni rab tu ga nas/ shes bcu rnam dag po dag nyid can// shes btso rnam dag 'chang ba bo// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i
6a7(rgyud): don/ thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan chab po// thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de
6a8(rgyud): bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag/ yang dag smra zhing tshig gzhan med// ji skad smos pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med pa gnyis med smra// yang dag mtha'
6b1(rgyud): la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu sngags ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba don yod bgrod// de bzhin gshegs pa yid
6b2(rgyud): ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor los bsgyur ba stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs rje tshogs bdag
6b3(rgyud): dbang dang ldan/ mthu chen gces pa 'dzin pa ste/ tshul chen gzhon gyi 'dren pa min// tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig
6b4(rgyud): mtha' yas// tshig bden bden par smra bdang // bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa mi 'ong / bsre ru so sor
6b5(rgyud): 'dren pa ste// nges 'byung sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyun ga pa// dge slong dgra bcom zag
6b6(rgyud): pa zang // 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pa gos pa mad// rig
6b7(rgyud): ba dang ni rkang par ldan// bder gshegs 'jig rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyid
6b8(rgyud): kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pa rol mthar gnas pa/ bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas// ye shes
8a1(rgyud): 'ba' zhig nges 'byung ba// shes rab mtsher chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa mchog/ chos
8a2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grung grub pa'i kur rtog ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dom pa zad mi shes/ 
8a3(rgyud): bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshegs// ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshegs gnyis tshegs dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can
8a4(rgyud): bsam gtan bsam byas blo yi bdag/ sau rang rig mi g.yo ba/ mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdagade nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi ba gau// sangs
8a5(rgyud): rgyas lnga bdag cod pan tsan// spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang // sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog/ shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas te// chos
8a6(rgyud): kyi skye gnas srid mthar byed// gcig pus mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ 'bral du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag/ na mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye
8a7(rgyud): shes snang ba lam me po// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes spron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug ter chen po rmad byung
8a8(rgyud): gtsug na mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po// mchod 'os rjed 'os drang srong che// rigs
8b1(rgyud): gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags ldan// dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ 'dzin pa tshe
8b2(rgyud): po rdo rje nags/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug sdongs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la ha la
8b3(rgyud): gdong brgya pa// gshin rje mthar byed bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa/ rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snyid// sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje skye gnas rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba/ mi
8b4(rgyud): g.yo ral pa gcig bgyings po// glang chen lpags pa rlon pa 'chang / drag tshon hA hA zhes sgrog pa/ hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// dgod mo chen po gang rgyangs can// rdo rje gad po cher sgrogs
8b5(rgyud): ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje gtum po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hU~M gi gzugs/ rdo rje mdang yi mtshon 'chang ba// rdo rje ral gris gcod mdzad pa/ 
8b6(rgyud): rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can/ rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bang ba gtsigs pa'i mig// mgo skyes rdo rje 'bang ba ste/ rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig// rdo rje'i spu ri byu gu
8b7(rgyud): lus rbardo rje'i spu ni lus gcig pu// rdo rje rtse mo sen mos brtsams// rdo rje snying po lpags pa mkhregs// rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gangs rgyangs hA hA nges par
8b8(rgyud): sgrogs/ yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba/ 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen po// nam kha'i khams kyi mthar thugs sgra// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag med de de bzhin
9a1(rgyud): dpa yang dag mtha' snyemi ge med/ blo shing smra la'i bu mchog ste/ ba cing rgya tshe smogs pa/ chos kyi du skye sa chen po/ chos kyi gaN+DI sna po che/ rab tu mi gnas kyangs das/ 
9a2(rgyud): ngogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs ldan dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan pa lus 'chang ba po
9a3(rgyud): snang ba med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas// chos kyi tog ni cher 'byung ba// 'jig rten gsum po cig gzhol lus// gnas
9a4(rgyud): brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang / 8/ sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// slob dpon 'jig rten yon she rangs// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon
9a5(rgyud): skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa// skyabs dang slob pa bla na med// nam khang khyad pa longs spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes ma tshe// ma rig sgo nga'i sngags 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba
9a6(rgyud): 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol son// ye shes dbang bsku cod pan can// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya na// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi/ 
9a7(rgyud): gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa/ sgrib pa thams cad nges par grol// na mkha' mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ dus gsum dus med rtog par gnas// sen/ 
9a8(rgyud): kun gyi klu chen po/ yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/ lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba// na mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpa/ 
9b1(rgyud): bsams shing chen rgyas pa ste/ bub pa bzang po che ba'i mchog byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan thogs sems can gnyis gshin pa/ bzang ngan shes pa dus shes pa// khab bdag dpa shes
9b2(rgyud): dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes/ rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa bau/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// chos shes rab zhi bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa
9b3(rgyud): grags pa dpal mi snyan pa dge// dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' ba chen po rol pa che// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs// rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan ma chog
9b4(rgyud): sprin gtso bo ste// skabs kyi dam pa skyabasu 'os// rab mchog 'ji gas pa chen po'i dgra/ 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsugabud pud pu ral pa can// ral pa mgo reg cod pan ldan
9b5(rgyud): gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i DA/ da// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang // tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar pir dka'
9b6(rgyud): thub che// khrus ldan gau ta ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa rig/ tshangs pa mya ngan 'das pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi bzhi pa nyid// mya ngan 'das zhim ngan 'das// le
9b7(rgyud): bar nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde ba sdug bsngal mthar byed gnas// 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// gsal min mi sdang gos pa med// cha maud kun 'gro khyab pa
9b8(rgyud): po phra mos sa bon zag pa zad// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyod med pa// shin tu rab sad rnams sad bdag // thams cad ye shes kun rig mchog/ rnam par shes pa'i chos
10a1(rgyud): nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med dul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med
10a2(rgyud): pa ye shes mi gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// sla ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// sla ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge thub pa med// 
10a3(rgyud): kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid phreng ldan lha na sdug// 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'ang // sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams
10a4(rgyud): ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nyon mongs nad kyi dgra che ba/ sdu/ gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skad dkyil 'kho ra can// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyal ma
10a5(rgyud): chen po sbreng // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byem sa dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi
10a6(rgyud): rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig
10a7(rgyud): rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag// rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan
10a8(rgyud): rdo rje nyim snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags dral dang po chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'odi/ rdo rje dkyil krungs rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal
10b1(rgyud): ldan sa sa rgyas dadra skyes// kun pa 'ad ye shes mdzod 'dzi nga/ rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang / che ba sangs rgyas rig pa 'amang rje gnon por la gri che/ rnam par dag pa 'gyung med paH/ 
10b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcad/ mtshom mchen po rdo rje chos/ rdo rjezab mdzin dza// rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig pa rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/ sa rnams thams cad rnam par rgyad/ rnam par dag pa bdag
10b3(rgyud): med chos// yang dag ye shes zla snying 'od// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor che// rgyud kur gyi ni bdag po mchog/ ma lus rdo rje dkyil dkrungs te// ye shes skra rnams ma lus 'chang // kun tu bzang po zla
10b4(rgyud): gros bzang // sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kAn gyi snying po che// sna chags sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye
10b5(rgyud): med chos te sna tshogs dor// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang pa// skad cig gcig la shes rab che// chos kun khong du chud pa 'a chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang
10b6(rgyud): dag batha'/ mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon gsum pa// ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don sgrub dam pa ste/ ngan song
10b7(rgyud): thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du cig dpa' ba// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo ni sgeg 'chang das
10b8(rgyud): dang ldan/ dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod cing // rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// namakha' khyab par gar byed pa/ rkang pa gcig
11a1(rgyud): gis mthil gnod pa/ sa mi snying po mthil la gnas/ tshangs pa'i sgonga'i rtse mo gnon/ rkang 'thabs sen po la gnas pa/ don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don / dam pa'i don te brjid
11a2(rgyud): pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don// sems dang rnam shes rgyu dang ldan/ dngos po ma lus don dga' ba/ stong pa nyid dga' mchog blo/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs 'das/ srid pa gsum po dga' ba che
11a3(rgyud): dag pa sprin dkar bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ 'dod chags chen po sen mo'i 'od// zur phud bzang po mthon kha mchog/ skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang
11a4(rgyud): nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ 'jig rten kham brgya kun bskyod pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen lnga na// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang / dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin
11a5(rgyud): rgyal byang chub yan lag me tog dga'// de bzhin gshegs pa yinatan mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher
11a6(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid las skyes/ sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de
11a7(rgyud): nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// thams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas// thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po// yan lag
11a8(rgyud): bcu gnyis srid cu bton/ dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang / bdan pa 'ini tshul gyi rnam pa can/ shes pa brgyad pa rtogs pa 'chang / 'ded don rnam pa bcu nyis ldan/ dating rnam pa bcu drug ga/ rnam pa'i shus/ 
11b1(rgyud): byang chub pa/ rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi// sku yi mtha' ni rnam sgom pa/ skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs/ sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs
11b2(rgyud): thabs tshul gyi// 'gro ba'i don gyi rnam dpe can// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ nyon mongs khams rnams rnam dag bdag/ las kyi khas rnam zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun la
11b3(rgyud): rgal sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa rab spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'du shes thams cad rab spangs don
11b4(rgyud): rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang // sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul/ sems can kun gyi yid gnas pa// sems can kun gyi yid dang ba/ de nas/ de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son// sems can
11b5(rgyud): kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba/ grub maH ba 'khrul pa ldan pa min// 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsu
11b6(rgyud): gyi ba dngag / dus gsum phung po lnga yi don// skad cig thams cad rnam sgom pa/ skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med sku te sku yi mchog/ ska na bye ba rnam
11b7(rgyud): par 'gyed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs pa ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags skye gnas yo ga med// gsang sngags chen
11b8(rgyud): rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// ba le stong pa yi go drug rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med// bcu drug byed byed thig le can/ ma med/ 
12a1(rgyud): cha ldan las 'das pa/ bsam gtan ba'i pa'i rtse mo 'chang / bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting nge 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa/ ting 'dzir sku te sku yi mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku
12a2(rgyud): kun gyi rgyal// sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lha min dbang po sbyin byed bde// 
12a3(rgyud): lha yi bla ma 'chi med dbang // rab 'joms rab 'jo mas dbang phyug po/ sred pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba/ ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po// byams
12a4(rgyud): ba'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo bai dud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa/ 
12a5(rgyud): bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas jig rten 'dren/ mchod 'os bstod 'os ngag gi gnas/ rtag tu rim gro ba ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rjed par bya'i mchog/ phyag
12a6(rgyud): byang 'os pa bla ma'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// na mkha' mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste/ mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug / byang chub sems dpa' sem
12a7(rgyud): dnga'ache/ rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das/ shes rab rol phyin pa'i mtha'/ shes rab kyi ni de nyid theg/ ba dag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// kun la zin pa gang zag mcho// 'jig rte dpe las 'a
12a8(rgyud): bste/ gas dang zhesu pa'i 'dag po mchog ga chos kyi srid po'i bdag pag rgya zhib did sngon pa 'gro ba'i basben pakrung banas kyi mchog nges 'brung gsung po 'grod rnams kyi don gyi das pa rnam da/ 
12b1(rgyud): dpal 'jig rten gsum gyi bskal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod dung// yang dag mthar 'gyur khyod la 'dud/ sdong nyid snying po
12b2(rgyud): khod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'ad// sangs rgyas dgos pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ 
12b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ sangs rgyas snang la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas
12b4(rgyud): 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// na mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas la// ra mdzod khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la
12b5(rgyud): 'dud ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'din bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang 'jam dpal ye shes sems
12b6(rgyud): dpa'i ma 'dres pa yong su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dad pa dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i don dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
12b7(rgyud): yongasu dag pa'i phyir dang yongasu ma rdzogs pa dang yongasu ma dag pa'i sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshigs yong su rdzogs pa dang yong su dag pa'i phyir dang bla na med pa'i don lhag pa
12b8(rgyud): ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir dang ma thob pa thob pa'i phyir dang ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung ba'i don tu yang bdag gis bstad pa dang yang da/ 
13a1(rgyud): / pa rabatu bshad pa dang dam par grol ba dang napa par pe pa dang btugs la ba byas pa dang byin gyis 'drangs pa'o// lag na rdo rngorje 'chang 'di dings khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid zad/ 
13a2(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rje su bsngags pa'o// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu yong su dag pa yongasu bang ba
13a3(rgyud): thams cad pakhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
13a4(rgyud): kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtog/ sa pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams
13a5(rgyud): cad pham par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobasu gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'o// chos thams cad kyi lung // sang+yas
13a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi yang dag par kun thub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dri ma med pa shin tu yong su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos dang rang
13a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye ba'o// lho dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing // theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung khung ngo // 'phags pa'i
13a8(rgyud): lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen
13b1(rgyud): po'i rigs dang d+hu dab tu 'phel ba'o// bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi char gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi'i spobs dang dpung dang snga rnams kyi pham par byed pa'o// 
13b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongasu smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bani la gnas pa rnams kyi ting 'dzin do// sems
13b3(rgyud): rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// yang dag par spong ba thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyod mong
13b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o// lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o// 'bor ba thams
13b5(rgyud): cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa/ 'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyi 'gebs pa'o// rnam par grol bI/ grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor
13b6(rgyud): lo'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu bskor ba'o// de bzhid gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshad dang ba da rab tu sbyong ba'o// dam pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o/ 
13b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams kyi myur du grub pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom par lhag par rtogs pa'o// gnyisu med pa so sor
13b8(rgyud): rtag par sprom pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtags pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o// yong su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yong su rdzos
14a1(rgyud): pa'o// yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'o// drad pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang dag
14a2(rgyud): par brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongasu rdzogs pa'i b.ro// 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjesu bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang
14a3(rgyud): dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o// 
14a4(rgyud): ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad ya rang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khom pa brgyad du smra bar 'gyur ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad nye ba ni
14a5(rgyud): bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel ba'o// ma/ tshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o// lta ba ngan pa dang da grogs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// 
14a6(rgyud): bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// brgyag
14a7(rgyud): pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin po thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
14a8(rgyud): gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur ba'i// 'og rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams ca
14b1(rgyud): brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gsungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang stobs dang dbang phyug pud sub tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal dang
14b2(rgyud): dge ba dang zhib legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshig su bcad pa dang bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye ba bzhi bar byed pa'o// shin tu dag pa
14b3(rgyud): rnams kyi shin tu dag pa'o// shin tu gtsang ba rnams kyi shin tu gtsang ba'o// shin tu 'bor ldan rnams kyi shin tu 'byor lngano// shin tu bkra shis pa rnams kyi shin tu bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi
14b4(rgyud): skab so// gnas 'dod pa rnams kyi gnaso// skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// gling 'dod pa/ rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o// na 'dod pa rnams kyi bla na
14b5(rgyud): med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o// nad thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i pir sman pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o// blang bar bya ba dang dor bar ba
14b6(rgyud): ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i slag rum thams cad bsal ba'i pir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod pa ji lta
14b7(rgyud): ba bzhin du yong su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi ska rab tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu gyur pa'o// spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i pir yongasu dag
14b8(rgyud): pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o// zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par gyur pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ti
15a1(rgyud): 'dzin ni yongasu rdzogs pa'i dkyis sa bcurab tu thob par gyung ba'o// gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyi su med pa'i chos nyid do// lhag par spro 'dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang
15a2(rgyud): bzhin ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yong su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyi
15a3(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ 'di ltar gnyi su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos
15a4(rgyud): thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo ga/ supa brje su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje'i chang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi sgo'i spyad
15a5(rgyud): pa spyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dang / 'i ye shes kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyisu med pa don dpa pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsu
15a6(rgyud): gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag yongasasu rdzogs pa ma tshang ba med pa dum bu ma yin pa/ tshig su bcad pa dang tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis/ nyi ma so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang brjod par
15a7(rgyud): byed pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang gzhan rnams la yang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam// 
15a8(rgyud): dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang lhag par mos pa dang de kho na yid la bad ba dag gis kunas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang chos thad so sor rtogs pa dang ma
15b1(rgyud): tu gyur pa dang rnyog pa med pa dang shes rab kyis rje su 'bigs pa dang / dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni dus gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te yang
15b2(rgyud): dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byor nas chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid sgom pa nye bar ston par byedo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis
15b3(rgyud): brlabs kyis kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjesu 'dzin pas kyang 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad la mi
15b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang nye bar sgrub par byed do// dgra/ bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags dpa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po yang nye ba
15b5(rgyud): ston par byed do// gdul dka' ba 'dul ba po rnams kyang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po dang rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongasu slob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams
15b6(rgyud): kyis mdangs dang stobs dang gzi bzed zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang mngon par rdzogs pa dang dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par byedo// sngags dang rigs pa'i rgyal po ma
15b7(rgyud): lus pa dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang bdud dang dragra phyir rgol ba dang gzhan gyi mi thub pa chen po thams cad kyang mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod pa thams cad dang lam rnams
15b8(rgyud): yang srung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed par byed do// tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang drag po dang srad med kyi bu dang kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang dbang drug chen po dang smin dag gi bu dang nag po chen po dang dga' byed
16a1(rgyud): dang phyug dang gshing rje dang u lnga dang lus ngan dang 'phrog ma dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten spyong ba gang yin pa de dag thabs cad kyang rtag par rgyu tu mtshan po dang nyin por bcas pa 'gro ba dang
16a2(rgyud): gnas pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang gnyid log pa dang gnyid sad pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma gzhag pa dang gcig pur gnas pa dang skye bo mang po'i nang du song ba dang ji srid grong dang grong khyer
16a3(rgyud): dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho drang na gnas pa dang dbang po'i phur ba dang sgo khang dang lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang grong khyer gyi bar dang tshing khang gi nang du gnas pa dang
16a4(rgyud): ji srid khang sdong dang ri dang dgon pa dang chu klung dang dur khrod dang nags/ tshang tshing du nye bar son pa dang 'phags pa dang ma 'phags pa dang myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na rtag tu thams cad kyi rnam pa
16a5(rgyud): thams cad du mchog tu srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyur// nyin mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legasu byed pa 'a/ gyur// gzhan yang gang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
16a6(rgyud): dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang gzhan yang gang dag gza' dang rgyu skar dang ma mo dang tshegs kyi bdag po rnams dang gang yang
16a7(rgyud): ma mo bdun po rnams dang gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo dang sha za mo rnams te de rnams thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sde dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis spyod lam dang lam rnamasu
16a8(rgyud): yang mchog tu srung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur// gzhan yang de'i lus la mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed/ nad med pa dang stobs dang tshe 'phel ba yang nye bar sgrub par byed// 'din
16b1(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjesu bsngags pa bcu dgu pa'o// / gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di nyi ma so sor ma nyams pa yang dag par blangs te
16b2(rgyud): mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed pa dang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs
16b3(rgyud): te de'i gzugs kyis rje su sems par byed pa dang / yang de'i gzugs kyis rje su bsam gtan byed pa de nyid sprul pa'i sku yis yun mi ring ba nyid las gdul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung nas mthong bar 'gyur/ 
16b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang lhan cig gnas pa namakha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur// sems dpa
16b5(rgyud): chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang ngan song du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur// yu la mtha' 'khob kyi skye ba myong rdzi 'gyuraro// dbang po dman
16b6(rgyud): bar mi 'gyuraro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba'i rigasu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang des bstan pa'i chos
16b7(rgyud): spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyu'o// lha tshe ring po rnam su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang nad dang mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyuraro// snyigs ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang
16b8(rgyud): chom rkun dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'thung bar mi 'gyur// rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur// mi bsngags pa dang skur pa 'debs pa dang smod pa dang mi snyan pa dang grags pa ngan
17a1(rgyud): ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyu'o/ skye ba bzang po dang rigs dang rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// kunas mdzes par gyur pa dang gzugs dang kha dog yang dag par ldan par 'gyuraro// 'ji
17a2(rgyud): rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang yid la 'bab pa dang 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyuraro// gang dang
17a3(rgyud): gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur// longs spyod che ba dang 'khor mang ba dang longs spyod mi zad pa dang 'khor mi zad par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang
17a4(rgyud): yang dag par ldan par 'gyur// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gan/ sa bzhi la gnas par 'gyur// dran pa dang shes bzhin dang
17a5(rgyud): thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan bar 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa smra mkhas par yang 'gyur// tshig gsal ba dang blun po ma
17a6(rgyud): yin pa dang blo gsal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa dang le lo med pa dang chog shes pa dang don che ba dang sred pa med par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang slob dpon dang bla ma bkur
17a7(rgyud): bar bya bar 'gyur// de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang rtsis dang shes pa dang bstan bcos thams cad don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur// shin tu yong su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang
17a8(rgyud): 'tsho ba dang kun tu spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyuraro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyur// nyan tho
17b1(rgyud): dang dgra bcom pa dang nga sangs rgyas sdi nges pa dang grod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur/ 'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go// lag na rdo rdo rdo rje 'chang de ltar yon dan dpag tu med par
17b2(rgyud): yang dag par ldan par 'gyuraro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
17b3(rgyud): skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te shin tu byung bar sangs rgyas kyi yon ngan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs
17b4(rgyud): ba'i byang chub ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// bskal pa ma nga bor yongasu mya ngan las mi 'dar ba'i chos kyis sapas can tham sa cad kyi bla ni ring pa'i chos ston pa po dang bogs bcur
17b5(rgyud): chos kyi rjeb che lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyung // 'dir 'khor lo drug pa'i bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o// oM sarba d+harma b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra Tuk+kha a A e AH
17b6(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+haHsarbad+harmAHya duta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu shri Sha ri shud+d+hi dA/ su pa dA ye ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ba hri da ya/ sa ra ha ra/ oM hUM hri b+ha ga bar dz+nyA na purdi/ wA gI shwar ya hA pA tsa/ sarba d+ha thA ga ga nA pa la su
17b7(rgyud): ba ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+ha yA dz+nyA na bad+hA aH// de ras dpal lnga'i rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyang/ mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la phag 'tshal nas/ rngab pa'i bangon pa
17b8(rgyud): gzhan rnams dang // gseng dbang lag mardo rje de// khro bo'i rgyal por bcas rnams kyis// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po bdag cag rjes yi rang // legaso lang sau legs par gsungs// bdag cas
18a1(rgyud): yang dang rdzogs pa yi byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzangad/ 'gro ba mngon med rnams dang ni// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// rnam dag legs pa'i lam 'di ra// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa/ 
18a2(rgyud): zab cing yangs la rgya che ba/ don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul drab stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting 'dzin
18a3(rgyud): ba'i le'u las byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogaso// / thun mongs dang thun mongs ma
18a4(rgyud): yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po da bla ma dpapa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bsnyungs pa smra bsgyur gyi lo d+hAb blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gyi
18a5(rgyud): gi dben gan su bsgrung zhing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis// rgyud 'di bsgrung zhing kun la grags lags mod// 'on kyeng sgro don gtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgyud 'di blo brtam
18a6(rgyud): gnyis pas legs par bsgrud // / rgya gang skad du/ mA ya dzA la tA dan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma khod ska du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
18a7(rgyud): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa/ rdo rje'i kaM bas rgyan pa/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdo
18a8(rgyud): dril bu 'khrol ba/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos rgyan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba rnams kyi don gyi ba btas pa/ rnam par
18b1(rgyud): snang bzad kyi snying po las yang dag par 'thung ba'i spyod pa baspyod dam/ zhal ba ni ga' bo skabs das byung ba sna tshogs dang rdo rje dang / rin po che chen po dang / 'od dpag med da bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
18b2(rgyud): chen po'i tshogs dang / rigs sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis rgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang / bran dang / bran po dang / po nya dang / po 'pho dang / phyag brnyan dang / ngag brnyan mo du pa'i 'khor gyis sgo cing 'dun gyi bsdus pa/ ting
18b3(rgyud): 'dzid kyi ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang / dmigs pa dang bral ba/ thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral po la brtsod par mdzad pa lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyid dang / dri za dang lba
18b4(rgyud): ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'ab chen po dang / mi dang mi pa yin pa la sogs pa mang pos rgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bcu
18b5(rgyud): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi khams kyi dbus dbang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la/ gzigs nas 'dzub pa mdzad// 'dzub pa mdzad ma
18b6(rgyud): thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag nardo rje zla gos brag pa gcig tu gzang nas 'gying bag cad du bltas nas rdo rje gsod te/ dbus maM g.yas pa'i lda ngas la btsugs de thal mo sbyang nas
18b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa ma mchis par 'dzub pa mi mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa gang gi slad gzigs pa dang 'dzub pa
18b8(rgyud): mdzad/ de des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur ba lags na/ de'i sla du bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sed pa chen po
19a1(rgyud): phyag nardzongs de skad du gsol ba bdab ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po spu 'phrul dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings brgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i thabs pa dang / 
19a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i yang shas sgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams cad kyi 'byung gnas sdang skabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol ba rol pas bzhad cing ba
19a3(rgyud): ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ri mo'i gzugs dang / sgom pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sdang sngabs dang / sbyor ba dgod pa dang / ting
19a4(rgyud): 'dzin dang / dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang / brog pa dang / dgug ba dang / bcings pa dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / 'am thag par/ bya ba dang / bcad pa dang / sreg pa dang / bskang ba dang / bskrun pa dang / nga
19a5(rgyud): bskang ba dang / sbyid pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma bzung chu/ dang / gsang sngags mang po'i 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par ba'o// de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang ting 'dzin mchog la snyoms pa bzhugs
19a6(rgyud): la nyon cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'bal ba'i gtam mnyan par
19a7(rgyud): brtsam so// de la re shig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon chos kyi rje su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon med par gyur na ni/ dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas/ slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ye shes snying po/ 
19a8(rgyud): khyod nyon cig/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med// gsang sngags rgyud kyi spyong shes pas/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing / sems can kun la rmi/ 
19b1(rgyud): 'jigs sbyin// theg pa chen la dag dga' gdeni slob dpon yin par gsungs / phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing / nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang / gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang / theg pa chen po mi shes pa/ 
19b2(rgyud): snying rje yod pa ma yin dang // dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la// rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang // bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min// gong du bstan pa'i mtshan 'dang / ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung // de yis
19b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams brtan// de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dang // 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dge dang sgrom la dga' ba dang // rtag tu bla ma la gus dang / rgyun tu lha rnam
19b4(rgyud): mdza du byed pa'i// yon ngan ldanan slob ma yin// slob dang / na ci 'dra ba lta zhes na/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ de nyid rtag/ chu rdo rje 'chang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen chog/ doni ye shes
19b5(rgyud): rgya mtsho che// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin/ slob dang na gyi ni yon tan bzung / skyor rnams rnams kyang ma yin// yon ta/ na bzung bas dngos grub cing / skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyas/ 
19b6(rgyud): de yi grib ma'ang mi 'grom ste// mchod rten pa shig dang 'dra bar gsungs// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi// dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa dag/ rmi lam du yang mthong mi ba// slob
19b7(rgyud): dpon smod pa gang yin te// bgags dang log 'dren rnams kyis bzung // ngan pa btum po las byed pa// mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya// mnar med shin tu skye g.ya' ba'i// dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin
19b8(rgyud): deng ni slob dpon slong byed pa// gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgoms te/ bsam yas 'bras bu smin bod pa'i// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod byed pa'o// sems can dad pa ldan pa
20a1(rgyud): mtshang rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'dini 'jug pa'i sa pa bye ba'i le'u ste dang bar// de nas bcom ldan das rnam par snang badzad chen ba rdargya'i de bzhid ga shes
20a2(rgyud): pas thams cadang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i bin rlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la stoms par zhug so// snyoms par
20a3(rgyud): zhugs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma ye shes chen po'i snying po
20a4(rgyud): 'bar ba rdo rje snying kur byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dang dang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas phyag ni rdo rje sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba
20a5(rgyud): de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ngag byas pa dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba la yang dag pa zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs
20a6(rgyud): rgyas nyid kyi grangasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyon cig/ dang po kho nas yongasu bzung ba byas te/ slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabasu 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing / lag pa g.yon pas
20a7(rgyud): dril bu gsil nas rdo rje 'gros kyis yongasu bskor bar bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hUM zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa gang gis bskor nas kyang khro bo/ 
20a8(rgyud): sku bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gsong ba pa rnams la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o// slob dpon ming zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang / san
20b1(rgyud): thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob pa ba pa'i phyigs phyogs 'di dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming zhes pa pa bri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / yi dwags dang sha za dang 'arjed
20b2(rgyud): ba dang / 'byung po dang / mkha gro ma dang / gnon po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa dang / rgan po 'am/ rgan mo g.yog dang / 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig
20b3(rgyud): 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyidadu dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba dag ni phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bang ba kun tu 'bar bas ma'o// 
20b4(rgyud): tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyuraro// zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ stang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gan rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang
20b5(rgyud): ba dang sa ga'i 'dug stangs dang / zlum po'i 'dug sngangs dang / thun pa'i rkang skabs dang / dus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / rdo rjegade/ ga pa dang / rdorje 'jo tshul dang / rkang pa ya cig gi spyang / 
20b6(rgyud): dang seng ge stabs dang / seng ge skal pa dang / thub pa'i 'phung ba'i stabs dang / rdo rje smog dang rdo rje gsor ba dang / rdo rje'i stang sngabs dang / rdo rje gug pa dang / rdo rje gang dang rdo rje 'jig su rung ba dang rdo rje
20b7(rgyud): langs ma dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje'i byin rlabs dang / rdo rje'i gdu bu dang / bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul sdang stabs dang / rdo rje'i dra ba dang / stobs po che'i 'dogs pa dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje sgra dang / 
20b8(rgyud): ral gri thabs dang / rdo rje'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i thabs dang / btun shing gi thabs dang kha dan gyi thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / pad+ma'i tshul dang / be tson gyi thabs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i tshul
21a1(rgyud): dang lcags kyu'i thabs dang / 'bras bu'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi thabs dang / gzhu'i thabs dang / mda' bzung ba'i thabs dang / mda'a'angangs pa'i thabs dang / ngag mdung bskong ba'i thabs/ 
21a2(rgyud): dang mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang / mdung gi thabs dang / mtshon rtse cig pa'i thabs dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang / rdo rje 'dug stangs dang / ting 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang / rdo rje skyil mo krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug
21a3(rgyud): stangs dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / dpa' mo'i 'dug sngangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / tsog pu'i 'dug stangs dang rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang / mdun du dgu pa dang / phyir dgye ba dang / mtha'
21a4(rgyud): yas dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / sprid sgra dang / gsus bo che dang / rgyal ba'i phur bus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang / phur bu brda nga ba dang / dra ba dang ra bas mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing
21a5(rgyud): ba de lta dus sa gni rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bang bas/ 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan la dbab par bya'o// rang gi rje nganas smos te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod na
21a6(rgyud): 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyuraro// de nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas par bya ba ni// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo
21a7(rgyud): khyod ni dbang du gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya nas lan gsum brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du
21a8(rgyud): gnas par ba ste/ thugs btsor gnas pa'i dgongs pa can/ sangs rgyas bdag la dgong su gas la/ sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang / so ga ni yong su gzung bar mdzod/ de nas 'kho tsha
21b1(rgyud): dbus su chos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la// mtha' kun tu yang mtshan nas smos te thig ler bya'o// de ltar spyan dras te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung sde phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas sems
21b2(rgyud): can sta gon tu gnas par bya stau spos chus spyi bor bsang gtong bas nas/ lag pa snying kar bkram na su// rtse mo lnga brgya gram pa// g.yas ba srung skung brjings nas su// lag mthil so shing ku sha sbyin
21b3(rgyud): de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabasu btang ba dang / sdig pa kun tu bshags pa dang / bsod nams kyis rje su yi rang ba dang / bdag nyid dbul ba dang / byang chub tu ni sems bskyed par bya'o// de la 'di ni skyabasu 'gro
21b4(rgyud): pa yin te// gan mchag gsum la skya su mchi/ hrI/ pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste/ dasangs rgyas bying chub med kyis gzung zhes lan gsum brjid/ 
21b5(rgyud): de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o// de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du mnyes par 'gyur ba'i mchod pa cho ga bzang po ba ste/ slar yang gsheg su gsol bar bya'o// 
21b6(rgyud): nas mang du zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyis gzhing glo g.yas pas nyal te/ rmi lam bzang ngan bltas nas phyi de nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// tshan dang thig la sangs rgyas lnga'i/ ngo bo dag kyang sprul par
21b7(rgyud): 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste/ zhes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// tshon rtsod dargya
21b8(rgyud): ba brtsams par bya// dang por slob dpon nyid kyis dgye// de nas kun tu slob mas pa// dang po sa gzhi yongs gzung ba// gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste// nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yin/ tsher sna lnga pa'i
22a1(rgyud): skad bu mis khru myong ba'ang lnga 'argyab / kyil 'khong dpa pazag pa gag sangs thu lnga khrong ba'ang/ khrug pa ma bang du'o'o/ byungs pa la snga ldan pa dbabs pan pa rdzu
22a2(rgyud): ba yi// dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri// dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad pa'ag/ shar po gsu ri mi 'khrugs pa/ lho phyogasu ni rin chen 'byung // nub po gsu ni 'od dpag med// khang po gsuni don grub
22a3(rgyud): rnams 'khor lo grwar ni lha mo bzhi// dngos grub sbyin par mdzad par bri// dbang bdag gi phyogasu ni spyan// ma'i pogasu na~M mA ma ki'o// bden dral po gsu ni gos dkar can no// rlung gi pagasu ri lha mo sprul
22a4(rgyud): ma'o// rdo rje shugs kyis phyir byung nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogasu ni rdo rje sems ma/ lhor rdo rje rin chen ma/ nub tu rdo rje chos ma/ khyang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o// grwa rnamasu skul byed ma dang / r-in
22a5(rgyud): chen sgrol ma dang khro gnyid can dang / rdo rje lugu rgyud rnam so// de/ nas yang 'gying bag tu langs te/ rdo rje shugs kyis phyir dru nas rim pa gsum pa laM/ shang gsu byang chub
22a6(rgyud): sems dpa' byams pa dag 'jam dpal dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes togs rnams bri'o// lho phyogasu bzang skyong dang blo gros rgya mtsha dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa rnam
22a7(rgyud): bri'o// nub phyog su ni mthu chen thob dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o// byang phyogasu zla 'ong dang
22a8(rgyud): / 'od dpag med dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o// shar spod ni gshin rje mthar byed do// lho spong ni shes rab mthar byeng // nub spa ni pad+ma mthar byed/ khyang
22b1(rgyud): smon pagags kyi gshed bzang byed do// bla rnam su ni pri g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / bcon sngon po dang / stobs po che'i gzung rnam su rdzo dri'o// sngar nang logasu yang dro bri'o// 'khor mon tshan
22b2(rgyud): dkar pos bri'o// gnyis pa ni chen rtsi dab ba dang / ser po dang / sngon po gsum gyis bri'o// gsum pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta buni dkyil 'khor chen po yin// de nas dbang bskung ba'i don du dkyi
22b3(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o// dbus su ni pad+ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o// snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyog su ni rdo rje'o// lho phyogasu ni rin po che/ nub phyogs
22b4(rgyud): su ni pad+ma/ dang po gsu ri ral gri sta/ de lnga bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te/ spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog
22b5(rgyud): gi phreng ba mgo la bcings nas mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la/ ldum bu yis ni kha bkab pa/ rin chen sman 'byung sna lnga dang / spos chu yis ni bkang ba dang / bum pa mngon par
22b6(rgyud): bsngags par bya/ rnab rgyal bub pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bani// las kun bde pas bzlas brjod do// sems cad kun gyis bsang gtor ba// 
22b7(rgyud): yang ma ku shau'i rkun pos bya// de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lnga bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bkru ba la sogs pa
22b8(rgyud): dbulo/ de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grwar bzhag par bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbusu spyan drangs par de'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan
22b9(rgyud): drangs nas gsal bdu bya ste// gzhug pa dang / bsdams pa dang / dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang / ra ba dang / dra bas pogs bcing ba dang / mtshams gcad ba bas la/ mchod yod dang / rabs bsil dang / 
23a1(rgyud): / gdan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa yang bsngos te phul ras phyag rgya'i tshigs rang rang la bstan par bya'o// bstod pa dang / rdo rje'i glu dang / dril bu bsil ba'i sgra dang / sil skar dang / gling bu dang rgyud kyi
23a2(rgyud): rtswa 'ang ba yang 'dul rol ma dulang bang gar rnams kyis kyang brjod par bya'o 'aslang nas 'thod par gsol te dngas grub thams cad kyi ba gsol ba gang go de nas slob dpon pa dag zhing zhugs te khri
23a3(rgyud): 'og tu slob ma bzhu'o// de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang ngag rgyas gnas lngar srung zhing gnas lngar chog pa'o// hA oM dzin dzika/ oM A ro l-i ka/ hUM badz+ra dzAka sA rAt+na d+h+r-ikahA pradz+nyA dz+dza// de nas tshig su bcad
23a4(rgyud): ba 'dis gzhug par ba ste/ rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'di/ bad gis slob ma gzhug par ba/ rdo rje sems mes me tog gtor ba
23a5(rgyud): bgyi ste/ pra tIn+d+re badz+ra ha~M/ tshig su bcad ba 'dis gdong g.yogs 'gre'o// di ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni dkyil 'khor de/ nga 'dir blta bar gyis/ sangs rgyas gdung gi rigasu 'khrungs// 
23a6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs/ dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed// rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid shes padag// de yi snying po 'di yin de/ 
23a7(rgyud): ra bya badz+ra gang la mchog ba pa de de'i lnga yon/ de nas dang bskur sbyin pa ste/ dri dang me tog drang bas rgyan/ gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// steng du blar bre babyabya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa / 
23a8(rgyud): dang lha dang ma sa pa'i srung pa dag 'du 'a dag dang ga rags dang kyi kri gis yi byed rnams kyis srungs/ slob ma ga da pral ba la slo ba da kyisani gatsho nga / do po nas rgyal bus pa mas das
23b1(rgyud): lnga po ba rnams dang / ldarnapas kun gyi ba'i po yis grang gis tshigs pacang glu smra dang rdo rje drol bu gsol ba yis / chub bkun gyis mngon sum du / til gyi gang bu bzhin gang pa'i rgyal ba bum pa 'thang
23b2(rgyud): ras ni// de nyid la de dbang bsku ba/ dkyil 'khor de'ang rig par bas pa/ de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya/ thung ba me ling 'khor lo dang / dung dang rdo glegs papa dang / gser ngas / 
23b3(rgyud): dang ni dngul rnams kyis/ mi shes rab rib la sogs pa/ ci nus par ni bsal bar bya/ thung pa la sogs med na yang / phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya// de nas dang tshig bstan par bya// de ring phyin chad
23b4(rgyud): bu khyod kyis/ srog dang lus la bar gyur kyang // dpa pa de'i chos dang byang chub sems// slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ rdo rje sgra dan rnams bku sti zhing / sdang la byams shing chags bral ba// nam
23b5(rgyud): kyang bya ba ma yin// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyis//  da ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dod// de nas bla mas yon blangs te// sa dang yi da 'ong chung ma dang // rin chen gsor dang nor bu 'bar// mu tig byi ru
23b6(rgyud): la sogs dang / lus kyang dngul du bzhug par ba/ bla ma la ni gus pa yi/ slob mas de bzhin kho nang bya/ bla ma de ni mgu bdub bla ma mgu ba dngos grub kyi// gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung / de nas slob pa
23b7(rgyud): bslang ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyad sngar mchod pang ste spyod bsreg gi las bya'o// de nas chog mthong bas las byas nas/ sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang // de bzhin sgob pa'i rim pa'i tshul
23b8(rgyud): ni dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// las rnams thams cad tshim par bya// de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// rgyal ba thams cad gshegasu gsol// sgrims te tshen rtsi rnams bsdus nas/ chu klung
24a1(rgyud): chen por bsru das kyang kha mo lci bas drug bdub/ dkyil 'khor gyi de yo byadakurd/ slob dpod nyid kyis bskung bar ba/ slob pas cud zad mi bskud de/ de ni dang tshig nyams par 'gyur/ slob
24a2(rgyud): dpor gyis kyang ci rigs par/ bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad bdug/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di dkyil 'khom ngos bong pi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
24a3(rgyud): sdang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs nas pag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ pag na
24a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsang sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams 'on cig/ phag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshod du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa
24a5(rgyud): bshadu gsol// oM las rnam par sdang mdzad// oM hUM moM 'khrugs pa'i 'o// oM trai rid chen 'byung gnaso// oM hri/ 'od dpag med do// oM khaM don yod grub pa'i'o// oM ga ga na lo tsa ne hUM/ spyan
24a6(rgyud): byi'o// iM ka~M ri ki ri mA pa ki hUM pA ba ka'i'o// oM ka DoM ba~M ka Ta~M ka Ta ka Ta ka ro Ta bId+ha swA hUM/ gos dkang ba'i'o// oM tI d+d+he tu ra swA hA/ sgrol ba'i'o// mo satwar+b+ba badz+ri hU~M/ rdo rje sems ma'i'o// oM rat+na badz+ra n+da/ 
24a7(rgyud): rdorje na ma'i 'o// oM d+harma hrIts+tsha rjerje chos pa'i'o// oM karba d+hA d+ha/ rdorje las ma'o'o// oM tsa le nu le kun de hUM/ sbrul byed pa'i 'o// oM tra lo ka rahA dz+wa la~M ni swAhA/ rin chen sgrol ma'i 'o// oM dz+dza \u0f7fts+tsha
24a8(rgyud): kyi mag so la 'i rdzul 'al jo su lda 'i rnam byam pa dzag mo su la me la gyig yos kya du tu ga mi / chos mra ga / 
24b1(rgyud): d+hA ge zhung / ye shes chos/ mo bla dra ba'i thadra pA le hUM/ bathang rdzong/ oM sA ga re ba hA sA gare hUM blo gas rgya mtsho'o/ oM ak+Sha la hU~M/ ak+Sha ya thA a ka rma A pa daNapa d+han swAhA / khro gros mi zad pa'o/ ma
24b2(rgyud): ma ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros so// oM dz+wa li ni ma bA dz+wa la ni tAM/ dra ba can gyi 'od do// oM su d+ha na shri ye hUM/ nor bzang so// oM tsan dre tsan+den+dan+na bya ba lo ki te swA hA/ zla 'ong ngo // oM a pr-i te
24b3(rgyud): br-i b+ha a br-i te hUM/ 'od dpag medo/ oM ga ga ne ga ga na bar lo tsa ra hUM/ namakha' mdzod/ oM sarba ni ba ra Na biSh+pe b+hi ni hUM/ smib pa rnab par sel ba'o// oM ya mAR+tha kr-ita/ gshin rje be shed// oM pradz+nyA rA krita/ 2
24b4(rgyud): gyis mi 'byu pa/ oM pa pa kri/ rdza grang/ mo ma mr-i kur+dz+dza'i baig+h+nA krig du rtsi za ba snad/ oM a tsal dzI/ mi gsoba'o// oM hUM 'dod pa'i rgyal bar/ oM trail de d+ham hA
24b5(rgyud): hUM/ be can sngon po'o// oM kro d+ha hUM dzaH// stobs po che'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dgo// 'di dag la brten nas ting 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags
24b6(rgyud): bye ba phrag du ma gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyad drang// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyaso// rigs pa'i lha po rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum rnams
24b7(rgyud): song khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag rgyaso// bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyaso// pa nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyaso// de dag la sogs pa ni spyan drangs pa'i sbyor ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'dra
25a1(rgyud): dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam
25a2(rgyud): bang 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pag na rdo rje ras sam cig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan sgrub pa dmigs pa gang gis gas
25a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang rnams kyis ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes rdzogs pas sangs rgyas nyid bde brag tu thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lnga smos kyi dgos pa'i gseng sngags kyi tshogs thams cad
25a4(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yis 'on cig/ oM gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad nishes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
25a5(rgyud): mchog gis mchod// zhi ba thod tshugs cod pan 'chang // zhal gsuM ma gyis ni rnam par brgyan// gser gyi mdog can phyag drug pa// dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can// bgrang phreng ldan zhing
25a6(rgyud): mdar yis rgyad/ g.yan gyis lce ma'i dum 'dzin/ 'khor lo dang zhigazhu gas shing / lha rnams dreng cing khams rnams 'jog 'bang ba'i 'ad kyil rgyan pa la/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spri 'brog tu
25a7(rgyud): byung rnying legs 'khyud pa// de nyi spyod yul can bsgoms te/ gsang sngags nang gis bzlas brjod pa// ting 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// oM zhes bya
25a8(rgyud): ba'i tshigs gi la mi/ 'jig rten dang 'phrug 'od chen pasam/ tho tshugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha// dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan// rgyan noms kun gyis btsun pa ste// gtso ba zla ba'i gzugs
25b1(rgyud): pras pa gdus spyad gsum sa drug gru chus sdu sa pa bas jug gnyis la tshul cas galas dgra bre 'ams/ g.yon pas sum 'dzin pa la la ba stsa rnags gsu
25b2(rgyud): ba na/ gzugs rnams thams cad 'phro mdzad cing // kun sa 'od zer phreng ba can// l-ig nas mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i// bgegs 'gyel ba la lnga byed pa'i// de 'dra'i tshig gis lam bsgoms
25b3(rgyud): na ring po mi thogs sangs rgyas 'thob// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i gzugs la hU~M zhes pa// sems kyi
25b4(rgyud): rdo rje bsgoms par bya// mthing shing bzang po lta bu'i mdog/ rgyan rna mas kun gyis rangab klubs pa// cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ rin chen rnams kyis yongasu rgyan// zhal ras gsum
25b5(rgyud): ldar spyan gsum pa// cung zad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg can// phyag brgyad/ kyis ni brgyan pa la/ rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang // gnyis pa na ni ra/ la gri gdangs// lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na// 
25b6(rgyud): bzhi po yis ni mda' yang gsod/ de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams// de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud// gsum pa na ni zhags pa ste// bzhi pa lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin/ rol pa'i stabasu legs par bcun
25b7(rgyud): de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag smos pa/ de yi rdo rje sems bstan zhing / ring por mi thogs byang chub thob/ rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro// sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas
25b8(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya pa'i ding 'dzin to//  gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ rin po 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de// zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa// thob rmugs cad
26a1(rgyud): pan rnams kyis rgyan/ bde 'a chen po kha dog dbang // ting 'dzi phyag rgya rnam par bzhugs/ sems dpa'i stsol krung bcas pa ste/ phyag g.yas na ni rdo rje dang / g.yon pa rin chen yong su 'dzin/ 'o
26a2(rgyud): za ser po 'phro ba las// rid chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis// rin chen char gyi rgyas par byas// rin chen mngon par tho ba'i ye shes rdo rje 'as bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 
26a3(rgyud): gaM ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ don yod rdo rje bsam par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa// margad rta yi 'od ltar 'bar// g.yas pa'i bag na ral gri dang // g.yod pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid// sangs
26a4(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing // legs par grub phyir slar yang sdud// 'od chung chen pos rab gsal zhing // ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs 'di 'dra rtag tu sems byed pa// na mkha' snying po
26a5(rgyud): thub pa che// 'du byed thams cad spangs pa yau/ mkha' dang mnyam par de 'gyur ro// na mkha'i snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ ting 'dzin to// la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ 
26a6(rgyud): rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang rgyan// lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa// zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba// cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags ma// dang po
26a7(rgyud): phyag ni mchog sbyin mdzad// de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin// phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste// bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// rin chen snya ma gnyis pa na// gsum
26a8(rgyud): bo na ni bgrang phreng ste/ bzhi pa gzhu yis legs par rgyan// 'od dma'i 'od zeng phreng ba can// lha rnams 'jigs pas sems mos te/ lag pa thal mo sbyor bas da// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro ba ba/ 
26b1(rgyud): ye shes rdo nga spyad pa bsam/ khang nub yan lag 'bras rgyan pa'i// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ma yi ye shas las bsgrubs pa
26b2(rgyud): rdo rje rigs ca pA pa kI/ lha mi zhal gsum phag drug ma// dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas/ ud pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ 'od dmar shin tu 'bang ba can/ dang po mi 'jigs sbyid pa'i pag// gzhes
26b3(rgyud): ba legs par rdo rje bsdams// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams// gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// rdo rje can
26b4(rgyud): ma sku gsum 'chang // dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba// 'di 'dra sgom pas bsgom par bya'o// sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
26b5(rgyud): pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yus/ maung ni gis dag can zhes bya// spyan gsu mdog gis rnam par rgyan// zhal ras gsum pa dag mdzad pa/ byag
26b6(rgyud): drug mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa// gnyis pa na ni rdo rje sde// gsum pa mda' yis rnam par rgyan// g.yon pa pad+ma bsnams par bya// gnyis pa na ni bgrang nong phreng // gsum pa na ni gzhu bsdams shing / rol pa'i
26b7(rgyud): stabasu lags por bzhugs// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad// pad+ma'i sprin gyis rgyas par sgom// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ rin chen skur ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul
26b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//  ya~M ye shes las bsdus pa/ lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che// 'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa/ zhal ras gsum pa spyad
27a1(rgyud): gangag drug sems dpa'i skyil lo krung / bzhad pa margad 'od dang ldan// dang po 'i 'jigs sbyin pa'i bag// gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsdams// gsum pa na ni mdarang yang gsod// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i
27a2(rgyud): mdzum mo ste// gnyis pa na ni ut+pal nyid// gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can// sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa/ dga' mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// rtag par rgyun tu bsgo
27a3(rgyud): ba bya// sems can thams cad dang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming // sems ma dang ni
27a4(rgyud): rig chen ma/ chos ma rdo rje las ma ste/ rol pas rje su mnyes mdzad ma// de dag ji ltar rigs par sgrim/ de dag kyang da ni bsgoms pa yis/ ring por mi thogs byang chub thob/ sems can
27a5(rgyud): rab tu dga' byed pa'i// 'phags ma bzhi yi ting 'a dzin to// cung gi yi ge las bsgrubs pa/ ming ni bskul byed ces ma'i gzugs// sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag/ bdun gyis gsang
27a6(rgyud): sngags klu yis bstod/ yi ge dgu pa thabs dgu can/ lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin// zhal gsum ston ka'i 'das bu mdog rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na rlung skal ldan dang la ba
27a7(rgyud): mas ldan sa khams cad stsol mdzid pa/ dang patsham ma ya mam/ khan cing spyad gsus ldan pa sgra/ gams kyi zhalan rnam gnas pa// su la ldan pa 'ad pa sa pa na chen
27a8(rgyud): pa nan/ yun rdzus padi pa mdzad/ g.yon ga di dam / chom gyis rlos rnam par mad / khom pa sta su legs pa du sa/ nga su pa pa dmigs kyis rgyan / 
27b1(rgyud): ngag nyi shu rtsa drug la phag gnyis rtsa ba'i phag rgyas snying ka'i gnas rnam par rgyan pa'o// g.yas pa gnyis pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// gsum pa na ral gri'o// bzhi pa na rin po che sbyin pa'o// lnga
27b2(rgyud): pa na shing tog pa dzaM pu ra'o// drug pa na mdar gsor ba'o// bdun pa na dgra sta'o// brgyad pa na dbyug to'o// dgu pa na tho ba'o// bcu pa na lcags kyu'o// bcu gcig pa na rdo rje'o// bcu gnyis pa nas gol
27b3(rgyud): rtogs pa'o// bcu gsum pa na bgrang bre'o// g.yon pa gnyis be na yid bzhin nong bu'i rgyal mtshan// gsum pa na bad+ma'o/ bani pa na ril baspyi blugs te'o// lnga pa na nags pa'i// drug pa na gzhu'o// dun
27b4(rgyud): ba na mdung thung / brgyad par 'khor la'o// dgu ba na du// bcu pa na bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o/ bcu gcig pa na bum pa bdang po'i/ cu gnyis pa na tha mad/ bcu gsum pa shes pa
27b5(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'od zer dmar po'i dzin/ la 'khor can/ pad+ma la bzhugs bsgob par bya// la yi zhing cung / bgos pa yi// steng du bla gos gyon pa ste// sna tshogs tshig kun
27b6(rgyud): gzar gsor// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs 'phro// sum bcu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang // bgegs rnams shin tu 'jigs skrag par// thal mo sbyor bar byed
27b7(rgyud): bste 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing / bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des/ sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur ro// ngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smras/ ding 'dzin ba thob 'gyur zhing / sdom
27b8(rgyud): bkun las rnam par 'grol/ rgyal ba mthar yas pa'i ye shis bskul par byed pa'i skabos kyi rnam par rgyal bzhes pa'i ro ti 'dzin to/ nga mi ye shes la bsgrubs gad smra na
28a1(rgyud): bya'i gzugs// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ na rlung dang la bab pa'i tshad// zhal ni cung zad pa nad pa ste/ phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams/ 
28a2(rgyud): phyag gnyis rin tshon thal mo ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba 'khrug/ g.yas pa'i phyag na mi 'jigs sbyin// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor// g.yon mdzub ma rungs rnams la bsdigs// 
28a3(rgyud): gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar// rol stabs thabs kyi zhabs kyis gnon// sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud// chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi// lha mo 'di 'dra
28a4(rgyud): bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// b+h+rU~M yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// 'jigs las sgrol ba khro gnyer can// zhal ras gsu
28a5(rgyud): pa spyad gsum pa/ ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshung sa/ phyag drug pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ rol pa'i stengs la brtson pa/ ste// zhal ni khro dang bcas par bshad// legs par 'bar ba'i
28a6(rgyud): rtser lha can// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa be tsan 'dzin par bshad/ gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams
28a7(rgyud): gsum pa na ni mtshon mgo nu// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i// nyal dang 'greng dang 'dug pa na// lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom// 'jigs pa thams cad
28a8(rgyud): dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ ming ni rdo rje lug rgyud// thams cad 'ching ba bskyed pa ste/ sems can ma rungs phung bar byed
28b1(rgyud): sasangs gsub pa spyan gsub pa/ phyag drug spobs gzugs bza pa// zhal mi chung zad bshad par mdzad/ lag pa g.yas mdzo rje ste/ gnyis pa rjod 'gu rgyud/ gsum pa na ni mdar yang bsdus/ 
28b2(rgyud): g.yon pa bsdogs pa'i mdzub mo s+ho// gnyis pa na ni zhags par gsungs// gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtson// sangs rgyas rnams ni sprin 'phro ba// rdo rje lug rgyud bsgoms na/ byang chub skad
28b3(rgyud): cig gis 'thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// rdo rje sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// me yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ thub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni// zhal
28b4(rgyud): ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// de yi 'og na pad+ma ste// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// phag bzhi dag gis rnam par rgyun// phyag gnyis chos 'chad pag rgyas brgyan// g.ya
28b5(rgyud): pa yis ni phag gnyis pa// sems can skyob pa ma chog sbyin mdzad// goyon pa lha rdzas klu shing gi/ me tog ze 'bru 'i mgo lcags bsnams// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
28b6(rgyud): yi sprin chen de bzhi 'phro bar mdzad// byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyan pa'i ting 'dzin to// mu gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gzhon nu 'jam pa tshig gi lam/ shes rab ya
28b7(rgyud): shes mi chog thob pa/ the'i ma tshul ni sbyin pa 'o// zhal gsum spyan gsum zung dung gsum// gzhon du rgyun gyis brgyan pa ste/ cod par zang po mi 'khrugs can/ btog sna tshogs rnams
28b8(rgyud): kyis srungs// 'og na pa chen po la// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol bste/ zhal cung zad pa nad pa la/ dpa' mchen po lag drug pa/ dngang mi 'jigs
29a1(rgyud): spyod bdug gnyis pa 'di gru'i / gsum padan papa yang gsong/ de bzhidag med pa shes rab 'chang / gnyis pa na'i mad la thabs/ gsum padzan ga byung / shes pa
29a2(rgyud): ye shes mchog gis klubs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin gyi bsnams/ 'bro bar sangs rgyas 'dod pas sgo pa// 'jam pa mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// spos
