29a3(rgyud): kyi glang po ye shes tog/ de bzhin du ni bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros ni// mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid// ngan song kun spong mthu chen thob/ mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo// dang bzang
29a4(rgyud): dang na dri ba'i 'od// de bzhin zla 'od 'di dpag med/ na// mkha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel// de ltar de sogs grangs med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa kun/ sa bon yig 'bru rnams
29a5(rgyud): las 'khrungs/ yi ge phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ sna tshogs thabs kyis rol par mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu/ gsang sngags bzlos par
29a6(rgyud): bsgob pa bya/ mdog ldan du zhing 'phro mdzad pa// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsam/ hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi// gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grangs pa
29a7(rgyud): bskal po'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// char sprin gyi ni 'od dang 'dra// zhal drag pa la bag dag pa// de bzhin zhabs drug ma'i thung 'dra// gsus khyim shin tu che ba ste/ de ni drag po chen po yin// lcags 'dril
29a8(rgyud): rdo rje mche ba can/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// stag lpags kyi ni sham thabs bgos/ rol pa'i stabs can ma he bcibs/ de yi 'og tu pad+ma byas// mi thod phreng can skra 'khyil pa/ a gcom ser/ 
29b1(rgyud): la sgra cher 'byin// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrungs pa/ sku gsum la ni rnam par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i dpal gyis rnam par rgyan// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// gas
29b2(rgyud): ba'i tshems kyi sgros mnan khros// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa na ni rdo rje nyid// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni
29b3(rgyud): ru ma 'dzin/ gsum pa gzhu ni brdungs pa yis// shin tu legs par rnam par rgyan// lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyud// gnyis pa na ni ud pa la thogs// g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba// pad+ma dkar
29b4(rgyud): bai thogs par bya// 'og tu lha dang bgegs kyi rnams/ snga ma drang nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar dang baHsa// sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud/ rnal 'byor dgi sgon su
29b5(rgyud): bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa de// 'dug/ dang nyal dang 'chag pa na// legs par bsams te kun zos shi nga // 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod kyang // na mkha' lta bur gos mi
29b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub
29b7(rgyud): pa la zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag drug gis ni rnam par rgyan// mdog ser mo thung gzugs can la// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs
29b8(rgyud): sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ dang po'i nol ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin yas pa rnam par bsgyur// g.yon pa tshems kyi smos kyang mnan/ sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste// lag pa
30a1(rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje thogs// gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste// gsum par ni dada' yang thogs// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa
30a2(rgyud): gzhu can yin par gsungs// spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs pa// ram bzhin 'phro zhing bsdud pa ste// 'di 'dra goms pas bsgom par bya// zlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye
30a3(rgyud): shes rdo rje zhes pa ba'i ting 'dzin to// ha yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ khro bo pad+ma mthar byed pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// kha dog dmang po phyag brgyad spyan// sku raM sbrul gyis dkris pa ste/ pad+ma la bzhugs
30a4(rgyud): rol pa'i snabs// khro ba lta bas grajigs mdzad pa/ dang pa la ni/ de mthong ba'ang / g.yas pa ltag sna hU~Ml ba ste/ g.yon pa kyis sgros mnan pa/ sdug ljags gsol ni
30a5(rgyud): ba la g.yas pa'i phag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni dngag to gsung sa// gsum pa na ni lcags kyu ste/ bzhi pa ni ni mda' yang gsod/ g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzu mo ste// gnyis pa yis
30a6(rgyud): ni nu ma 'dzin// gsu mo pa na ni pad+ma ste/ bzhi pa na ni gzhu nyid do// de yi cod pan mi 'khrugs pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag/ 'phro zhing 'du bar bsgoms byas na// 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// 
30a7(rgyud): mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed// me yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin// lag na rdo rjes 'brangs pa// zhal ras gsum pa
30a8(rgyud): spyan gsum pa/ bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad pag drug can// dang po'i nal ni band pa ste/ de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa// g.yon po tshoms kyi sgros mnan khro/ ud pal sngon po'i mdab 'dra
30b1(rgyud): mdog zhabs kyis 'gegs ni mnan pa ste/ gnyis pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag na la gri ste/ gnyis pa na ni dgra stang gsungs// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsod// g.yon pa bsdigs
30b2(rgyud): mdzub nags pa can/ de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gzhi yang gsungs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar// ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya// bgegs rnams thams cad 'dral ba'i
30b3(rgyud): ye shes kyi rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// hUM gaM yaM shes las bsgrubs pa/ mi g.yo bus pa'i gzugs dang ldan// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan
30b4(rgyud): pa la 'dang po zhal ni bzhad pa ste// de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas/ khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags kyang 'dril// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgro sa mnan kho/ hU~M gis snying ka'i phyogs kyang bkang / 
30b5(rgyud): mthing shun gyi ni mdog can ste/ rin chen ri stangs pad+ma la/ rol pa 'i zhabs kyis stabasu bzhugs// thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'jing joms// ngag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi// 'od bzang dam
30b6(rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor na// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste/ gnyis pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor// g.yon pas bsdigs mjug nags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsuM
30b7(rgyud): ba gzhun brdungs pa la/ tshangs pas gzungs sde lnga pa dang / sna tshogs ma dog gos bcings pa'i/ cod pan dang ni ngang rgyun rdzogs zung pud g.yod pa bung ba'i mdog mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par rgyun
30b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin dgis// cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro// de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang / sgom pas sgom par bad ba de// blan pad pa'i byang chub kyi// tham skas la ni 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin
31a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa zhes pa ba'i ring 'dzin to//  gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa ying na 'dod pa'i rgyal po snga/ 
31a2(rgyud): zhal ras gsub ba spyadan gsum pa/ phyag drug pa zhes bya bar bsgrags// dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis rgyan pa'i// thor tshugs cod par bzang po can/ dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa la// g.yas pa'i sa ni rnam par
31a3(rgyud): bsgrung g.yon pa tshems kyi sgros mnan khro// dpral ba khro gnyer rim pa can// 'bar ba char sprin lta bu'i mdog// dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can// phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phag rgyar ldan// g.yas pa na
31a4(rgyud): ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' yis rnam par rol// g.yon pa yis ni du ma 'dzin// gsum pa'i bag na gzhu yang bsnams/ pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i thabs// 'og tu bgegs kya
31a5(rgyud): rnam par mnan/ sangs rgyas lang long 'pho mdzad pa/ ting 'dzin gyi/ sa sgo ba byas na/ bla na med po'i ye shes 'brob/ snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes
31a6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// khro bo be con sngon po can/ zhal ras gsub pa spyan gsum pa/ ngag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg pa dang // de bzhin gal
31a7(rgyud): pa rnam par gdangs/ g.yon pa tshems kyis smos kyang mnan// sku ni kha chu 'dra ba ste/ lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par rgyad// blo tshogs lcang long 'khyil pa ste// dab rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs khad+gal
31a8(rgyud): bzhugs rol stabs can/ g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni bi cin nyid/ gsum pa mtshan ma mda' dang ldan/ g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa ste// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma dzin/ gtsu
31b1(rgyud): nganadag nyid bsdabs/ kyil 'khod dbang po 'bang ba can/ spyong ba'i ye shes kyis bkun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprid ni rtag tu 'phro/ bgegs kyis rdog pa'i ye shes thos rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
31b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin daM/ hUM zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni/ ye shes dam pa stobs po che// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par rgyan// sprin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par
31b3(rgyud): brgyan mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes// mgo bo la ni pi 'khrugs bzhugs/ dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa tshams kyi spros mnan pa// pad+ma la
31b4(rgyud): bzhugs 'gying bag ce na// drag po'i tshem rngam sdang stabs can/ phyogs bcu'i lha rnams rung bang mdzad// 'bar ba rnams kyis yong sa bskor ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang du bzhugs// 
31b5(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ gnyis pa btson thogs par mtshon// gsum pa yis ni ral gri gdengs// bzhi pa mda' yis rnam bar rgyan// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can
31b6(rgyud): gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum par ni tho ba nyid // phyag bzhi pa ni gan can la// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba// sgom pa mchogs bsgom par bya// gnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i stobs
31b7(rgyud): kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// b+h+ya gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gtsug gtor 'khor los bsgrub ba ste// sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum// gser gyi mdog can 'di zang ba/ 'dod
31b8(rgyud): gang 'od kyis rnab par rgya/ ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam par gnas/ rin chen stengs pad+ma'i/ rdo rje skyil mo krung du btsugs/ rigs kyi yum ni bani po rnams/ gzugs dang yan lagakun pa das can nam
32a1(rgyud): ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rgyar// gos dang rgyar gyis klubs pa ste// chags pir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// phyag rgya rin chen snyi ma dang / rdo rje pad+ma u dpal ldan// lha mo so so'i phyogs
32a2(rgyud): ra bzhugs// gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can// kun tu 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang // 'khor lo'i bar rdo rdo rje gnas// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas// na mkha' thams cad
32a3(rgyud): 'gengs par mdzad/ byang chub snying po don gnyer bas// 'di 'dra 'khor lo can sgom zhing / bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis/ ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'thib/ ngang chub snying po thams cad kyi
32a4(rgyud): rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// je gyi ye shes la sa bsgrubs pa/ gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can// zhal ras gsum pa ngag gnyis na/ bI dza pu ri ne'u le can
32a5(rgyud): pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'am// yang na bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas// ngos na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// brgyan pa 'i gnod sbyin mo bzhi dag/ rin chen char pa 'bebs
32a6(rgyud): par byed// mgo bo'i steng na sangs rgyas lnga// da yi cod pan bzang po yi// g.yon phyogs rtse bran rgyan yang chags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // rin chen char pa 'bebs par mdzad// gang zhig
32a7(rgyud): nor rdzas 'dod pa yis// gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgom byas na// de yis sa chen nor rdzas kyis/ ring por mi thogs gang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi// chu yang rtag tu dbul bar bya// rin po
32a8(rgyud): tshe sprin sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// nyi ma'i 'ad ltar 'od zer can// rta dun ldan pa'i shing rtang bzhugs// 'bong ba'i lag
32b1(rgyud): 'khyod snang mdzad pa// zhalangs gsum pa spyad gsum ldan phyag drug la dag ser po srung / phyogs bcu srung bar brtson pa ste/ 'jo skrag rdul dun la yang bdang / rung rgyun ni g.yobasas / tshad pa rdzon
32b2(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas lnga/ thong tshugs me tog rnams kyis rgyan// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni khe bskud bsdams// gsum pa ni de meda' yang gsod// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhabs pa
32b3(rgyud): gnyis pa a shwa'i yal ga ste// gsum pa na ni gzhu 'od// gzugs brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis// sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba dang / rig dang kha ni 'dub par byed/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'ang
32b4(rgyud): bdag/ gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ lha mo hUM mdzod bsgom bar bya/ 'di ni sgom par byed pa yin// dbang du sems can rab tu 'gro/ sdang po rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i
32b5(rgyud): rdo rje mchog bces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ba yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// dag pa'i ro khrod shing lo can// zhal ras gsum po sbyin gsum pa/ zhal ras banod cing khro dang bcas
32b6(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ na rlung gzhon phyag drug ma// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ gnyis pa na ni dgra snga nyid// gsum pa mda' yang rnam par gsor// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags
32b7(rgyud): ba can cha gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste// phyag gsum pa ni gzhu nyid// thor tshugs ma tog phreng bas rgyan/ de stang kha dog lnga po dag/ rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// mdog ser pad+ma'i ga
32b8(rgyud): la bzhugs/ dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'bang ba// khro ba'i sgron 'dri sdud mdzad cing / gdon gang skyes dgu'i nang gnas pa/ dge khro bo'i mes kyang srag/ phying yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyis/ 
33a1(rgyud): kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad/ de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na/ mi ngas thams cad zhi bar mdzad// nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 
33a2(rgyud): dza yi ya shes las sgrub pa/ rigs sngags mtshan ni dug sal ma// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdangs ka can// nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// gzhon nu mtshan ni 'bar
33a3(rgyud): ba can rabazhad cing khro dang bcas pa ste// sbrul gyi ska rags dgis rgyan// phyag drug rol pa'i stang stabs can// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa ral
33a4(rgyud): gri thogs par brtson// phyag gsum pa ni gang thabs kyis// stang sbab// sa tshul gyis mdara' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub na// gas pa can// gnyis padug me tog can/ phyag
33a5(rgyud): gsum pa ni gzhu nyid do// dbu rgyan ma tog rnams kyis brgyan// gser me dog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od ni dmar po dkyil 'khor can/ dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste// kunas 'bar
33a6(rgyud): ba rnams kyis khebs// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'phro ba can// phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i// kha ni rnga yis rnam rgyan pas/ dug gis phog pa rnams la ldugs// rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma
33a7(rgyud): dug gis phog pa rnams la sgom// de ltar sgom par byas pa yis/ ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sol ba// gdengs ka'i dbang po rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag phyi zhes bya ba'i
33a8(rgyud): ti 'dzin to// tri li ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ sku tshon ta la ta la ste/ zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ thong tshugs cod pa ni rnams kyis rgyan/ zla ba tshes pa bsnams pa'i lho// dbu rgyan tha~Md bad/ 
33b1(rgyud): gis brgyan// thor tshugs rgyal po'i sku dathugs bzhugs/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ pad+ma dkar po lta bur snang // sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can/ phyag brgya zhal yang bzhad pa sdu/ 
33b2(rgyud): smad g.yogs stag gi lpags pa banabs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa bgrang nor phreng ba can// gsum pa yis ni mnga' yang gsod// g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par rgyan// gnyis pa yis
33b3(rgyud): ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gnu nyid// g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa la// sbrul gyis yongasu dkris pa snga// g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i// me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba// pad+ma dmar po la
33b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa// rol pa'i stang stabs tshul du gnas/ rin chen ri phug nang ba zhugs par/ rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni// cho 'phru
33b5(rgyud): chen po sna tshogs 'byung // rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis/ kha zas thams cad za byed cing // nang gi sngags pas sngags brjod cing // rim bzhini rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na// byang chub myur du
33b6(rgyud): thob 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dran/ 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrubs pa/ ho la ha la yongasu mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ 
33b7(rgyud): sdong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i/ lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste/ sdang po'i sems can 'joms mdzad pa/ phyag stong ldan zhing dbu sdong la/ spyan gsum dgis rnam par rgyan// brtson chen phyag brgyan
33b8(rgyud): khro ba dang / sdig pa'i thabs kyis dgongs pa can/ phyag g.yas mtshad sbying lnga rdzas kyi/ ral gri lcags kyu mdang dang ldan/ phyag g.yod 'ad+mo rjed / 'gas pa gzhung sbyar can/ mngag dmang nal
34a1(rgyud): ras bzhi pa ste// bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin/ rang gi rnal 'bor la brtson pas/ dmakha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing sgo/ glang po rtsa dang skyes pa dag/ za bar mdzad pa phreng
34a2(rgyud): ba can de yi las kyis bskul ba yi// gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya// rnal 'bor dbang phyug las 'dod pas// 'di bas pas ni srung bar 'gyur// dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad
34a3(rgyud): srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// d+hi zhes bya bas bskrad pa'i bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo'i phag rgya car drag po
34a4(rgyud): chen mo zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam pa/ dar brgyan pa la/ ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / 'khor li dang / mad snrums pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / gzhu
34a5(rgyud): dang chom rkun mdzub mos bsdigs pa ste/ rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba/ dag/ mthong bas dpung rnams bcom gtor bas/ lha mo rtag tu ba skabs na ni// ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ 
34a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ stobs mo che pha rol gnon par mdzad ma
34a7(rgyud): spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / mda' dang / phyag g.yon na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / gzhu bsdam
34a8(rgyud): bdag sdang ba'i bgegs rnams ltung bar mdzad par bya'o// bu mi 'tshe dang mo gsham dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcug na su// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa yis/ slob dpor gyis ni dbang bskor ni
34b1(rgyud): de yi mngal du byis pa ni// 'jam pa'i gzugs can 'jug par bsam// zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngan nas// skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang // dran pa yis ni bral nas kyang // mjal ni bsod
34b2(rgyud): nams dag gis sbal// mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ba yi ye shes rol pas bkun// lnga po nor gyi zla
34b3(rgyud): gros pa/ gzi byin gser gyi mdog can la/ phyag drug lang tshe dang la bab/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyad pa ste// 'jo sgeg thabs bcas 'bar ba ste// de yi phag g.yas mchog sbyin mdzad// gzhi
34b4(rgyud): pa 'bru yi snyi po can// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang // rin chen char 'bebs gzhu yang 'dzin// grogs mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing
34b5(rgyud): mngago gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs// rin chen char pa 'babs pa dang // nor kun gyi ni char pa dag/ 'babs par byed pa bsam par bya// nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di// da ltar
34b6(rgyud): sngags pas bsgoms na de// dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang / nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad/ byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma/ de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid sgom// nor gyi rgyun gyi char rab
34b7(rgyud): tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// ba yi ye shes las bsgribs pa/ srin mo 'bar ba'i klog phreng can/ ming ni dngul dkar los skyes mo// stobs mo che la pha rol gnon
34b8(rgyud): gsus 'phang mo la mche ba gtsigs ma// skra ser mo 'am kham pa gyend brdzes pa/ thor tshugs dang cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ spyi bo la mi 'khrugs pa banags pa/ phyag bco brgyad pa/ mgo
35a1(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa spyan gsub gsum can/ thod ba'i drang ba dang ldan pa/ drag mo lag na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa/ slad g.yogs seng ge'i lpags pas g.yogs
35a2(rgyud): pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / gtun shing dang / gdung rtse gsum pa dang / dril bu dang / kha dan dang / lhag dbyug dang / mdung dang / mchog sbyin pa dang
35a3(rgyud): gnu dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / kha con dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / khro ba thogs pa/ lus kyi rgyu ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mdog gnag pa/ khang ma'i gdun la rol pa'i stabasu bzhugs
35a4(rgyud): ba sdang ba dang 'dul ba zhes brjod pa 'di lta bu/ rtag tu hUM gis hUM mdzad pa/ bzlas brjod yang dag ldan par sgom// se ma sa can kun don tshogs pa yi/ byang chub ring por mi thogs 'tho
35a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rang byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// klu zhes bya bas sgrib pa'i gzugs// rgyad rnam
35a6(rgyud): kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can// mgo bo skra tshugs pad tu bzung // de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang // la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste// de la kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog 'phrul
35a7(rgyud): ba rnams kyis rgyan// gser gyi mdog cin bzhin 'dzum pa/ phyed gzung bas ni rnam par rol/ dpag bsam shing gis rgyan pa yi// rin chen ril legs par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis
35a8(rgyud): de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhags// tha ma thog thag gnod sbyin mos// nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// sngags la oM aH
35b1(rgyud): b+h+rUM/ yig gsub pa rig gsung bzugs// khyab 'jug lnga chen mes po ste// 'dod gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la/ rdo rje hUMmadzad kyis bskul cing // rdo rje ting 'dzin bsgoms na/ mod la dngos grub
35b2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// gzhan yang gsang sngags yig yi// sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te// rdo rje yig 'bru
35b3(rgyud): rnams bsgoms nas// de dag ma bsgribs bzhin du sgrub/ 'phrog sa 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i// bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang / lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma// byung ba nyid 'grub por 'gyur/ rgyud kyi rgyal ba
35b4(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni ting 'dzin rim par bya ba'i laci sna zhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang ma dzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshad pa
35b5(rgyud): thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs kyi ya
35b6(rgyud): shes bskyed par mdzad pa'i de dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las phyung // oM b+haM ga ba ti ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha la tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ da nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsung
35b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes/ bdud kyi dpung rnams 'das gyur te/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes par byed// zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams
35b8(rgyud): kyi yum// rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na/ shi ba rnams la srog sbyin mdzad/ ma grub pa rnams grub par rtsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku
36a1(rgyud): gsung rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la stobs par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang mchog thams cad bskyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
36a2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo // oM shaM ka re shIn+tiM ka ri g+hu Ta g+hu Ta g+hu Ta~M ni g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+hA Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa
36a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi ni mig pa nas/ rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur// sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma// de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yi// sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma ste/ zhi dang rgyas dang 'phel
36a4(rgyud): mdzad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'a dod chags chen pos zhen pa pad+ma gar gyi stang stabs thugs kyi rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig
36a5(rgyud): / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos tha mas cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams la sa phyung // oM ka Ta bi ka Ta ni ka Ta ka kung+ka Te swA hA/ 
36a6(rgyud): de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog/ dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// ting 'dzin gyi mig pha nas// rdo rje pad+ma rjes dran byed/ rgyas pa chen po yum yin te// chos mdzod rnam par 'phel mdzad ma// 
36a7(rgyud): bsgoms shing bstan te bzlas brjod na// rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas// rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar
36a8(rgyud): byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs thams cad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsung so// oM tI re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 
36b1(rgyud): de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyi rnams// spyad pa rnam par gdangs na su// ye shes rdo rje ldan pa dran/ lha mo bzlas brjod pas tsam gyis// skye dgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'a
36b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung // na maHsaM ma
36b3(rgyud): sa seM la la ma zhes pa mdun pag ma sa sus la ba /  su gas spyong la g+hu rnams sa cwa/  du sa nam
36b4(rgyud): g+hA ta ka bi kr-i ta A nen/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha ya~M ka ra/ aT+TAHhA sa nA daMn/ brA g+hA tsirme ni bA sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba/ rmA Nits+tshin+dats+tshiN+Da/ sarba man+tan+ta/ b+hiR+Sha b+hin+da/ ba ra mu drAHA~M kar-I ya a kaR+Sha ya/ sarba
36b5(rgyud): d+hU tA/ ma tha ma tha/ nirma tha ni rma tha/ sarba du// pra ba sha ye pra dze/ ye/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye bai ba shwa ta/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ku ru kA ru ma ma/ kAr+yA/ da ha ta/ btsa ba tse/ mA bi la ba pA bi laM gas
36b6(rgyud): me ya ma nu sma ra/ hAM hUM/ phaT paT bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA sha ya ri pAM/ ka ra ka ra/ big+han sarba A sha pa ri pA ra ka/ ha he b+ha ga ban/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ma ma sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA// de nas khro bo 'di gsungs
36b7(rgyud): bas rba sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun// 'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ rdo rje 'dra ba yin// ye shes sna tshogs can la lte// bsrubs gcig pa 'am bsru
36b8(rgyud): gnyis pa'i// thod pa bzang po rnyed pa dang // rkang pa rjes pa'i cho ga la/ lha mo bzhi yi sbyor ba dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis byin rlabs te// sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms na su// myur bar khugs kyi bar
37a1(rgyud): rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod pa// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdod mi za ba'i mchog
37a2(rgyud): sprin chen po na mkha' rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje gsum rnams las snying po 'di gsung so// da maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si
37a3(rgyud): mu sa la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+DA laM/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha bar d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+b+ha gar+b+hA/ baM s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba bodz+dza khaM nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na
37a4(rgyud): pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ khro bo chen po gsuM/ ngas pa yis/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ yid phyung nas ni skrag par gyur/ log 'dren rnams dang bgegs
37a5(rgyud): rnams 'dar// sku gsub ye shes mchog mnga' bI// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran// de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni// rlung gis gtsug pa'i shing lo la// khro bo'i 'khor lor gzing nasu/ 
37a6(rgyud): tshegs bdag rkang pa'i drung du bzhag// hUM dang phaT kyis bskul nasu// bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang skrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje zhes
37a7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po sku gsum rnams las phyung // na maHsa man+ta kA ye bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NA/ oM hUM dzi na ri tiT+Ta hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ da
37a8(rgyud): nas khro bo 'di brjod pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas// gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran// srin po 'byung po dang mkha 'gro// skem byed
37b1(rgyud): gdon rnams gzeng ba la// rdo rje gzeng ba'i sbyor ba yis hU~Mtsam gyis kyang las byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs parjo mtha' yas kyis yon dan rin po che dpag tu med bkungs sdud pa'i rdo rje nas
37b2(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje padz+ra'i khro bo chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ nga ru la/ bi ru la/ sarbabi Sha g+hA ta ka/ dz+wa li ta/ bai s+phu li ga/ an+ta hAs
37b3(rgyud): nA ni/ ke Sha ri sa Da to ba Ta ka ra/ badz+ra khur/ ning g+hA ta na/ tsa li ta ba su d+ha da la ni shA sa ma ru to tak+Ship+ta d+hA ra Ni d+ha ra / b+hI Sha na iT+Te TA da Ta Ta Ta has/ a pA raM mi tA kha la pa rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hi da b+h+ra ta ga/ ar+N+Na
37b4(rgyud): dzigabud+d+ha bahru la grag lngab khA / bar man+tan ts+tshaHts+tshin+da/ sid+d+hip+pe sA gar A re'i ya/  rjes rbarji pa ShAH/ rbakra trel a pra'i yo rdzab rji na ts+tsha rA ma saM/ oM duSh+Tha
37b5(rgyud): han/ duSh+TaM sadz+ra ma bA/ d+hun d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ ma dam da/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ye/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi d+ha ba~M d+ha/ bud+d+had+harma saM g+ha/ a na? dz+hi karma ku ru shI g+h+nAM ha ya gr-I bA ya phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+rA g+hAH
37b6(rgyud): ya phaT/ badz+ra nai trA ya phaT/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta ya phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra ning g+hA ta na ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi rA sha nA ya phaT/ badz+ra trai lo kya b+ha e yaM ka ra phaT/ sarba karma su pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ku le sa
37b7(rgyud): sa nA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT ngaT swA hA/ de nas khro chen byung ba yis// rdo rje pang mchog las byung rnams/ yid ni 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// 'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs nas// byang chub
37b8(rgyud): tshogs ni dran byed cing // ye shes rdo rje dran 'gyur ba// lag pa la ni ba ma dang / ha zhes bya ba mchog 'bar bsam// khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum
38a1(rgyud): du du pa'o//  pa ga ni drung dus/ nas bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mtshas nong du'i rdzordza
38a2(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzid la stobs pa zhugs nas khro ba'i rgyal po chen po bcod sdod po can 'di rdo rje gsupa las dru // nams paN+Di bud+d+hA nAM e hi e hi/ khA ga bAn/ mI la badz+rad d+ha/ tu ru du ru/ hu lu phu lu swA hA/ 
38a3(rgyud): lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya/ gu lA pa ya/ kla ma kA ma/ b+ha ga bAn bA yu be ge na/ b+hU tAn shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ dar dang / pra ha ba ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma \u0f7f/ bA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA ba ya mo TA pa ya/ sarba
38a4(rgyud): Nits+tshin+da ts+tshin+te/ b+hak+Sha ya b+ha k+saM ye/ a smr-i bi da ma s+yarud+haM mad dzA ma di/ bai shwa ma da dza/ ru d+hi / pri ya me h+ye'i b+ha ga bAn/ nga sarba bi g+h+nAm/ sarba mnAn sa tre mu la karbAHkr-i bi maNi/ sarba grA hAnA/ 
38a5(rgyud): na n-i/ n+tib+han+ti/ mad dmed nga/ i daM pe/ kad+ya sA d+ha/ ya nI lA ya nI la badz+rad d+hA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ da g+h+nAn bi nA ya/ nA sha ye tA shA la rje du ru/ dzI b+da baN+Te ye/ sarba sa wA rdzi
38a6(rgyud): Ta ya/ ts+tshir+tha ts+tshin+na/ ba ra bi dA nA ma/ ts+tshe dka hUM bid+yA nA pa shiSh+Tha ka/ sa ma ya a nu sma ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra bA tsan tsa/ ma ra ma ri kron+ta/ hU~M da na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT/ hUM hUM
38a7(rgyud): tan+t+ra ya/ de ba bi'i bi dra ba ye ka/ ha na badz+ra daR+sha ne swA hA/ khro bo chen po mchog gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog gtso ba
38a8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dran par gyur to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskal na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo chen pos gsod par byedo// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
38b1(rgyud): rdorje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bkod pa kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po ma rdo rje 'di sku gsum las phyung // na paHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA
38b2(rgyud): oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shA la pA N+Di hrI hUMhUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ mai dz+yo ning nAd hUMHhU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA yaM swA hA/ de ras khro bo gsungs tsam gyis/ gdangs ka yis ni bsku
38b3(rgyud): kun yid ni shin tu 'jigs skrag ste// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dran// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yis// las kun rab tu grub par byed// char pa chen gcod 'gyur la/ char pa chung na rab tu 'ja
38b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khri/ po chen po 'dod pa'i khro bo 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung // 
38b5(rgyud): na ma/ sa man+ta bud+d+ha rAM/ Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas khro bo gsungs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skag/ bdud kyi dpung rnams ltung bar gyur/ rkang ga
38b6(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje yi// sbyor bas mtshon ni mnan nasu// sku gsum ye shes stobs ldan pas/ khro gnyer rim par gnyer bas ste// gsang sngags kun gyis bkug nas// sems can thams cad dang
38b7(rgyud): du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
38b8(rgyud): nas rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las byung // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a tsa la kA Na tsin Da/ na Ta na Ta/ man+t+ra maT+Ta/ sar+b+ba sar+b+ba/ tan+na tan+ta/ tan ta mang shang ha/ mo
39a1(rgyud): / mo dag ra zhes pas badz+ra hAs ku ru/ trAs hA sa/ mar pa ra Ta ma rag gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ tan tan par d+ha ban d+ha tiSh+Tha Sh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi man+t+ra ba laka d+hu d+hud ti tsi da mi khA da khA da Shid+ha
39a2(rgyud): mA ra ya mA ra ya duSh+Tan/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+kha/ sarbA da ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ pa hA bi Sha ba badz+ra s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hA hA hA/ tri ba lI ta raM gan+derba ke/ aM a~M aM/ hA hA hU~M/ a tsa la tsa Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ye hUM hUM/ 
39a3(rgyud): sa par+b+ba kaDA Ta ma hU~M ba la sha ta ya/ par man+tan/ e a~M/ hA hA/ maM shudud+ha tu lo ka/ traSh+To tu bar+thi/ na mo N+Dim+bi/ a pra bi hata ba le b+hU dza lA ya/ drAH/ a sa han ma/ swA hA/ de nas khro bo mig m-i'i/ 
39a4(rgyud): khro ba stobs chen 'di gsungs pa/ lha dang klu kun mngag gzhug po gnod sbyin srid po lha ma yin/ 'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur// bdud kyi snga rnams lhung na su// tshig cing rab tu
39a5(rgyud): zhum bzhin du// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad drad// khri bo'i rgyal po du ma yis// bcug pas 'jigs pas nyid bzhin du// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid// sna tshogs las rnam
39a6(rgyud): myur du mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs pa chen po rdo rje
39a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs pa'i rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsung so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM/ g+h+r-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ bing+ga
39a8(rgyud): rAdza hU~M phag/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// lha yi bu mo thams cad ni/ skra tshugs zhig cing gcer bur gyur// mig rtsa rig rig byed pa dag/ sku gsum rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i// zhal gyis nu ma gnyis
39b1(rgyud): mnan pas// gtso bo rdo rje rnam par mdzad// ye shes kyis ni 'joms dran 'gyur// lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te/ rdo zla zhags pas bcings nasu// bu mo thams cad dgug pa pa// bu mo dgug pa'i
39b2(rgyud): mchog yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par dgyings pa'i dga' ba ston pa ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyed pa
39b3(rgyud): mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dri rjesu dran bar mdzad/ 'khor lo cha la rnam gnas nas/ sangs rgyas rnam ras kyi sprin dag dang / de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin// rdo rje lcags kyu
39b4(rgyud): zhags thogs 'byin// kun mkhyen ye shesalas byung gtso// gsang sngags skyes bur bdag bsgoms na// / sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gug byed na/ rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig/ 
39b5(rgyud): smos bud med lha chen bu mo dag/ rlung la rkang pa bzhag na su// lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni// sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te/ 'di la dpyad pa cung zad med// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad
39b6(rgyud): nisku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ rdo rje bdud rtsi 'babs bsam ste/ lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis// don gdon mi za bar khugs// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la
39b7(rgyud): byung ba/ rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yis// 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'gro ba yis// gno dum dag nges par 'gugs// rdo rje gsum 'khrugs khro bo ni/ rdo rjes 'og gnas pa ste/ lha ma yin kun nges sreg
39b8(rgyud): lha min bu mo rjes chags pas// gsal shing gis ni bsgyel nasu// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ drangs nas lha min bu mo 'gugs/ bcag dang thod lo kor dang ni// babla 'byor bar gyur na na// 
40a1(rgyud): gzas zin tshen khar bcug ste/ rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'grub// drag po rlung dang khab 'jug dang / lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyid pa// mngag gzhug bcas pa'i 'jigs skrag ste/ mi
40a2(rgyud): bris kunas rtag tu 'gugs// sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs bzhugs te// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs// khros shing 'ber ba 'phro ba
40a3(rgyud): yis ngaganod sbyid bu mo bkug nas spyod// phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyong ba yis// dgugs par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa/ gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur/ rgyal
40a4(rgyud): po'i zhabs drung kun gnas pas// rdo rje sems dpa' sada' chan// kun gyis sems rab rdzogs byed pas/ yang dang yang du bskul bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
40a5(rgyud): mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam bar rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ding 'dzin la snyibs bango zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal po chen mo rnam pa
40a6(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las byu // oM shU laM ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// klu mi dbang chen grags pa dag/ gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du// gtse bo rdo rje rnam snang
40a7(rgyud): dran gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni// klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed// bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni// gsang sngags bzlas brjod pas pa yis// gser gdub rgyan ni gsol
40a8(rgyud): ba yi/ klu mo'i mig yangs bkugs nas ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'o// klu mo nye bar spyod par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na mkha' chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam
40b1(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la stobs par zhugs nas skul byed pa chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen po 'di gsung so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha daM/ sa d+ya ka saM bud+d+ha ka TI nan/ tad+ya thA oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swA hA
40b2(rgyud): de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus// ting 'dzin las g.yos par gyur// bdud rnams brgyal zhing tshi ga na su// thams
40b3(rgyud): cad chongs 'debs par byed// sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang // lha mi bu mo klu mo dang / gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran// rig sngags 'di ni bzlas pa dang // sgom pa yi
40b4(rgyud): yi ri sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing // bku ga nas rab tu long spyod pad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na kha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes pa
40b5(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzid la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dab tshig gi rdo rje'i khri gnyar 'dir rdo rje sku gsupa rnams las phyu ngo// oM b+ha ya nA sha ni tra sa nai tA sa trA sa ya/ 
40b6(rgyud): ra Ti b+h+r-i ku Ti ti Ti / bai Ta Ti bai Ti Te/ shwe te shwe te/ dza Ta ni swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni// g.yos shing 'jigs pa thob par gyur// bdud rnams 'jig
40b7(rgyud): pas rnam 'khrugs te// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// yid gcig tu ni dran par byedo// nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba yis// rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bcas// lha mir bu mo gsang ba yi// 
40b8(rgyud): bu mo bkug nas spyod par byed// 'dis ni las kun byed pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin// yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni// skye ba med pa'i nags tshal du// sman pas bye ba
41a1(rgyud): bzlas nasu// las rnams thabs cadra ba par gsungs// gang gzhan slob dpor spong ba dang // theg pa chen po sud 'dzin dang / pa~M gang gsang sngags rgyung dgi/ sbyor ba la ri 'ab byed pa/ 
41a2(rgyud): de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// de ni rtag tu gdon gyis zod// bsgrilas nas bsad par bya ba 'am/ yang na lus ni gzhig par bya// sngags pas 'di ltar bas da ni// bang rab dngos grub legs par
41a3(rgyud): 'thob phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i'o// khad par du ni bsgom par bya// dgra la 'di ni the tshom med/ khrag 'thung chu yos brlan pa 'am// dur khrod thal
41a4(rgyud): ba 'am bau shang gci yis// brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas kyang / rkang pas mtshan ma mnan na su// khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas te/ gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// sangs rgyas
41a5(rgyud): kyang ni nges par 'jig chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te// zla bo'i mdun du bcings nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig bsha
41a6(rgyud): gci yis ni spags pa'i gos// rul ba'i dri can smad pa dang / bgos nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod na/ mod la 'chi ba 'am bskams par 'gyur// dung khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos// bgos nas
41a7(rgyud): khro bo 'khrugs nas ni// lan grangs stong du brjod na ni// rdo rje sems dpa'ang rnam par 'jig/ skra ni lhug par bshigs nas ni/ kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas ni
41a8(rgyud): na mkha'i khams kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong 'am ni bzhi mdo 'am// mtshan ma gcig pa 'am shing gcig tu// dral shul spyod pa brtsams par bya// de yi rka
41b1(rgyud): rjes sa la ni/ mi rus las byas phung bu dag/ so brgyad tsam gyi tshad tsam la/ lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i// phur bu yis ni btab nasu// dgra yi khyim spong 'arkos te gzhug// sangs rgyas sku
41b2(rgyud): gsum mchog sbyin pa/ shos dang mi shes spangs pa yang / zla phyed nya yi nang rol tu// 'ching ba 'am yang na 'jig par 'gyur/ mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshangs pa/ khad par can ni rnyed pa dang / 
41b3(rgyud): la gsang sngags tshig bris te// rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas// dgra yi sgo 'am yang na ni// grong du sbas na nges par skrod// ta la'i 'dab ma 'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bos gsang sngags legs
41b4(rgyud): bris te// dgra yi khyi pa 'am sgo kar ni// sbas na 'chi 'am bskur sa par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
41b5(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rje'i pu ra bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khams gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
41b6(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i pur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung // oM g+ha g+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT paT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM pa
41b7(rgyud): paT swA hA hUM badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+har Adz+nyA pa ya ta~M/ kA ya bA ka tsitI badz+ra / kI la ya hUM hUM hUM Ta phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje dbang cher grags pa kun/ brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes rgyu
41b8(rgyud): te// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ mi ye rus pa'i phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung ba 'am/ lcags las byas pa'i phur bus ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig rdo rje sems dang
42a1(rgyud): gzhag ste/ 'od bzang me sdug 'khrug pa can/ sku gsub rdo rje bathas gtugs pas// gzugs brnyan pa ni bsams nas sbyar/ rna ba snang phyug rgya chen po 'am// yang na 'dod
42a2(rgyud): rdo rje cang/ phyag rgya chen po gshing rje gshad / 'dod pa'i khro bo nyidu de/ rdo rje phur bu bsam pa dung// bdag nyid chen po stobs po che// bdud rtsi thab spyod rdo rje dang / rdo rje ya ni rnal 'byor gyis// sdang dang
42a3(rgyud): gtum po bcad par ba// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // thugs nas zhabs la thug/ khor du// rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms// rdo rje ting 'dzid sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par
42a4(rgyud): gnon// 'di ni pur bu'i mthu rlabs te// stang 'og lha yi dam tshig yin// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi// ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni
42a5(rgyud): myung du 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rjeng bsgrid
42a6(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyisu med pa'i dam tshig gi phung bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyu'o// 
42a7(rgyud): n+dats+tshin+da/ sha ra ha ra/ di p+ta badz+ra tsakra hU~M phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bdugs// snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas// rdo rje phung bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam
42a8(rgyud): gyis sems dpa' che/ sku gsum yi shes las byung ba/ dam tshig mchog bzhes par mdzad/ gzhin du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi me
42b1(rgyud): shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyi phung bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang gsung dang
42b2(rgyud): thugs rnams las byung // oM badz+ra rA dzA hUM/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings na su// me tog 'phro ba bsgoms byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis
42b3(rgyud): rgyal po che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhes mdzad// gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig
42b4(rgyud): mchog rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la sgo dmas par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyi pur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung
42b5(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje rnams las byung // oM tr-i oM b+hud+d+ha ba/ rdo rje song ma sum pa yi/ pad+ma kha bye 'a bar ba yis/ 'dod chags rdorjezhabs kyis mnan/ rdo rje phung bus nges pa
42b6(rgyud): gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// sku gsu ma ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod// gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyis cha/ 
42b7(rgyud): pa yin// cho ga bzang po tsam gyis ni// rdo rje mkha' dbyings mthas gtugs pa// mnan 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rnar snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams
42b8(rgyud): bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams// dgyes shing mgu pa brnyes nas// rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs/ kye ma'o gsang ba'i
43a1(rgyud): tshig gi mchog/ kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa/ kye ma'o zhib chos kyi tshig/ ye shes rdo rje phung bu rmad/ gsang sngags kun gyi bu dbus 'di/ bde gshegs bka' yi rje su
43a2(rgyud): byed pa 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste// phur bu de nyid rnams las byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad mdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
43a3(rgyud): nas rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can 'di gsung so// oM mA rI ts+yai de ba tA ye swA hA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ri// dbang tshan grags pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ thugs ni dgyes
43a4(rgyud): shing mgu bar gyur// sras rnams kyi ni spyan yang pa// 'di ni las rna/ mas thams cad pa// chom rkun ldang ba 'ching mdzad pa// 'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na// 'gro ba'i tshe na mthong mi 'gyur
43a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhi na gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye
43a6(rgyud): chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsung so// oM ma hA sa hA sra pa mdzad pa
43a7(rgyud): ra sid+d+hi da mI ga ma Ni badz+ra Ni hUM phaT swA hA// de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' thams cadang // bdud kyi ris rnams g.yos par
43a8(rgyud): gyuragatso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa// thams cad tshig bzhin btud na su// bcom ldan 'das sngags mthu stobs kyis// gnod bgyid thams cad gzir lag so// gang ni rig sngags stobs ma
43b1(rgyud): pha rol gdod pa 'di bzlos pa/ deng ni bdag cag pi mchi zhing / der ni srung bdag kyang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ched po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya byin bangon
43b2(rgyud): par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po
43b3(rgyud): 'di gsung so// oM b+ha ga ba tI d+h+wa dzA gra ke yu re pa ra sai n+ya/ bi d+hAn sa na ka swa sai n+ya pa ri la ni/ u lA kA mu khi kha kha khA hi khA hi/ pa ru ser+ya ma/ a na b+hu dze/ a nad ta mu khe pra ha ra pra ha ra hUM phaT
43b4(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ de nas rig sngags tshe gsungs pas// sangs rgyas dezhing rnams g.yos par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rab g.yos shing // bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par gyur
43b5(rgyud): gnod sbyir srin po gos bral nas/ 'jigs shing skrag par gyu ra ba yis// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snong dran// bcom ldan 'das ri ga sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis tshig
43b6(rgyud): lags te/ bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na mgon mdzad cing lus thams cad rab tu bsgrub tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad chen po rje
43b7(rgyud): rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas mngal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma 'di
43b8(rgyud): gsungaso// oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+ra Ni ma hA pra ti sa re swA hA/ rig sngags chen po gsungs pa dang // r-ig sngags rgyal mo'i mthu yis ni/ mi yi skye dgu 'tshe bad pa// mthu chen mngal ni 'phrog pad
44a1(rgyud): log 'dren kun dang spang ba'i rnams// mi bzad me lces tshig gyur nas// 'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis// rdo rje snang mdzad drung lpags te// zhags la gtugs te tshig sbas pa/ 
44a2(rgyud): bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal// rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa// gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing // rtag tu mngal ni spel bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
44a3(rgyud): mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po nor rgyun 'di
44a4(rgyud): gsung so// oM ba su d+hA ri pa hA ba su d+ha ra briSh+Ta ni pA ta ni ba su/ swA hA/ nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba yi/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// bgegs dang logs 'dren thams cad
44a5(rgyud): dag yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ rdo rje rnam par snang mdzod kyi/ drung du nye bar 'ongs nasu// dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba'i// mtshan ni
44a6(rgyud): mi mchog sgrogs bgyid na// de la nor gyi char 'bab cing // nor chen dang ni ldan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
44a7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glog 'bar ma bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsung so// a re du tre ni pra ku pa ta tsaN+De/ ma hA be ga d+ha ri b+hid d+ho dzi traM/ ma ho da ri/ r-i dri ka pA la ma la d+hA ri Ni dza Ta ma ku Ta/ man+ti
44a8(rgyud): te nAn pra ha da~M \u0f7f/ d+ha ri hU~M hU phaT phaT/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ ku ru ku ru/ hU~M hUM/ pra ma~M d+ha ma/ sarba she drA trU~M/ sho na ta be bi pra tsat+ta/ be ga d+ha re/ btsa ta pa tsa te/ bi kir ta sa ta ya hU~M
44b1(rgyud): da ha daha/ sarba sha trUM/ sarba duSh+Tan/ ni krin+ta/ pra sA da ya hUM/ ma hA b+ha ga ba te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ che ge mo zhig me ba sha mA nA ya swA hA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i klog/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa/ 
44b2(rgyud): yis// bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par gyur// dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bskams/ dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsags bris nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi bdug pas sreg cing brgya
44b3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pas la/ me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor ma dang lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko bar bya'o// de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgya
44b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to// brkos pa 'i mod la phyir rgol ba dang ngagra thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ mnan pa drang rmongs par byas par 'gyuraro// de nas brtsa
44b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po
44b6(rgyud): 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsung so// oM hr-i ri t+yai ma hA ya kli NI ye/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba ya~Mk+Shi NI pra be sha na~M swA hA/ de nas 'phrog dga' 'phrog ma ni// gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang // gnod
44b7(rgyud): sbyin ma kun g.yos na su// dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur// khro mo'i 'khor lo gdod sbyin pa/ brgyad dbus 'phrog mas rgyun byas te// lcags kyu 'bras bu ne le can// gnod sbyin brgya
44b8(rgyud): kyis klu bas dasu// gnod sbyin ma ku na bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po thaMd las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ma
45a1(rgyud): ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can pa 'di gsung so// oM pi shu tsi badz+ra sha ba ri sar+b+ba mA ra pra sha pa ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas
45a2(rgyud): zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// gnod bde nad 'gro srin po dang / sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags// yas shing 'o ma can dang til// 'o mas du ba zhi bar 'gyur// na mkhar kunas rig sngags kyi// rgal mos
45a3(rgyud): legs par bkad na sa// bdud rtsi cher 'bebs bsams na ni// modo la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyur 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa rim
45a4(rgyud): par phye ba'i le'u sde lnga pa'o// / de nas pa com ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhini gA shegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gas
45a5(rgyud): ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa 'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyi sa nyon cig/ gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa kun las
45a6(rgyud): rnam grol zhing // 'di ni lus ni byin rlabs te// rang gi gzugs rnam bsgoms na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa
45a7(rgyud): las mthe bo gnyis gteg pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ sku byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g.yas pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni 'jig rten
45a8(rgyud): dbang phyugi ste gsung byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid los g.yas pa'i mtha ba nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi ste/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ 
45b1(rgyud): lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings pa las g.yon pa'i 'dzub po bsgreng ba'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du
45b2(rgyud): 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa bang bar bzhag ste// g.yas pa sa la gnon pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i ngag rgya'o// de nyidadi las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par bas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// 
45b3(rgyud): de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bas pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag
45b4(rgyud): pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar byas pa las gung mo pa shibs te sbyang ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i phya brgya'o// de nyid las gra nga mo'i tshogs dang po bkug ste/ rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo
45b5(rgyud): rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar gdub bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma'i pa brgya'o// de nyid las gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdo rje les pa'i ngag
45b6(rgyud): rgya'o/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyang ba las mdzub mo gnyis gdub bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa
45b7(rgyud): las gung mo sgreng ba'i tshig gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni mA ma kI'i ngag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te pad+ma kha bo ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos
45b8(rgyud): dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung ro'i sen mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis dbusu bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni sgrol
45'a1(rgyud): ma'i ud pa la'i ngag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te// mdzub mo dang gung mo'i tshogs dbu par gdub bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bo gnyis glong bzhag pa 'di ni bskul
45'a2(rgyud): byad ma'i gzungs kyi ngag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje bcings ba byas pa las mdzub po gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin cheni sgrol po'i pog rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang snga mthe bos so
45'a3(rgyud): mthe'u chung gis sen po padad nas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyidadu byas pa 'di ni khro gnyer can pa'i phag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so so'i khur tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u
45'a4(rgyud): rlung gnyis lugu rgyud ljar bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje lugu r+m+ma dkyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung po dang srin la gnyis bsgrangs te rtse mo'i tshul
45'a5(rgyud): du byas la gung mo'i rgyab du srin lag bsnol la/ mdzub mo ga nyis gdub bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas pathe bo gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug te kha'i tshul du byas
45'a6(rgyud): po 'di ni gshin rje gshad kyi phag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar gnag ste/ lag pa g.yas pa thal lca gi tshul du byas pa ni khro bo gzhan
45'a7(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la the'u chung lug rgyud ltar mdud la mdzub mo gzhibs te sgreng pa las bzlog sta dpral bar gzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
45'a8(rgyud): kyi mthe bos srin log dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen ma minan la ril gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas
45'b1(rgyud): ba las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lugu rgyud ldang bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje lu
45'b2(rgyud): tshur gyi mdzub mo snying kar brdeg la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo ba con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni/ ba con sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying kar bzhag la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rngas
45'b3(rgyud): sngangs dang bcas par byar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la// mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrangs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni bams pa'i phag
45'b4(rgyud): rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo/ gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas/ ud pal la khe bye ba'i tshul du bzhag po ni 'jam dpal dbyangs rgya
45'b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa pang bar bzhig pa/ lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur na mkha' la sme
45'b6(rgyud): pi lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o// bzang po'i 'dug stangasu 'dug ste// thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying kar bzhag pa ni bzang skyong gi
45'b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang pa las sor mo rnams chu rlabs drang ba ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bzhag la g.yas po mchog
45'b8(rgyud): sbyin pa ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pa da bzhag la// g.yas pa se gol gtogs pa'o tshul du byas pa ni spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
46a1(rgyud): badra cung zad kha bya ba ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor pa'i tshul du byas pa ni ngan song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
46a2(rgyud): thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni bya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa
46a3(rgyud): ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas la g.yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas pa ni zla 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dpa' bskung ba
46a4(rgyud): ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur na mkho' la kun tu bskor po'i tshul du byas pa ni na mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa
46a5(rgyud): sa la brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe za sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur
46a6(rgyud): las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la hUM zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo khu tshur rdog stangs dang bcas par phyar ba ni ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yodan pa sor mo brgya
46a7(rgyud): ba las mdzub mo dang mthe bo skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la// lag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag
46a8(rgyud): ba gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdangs ka'i gdugs lter byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis spang ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid
46b1(rgyud): las g.yas pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis dza zhes byas pas dgug pa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa sna rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// / 
46b2(rgyud): rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa gnyisu gzhag la/ lce ljib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba na rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
46b3(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis bskum// mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas nas kha'i grwar bzhag ste hUM zhes bya zhing khro bo'i lta bas lus bcu pa ni rdo rje mkha 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyi
46b4(rgyud): kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sta bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las khrig ma gnyis bsnol
46b5(rgyud): te bstod cing bteg pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyi sa rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mtshan khung du bsnams te khro za 'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams
46b6(rgyud): cad skrag par bad pa'i phag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon brkyang ste kha srub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskod pa ni lha ma yin gyi sgra dang 'khrul 'khor
46b7(rgyud): 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo slar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma ba dani rtse gsum pa'i tshul
46b8(rgyud): du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hUM zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni rdo rje bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
47a1(rgyud): bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i ngag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i
47a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dong ngo'i tshul du byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o
47a3(rgyud): lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o// leg pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du byas te gdong g.yog cing brkyang la
47a4(rgyud): ngo'i mig du byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings ba la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni sprin thaMd
47a5(rgyud): gtub pa'i tshor ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdub bu ltar ba sa te skam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi phu
47a6(rgyud): ba dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe'o lag mthil du bzhag ste/ lhag ma rnams 'dab ma lhor g.yab cing rkang pa ya gcig sa la btsugs la/ gcig rgya ba du bskum
47a7(rgyud): nas khro mo lta bas lce ljib cing hUM phaT ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni rdo rje na mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o// 'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skad cig sel ba
47a8(rgyud): byed/ rdo khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dgi tshul gyis phyogs pa zhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje mda' phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis la/ 
47b1(rgyud): gung mo gzhibs te sgreng ba las rin po che'i tshul du bkug la// mthe bo brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdab ma gnyis gdub bu'i tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phag
47b2(rgyud): rgyu g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo sbrang la g.yas pas pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la ha la'i phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyi
47b3(rgyud): kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgrangs nas bzlog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha' 'gro ma rnams
47b4(rgyud): 'jigs par byed pa'o// g.yon pas thod pa gzung la g.yas pas bdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas ral ba bcings te zla bas rgyan cing min nu sbed la/ mig gsum pa
47b5(rgyud): gang byed pa ni gong thabs kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni 'du byed kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas ba las sor mo rnams cung zad bya ste mthe bo lag ma thil du
47b6(rgyud): bzhag// de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu dur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar bas pa ni khyab 'jug phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
47b7(rgyud): thal mo khong stong du sbyar te me tog lter byas pa ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ni// rgyab tu bdud pa ltar 'dod zhing / rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i// rin chen cad pan
47b8(rgyud): phreng dbang bskur/ ting 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can/ 'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams la/ sangs rgyas sa ni rab 'gyengs pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'byung bar bsapa/ 'gyur zhi shu
48a1(rgyud): zad 'jo tshul can// sgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis// gar gyi tshul du bkod nas kyang / hUM zhes pa ba glur blangs shing // de nas sangs rgyas kun dgyes pa/ rdo rje rgyud di sbreng bdu ba/ de nas pra
48a2(rgyud): tshul phrang ba yis/ lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya// 'jo skrag thabs la spro ba yis// la gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang // g.yas nas g.yon du bskor ba yis// gar thabs byas la mgo la bal+la
48a3(rgyud): me tog dbul ba'i tshul du ni// gang gi me tog thal mo sbyar// bdug spos rtse mo sbyor ba yis// gung mo gnyis ni bzlog te sgreng // bskor zhing bsgyur ba byas pa yis// mtha' gnyis mar me'i tshul
48a4(rgyud): du bzhag/ dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas// dung por lta bur mchod yon dbul// de nas lha rnams kun la yang / lag pa'i gar gyis byug tshul bya// de nas sil snyan tshul gyis// lag
48a5(rgyud): gnyis sil snyan lags par brdung // dung dang gling du bud pa dang / lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yog/ bsil yab chu la gyis bsol yab dang // sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan
48a6(rgyud): bya tshon dgye tshan lcug phran ltar// bskrad cing tshon gyi phreng ba dgye// lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la// g.yas pa yis ni lha bshos dbul// khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag na su// gos kyi tshul
48a7(rgyud): gyis gos rnams dang // gdub bu ska rags rkang rgyan dang // rna cha do shal sna lnga bzhag/ de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyi su// lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzugs/ bsam gtan tshul gyi
48a8(rgyud): lag pa dang / nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na// sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ grwar ni pad+ma'i drang ba dang // dril bu g.yeng ka'i dra bas rgyan// gsang snga/ 
48b1(rgyud): 'di ni cho ga bzhis rdo rje dril bu bsil ba yis/ sgo 'phar dag kyang dab ba ba/ oM badz+ra g+hAd+hA cing / bla ra Nita/ saM pra da Ni ta/ sar+b+ba bud+yA k+She tra/ pra tsa li ta/ badz+nyA pA ra pi tA/ nA da swa b+hA be badz+ra d+harma hr-i ya
48b2(rgyud): san+do 'aNi hUM hU~M hU~M// lag g.yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing // sna tshogs khug suM 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje glu yis bstod pa po/ rdo rje thag pas mnyes pad pa// 'di ni ded dam mchod pa yin// gang gis rnam rtog
48b3(rgyud): rnam spangs te// bang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas/ lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa// de yi mchod pa bla ni med// sems can gang gis dbu ma yi// theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing // theg pa
48b4(rgyud): dman pa lhag mos pa/ de yi mchod pa kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis// mchod pa dag gsan pa dang // ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan pa nas// legaso zhes ni
48b5(rgyud): rab tu gsungs/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sangs rgyas thabasu ste/ rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa mi/ nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob/ rdo rje thag chen lags
48b6(rgyud): pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/ zab cing rgya tsho legs pa ste// rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus lags// de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dgas
48b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje theg pa bsngags pa thos nas/ dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la// dga' ba'i yid kyis bstod par byed// thog ma med cing
48b8(rgyud): skye ba med// 'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med// mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba/ rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags/ thab su brtags pa gang yin des/ ye shes kyis ni sras po kun/ 
49a1(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa bslabs pa yis// sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur zhes sraso// bde ba las 'khrungs rjerje 'chang ba yis// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyed/ 8/ 
49a2(rgyud): po gang du rnam par snang mdzad de// dag cing dri zad blos ri oM da sbrul// gzugs mang rgal gyis phreng bas bskor ba yi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khod la phag 'tshalo// gsung snyad yi ga kun la khyab pa yi
49a3(rgyud): spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// rig gsum lha ma dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyu 'phrul tshul ming ldan pa 'go' ma mchis// gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/ 
49a4(rgyud): dadung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing // g.yas dpa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nasu// g.yon pa'i ngage gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol/ lha mo mtha' dag btsun por gyur pa yi// 
49a5(rgyud): tshig rnams kyis bababs par 'gyur// gcig gri log pas kunas 'khyud pa ste/ gnyis po rje su chags pi ra bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba 'thor// 
49a6(rgyud): bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phan/ gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag// bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo'i glu yin// oM a
49a7(rgyud): nuSh+Ta sarba pU dza me g+ha u dag te/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na kha hUM phaTa~M swA hA/ 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprid rab 'byam thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po
49a8(rgyud): chen po sgyu 'brel dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phra ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang thugs rdo'i de bzhin gsheT pa tha dang / 
49b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin
49b2(rgyud): po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugasu chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'
49b3(rgyud): stsal to ma sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la// lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dgis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
49b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsungs dung thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba tho ngas nas cha du brjod pa 'di brjod/ e ma kun tu bzang po ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo can/ chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba
49b5(rgyud): med cing gnas pa med// rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa 'di// bskyed par gnas rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med
49b6(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i
49b7(rgyud): byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rid chen 'byung gdas kyis
49b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmig su med de rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// dngos po 'dig dngos med// chos kyi mtshan nyid
50a1(rgyud): spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i/ byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin ched togs gsung so// de nas
50a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lha 'bor ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso// dngos po slu ba
50a3(rgyud): med pa ste/ dngos po ngo bo yod yin pas/ namakha'i go 'phang thob po zhes/ dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
50a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dod yod grub kyis de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chu
50a5(rgyud): kyi sems 'di gsung so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// bzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu
50a6(rgyud): ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsung so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
50a7(rgyud): po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa mthong nas ngo mtsha
50a8(rgyud): skyes par gyur te che du brjod pa 'di brjod// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'i dag kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams// bdag med chosau las legs byung ba// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal/ 
50b1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis// mi g.yo yige las byung ba/ rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa// byang chub sems la phag 'tshalo// gnas dang sta ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil
50b2(rgyud): ma~M krung bcas nas/ dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas/ yid kyis hUM byas rdo rje can/ rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlabs/ rin chen lus nga rgyal bya// la
50b3(rgyud): pa bstod de bskor ba yi// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang dang / byonas dang por phyogs bcings te// dam tshig yang dag dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nasu// mchod yin dbul ba'i
50b4(rgyud): sbyor ba bas/ dbang bskur mtshan cha go cha sogs/ sel snyan mchod sags dbu bya/ rnam pa kun gyis mnyes pa / rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag rnal 'byur rnam gas
50b5(rgyud): shes pa ste/ byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brta/ gas dang // gzugs gnyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/ sngags kyis byin rlabs pa
50b6(rgyud): rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor bin rlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / gsang sngags sa bon bskyod pa che// phyag rgya'i tshegasu brtags pa yin// rims kyis gzugs
50b7(rgyud): ni rdzogs byas pa// de ni brtog par brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungaso// bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag / skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa
50b8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin rlabs par/ rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags/ rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'bor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs
51a1(rgyud): mdubs pa'i sems/ byang chub sems kyis dgu pas te/  de rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ brjod cing thal po gsub gyis spyang dag byung de nas zla yos ni/ sems la sas
51a2(rgyud): brtag par ba// sebs la so sor brtags nas kyang // pi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas na su// byang chub tshogs kyi bgo chags des/ sgob pa ba pa'i ngo bo dag/ zla ba'i gzu
51a3(rgyud): su rnam par brtag/ lag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i// oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yis// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs/ rdo rje skud ni bsgom par ba/ AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung / sos
51a4(rgyud): ni hUM'asu ba bar sprul/ yi gsum gyis byin rlabasalus/ snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs/ de la rang gi yi ga ni// mdog gzugs 'od do bang bsams te/ ngargyal
51a5(rgyud): bskyed sa dul ni/ rdo rje bdag thaMd bdonag yi pad/ rgyan kun mi su rmugs pa dga'ang kyi dkyil 'khor kyis rgyud pa/ chags kyi ning barbar/ yo shes sems dpa
51a6(rgyud): bar brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha mtshan cha la sogs pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas lngang dbang bskur te/ tsan pan phrang ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi// 
51a7(rgyud): sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro// yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i// ngogos bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnams ma dang ni rtogs ldan ma// mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can/ sgyu ma'i chu bad rnam
51a8(rgyud): mang ngo po// rnam par 'brel par byin gyis brlabs/ kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbusu bzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi'i 'khor lo khab byas te// dag
51b1(rgyud): bas dga' byang bzhi yang spong // ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// longs par spyod pa'i sngags pa yis// 'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la dag ni// 'khor lo kun las pad+ma
51b2(rgyud): yi ringango ba yos ni rol pa dang // e zhes bya ba 'phos pa las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugasu bya/ mdzes pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan pa// nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta/ sge ge mo glu dang
51b3(rgyud): gar rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang // sil skar mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgos
51b4(rgyud): nas myur ches pa dang bral ba dang // mig gsal gug skud nyams pa dang // rtog pa dad pa rnam spangs nas/ de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod pa// bzlas pas skyen lag
51b5(rgyud): g.yas kyis// bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang / g.yon pas rdo rje dril bsil zhing // rdo rje glu tshul sna tshog sa dang // ba dang tshul du bya bas mchod// bzlas pa'i mjug
51b6(rgyud): brtul nas kyang // gshegasu gsol te bdag nyid srung // lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar cha du ni gyir na yang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis
51b7(rgyud): brlab// de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub des ni myur thob nas// zla nya'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang / sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing // rim
51b8(rgyud): chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byeng // chags chen pad+ma'i gdung rgyud can/ gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' chen rdo rje lcags kyur
52a1(rgyud): / 'gyu sgyum bshig bku shes shing / dregs pa 'jobs byed dro ba 'gru/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sna phrul dra ba las 'di byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i lu
52a2(rgyud): ba'i la'u sde bdud pa'o// de nas bcob ldan 'das rnam par sdang marjid min po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'i tho'o gshegs pa thabs cad kyi bka' 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i yen 'os
52a3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzid la stobs par zhugs nas paM nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byam 'di bka' stsal to// lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig 'kho
52a4(rgyud): lo'i dbusu bzhag na ni// de yi ming smos rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// zhi dang rgyas dang drag la dang // rang gi las la sbyor ba na// 'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam
52a5(rgyud): bsgoms nas/ bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya// zhib spyan dang skul byed mas// rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mar// dbang la ste/ la ma lu gu brgyud/ yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ 'od
52a6(rgyud): zer can dang ri khrod pas// drag shul spyad la pA ma kaM/ khro gnyer can pa dag gis pa// 'dig shes rab rol ste// chags pa'i rdo rjes rjes chags pa// gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na// gdon mi za ba
52a7(rgyud): phrin las mdzad// spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma// dbang po zhi ba zla 'dra ba/ phyag gnyis na ni bgrang phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs kyis rgyan pa/ dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas/ bum pa zla ba'i mdangs
52a8(rgyud): ldan pa// bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste/ lag gnyis pad+ma'i gdab mchog gis/ rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du// nad pa la ni gdugs par bsam// rin chen ma dang gos dkar can// skra tshe
52b1(rgyud): dog seng po ste// lha mo seng mo sdang ba la/ phyag na rin chen pad+ma can/ dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas/ yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba'i nabs drung du// bdud rtsis rab tu dgang ba dang
52b2(rgyud): bla red rin chen khar baban/ rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzad par 'gyur/ lha mo sku chen mdog dmar pa/ sgrol ma de bzhin lugu brgyud/ kunas 'od dmar 'bab pa can// lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa
