52b3(rgyud): rab tu bzhad cing spyad phye bas/ 'od dngagi med pa'i zhabs drung du// 'ang dpag med pa'i zhabs drang du// bsgrub bya rgyags pasemyos pa dag / bkug snga mda' yis bsnun na ni/ skad cig nyid la dbang du man
52b4(rgyud): mi ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// sku chen na mkha'ikha dog can// 'od zer can dang ro khrod mas/ rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du// mkhas pas sngar bshad tshul du ni// bdud rtsi yis kyi
52b5(rgyud): rnam par bzlog/ lha mo khro gtor ma mA~M kaM/ margad lta bumadog can ma/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rdo rjes bsdigs pas brtson pa yis/ rdo rje mi 'khrug zhabs drung du// khros
52b6(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i me yi char// 'bebs par rnam par bsam par bya// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des// bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed// sbyor ba 'di yis mod la ni// de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am// yang na lus ni
52b7(rgyud): 'jig par mdzad// byin rlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la// rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang // chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar// sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang / bla med 'kha
52b8(rgyud): lo byed pa ste/ rang gi phyogs nas las byas na/ 'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed// khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin/ deng ni rdo rje
53a1(rgyud): bsgobs nas bskul/ rkang pa'i rjes kyis blangs la/ dung khrod thal ba dag dang bsre// de yi ras blangs maM rus dang // mu 'gras gnyis kyis dag ni/ brtags nas lung bong gcid kyis sgra
53a2(rgyud): de las dag bo'i gzugs pas la// de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya/ dug dang sku na lan tshwa dang / 'bru bar chab rab bsres te/ dgra po che bskyed pa'i pir// de yis lus nang rab tu dgang // de nas rna
53a3(rgyud): shas rlung 'dra ba lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang / srin bu me khyar 'dri btsug ste/ zhags pa yis da dam du bzung // da rdo rje smrig du gzhug// bsgobs nas de yi ping smos te/ dgra bo'i lus ni
53a4(rgyud): ma lus par/ po son cha yi tshar mas dbug// mi rus las byas pur bu 'am/ yang na seng ljang las byung bas// dpal ba snying maM phrin dpung mgo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims
53a5(rgyud): tag ga nim par shing la spang ba yis/ me spang ba la bskal pa ra bya/ mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams ste/ mtshan mdzan pos gtub se nas ni/ 'bar ba'i lus can khris pa mi
53a6(rgyud): de yi dum bu sbyin bsreg pa/ las 'di la ni lhag par yang // rus sbal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar// nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na// las 'di nyid ni bsgrub par bya// las 'dri byas nas nges par ni// gang zhig
53a7(rgyud): rgyal bas bsrangs na 'di des/ nges par 'chir khyab 'jug dang // lha chen tshangs pas ci zhig smos// phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i go cha'o// gsod pa'i ye shes las sprul pa// nang gi yang ni ba
53a8(rgyud): par bya// bsgrub pa yid kyis bsrungs nasu// cho ga bzhin du dgag par bya// lag na ral gri mtshan cha dang // be con rdo gtun shing zhags// lag nas 'khor lo mda' gzhu can// khro ba sna tshogs bsna
53b1(rgyud): bdes/ bsgrub pa zhags pas bcings na su// rdo rje yi ni khro ba yis/ lho yi phyog su khrid pa dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang // de ni ral gris gtub pa dang / sgra ma lang long nang bar bas pa/ oM hUM dz+ra
53b2(rgyud): rAk+Sha sa b+hak+Sha~M ya~M tha dag/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang khyi rog wa dang bya rgod kyis// kun sa yongasu bskor na su// dgazang thob pad par ni/ sgom zhing ming nas bskul bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor
53b3(rgyud): la gnas pa'i// rdo rje rnga mo rnams bsams te/ bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pa// de yi rgyab tu zhon su// rdo rje khro bos gzir bzhin du// lho phyogasu ni bkri bar bya// de yi rkang rjes sa la ni// rlung gi
53b4(rgyud): rtsubs pa'i shing lo la// de yi ming nas brjod pas te// rdo rje sna yon drung du sbas/ de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las/ sgom zhing cho ga bzhin pas na/ brgya byin nyid kyang bskrad 'gyur na/ sa steng skye ze sbom
53b5(rgyud): tsa dgos/ de ming gsang drang sngags spel te// 'ug pa'i sgro la tshwa/ sa nas ni/ dge sbyong bram ze'i sgras dkris te/ sa yi 'og tub skos nas gzhug rdo rje khra ba gnyis kyis ni/ 2
53b6(rgyud): mo 'gye du 'jug par ba// de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'bya bar 'gyur/ hUM zhes bya bas gang ba yi/ rdo rje phra mo sgom byas nas/ sna yi rtse mo nas bton te/ bsgrub bya'i lus ni
53b7(rgyud): dgang bar bya/ lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad do// sna tshogs rdo rje bcings na sa// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros gyur pa// des ni lus kyang bskam par bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ba bsgoms te/ kunas kyang ni gan/ 
53b8(rgyud): par ba/ oM badz+ra nA ki ni/ a mu ka s+ya rak+ta A~M kaR+Sha tsa sha ya hUM phaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ bskams 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song ste// dkyil 'khor gru/ 
54a1(rgyud): bzhi ngas nas ni// spos kyi theg le bdun byas te/ deg kham pa'i bor pa dag pa/ de ni ri rab thams cad nas/ rtse mo brgyad par sprul byas te/ rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis/ deg rnam
54a2(rgyud): ni mnan par ba// yaM zhes pa bas bskyed pa'i rlung bdun rnams/ laM zhes bya bas mtshan ma dbang chen gyi/ nang du rlung rnams nges par rgud par bya/ de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings/ pad+ma 'dab
54a3(rgyud): brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la/ klu brgyad bkod dbus ma tshogs 'bar ba can// rdo rje khro bo'i sku yi zhabs mthil gyis// klu rnams mnan na char sprin char pa 'bebs// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis dbus
54a4(rgyud): klu rnams kyi// snying po yongs bcug sbal mas gzir na su// hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod pas na su// 'jigs dus char pa lta bu char pa 'bag/ nyi ma'i mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang nas/ 
54a5(rgyud): na mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni// kunas// char chus yongasu gang ba'i sprin// hUM zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis ldag/ dbugs rngub pa yis bkug nas 'byung ba yis
54a6(rgyud): shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya// yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshor 'bar ba// btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te/ hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs pa byas na ni// nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus
54a7(rgyud): ltar snang / me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyi// zhabs drung dpral 'byes nas byung mi g.yo bran// bdud las rnam rgyal phag drug mda' gzhu zhags/ ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'babs
54a8(rgyud): ba ru khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas/ bgegs rnams sreg mdzod hUM gi sgras bkang nas// 'jig rten gsum po gong ba'ang rnam par 'jig/ rkang rje su dang mi yi khrag dag las/ rmi
54b1(rgyud): gzugs pas mi rus pur bu la// 'od zer can gyis gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis// lan grangs nyi shur mdzod bsngags mig tu gdab// tshogs kyi bdag po'i khang ni ping bcug nas/ pi bzhin rdo rje
54b2(rgyud): gtun shing dgis brdung // oM sum+b+ha badz+ra mu sa la na// tsar+N+Na ya na ra big+h+nAn hUM phaT// las 'di bsams pas mod la ni// me yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur/ sdang zil kha dog lta bu na mkha' lding // 
54b3(rgyud): lus la sprul sdong dgis rgya du bas pa mkha' la 'dug nas gdengs ka stong ldan pa'i// klu brgyad dag dang char sprin rnams la bsgo/ brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas/ spri tshogs bum pa'i
54b4(rgyud): char gyis ma yang gsod// na mkha' lding gis 'dab mas bkab nas ri// brkus brkos ku klung gis ni mtshams/ kyang bcad/ oM badz+ra nA rA ya Na/ ni ba bA ya/ tab pa mu me g+ha hA
54b5(rgyud): zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog/ phag bzhi 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar bu'i 'od// lha mo bzhi pa bsnams ma khams ma dang // chu sprin rgyal mtshan me tog rol pas bskor// g.yas
54b6(rgyud): pa'i phyagis rdo rje legs gsor zhing / g.yod pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par gzhag/ ldam bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol pa ste// sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprid rnams rnam par 'phel/ rnam pa kun gyi
54b7(rgyud): rnam rgyan cing // ring chen cod pan dbang bskur bas// na mkha' la de 'bab pa yis// thog thog rnam pa zlog par byed// oM ma hA puk+ka badz+ra/ che ge mo dzaM zhes bya ba dang / hUM zhes bya ba nas/ pU ra Da ban d+ha hUM
54b8(rgyud): paT sbyor ba 'dir bas pa yis// bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// paM 'a drugs rin chen 'od dpag med/ 
55a1(rgyud): / don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang / bzang po dam pa bcu drug po// kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la/ gnas pa yis de khro ba dang // gsang sngags rdzogs mdzad rig rgyal la/ rnam pa
55a2(rgyud): kun dang ldan pa dag rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas/ thams cad ldan pa'o 'khor rnams la// gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// srid pa mdzes par bskod
55a3(rgyud): nasu nga yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'dzub bstan nas// thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad/ dga' bar mdzad pa'i bod la ni// sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa/ shes rab chen po'i thog 'dran / 
55a4(rgyud): bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des/ bde chen ting la rjid la gnas ste/ ldem bag 'jo tshul gyis bltas nas// lag/ gnyis 'ad+ma'i tshul gyur te/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar bas nas/ ya shes
55a5(rgyud): la me ni rab ston pa/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ yid rgyas pa yis tshig gsol ba/ ci smad rnam ba thad du/ zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang / spring ma bskyod pa
55a6(rgyud): 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam par bsgyings pas gsung // byang chub chen po'i rdo rje can// lag na rdo rje gsol mod la// brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad// sgom
55a7(rgyud): pa'i lam la lags byung ba// rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabaso// bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi// rjesu 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig/ gang la dngos rnams dngos
55a8(rgyud): med cing // mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med// dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag// dus gsum 'das pa na mkha' 'dra// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs// rtogs pa
55b1(rgyud): 'dod pa dag ni// thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya// phung po dngos po yod med pa'i// byang chub sems ni grogs gyur pa// spro ba dang ni btung ba yis/ sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya// sems kyis sku
55b2(rgyud): ni 'thob 'gyur zhing // sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin// sems kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas// de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par sgor// sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste/ byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra// dper
55b3(rgyud): na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas/ gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te// legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la// sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni/ rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs// zhen pa'i sa mi sa la snang dang // 
55b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin bsod nams ye shes las/ byung ba 'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems// sems can rnams kyi bsam sa ba la/ bla med byang chub snang bar byed// dngos po don dam mi shes
55b5(rgyud): ba phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas// ngan par dz+nyAH/ pa'i rnam rtogs// rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas// 'byung ba che na po bzhi rnams dang // dngos po thams cad ldan zhes gsungs
55b6(rgyud): da la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/ mi shes pa yi yongasu brtags// bdag tu 'dzin pa mngon zhen pas// don dam pha rol byas pa yi// theg pa dman pa rnams kyis// bla med byang chub ci ltar 'thob// khang
55b7(rgyud): chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med/ lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste// nyon mongs pa rnams yongasu bsregs/ lhag med bag chags med pa ste// mkha' ltar dri ba med pa
55b8(rgyud): yin// bla mngadu byang chub 'di lta bur/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par bshad/ de yi byang chub spel ba'i phyir/ las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin/ rnal 'byor can gyi gsang sngags gang / ye shes se de'i
56a1(rgyud): drung du// rtag tu mnyes pas ma grub pa'i// lhag ma da yis bsha ba ste// de ni bde drug thabs kyisu// char bcad nas ni sgrub pa bshad/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che// rdo rje 'gas pa rab gdung
56a2(rgyud): byad rdo rje khu tshur gzi brjid che// rdo rje phur bu rnams 'dril byed// rdo rje tho brdung po ste/ rdo rje nag mo cher 'bab pa/ lha rnams kun la 'jigs pa skad// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di/ bsgoms nas la
56a3(rgyud): la spyad na ni/ dam tshig rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir/ mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed// gsang sngags rigs pas hUM zhes pa'i// lcags kyu btang nas zhabs drung dgugs/ 'di ni gal te sangs
56a4(rgyud): sa ma/ rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las 'gugs/ dam tshig gos ni zhugs pa dang / rdo rje bcing bas bcing ba bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi sa bzung nas/ rdo rje nag mos kun tu bsngags/ rjem
56a5(rgyud): ni phur bu yis// gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga'o// dpral ba mgri na po snying ka dang // de bzhin dpung pa gnyi su gdag/ rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid
56a6(rgyud): kyang nges par gnon// sdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzugs rnyan mig yor gyur pa dang // sangs rgyas byang chub rab rdzogs pa'i/ dngos grub de tshe sbyin par mdzad/ 'di ni mthu yis grub
56a7(rgyud): pa yid sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin// do nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba'i sgrub pa thos nas mgrin cig tu thad kyis lag so zhes bye ba gsol to// gtso ba rnga/ 
56a8(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad/ dpa' bo chen po leg so zhes/ zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa// dam pa bshad pa mdzad pa legs/ sems can phan par thugs rje yi/ lcags kyus kunas 'bar ba legs/ 
56b1(rgyud): med chos rnams sgrub pa yi// ye shes snying ku 'bar ba legs// gsang chen thams cad bstan pa yi// rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs// thag pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na// bla med pang chub bde bar
56b2(rgyud): oM badz+ra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pA sha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra Tak+ki ra dzA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+TiM gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badz+ra kI la ya/ kI la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra mud ga ra A kau Ta ya hUM/ ye shes kyi snying kus snying po can du
56b3(rgyud): gyur pa'i gsang sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa den yod pa'i las 'di dag su la yang bstan par mi bya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim
56b4(rgyud): par phye ba'i le'u sna brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spro ba'i las thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i rdo rje zhes
56b5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad/ oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhagasta/ AHni bzhin gyi pad+ma la/ hrIni bskul nas snyi
56b6(rgyud): kar bzhag/ yaM ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// bzhag nas bsgrims te gdeg pas nas// 'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par 'gyur// dbab snod skul byed gzugs de yi// ga
56b7(rgyud): kyi ngo bor bsams nasu// rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal gyis// gsang sngags bsgoms dang bcas par bklag/ brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i phreng ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta nI/ samya kAM bud+d+ha ko Ti nan/ tang
56b8(rgyud): thA oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swA hA/ brtson 'grus chen po thogs pa med par 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon po cho ga/ phyag na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dag sta dang / zhags pa bsnams ma/ khro mtsho
57a1(rgyud): ma khro mo'i dbang phyug ma khrag po'i gzugs can ma// zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ phyag sdong pa ma pas pa/ gnan gyis mi thub ma/ dod yod pa/ gdul bar dka' gzig stong ma
57a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bon gyis brlabs ma// lha thams cad kyis phag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i seran mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon sa cad// rdo rje'i sku
57a3(rgyud): can ma/ rdo rje spyad gdangs pa'i stang stabs can/ drag shul ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar sdang ba/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+yas rgyan pa/ oM b+ha ga ba'i tsun+da drudru d+ha/ khri ma
57a4(rgyud): rurasru swa rur/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/ A be sha ya A be shaya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-its+tsha ba ya/ sa ra sa ra mA ra ya mAM ra ya/ sa8/ b+han+d+hab+hany+dza/ ma ra ba ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ye/ pi cib cad
57a5(rgyud): ha da ha/ grah+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhigacig/ pa dang / zhe gnyis pa dang / zhagasum pa dang / dag bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang
57a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'jig dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba thams cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha
57a7(rgyud): ma da ya~M mang da ye/ sho Sha ye sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta ba ya/ u ba d+him su pad+ha ya/ han ha na~M/ badz+re \u0f7fsa ra sa ra dat+te na/ ma ra mA ra/ khang+gen hUM hU~M hA ts+tsha tsu nr-i/ tri tri tI/ oM tsa le tsun+da sarba sA d+ha ya sA hA
57a8(rgyud): de nis rdzas bskul nas// rdo rje dril bu bsil bya zhing // rdo rje bcings pa bskyed par bya'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas oM/ dbusu pad+ma 'dib brgya dang // 'brel pa'i pad+ma bzhag na su// aHzhes
57b1(rgyud): bya brgyad kyis rgyan/ dbus su bsgrub bya bsag na su// hUM ba'i yis ni brdzes par bya// kham por kha spyang nang bcug ste/ steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan/ sgom zhing gsang sngags bskul tshigs/ bzlas brjod
57b2(rgyud): dag ni bya ba dang // ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis/ kunas kyang ni bkri bar bya// 'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i// lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur/ sngags la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid na/ kha dog dmar po rdo rje can
57b3(rgyud): 'dod chags tshe dang ldan pa'i gzugs/ 'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig bsam// sku gsum ldan pa mda' thogs shing // g.yon pa yis ni gzhu yang bzung // oM hA bud med spyi bor bsam nas ni// 'dod pa
57b4(rgyud): snying zag dregs bdo ba/ mdog dmar thal mo sbyar nas ni/ 'dud bzhin du ni mdun bzhag ste/ rdo rje mda' yis bsnun da ni/ pad+ma dag nas zil pa 'jog/ rdo rje mda' yi sbyor ba yis/ 'drod
57b5(rgyud): chags can ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor cin gyis dbang ba'i pi / 'dod chags rdo rje can yang sgom/ maM tha~Md las byas cang 'a'u la/ spre'u'i lpags pa g.yogs nas ni/ ngos
57b6(rgyud): nyid la ni pad+ma bri/ bud med khrigs 'dzag par bya// de yi dkyil du pro dris to// pi yi skra yis btags nas ni/ mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyi/ phreM hAM ming nas brjod cing brdad// lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil
57b7(rgyud): 'khor ni// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bri/ bla ra ni bu mo zas sbyin ma// 'gugs par brtson pa'i lcags kyu ba// gtso bo khrag 'thub cha lugs kyis// gzugs can gyis ni rting pas brdung // 'dis ni
57b8(rgyud): khams gsum rnam gnas pa'i// bu mo zas sbyin 'gugs par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ gnas pa yis ni nga rgyal gyis/ rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyur na// tshig
58a1(rgyud): rnam pa tsam gyis kyang / lha dang lnga min mi la sogs/ rnal 'bor can gyis thams cad dang // gape 'dabang nyidadi la gdas pa/ de ma thams cad bangag gzhug 'gyur// bltas pa
58a2(rgyud): tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am// de tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis bskul nas/ rnal 'bor can gyis glu dang gar// ji lta ji ltar sgom bas pa/ de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed// sbyin sras
58a3(rgyud): de nyid la gnas pa'i// me yi lha ni zhal yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsha nga/ sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur nas dang
58a4(rgyud): grub sbyar// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa/ thams cad sbyin sreg dgis skong // de pir sku gsum mkhas mchogs// sbyid sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad// rtsub shi
58a5(rgyud): las ni byung ba'i me// dge ba yaM ni las rnams byed/ gang lnga pa 'am dur khrod las byung ba'i// ma yi las rnams rab sgrub pa// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi pa/ zla gam dang ni zur gsum pa/ dkyil
58a6(rgyud): 'khor zur gyi kha khyer ba/ rdo rje mtshan ma dag rgyun// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus ni// pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang / rdo rje rin chen pad+mo bzhag ci ltar rigs par
58a7(rgyud): 'dug na su// la gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni// blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg sbyin sreg la dgos g.ya su bzhag g.yon du chu yi snod dgo/ las kun
58a8(rgyud): byed pa bzlas nasu// bsang gtor dang ni mthor 'thung ba/ ku sha'i rtse mos gnon pa yis// thab khung khor yu ga bskor bar ba// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas pas mi 'jigs 'them
58b1(rgyud): bskyod cing // gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// me yi lha ni spyad drang // tshur spyod tshur sprod 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong brab ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang / 'di nyid du ni bzhag
58b2(rgyud): suM gsol// oM ag+na ya/ dI pya dI pya/ A be sha ma hA shri ye/ ha~M bya ka ka baM/ ba ha nA ya swA hA// lag g.yod rdo rje bsang gtor de// mchod yon mchod dang rnam lnga dbul// pe yaM phyogs nas bod
58b3(rgyud): pa ni// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan// 'od dpar ral po'i thor tshugs can// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis rgyar// 
58b4(rgyud): lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni snga gas dor phrad// g.yon na ril ba spyi blugs te// gnyis pa ra bcon nyid/ mdog dmang rgyud ni med bral// drang srong rnams
58b5(rgyud): kyis yongs bskor ba/ 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsam nas kyang // thab kyi dbus gzhugasu gsol// da la sbrid sreg la dgos pa// kunas lad gsum sreg blugs dbul// de
58b6(rgyud): nas thor 'thung byas nasu// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par ba// legs par tshim byas bzod gsol to// 'dod pa'i ngas
58b7(rgyud): grub gsol ba gang ba/ bum nga rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugasau// pad+ma lcags kyu'i rnam par dag/ me lce mdog dkar sdang ba dang // 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma mkhas pas brdag// de nas myur du 'grub
58b8(rgyud): 'gyur bas// sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar/ dbangs kyi rgyun ni srid ba dang // bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar/ zhi bo'i seMs
59a1(rgyud): zhib mo// 'byor pa rgyas pa mngon par sbal// dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o// drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pas/ hUM zhes pa dang
59a2(rgyud): phaT dang bcas// lus ni me lci 'bang ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzang bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yig nges par sbyar// sngags grung tshig shes
59a3(rgyud): pa yis/ sbyin sreg yog thams cad la/ sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lha/ gang dag yin pa mchod par bya// spyir sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing / dang po dgang blugs sreg cing dbul
59a4(rgyud): pis ni rim bzhin rnam par sbal// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang na mas la// dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin bsreg bya/ bi shang gtsa khrig rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang sbyin
59a5(rgyud): bosreg bya// tsaM ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal// mi gtsang ba yis bkang dgo// ci ltar sdig pa mi ske 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang // sems can mi shes pas
59a6(rgyud): rmongs te// thams cad shes rab rnam spangs shing / phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang // deg gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyi su rnam par brtags/ chos
59a7(rgyud): 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas pa med// sen shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan// dpa nga'i don du dge spangs na/ bsod nams
59a8(rgyud): med pa ci zhig smos// dper na chus gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te/ chu las rgal ba'i gzings byas na// de la 'jus te legs rgal
59b1(rgyud): bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyi lam ni bskyed pas kyang / chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin// da pir rnam rtog drang spongs la
59b2(rgyud): zab mo yi ni chos sbal te// de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs lam la/ sngags reg rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung byed pas// nam mkha'
59b3(rgyud): lta bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gnos// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdams nas/ nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs// rnam pa kun
59b4(rgyud): gyis rnam par rgyan/ rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid 'gyur// las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i/ skyes pa bud med gzugs mngal/ brnyas pa nyid
59b5(rgyud): mi ba 'dis// rdo rje lus can dab tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yis// sems kyis sems cad rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sud pi dbyung // rdo rje sas
59b6(rgyud): ldan dam tshig yin// sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yis// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par sdang mdzad cher 'khrugs
59b7(rgyud): mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// rkang la mi 'khrug rgyal po ste// khrag la rim chen 'byung ba gtso// sen rnams kyi rus pung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi tshe/ 
59b8(rgyud): rnams rnam 'dran pa// thub pa skyes mchog don yod la/ dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen nga yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni// rtag tu bstan zhing bsgo
60a1(rgyud): par ba// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs/ sred dang de bzhin rnam spel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di/ thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshang gci khu ba mchil pa khrag/ 
60a2(rgyud): 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhin bsdus pa/ sgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis// dam tshig bstan bar ba ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'dir sbyin sreg ri pa
60a3(rgyud): par bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ting 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
60a4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje gsang sngags sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs yang dag
60a5(rgyud): par bskul nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub pa'i thabs pa/ sang chen 'di nyon cig/ rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin la// gnas shing sku gsung thugs bsgoms te// mdun du 'khor lo la/ 
60a6(rgyud): par bzhag/ sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od/ 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par// sgom zhing 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// ma yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'di/ 'khor lo
60a7(rgyud): chen po 'phags par 'gyur// spyan ni bzlas brjod pade bzhin du// bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya/ rgyal tshon 'khor lo drug pa dag // 'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can
60a8(rgyud): lang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur// mi 'khrugs par ni rnam sgom zhing // rdo rje mdun du bzhag nas ni// rim pa bzhin du bskul na 'dis// sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing // 'bar ba'i phrang
60b1(rgyud): chen mnyam pa'i 'od// rdo rje chen po 'phags par 'gyur// bA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du// rdo rje bla ba blang bar ba// rdo rje rgyal po blangs pa yis// gtso ba rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur// gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang // 
60b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor nas/ sems can kun sems la gnas pa'i// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / 'jig rten khamasu rnam rgyu zhing / kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// rin chen 'byung ba
60b3(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste// sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na// rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur// rin chen sgrol me zlos bzhin du// 'od bzang gzi brjid 'bor pa can// pogs kun
60b4(rgyud): snang bar byed pa yi// nor bu'i rgyal po blang bar bya// lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis/ rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur// de ni semaras can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ba'i/ 
60b5(rgyud): rin chen tshor ba rab 'bebs shing / sems can kun gyi dbul ba 'joms/ gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam bar rgyu// 'od dpag med par rnam bsgoms nas/ 
60b6(rgyud): pad+ma chen po dun bzhag ste// rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs bstod na// 'dab ma ba bas rnam rgyan pa// 'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba can// pad+ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur// gos dkar can ma'i gsang snga
60b7(rgyud): kyis yid las byung ba'i pad+ma blang // 'ad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis// 'od dpag med pa gnyis par 'gyur/ chos mdzad rnams kyis thog 'dren cing // sems can rnams la bdud rtsi rtsol// sangs rgyas
60b8(rgyud): ring rnams snang bdag tso// bde ba can gyi rgyan du gyur/ don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms nas/ ral gri mdun du rnam bzhag ste// rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni// sgom pa de nyid kyis bskul na/ rdo rje 'ab
61a1(rgyud): ba lta bu'i 'od/ ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ sgrol ma'i gsang sngags zlos bzhin du/ ral gri bla med blang bar ba// de ni ral gri mchog blangs nas/ don yod grub pa ga/ 
61a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'ang du rnam rgyu zhing / sems can rnams kyi mi shes gcod// rtag tu dri med snang gyur te/ chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin/ rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni// phyag rgya chen pa bsgrub pa/ 
61a3(rgyud): bya rnal 'byor chal rnam gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo che// zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad ma/ rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI/ rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang / lha mo 'gro ba dbang mdzad ma/ 
61a4(rgyud): mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad ma/ rim pa bzhin dung yis bshad// de nas bu mo mig yangs ma/ lo ni bcu dru/ ga lon pa la/ gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tsher ldan// ga
61a5(rgyud): gyi rnam g.yol can// gcig gcig bsgrims te baHlan su/ lha po ti dong legs pas te/ rigs lnga yaM ni tshigs can ma/ las kyi rjesu bsgoms byas nas/ bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba
61a6(rgyud): yid pad+ma la ni rdo rje bzhag/ sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul// gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dang // de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba yis// mod la sgyu mas dregs mos nas// rdo rje las ni bdud rtsi 'byung
61a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ldan pa'i shes rab lag/ pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi btung // rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni// 'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs lnga yis// sku ni yongasu 'gyur ba 'thob// na mkha' 'dra ba'o// 
61a8(rgyud): chos kun le// thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste/ 'dod lnga'i yon rjes 'jug pa'i// byang chub bde bas bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje 'dre drin
61b1(rgyud): rlabs nas// rjesu chags pas 'thob par 'gyur// grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni// sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs// rje su chags pas bde ba yi// rdo theg pas mnyes par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i
61b2(rgyud): khyad par 'di yis ni// lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang // las kyi phyag rgyangs bshad de// deg lag pa'i phyag rgya dag/ ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas// dam tshig mchog gis 'grub
61b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba// sna tshogs phrin las mdzad par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang thugs lnga/ 
61b4(rgyud): byung // sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste// chu khams mA ma kI zhes bshad// sgrol ma rlung nas kun tu brjod// gos dag can pa ma ru bsgrags// rdo rje dam tshig namakha'i dbyings// ston pa rdo rje/ 
61b5(rgyud): 'chang bas bshad ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos gsung so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin
61b6(rgyud): gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsungs dang thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
61b7(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsungs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
61b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba 'das par da / 
62a1(rgyud): bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca dang / khang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ci lngar blta bar bgyi lags// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams
62a2(rgyud): ca dang / ngang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni rdo rje'i bang rkub kyi sem su blta bar ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/ bang chub kyi sems dang rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyisu byar med pa'i pir
62a3(rgyud): nas bro ba'i bor nas rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus nas yang bshad pang ba'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khabs na sangs rgyas dang bang chung sems dpa' bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i bar de dag
62a4(rgyud): thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas mngon bar mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa tha
62a5(rgyud): kyi pha yin// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi ma yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thab sa cad kyi ston pa yino zhes rdo rje'i yi ge gsub phyung nas slar
62a6(rgyud): yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dper na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
62a7(rgyud): rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni rdo rje slob dpon da'i spu'i khung bu gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ri
62a8(rgyud): kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
62b1(rgyud): chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin chen 'byung ba dang / don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin ga
62b2(rgyud): pa 'od pag ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
62b3(rgyud): bang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyod cig/ phyogs bcu das gsu ma du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon drung du
62b4(rgyud): byonas mchod par mdzad cing phag 'tshal bar ba rjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cadang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stod pa yin pa dang / bcu
62b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang nga nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyiraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dag la 'di
62b6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
62b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid la gnaso// bang chub sems dpa' thams kyis gsol pa// rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag
62b8(rgyud): dang sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ na mkha' la gnaso// na mkha' gang la gnas// rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems la gnaso// sems gang la gnas/ gdang yang ba yi'o// de ngas byang chub sed
63a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po// dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ dkyil 'khor dang / ting 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / sdang stabs dang / 'dug sngangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / 
63a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / las la sbyar ba dang slar bsdu bo rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid bcu yin par gsung so// dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnam
63a3(rgyud): kyi gsang ba dang gsang chen dang ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni slob dpon gyi kha nas bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o// bla mas dam tshig ci ltar lta ba bzhin
63a4(rgyud): gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o// bsgrims nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rims bzhin bshad par bya
63a5(rgyud): 'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi spyir shes par bya'o// de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongasu mi shes par gsang snga gas smra ba nga yin// zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gas
63a6(rgyud): sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam tshig thams cad nyams par 'gyuraro// dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyuraro// skas bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzad pa chen por 'gro
63a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// sems can rnams la rten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bslu bar mi bya'o// zhes shes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can dag sbyar
63a8(rgyud): bar bya'o// gang zhig 'di la brtson par ma bsa~M pa dag gis ni lag pa dang / rkang pa dang mig sbyin pa'i dka' ba spyad pa dang / dka' thub ci lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa 'am// bdud rtsi'i ro thob par
63b1(rgyud): mi nuso// rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste sgom pa byas na sdig pa las 'grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang / chos bdag med par bsgoms pas thams
63b2(rgyud): cad mkhan pa'i rnal 'bor khong du chud par bya'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod par bya'o// dngos po thams cad dngos pad par// bzhi bcu'i
63b3(rgyud): don ni rtogs pa dang // rdo rje pad+mas dbang bskor bas// bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba// gsang zhing sbas te bzhag par ba// 'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni// gzugs sgra
63b4(rgyud): dri ro rag pa sogs// rnal 'byor sems dpa' spyad pa zhing // / de bzhin bza' dang btung bas na// bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rgyud kyi rgyal
63b5(rgyud): po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las cho ga thams cad bsta na pa rim pa pa ba ste bcu pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dza
63b6(rgyud): za dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dag yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zag pa chen po'i yang thag pa chad pa
63b7(rgyud): yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba chen po rdzog ste// // bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 
63b8(rgyud): rgya gar skad/ sarbata thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta kauSh+Na ya ma ri nA pa tan+ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rjegashing dag pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'phags pa
64a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i
64a2(rgyud): btsun mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshing rje gshed dang / pra pa rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / prag dog rdo rje ga shin rje gsha
64a3(rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gsha dang / tho ba gshin rje gsha dang / dbyug pa gshin rje gsha dang / pad+ma gshin rdza gshad dang / ral gri gshin rje gsha dang / mtshams rnamasu rdo rje tsartsi ka dang / rdo rje phag mo dang
64a4(rgyud): rdo rje dbyangs can pa dang / rdo rje gau rI swA rnams mtsham su'o// de ngag la sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhug so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
64a5(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams cad rnab par
64a6(rgyud): 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to// zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yis// gshin rje mthar pad bsgom par bya// bdud rnams zhi bor ba phir dang // zhe sdang
64a7(rgyud): thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yis// rdo rje srung ba'i don du sgom// phyir mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang // dra ba dra ba de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
64a8(rgyud): pa bsnyad pa po bdad 'dol ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las
64b1(rgyud): dris par byung ba/ dbus su ya dang kle ma me da yats+tsha ni rA dzas do ru t+ya yo ni ra'o// ya sogs yi ge dang po las/ gshin rje gshed 'gyur ba yin// yi ge kle ni gti mug brjod// yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs// yi/ 
64b2(rgyud): ma ni 'dod chags nyid// yi ge da ni phrag dog 'gyur// gshin rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags// yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur// yaM ga tsA las dbyug pa'i gtso// lag na pad+ma ni yig las// lag na ral
64b3(rgyud): gri rA las yin// dza las tsartsi ka zhes brjod// yi ge sa las pag gdong ma/ yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags/ yi ge ru las gau r-i dran// na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi// thod pa bzhi ru 'dod
64b4(rgyud): pa yin// sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba/ namakha' rdo rje dkyil du bsam/ de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed/ gan gcing 'bar ba bsgoms par bya// shar du gti mug rdzo
64b5(rgyud): ste lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin// nub du 'dod chags rdo rje ste/ de bzhin byang du phrag dog mchims kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ tsar ci ka sogs rnam par sgom// sgo yi rdo rje ci bzhi la// tho baM las gas
64b6(rgyud): rnam par sgom// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams pa'i ru// mi yi mgo bo bzhi dgogau/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gshin rje gshed po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti
64b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa// oM hriHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT paT swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
64b8(rgyud): bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rat+na hUM/ 
65a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM A ro l-i ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshas
65a2(rgyud): pa thabs kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i kaM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM
65a3(rgyud): puSh+ka ra d+h+r-i ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM daN+Da d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
65a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pad+ma d+h+r-i// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags
65a5(rgyud): gsungs pa/ oM khaD+ga hU~M// de nas bcom ldan 'das deng na na gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngar gsungs pa/ oM mo ha ra ti// de nas bcom ldan 'das
65a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbang
65a7(rgyud): can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rA ga ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gau rI ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra ra ti/ de nas de bzhin
65a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swaH/ 
65b1(rgyud): ba At+ma ko6/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhe sdang chen po'i sku nges par bstan pa/ zhal gsum phya
65b2(rgyud): drug khros pa la/ in+d+ra naM la 'dra ba'i mdog/  gi ma rdo rje bsnams pa nyid// gshin rje gshad ni bsgom par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la// gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'ong / phyag ma
65b3(rgyud): 'khor lo bsdams pa nyid// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug rgyas gyur pa// gser gyi rnam pa'i 'dod ldan// phyag na rin chen bsdams pa nyid// phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya
65b4(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug dbang byung ba// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag na pad+ma bsdams pa nyid// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam pa sgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la/ 
65b5(rgyud): chen margad 'od dang ldan// phyag na shubs can bsnams pa nyid/ phra ma rdo rje rnams bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gau shin rdza gshad nag po'i
65b6(rgyud): las mngon par rtogs pa'i rim par phra ba ste le'u dang po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa// ga
65b7(rgyud): rje gshad po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje gshad po rab 'jigs pa'i// phra ma rdo rje'i ngo
65b8(rgyud): rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshing rdza gshed po rab 'jigs pa// rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje gsung la phyag
66a1(rgyud): 'tshal bstod// phrag dog ngo bo'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rje gshed po las kun pa// rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungs// phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi
66a2(rgyud): dngos po khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso// dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag bstod// rdo rje pog dang / rdo rje snga ba dang / rdo rje lce dang / rdo rje lus
66a3(rgyud): dang / rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang dag bshad pa pa// 'dod pa'i don grub grub byed pa'i// gshin rje gshed
66a4(rgyud): po nyid mtshungs pa// gshin rje 'jigs pa'i dkyila'akhor lo// skud po gsang ba legs bsgrims la/ legs ba'i tshad la mdzes pa yis// skud pa shes pas thig
66a5(rgyud): gdab po// gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo// mtshan rnams thams cad rab rdzogs shing // bar chad thams cadarab nyams pa// zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa'i// dkyil
66a6(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo'i cha byad la/ rtse mo lnga dang ldan mnyam pa'i// las kyi rdo rje de la bris// rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rje de yi dbu su bri/ ral gri byang gi phyogasu bri// 'khor lo'i 'od kyi bskor ba
66a7(rgyud): yi// 'khor lo shar gyi phyogasu bri// 'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// rin po che ni lho ru b+hi// pad+ma rA gA'i mdangs 'dra'i 'od// pad+ma nub kyi phyogasu bri// 'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i// shar gyi
66a8(rgyud): mtsham su 'khor lo br-i// lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya// nub du pad+ma'i me tog ni// yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal// 'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// ud pa la ni bang nub bri// shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste// dbyig
66b1(rgyud): pa de bzhin lho yi sgong// 'dam las skyes pa nub kyi sgor// byang du rdo rje ral gri'o// shes pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la/ mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dgis// 'jig
66b2(rgyud): pa med par mngon par mchod/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba sna le'u gnyis pa'o// des
66b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa// sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi// 'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'joms dkyil 'a
66b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo// mgon po dkyi la 'khor bri bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi myang
66b5(rgyud): ba'i cho ga nges par byung ba/ oM AHhUM/ rdo rje ma lce sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun mnyas pa dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs// ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid// 
66b6(rgyud): dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid// tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis// mnyam par gzhag pas rnam par sgom// ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor gtso
66b7(rgyud): rnam bsgom pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom pa// zla bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa// phra ma zhes bya rnam bsam pa// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbus gnas pa
66b8(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom pa// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya// zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste/ rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin// 'dod chags rdo rje dbang du byas/ 
67a1(rgyud): rdo rje las kyis thams cada'o// rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis// mi tshil mi yi thod par bzhag/ de bzhin mi sgras sdong bu ga/ dung khrod dag tu du bsgrag/ mig sman dag ni de bzhin du// mig
67a2(rgyud): sman las kyi sgom pa dang // las kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// piMg sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur/ khrag dang gur gum bzung bas nas// sgrub pa drug pa bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje skyong ba yi// rkang
67a3(rgyud): pa byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la/ sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yos// lcags gsum du ni bcug pas na// las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// kon ta'i lcags kyi ral gri ni// la
67a4(rgyud): kyi sbyar ba bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud
67a5(rgyud): las las kyi rim par phye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'a ngas rdo rje 'dzin chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis
67a6(rgyud): bstod nas gsol ba btab pa// las kyi dbye ba'i dab pa las/ sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje chen pos bshad gsol/ yon tan rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags// de nas rdo rje 'dzid
67a7(rgyud): rgyal pos// las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa// nyes kun gsol ba'i bdag nyid kyis// 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad// thugs rdo rje nyid kyi
67a8(rgyud): mthus phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal
67b1(rgyud): dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bstan// gshin rdza gshed kyi 'khor lo mchog ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// bud med dbang du bya ba dang // srung ba'i don dang de bzhin du// zhi ba'i ro tsa nas bzung ste/ 
67b2(rgyud): gro ga 'am de bzhin smyug shun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas// nam rnams rnam sten la// gnag dang yu can ma yin pa'i// khams por gnyis ni kha sbyar te// mang dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug/ skud pa
67b3(rgyud): dkar pos kham por bcing // shar du mngon par sogs pa yis// me tog dkar pos dus gsum gtor// gshin rje mthar byad chu shal 'drar// bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun bkod la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
67b4(rgyud): gnas nas// bsgrub pa bltas nas dbang bskur ba// bdud rtsi lnga yis ga/ dang ba yi// bum pa dkar po zla ba 'das// rdzogs sangs du mas khros pas te// bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam// oM na maH
67b5(rgyud): skr-iSh+NI wi kr-i tA nan hUM hU Ta phaT de ba dat+ta yo shAn+tiM ku ru nA raHswA hA/ ni ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// skyes pa zhi ba'i gur gum gyis// dri bye pani na rgyas pa yang // 'khor lo gnyis ni kha che yis/ sA
67b6(rgyud): ming ni rgyan pa yi// bsgrub pa'i ming ni bris pas la// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas ni// kham por kha sbar nang du bzhag/ skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// me tog ser po dus gsum gtor// bang du kha bltas mdog
67b7(rgyud): ser ba'i// gshin rje gshod du bdag nyid bsam// bsgrub pa zla ba ser nag la/ bum pa seng pos bskur ba zhing // dbang bskur ba ni bsgom byas la// spros la rgyas pa'i bzlas par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i tA nar hUM hUM phaT/ 
67b8(rgyud): phaT sA hA/ dang datA puSh+TiM ku ruM swA hA/ oM hrISh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ba~M laT de ba dat+ta s+ya bo puSh+pa ku ru bo baT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'i khro ga'am ras la
68a1(rgyud): // rgya skyegs kyi// khu ba 'am can da dbang po 'am// srin lag gi ni khrag kyang rung // yi ge ha yis brten pa yi// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// 'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i// 
68a2(rgyud): por gnyis ni kha sbyar du// mar dang sbrang rtsi bkang ba bzhag/ skud pa dmar pos bcings pas la// nub phogasu ni kha bltas nas// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// kha dog
68a3(rgyud): dmar po che 'bar ba// zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'o// bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya// rang gi lus l-is byung ba yi// 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu yis// bsgrub bya dgug par bya bar bas pa// sngags ni spro
68a4(rgyud): zhing khri bzlas pa// des ni bsgrub bya nyams gyur nas// rkang pa gnyi su lhagos gyur nas// gos bral skra ni bshig gyur pa// rnam par bas ma la bzlas pa rtsom// gal te dbang du ba gyur
68a5(rgyud): na dmar la sogs pa bral bas la// du ba med pa'i seng ldang ma sa// 'khor lo de ni sgrub pos so// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hA phaT phaT swA hA/ ho daM ba dat+taM ba sha~M ku ru to// oM hrIHSh+T+rI
68a6(rgyud): wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hU~M/ bau ShaT da ba dat+ta s+ya ya ba sha ma na ya bau ShaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang de bya ba'i cho ga gsung so// dur khrod gos sam yang na naM// rang byung gis bskul
68a7(rgyud): ras la ni// khrag dang rgya skyegs bsres pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la// yig dza dang yi ge hrIs// ming ni rnam pa rten byas la// btsun mo yi ni pad+ma'i snod/ kha sbyor nang du btsud byas te// 
68a8(rgyud): skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa/ nab ka'i nyi ma dang 'dra dmar// lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi// bsgrub bya dag ni rnam
68b1(rgyud): bsgoms pa// snying la lcags kyus brgyab nas ni// skye nas zhags pas bcings byas te// gcer bu skra ni ma bcings par// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// seng ge dmar po'i steng 'dug la/ rdzas lnga
68b2(rgyud): yis ni bkru bya zhing // 'ongs pa ru ni bsam par bya// gal te bsgrub pa mi 'ong na// seng ldang gi ni me 'dag la// der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya// brtul zhugs can gyi 'khor lo sro// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i dAn
68b3(rgyud): na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hrI a mu ka A kaR+Sha ya hrIHoM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT dza/ de ba dat+ta A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// nga breng gos la
68b4(rgyud): mkhas pas ni// yung ba yi ni khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// yi ge lam gyis brtan pa yi// bsgrub pa'i ming yang bri bar bya// kham por kha spyir rang du ste// khab
68b5(rgyud): por ser po'i steng du bzhag/ de la mkhas pas re khA bri// re khA bdun nam yang na bzhi// mnyam par gzhag pas bri bor ba/ ri rab cog brgyad zhes grags pa// de yi steng du pa
68b6(rgyud): par bri// yi ge hUM dang yi ge baM// ri rab de ni brten par ba// de yi steng du lam yi ge las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la// skud pa ser pos bcings nas ri// 
68b7(rgyud): gshin rje gshed po mdog ser po// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bsgrub pa ser po rnams bsams la/ ri rab kyis ni mnan pas pa// phyag na rdo rjes mnan pas pa// dbang chen dkyil
68b8(rgyud): gyi 'og tu// man dang sogs ri bo dang // sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang // bsgrub pa mnan par bsgom par bya// de la gnas nas bzlas pa ba// oM hrIHhrIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M pU phaT phaT/ laM re bdat+ta s+thAn
69a1(rgyud): stam+b+ha ya ku ru laM// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// ngag ni rangs par 'dod pa yis/ de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis dris la// bsgrub pa'i ming yang
69a2(rgyud): bar bya/ deng ni sngags kyang spros la bzlas/ oM hrISh+Ti wi kr-i tA nan hU hUM phaT phaT/ la de ba dat+ta s+ya ya thA swa ra thA/ kar kr-it+te nan+ti ba ra ya thA a bi ru pa kaM de ba dadat+to ya dz+nyA dat+ta ya s+ya bA ka stam+b+ha na ku ru laM/ bac+doMs
69a3(rgyud): kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsungaso// shin tu legs par sbas pa yis// 'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dang // gshin rje gshed nag sbyor ba yis// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// sngar
69a4(rgyud): bzhin dur khrod kyi ngas la// 'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can// ske tshe dang ni tshwa dang yang / dug dang gzhan yang nim pa dang / tsha gsum dang tsha ba'i mar// dur khrod kyi ni sil ba dang // da du ra'i
69a5(rgyud): lo ma'i khu ba dang / tsan da li 'bras mdzub mo khrag cha ste can gyis blangs te// gdol ba'i rdza ma'i drag pa dang // rab tu ltogs ba'i sbu gu yis// bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can// khros pa
69a6(rgyud): sems kyis nyin phrad na// gdug pa can rnams bsad pa'i phyir// sems can gnod pa byed pa'i ming // yi ge hUM gis brten byas la// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'o// spyod pas lho phyogs kha bltas te/ khwa
69a7(rgyud): chen rab tu drag pa'i gzugs/ rus pas mgo bo rnam rgyan la/ ma he la bzhugs lho byung 'dril// gsus pa che la rab 'jigs dang // skrag bed skra 'bar gyen du 'greng // slar smir ma de bzhin ser// gal
69a8(rgyud): nardo rje chen po dang // gnyis pa na ni ral gri dang // gsum pa'i phyag na gri gugo// da ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya// 'khor lo dang ni pad+ma che// thod pa nyid ni g.yon na'o// rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnas/ g.yas pa'i zla
69b1(rgyud): 'od bzang po 'dra// g.yon pa'i dbar po yin par brtag / rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyad// kha spu khung nas 'jigs chen po// rang rigs bdag po rang 'phro ba/ nyi ba'i dkyil 'khor sdang na ni// zhabs ni g.yon pa
69b2(rgyud): brkyang bas gnas// mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis// bskal pa'i 'bar ba pa dang mtshungs// 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis// bsgrub pa rub ba mdun du dgod// gdug pa'i mtshor gyis rgyas pa yis
69b3(rgyud): dri la can la nad kyis gzir// gos mad 'dar zhing nyams chung bas// don 'dod pa yi tshig sla zhing // mtshon gyis gzir ba byas pa yis// gdag gi thum pos lus gang ba// gang ba'i rlung gis gtsas 'gyur nyid
69b4(rgyud): me yi nang du zhugs pa la// ma 'a dang ni stag dag dang // khyi dang marga rings can dgas// sangs rgyas sde ni mngon 'jig pa'i// sdi ga po che dag za bar byed// mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas pa// cher
69b5(rgyud): lus ni bkang ba dang // rkang pa shing ljags sgrogs gi sa bsdams/ de bzhin dum bu dum brdungs/ lpags pa dag ni bshus pas nas// de la tshwa dang skra tshe bskus// hUM zhes thar pa ba
69b6(rgyud): par ba// de yi lus srang la sogs la// bcad pa dag ni mdun du dgod// de'i go ma'ang med pas nas// stong pa'i lus ni mdun du ngas pa// rang gi lus byung khro bo ni// gshin rje ga shed sogs bdag 'di
69b7(rgyud): 'dres de yi lus la brgya pa ras ni// tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed// de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgoms/ lag ra darig pi stobs po che// gdug pa can des 'jags par byed// de yi rgyu ba'i drang
69b8(rgyud): ba sogs// kha rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro// sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni// lha ma yin la sogs pas brdeg/ 'di ltar bsgrub pa nyams pa ba// snying rje la gnas sems kyis ni// bde pas 'khor ba'i
70a1(rgyud): gnas btonas/ sangs rgyas ring du 'gro bar byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par can gyi 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad/ e lo bas
70a2(rgyud): yang dag bsad// bsad pa ma yin sdig las dkrol// ji srid bsad kyang ma bsang ste// sdig pa stong drag bas pa yis// mnar med la sogs mi skye bas// e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ bsad pas
70a3(rgyud): byang chub thob par byed// sems can gsod pa bsad pa nyid snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas// e ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog/ snying rje dman pas 'dru ba mi 'gyur// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na ra hUM hUM phaT/ 
70a4(rgyud): phaT hU~Md pa dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-i wi kr-i tA na ra hUM hUM pa Ta phaT/ de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT/ da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rdog pa'i rdo rje 'khrula'i khor dang sngags deng sman
70a5(rgyud): gyi bsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las rim par pha ba bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo gnyis
70a6(rgyud): bris la// yige phaT kyis brtan pa yi// bsgrub pa'i ming ni bri byas la// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhag/ skud pa sngon pos bcings byas te// nyi ma pad kyi dasu ni// dur khrod sa yi nang du sbas// gshin rje
70a7(rgyud): gshed kyi sbyor ba yis// rta dang ma he zhon pa yi// lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis// mdun du bsgrub pa dgod par bya// khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs// gnyis ka'i phyogasu bsam par
70a8(rgyud): byang gnyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed// khros shing gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i// stobs ldan khros pa bsgoms par bya// bsgoms pas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA nan hAhUM
70b1(rgyud): phaT paT/ de ba t+ta ya d+h+wa tAM bi dA Sha ya hUM bka/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// cho ga dag ni snga ma bzhin/ 'khor lo gnyis ni bri byas la// yi ge hUM phaT gyis brten pa// da pa
70b2(rgyud): kha spyar nang du gzhug bsrud pa nag pos bcings byas la/ sha za'i tshul du spo ba bya// gshin rje'i spyong ba la gnas pas/ mdun tu bsrung bya bsgom par bya// yaM byung gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ rlu
70b3(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor nig po'o// de steng mdog sngon rje mo sgom// de la gdug pa can bskyon la/ lho yi dog su kha bstan te// khro bo'i chags kyis de brdeg pa/ sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog pa dka'/ 
70b4(rgyud): oM snig+niHwi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM phaT de ba dat+ta uts+tsha Ta ya naM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// khros pas rnal 'bor lhor bltas la// ra khrag mi
70b5(rgyud): bsregs thal ba dang // dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang // mar khu smon pa'i khu ba yis// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// rim pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya// bsad pa gshing rje'i lus la gnas// 
70b6(rgyud): bar+Na dang ma he yi// bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rgyas pa zla ba ser po la// btsun mo snying kar dbang du bya// ra la skyon pas 'gugs par bad// ri bo dkyil du rengs pa
70b7(rgyud): bzhag/ sha ra ba'am seng ges dgug// de bzhin gnan yang mtshon par bya// ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang // kha me yi ni khyad par gyi// dbang du bya ba gro bar bri// dge ba'i sems kyis bzung bas na// 'grub pa/ 
70b8(rgyud): 'gyur te the tshom med// kham por kha sbyar nang du gzhug khwa yi sgo yi sma gu yis/ nyi ma he nas bri bar ba// pad+ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs sar// gshin rje'i rnal 'bor bdag nyid kyis// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs
71a1(rgyud): gsang sngags bzlas/ lho phyogs gnas te tshar bcad pa/ mtha' yi ya bor zhi ba la/ yig ni de gnyis ka dang // pi nas dkyil gyi ya spangs ste// yige lhag ma ci bde bar// mngon du/ 
71a2(rgyud): bsnyen pa khri tsam bya// 'dis ni las rnams rab sgrub pa/ ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// rab tu grags pa'i 'khor lo 'di// yi ger bris nas gnas pa dang / 'khor la
71a3(rgyud): bris nas gnas pa yi/ khyim der 'thab mo rtag tu 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'khrul 'khor gyi go rim bri ba zhes bya ste
71a4(rgyud): rims par phye ba lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ gang gis rdo rje can mnyes pa// zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal 'bo
71a5(rgyud): gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// 'di lta bu yi ga/ sung bsgrag so// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi// dbul
71a6(rgyud): gshin rje gshad pa sgom// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rtag tu sbyin bsregs kyang dgang // rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang bzung // sdom pa dag kyang yang dag bzung // dang po la ni cod pan dbang // gaN+DI
71a7(rgyud): pa ral gri sbyin par bya// gsum pa rdo rje dril bu dang / zla ba bza' ba bzhi pa ste// bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po// nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yi// dbang 'di dag gis bra brag gis// rgyal ba'i sras kyis
71a8(rgyud): byang chub thob// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma'i lus// sngags 'di de nas rab bshad pa// sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// 'byung po thams cad 'dar 'gyur ba// oM in+ta ya hrIHya mA ya Sh+T+rIHba
71b1(rgyud): NA ya wi/ ku ba rA ya kr-i/ I shA na ya ta/ ag+na ye A/ nai raM te ya na/ bA ya ben/ tsan+d+ra ya hUM/ a kaR+Sha ya hUM/ prah+ma Ne phaT/ ba su d+ha ri N+yai phaT/ bai ma tsi tri Ne swA hA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo hA/ haha hi hi/ hUM hUM/ pe paM/ phaT pa
71b2(rgyud): swA hA/ bi Ta mu tra chu bsres pas/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum pas nas ni// lha rnams kyang ni tshim par byas// ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya// dkyil 'khor rim gsum pa bi no// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa
71b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma khas pas bris pa la// sngags ni kun tu dgod par bya// brtul zhugs can gyis btsos par// grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod par bya// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// ma lus lus pa
71b4(rgyud): med par 'grub/ oM ya pa rA dza/ sa do pe ya/ ya me da ru/ Na yo/ da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+Sha ya/ yak+She yats+tsha/ ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ dkyil du ya byas shar duk+She/ lho ru 'jam po'i rdo rje ste/ yig
71b5(rgyud): me ni nub tu bri// byang du na 'da' ba na// bsgrub pa'i ming ni sbyin ba/ mtshams kyi stong pa dag tu'o// hUM gnyis kyis ni brten byas la/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// ya tsa ni radzas
71b6(rgyud): do ru// na yo ni ra la sogs pa/ ji rol rim par g.yon brtsams bri// don kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir// rim pa gsum pa de la ni// kun tu cha re bor ba la// shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHlas/ 
71b7(rgyud): ba'i sngags// de yi bar dag thams cad kyi// cha brgyad bor ba dag la br-i/ a mu kaM kuM ru/ uR+tha Ta ya ba sha~M ku ru/ bi dwe Sha yaM/ shrIn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ 'di ltar g.yon nas ni// las dang rjes 'thun
71b8(rgyud): par ni/ phyag 'tshal nam tha ma'i bang/ tha mang po 'aT dang / sU Ta dang ldan sa bon gyis// nidang rgyas dang mthar dang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag
72a1(rgyud): rgyud las 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba drug pa'o// / khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug skam pa yi// phyag na 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'o// ma
72a2(rgyud): bas tsar cika bsgom bya// chang dag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma// rab sngo phyag na rdo rje bsnams// mkhas pas phag mo bsgom par bya// shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir// zhal
72a3(rgyud): gsum phyag drug dmar ba la// zhi ba phag na pad+ma bsnams// dngangs can brtul zhugs can gyis sgom// khu ba dgag pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum pag drag ral gr-i snams// nor bu margad 'dra ba ni// gau ri
72a4(rgyud): mkhas pas bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed po bsad pa dang dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags 'di
72a5(rgyud): gsung so// oM tsartsi ke sa~Md d+han+da rI la ha rI Ni rat+na tra ya a ba ka ri No ru d+hir A kaR+Sha ya dza/ sngags 'di dag ni dran byas na// kha gdangs pa dag byas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum gyi khrag
72a6(rgyud): chen po// 'gugs par 'di la the tshom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshad chen po chang 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gugs
72a7(rgyud): pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra g+ho na g+ho na su badz+ra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+hA ra saM b+ha ra/ ke tu kAr+Na/ a kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas// bum pa kha mdzes nyer byas la// rkun ma'i
72a8(rgyud): skra ni rten bzhag ste// sngags ni rje su dran par bya// sngags 'di che ba'i bdag nyid 'di// ba ta mchod rten dag tu bstan// dal gyis dmigs nas 'bad par bya// chang ni 'gugs par rab tu grags// de nas
72b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i gshin rje gshed rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM bi tsA pi tsa pradz+nyA
72b2(rgyud): badz+ra ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ra d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi badz+ra na swA hA// chos kyi dang po nas bzung ste// kun tu zla bA nya yi bar// sbyar ba'i skad ri sla bar bya// ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas// rtag tu tshigs bcad brgya
72b3(rgyud): zir 'di// dgi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// khams gsum ma lus pa dag ni// ma lus lus pa med par 'grob// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshad rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa zhes bya
72b4(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// khu ba 'gra gas par byed pa'i gau ri'i sngags 'di gsung so// oM A ka rA Ni a kaR+Sha Ni gau ri hrIHduSh+TA ya duSh+TA ya/ shu kra pa~M/ a kAR+Sha ya dza dzardza
72b5(rgyud): hA hUM hUM swA hA/ pad+ma kha dang rdo rje dang / dril bu lcags kyu'o// rlung sbyor gyis// bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// khu ba'i tshig sa ni 'gugs par byed// nags kyi nang ngam dben pa ru/ 
72b6(rgyud): las 'di dag na bskul byas nas// nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje ga shad chen po// rdo rje nag po 'jigs pa zhes bya
72b7(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin pa rnams par zhugs nas dbang bskong ba mchog dam tshig 'di bod kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bab mdzad / u dus par man dang / khu dza taka drung dang / ngang
72b8(rgyud): nika yi phreng ba ni/ bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs/ ril gri chen pos khams gsum pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ 'thung po thams cad 'gugs par byed/ las kyi ram gri dam
73a1(rgyud): pa 'dir gzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ rdo rje dril bu sgrub pa 'di/ long la slob ma yang dag gzung // btud pa rin po che 'dis ni/ rdo rje lus
73a2(rgyud): ni rab tu sgrub// kun tu ya shas bu khod kyis// 'thung shig ye shes las byung ba// slob ma'i khar yang blugs pa pa// gshin rje gshad kyis bsgrubs pa yin// rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid ches// shin tu dga'
73a3(rgyud): ba'i semasu bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin
73a4(rgyud): rgyal po// srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed// bgeg/ sa dang log par 'dren pa dang / gdug pa can dag bsal phyir ga/ sungs// dpal ldan ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag/ srung ba'i 'khor
73a5(rgyud): lo sbyor bar byed// ral gri 'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ rig pa gsum las mchod par byed// sems cad thams cad skyob pa yi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol
73a6(rgyud): phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni// slob dpon dgos dkyil 'khor bri// gos kyis gdong na bcings byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun sgo bzhag/ 
73a7(rgyud): khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad dri// skal bzang bdag ces tshig tu brjod// gsol btab pa yi blo bzang la// yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya// dbang bskur don du gus chen pos// de nas lan gsum ched brjod/ 
73a8(rgyud): ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing // mchog kyang bdag la sprul du gsol// de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod// de bzhi
73b1(rgyud): khrus dang byug pas kyang // slob ma dad pas blug par bya// de la bstod pas kun kyang bya// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ oM pu dza
73b2(rgyud): swa b+hA ba A lAko tsa/ oM d+harma d+hA hu badz+ra swa b+hA At+ma ko tsa~M/ zhi ba la sogs byed pa yi// sbyin sreg de nas bshad par bya// sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi// las rnams thed rab sgrub pa// zhi ba zhi ba'i sems
73b3(rgyud): kyis te// rgyas pa rgyas pa'i sapas kyiso// dbang yang der gtad sems kyis te// bsad dang bskrad pa la yang // zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams pa ste// rgyas pa yi ni rdzing bu 'dra// dbang du bya ba
73b4(rgyud): zla gam ltar// na mkha'i khams 'dra bas ni bsad/ zhib khru gang tshang du ste// de bzhin rgyas pa'i 'khrud pa/ ji ltar rgya sa pa de lngar dbang // bsad pa 'a di sor nyi shu/ zhi ba stong du khru
73b5(rgyud): byed dang / rgyas pa la ni khru tsam ste// sor lnga gnyis ni bsad pa la/ dngang la ji lta nga bzhin dgug/ tshes cig la naM wi bu bya// zla ba nyal rgyas pa ste// bcu bzhi la ri mangs su / 
73b6(rgyud): dbang gi las ni tshes brgyad la'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dag po'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// rgya
73b7(rgyud): sa ni blang bas la// klu yi gzugs cig brtsams byas te// yi ge hUM ru snying kar ni/ hriSh+TiHla sogs bzlas pa bya// char ri mi 'bab dus dag tu// bzlas pa khri byas 'bab par 'gyur// sprul na
73b8(rgyud): ba yi sha dang ni/ nim pa'i lo ma dang bsres la/ de la ril bu nyes nas ni// brtul zhugs cad gyis rgya mtshor bzhug/ sngags kyi bzlas pa khri byas na// mchi rlabs rengs byed mchog yin// cad don
74a1(rgyud): bu brgya blangs la/ 'bras dang la shes bsresu bas te// 'bub phrag brgya ni rab bzlas la// sbyin sreg pas na lha mthong 'gyur/ dur khrod ro bsregs yog pa'i shing // brtul nu
74a2(rgyud): can gyis gzugasu bri// smon pa'i khu bas bsku byas la// sngags khri bzlas pas mdzes thabs 'gyur// grub pa'i yungs kar drangs pas na// 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pas na// sbrul gyis bzung nas 'gye
74a3(rgyud): ba la// gtor na 'tsho bar the tshom med// ri gshing chu yis blangs la// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas nas// mgo la bskus pa tsam gyi ni// mgo yis nad ni nyams par byed/ sngags ni lan bdun mngo
74a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i// lag pas mgo bo mnyes nas ni// mag ni zug gzeng 'byung mi 'gyur// don 'di ltar the tshom med// bram ze yi ni sha dedag la/ dur khrod sa dang thal ba las// gshin rjeg
74a5(rgyud): kyi gzugs byas te/ phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la// rdo rje na bo g.yas pa na// de bzhin mi mgo g.yon pa na'o// mdog ni da kar po cher 'jigs pa/ de yis gdug pa 'dzabs
74a6(rgyud): par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni sha lnga yis// nyin ra bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// bdag gri dag po choms shig ces// rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdab// nub mo de skad brjod pas nyal// dag ni tho rangs
74a7(rgyud): 'tsho bar 'gyur// chu 'gags la sogs pas gzir zhing // yang na nad kyis thobs par 'gyur// dag yi bai ro tsa na blang // mi yi rkang sbubs yongs bkang ste// rab tu bkang nas 'bum bzlas na// shing
74a8(rgyud): rtsar rgyu ba'i yi dwags mtshungs// lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dag po'i rgyud las 'dzi
74b1(rgyud): byeng gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni// de nas yang dag bshad dang ba// sgrub pa bzang po kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i
74b2(rgyud): bzang po mgod rma med la// shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la// phab la legs par bkru bya ste// dang 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can// e ma'o ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu// bsam pa chen po
74b3(rgyud): 'dod 'bod// gshin rje rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// yid kyis cung zad 'jigs mi bya// rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod pa// de kun thams cad ster bar byed// ma he dang ni ku ber// sdug dang de las gzhan pa dang // 
74b4(rgyud): ngo ba dang spre'u dag la ni// khyi dag gi ni khyad par dang // dug dang ska tshe tshwa dang ni// de bzhin cha gsum so bar dza// 'di dag lags par sbyar gzugs pa// gshing rdza gshad po 'jigs pa'i
74b5(rgyud): gzugs da la rnal 'byor pas gsol gdag / hrIHSh+T+r-iHla sog/ sa sngags kyis ni/ che ge mo de bdag la stsol// de yaM pa yis steng dri byed// gal ngarnal 'byor pa ma phyin/ rmi lam gshing rdza
74b6(rgyud): gshed brdeg cing / lho yi phyogasu khyer ba byed// sad nas de yis pa yis star// zhal gsum phag drug 'jigs pa la// in+d+ra ni la 'dra ba'i mdog/ thob 'dzin pa'i brdal zhugs can// phag tu tho ba dgod par bya
74b7(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la/ bdag dmang po sde khros pas 'jigs// 'jigs pa yang na 'jigs par mdzad// mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod// zhal gsum phag drug dbang ba la/ 'jigs
74b8(rgyud): chen po bsdigs pa yis/ phyag na pad+ma dmang po bsnapas/ pad+ma nas bya mkhas pas sgom// zhal gsub phyag drug lnga ku ste/ phyag na rol gri bsdams pa yi// las kun byed par gyur pa'o// la gri'isu brda
75a1(rgyud): bsgom pa/ rtsa gang ling garnab sgo ba nyid// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par sgo ba/ zhe sdang rjes drang rnal 'byor gyis// gti mug rjes dran bsgob pa nga // gti mug rdzas dran la dmigs nas/ 
75a2(rgyud): pra ma rjes dran bsgom par ba// pha pa rjes rnal 'bor gyis// 'dod chags rdzas ngan bsgom par bya// 'dod chags rjes dran rnal 'bor gyis// phra dog dar ba daN+Dal 'gas can// sau'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni// 
75a3(rgyud): ba spu'i khung nas spro nga ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// gtub po'i khro bo bsgom par la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// lha mo bzhi po rab bsgom pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thu
75a4(rgyud): gshin rdza gshed nag po'i rgyud las rje su dran pa rim par pe ba ste bcu pa'o// / zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// / zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugasu// bcom ldan gshin rje'i
75a5(rgyud): dbang du mdzad// zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed// gti mu ga gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// gti mug gshin rje gshed gzug su// bcom ldan gshin rdza gshed dbang mdzad// gti mug thams
75a6(rgyud): cad zad par mdzad// 'gro ba phra mas mnan mthong nas// phra mas gshin rje gshad gzugasu// bcom ldan snying rje can gyis mdzad// phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad// 'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro mthong
75a7(rgyud): nas 'dod chags gshin rje gshad gzugasu// bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas// 'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad// phrag dog gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// phrag dog gshin rje gshed gzugs
75a8(rgyud): bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas/ phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad// byams pa tsartsi kar gsungs te/ snying rje de bzhin phag mo'o// dbyangs can ma ni dga' ba ste/ btang snyoms gau ri'i gzugaso// 
75b1(rgyud): nyid dngos po thams cad kyi/ rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi// rnal 'byor snying ka'i sa bon sgro// 'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ de nas da ni bshad ba pa// spyod pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ gshin
75b2(rgyud): gshed po 'jigs gzugs kyis// sku dang gsung dang thugasu 'grub// dgon pa chen po'i sa pogasu// ma ha mchog ni bkug la zhon// sbrul nag gis ni brgyan par bya// lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs pa
75b3(rgyud): ba skra yang ser po dag tu bya// gyen brdzas pa yi khyad par gyis// mgo la thod pas yang dag bskor// slar lkog spu ser po ba// hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags brjod cing // lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor
75b4(rgyud): rdo rje ga shin rje gshed spyong bas/ seng ge'i sgra yang de la bya/ nus pa cung zad skyes pa ni// rol cing grong du 'jug par bya// dang bde ba'i cha kun gyis/ drug las skyes sogs gru blang bya/ 
75b5(rgyud): de nas rgyal mtshan khams mthong na// der ni 'o ma rab bsgrub pa/ 'o ma la sems cig goms pas/ phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa// phag mo yi ni gzugs gzung ba'i// btsun po kun
75b6(rgyud): la 'khyud pa yis// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyad// 'dod pa'i don kun rab tu 'grub/ de nas da ni bshad bya ba// phag rgya ma ni rab sgrubs thabs/ gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig/ de yi bzlas pa mngon
75b7(rgyud): bshad ba/ yi ge hrI las byung ba yis// ma he yang dag bsgom bya ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// ma ha~M stang du bsgom par bya// gang yang cung zad gcod cing 'bigs// mtshon cha sna tshogs gzugs
75b8(rgyud): de na// ma he sna tshogs sgrub pa yi// blo dang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams// de nas yang dag bshad pa ba/ dbyig pa gshin rje gshed sgrub thabs// yi ge hI ni gsang sngags che// ma he chen po la bcibs
76a1(rgyud): / pag ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phag/ sku ni mi ro'i thal bas bskus/ ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus// gser gyi sa gzhi thug par mnan// de nas yang dag bshad pa pa/ ba ba'i pag can
76a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs// yi ge hUM las byung ba'i gtso// wa~M kr-i ta na gsang sngags che// oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ha hA hi hi hu hU he hai ho haM haM ha/ phaT swA hA/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa yi// dam tshi
76a3(rgyud): sgrub thabs bshad pa du ba// sngags kyis dub pas kha zas bza'// ngan pa dang bral ni de dka' med/ sha tshon dang ni rta dang ni// gleng po che la khyad par dang / ba glang gi dang khyi dang ni/ bang bu rnga mo lnga spyang / 
76a4(rgyud): sngon po dang ni bsras pa yi// snum chen gyis ni lus byugs na/ lus la byugs pa tsam gyis ni// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'a gyur// snang mdzad saM du ba ra dang // de bzhin bil ba'i
76a5(rgyud): lo ma dang // so ngag phyi ma bsres pa dang // gser shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams// 'di yis dril pis byas gyur na// khabs gsum pa ni dbang du 'gyur// dug dang rku bur de bzhin mdze/ dril
76a6(rgyud): phyis byas pas nyams par byed// gci ba chen po btung bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi de bzhin du// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gtso bo// rang byung me tog btung ba bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
76a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las spyod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rim par phra ba bcu gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje sems
76a8(rgyud): dpa'i ngo bo car ci ka'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing phag mo'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / dbyangs can gyi rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhu
76b1(rgyud): pa dang // gau ri ma'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs te// mchod pa'i glu 'dig brjod par mdzad// Akya kya gshin rdza gshed nag bla// srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod// bad gis khrod/ 
76b2(rgyud): mthong shin tu 'jigs// khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod// mtho ris sa stangs sa 'og bcas// khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos par mdzod// ad tsa nag po bcag 'dra ba'i// khro khyod ro langs zhig
76b3(rgyud): mdzod// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing // mdangs nag tshad ni thung ba la// bde chen ngo bo bro gar gyis// rdo rje dbyangs can pa gsol 'debs/ hrIHSh+T+rIHsngags dang gar gyis khyod// srid pa gsum
76b4(rgyud): gyi 'khrul pa tshad// snying rje khros pa'i dang grol gar// 'gro bas dang ni ngo mtshar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bzlas pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ bzlas pa gang zhig rab bzlas
76b5(rgyud): dngos grub yangs pa thob pa ni/ myur bar ma yin dal bar min/ ring du ma yin thung ngu min// sngags ni cung zad thos par bzlas// gshin rje slob dpon mi mchog/ ma he pi dang so gan
76b6(rgyud): dang 'ab lang dang ni rta dag dang / khong bu rnga mo'i rus pa las// bzlas pa'i phreng ba rab bsgrub pa// zla ngo gcig gi bcu bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// sha lnga dag ni bsdu byas nas// bzlas na da
76b7(rgyud): grub 'grub pa'i mchog/ ril bu dag ni sau la// rnal 'byor pa yis gshin gshed sgom// mkhas pas ni yang mi mgo ste// khrag gis bkang ba'i mgo bsgom pa// khwa tsam gyis ni 'byung po rnams/
