100b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir// gzhan la gus ma mchog tu bkur// rdzog s+ho// / de nas gzhan yang bshadu ta ba// sngags pas rtag tu brten pa ni/ ru sbal 'o ma zhes bya ba// de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang // 'jim pa skam po nyid
100b7(rgyud): de bzhin me yi khu ba dang // sgra snang gi rdzas dag dang // 'di rnams rtag tu dab dad ni// rang bzhir gyis ni nad med cing // tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang // rtag tu lang tsho dpal bab// lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob
100b8(rgyud): la dpyad par mi bya ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub// ting 'dzin sngags kyis byi rlabs nas/ las kyi rnam smid sbyong bar byed// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// de pir cho ga bzhin du brten/ tshes cig skya reng shar
101a1(rgyud): snod la pa reg du sbal 'o// drod ma yal bar btung ba'am/ yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung / mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/ 'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni/ de nyid nas ni bzung bdu ba// zhag gsum chu yis
101a2(rgyud): char ba btang // lo ma da bcad bza' bar bya// yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // 'jim pa skam po spar nas ni// zhag gsum chu yi nang du spang // de blangs nas ni yang bskams nas// pe ma byi la'i spar tshad re// ba yi
101a3(rgyud): ma dang sbyar nas/ sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya// me yi sdong po ser po ni// sa yi mar gyis dril nas ni// kha sbyar sbyor dang ldan byas na// me chu sa yis btsir nas ni/ btung ba 'am nyi ma'i sbu gus btung / lan
101a4(rgyud): tshwa bral ba dag la ni// nagasum 'chi ba'i sgra brten rdzas/ nam gyi dus la sngags pas blang // cha gsum snad du zhag gsum bzhag kha mi tsani byugs pa ste/ dbus ma'i che ni 'dud rtsi zhing / 
101a5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i cha ni drong ba ste// 'di rnams so sor brtan pa na/ mal 'bras bu gsum gyi phye// byi la'i spang chad de dang sbyang // ma sbya ra na yang nyes pa med// tshogs par bsten nas bza' bar bya// ra ra
101a6(rgyud): yang nyes pa med// dam rdzas rma du bsgyur te brten pa'i cho ga rdzog s+ho// / nad med rnams kyi byang chub grub rtags bshad pa'o// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshalo// de nas yang dag bshad pa pa
101a7(rgyud): bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi// lho phyogs rgya mtsho pha bskal nas// de na gshin rje'i grong khyer ni// ga la ba yi gnasu byon// mi bzad zhabs ni
101a8(rgyud): bu drug gis/ lcags mkhang sgom da bcu drug brtsis/ sa shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis// dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis// de ma bdud chen las rgyad nas/ tata nyiti sna sgrogs pas/ chos kyi rgyal po
101b1(rgyud): bang gzing bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dpal po chen po ga la ci// dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdags bgyi// bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams// tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bo bzhes// lha ma yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi
101b2(rgyud): snying dul ba ni// gshin rjes ya phul ma mos ma/ srin pos dbul gnod sbyin k+She// ma yis na phul sa bdag sa// btsan gyis tsaM phul bdud kyi da// de rnams cig tu dril ba ni// bran du yang ni khas blang so// gtan
101b3(rgyud): tshigs chen po de yi phyir// ye shes lnga yi dgongs pa dang / bstan pa nyams 'og rab chung nas/ lha yi bsnyen parab chud nas/ sngon gyi thun dam las mi 'dar/ mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do// ya ma rA rdzas dom sa
101b4(rgyud): ya ma da du Na yo da ya/ ya dang ni ra ya k+Sha ya/ yak+Sha yats+tshani rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de skad smras pa dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed/ chen po yis// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ gshin rje'i po
101b5(rgyud): la sogs kun// sgrol ba'i gang du byin gyis brlabs/ ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // 'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgo ba/ lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor rigs
101b6(rgyud): 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis// zhes pas dam bcas pa dang / mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro// gtam brgyud kyi rtog pa rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar ska du/ ya mA ri kriSh+Ta karma
101b7(rgyud): sarba tsakra sid+d+ha ka ra nA ma tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad/ gshin rje gshed dag nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad grub par byed pa ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha'agro la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bani/ 
101b8(rgyud): thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti mug rdo rje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / phra dog rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje
102a1(rgyud): ud tu dang ma rdo rjo dang / rgyung chedang byang chu kyi sems pade batshan pa ma dang / man na gyi phreng bas dang sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa ma dang / tsun grus rgya gas dang / 'dug smram ma dang / me
102a2(rgyud): ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / de la sags pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhug s+ho// de nas lha mo ba ta li stan las langs te// thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
102a3(rgyud): da ltar 'din gdug pa can rnams kyis sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na yang theg pa chen po pa dang / sems can thams cad la'ang 'tshe bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na de rnams ji ltar char bcad
102a4(rgyud): par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das bgegs thams cad 'dzu mas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las snying po 'byung // hrI/ de ma thag tu btso
102a5(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa'i dza za gyur nas ma he ru gnyis pa la brdzis te/ ma he'i bdag po chubam bcas par oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes zhal
102a6(rgyud): bzhad pa dang bcas pas// oM gsung zhing mnan par gyur to// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud thams cad kyang skrag cing 'dang ba dang bcas pas 'dud par gyur to// tshangs pa de dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag
102a7(rgyud): zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi// rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs pa// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lta ba la/ bdag
102a8(rgyud): nyid phyag dang gal rnams ni// drug drug ldan par gyur bsgom// zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar ste/ g.yas kyi dang po phyag na ni// rdom tho ba g.yas gnyis na/ ral gri de bzhin g.yon gyi yang // dang por zhags pa bsdigs mdzub ldan// 
102b1(rgyud): gnyis par gtun shing lags par 'dzidan// rdo rje dril bu thams bsnabs// ste banal nag por ba 'jigs pa/ zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste/ brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs pazhir gnas// stag lpags kyis ni rnam dkris
102b2(rgyud): shing // seng ge rAl ral ba ni/ gyen 'greng bsdus te spyi bor yang // thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings/ 'di ni khro bo tshal ba ste/ lag cha sna tshogs dag dang ldan// shar rtsibs la sogs rnam bzhi la// gti mug sogs te bzhi
102b3(rgyud): yang / dkar dang ser dang dmar ba yang // de bzhin bzhi pa ljang ku ste// g.yas kyis 'khor lo rin chen 'bar// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste// g.yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin// mtsham su la sogs las skyes pa/ lha mo bzhi pa
102b4(rgyud): nges par bsam bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin// mra yi lha mo mtshan la ni// lA s+ye pu ti kur ldan// rin chen phreng ba pa gnyis bsdu mas/ pi wang sgrogs pa'i gsung dbyangs can// gar gyi rgyas par 'gro ba yi
102b5(rgyud): don la rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan// bdug spos sogs dang bzhi tha yang / rang gi mtshan ma ngas par 'dzin// phyag rgya'i sngags rnam sa brjod pas// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
102b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungaso// oM dzi na dzig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs pa ni ser sna rdo rje'o// oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas yang
102b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'di gsungs/ oM A dza likA ste 'dod chags rdo rje'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dag
102b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsung / oM prad+hA dzAka/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas sa rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs// lo can hUM// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de ni/ 
103a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos chu rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsung so// oM mA ma ki traM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ma rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsu
103a2(rgyud): pAt+tA ri hrI/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsung so// tA ra a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bde
103a3(rgyud): ba chen po bskyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsung so// lA s+ye/ de nas yang yon tan brgyud pa bla ma'i sngags 'di gsung so// mA lI/ de nas bcoM ma ldan 'das kyis dbangs can ma bskyed par byed pa'i snga
103a4(rgyud): 'di gsungs/ gI ti/ da nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gar ma'i snga'adi gsungs// nri ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra d+hU ba~M/ oM badz+ra
103a5(rgyud): puSh+pa/ oM badz+ra dI pa/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing
103a6(rgyud): dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdza su dgas par byed pa'i sngags rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM
103a7(rgyud): badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra A ba sha ho/ blo ldan mkhas pas ci nus kyis// thig gis thig ni gdab pa la// tshad ldan 'jung mdud myed pa dang // gshed zhing sar pa mdzes pa yis// shar du bltas te gdab par bya/ tshangs
103a8(rgyud): thig gnyis pa gdab pa yang // lho ru bltas te gdab par bya// de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa/ byin zar gnas te dbang ldan pa lta// rlung gnas bden bral kha bltas te// nub tu lags par bri bar bya/  gnas
103b1(rgyud): du kha bltas te// bang du bri tre bin zar gnas// bden bral min pa'i mtha' ma gdag/ blta ba bden bral phyog su'o// slob dpon ldang min grogs po ni// ri drags zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste// mtshams thig dang
103b2(rgyud): gdab par ba// gnyis pa'ang bden bral pogs 'dug ste// bgegs phyogs brkyang la gdab par bya// dbus dang mtha' mar bya ba yi// gnal yas khang pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang
103b3(rgyud): rta babs bzhis ni brgyad pa yi// dbus kyi rtsibs brgyad lta ba la// rdo rje tho ba bri bar bya// ri ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus nyi du// gri gug kyang ni bri bar bya// shar rtsibs 'khor lo chen po ste// rin chen lho yi phyog
103b4(rgyud): rtsibs la// pad+ma dmar po nub tu bri// bang du rdo rje kun tu rtse/ shar lho phyog su'ang de dang 'dra// grwa bzhir brgyad po'ang nyis rtseg tu// mtshan ma rnams ni legs par byi// sgo bzhi dag tu bri bar
103b5(rgyud): lcags kyu zhags pa sgrog dril bu// gzhan yang rgyan kun legs par byi// mchod pa legs par dgram par bya// khu tshur dku gci sa bzhag pa dang / de bzhin dpral bar zhug pa dang / 
103b6(rgyud): nas 'byin dang gar bskyod dang // bdug spos nyug dang me tog mthong // mthe bong sbrang ste rang lus la 'am// gzhan la nyug tshul gnas pa ni// brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag/ bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya
103b7(rgyud): yin sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dang / rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba a
103b8(rgyud): ko ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ mig sogs byin gyis brlab pa la// gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis srung // dbang sbubs stong pa nyid byas te/ snying po 'am ming gi yi ge yis// rigs kyi phyag
104a1(rgyud): mtshan bsdams pa yi/ sku rnams nges par bskyed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud rtsi myang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la spobs pa
104a2(rgyud): zhugs te sngags 'di gsung so// oM AHhUM/ dag cing 'bar bar rnam rtags te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// zhes sdang rdo rje'i bdag po ste// zla ba'i dbus gti mug bsam// rin chen dbus
104a3(rgyud): bsam pa yang // ser sna nyidu bsam par bya// pad+ma'i dbus 'dod chags bsam// sna tshogs dbusu phrag dog bsam/ bsam pa ljags la sa bon te// 'phros pas bkug sde tshim parang // shar ni
104a4(rgyud): dgar pa chen po ste//  ni seng po 'dur// nub ni dmang po nges pang/ shes/ byang ni lja dgung yang dag ldan// da las de bzhin rega'i ri/ ma/ dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i chen yang / byams
104a5(rgyud): dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// tshad med pa yi rim pa yis// sem sa can rnams la phan gdags phyir// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams/ yod min med min gnyis ka min// gnyis
104a6(rgyud): ka min pa'ang ma yin te// spros bral ngo bo med par sgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM// raM las nyi ma rnam bsgoms te// da dbus las kyi rdo rje ni// kun tu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin te// de dbus hUM las
104a7(rgyud): rdo rje ni// kun tu phra mos bgegs bcom ste// ra ba gur dang sa gzhi yang // de yi 'og tu nges par sgom// gru gsum gyen sgrang dkar po ni/ shin tu gsal bar bdag gis dmigs// zhe sdang las ni sngar
104a8(rgyud): ma byung // byung zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur// byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang // gtong zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med// le lo bcom zhing khro ba med// ser sna med g.yo yang med// sgyu spangs shes rab gas
104b1(rgyud): ba dang / gcig tu thag pa che la gzhol// des ni dka' ba med par yang // gzhan gyi don du 'di brtsams na// grangs ni bya ba tshang ba yis// bcu bzhir tshang ba'i gsang sngags kyis// las rnams kun grub
104b2(rgyud): the tshom med// yang lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de yi 'khrul 'khor ji lta bu/ yig rnams ni ji ltar bri// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdun tshan bdun dang ldan pa sa/ 
104b3(rgyud): re mig legs par bri bar bya// las kun byed pa'i 'khor lo la// mchod pa yis kyang legs mchod la// de 'og las rnams brtsam par bya// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam 'am// mngon sum byung bar
104b4(rgyud): gyur nas kyang // 'khrul 'khor rnams ni dri bya ba'i// rmi lam mtsha nam 'di yin te// tshal chen thug pa'i gling dag dang // lha gang mtsha brten gzhal ya su// dam pa rnams dang ngas phrang/ 
104b5(rgyud): dbang bskur ril 'dzeg pa dang / rgya mtshor bcas pa'i chu rgal la/ klaklo bran du 'khor rmin/ nges par 'grub ste 'khor lo bri/ de na sa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba'i dkyin
104b6(rgyud): 'khor sgom pa gsungs te// yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor// sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can la// kha dad ldan par nges par bsam// raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor// gru gsum dmar po bas
104b7(rgyud): pad+ya bya// baM las byung ba chu yin te// dkar po zlum po bsam par bya// la byung sa yi gyol 'khor ni/ ljang ser gru ba ni bsamA byas te/ sngon du bsam pa lta rims bzhin// tar phyi nas nges par bsam// khru
104b8(rgyud): las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs// druganyis ldan pa'i lta ba la// bruM las gzhal yas khang pa ste// gdan dang ldan par sgrub pos bsam// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya da
105a1(rgyud): sngags kyis bde par gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsdu bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa mA ma lag ngang gnyis ni nges bsnol la/ mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul byas te/ se gal la
105a2(rgyud): cing brdung bar bya// lcags kyu la sogs rnam pa bzhis// nges par dgug pa la sogs bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos mchod pa'i sngags 'di gsungs/ 
105a3(rgyud): oM ar+g+haM bA hrI ts+tsha swAhA/ pra bar sad kAr pra tits+tsha swA hA/ nag po rab ri med pa yi// bum pa lto che de chang ba// mchu 'phyang mgrin ring gdan ldan par/ snying por ldan pa'i sman sogs gzugs/ mgrin par ras
105a4(rgyud): bzang dag gis gro/ medang ma ldan pa'i lcug me yang / dri dang / ldan pa'i brgyad te/ bdud rtsing ljon pa yis kyang mchod/ zla gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bi dun mil ma thom ma
105a5(rgyud): gus pas dkyil 'khor la yang mchod/ 'dzam bu'i gling ma gling gzhan dag/ nang bu rin chen bkang ba yang // stong gsupa lasog/ sa de bzhin te/ zhum pa med par byas te dbul// blo ldan snu
105a6(rgyud): pos sems can la// phan pa'i sems kyis srog mi gcod/ ma byin par yang mi blang // 'dod pa mi spyad brdzun mi smra// gnod pa'i rgyu phyir chang mi btung / gdug pa rnams la bzlog te bya/ dngo su 'am yang na sngags
105a7(rgyud): dang gzhan// 'khrul 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin/ sman gyis kyang ni bya ba ste/ de ltar mi byed de yin// des par dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// gdon dang log 'dren dgas kyang / nges par 'tsho sna dmyal bar ni// yun rings/ 
105a8(rgyud): drug brgyal gyis rlung ste// de banan tan ldan pa du/ yod pa mi spyod rnying rje mas/ rdzogs kyis nges par bas pa bya/ mi ldog pa'i ses su gas/ byang chub cu mis tshanang/ sheso rabapar mabyin pa ma
105b1(rgyud): phyag rgya che la de gzhon te// ngo ba dang bral dngos po 'jig ma byin byang chub blangs pa la// brtson pas la lo dor bar bya// brdzun du shes pa dngos po rnams// de nas de bzhin gzhan la brjod/ rgyas btab pa yi dngos po la/ rgya bshi
105b2(rgyud): shes rab ral gri yis// bcad cing rnam pa med pa la// bsad pa yang ni de yos bsgrags// ud med pa yi ge rnams// stang gi g.yas phyogs nyid nas bri// 'og yi ge bri ba ni// da nyid g.yon gyi phyogs nas bri// a li ka l-i dzas
105b3(rgyud): bris te/ kla ma gtogs par dbus stong ste/ de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ ming sogs nges par bri ba yang / lto ba'i nang du chud par bri// 'khor lo nyid kyang de 'dra ba// grwa bzhi dag tu bri ba ni// ma ning 'dod pa'i kA li dang / a
105b4(rgyud): li min te lhag ma yin// gdug pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi po// ming dang brtsas par phyogs bzhir bri/ dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa yis// bani pa gcig/ gi mgo ste su// sum bskor nyid ni shis pa yin// las kun
105b5(rgyud): byed pa'i 'khor lo // 'dri bar byed pa'i spyi dus dang // khad par dus chos lha ya~M ni/ rnal 'byor med pas bya ba min/ phog su blta ba'i ba brag/ gis// las kyi sgrub bos shes par bya// las kun byed pa'i
105b6(rgyud): 'khor lo ni// bde gshegs kun gyi snying po ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsang ba'ang yin// 'khor lo 'dir ni bcug pa gang // sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ dam chos smod pa'ang de bzhin zhi// 'khor los bsgyur ba
105b7(rgyud): dbang du 'dra// lha min pra ti'ang zhi bar byed// dag bcom gsod pa'ang de zhi la// brgya byin nyid kyang dbang du nges// de lta bu yi 'khor lo de// thog mar bris te de 'og tu/ byin rlabs ma nor de nyid la/ mchod pa gus par bdegs
105b8(rgyud): byas mchod min las rnams bas pa la// 'bras bu 'byung min 'khrul pa'ang // 'bras medangal ba nyid yin// yang lha mo ro langs ma nyid stan las langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// 
106a1(rgyud): / 'khor lo 'dri ba'i snag cha gang khri ga mi smyug gu ji lta bu// gcig gam 'on te de tha dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshadu gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs legs
106a2(rgyud): pir legs par 'on la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad// ji ltar las rnams bye brag yod pa ltar// bri ba'i gnas dang gzhug pa'i gnas// tha dad de bzhin 'khor lo sgrub/ snag tsha tha dad 'bru rnams bzhin/ 
106a3(rgyud): grong khyer chen po srung 'dod dam// skyes pa snang bar 'dod na yang / gro ga de bzhir u b+hi shun/ zla gor zho sha'i shun pa 'am/ ras la kha ches 'khor lo ni// bskal ba'i tshig dang ldan par ro// so ma btang ba'i kham
106a4(rgyud): bor ru// sbrang mar dag dbus 'khor lo gzhug/ skud pa dkar po sa legs par dkri// nang par shar du kha bltas te// me tog dkar po dag gis mchod// bdag nyid dkar po'i mdog tu bsaM/ 
106a5(rgyud): mdun du skyes pa zla ba la/ mtha' dag gnas pa mdun du bsam/ sangs rgyas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis/ bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis// rku rgyun dgis dbang bskur te// da 'og
106a6(rgyud): bzlas pa brtsam par ba/ swA hA'i sngon du bskul tshig ldan// bud med la ni gi wang ste// phyi rol mtshams bzhir phung pa yis// bgags bskrad stang du bla re dre/ phye ma skyes pa'i ji bzhin// bye brag tu yang skyes pa'ang
106a7(rgyud): bud med zhi bar 'dod na yang / ga bur tsan dan dgis ni// shir sha shing gi shun pa las// 'khor lo yige legs bri te/ shar du nang par bltas te mchod// las kun dad pa'i thab la yang // sgo gsungs zhal ldan
106a8(rgyud): bgod par ba// phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur pa yis// bgegs bskrad steng du bla re bre// bum pa kha rgyan dang ldan zhing // rin chen 'bru dang sman du ldan// dri zhim chu dang ldan par bya// gos bzang gis ni mgrin pa dkri/ 
106b1(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par ba// thang ka'am dkyil 'khor la mchod/ dri'am chu dang me tog dang // bsres pa'i skyor mos chu yang blugs// gzang du stong gis sbyin bsreg pa/ chu des gzhan yang gtor badra ba// bar ma chad
106b2(rgyud): bar zhin bdud du// de ltar rgyun tu gtor ma sbyin// dri nas 'khor lo rin chen de/ bum pa'i nang nas rnam byung ste/ rgyal mtshan rtsal gtags na su// gnas mthon por yang bzhag par bya// zhi bar nyed par tha tshom med/ 
106b3(rgyud): sngar bshad pa yi shing shun dang / dur khrod ras la sgrub po yis/ yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri// som btang ba'i kham por du// sgrub pa'i rkang rjes sa dag dang // snang mdzad chu ngogs sa dag dang / ri dang
106b4(rgyud): lam sa btags nas ni// ldong ros dang ni yung ba yis// khu bas sbrus te gzugs pas la// 'khor lo gnyis dril yung ba dang // sngo/ nga ros kyi ni khu bas bsku// snying kar bcug ste gzhug
106b5(rgyud): pad+ya // seng ljang phung ba sor brgyad pas/ lus la sogs pa gdab pa bya// dgra rnams 'ong ba'i lam du yang // khung bur bskos te gzhug sa par bya/ lam las dbang chen gyis mdan cing / su
106b6(rgyud): las skyes pa de stangs na// sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yi// kham por skad ser dkri bar bya// rgyal chen dag ni ser po yang / dbang chen la gnas lhor bltas te// bsgyur bya ser po'i ris mnan par/ bsams nas
106b7(rgyud): bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ swA hA mad par stam+b+ha ya/ laM gi mtha' can lnga stong bzlas// gtor ma rgyun tu sbyin par bya// rangs pa chen po'i las 'di yis// dam gi dpung yang nges par rangs/ 'ga' tsam la ni smos ci dgos/ 
106b8(rgyud): sran na lan gsum bsngags pa yis// dur khrod ngas la 'khor lo bri/ rims dang dag gis zin pa ste// de yi stang du bzhag par bya// bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te// tshogs bab cing gdon par ba// de ni de na/ 
107a1(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur/ ngag dag rengs par 'dod da yang // sgo byed khu ba dur khrod sol// gcig rnam bsres te so ma btang // kham por gnyis la 'khor lo 'di/ po dang mo yi bskor phyogs gnyis/ ma
107a2(rgyud): nor bris te kha sbyar la/ ro bsregs sa dang thal bas g.yogs// steng du bzlas shing spel ba ni// stam+b+ha na dang ku ru lam// swA hA med pa'i sngags 'di yis/ kha bcing ba ni nges par 'gyur// gang zhig bsad par byed
107a3(rgyud): pa la/ snying rjer ldan pa'i gang zags// gdug byed las 'di byed pa la/ gshin dgra lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// zhagacig gis ni 'grub par byed/ bcu bzhi nyi ma byed pa na// bya rog sgra rtse'i smyu gu yis// du
107a4(rgyud): khrod kyi ni ras dag la/ dug dang tra dngas tshe dang / nib pa tshab ga/ sum dag dang / mtha'i mang khru dung khrodas la/  byed mdzub mdza khrigs bri/ ra bsregs pa yi thal ba dang / bsgrub
107a5(rgyud): rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa/ mau yi rus pha la sogs la// gzugs pa sa da yi snying kar gzhug/ dur me dag la de bas zhing / khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas na/ skad cig tsam gyis 'chi ba ni// rnga
107a6(rgyud): 'am dud du sba// de lha'i las kyi de 'grub ste// mtshan mo phyed na kha lhor blta/ bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te// zhal sogs sngon du gsungs pa ltar/ ma he'i steng na mche ba gtsigs// gsus khyim
107a7(rgyud): chel gyen skra 'bar// spu sogs gzhan yang de 'dra'o// ba spu dgi bu ga nas// 'jigs mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa yi// khro bo mang po 'phro ba ste// bdag nyid bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// bsgrub bya mdun du bsam
107a8(rgyud): bya ba/ mchims med rdzogs pa'i sdig dang ldan/ dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang / grong khyer skye bos 'tshe ba can/ grang ba'i reg pas lus la rgyas// mtshon gyis btab pa byas pa la/ gcan zan seM za na du
107b1(rgyud): du bsam/ ngag tu'ang de ltar yang yang brjod// lcags kyi khyud pos yan lag bsdams/ tsher mas dbugs pa byas pa ste// lus ni lpags pa med par bsam// ske tshe lan chas lus byugs te/ a rU ba yi sgra 'byin
107b2(rgyud): bsam de yi mgon skyabs bsal bas nas/ gshin rje'i lto ba'i tha mar bzhag khe con thogs pas de za'o// 'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi// sras bu de ni skye bar 'gyur/ las kyi sdig las de grol/ 
107b3(rgyud): gsod pa'i sngags de sbal ba ni// hUM che ge mo mA ra ya hUM/ bsgrub bya nang dag dbab na/ ma he r+Na yi lpags pa dag/ yang naro dang dur khrod ngas//  dang ma he bi la 'am/ khyi dang dam pa'i mdag khu dang / khyim bya'i
107b4(rgyud): khrag dang skam tshe bsre// deng ni 'khor lo 'di bris te/ rnam par gras pa bskul dang ldan// rnga sAl dag gi nang bcug ste/ ma he'i rmig pa'i nang bcug la/ sngong phrag bcu ni chang par ba
107b5(rgyud): nim pa'i shing bsros de nang sba/ de nang 'bras pa nyid ni/ dbang / tshad brgyas mchod 'dab par 'gyur/ a mu ki dang a mu ki/ bi dweSha ya phaT/ rims kyis thebs ba bya ba la/ dung
107b6(rgyud): khrod ko ba che ba la/ arga shing gi lo ma dang // tsi tra ka dang ske tshe dang / khra gis 'khor lo bri bar ba// bi ba bskos la ri mo dag/ sang ldeng mdab ma dug med la/ bsro zhing khros pas lnga brgya bzla/ khyim dang lam
107b7(rgyud): gyi bzhi mdo dang // dur khrod sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las kyis rgyas 'dod na// gau wang gis ni gro ga la// 'khor lo gnyis ni rnam bri te/ bskul tshig ldan par yi ge bri// zla drug zang gi mdun da/ 
107b8(rgyud): tu gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mos/ rin chen char ni 'babs pa dang // gshin dag ser po zla ser la/ gnas par bsams te khri bzlas te// 'phags pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur/ oM che ge mo buSh+Ti ku
108a1(rgyud): grog sogs kyi shog shog la/ gi lba ba dang ni rang byung gi// me tog dag gis bri ba ste/ yang na tha lcag khrag dang ni/ bil ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang / ras dmang po yi khu ba dang / rtsi rnams
108a2(rgyud): bsrel la bri bar bya// sgra tshil gyis ni 'khor lo bri// bum pa mang sgrab ldan par bzhag/ dus pa'i dag tu mchod pa ni/ me tog dmang pos mchod pa'o// de ma bzlas pa tshul dag ni/ so ba sha~M ku ru // dem thag tu
108a3(rgyud): lha rnams kyang // dbang du byed pang des 'gyung // grog dgal dri bani/ zla ba gzas zi dus dag gam/ rgyal gyi nyin par bri bste/ skud pa dmang pos 'khor la gri/ me tog dmang pos mchod pa
108a4(rgyud): zod pa kha spyang nang bzhig ste// bzlas pa khris ni brgya byin gyi/  dmo'ang rnyid par nges 'gyur// dung khrod kyi nongs dag la/ gung gu/ ma sogs kyis 'khor lo bri/ yi ge thig los
108a5(rgyud): rnam bskor te/ a mu ka~M dang mA ma kI/ mo ha na dang rnam sbal la/  sgrub bya gos kyi mtha' ma la// legs btags chos kyi dbyings nyidu/ bsgoms nas zlos shing 'gron yang / lnga dang
108a6(rgyud): lha min gyis mi mthong // bdag nyid gshin dag nyid bsgoms nas// chu yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na// rdul pan lha yi rnam par te/ ur+yan du ni bdag rang nyid// nges par stang 'gro gzhan dag kyang // bu mo
108a7(rgyud): nags kyi ras dal la/ skud pa bkal ba gzhan mas/ sum sgril du yang de yis bya// gdug sngags stong du tshangs par te/ bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin/ skad ma rgyal gyi dus la bcwa/ khri
108a8(rgyud): nyin mo'ang de' de la'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ltar brtag pa/ g.yon gyis mdu byas gzhan la gdags/ maM lus mtshon dag rengs byed// gcing bu la yang rengs par byed/ ma tog las ni gzhan du na
108b1(rgyud): sha lnga sogs kyi ril bu ni// legs par grib ma dag la bskams// lcags gsum dag gis dkri bar bya/ bzlas shing mchod pa bad pa'i tshe/ dngul dag gi ni rengs bzhin ba// 'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang
108b2(rgyud): mchod pa lags par rnam byas te// bskor ba brgya phrag du ma byas// de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos// khar bcug tsam gyis 'dod pa sgru ba/ phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid// gso ba 'dra bas 'o mas kyang / nges par
108b3(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya// rigs sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te// rnal ma nyid la gnas pa yin// snum ster dgi sa bon la/ nya lcibs dang ni b+hi tang ka/ khu bas yang dbyugs pa la/ thod pasas
108b4(rgyud): ni rnam bkang bar// sbas te bzlas pa grangs med pa// de che mtsho dang ga tor ma dag/ yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnams blangs te/ khar bcug/ mkha 'gro byas 'gyur// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zhus
108b5(rgyud): dang 'das byung gdug pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin/ kyi la 'khor rnam par spros pa dang / thig gis gzhal yas mchi/ na pa dang / rdul chen phyogs las rnam par brtags
108b6(rgyud): yang dag byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bdud rtsi mang bar bya ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom pa dang / sngags kyi dngos med bzhin mtshams// chos 'byung dang ni sgrub po dang // bzlas dang de yi grangs tsha dang / 
108b7(rgyud): 'khor lo dang ni yi ga nyis// nges te nga mis bstan pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshis par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa ni dang de bzhin snag tsha dang / so so las kyi
108b8(rgyud): bye brag ste/ bsdus te yis bstan pa yin// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
109a1(rgyud): 'di / oM hrIts+tsha wi kr-iSh+Ta d+ha la paT Ar+tha/ 'byung ba rnams dang sa spel te/ kha mang srung ba byas pan rkan na cu pom be ma sA ny+dza/ dung khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i/ 
109a2(rgyud): zhe sdang gshin gshed rdo rje ni// spros med na mkha' lta bu las// snying rje thabs kyis sku sprul pa// ye shes khro rgyal rab 'jigs pa'i// dud kha mun chen sku la 'dud// gang dag nyams dang ldan pa mi
109a3(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed/ skye med don dam ngang nyid las// thabs kyi sprul pa'i skur bstan pa// 'jigs byed dag po'i cha lugs can// zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud// bskal pa'i ma ltar
109a4(rgyud): 'bar ba yi/ ser sna gshin rje rdo rje ni/ 'dzin pa po las grol kha mas// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro ba sprul// gter 'chang serasna grol mdzad pa// gcom gsar 'dra khyod la lu/ 
109a5(rgyud): chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i// 'dod chags gshin rje rdo rje ni// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings la// khams gsum ba dag khro bar sprul// ma chags spyad ldan thu
109a6(rgyud): rje can 'ban 'du lta bu'i sku la 'dud// shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka/ phrag dog gshin rje rdo rje ni/ rnam rtog dpe dang bral ba las/ thugs rje'i sprul pa'i khro bo ni// 'gro don brtson pa'i ral gri/ 
109a7(rgyud): sna tshogs mdog can khyod la 'dud// thams cad la bskyed pa'i lha mo che// dbang po lta bur bsgyur mdzad pa/ khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan// rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs// 
109a8(rgyud): bad ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes// ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud// kun sdud lha mo rin po che// rnam rtog skyon las rnam grol yang // dus gsum bad gshegs pa dgir byed/ rin chen rtog can mdzes pa/ 
109b1(rgyud): sku/ don dam thugs chud 'khor ba sel/ ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dung / 'dus byas ma lus sreg byed pa/ rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las/ khams gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed// 'od dpag med kyis/ 
109b2(rgyud): rab mdzes pa/ ma chags dag na bsdams pa yi// drin las dag byed can la 'dud// thugs rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can// 'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed// gnyis med bde chen dang nyid las// 
109b3(rgyud): phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhin can// btang snyoms bzhugs par 'a gro ba 'dul// kun tu las kyis rgyal la 'dud// ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongasu bstod// de nas yang dzad
109b4(rgyud): kyi bdag pos leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo rnams kyi sku la ba tsud de// gdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni// bcu bzhi pa la dmig/ sa pa yang / 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba 'am
109b5(rgyud): nyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar/ dmigs te ma yangs brjed pa med// bzla sa pa nyid ni de ltar bya/ bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis// rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa/ med de de yis thams cad
109b6(rgyud): 'grub// 'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang // phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed// gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyis ni// de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa ba// yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis// bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'din// mi
109b7(rgyud): 'phos sems kyis 'di bzlos shing / lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la/ stag sogs chu yis mi 'jig so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ dbang gis blo sbyangs rab ldan pas// 'bras thob de med mi 'grub
109b8(rgyud): ste de bas de ni bshad par ba// bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang // gsang ba'i dbang gis gnyis par ste// gsum par bya ba de nyid ni// shes rab ye shes de yin te// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin// brtan g.yo/ 
110a1(rgyud): dngos po ma lus pa// bsgom par bya ba'i dus nyid la/ blos ni yongasu mi sgob ste// kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na/ sgom pa kho na de min te// thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na// de ni sgom
110a2(rgyud): par yongasu bsgrags// de nyid bla ma'i kha yis te// 'bad pas mnyes bya de mi smad// de la thams cad 'byung ba ste/ bla ma la smad g.yo sgyu can// nges par da ni dug dang yang // gdon chen dag ni ma lus pas/ 'chi
110a3(rgyud): zhing rlabs par de gyur nas/ dmyal ba dag tu yun ring lhung // bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal te// rtag tu tshanges 'debs par byed// de bas blo gros chen po la/ nam du'ang mi smad gzhan du na/ bkur sti pu dud 'gro
110a4(rgyud): ba la// phan pa'i sems kyis da ltar ba// gzhan yang bsgom pa bya ba nyid// gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro po// de yi ngo bor bdags bya// bsam gtan mi byed de blo yis// kun tu blo yis
110a5(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ bcom ldan bdag pa chen po yis// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje la// bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// ga gas sgra la sogs drug po rnams/ dngos mad mkha'
110a6(rgyud): dang 'dra ba las/ longs spyod yul du du mar snang // shel la tshan ni ji bzhin du// 'dod pa lnga dang chos rnams la// rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod par shog/ a la la la ho// rol du gsol marnams par mdzod// mi
110a7(rgyud): 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la// gar gyis dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod// rig pa dgag pa med pa la/ mi g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod// ho chags pa med pas chags par mdzod// de nas yang dog rab bshad pa// snga
110a8(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i// de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes nag po ste/ kha ni kun tu gyes pa ni// lag gnyis thal mo des
110b1(rgyud): sbyar te// gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la// mthe bong nges par sbyar bar ba// mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyang rtser sbyar// 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ snying ka dpal ba lkog ma dang // spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par ba// oM hUM
110b2(rgyud): Sh+T+r-iHwa kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM// gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs// phag rgyas dbang bskar dbu rgyad brtag/ gti bug rdo rje la sogs pa/ sa so'i bdag po dbu rgyan cing // dbang bsku
110b3(rgyud): chen bum pa che// ngag gis bsnams te dbang bskuraro// 'khor lo las kun bad pa la// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// gtugs pa skrag byed 'khor lo ma
110b4(rgyud): ljang 'bar// dus gsum khro rgyal he ru ka yi thugs// las rnam sa dag byed phrag dog rdo rje ste// ma lus tshems gcod gsol ba sa sku yi dang // hUM dang phaT kyi gdug rtsub sbyor bas
110b5(rgyud): gsung // kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyis gshin rdza yi// lhor 'dzud pa ka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing / phyogs bcu'i sprul pas gnas na 'gugs mdzad pa/ ma lus kun 'di 'khor lo cha
110b6(rgyud): mchog la// gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshalo// khod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdang // nga yis lam bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang // dpa las 'da' zhing log pa kun spyad la// khyod kyang
110b7(rgyud): ka' las ma 'da' las rnams sgrubs/ tshe dang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par bcings// bdud rtsi chu rgyudar rnal 'byor nga la 'dod bsgrub na// ngas ni sbyin pa khyod ni dpa las ma 'da' shig/ ces dpal gshin
110b8(rgyud): rje dag nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lto ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe ba'o// 'khor lo snying kar lta ba'i tshe/ sa bon tshul te lte ba la/ yi ge ma lus 'dod pa yang / mtshan
111a1(rgyud): nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las/ grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las/ kla ni zad pa'i bdag nyid la/ u ni hUM gi bdag nyid// de ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes te// thabs na
111a2(rgyud): shes rab ldan pa las/ dus thabs bstan pa'i bdag nyid kyis// 'thob ste gzhan du da mi 'thob/ chu 'gram chen po bas mtha' dang / dung khrod shing drung dgon pa ste// dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim// der ni mgon
111a3(rgyud): bo 'di la 'bang // gzhan du bsgrubs kyang da mi 'grub/ skad cig de la rang bzhin kun/ nges par mi snang rig pa yi// lam du gyur pa med par shes/ 'bras bu de ni rgya chen te/ mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin// de nas
111a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rjes 'icho ga gsungs// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ lha mo khyod ni
111a5(rgyud): dbang du gyur// srung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas/ sdang ba'i log 'dren skye bo dang / bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di sa da gsungs// dpal ldan bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin/ srung ba'i 'khor lo
111a6(rgyud): sbyor bas// bdagis ye shes rdo rje yis// lus ngag yid du bcas pa dgos// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag/ slob dpon gyi ni dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum gyi bang du
111a7(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid/ dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la// sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin/ slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod// de bdag skal pa ldan par brjod// ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis// 
111a8(rgyud): mgon la dbang ni bskur ba bzhin/ bla mad byang chub gnas bya'i phyir// bdag la'ang mgon pos dbang bskur gsol/ ma tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog rab 'byas rgya mtsho ma lus pas/ slob dpon dpa'
111b1(rgyud): de nyid la/ yang yang mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs/ rgyas par mnyes bya de 'og tu/ dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin// de nas rgyal po bde chen po// dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa// 'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum
111b2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis 'di skad dka' stsal ro// spyid sreg med na 'bras mi 'byin// de ngas bdag nyid dam pa yis// de yi las la 'bad par ba/ gos nag rgyan gyis rnam brgyan la// gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor
111b3(rgyud): khro bo'i skyil krung bcas pa yis// sran te'i stan la bdag 'dug nas/ lus rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni// mtshan mo 'am nyi sa pad nyid la// rang byung me yi dkyil 'khor du// hUM phaT mtha' na yod pa yi// sdug
111b4(rgyud): kyis thog ma bar tha mar// sbyin bsreg bya ste de pi ni/ du khrod pa 'am rus pa 'am/ rdo nyid las ni byung ba 'am// tsaN+Da li yi khyim nyid nas/ thab khung gru gsum can der ni/ tsher ma can gyi
111b5(rgyud): bud shing rdzang // rlung yab sbar ta pUdz+wa la raM/ dza la hUM brjod pa spar brjod// lag g.yas ku sha bcas pa yis// mtha bong srin lag rtsa ru gzugs/ oM e h+ye si ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i 'dri \u0f7f
111b6(rgyud): sat+ta ma gri hi tA a hU ti a hA raM as+sani saM ni hi to b+ha ba zhes brjod la spyan dang // 'bar ba me yi dbus nyid// ming de zad bad ces pa ba// khro bo me ltar phun sum tshogs// ba spu kham pa de bzhin du// du ba'i mangs
111b7(rgyud): cam zung mig sdeng du gzigs// sgyu ma mcheb bzhin ldan stobs po che/ yi las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ti/ bzhugs nas drag por mi ge brjod/ spyan gsum pa la phyag ban pa/ rig pa'i gnas la lan
111b8(rgyud): bar bzhugs// zhal bdan rnam gtsigs ma he la/ bcibs pa du ba'i phreng rnams 'khrigs/ phyag gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzid// de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid/ 
112a1(rgyud): bzhin mdun gyi phyogs nyid / spyad bras byin rnapas ldan pa la/ a sogs kyis mchod pa bya/ oM a r+b+ba pra tIn+da swA hA/ lagayas mdzub mo mthe bong dag/ skam pa lta dur nam byas pas/ 
112a2(rgyud): chu blangs bskyod pas dngul bar bya// oM ba ta ma mthar ni sngor gyi brjod// zhabs bkru ba la shis pa yin// dgang bzar yu ba ser bcu drug/ de min sor bani zabs sor gnyis/ zur gsum dbusu sor
112a3(rgyud): gnyis tshad/ rtse gsum phreng bas yongasu bskor/ de yid bu su'ang mtshan ma ste/ stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshan ta// khu bcud 'dzag pa sor gcig// khro bo rdo rjes mchu yi dbyibs/ byin rlabs sor gci
112a4(rgyud): tshad can no// thugs gzar yu ba song bcu ban// zabasu song gcig gru gsum dang // yu ba'i mthang ni rtse gsum pa// gdengs/ pa byin rlabs mngon spyod kyi/ gzer bu yin pa nga yis bstan/ 
112a5(rgyud): gnam lcags tshar ma can sogs shing / de la dbas sa ngas rgyas 'jigs/ sreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs sreg/ stong du tshang bas 'bras bu ni/ nges par 'byin par byed pa yin/ 
112a6(rgyud): g.yon gyi rtsa deng dgang bzar la// g.yas pa glugs pa'i gzar ba yin/ kha ni pad+ma'i mdab ma yin/ sor mo gnyis par de rgyaso// rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag/ sreg rdzas kyi ni snod yin la/ rdzas rnams rdo rje rin
112a7(rgyud): chen dpa'// hUM phaT kyi ni mtha' can gyis// bsreg pas chu me dang rlung / na mkha' lta bu'i dbusu gnas/ kha taM gnas pa rtag tu'o// kun tu'ang kha pha bskor bar bya// bzhi gnyis 'dab ma'i steng du ste/ lte ba dang naM/ 
112a8(rgyud): yang dag ldan// lhan cig rnam par shes pa'i lha// namakha' nyi nges par 'bar// de yi mtshan mar shes bya ba// rdul gyi rnam par de nyid do// thig le yi ge med pa ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par 'od kyis gnas// brgyar/ 
112b1(rgyud): bshags sgra yi tshad kyis/ a rgas rab tu spang bdub// sngar gsungs 'byung ba rnams pa ni dang / na mkha' yang dag ldan pa yis// sor mo lnga dang nges ldan pas/ gang gi sgyid bsreg des bya'o// gzhan dag sa ma
112b2(rgyud): gsum gyis bsres// dmigs pa thams cad 'gags par 'gyur// sded med stong pa namakha' dra/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba// shes/ 
112b3(rgyud): rab dang ni snying rje ches/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos 'gyur// bde chen dmakha' lta bu ste// rnal 'bor ba yi dmigs pa min// mdog gnag mdab brgyad lta bu la// rgya dang zab su so ma ni// nyi shu de bzhi bcu pa'i thab/ 
112b4(rgyud): byang du rtse mo bstan pa la/ rdo rje tho ba'i mtshad ma de/ sorani bzhi par bri ba bya// da sta sor mo gsum bong bar/ kha khyer kyang ni de yi chad/ sa nag bong bu rnga bo'i spangs// mi rus 'bras kyi phub ma
112b5(rgyud): srol ba'i phams rnam byugs la/ pi zhim dri dang bdug/ bas mchod/ dur khrod shing ngam bong bu dang / rnga mo'i spang bskams bud shing ngo // sor gcig gis ni dma' ba yin/ nim pa de bzhin
112b6(rgyud): seng ldeng dang / se ba de bzhin bse shing dang / dung khrod shing bu song bcu pa/ rtsa ba'i cha las rnam byung ba/ dung khrod mar khu rnams bsnyugs la// de yis yam shing bya ba yin// bya rog 'ug pa'i bshog pa dang / 
112b7(rgyud): nim da'i mdab ma thal ba dang / rkang rjes sa dang bong bu dang / rnga mo sogs kyi spangs dang ni/ skra dab zhag dang bshang ba dang / gci ba me rus sungs kar dang / yungs mar khrag dang lan tA dang / de la saT pa ri re zhi
112b8(rgyud): ji lta drung ba'i rdzas rnams ni/ dug dang khrag dang sgra med kyi/ mdang bu bal ba sol ba dang / 'bras kyi phub ma la sogs la/ dag po dag gi gzugs byas la// ma gnas brtsams te mgro yis/ dus du
113a1(rgyud): // gdub cing lcags pod du// khrag dang lu dang mi rnams dang / khong du'i gtsun la phan ldan pa'i// gdug pa'i mi ge rnams bzlas pa'i// rdzas la gsang gtor byas nas kyang / slab dpon la
113a2(rgyud): sdang rmongs pa 'di// brjod cing sbyin bsreg dbul bar ba/ de la 'di skad ces pa ste/ 'byung ba tshim pa gtor ma dang // bstod bzlas mnyes par bya ba dang // dbang gi dab pa bstan pa dang / dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya
113a3(rgyud): dang de yis la mchod pa sogs// cod pan du ni bde gshegs bzhag// mngon spyod tom gyi tshig dang // bsdus nas bar du rnam pa brgyad// pad dkar po 'dra 'grin pa ring // gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba med
113a4(rgyud): lus la rdul 'byung yid 'phrog ma// dri ni shin tu'ang zhim pa yin/ lta stangs mig sogs ri dwags 'dra// mgrod dang lto ba'ang ridra gas kyi// skal bzang rkang pa'ang ri dwags kyi// glang chen dri ldan bzhi
113a5(rgyud): del che// myos shing num rab tu rgyas// gzhan yang kun rdzob bden pa ni// khong thung de yi skra yang thung / rkang lag ring zhing bzhin ring ma// Sha yi dri blo bong ring ma// zla 'dra skye gnas rab tu ring / 
113a6(rgyud): skyes gnas chung zhing yan lag rtsub// bong ring de bzhin nu ma mkhrang // skra srab dal sgra yan lag chung // sngo bsangs ri mo mnyam pa de/ gsang ba shes rab rnam gnyis la// rig mar nga yis bsgrags pa yin
113a7(rgyud): ngang pa'i 'gros can skra 'khyil maM// bzhin zlum nu rgyas lus rkyang rgyas// shin tu ring min dal bar sla// dbus nas rna 'phang gnyer gsum can// mtshan nyid ngan zhi le lo che// yan lag gnag zhing skra 'khyil ma// 
113a8(rgyud): khang par gnas shing lus rtsub ma// sa'i 'dri 'byung sa la'i blo// na spangs de ni skyes bu bzhin/ chang gis myos pa'i dpa' mo ste// chang la shin tu chags pa yin// de gnyis de la shis pa yin// tha ma tha mar nges pa
113b1(rgyud): yin 'chi ba'i bsam gtan de nyid ni// bde ba dam pa kho bos 'dod// 'di la'ang bde ba de nyid yin// ka sogs spangs pa'i a li ni// bcu drug yin de dag gnyis po/ 'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin// zla ba dag
113b2(rgyud): sum cu gnyis/ a sogs spangs pa'i ka li ste// bcu dadan gnyis pa de stangasu// ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid// gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi pa'i gnyis/ bcu phrag bzhi ste de ngag gnyis// sen mo zangs so/ 
113b3(rgyud): sa bon te/ nyi mar rnam bsgrags de dbus gnas/ hUM dang a yi rang bzhin las// rdo rje rdo sogs so sor rtog// thim pas nan tan ye shes te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste// gshin dgar bdag nyid 'dod pa
113b4(rgyud): yin rgyan gyi ba drag lus la gnas// de ni 'di skad ba ba ste// rig pa shes rab bstan pa dang // bskyed pa'i rgyu yi ba bra ga ni/ tha mar bstan te sdom gsumo// mchen par byede pa'i bdang / 
113b5(rgyud): nyid mtshon pa sngon bstan nyid yin// gshin rje gshed nag pa'i las thams cad grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen bo rdzog s+ho// @#/ rgya gar swA du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bA kalA tAn+ta
113b6(rgyud): dzA bod skad/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// ngagi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// de nas 'dir ni bshad pa ba/ ji ltar 'gro rnams zad bad pa/ sdug bsngal rnams mthar bde pa yi// bsgrub
113b7(rgyud): bya'i thabs chen mchog gyur pa// gsang sngags de las 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po rnam par sdang mdzad// de dang nya bar ngag dbang phyug/ rdo rje 'khor lo bsgyur ba'o// gdon gyi bdag dang 'byung po'i rje// mgo dang mtha'
113b8(rgyud): ma gnyis lda dang // mchod rngan sreg pad mtha' dang bcas// gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur// rdo rje car gyi mtha' la gnas/ yi ge 'bum phrag khri brjod na// nyams pa thaMd sa la bad cing / 'i dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod
114a1(rgyud): gsod dang skrod dgug dpe rengs dang // dman par bye dang rgyal srid sogs// thob pa nyid la the tshom med/ dur khrod chang tshing khrod dogs drub/ shing cig khang stong mtshan cig dben/ gang
114a2(rgyud): 'dod gan su bsam gtan brtsam// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la khyab pa me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang ye shes thams cad la khyab par bya ba'i phyir
114a3(rgyud): sku mdog dkar po zhal lnga dang ldan par byas nas/ 'jig rten pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ rang gi rigs kyi yi ge nyid brjod pas sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las dang ye shes kyang
114a4(rgyud): gcig gis ngo ba sprul pa'i skur gyur to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje cha/ don rnams bskyed pa yang nyid// mkha' dkyil 'od kyis 'gongs 'gyur ba/ slar zhing kha dog lnga ldan pa/ sa bon sngags
114a5(rgyud): kyis bskul ba yi// 'od kyi rtse bran thub pa'i sku// kun kyang sangs rgyas gnas las skyes// rang la zhugs pas sku rdzogs gyur// zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjid pa// ma ha'i zhal lnga
114a6(rgyud): steng gnas pa// 'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs/ lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i mdog mtshungs gyin skar ldan// thod pa skam rlod sgyu ma sprul/ rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas rgyan// glang che
114a7(rgyud): stag lpags gyon nas ni// hUM phaT glur len gad mo can// na mkha'i lus can khro bo'i sprin// yang dang yang du spro byed pa'i// phyag drug rab tu brjid pa yi// dbyug pa thob gtun shing dag/ g.yas pa'i phag
114a8(rgyud): gis rim bzhin 'dzin// dgra sta dang ni lcags kyu dang // zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin// pad+ma nyi mo ma hi dang // gshin rje'i stang na 'gying bag can// zhabs drug g.yon rkyang gar gyi gnas// 'jig tu
114b1(rgyud): bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o// de ltar gang zhig dad pa dang // blo ldan g.yo spyang rang spangs shing // legs par dbang rnams thong bas nas// rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byed pas// yang nas yang du dran pad na// bstan pa chen
114b2(rgyud): bo thob par 'gyur// lha yi dag 'dun ngal nyod/ dang po chang la rab dga' zhing / sha chen rtag tu mur ted na/ las rnams de yis myar du 'grub// sku ni dum 'phro ded cing // sku la sku rnams nges brib bang // 
114b3(rgyud): thams cad smra ba nyid shes pas// 'jig rten rnamasu yid sad pad// khong stong kha dog dkar ba ste// rgyun tu rlung ni 'dzag par dad// chu skyes dmar po kha sbyar gnyis// yan lag gnyis kyis lags par
114b4(rgyud): btsun shes pa 'phel bam dang rlung // nyi ma zla ba thabs ldan da dang // shes rab ldan par shes par bya/ gnyis pa de nyid rnams spangs na// khong du chud par mi 'gyur// chu skyes la
114b5(rgyud): spyod la bsten te/ gsum gnas pa yi ting 'dzin la// rdo rje chos kyi sa btab pa yi// thabs dang shes rab grol ba'i rgyu// blo ldan 'das pa shes par 'gyur/ de phyir da la brtson par
114b6(rgyud): chos rnams chos nyid dbang med pas// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes che/ mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma med/ bde chen ye shes rdo rje sku// ye shes mi rtog rtog pa bral/ rtog pa'i mtshan ma thams cad sreg
114b7(rgyud): spros pa'i mtshan ma mtha' dag ni// ji snyed sgyu ma'i rnam par shes// de nyid shes nas grol ba'o// ma shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor// 'jig rten skya bo blo ldan 'ga'// nges par rtogs pa thabs kyi mchog/ 
114b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal chen pos rab 'jigs nas/ bad pa 'dod pas nan tan pa// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thabs dang shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pol/ 
115a1(rgyud): de nas yang dag ba shadu ba ba/ sngags grub pa las byung ba yi/ las rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste/ de ni lha yi sku yang spyad/ ni sogs bzlas pa'i rim pa la/ rdo rje'i dbus rdo rje di/ nyi zla la
115a2(rgyud): brten yi ge yi// phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa/ skyen bul spangs nas klag pa ni// mkhas pas bzlas pa'i rim pa'o// drag po'i las rnams sgrub pa la// nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// sngon po rtse rtsibs
115a3(rgyud): bcu pa la// 'od zer sna tshogs 'pho ba bsam// zhi bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu das/ sems ni yang dag mnyam gzhag nas/ sngags kyi 'od kyang 'gro gzhan la/ phan pa'i yid dang ldan par bya// go kha ras dang shing
115a4(rgyud): shun la/ gur gum gi wa dri rnams kyis/ mchod rten rim pa lnga ldan zhing // gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya// sgrub pa po yi ming dang rus// de yi bum pa'i nang du bri// rten 'brel snying ba
115a5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sngags kyi g.yon nas bskor ba bri/ cig na sa g.yas nas g.yon du bri/ de la spel tshig me pa'am/ yang na 'khor lo'i bar du bzhaga'ikhor lo kun la kha
115a6(rgyud): sbyor gnad// rab tu gnas par byas nas kyang // lus sam mgul lam gang bder bzhag/ des ni gdon dang bad bsnams dang // rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed// gang zhig yul rnams gzhom
115a7(rgyud): 'dod na hUM gi sa bon dang ldan par// ming yig tsam po bri bar bya/ so phag pha ma ldong ros dang // kha bra ma ho'i khrigs brdzis/ zla gam gnyis pa'i gzugs pas te/ bar du gang 'dod sgrub pa yis// gcu
115a8(rgyud): brnyan sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ byas la gan rkyal du bzhag la/ ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ khri phrag gcig tu sngags bzlas nag/ dum bu dum bur btubs pas te/ chu bo'i gzhung du gtong byas na
115b1(rgyud): skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur// ba rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te/ ma nu ma li ro tsa nas/ khyo shugs bsgrub bya'i ming bris te// gshin rje'i phyogs bltas gsang sngags gdon// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas
115b2(rgyud): // mi yi rdza ngang phur bus gad / skad cig tsam la dag dang // de nas 'dir ni bsad pa yi// cho ga'i rib pa bshad par bya// zhal drug pag drug zhabs drug pa 'am/ yang na zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa 'am
115b3(rgyud): zhal gcig pag gnyis pa yang rung / ma he gdong pa'i sbyor ba yis/ khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang / bsgrub bya'i rjes dang dge rigs/ rta dang ma he bong bu'i chus/ sbrus pa'i bsgrub bya'i ling ga
115b4(rgyud): byang lus la tshar mas gzugs bya zhing // til mar gyis kyang bsku bar bya// yang na shing la gro ga 'am/ dur khrod ras sam/ shun pa la/ rang nyid gcer bu skra bshig nas// lus
115b5(rgyud): ni thal bas byugs bya ste// mngon sum khros nas sha chen bza 2// rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing // nag pa'i chos kyi mtshan byed dus/ 'khor lo bri bar brtsam par bya// li tshe bcus
115b6(rgyud): 'khor lo ni/ hUM dang hUMHSh+T+rIHdbusu dgod// Na ya ni ra rtsibs mtshan la// yungs kar til dang skar chu dang // rta dang ma he khyi pag khrag/ bya rog 'ug pa'i sgo yis bri// yi ge ya yi lto bar yang // ming dang rus
115b7(rgyud): ldan pa bris/ phyogs bzhir yi ge bcu pa ni// ming dang bcas pa bri bar bya// brgyad po dag la rim pa bzhin// yi ge 'di dag bri bar bya// oM yA ma rA dza kA la rU pa a mu ka mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ yi ge
115b8(rgyud): rnams la bskor nas ni// bsgrub bya gzugs dang ldan pa bri// de yi mu khyud dag la ni/ yi ge bcu pa ming bcas bri// phyogs bzhi rtsa gsum rdo rjes mtshan// de bzhin rdzas rnams ma lus pas// 'khor la
116a1(rgyud): / lte bar ldan pa bri// gshin rje'i gzugs ni ral gri dang / dbyig pa 'dzin pa bris nas ni// de dang de nyid lho sbyar la/ mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ cha gsum ske tshe dug su thi/ ro nyes bkang
116a2(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum dbusu bzhag par bya// yungs kar bro ba~M sa lu nag/ dza b+hi bra bo sogs rnams la// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod pas te// dr-i 'am du ba 'thul bar du// rims dang rims
116a3(rgyud): kyi khrag rnams ni// ma lus zad par 'thung ba yi// ma yengs par ni bsam gtan bya// yang na bsgrub bya za bar mthong / shing gcig rtsar ni rangs pa dang // mal 'og du ni zha zhing lkugs/ chu
116a4(rgyud): mdor 'byed cing 'i rtsa bskad / bas pa mthab 'og tu sa/ dgugaba'i sgo khang 'og/ lba 'ba'akhor lo sgyung ba'o// bde gnas rnam/ sa kyis dbang du 'gyur/ mar khu chen po 'od
116a5(rgyud): yi ca nang du blugs nas bskol byas te/ bzhar bas mig la byugabyed na// mngon shes de nyid myur du 'thob// rigs ldan rgyal po la sa rnyed cing // mdog ldan lang tshogasang bkug la
116a6(rgyud): tsan dan lde gu mang byas te// las kyi sbyor bas de nyid bcing // yang na ma la gdung bas 'grub/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma rA dzaHbadz+ra kI li kI la ha na ha na ma rA ya phaT/ ces pa'i gsang sngags brjod byas la// rus pa'i
116a7(rgyud): phur pa gdab par bya// gsal shing la btsugs skya bu yi// rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya// til mar byugs la thod pas bzhar // mar ma byas pa'i dud pa yis// mig rnon dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// gsang
116a8(rgyud): sngags rgyal ba thogs med la// bstan pas thog pa mang yod kyang / 'di ni brjod pa ci zhig dgos// yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste// rang nyid sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan// brtson chen gzhan du ma yangs pas// gang du
116b1(rgyud): brtsams pa de 'grub 'gyur// smad 'tshong rang byung nyid kyis ni// sngon bstan tsakra legs bris te// ling ga'i snying khar bcug byas la/ rang mdun khra gi zla gam ste// khragis byugs pa'i stang du bzhag/ mi 'am rgyal
116b2(rgyud): bo'i bu mo dag/ dkag dang dang gi yi ge yis// de nyid du ni nges par 'gyur// 'al ba'i 'og tu ma dan pa ga/ mi glang du khyi bas phag khrag/ 'khaMr lo dris nas ling ga yi// mgrin par bcug nas ba rog gi/ khrag
116b3(rgyud): gis khrag skyug sngags bris nas/ yig de ldan thod pa ru/ bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te// dur khrod pe thab 'og bzhag na// khrag skyugs pa la tha tshom med// bsros na tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi// sbal
116b4(rgyud): khrag pha wa klad pa yis// 'khor lo de nyid legs bris nas/ ling ka'i mchan khung g.yon bcug la/ g.yas g.yor sbal khrag glang khrag byugs/ ling ga'i phyogasu rang nyid kyi// rkang pa
116b5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mthe bos mdang / de cha bzlas pa mang byas nas/ rgya gram la du mnan la bzhag/ de nas bzlog pa bris nas ni// shing cig khong bar sbas na rengs// rnga mo bA rog rgan po'i khrag/ 
116b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi// rkang gnyis par bcug rang mdun du// khrigi rnga mong gzugs bris te// de yi steng bzhag rang nyid kyis// rlung gi bsam gtan nges ldan na// bskrad pa nyid the tshom med// ri bo rtsal
116b7(rgyud): 'dzegs te sba// ne'u la sbrul rta ma he dang / ba rog 'ug pa'i khrags ni// kho shags rkang pa'i rjes sbrus pa'i// ling ga sor brgyad par byas te/ khrag des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag/ snying khar bcug pa gnyis byas te/ 
116b8(rgyud): na'u la gzugs bsnyed de bzhag/ la gnyis rta dang ma he yi// rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags zlas// rtsa dud shing khar sbas na 'bad// tsan dad dkar pos lags bris nas// gser sogs rin chen rdza su dril// mdan
117a1(rgyud): duzla ba'i gzugs steng su// bzhag bzhin pa bskor ba ni/ ji sri du bas na srung bar nges spyi bor btags na g.yul las rgyal/ rkang par btags na mu stangs 'gro// ba yi khoms khrus pas
117a2(rgyud): ku sha ba mar sogs mchod nas// gsol btab nad rnams thams cad srang // de nas bcom ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las rgyal ba// zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// las thams
117a3(rgyud): cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i sngags 'di// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // mA ra ya phaT/ ces pa bsad pa'i 'o// bi dwe Sha ya dbye ba'i'o// um+ba Ta ya bskrad pa'i 'o// mo ha ya rmongs pa'i 'o// wan
117a4(rgyud): ku ru dbang du bya ba'i 'o// stam+b+ha ya mnan pa'i 'o// A kaR+Sha ya dzaHdgug pa'i 'o// oM hrIHswA hA/ kha dang lag pa bshalaba'i sngag so// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha tAn nA shA
117a5(rgyud): sAm+b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'i sngag so// oM hAM/ kA la ru ba hUM khaM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM hrIHkruM b+haM swa dz+nyAM hUM ga/ sI nga po dam pa'o// oM hrIMHhUM/ b+ho ma hA kro d+ha gats+tsha gats+tsha s+sat+su dza pra/ 
117a6(rgyud): ti gr-ih+Na pra sa da de bi mAM ku ru swA hA// spyan drang ba'o// i hUMHSh+T+r-iHhaHyon chab pa// oM hUM phaT phaT zhabs bsol// oM sarba duSh+Ta sa twad ma ka ga ga/ ces pa dri chab kyi sngagaso// oM ku mA ra ru pi Ni dza dzaHhUM
117a7(rgyud): me tog 'bul ba'i sngagaso// oM hU~M/ haHhe phaT/ bdug pa'i 'o// oM ka la rU pa sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma kaM ma hA b+hU ta pa ti i maM ba ling gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngagaso// oM d+hip+ta lo tse na bi kr-i tA nan ma hA nA nA
117a8(rgyud): hA sa nA din dip+ta ya swA hA/ mar ma'i sngagaso// oM dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shwa ru ba d+ha ri gats+tsha gats+tsha sAs+thA ni kr-i ti te na ta thA ga tash+tsa bi sardza ya ma ma kar+yaM ku ru swAhA/ ces pa gshegasu gsol ba'i sngag so// 
117b1(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ chos thams cad kyi rdza su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags yong su rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'di nyid bka' stsal to// na mkha'i dkyis
117b2(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par// hUM las yongasu rdzogs pa yi// rdo rje 'jigs pad bsam par bya// dmar po zhal cig phag gnyis pa// srin po rab tu khros pa 'dra// dbyug pa thod khrag phag na 'dzin// ma he pad+ma nyi ma la/ 
117b3(rgyud): g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyi sgom/ oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na/ 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung // na mkha'i dbyingasu dbus gnas par/ ya yig sngon po las
117b4(rgyud): skyes pa'i// khro bo rdo rje 'jigs pad ni// pad+ma nyi ma'i ga/ dan stengs na/ sems dpa'i skyil krungs kyis gnas pa'i// gri/ gug bin+di pa la dang / dgra sta dang ni thod khrag dang // phyag bzhi po na
117b5(rgyud): rim pas 'dzin// ma he nag po'i zhal stang na// 'jam dpel zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum// dpa' bo chen po rang nyid sgom// rab tu zhim pa 'i chang btung zhing / sha chen dag kyang mur bar bya// mtshan mo dur khrod
117b6(rgyud): rgyu byed cing // rtag par gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ thig la 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bsgrub pa'i phyogasu bsam par bya/ las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub po// yang na 'di ltar shes pa ste// ma he gdong gi sbyor
117b7(rgyud): ba yis// sku yi kha dog so sor shes// khyad bar du ni bsad pa la// nag po ma he'i zhal can no// rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste// ma he sha stang bsam byas na// khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs/ ras
117b8(rgyud): 'gag sku la khro ba ni/ lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro/ zla ba spyang kis zin dusu// byi la'i sder mor sting dang / bya yi khrag dang mi rus bsre// gang la phog pa spro bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog
118a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byong pas/ dung khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos// yang na mtshan gyi
118a2(rgyud): khab ma la// rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje'i chu// dpa' bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug/ go ra tsa nas ras chos bya// legs par dam por drung byas te// lus ngag yid kyi gnasu ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus// yi ge oM/ 
118a3(rgyud): AHhUM hriM/ sku byed dung khrad sol ba dang // khrag chen ldong ros pa bla yis/ dbang thob dam tshig srung byed cing // shin tu gsang lo dam pa li/ ri mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des/ rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas
118a4(rgyud): nag pa'i dus kyi mtshan 'a dus/ gsang ba'i gan su rab zhugs nas bcom ldan rdo rjes 'jigs mdzad bri/ rtsa ba ma he khros pa'i zhal/ de stengs 'jam dpal 'dzum padzi zhal/ lhag ma/ 
118a5(rgyud): dang seng dang dmar/ dung ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen sgra can/ rib tu rtsarjid cing khro bo'i zhal/ drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus che/ thod pa / rlon sgyu ma sprul// rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas rgyan// glang
118a6(rgyud): tshan stag lpags gyon nas ni// 'ad+ma nyi ma ma he la// gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis// g.yon brkyang g.yas skum gar gyis 'gying / phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na/ rtse cig gnyis pa thob ste// gsum
118a7(rgyud): gtun shing mkha' la 'phyar/ dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni// g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa blo// namakha'i midog can thal bas byugs// skul khro ba dum 'phro// sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bsku
118a8(rgyud): legs par de ltar bris pa yi/ rgyab dang phyogs rnams thams cadu/ dur khrod chen pos bskor ba bri// mgo dum sgyu ma mkha' la khyer// rkang dum lag dum ro langs dang / wa dang sbyang ki gtum po dang / ma
118b1(rgyud): 'gro po mo sha za'i tshogs// ba dang gzan zan sna tshogs bri// skyi bung rab tu 'jigs bris nas// de ni sgrub pa po yang bri/ gri thod bzung nas sha chen mur// gos nag gyonas khrag chen 'thung // rta dang ma he rus pa mi
118b2(rgyud): phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'dron/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba bri/ da ltar bris nas chang dang khrag/ sha chen gor tsa nas mtshad/ mnyam gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des/ dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na/ rdo rje
118b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa myur du thob/ sku ni rab tu sba zhing gsang / phan yon dam pa 'di las 'byung // dpal rdo rje 'jigs pad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad
118b4(rgyud): par bya// rtag pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'gru ba 'dod pas/ blo ldan ser sna rnam spangs te// brtul pod g.yeng ba rnam spangs nas/ sbyin sreg las la rab brtson
118b5(rgyud): byamatshal dang ba bla ldong ros dang / shan pa'i go thal dung khrodangs// mi dang ma he khrag gis brdzi/ khru do pa la khru phyed rtsig/ gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni// rdo rje rgya gram ldan byas la// de stang 'khor
118b6(rgyud): lo rtsibs drug la// mtshan ma drug ni dgod par bya// lte bar ma yi dkyil 'khor ni// mtho gang tshadu byas pa la/ ma he'i khrag gis lags par byug/ bdag nyid lho yi phyogs bltas te// ma he zhal gyi
118b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// thab kyi nang gi lte ba la// me yi sa bon mngon bltas la// bskal pa'i me chen lta bur sgom// der ni me lha bsgom bya ste// zhal gsum phyag drug nag la rtsub/ pa gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud
118b8(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la// skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang phreng 'dzin// g.yon pas ril ba mchog rtsol brtson// zhabs drug rigs drug mtshan ma brdzes// zhol nas me rnams rab 'phro zhing / 
119a1(rgyud): rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis rgyan/ de ltar shes nas rab bsregs na/ 'dod pa'i don rnams rab tu 'byung / dag pa'i gzugs rnams sha chen dang / chang dang mahe'i khrag bcas pa/ stong phrag
119a2(rgyud): gsum du bsregs byas na// bsgrub bya khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi/ glang po rta bong khyi sha la/ stong drag gsum gyis dbang du byed/ kha rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu// bsreg na me lnga 'bye bar 'gyur// til dang nas dang gras
119a3(rgyud): lu yung ba gi wa~M so pag rnams// stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa/ longs spyad thams cad rnyed par 'gyur// rta dang rngo mo byo ga sha/ mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan pas te// brgya
119a4(rgyud): brgyad kyis nges par skad/ ra sha raN+Da ud pa la/ chang dang ma te rgur bcas pa/ gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lkugs/ dug dang khrag dab sgog pa dang // sha tshan til mar rab sngags te/ brgya rtsa brgyad du
119a5(rgyud): bsregs byas na// pha rol gzhan gyi gsang sngags gan da// tsan dan dkar po 'bras dkar dang // til can 'bras can yung sa kar dang // u dpal kar ga bur dang / shar du bltas te brgyartsa
119a6(rgyud): brgyad// bsregs na dus rnams kun tu srung // gang zhig bya ba'i rigs sogs dang / sngags rnams bsam gtan nges ldan pas// snying rje yid ni ma bral na/ 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya// gzhan du rmongs ni
119a7(rgyud): byas pa bslu// blo gros med gang shes rab 'chal// sngags dang dam tshig dmar gyur cing // ting 'dzin la mngon g.yel ba// brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gas// bskal pa stong du bsgrubs byas kyang // 'bras bu
119a8(rgyud): yod pa ma yin te/ sha thang chad pa nyid zad// dbar na blo zhal byis pa rnams/ 'ga' zhig 'bras 'dod 'khrul gyur nas/ phub ma rlung khar byed pa la/ 'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur bzhin// ji ltar sprin dang chu zla
119b1(rgyud): dbang po'i gzhu rnams rtag min te// thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba yang // sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol// ye shes gcig pu rnam grol rgyu// stong pa dpag par blos mi nus/ de la spyad cing gzhal bzod na// brtags pa'i snying po de
119b2(rgyud): la med// de la dngos rnams ma grub na// sgrub pa'i rim gzhan smos ci dgos// bya ba dang ni byed pa dag/ nges par de la rtag mi bzod// ngam grog g.yang sar ljang yang bla'i// chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod// rtag pa nyid
119b3(rgyud): kyang rigs min te// dngos po yod bdag la 'gyur// dper na byis pa rnams la mas/ sa 'dir sngod dang ma nyid kyis/ 'bras bu shing thog mang blangs la/ khyod la bde pas sbyin zhes brjod/ de bzhin rnam pa du ma
119b4(rgyud): yang 'jig rten rtog pa tha dad pas// deg drang bar ba rtsi ra bshad// bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du// sha chen po yi zhal zas dang // chang dang til mar ma he khrag/ rab tu zhim pa'i zas mche
119b5(rgyud): rnams 'dus rnams rtag tu dbul bar bya// gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu/ bad gis rgyun tu gdon pa zhing / bsam gtan rtag tu ba rtson par bya// de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan de
119b6(rgyud): yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur// zhi sogs las la smos ci dgos// grong khyer dkrug na sngags pa des/  sha sbal sha ru sbal sha/ rnga mo byis pa'i sha rnams la// stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg
119b7(rgyud): bya/ rta sha dri chen rab sbyar nas// ril bu byas nas bdag mdun du// gsang sngags rgyal po zlas byas nas/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/ bud med dbang du byad 'ang
119b8(rgyud): na/ nya sha chang dang sha chen rnams/ rdo rje chu yis sngags byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// tha ma la dbang du byed 'dodi na/ sha chen glang po sha dang bcas/ byang chub sems dang bsres byas te/ stong phrag
120a1(rgyud): brgyad du bsreg par bya// dgug pa dus rnams tha du/ khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga/ cha mnyam ril bu byas nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs/ sbyin sreg las rnams thams cad kyang / 
120a2(rgyud): ma he zhal gyi sbyor bas ni/ gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar/ ma yangs rtse gcig sems kyis bya// gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang // ji lta ba yi rim pa yis// rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid nyar
120a3(rgyud): gnas/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du thob/ zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis te// rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la/ snga 'bral chags pas dbang la'o// drag po'i las la khro zhing rtsub// rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis ni
120a4(rgyud): gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya// gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi// grub pa myur du tshol byed na/ sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas// rdo rje 'dzin par de 'grub 'gyur/ dngas po gang dang gang
120a5(rgyud): spyod yul/ de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro// mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bA la/ dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya// da ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu/ rgyud
120a6(rgyud): rgyal po 'di la ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub myur bad de// dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni// dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnam spangs te// shin tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs/ bu kha 'jigs med dadud rtsi'i ro// blo lnga
120a7(rgyud): lags par blang bya ste// shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub pa bya// mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'ga'// rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe// bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi// phung po rnam pa gnyi su brtags// 'od kyang
120a8(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad ni// rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur phyir// dbar zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'// 'di la zhags na myur du 'grub/ de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni// rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa/ yi ge'i
120b1(rgyud): dbyibs kyang mi bstan na// bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos/ dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing // bla ma mnyes par ma byas che// bstan kyang thos par mi 'gyur te// cha ba la sogs 'khor bar 'khor/ 
120b2(rgyud): de skad sngon pas bshad pa'i tshe/ sde rnams mos shing brgyal rmongs te// kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo spang / 'jig rten 'di ni shin tu g.yos// ganga'ig rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / shes nas 'chang bar byed pa dang / dus na
120b3(rgyud): kun tu 'don pad na/ tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te/ shi nas mtho ris myur du 'thob// gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di/ bstan nam bshad dam gsal phye na/ de ni sdug bsngal mang myos nas/ 
120b4(rgyud): nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro// rang gis shin tu bcad bya zhing / da ngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na// sdug bsngal mtha' dag nges zad nas/ myur du bla med thob par 'gyur// dpal rdo
120b5(rgyud): 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgyid sreg gi rim par pe ba'i le'u sde bzhi pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud pa'o// yad kyis gab kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag
120b6(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho// paN+Di chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa can dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mar ba ban d+he chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// slad kyis grub thob chen po kan+da shri'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ 
120b7(rgyud): thar pa lo tsA ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar ska du/ shri rak+Sha ya mA ri dan+ta rA dzA nA ma/ bdaska du/ dpal gshin rje gshad dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal
120b8(rgyud): gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhug so// deng bac+doMs kyis
121a1(rgyud): gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi snying po gsang ba las shin tu gsang ba'i mchog/ e ma to// phag na rdo rje legaso lag so// snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa
121a2(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje/ zhe sdang rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku nyon cig/ phag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ gshin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lags pa 'dir bshad da
121a3(rgyud): gti mug rdo rjegashin rje gshedang/ phra ma rdo rjegashin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rjegashin rje gshed dang / phrag dag rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / zhes pa ste/ rdo rje \u0f7f rtsika dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje
121a4(rgyud): canam dang / rdo rje go r-i'i yang // zung du bum pa bzhi rnam mo// de ltar rab tu bskor ba'i gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po rnam so// de nas sa par bcom ldan 'das phag na rdorje/ rdo rje sems dpa
121a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur to// de nas nges bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ bdud thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
121a6(rgyud): 'dzin gcig nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams la nges par phyung bar gyur to// sngags kyis dgug dang dbang chen dang // de bzhin nus pa rnam mang po// ral gri sgrub thabs rgyal srid dang / pha rol sde ni rnam 'joms dang / 
121a7(rgyud): mi snang mig sman bcud nyi dang // nges par grib la 'phrog par mkhas// ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang // sbrul dang gdug pa'i tshogs srung dang // sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las rnams dang // byang chub sems ni rnam spyod dang / 
121a8(rgyud): nyer mkho thams cad spyod pa dang // pha rol grod du rab 'jug pa'o// 'od zer lnga ni mnyam 'khrigs pa'o// rdo rje srung ba'i don bsgom bya// sa yi cha yang rdo rje yis// de bzhin ra ba dang ni gur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
121b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa po bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'di thams cad kyi sa bon nyid kyi sku
121b2(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rnams la nges par byung ba// dbu su ya'o// kle ma ma dang yats+tsha ni rA rjo ru Na yo ni ra ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms par 'gyuraro// gti mug kle yig la brjod pa// phra ma nyid brjod pa
121b3(rgyud): yig la'o// 'dod chags nyid kyang me yig la// da yig la yang phrag dog yin// lnga rnams gshin rje 'joms par bsgrags// dza yig tsartsi kA ru brjod sa yig la ni phag mo ste// dbangs can ma brjod do yig
121b4(rgyud): la ru ru yig la ni gau rIr 'dod// tsa yo nir zur bzhi ru// mi yi zong pa bzhi rnam so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
121b5(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te// zhe sdang chen po'i rigs 'di sgom ba'i rnal 'byor 'di gsung so// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par/ ldan/ blo bzang sems can don dang cig/ byams sog
121b6(rgyud): yon tan yang dag rdzogs// dad dang thos pas rnam par rgyan// brtse ba'i bdag nyid can snga dro// thog mar kha sogs dag pas te// skye bos dben pa gas dur khrod sogs// bde ba'i stan la rang brtsam pa
121b7(rgyud): rang nyid pad+mar nyi ma la// rnam bkod shin tu gsal ba'i blta/ de 'od rnams kyis sems can don/ pun tshogs pas nas spyan drangs te// bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bsgom pa/ ma lus mkha' dkyil rnams
121b8(rgyud): khyab pa// dmigs te de rnams la ni phyag/ lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson/ tsar tsika sogs rnams kyis mchod// de nas sdig pa rab bshags pa// lus ngag yid kyis yang dag sdig/ pas dang bad 'gyu
122a1(rgyud): // de bzhin du// gang yang rje su yi rang ba// mgon pa dus gsum pas de bshags/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang mtshungs rnams kyi// bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
122a2(rgyud): dam chos bcas// tshogs mchog rnams la skyabasu mchi// yon tan rgya mtsho khyod rnams slar// rang lus dag ni dbul bar bgyi// dam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing // shin tu mthar thugs mdzes par ba
122a3(rgyud): yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dam chos// de nyid sbyin sogs rang bzhin la// sku gsum ye shes thob par du// rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi// sems can rnams kyi don sgrub phyir/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub seMs/ 
122a4(rgyud): bskyed bgyi// bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub gang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo// dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed/ du// gyur nas bdagis 'gro phan bgyi// smon lam 'di ni btab bya
122a5(rgyud): te de dang de rnams blos gshegs bya// brtsa bas chog/ bzhin bltas te/ sna tshogs stong par rnam pasam hA/ spyong ba dra/ la ba'i rang bzhin te// rgyu nyid kyis dang mtshan ma med// rnam par
122a6(rgyud): rtog dang bral nyid pir// smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o// oM shUn+ya tAdz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko taM/ yaM raM ba laM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi/ bsdus pa'i b+h+rUM yig las skyes pa'i// khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya/ 
122a7(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs pa ni yis rgyan pa ste// do shal di shel byed pas sgras/ lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes// sna tshogs rtse mo rlung bskyod pa'i// ba dan dril bu mnyam par ldan// de yi dbug garba
122a8(rgyud): paM yig gis// sna tshogs pad+ma rnams bsam pa// dang ni lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas// mtshan ma mtha' dag yongs gyur nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par spros// pad+ma nyi ma mnyam
122b1(rgyud): mnan cing / ma he dmar po'i steng bzhugs pa/ g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ bdud rnams thams cad nges 'joms pa/ ri ma pe 'di 'od ldan lnga// ra langs ma yis mgri ma khyud cing // dpa' bo zhal cig
122b2(rgyud): ngag gnyis pa/ klu ni brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan// spyan gsum dmang po 'jigs pa ste/ khrag ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba ban// g.yas na rdo rje dbyug pa dang / g.yon na thod ga 'dzin pa'o// khro bo zhal dang ma'am ldan
122b3(rgyud): zhing ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs pa can/ khro gar ldan zhing sku rgyas pa/ stag gi lpags pas rked pa g.yogs// zung zhing gsus 'phang 'jigs par byed// dri med dag pa'i 'od zer 'bar// 
122b4(rgyud): langs ma yi g.yas pa na/ gri gug g.yon na thod pa tsa na/ spyan gsum ldan zhing skra grol ba// phag rgya lngas ni rnam par rgyan// mgo yi phreng ba mnyam ldan zhing / gtso bo'i brtul mang
122b5(rgyud): ba mo// shar gyi mdab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po// rdo rje tsar tsi kA dang snyoms par zhug so// lho'i mdab ma l-i phra ma gshin rje gshed se ra bo/ rdo rje ngag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// nub kyi mdabo ma la/ 
122b6(rgyud): 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar pa rdo rje dbangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// bang gi mdab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang ku rdo rje gau rI dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// tsar tsi kA nag mo//
