122b8(rgyud): bral du gser gyi bum pa gla rtsis gang ba'o// rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sih+la sa gang ba'o// dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyis gang ba ste thod pas kha bcad pa rnam par sgom pa'o// khro bo 'ching ba'i sngags
123a1(rgyud): gsungs pa/ gtso bo dnga' bo'i ni// oM s+t+raiSh+T+r-i wi kr-itAnan hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'i sngags/ oM dza~M kle k+Sha ya~M kar ya/ gr-i b+ha gr-ih+Na hU hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rke ba'i snying po'i sngag so// oM maH
123a2(rgyud): yak+Sha senA d+hi pa ta ye ma hA dung dAn tad ma kA ya/ nA sha ya nA shA ye khi drA pa ya bi drA ba ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// phreng ba'i sngags// oM dra Sha ra ti nung nu / tru Tu truT hUM dzaHswA hA/ rje btsun ma'i sngag so// oM mo hA
123a3(rgyud): an kr-i ta hU hU~M phaT/ oM bi shun an+ta kr-ita hU hU~M phaT/ oM rA ga an to kr-itad+d+hA hU~M phaH/ oM Id+yaSh+ya ar+tha kr-iH hU~M hUM phaT/ dpa' bo bzhi'i sngags oM ma ta ra ti hU~MH oM bi shun da ti hU/ dza/ a~M dag
123a4(rgyud): hUM dza oM I Sh+ya ra ti hU dzaHdpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi'i snga gas/ oM mang+ge maR+YA bau g+ha te/ oM badz+ra tsa rtsi ke/ ha ra ha ra/ puk+saM mA ra/ ya/ a mu kA ya dzaHoM g+ho Ne/ su g+ho ma~M badz+ra mA ma kI/ 
123a5(rgyud): b+ha ra d+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra sa b+ha ra hU dzA oM mang+ge ma R+tha k+Sho b+ha Ni badz+ra sa ra swata/ dang dang / thar thar/ pe ra pa ra/ kaM ba ke pa/ d+hu ma d+hu na/ hU a mu ki dzaHaM go b+hI ra/ badz+ra karti ke/ g+ha g+ha rak+Sha sho Ni ta pri ye gi rI li amra
123a6(rgyud): kaM dzaHgdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis// skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad// klu ni 'jog po dmar po yis// rna bar drag pos rna rgyan byas// rigs ldan sna tshogs dpung pa'i rgyan// gdengs can ser
123a7(rgyud): bo dung skyong ni// lag gdub dag tu 'dzin pa ste/ pad+ma dkar po do shal mdzes// karko Ta ni sde bsangs kyang // mchod phyir thogs pas mdzes pa ste// gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi// kha dog lta bu'i ska rags
123a8(rgyud): byas du pad rtsa lta bu dkar ba'i mdog/ pad+ma chen pos rkang gdab byas/ thams cad phud kyi rnam pa sgrogs/ lce gnyis phreng ba'i mche ba can// zhes pa 'khor ba myang 'das kyis/ gzugs can gshin rje gsod
123b1(rgyud): pa sta rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// sngags kyis yang dag byin rlabs pa// rang nyid sa bor lcags kyus dgug/ zhal nas zhags te thams cad// mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// zhal nas
123b2(rgyud): zhugs rnams snying khar zhu// der ni sa bon phyung byas te// rdo rje'i lam nasau zhu ba ste// rang 'od pad+ma'i nang gnas pa/ sa bon rang bzhin can blta ba// sa bon da rnams kyis byin rlabs// 'od zer mi bzang 'phro ba ni// 
123b3(rgyud): mkhas pas cho ga bzhin bsgom bya// bltas te snying khar zhu byas la// rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste// rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma yi// za 'brur lha mo'i tshogs bltas pa// me tog sna tshogs nyar spyod sogs// lag pa'i
123b4(rgyud): gas bzung ba dang / yid 'phrog klu yi mchod pa dang // sna tshogs pa/ ra gyi rang bzhin nyid/ bde ba chen po rab steng ba/ rol bcas de rnams kyis mchod bya// kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po// bla ma
123b5(rgyud): srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// khyod mthong kho bo rnam par 'jigs bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs/ khyod kyis gar mdzad sa sngangs dang / sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo/ chags pas brgyan
123b6(rgyud): nga'i khro ba yid/ gar mdzad khyad ni ro langs lags/ sku ni dmar zhing thung ba ste// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa/ rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud che/ gang mdzad khyod de bde ba che/ hrIHSh+T+rIHgsang sngags dgos
123b7(rgyud): khyod// sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sa la/ snying rje'i khro ba rje btsun khyod/ gar mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bu dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma kau haM/ sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ sgra
123b8(rgyud): brnam dang mtshungs rnam par blta// 'khor lo'i gcol bstod byas te/ de yis de rnams de lta bzhin/ gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ shin tu 'jigs pa gshi rje gshed// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhi
124a1(rgyud): sku yi rdo rje khyo dag 'tshal/ pra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje gshed/ thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba/ rin chen rdo rje khod pag 'tshal// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang na/ 
124a2(rgyud): khyod khab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas/ dbangs mchog kun gyi mchog mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje khyod phag 'tshal/ phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin da/ las kun bad pa'i gshin rje gshed// sku
124a3(rgyud): yaM rdo rje rab gsal ba/ pag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun rab mchog mchog
124a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal// aHyig las/ skyes pad+ma'i snod// mi mgo gsum gyi stang gnas pa/ dgabar rnam par bskyed byas te// der ni 'og tu me dkyi
124a5(rgyud): 'khor zur gsum ra yig las byung ba'o// deng ni 'og tu rlung nga kyil 'khor// sngon po g.yo ba gzhu lta bu// ba dan gyis mtshon yaM las byung // deng ni de'i ming dang po las/ bskyed de rnam snang
124a6(rgyud): la sogs pa// bum yig sogs las yang dag byung // glang po che la sogs pa lngas/ hUM spyi rdo rje'i kha chod kyi// bkab pa mkhas pas bsgom par bya// ma la rlung gis bskyod pa na// der ni zhu ba rnam bsam
124a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i ro mnyam dag gyur cing // shin tu dri ma med bltas te/ hUM yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// spyan drangs ye shes rang bzhin can/ sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab gzhug cing // mchog bdud rtsi lngar bltas/ 
124a8(rgyud): nas// de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs bya/ dkyil 'khor bdag pa tshim bya ste/ lce la rdo rje gtsang ma nyid/ hUM yig yang dag byung bltad der// de 'od sbu gu'i rnam par la// yang dag bkug pa de yis kyang / rdon
124b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams de bzhin gzhan// ye shes 'od kyi snying khar bkug/ kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// thog ma tha ma dbus dbye bas// deng yang gzung ba gcig yod min// 
124b2(rgyud): de nyid kyis ni 'khrul gzugs med// gang la 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas/ thams cad chen sems 'khrul med/ lus ni spro dang sdud pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin
124b3(rgyud): rje gshad dmar po'i rgyud las// mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u swa dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal
124b4(rgyud): 'dis gsol ba btab pa// las kyi dbye dang rab dbye las// ci ltar sems can rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje chen pos bshadu gsol// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams nyan 'tshal/ de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// nyes
124b5(rgyud): pa thams cad gso ba'i bdag las kun rab tu sgrub pa pos/ gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i
124b6(rgyud): mthu mnga' ba la mchod pa bas te phyag 'tshal ba/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing / btsam ldan 'das kyi gsung mnyan to// de nas rdo rje 'chang
124b7(rgyud): rgyal pos// dbang ba 'khrul 'khor rab gsal byed// gshin rje gshed nag 'khrul 'khor rnams// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// bud med dbang bad par de bzhin// bsrung ba'i don du bya ba nyid// gi baM bzung ba
124b8(rgyud): zhi ba la// grog de bzhin stug shun la/ 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te// na maHming ni nang du spel// nag po rtsa ba sogs spangs te// kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar la// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag ste/ srad du
125a1(rgyud): dkar pos dkri bar bya// me tog dkar pos thun gsung du// shar du kha bltas mchod par ba// ga shin rje mthar da zla shel 'ong // bdag nyid bsam te 'du 'gong pa// bsgrub pa zla ba'i dkyil
125a2(rgyud): 'khor la// zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur ba// bum pa dkar po zla 'dra ba// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang rnams la/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus byed pa// bltas nas bzlas pa brtsams par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA
125a3(rgyud): nan hUM hUM phaT phaTan ma lnga sbyin gyi shAn ti ku ru ru nas zhi ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa'o// skyes pa rnams kyi zhing la/ gur gum gyis bla rgyas pa la'ang / kha che rnams kyi 'khor lo gnyis/ sre sde ling gi da
125a4(rgyud): du spel// bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs nas ni// mang dang sbrang rtsi'i dbu sa bzhag nas/ kham por kha sbyar du bdag ste/ srad bu ser po sa dkri bar bya// me tog ser pos thun gsum du// byA
125a5(rgyud): du kha bltas mched par bya/  gshin rje 'joms pa sku mdog sa / bdag nyid nges par blta bdu bya/ bsgrub bya ser bzla bar gnas/ bum pa song bas dbang bskur bya// dbang bskung dzin
125a6(rgyud): bsgoms na su// rgyas par byed 'dod yang dag bzlas/ oM hrI lI wi kr-i ShAnAn d+hA d+hA Ta phaT swA hA/ lhas sbyin gyi bu ku ru swAhA/ kho ShaT oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAnan hUM sU Ta phaT mA~Mny+dza/ kha~M laT lA sbyin gyi
125a7(rgyud): luSh+Ti ku ru bo 'aT ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas pa'i dam cheg gro ga 'am/ yeng na ngas la yang / rgyu skyegs khu ba 'am can dan dmar// ming med khrag dang bsres pa yis/ 'khor lo gnyis
125a8(rgyud): ni mnyam bris te/ ma chog gis ni nang du spel/ nag pa la sogs spasbas 'khrul 'khong// kham par gnyis ni kha sbyang te/ mang dang sbrang rtsis yongs gang bar/ srad bu dmar pos dkri ba bya/ nub tu mngon par/ 
125b1(rgyud): phyogs byas te// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms pa po// sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ bsgrung ba zla ba dmar po la// don pa nyid kyang rnam bsam pa// rang lus las 'phros 'od zer
125b2(rgyud): ni dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs rnams kyis// bsgrub bya bkug par bsams nas ni/ spro ba'i sngags ni khri bzlas pa// de yis bsgrub bya brgya la 'gyur zhing / rkang pa dag la de bzhin 'gyel// gos dang bral
125b3(rgyud): skra grol ba khasams te bzlas pa brtsam par bya// gal ta dbang du ma gyur na/ dud med seng ldeng me la ni// mar sogs dang bcas brtul zhugs can/ 'khor lo ni gdung bar bya/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM la
125b4(rgyud): phaT mo lnga sbyin gyi mchod sbyidan pa shing ku ru mo oM hrISh+NI wi kr-i tA nan dz+nyA hU~M phaT phaT bau ShaT/ lha sbyir gyi pra shA mA na mchod sbyin tha 23ces pa gsungs sa bcom ldan 'das kyi dang ru
125b5(rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig/ dur khrod ras sam yang na ni/ rang byung bskus pa'i ras dag la/ rgya skyegs sgra rlon khrag bsres pas// 'khor lo gnyi sa ni mnyam bris te/ dzaHyig dang ni hrI/ yig gis/ sku
125b6(rgyud): ba'i ming ni nang spel ba// btsun mo'i pad+ma'i snod ni// kha sbar bzhag ste mchod par bya// srad pu dmar pos dkris nas ni// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje gshad po ni/ 'tshams kyi nyi ma
125b7(rgyud): lngar 'bar ba// lcags kyu kha dog dmar po yis// bsgrub bya bkug pa nyid bsgom pa// lcag kyu rnams kyis snying phug cing / zhags pas rked pa la bcings te/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ seng ge dam
125b8(rgyud): po mnyam zhon pa// rdzas lnga yis ni bas bya bya ste/ de 'ang ba rnam pas ma byaM// gal te bsgrub pa ma 'ongs na/ seng lde shing me 'bang ba la// 'khrul 'khor de bsros brtul zhugs can// de ni bzlas pa
126a1(rgyud): dag brtsam/ oMr+thiSh+NI wi kr-i tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT hrI A mu ka A tA yah+ni \u0f7fsar+b+bad+d+haHwi kr-I tA na hA d+hu Ta phaT ma lnga sbyin AHrA sa cha ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bkun
126a2(rgyud): pa'i dam tshi go// blo ldan dur khrod ras ma la// yung ba yi naM khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te// l-i yig gis ni nang du sbal// bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang // kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste// kham phor
126a3(rgyud): sar po steng bzhag nas// der ni mkhas pas ri mo bri// dang po ri mo bzhi bcu bdun// mnyam par gzhag ste mnyam bri ba// cog brgyad du grags ri rab ni/ de yi steng du yang dag bri/ hUM yig dang de baM yig ste/ de yis ri raH
126a4(rgyud): nang du spel// de yi nang du la yi gis// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la// srad bu ser pos dgr-i bar bya// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed pa no// sku mdog ser po rnam bsam bya/ 
126a5(rgyud): ru mngon phyogs rnal 'byor bas/ dbang chen dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i bsgrub bya ser po rnam bsams nas/ ri rab kyis mnan myur dag dubyasna tshogs rdo rje mnyam mnan la/ dbang chen dkyil 'a
126a6(rgyud): las 'og tu// man dang sogs 'jigs rung ri// gangs raM g.yo med ma chung sa rnams kyis// bsgrub bya mnan pa bsgom bya ste// de nyid bzlas pa byA nyid// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA nan d+hu hU Ta phaT/ laM lha sbyin
126a7(rgyud): swa sAn staM b+ha ya le swA hA/ zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rengs pa chen po'i dam tshig/ ngag ni rangs par 'dod pa yis/ rang bzhin 'kho lo gnyis bris nas/ bsgrub bya'i ming rnams nang sgrol te/ de nas spos
126a8(rgyud): shing sngags bzlas te/ sas+t+rai dz+dzaHli kr-i n+dan tu m+bu ja la/ lha byin la thA bAt+ma kAn+ya s+ya kr-i te/ na par ma to drug ga par tal te'i dra pa gi kha ta ma dzA da da s+yan ga ste tan gu chule// zhes pa gsus te/ dz+ra
126b1(rgyud): kyi ngag rangs pa'i dam tshig// de ltar dgongs pa gsungs pa 'di/ nang du shin tu legs sbas pas// gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las/ nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ dur khrod ngas la 'khor lo gnyis/ snga
126b2(rgyud): bzhin bri ba brtul zhugs can// skye tshe dang ni len tshwas kyang / dug dang rnam pa yis kyang ste// de bzhin lan tshwa cha ba gsum/ dung khrod sol ba nyid dang ni// spro byed mdab ma'i khu ba dang // de bzhin gtum po'i sa bon nyid// mthu
126b3(rgyud): mo'i khrag ni blangs byas te// tsi tra ka yi khu ba 'am/ tshwa sgo can gyis blangs te// gdol pa'i rdza ma'i drag pa dang // ltogs pa can gyi smyu gu yis// gdu ga pa'i sems kyis bcu bzhi la/ nyi pad na bri brtul zhu
126b4(rgyud): can dam rungs pa rnams bas rgyu yi/ sna tshogs sems cad rnab 'dzams pa'i// hUM yig gis ni rnam spel bya// lho ru mngad phyogs rnal 'byor ba/ bdag nyid gshin rje gshad po ni// gtum
126b5(rgyud): po chen po khro bo'i gzugs// thod pa'i dum bus rnam par rgyan// ma he la zhugs ljags 'gyur ba// gsus pa che zhing 'jig su rung // gtsigs shing gyen du 'brang ba'i sku// de bzhin slar smin ma ser// g.yas pa rdo rje'i dbyug
126b6(rgyud): ba che// g.yon pa thod pa nyid kyang ste// rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag mtshungs// de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te// de mdun bsgrub pa myur dgod pa// dri ldan rims gzir nad
126b7(rgyud): rnams kyi// gdug pa'i lus la gzir ba dang // gos dang bral bas 'dar ba dang // nyams chang lus ni rma dang ldan// 'bras kyi phreng bas yan lag bskor// mtshon cha yis ni gzir bar bya// grang ba'i rlung gis nye bar gtses
126b8(rgyud): me yis dbusu yang dag gnas/ ma he dag dang stag dang ni// khyi dang mchu rings can rnams kyis// sangs rgyas sde ni rnam 'joms pa'i// ma rungs chen po za bad cing // mthar byed lto ba'i nang na gnas// cher ma rnam
127a1(rgyud): kyis lus gang ba// gdos dang sgrogi rkang par bsdums// de bzhin dus bu dum ngur bas// lpags pa med parlabs bsams te/ ske tshe dang ni lan tras byug/ sIng mig brjid pas bsam par /

127a7(rgyud): nyid che// gsod pa byang chub thob par mdzad// slar yang snying rje rnam mdzad nas// bsad 'os sems can gsod par mdzad// e ma snying rje mchog stobs// snying rje dman pas mi 'grub po// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i ta na na hUM
127a8(rgyud): Ta phaT/  de bi dat+ti mA ra ma hUM oM hrI Sh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAnan hUM hU~M phaT phaT hUM phaT/ de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par rtog pa chen po gsad pa'i rdo rje/ 'khrul 'khongs
127b1(rgyud): dang / rgyad kyi gsod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig/ de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris te// phaT kyi yigs rnam sbal ba// bsgrub pa'i ming ni blangs byas te// thod pa kha sbyor du dgod pa// srad bu nag pos yang dag dkri/ sdang ba'i
127b2(rgyud): sems kyis nyin pa na/ dur khrod rnamasu sba ba // gshing rje mthar bang du yang dmigs// mdun du bsgrub bya dgod pa // rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa/ lag na mtshon thogs de gnyis dang / khro bo 'dus pa rnams kyis
127b3(rgyud): bskor gnyis ka'i phyogasu rnams bsam pa// khro bos dkris pa yi sems kyis// gnyis po de dag dbyug 'gyed par// bsgom bya 'thab bo'i bsam pa can// bsgoms te bzlas pa brtsam par ru // oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwikra
127b4(rgyud): tAnan hUM hUM phaT phaT/ daM ba dat+ta yadz+nyA dat+to bi dA ny+dza ya paHces gsungs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbye ba chen po'i dam tshig/ bzhin cho ga de nyid kyis// 'khor lo gnyis ni dri bste// hUM dang phaT yig
127b5(rgyud): rnam spel bas// thod pa kha spyod du bkod de// srad bu nag pos yang dag dkris// ma mo'i chal rnamasu sba bya// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gzung // mdun du bsgrub bya rnam bsgom bya// ya
127b6(rgyud): byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// nag po gzhu yi rnam pa la// rnga mo chen po mdog sngon po// de yi ste du rnam bsgom bya// de la ma rungs che bskyod te// lho yi phyogasu de khyer la// khro tshogs rnams kyis brdungs pas na// 
127b7(rgyud): par sangs rgyas rnams kyang bad+mod/ oMts+tshiSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tAnam s+thu hU Ta ngag de bdat+taM u sA Ta ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi bskrad pa chen pa'i dam che'o// khros pa gshin rdzing bltas rnal
127b8(rgyud): 'byor ma khrag bcas ro bsregs thal ba dang // ngag dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang // til mar sgo byed mdang de bzhin// dung khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// de ltar rim pas bri bar bya// gshin rje'i lus gnas bsang ba la// rta dang
128a1(rgyud): ma he dag las bye/ rnga mo'i lus gnas bskrad pa la/ zhi bzla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ rgyas bzla ba ser po la// btsun mo'i snying khang dbang du byed/ lkugs par mi lus la gnas/ lhun pa
128a2(rgyud): dbus su rengs pa ste/ seng gi shar b+ha gnas dgug/ da ltar gzhan rnams las mtshon bya// gi brgya skyegs nyid dang ni/ kha tshem ni bye brag gis// gro ga'i mdang ma la bris dbang // 'di ni 'grub 'byung ba
128a3(rgyud): mad kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste// dge ba'i sems kyis yang dag bzung / bya rog sgro yi sbu gu yis// nyi ma'i gung la nges par brtsam// ro bsregs pad+ma kha sbyar la// gshing rje gshed bdag rnal 'byor
128a4(rgyud): las oM hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs kyi sngags brjod cing / lho ru gnas pa'i char gtsad pa/ zhi la mtha' yi yi ga ya/ dbye ba ni gnyis kyis yang // pi nas dbus kyi ya yig gis/ lhag ma'i yog
128a5(rgyud): ci bde ba'o// sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas te// las 'dirab tu sgrub pa ni// gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las// ye sherdo rje yis bya ste// drag po chen po'i 'khor lo 'di// bris pa
128a6(rgyud): gang du gnas pa dang // yi ge bris pa'i khyim du yang // rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul
128a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// ri bo skye bos dben phyogs dang // legs sbas yid pa'i khyim rnam so// tha sku bkram ste rnal 'byor bdag/ sngags kyis dgug pa yang dag brtsam// 
128a8(rgyud): zhal gcig phya gnyis su mdog dgapa/ gri sug thod pa 'dzin 'am/ khrag 'bugs pa mi ras stsab la/  kA smam rnal 'byung ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje khran
128b1(rgyud): 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje tsartsi kA'i sngags 'dig gsungaso// oM badz+ra tsartsi ka sid d+hen+na nI la hA ri Ni rat+na tra ya/ a ba ka ri tsi ru d+hi ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaHkha ni rab tu gdangs bya ste/ 
128b2(rgyud): sngags 'di rje su dran par bya// khams gsum pa'i khrag chen po// 'dir ni 'gugs par the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed pos chang dgugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyam
128b3(rgyud): ba zhugs te/ de rje pa goms chang dgug pa'i dam tshig 'dis su ma/ oM g+ho na su g+ho tsa badz+ra mA ma lA~M/ b+hA b+ha/ s+thAr sam+b+har/ kyai 'dug ma du m+b+ha kaR+Sha sa ya~M rdza ma khan lag pa phyi sa pa'i sas/ bum pa
128b4(rgyud): byas te kun nas bsgribs// rkun po'i sku yi gzhir bzha ga ste// sngags ni rdza su dran par bya// paN+Di tas ni mchod rten du// snga/ 'di'i bdag nyid che ba bstan// 'bad pas brtan par da mi Da bas
128b5(rgyud): nas chang dgug pa ni rab tu 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// dbyangs can mos
128b6(rgyud): sngags 'di gsungaso// oM bi tsu pa tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ mi d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar+d+ha naM swA hA/ bzung nas ji srid tshes gcig nas// kunas zla ba rdzogs pa'i bar/ legs sbyar byed 'dod brtsam bya ste/ 
128b7(rgyud): ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug las// ngag dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// de nas tshigs bcad brgya byed cing // khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ ma lus lus pa meng banga'akhrugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha
128b8(rgyud): byed chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te// khu ba 'gugs pa go rIs sngags 'di gsung so// oM a karA ni a kaR+Sha rI/ go rA mra wi du zhus du
129a1(rgyud): / ya/ shukra A d+hA sa cha mdzu swA hA/ mkha' sgo rdo rje lam dang rlung / dril bu lcags kyu'i sbyong ba las/ bzlas dang sgom par rab sbyor las// khu ba'i tshogs rnams 'gugs pa byed// dpan
129a2(rgyud): pa'i nags khrod rnas su yang // las 'di rab tu bsgrub bya ste// mtshan mo dadun gyi rang sbyor gyis// 'dir ni 'grub par the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po dus 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i
129a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung bar gyur to// u dum par masder/ ba ra dzA trakaM pA li ka/ kar ni ka
129a4(rgyud): ra'i phra ba yang // bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs// khams gsu ma pa yi ral gri che/ sangs rgyas thams cad phyag mdzad pa/ bzung nas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ las kyi ral
129a5(rgyud): gri dang mtshungs mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni/ rdo rje rje la bu'ang sgrub pa'i phyir// mnyes shing gsang ba'i rdo rje zung // khyod ni slob ma bsdu bar gyis// 'di ni btung ba rin chen te// 'grub pa'i
129a6(rgyud): lus ni rab sgrub pang // skyes bu byung ba'i chu 'thungs cig/ mnyes gshin kun tu ye shes nyid// slob ma'i kha yis btung bya ste// gshin rje gshad ni rab sgrub phyir// rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid che// sems ni
129a7(rgyud): shin tu dga' bar mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las sngags kyi dgug pa'i rab tu sbyang ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
129a8(rgyud): de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // ral gri'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya// khab len lcags kyi rang bzhin las/ ram gri yang na dngul chu yis// phedu bas khru gang chad kyis ni// ral gri rnam bsam brtul zhugs
129b1(rgyud): can bcu bzhi yang na brgyad pa la// dur khrod dbus su bzung bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// thun gsum khri phrag bzlas par bya// zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi las// gtor ma mchod pa sngon 'gro bar// zla ba
129b2(rgyud): gcig gis 'bum phrag bzlas// 'bum phrag lngas ni 'grub par 'gyur// grub nas ral gri rab tu 'bar/ snang ba chen po'i 'od zer lnga// de nas bzung bya 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal
129b3(rgyud): ming 'jigs bang gshin rje gshed sbyor las// gang tsha ral gri grub rnal 'byor// rtsed rmongs ni grub byang de'i// g.yul du de yi bzod par dka'// rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang // blta phyir phyogs bcu rnamasu
129b4(rgyud): 'gro lha dang lha min rnams mi bzod// mi yi 'jig rten smras dgos// rgya mtsho'i 'jim pa blangs byas te/ zla ba gtsigs yang dag/ sgrub/ oM pu'iHyi ge snying khar dgos// hrIHSh+T+r-iHlas
129b5(rgyud): sngags bzlas bya// char pa mi 'bab dus rnamasu// khri khrag bzlas bas 'grub par 'gyur// sbrul nag dag sha rnams dang // nim pa 'o lo mas bsres byas te// de yis ri lur byas nas na
129b6(rgyud): rgya mtshor zhugs pas brtul zhugs can// khri phrag tsam zhig rab bzlas pas// chu rlangs rengs pa'i mchog yin// gtum po sa bon brgya blangs te/ sran ma 'bras dang bsres pa ni// 'bum phrag bdun
129b7(rgyud): du rab bzlas pas// lha ni sbyin sreg las gzigs 'gyur// dur khrod kyis ni gso ma blangs// gzugs brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can// smyo byed khu bas byug pa yis// khri phrag gcig gis 'gugs par byed
129b8(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas pa yis// don grab sa bon kun bsags pas// gnyid log langs te bya ba dang // tshor bar yang ni the tsom med// rgyan lam gyi ni sa blangs te// sngags ni 'bum phrag bzlas pa las
130a1(rgyud): skye bo rab tu thugs cam gyis/ sbya ba na rnam par 'joms/ lan dun pangan pang bsngags byas te// lag pas skye ma 'dus/ da kyis rnams pa med gyung / ma
130a2(rgyud): the tsom yod pa yin/ bram za yi ni sha dag dang // dung khrod thal ba sa de ni// gshin rje gshed kyi sku gzugs pa// phyag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig pa// g.yas pa rdo rje chen po ste// de bzhin g.yon da mi mgo'o//

130a8(rgyud): bar bya de yang / bzlas pa'i phreng bar rab bsgrub bya/ zla ba zla ba'i bcu bzhi la/ sha lnga yis ni byug par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ bzlas par 'grub pa byed pa'i mchog/ 'di yis 'bum phrag
130b1(rgyud): bzlas pa yis// nges pa rgyal srid 'grub par 'gyur/ e ma sngags kyi nus pa ni// gnyid log sgra'i sgrogs par byed// gshin rjeg shad kyi sbyor ldan pas// skad cig kyang ni 'jigs mi pa// gang gang 'dod pa'i rnal
130b2(rgyud): 'byed ba/ de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur/ ma ha dadon su srin dang / sdug dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyis// do dang lce spyang dag+sa da ni/ spre'u la ni bye drag las/ ske thalam na de bdon du/ sha badz+ran rAng
130b3(rgyud): 'di yis sku gzugs yang dag sgrub/ 'jigs pa'i gzu can gshin rje gshed// de la gsol btang rnal 'byor pa/ hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags bzlas te/ rgyal po che ge bsad nas ni// bdag de rengs par skya
130b4(rgyud): bad+yabya// bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te/ bded shing bden par 'tshom med// de nas gzhan yang / rgyal gyi zla ba'i da phyogs dang / nyi mar bsgrubs la yang dag sbyad/ rdul ldan gas
130b5(rgyud): yang dge blang // thang sku mchog na bri bar bya/ bri ba bkra shis mchog snag cha/ chen po yang dag ldan rnams kyi// sku mdog dkar po drag shul che/ phag gnyis dang ni zhal gcig mchog/ g.yas pa rdo rje 'brang ba ste/ 
130b6(rgyud): g.yon pas 'dzag pa'i mgo bo 'dzin// zhabs ni g.yon brkyang rnam 'gyur dang // rin chen cod pan rnam par rgyan// rin chen rnams yongasu rdzogs// 'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs// gsod pa'i bsam pa'i rgyal
130b7(rgyud): po ning 'og gi cha la nges par sbyar/ thun mongs kha dog yang dag ldan/ ji lta'i dad bas ni rnam par gnas/ 'dus pas lha ni bsgrub par bya/ ci ltar 'byor pa'i tshad la ni// de yi mdun du sbyid pa sreg pa// nges par zur gsum
130b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la'o// sbyin bsreg 'bum gyis de rgyal srid/ thob 'byu 'di ni tha chom med// de nas gzhan yang // zla ba gzas zin du su ste/ gal te nyi ma la blta bya/ dung khrod thal ba yang dag blangs// gzugs brtan
131a1(rgyud): bya ba brtul zhugs can/ shrI gI rA dzI sha lnga dang / nim pa d+ha dur lo mas// mkhas pas cho ga 'di yis ni// gcig tu byas te gzugs brnyan bya// sku mdog sdong po drag shul che/ pha gnyis dang ni zhal
131a2(rgyud): gcig pa/ ma he la bzhugs rnam 'gyur zhal// rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin// bsgrubs te sku gzugs rang bzhin la/ mtshang ba byas na slar yang ni/ rgyud tu sni Sh+T+rIHla sogs sngags// 'bum phrag bzlas te mnyes par bya/ 
131a3(rgyud): sde bcas g.yog 'khor bcas pa yis// rgyal po che ga gzhom bya ste/ bzlas pa 'bum gyi bdag rnal 'byor// byas nas 'bub phrag khyad par las// mchod pa'i las ni yang dag ldan// bzlas pa'i sbyin
131a4(rgyud): sreg cho ga 'dis// sems can don mchog blo dang ldan// rgyal srid thob 'gyur the tsom med// de nas gzhan yang // bkra shis kyi ras la rdza nA na mkha'i chu yis zla mtshan gyi gos bkrus te thang sku ma

131a6(rgyud): brtsas byas ste// dragra yi mdun du rnam par sgom// gri gug gis ni bcad byas te/ tshil dang zhag rnams 'thung ba dang / rgyu ma rnams dang 'jim pa dang / khrag ni mang po 'thung ba byed// 'bum phrag tsam gyis bkur bar 'gyur/

131a8(rgyud): ba smod par 'gyur// gcig pu skye bos dben par 'dug ste// rje btsun gyi thang sku bkram nas/ phyogs bcun zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du byas nas// mi'i rus pa bcad pa'i khrag can/ 
131b1(rgyud): po dang bsres pa'i ba rog gi khrag gis sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la/ sa bon bcu gnyis dang / da nyid dag po'i ming dbusu sbal la// tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i kha sbyar ba tha yig
131b2(rgyud): gsum gyis pi rol tu bskor ba ba rog gi mgrin par btags te// gal te 'bang chu la bsgyur na de'i tshe 'khrug par 'gyuraro// de kho na ltar sa bon bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste/ phaT phaT hUM hUM nad hA kr-i biSh+TiHhrIHoM/ ji ltar
131b3(rgyud): 'bor bas phud mchod nas// stobs po che yi bdug pa phul// gal te 'bad tshul bskyang na de'i tshe 'khrug par 'gyur// gal te ma gyur nu ba rog gi bshog pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ dag
131b4(rgyud): sgo nang du ming dang spel ba ni 'dral du 'khor dang bcas paskrod par byed do// de kho na ltar rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus// tsha ba gsum dang dug dang skra tshe rnams rus pa chen po'i 'dri smug gis
131b5(rgyud): sa bon gyi dbu su/ tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i g+haHyi gnyis kha sbyang / ba'i tha yig gsum gyi phyi rol du bskor ba'i me'i bud shing gi me/ la gdung bar bya ste/ de'i skad cig la bu dang chung ma dang

132a1(rgyud): / 'dzin pa ni rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa/ skye bo rnams kyi mthong byung gang / de nas thams cad gdang gzhan 'gro/ seng ge mthong ba'i blang ba ba'i// de nas gzhan yang / mas pa'i

132b1(rgyud): dasnyi pa rdzasas sa yu 'i rtsab dmams cad mdza bangs cig du byas rje ba'i dzin lanyim gsus nas la ngas du bya nas yang yang 'du ste mi mdzang bar 'gyung zhes gan/ 
132b2(rgyud): gzas bzung ba'i dus na/ ul+lI'i mchu dang / ro dang / d+hu d+hu ka na ka hA ya nyid// ba Da b+hi'i gcin gcig la yang dang dag par bzhag ste/ ril bu byas nas khang bcug na mi snang ba'i mchog/ de nas gzhan yang khri nA~M
132b3(rgyud): mig dang kha rgod kyi mig dang / sa 'og rkya bas kyang mamanyam por gcig tu byas pa'i ril du bshang laM du gzhug par bya ste/ skad cig de las de mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed// denas yang / nyi ma'i

132b7(rgyud): shA ka cig byas te bza' bar bya'o// des brun du gyur pa gang yim pa de dang / lhan cig bdag nyid kyi khubs thig le byas na mi mthong bar 'gyur// 'dis ni mi snang ba'i rab tu byed pa'o// mig sman bshad pa
132b8(rgyud): bya ste/ thog ma shig mig smad gyi ngan du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 'bum drag lnga yong su bzlas te mig smard sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o// dung dang ba rgod dang ku ngang rnams kyi mig blangs te/ mnyams na
133a1(rgyud): sa 'og gi sbrang rtsi'i khu bas// dang gos kyi sdong bus dreg pa 'chags par 'gyur// gang gis 'dis mig smad byugs pa tsam gyis/ sa yi bug mthong bar 'gyur// skad ma lag la wI
133a2(rgyud): ha ti dkar po'i rtsa ba dang / dza yad+hi nag po'i rtsa ba dang / lce sbyang gi mig bsnams te/ sbrang rtsis lhan cig btags nas thig la byas na sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur// b+hU mi la ta'i til mar dang / bi shang ka ra ra'i
133a3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i khu ba ra dza dang bcas pas/ dang gos la gnon nu mas byas pa'i srad bus dkris nas sdong bu byas te/ mi mi thod ba la drag pa 'chags par byas la/ mig sman byas na nges par gtar mthong bar 'gyur
133a4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rgyal gyi zla ba dang / skad ma snrums la zla mtshan gyi gos blangs te/ brgya pa'am bcu bzhi pa la rdo rje tsartsi kA'i thang sku mngon bang bris la/ mchod pa chen po byas na mtshan mo 'du
133a5(rgyud): phrag gcig bzlas na nges par rmi lam gyi gtar mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas gzhan yang / shing nim pa'i rtsar song ste/ brgyad pa 'am bcu ba/ ba la thang sku'i mdun du tsartsi ka bsams nas lce sbyang
133a6(rgyud): gi mgo'i steng du khri phrag bzlas na tsi rtsa ka drung du 'ongs nas bdagis ci bya 'dri bar 'gyur zhing sgrub pa pos bdag la mig sman gyi grub pa rab tu rtsol ces pa dang / bdag la ro'o bcud len gsol ces brjod par
133a7(rgyud): bya'o// gi wang dang lce spyang gi mig dang dngul chu dang / shing ta la'i khu ba dang / sbrang rtsi mnyam pa rnams mkhas pas ril bu bya'o// 'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni/ sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur/ lce spyang
133a8(rgyud): mig dang / bya rgod kyi mig dang / ku ra ra na'i de kho na ltar/ g.yon pas g.yon pa dang / g.yas pas g.yas pa bzung ste/ til mang chen pos dreg pa 'tshogs par bya'o// 'dis mig sman byas pa'i mig ni sa'i bu ga
133b1(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang gi wang dang / pi'i mkhris pa dang / ga pur gyi dngul dang / de bzhin du ha rang byinas brtag par bya'o// 'dis mig smad bas na sa'i bu ga mthong bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang gru
133b2(rgyud): ba sna tshogs gnas kyi don// nor dang 'bru sogs phun sum tshogs// lcags brgyad 'joms shing na mkha' la// spyod pa nyid kyang sbar bar 'gyur/ sdod du bsnyen pa'i don du sngags 'bum pa gcig bzlas nas
133b3(rgyud): dngul chu'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya'o// thog par dngul chu blangs te/ tsi tra ka dmar po'i khu bas bsnang bar bya'o// de'i rjes la zangs kyi khu ba dang / gser gyi phye ma bin nas la rA ka'i khu bas ba'i mtshang
133b4(rgyud): kyi nong bu bya'o// glang po che'i sha da / ldong ros kyis pa'am bor ba tags te skong bu la sbyar gyi nang dur dzu bin nas bsro bdung ra/ dbu gyur pa phyed ma dubs nas/ ra ti'i tshad kyis rba
133b5(rgyud): 'joms shing gser dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ro 'di dag til mar chen pos bskur nas/ lhang cher dang / mu zis til mar chen po nyi ma gsum gtso bdu ba ste/ ji srid slang gong du
133b6(rgyud): gyur gyi bar du'o// sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig cung zad zos pa la skyes bu lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur la// dngul bcos nas gser du 'gyur// gzhan yang swA hA sa'i khu ba byid nas dngul rku ba snang bar bya snga
133b7(rgyud): dza srid gong bur gyur gyi bar du'o// sha tA la dang 'dzam za'i ri'i khu ba dang / shA lo Daka'i 'bras bu'i shud pa so sor mnyam bong byin nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste/ de nyid kyis rab tu byugs padubs zhing
133b8(rgyud): bskams la po das skong bur bsregs par ba ste/ byar dgong bu'i chang du 'gyuraro// ra ci gnyis kyi tshad kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa cig ji srid par lo pa dang skyung po spangs shing thabs cad du bud med brjid pa
134a1(rgyud): bdu ste/ skyes bum na drug bcum su gas par babyung bab pa pa 'gyug das ba sa dus du 'gru sa pa'adas pa/  dza pa'i lubs su
134a2(rgyud): mi mA 'i rtsa bar 'a bya ste/ nga cheng dang da tsa khubs gong 'dub ba gang du 'a ban gnas 'dzin nyimam pa la stsas dub ste zla badrug gis gang bur 'byur lugs rgyang mas nges pa gas du 'gyur
134a3(rgyud): zos pas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob par 'gyuro// mthong ba dang rag pa tsam gyis lo lnga brgya rnamasu 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang / dngul chu ku ma ri'i khu bas bsnung bar bya ste/ so pa ta dang / pa lA sha'i rtsa ba dang
134a4(rgyud): nA ga ke sha ra'i shun pa dang / gtsag dang / ka thI ni 'i dang / de ba zhin du slar ba Da'i 'o ma dang mnyam pos bsro bar bya ste/ thun gnyis kyi gong bur 'gyur// cung zad zos pa tsam gyis nges par sa gsum du / 
134a5(rgyud): bar byed cing / ra ti tsam gyis nges par zangs srang gsar du 'gyur de nas gzhan yA/ dngul rgu shrI kha na Da sa rdu'i 'o mas cung zad pa nyes te/ mu zi dang zangs kyi snod dzam b+ha ra'i khu bas mal zhing ni 'od
134a6(rgyud): la bskams pa bya'o// gong bur gyur pakong bu'i nang du bzhig ste/ thun gnyi su bsro bar bya'o// su ki ti'i keng bur bcug la ra ti'i tshad kyis dbug par bya snga zangs bcom nas gsad du 'gyuraro// lus kyi yang gnyer ba dang
134a7(rgyud): dkar spong zhing phan par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang / dngul chu ba la'i rtsa bang bsnur bar bya zhing / slar yang dadol pa'i matog gi khu bas bsnur bar bya'o// slar yang skan tsa ka dang / kha ha ri'i khu ba la bsnur badra ba'o// de'i la
134a8(rgyud): ra ti'i tshad kyi gser gyi phyam byin nas gong bu bya'o// 'dab mi bdun pa'i gong du'i nang du kun dza ra'i rkang pa'i tshad kyis dub bu byin dgong bur 'gyur// de grangs te ti'i tshad kyis rangs 'joms shing gsod du 'gyur/ 
134b1(rgyud): lus la'ang ra ti'i tshad kyis skyon gsum 'phrog par 'gyuraro// gcong nad la yang 'tsho ba dang // rnal 'byong ba chen por 'gyur// zos pa tsam gyis rgyang gragasu 'gro bar bye // de nas gzhan yang / dngul chu snod bzhag ste/ rdo rje
134b2(rgyud): gzhi la bsnur zhing / dzi dzi'i rtsa ba dang / ka ran dza dang / pA thA'i rtsa bas bsnur bar bya/ gang du byas nas kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste mtshan mo mtha' dag par bsro bar bya'o// de nas rdzogs par 'dus byas te/ r-i ti'i tshad kyi cho ga
134b3(rgyud): la zangs 'joms pa dang / zos na ra ti'i tshad kyi sgra dkar dang gnye ma spong bar 'gyur// zla ba drug gi rab tu sbyong ba las/ lo stong phrag rnam su 'tsho bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyong ba nyid ste/ dngul chu srang gtsa/ 
134b4(rgyud): blangs nas shring ga ba ra'i khu bas bsnur ba bya'o// ljang che dang gser cung zad dang ldan pa/ shing gi dmar po dang mnyam pos ga DA ya'i khu ba blangs te/ nges par zhag bcu gnyis rnam so// de'i
134b5(rgyud): rjes la kong bu'i nang du bzhag ste/ bsra bar bya'o// kuny+dza'i rkang pa'i tshad las/ de nas blangs ter ti'i tshad kyis yang dag par blangs la bzhugs par bya sta/ zangs ma lus bcom nas nges par gsang du
134b6(rgyud): 'gyur zos nas mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob cing du 'chi bar the tsom medo// gnod sbyin dang mi 'am ci'i bdag po rnams kyis brten cing gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam su 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang lhang cher
134b7(rgyud): nag po srang cig dang / d+ha ka dang pad+ma dang dadub chu dang ldan pa rnams kyis zla ba phyed tu sbyar te/ rtsi bo che dang ro mnyam du byas pa za ba'i tshad kyis chu grang mo dang yang dag par ldan par bza' bar bya ste/ zla ba sbyor ba'i rnal
134b8(rgyud): 'byor pas/ bdag nyid rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang / lcags tsam srang gang blangs te/ ri gan pa mar bas te/ ka shi'i khu bas mnyam par ldan pa me lha'i 'od zer la bskam pa bya'o// dngul chu
135a1(rgyud): dang mu zi rnams deng ba'i cha'i tshad sbyang ba las/ k+ko la dang / li shi pha ma rnams pad dang gnyis snga ma'i tshad las te/ thams cad gcig tu byas la rdo ba'i gzhi la lcags bsnur bar bya'o// gsar
135a2(rgyud): kong bur bzhag nas bsro bar ba'o// de nas blangs te lcags chen po zla ba'i tshad kyis bza' bar bya sto/ skra dkar dang gnyer ma rnams 'joms shing rgas pa dang 'chi ba med par bdo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
135a3(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ mi snang ba la sogs kyi le'u 'dun pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ grib ma 'phrog pa'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs pa/ rkang gnyis dang rkang ngan
135a4(rgyud): pa rnams kyi dgra bo tshar gcod pa'i phyir rab tu sbyong ba 'di brjod pa bya'o// thog mar re shig sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba'i phyir/ dpal ba~M gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o// 8
135a5(rgyud): khyim rnams ma mtshan po'i dus/ stag lpags gdan la 'dug byas te// zhal cig dbar po mi bzad pa// zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin rol bzhugs pa drag shul che// spyan gsum shin tu 'chi
135a6(rgyud): rung ba// thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i lha// mi bzad pa yi ma stag 'phro// 'di ltar bsams nas 'bum phrag bzlas/ phyi nas cho ga kun spyod pa// ka na pa'i ra kar rtsa ba// de bzhin nan pa dmar rtsa ba// sbal ba'i khrags
135a7(rgyud): bskur byas te/ thig le bcang bya brtul zhugs can// gang gi grib ma 'phrog byed pa// rkang pa de yang rmongs pas 'thob/ rkang gnyis rkang bzhi thams cad ni// rmongs par 'gyur bar tha tshom med// nyi ma rengs dang dka
135a8(rgyud): phyogs la/ srin bu lto ba nas skyugs pa/ rab tu 'bad pas de blangs ste/ ra tsa yis ni thig le b+ha// dpral bar thig le byin byas pa// gang gi grib ma 'phrog par byed/ ngas par rmongs pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'o
135b1(rgyud): rnams kyis rab bkrus dge/ dan tI ro ha u ha rak+Sh+mI'i// rtsa ba 'dri rnams skam mnyam par// ba rog khrag gis bskur nas ni// thig le ba'o brtul zhugs can// thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis/ lha yang rab tu bskyod par byed
135b2(rgyud): nges par som nyi mi bya ste/ bya ba la yang rmongs par 'gyur// de bzhin rab tu sbyor ba gzhan yang ngas shing gi ku thA rI// pa NI nag pa NI de bzhin// 'di rnams kun gyi sha bcas pa/ ril bu bya'o brtul zhugs can// nam
135b3(rgyud): rdo ba'i chu nyid kyis/ spyi bong thig le bcang bar bya// nges par rag ste gdong bltas na// mi ni khrag tu skyug par daM/ kI ke ma rtsi sbrang rtsi dkang // khu byug dkar po'i mig gis ni// namakha'i chu dang mnyam par ldan/ sbyi
135b4(rgyud): la ni thig le bya// thig le 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// dag po rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// gang du phyag ni 'tshal byed pa// de rnams nges par rmongs bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab tu spyong ba yin te/ sprul
135b5(rgyud): nag po yi lce dang ni// de bzhin sre mo'i lce 'i dang // byi ba'i khris pa yang dag bsres/ khri phrag lnga yi ril bu rnams/ thig le 'di yi byin rlas/ sa kyis/ drag po bran du byed par 'gyur// ma rungs 'kha
135b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa yis// rgyal po rmongs par byed par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyar ba yin te/ 'chi med rtsa ba'i sI ta ka/ de bzhin pa hu DA pa la// 'di rnams mnyam po'i cha yis kyang / ril bu bya'o mkhas pa yis/ 
135b7(rgyud): thig le 'di yis yang dag bzung // 'jig rten gsum po rmongs par 'gyur/ kha yis bdud rtsi blang byas te// g.yon pa'i ming med kyis kyang ni// 'di ni ril bu byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags te/ oM ma hA yak+Sha se na

136a1(rgyud): sde brgyad pa'o// 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs gsungs te/ oM sni dzaHa pararA dzi Sha oM hUMHdzaHa dziH/ oM hUM dzaHbu ra ma oM hUM dza a~M pu ra Na 'os shu

136a4(rgyud): gul gyi dud po ponas mtshan mo mtha' dag bzlas par byanges par tho rangs 'ongs par 'gyur te/ gal te 'ongs par ma gyur na skad cig de la 'chi bar 'gyur// 'ongs nas kyang bdagis ci ba zhes bka

136a6(rgyud): lha mo ri bong can blangs te ster bar byed cing rgyab tu khur te/ lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang / brgya byin nyid ster bar byed// bskal pa bdun du 'tsho ba byed par 'gyur// de nas mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs 'di yin te/ mtshan ma
136a7(rgyud): mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ zhag bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// zhag brgyad po la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtor ma phul te gu gul gyi dud pa dbul zhing bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa na nges par 'ong
136a8(rgyud): par 'gyur// kye sgrib pa po bdags ci bzhes// sgrub pa po bdags ci bya ba khyod mkhyen// zhes smra bar bya'o// de nas brtsams nas ci bya ba'i las rnams byed/ slar yang rgyal srid ster/ la stong phrag tu 'tshe bar 'gyur
136b1(rgyud): ji sring 'am pa'i bangadu sa bya ba'i las rnams byed/ tshige 'tshalar gyis shig ces pa dang / tshig 'chi ba gyis ces pa thams cad da/ danas gsang ba'i sgrub thapas min te/  rje 'dzin ga la bang ba rje

136b3(rgyud): nas rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur// me tog gi mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ mnyes par gyur na rgyal srid stang zhing bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byeng // de nas kun tu gsang ba'i sgrub thabs yin te/ gdung dang

136b7(rgyud): 'tsho bar byed// de nas dung khrod padag po'i sgrub thabs yin te/ mtshan ma dung khrod du song nas nyi ma mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par byed// nyi ma brgyad pal nya dang / sha dang til dang / dzam bu li ka dang / zas dkar po dang
136b8(rgyud): zho dang / bu ram dang / bdug pa dang / 'bras bu ji ltar gsungs pa'i nye bar mkho ba rnams kyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// ga gal gyi bdag pa dbul bar bya'o// mtshan phod pa ji srid pa de srid du bzlas pa pa'o// de nas mtshan
137a1(rgyud): // byad nas sapa'i sgra thos par byed/ de la 'jigs papa mi bya'o// 'khor dang bcas pa tshogs kyis mo su bsko nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ dzas pan mched par dbul zhing mnyes par gyur na byung ba thams ca
137a2(rgyud): bran du 'gyur// nyi ma nyi mar dI nA ra brgyad rnams rab tu steng bar byed// dag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// lo stong phrag 'tsho bar 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs yin te/ lha'i gnasu song ste/ dri dang ldan

137a7(rgyud): dmar po dang nya sha dang til dang / 'dzam bu li ka'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma gsum pa la rang nyid myur du 'ong zhing mdun du gnas// de 'di ltar bdag gis ci bya zhes smra'o// sgrub pa pos bdags ci bya ba khyed mkhan

137b1(rgyud): mchog sgrub thabs yin no// rdo rje 'dzin pa khang par song nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la bzlas pa khri ba'o// nyi ma bdud rnamasu sngon du bsnyen par bya'o// de nas sgrub thabs brtsam par bya ste/ tsan dan gyi maN+Dal bas nas gu

139a1(rgyud): 'a pe rnams kyis dug dgus bya/ phyag g.yas de 'an dag yan pa la/ mdab brgyad badz+ra ga padug// dang busu ma tshum pa gyis/ 'di zeng rnams kyis bcu rtsi 'jug kyid kyis sgyu
139a2(rgyud): 'od dkar dkyil 'khor la dbus// mkhas pas ha yig bsam par bya// de nas hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags// byugs pas dug ni dgug ba ba// oM hrIHha hUM dzaHphuHyig/ sngags kyis spyi bo nas brtsabs te/ rkang
139a3(rgyud): mthar bya ba sngags bzlas kyi// bdud rtsi chang pa bsgom pa ste// 'tsho bar yang ni the tsom med/ sa bon yi ge rdzogs pa ni// 'dzin pa bcings pa'i mchog yin// kha dog ser po yang dag byung // seMs btab gnas la nges pa
139a4(rgyud): sgom oM yig dang po cheg drag mtha'// tshag nges spyad ha tha dag/ dug gi bya bas bcings pa la// sbyor ba rnams kyis bcings pa la/ spyi bong gser 'joms lags par rtog/ de ltar gzhan
139a5(rgyud): rnams kyang g.yan pa dang pol mig dang / dbu chu la sogs pa gos pa legs par tshar gcod pa'i rab tu sbyong ba mang pos kyang // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bas/ srung ba'i 'khor lo rab stsor
139a6(rgyud): mdzad// bgegs dang log 'dren 'dug pa rnams// dgug pa'i don pir yang gsungs pa// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyong las// 'bar ba'i sku dbang byug pa yis// lus gsum
139a7(rgyud): las skyes dgas pa bya/ slob pa sangs rgyas rnams kun gyi// lha ma khyad ni dbang por gyur// slob dpon gshin rje 'joms dkyil 'khor// bdag ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi// gos kyis gdongs pa bcings
139a8(rgyud): nas ni// dkyil 'khor khang po'i nang bzhag nas/ kye khad su zhes brjod bya ste/ bdag skal bzang zhes smra bar bya// blo bzang sol ba nang byas nas// bla ma mchog la gsol btab bya// dbang skud don du gus chen gyis/ 
139b1(rgyud): mgon po'i rjesu gsum brjod pa// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen gyis// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur las/ bdag la mgon pos yang dag dbang // mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol// glu dang rol mo de bzhin mtsha
139b2(rgyud): mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin nyid// slob mas mchod pa la dbul bya// yang na deng ni bstod pa bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// stong nyid yang dag gsung bar mdzad/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa/ oM pU dza
139b3(rgyud): badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma koN/ oM d+harmad+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tu/ de nas sbyir sreg rab bshad bya/ zhi ba la sogs rab dbye las/ gang gi sbyin sreg kyis 'grub 'gyur// las kun rab tu sgrub pa pa'o// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhiH
139b4(rgyud): la nga rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa la/ rab dga'i sems kyis dbang la nyid/ drag po yis ni gsod pa la'o// zlum po rnam bzhi pa ste// rdzing bu rnam pa rgyas pa'o// dbang la zla ba byed par brjod/ 
139b5(rgyud): mkha' khams mdog can bsad pa la'o// zhi ba la ni khru gang yin/ de bzhin khru gnyis rgyas pa la'o// ji ltar rgyas pa de bzhin dbang // song mo nyi shu bsad pa la'o// khru phyed brtsigs bzhi ba la/ rgya
139b6(rgyud): ba la ni khwa gang // lnga gnyis bsad pa las byas te// ji ltar dgug pa de bzhin dbang // zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tshes gcig la// zla ba nyal rgyas pa ste// bcu bzhi pa la mngon spyod// brgyad pa la ni dbang gi las/ shel dang
139b7(rgyud): pis zhi ba la/ mu tig 'bras bu rab bsngags te/ dung dang ba de tsi ta dang / nad med pa la mi ruso// can dan dmang pos bgos pa yis// bi ru yi ni khyad par las// drag mig lung thad de bzhin du// mi rus rA ga pa Ni
139b8(rgyud): yi brgya phrag gcig ni zhi ba la// de bzhin brgyad lhag rgyas pa la// dbang dang dgug pa nyi shu lnga/ drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon spyod la'o// brgya phyed sngags kyis bsgrub pa la'o// ril bu rgyu ba ba sngags la// 
140a1(rgyud): / ba rnams ni thams cad kyi// de bzhin lhun po gnyis rgyu bya// zhi ba 'dzub mo la bzhag ste// gung mo la ni rgyas pa'o// dbang dang dgug pa ming mad la/ char bcad pa ni mthe chung la'o// kha dog
140a2(rgyud): dkar po zhi ba la// kha dog ser po rgyas pa la// dbang la dmar po rtag bsam bya// nges par gsod la nag po 'dod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs gshin rje gshed dmar
140a3(rgyud): rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang / ston mo dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba la sogs pa yang dag par
140a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / phyudang/ gas dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dang / la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i rol mo'i sgra chan
140a5(rgyud): po lnga bsgom par bya ste/ mdun du gtor ma'i snod sgyogs sam grangs gzhong gi nang du bza' ba tsam bcas pa'i chu/ khyor ba gsum ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gis rdzas dang ldan pa
140a6(rgyud): bzhag la/ de rab tu gsal bar drung du bzhag la sgom pa brtsam par bya'o// na mkha'i dbyingasu pad+ma mdab ma brgyad bze ba dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// ze 'bru la yaM yi ge rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog
140a7(rgyud): sngon po gna'i dbyibs can// mtha' gnyis g.yo ba'i ba dan dang rgyal mtshan brgyad kyis rgyan pa'o// de'i steng du yig dmar po las skyes pa'i ma'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmang po zur gsu
140a8(rgyud): la raM yig gis mtshan pa'o// de'i snyed du du yig gsum yongasu gyur ba la/ mgo ba gsum gyi sked bu la gnas pa'i AHyig dmang po la skyes pa'i pad+ma'i tsung phyi dkang la nang dmang ba'o// nga bang/ 
140b1(rgyud): mdab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pa bsam par bya'o// de la shar la sogs pa'i mdab ma la/ bum aM dzaM khaM hUM gi yi ges rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang / de bzhin du ma la sogs pa'i zung du
140b2(rgyud): lA mAM bAM tAM bAM yi yi ges spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams bsam par bya zhing / yi ge bcu po 'di rnams yongasu gyur pa las go ku da ha na rnams dang / bI ra shu mA mu zhes pa 'di rnams kyi yi ge rnams kyis
140b3(rgyud): mtshan pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas bcu po 'di rnams pad+ma'i sna blta bar bya'o// de'i steng du a~M yig kha dog dkar po nas bkab pa'i rang bzhin bsams la/ oM yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor pa/

140b7(rgyud): oM AHhUM gi yig gsum las 'thod pa'i 'od zir gyi tshogs rnams kyis khams gsum ma lus pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi shin tu mang bar blangs par sgom zhing / de nyid rab tu gzhug par bya'o// 
140b8(rgyud): nyid rab tu bcug pa la mkha'i rnam pa shin tu gsal ba'i tshogs bsil ba'i sbrang rtsi 'dus pa'i gzugasu brtan pa bya zhing / phyi nas yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs par bya'o// kha dog dri ro phun su
141a1(rgyud): dri med stong ka'i zla ba'i 'od// ye shes bdud rtsi rab sgyur gyis// 'brad nas gtor ma rdzogs byas te/ gshin rje gshad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i sngags pa khro bo phag na zhags pa dang lcags

141a3(rgyud): ba rI wA ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaHsngags 'dis mig stong pa dkar ser/ glang po che dkar po'i gdan la/ g.yas pa dang / gcig shos na rdo rje dang / sdiHmdzub mjed pa bkug ste shang du bzhag par bya'o//

141a5(rgyud): mi ring bar bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis gshin rje ma hA la zhon pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa lho ru bzhag par bya'o// yang de'i nyid kyis chu lha kha dog dkar po brang 'gro la zhon pa/ phag na klu'i zha

141a7(rgyud): na bgrang phreng dang dag ste 'dzin pa// g.yon na la phug dang / la du 'dzin pa dbang ldan du'o// de nyid kyis dbang phyug dkar po khyu mchog la non pa ral pa 'dzin pa phyag na rtse gsum dang thod pa can// pha gnyis
141a8(rgyud): dkar mo la 'khyud pa dang ldan du banag par bya'o// sang de nyid kyis ma lha dmang po ra la gnas pa phyag na bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs can mang bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis srin po rol zhon pa pagan gri/ 
141b1(rgyud): gug dang thod pa can/ sngon po mi sdug pa khro ba dang bcas pa bden bral du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis rlung lha du ba'i mdog can ri dwags sar po la gnas pa rlung du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis nyi ma dam
141b2(rgyud): bo pa gnyis kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa rta bdud la gnas pa skad du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis zla ba dkar po pha gnyis kyis ku mu da 'dzin pa shing rta la gnas pa steng du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis tshangs
141b3(rgyud): pa seng po zhal bzhi pa spyi blugs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ral pas rgyan pa ngang pa la gnas pa steng du bzhag par bya'o// yang de nyid kyis sa'i lnga po pad+ma la gdas pa g.yo/

141b5(rgyud): gri dang / bsdigs mdzub 'dzin pa de nyid bzhag ba bya'o// de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs phyag na phung ba 'dzin pa rnam sa la/ khro bo mgrin pa 'phang ba nyid thugs ka'i
141b6(rgyud): sa bon gyis bkug ste/ de rnams kyi snying kha dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnamasu rkang pa'i mthar yang sngags 'dis phung ba gdab bang ba'o// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba In+da A dIn kI la
141b7(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ ces pa'i phung ba btab pa'i mthar grub pa'i bcud bsdus la lha de rnams thams cad kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rnam par bskyed pa po ste/ byang chub kyi sems khu bas sam yang na de'i tshes
141b8(rgyud): bod dang mtshan pa'i rim pas bskrad par bya'o// de las sa bor hrIHyig las rdzogs pa dbang po'o// sa bonaSh+T+rIHlas rdzogs pa gshin rje'o// sa bon bi las rdzogs pa chu lha'o// sa bon kr-i yig las
142a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa lus ngano// sa bon ta yig las rdzogs pa dbang ldan// sa bon na yig las rdzogs pa bden bral lo// sa bo na yig las rdzogs pa rlung lha'o// sa zod hUM yig las rdzog

142a6(rgyud): bar bya'o// oM rak+Sha mu ku TA ya/ rak+ta dza TA ya/ rak+Sha mu khA ya/ rak+ta sha ri rA ya/ rak+Sha b+hu dzA ya/ rak+ta muN+Da mA lA b+ha ra NA ya/ rak+ta ra tha sa mA ru D+hA ya/ rak+Sha pad+ma A sa nA ye/ rak+Sha b+ha ra Na b+hu Sha NA ya/ i daM bi laM gr-ih+Na
142a7(rgyud): gr-ih+Na/ ma ma bi g+h+rA ha ra ha ra/ tse tur mA rAng+ga ni bA ra ya ni bA ra ya/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma ya/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ bin+da bin+da/ na sha ya nA sha ye/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ts+tshe dats+tshe da/ b+he da b+had/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/

142b1(rgyud): rba n+da sams b+hU rmA sa namaHd+hU/ khwad+d+ha rnam pasas su khyenamaHpa/ dem ci dri rkyen maHswA/ sarba b+hu b+h+yo ma hA/ A6dz+dza hU~M/ d+hU d+hU/ e la me rgyu banas me sa dang / bdun pa dang mang ma
142b2(rgyud): lha bshos las gos pa dbul ba bya'o// de rnams la sgrub pa pos dul ba'i bcud thams cad gsol zhi bar longs spyod bar mdzad// de gnas pa rnams la rdo rje gsong la 'gyi' ba dang bcas par dril
142b3(rgyud): bu 'khrol zhing bstod pa bas te/ gti mug dga' ma la sogs pas mngon par 'ad pas gsol ba gdab cing / bshad pa rnam pa brgyad kyi sngags brjod pa bya'o// ngal sngags 'di yin te/ sag te sarbo hUMn+tu

142b8(rgyud): 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ dbyings mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog gsung gi rdo rje khyod pag 'tshal/ drag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// las kun bod pa'i gshin rje gshed// sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba

143a2(rgyud): spyan dang // rdo rje snyan dang / rdo rje shangs dang / rdo rje ljags dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje thugs ces pa'o// zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i spyan la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshigo// de nas dral shul gshin rje gshed//

143b1(rgyud): le'u sde bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba 'debs par mdzad// gang gyi
143b2(rgyud): rdo rje can maHsa pa// phyag rgya'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya rnams// slar yang 'grub par mdzad du gsol// da nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// tshig 'di dag ni gsung bar mdzad/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams tha
143b3(rgyud): spyi bo gshin rje go shed bsgos bya// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri ba zhing // rtag tu sbyin sreg gis mtshang bya// rtag tu dam tshig bsgrub bya ste// sdom pa gzung bar bya de nas// thog mang cod pan dbang yin te// gnyis pa ral
143b4(rgyud): gri sbyin par bya// gsum ba rdo rje dril bu yang // bzhi pazla ba bza' ba'o//  rnams dbang bskur chen po bzhi// dmar ba'i zhal nas 'byung ba ste/ dbang bskur 'jig byin rlabs kyis/ rgyal ba'i sras
143b5(rgyud): 'gyur byang chub thob/ de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi// gtor ma ba ba snga rab bshad/ sngags chen brjod par gyur pa na// 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bar/ hrIHSh+T+r-iHsogs sngags sa bon dang // swA hA ma thA
143b6(rgyud): yis nges par sbyar// bshang ci chu dang bsras pa yis// maN+Dal gru gsum byas nas ni// lha rnams tshim pas rnal 'byor pa/ hA hA'i rnam pa slar dran pa// dkyil 'khor gsum na nyes nas ni// brgya dang bcu gnyis bcu drug
143b7(rgyud): rnams mkhas pas tshogs yang dag bri// sngags rnams thams cad dgod pa ste// grub pa'i sngags rnams brtul zhugs can// ra mig bcu gnyis la dgod pa// mi rgyu rgyu bcas 'jig rten gsung// ma lus lhag
143b8(rgyud): ma mad bar 'grub/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya ma do ru Na yod ya/ ya da yo ni ra~M yak+Sha ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ning mA ya/ ya dbus shad du kle dgod pa// lho ru 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste// mau yig nub tu bri bar bya/ bad dang yig dag bad
144a1(rgyud): bsgru bya'i ming ni blang ba zhing // bogs dral stong pa la bzung ba// hUM dag gis ni nang spel ba// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// san+na ni rA dza sa do du/ Na yo ni bcas pi rol// thams cad
144a2(rgyud): don phyir sgrub pa las// g.yon nas brtsams te yang dag bris/ re mig rim pa gsum pa yi// mdun du cig dong ro mig la/ hrIHSh+T+rIHces sogs sngags rnams kyis// shar nas brtsams te bri bar bya// de mthar dor ba
144a3(rgyud): re mig la/ re mig brgyad po yang dag bri/ a mu kaM ku ru mA rA ya uts+tsha Ta ya/ ba shI ku ru/ bi dwe ShA ya/ shA ri ta ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ ces pa de lta bu la sogs pa las kyi rje su 'thun pa las dang po oM yig mtha
144a4(rgyud): nam mtha'ang ni ba 'aT do ShaT hUM phaT yi ge ldanas rje// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mthar byed // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar pa'i rgyud
144a5(rgyud): las 'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang gan na rje gshed sku mchog/ zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas/ 
144a6(rgyud): zhe sdang thams cad zad par mdzad// thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gshin rje gshed sku mchog/ gti mug gis mnan 'gro gzigs nas// gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ thugs rje mnga'
144a7(rgyud): ba bcom ldan 'das// phra ma gshin rje gshed sku mchog/ phra mas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad/ thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mtsha/ 
144a8(rgyud): 'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro gzigs nas/ 'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad/ thugs rje mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das/ phrag dag gshin rje gshed sku mchog phrag dog gis mnan 'gro gzin nas/ phrag dag
144b1(rgyud): thams cad zad par mdzad/ byams pa tsa ci kA rab brjod/ de bzhin snying rje phag mo'o// dga' ba dbyangs can ma rab grags// btang snyoms gau rI gzugs can ma// bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyi// rdzogs gyur dkyi
144b2(rgyud): 'khor rnal 'byor pa// snying kha'i sa bon las spro bya// 'dir ni 'grub 'gyur tha tsam med// de nas spyod pa'i mtshan nyid mchog/ 'di las yang dag rab bshad pa// 'jigs byed gshin rje gshang gzugs kyi// sku
144b3(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ping// dgana' chen po'i sa phyogasu// ma nye mchog la zhon bya zhing // sbrul rnams kyis ni rgyun byas nas/ ljags kyi rdo rje bsgom bya ste// gyen 'greng khyud 'phags la sogs pa// dbu
144b4(rgyud): slad mar seng dag tu bya// spyi bong cod pan rnams kyis bskong slar seng po dag byas la/ hrIHSh+T+r-iHla sogs brjod cing // rdo rje dpyu ba yang dag gsar// de nas seng ga'i sgra byas te// gshin rje gshed
144b5(rgyud): dmar rab sbyor las// cung zad nus pa thob pa ni// rol ci bgrod du 'jug par bya// skal pa bzang po gang bya zhing // drug las skyes sogs bla blangs bya// de nas rgyal mtshan khams bltas te
144b6(rgyud): de ni 'o ma rab spang ba// jo ma goms pa'i sems gcig gis// phag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya// phag mo'i gzugasu bsam bya zhing // btsun mo kun la 'dod pa pas// seng ga ltar spyod rnal 'byor pa// 'dod don thams
144b7(rgyud): cad grub par byed// de nas phyag rgyar sgrub pa'i thabs// 'di las yang dag rab bshad bya// sngags chen yi ge gcig po ste// de yi bzlas pas rab brtan pa// hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs sa bon yang dag byung // ma he'i gdong
144b8(rgyud): ni rnam par sgo'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khong mnyam zhugs pa// ma he'i ste dang bsgom par bya// gang sus la 'bigs byed pa// sna tshogs mtshon cha'i rang bzhin can// ma ho'i gdong di sgrub pa la// blo ldan pag rnams las sngam
145a1(rgyud): / de nas rdo rje dbyug pa yi// sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad pa/ hrIHyig sngags ni chen po ste/ ma me chen po la zhon pa'o// 'bus gnyis yang dag rdzogs pa'i phag/ zhal ba'i rdul gyis byugs pa'i
145a2(rgyud): klu ris gyun pa dang sa ma ge/ sa mi da tu nan par/ de su pa pa'i ngos sgyu'i thabs/ 'di las yang dag sa bgadug/ sngags chen bkr-i ldanan/ cab d+hu yig las myong ba/ ma bkra dzin d+da hrAm+b+ha
145a3(rgyud): bsA hA// dgos pa thams cad dab sgrub ping/ 'di las dam tshig sgrub thobs bshad/ sngags kyi dub pa'i bza' ba ni// bzang por rnyed par dga' ba'i zas/ sha chen dang ni rnga 'i dang // glang po che yi khyad par nyid/ @#
145a4(rgyud): rang bzhin khri 'ding // bong bu rnga mo lce spyang nyid// khang khu chen pos lus la byug/ sngon po bsres pa btso bar bya/ 'di ni lus la byugs tsam gyis 'gro ba thams cad dbang du byed/ gi nga rgya che'i
145a5(rgyud): khu ba dang // de bzhin bsil ba'i lom nyid// sau phag bye ma bcas pa 'am/ gsang shing lo ma'i khu bas kyang // 'di mi lus la dril phyis bya// de bzhin rdo rje bdud rtsi tshe// 'di ni rnal 'tsha
145a6(rgyud): mchog rtse'o// rang 'byung me tog ltung bar ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmang po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa dang dam tshig sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
145a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig tsar tsi kA'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rdo rje phag mo'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang // dbyangs can ma'i rnam pa'i
145a8(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / gau rIrI rnam pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mchod pa'i glu 'di brjod par mdzad// kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// khyod ma
145b1(rgyud): kho bo rnam par 'jigs// bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs/ khyod kyis gang mdzadas stengs dang // sad+ma dag dang sa 'og g.yo// chags pas brgyan pa'i khra ba'i yid// gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags// snyun
145b2(rgyud): dmar zhing thung ba ste// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa// rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud che// gar mdzad bde ba chen po khyod// hrIHSh+T+rIHgsang sngags dag gi khyod/ sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sal// snying rje
145b3(rgyud): khro bo rje btsun khrod// gang mdzad 'gro ba rnams la gzigs// de nas bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid mchog/ 'di la sa yang dag rab bshad bya// gang gis bzlas pa'i rab sbyor gyis// rgya chen dngas grub thob par 'gyur
145b4(rgyud): myung ba ma yin bral ba mid// ring ba ma yin thung du min/ sngags ni cung zad thos pa ste/ gshin rje'i slob dpon mi mi mchog/ ma he mi dang glang ba ma// ba lang rang bzhin rta nyid dang / 
145b5(rgyud): bu rnga mo'i rus pa gzung / bzlas pa'i phreng ba rab bsgrub pa// zla bzla nA bcu bzhi la/ sha lnga yis ni byug pa zhing // bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// mchog dngos grub rgyur bzlas te/ 
145b6(rgyud): chos gcig ril bu rnal 'byor pa// mkhas pa gshin rje gshed bsgom pa// yang na mi yi mgo ba ni// khrag dang ldan par rnam bsgom bya// khri phrag tsam gyis 'byung po rnams// mkha' 'gro ma rnam
145b7(rgyud): stong phrag gis// gshin rje gshed kyi rab sbyor las// yi dwags tshogs rnams bsad par ba// zlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag/ de ni las kun bang pa yin/ bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te/ 
145b8(rgyud): ba lnga yis smos ci dgos// nyin re bzla ba so so'am// yang na lo rnams so so la// dbyug go drug bcu rtsa bzhir mkhas// gtong ma drug bcu rtsa bzhi spyod// rtag tu cung zad za ba gang // de bzhin cung zad gong
146a1(rgyud): / 'thung ba// gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi// phud ni gshin rje gshed la dbul// de nas bla mar yon dbul bas// 'di las yang dag rab bshad pa// bdag nyid zhi ba nyid pir dang // las kun grub pa'i
146a2(rgyud): pir du yang // phangs pa med par dbul bas te// bdag nyid dngul gyi rna rgyan dang // gser dang nor dang ma ma dang // de bzhin bu dang chung ma dang // bskyed bang sring mo bu mo dang // rnam pa sna tshogs na bza' nyid// gdugs dang rnga yab
146a3(rgyud): mdzes pa nyid// khang pa khri dang dri bzang dang // de bzhin glu dang rol mo nyid// ral gri dang ni rgyan nyid kyang / bla mang rab dbul brtul zhugs can// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs gshin rje gshed
146a4(rgyud): dmar pa'i rgyud las/ nye bang mkho ba thams cad sgrub tha sa kyi le 'u sa bcwa lnga pa'o// de nas sems can thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa'i don du// dmang ba nyid ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i
146a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i don to// spyan gsum ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum// phya gnyis ni dang sa paM dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir// shes
146a6(rgyud): rab dang 'khyud pa ni stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i sbyor ba laso// klu brgyad ni rnam par shes pa brgyad mtshon pa'i phyir// mgo ba'i phreng bad+ma pad ni/ yi ge lnga bcu'i sbyor ba laso// g.yon na thod pa ni// ye shes lnga'i
146a7(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i ngo song su rdzogs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhid no// g.yas na thug pa ni/ phung pa dang / nyan pangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud ba'i rnam par 'joms pa snying rje'i drang mazhin// g.yon brkyang ban
146a8(rgyud): khams gsum pa rab tu rtogs pa byor// lha ma du phyag gson na dung can khrag dang cud len gyi dum myang ba'i phyir thod para'o// gsas pan dngas pa dang dngos pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcod pa thong gri gun
146b1(rgyud): ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i pir kho bo'i gzugs dang gsus pa 'phang ba nyid// ma ngan las mi 'da' ba nyid las dbu skra sar po gyan du 'greng ba nyid// gru bzhi ni sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'og pa dang / lam gyi
146b2(rgyud): bden pa bzhi rab tu rtogs pa'i phyiro// sgo bzhi ni bdud pa ni kun tu skrag par bad pa'i pi'o// zung bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas yongasu rdzogs pa'i ngi ro// ka ba brgyad ni rmi lam dang / dri za'i grong khyeng dang / brag cha dang / sgyu ma dang
146b3(rgyud): sprul pa dang / smig sgra dang / ma long gi gzugs brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba lta bu brgyad kyi rang bzhin nyid las na mkha' ltar dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i don// gang gis skyes pa rab tu 'jom
146b4(rgyud): pa nyid las drab med pa rnam so// babs za' di srid pa/ dang / snyan par smra ba dang / dod dpyod pa dang / don 'thun pa nyidang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir// de nas rdo rje mkha' gro ma
146b5(rgyud): sgrub thabs 'di las rab bshad pa// mkha' dbyings dang / su gnas pa yis// ri ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog bas pa bya// phyag/ tu rdo rje rnam bsgobs nas// lhag pa dag gzhan rnam dgod pa/ shar du
146b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas ma 'gro ma// pag drug gti mug yang dag mtshungs/ phyag na 'khor lo 'jigs da che// rnal 'bor dkyil 'khong la bsgos pa// lho du rin chen mkha' gro ma// bag drug phram yang dag ma chungs// phag na rin
146b7(rgyud): 'jigs pad che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khong la bsgom pa// nub tu pad+ma mkha 'gro ma// phag dag pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// da di las kyi mkha' gro ma/ dkyil 'khor snying po ral gri ma'o// maM la sogs pa'i zung ba'i ru/ lha mo rnam
146b8(rgyud): sgom brtul zhugs can// sgeg mo phreng ba gang de bzhin// glu ma dag kha bang nyid// de nas sgra skyong bsapa bang ba// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yi// dang pa tho ba dbyug pa dang // pad+ma de bzhin ral gri'o// oM bud+d+ha DA ki ri/ oM badz+ra
147a1(rgyud): kin/ oM rat+na ShA kin/ oM badz+ra hA gar/ oM sa.a d+na had/ ma mdog zung du'o// oM su ga rma oM ratA hUM oM pad+ma \u0f7f/ oM 'adz+ram zhes gsungs bcom ldan rdo rje ca/ rdo rje mkha 'gro ma'i sgrub tham
147a2(rgyud): ring po nas thos grub don du// rdo rje mkha' gro ba sgom pa// de lta rab tu 'grub pa'i sngags kyi tshob tu gyur pa ni/ oM A kA sha tsar badz+ra DA ki ni swA hA/ de nas rab tu bshad ba gzhan/ rdo rjes 'og sgrub pa'i thabs/ 
147a3(rgyud): 'og 'jug pa sgrub don du// gnod padzes rdo rje bsgom pa ba// phyag drug sku mdog sngon po mdangs// pag tu gtun shing dgod 'dub// dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus ni// 'di dgod rab tu bsgom par bya// shad du spyan pa
147a4(rgyud): dgo ba ste// de bzhin lho ru yA ma kI/ nub tu lha mo gos dkar mo// bang du sgrol ma dgod par ba// ma tog 'dug pa mngam dr-i/ ma la sogs pa rnamasu dgod// tho ba la sogs sgo rnams la/ sbrul
147a5(rgyud): kyi rgyan dngas rags te/ las rgya tshig mthong bam 'khang la 'di ltar bskam 'dub rdo rjes 'og rnal 'bong ldan khu ga barmi lal du shes 'gyur/ dadas rgyal po bdud dkyil 'khang/ 
147a6(rgyud): las yang dag rab bshad pa// mkha' la spyod nyid sgrub don tu// rta mchog rab tu bsgrub par ba// phya gnyis pa dang zhal gcig pa/ sku mdog ljang ku 'jigs rung ba/ nyi ma'i steng du yang dag bzhugs// shin tu 'ji
147a7(rgyud): byed rta yizha la// g.yas pa ral gri khu chung te/ g.yon pa'i phyag ni thod pa ste// oM puM phu hi hi/ sngags 'di bzlas bya shes rab can// rta mchog rab tu grub pa'i phyir// shar du rdo rjepa rnams bas ma~M// lho phyogasu yang
147a8(rgyud): myung 'gro ma// rlung tu rgyal po bdud pa ste// byang du rtamachog dag dbang bya// gca ba'onal dang phyag dgis// thams cad g.yas kyis bsgom pa nyid/ sngags 'di mis ni thams cad nyid / spro ba dag tu rab tu grags// gling
147b1(rgyud): bu'i wang rnga rnga dang / rnga zlab yang ni zung du'o// ba lang rna ba glang chen sna// bzhin bzang bzhin ngan de bzhin du// gtun shing dang ni dgra sta dang / lcags kyu zhags pa nyid kyang ste// gang la sogs tshul rnal 'byor las// sgra
147b2(rgyud): rtag tu bsam par bya// g.yon du ya ba saM bsam pa// de bzhin g.yas su rabartag so// rta mchog sngags ni ji lta ba// rdo rjes 'og g.yo bar byed// rta mchog bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor las/ khams gsum mkha' la
