184b3(rgyud): ma dang bu mo 'am/ rnal 'byor ma dab rnga mo dang / gzhan yang nye dum rnams kun// gtum ma de bzhin brab za ba/ mi mo'i tshogs ni 'dig sbyid/ cho ga bzang pos kun bsnyen bya// ji ldar dpe ba mi shes pa/ dbye
184b4(rgyud): rje btsun chog shes pa// sgrub po mnar med 'khrid par byed// 'dir ni 'jig rten 'gal ba nyid// 'jig rten pha rol bdes pa bcom// de phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas// blo bzang legs pas yang
184b5(rgyud): ngag 'phyas// sal 'gro ma sngags bzhin sbas nas/ rdzi lngar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// yi dang rjes 'thun phyog su ni/ bar 'cha ba kun spangs te// rang sems dga' ba'i 'dod
184b6(rgyud): rab dang de dag yang dag blangs/ dpan nying dub pa medadu byas nas/ ji srid rnyeng ba'i gos dang ni// gnyis kyis brtan par bsgom par bya// blo bzang phan tshur sbyong ba las/ bud med rang la bangon phyogs byas/ zhugs
184b7(rgyud): nas gnyis dag phan tshun du// chags pas brtan par brtags par bya// da nas balnga dang khar brjod pa/ rtse gcig yid kyis gnas par bya// de bzhin de nyid las brjod pa// bde ba'i gzi brjid shin tu byed/ des
184b8(rgyud): bu dang khyim thab khyongs bdag la spu dang pa zhing ba/ khyod nga'i ma dang rku ma ste/ rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo dang skyes bu bdun gyi 'bangs pa yid// khyod zhal can gyi 'bangs dang brad// smra ba de 'drang brjod par bya
185a1(rgyud): / kha gzi brjid byed pa'i mchog/ khyod nga'i pa brkung pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dang tsha bo dang / nga ni khyod kyi dus kun 'bangs// mdu thung rnon po mchog tu gzhol// brtse ba'i ma yis bdag la gzigs
185a2(rgyud): bsnyen pa'i lta bos nges rtogs pas/ de bdag skyes bu mthong nas ni// yang dang yang du'o byas nas/ yi ge gsum ni stong bar byed// rdo rje'i sbrang rtsi mtshungs pa'i khrag// brlas 'jigs par bya'o de'i// mthong nas mig
185a3(rgyud): rnam par 'khrul/ gdong yang dri yis byugasu byas nas/ de nas nu mar brtsi dbang bya/ bstan pa kun tu khang de'i khang/ rag nas kha du skyid par byeng / gas par byed cing smra bar bya// nga yis 'di 'drang brjod pa
185a4(rgyud): bdag gi a duts+tshid+he ni// mtho byung bza' ba rnam sda dzad/ pra bya/ lte ba byin ci log buM ga thams cad mthong ba'i phyir/  sog reg/ cing mthong ba las phyogs gsum gyis// med med kyi
185a5(rgyud): bar ri mo nag po mthong ba laso// yan lag thams cad bsil dza mthong ba las nyi ma bco brgyad na'o// khrus byas po byas ma thog skams pa na nyi ma bcu yis// lus dri ngan pa las zla ba
185a6(rgyud): gnyis na'o// gcin g.yon du 'khor ba las mtshan mo gsum gyiso// lus phra mor mthong bas zla ba drug so// sna'i rtse mo ma mthong ba las nyi ma gcig la'o// phyogs kyi 'di dag shes pa'i pir/ de bzhin na
185a7(rgyud): 'byor pa sgom dang // bsam gtan brtson 'grus pas sngags bzlas byas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'bad pas bklag/ bsrung ba lnga sogs bklag pa yang / rang ngam gzhan gyis bya ba'o// nyin rer tshogs la zas
185a8(rgyud): dang ni// dge 'dun zas dang de bzhin gzhan/ dman dang zhan la rjes brtsa bas/ sems can rnams la rtag tu bya// zhes pa sna tshogs rgyu du gsungs/ zhes/ gshin rje gshed dmang po'i rgyud le'u 'i shu ga
185b1(rgyud): kye bcom ldan 'das/ mu sngags ded pa rnams thams cad la snying brtse ba med par 'dod pa'i don lhung len pa dang / gang zhig ngag gdug pa thams cad du gsod pa lhur len pa de rnams kyi bsam pa la thugs
185b2(rgyud): brtse bar gyur pas/ de dag mnga'o bdagis bdag la gsung du gsol/ dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya// phyi nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga sbyin/ bye brag sme ba 'bad pas bslab// mdo sde pa yang de bzhin// dag pa
185b3(rgyud): bcu la goms gyur cing // bla ma la gus 'dul la mos// dbu ma'ang slong du bcug nas ni/ sngags ni kun tu brtsam par bya// gsang sngags las shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud// myur du phun sum chags pa'i rgyu
185b4(rgyud): mgo' sbyong ba 'angs myur du// bslab pa thos nas spyod yul bzang / bdungad bzhi rnams spangs rnal 'byor pas// lha oM sbyor bas gnas par bya/ staras gcod pa dang the la skor byas nas nyi ma gzus
185b5(rgyud): zin pa'i dus su mi bskyod pas gtor te// de nas rkang gnyis kyis mnan nas sngags bzlas par bya'o// gsang sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na thig le 'tshong // gshin rje'i stobs
185b6(rgyud): su 'gro te de gsal bar bye// bdagi lte bar bsgom pa'i yan ngag/ gang gang skad cig las brtsams te// de yi nyi mas bsgrub par bya// nyi ma ste yi mthar thug ste// log par slu ba'i 'jig rten las// 
185b7(rgyud): legs sbas rab tu gsal ba de// de nyid 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor ma kun de 'dadi bstad/ bzlas brjod 'bub breg cig tu brjod/ brtul po yis ni 'bub drag lnga// gang zhig rgyud gsum
185b8(rgyud): rang gi/ rang bzhin las ni 'dum phrag ca na// de nas shin tu chung ba 'di/ lha mo dkun gsal bar bstan/ dpal ldan gshed rdza ga shadabang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal ba le'u shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// gang gi rgyu
186a1(rgyud): rgyu sa la dums nas mas la la na ga 'i rjeb shed dam ma chur kyi rgyal
186a2(rgyud): ba chen po thang ba mo tsA ba'i bka 'drin gyis bsgyings pa khod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis chos kyi rje khro bu lo zla ba'i gdanas gnas gsang dgon par bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// 
186a3(rgyud): rgyud 'di 'gyung las 'brad pa'i bsod nams kyis// nag pa'i rtsa lag ma lus kun bcob te// bstan pa'i bya ba yid bzhin 'grub pa dang / mthar thug 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gyur cig/ rgya gar ska du/ shrI d+ha ga bAr e
186a4(rgyud): dzaMT ma hAHn+ta badz+ran ma/ bad sad/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bang dgis zas pa dus gci/ 
186a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi gnas rdo rje'i ri bo'i zom na bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jigs byang rgyal po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdong can dang / ma
186a6(rgyud): bkod pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i de kho na nyid shin tu sbas pa'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par
186a7(rgyud): nges pa/ rigs dang tshogs dang dam tshig dang brtul zhugs chen po phyag rgya rgya mtsho lta bu'i tshul la gnas pa/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i bde ba chen po la rnam par rol pa/ thabs shes rab bla na med pa'i kha
186a8(rgyud): sgyong las nges para'abyung ba'i ye shes can/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kunas sdang ba dang bag la nyal 'joms pa la mkhas pa dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag 'dzi
186b1(rgyud): masams ched cu ma gams pa ldangs la bcugasanasapa lam byung te/ ma ldan 'as la 'dis kyis pasams rje dang drug kyir/ darje rgyal ba kun bdag so/ sangs rgyas thams cad byed pa
186b2(rgyud): mtha 'dechen ma khangs bdag la gsus dring gsum 'gribs pa sal mdzad cig/ mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa/ zhus can kun skyab rgya chen po/ 'dren pa khyod lab bstan du gsol/ bla gras rnying rje bstan ldan
186b3(rgyud): thabs ni gang zhig mngon bsgoms na// sku lnga phyag rgya 'grub 'gyur ba// gtso ba de ni 'dod bshad gsol// rdo rje dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba// 'bum phrag rgyud chen las gsungs pa// ral ba gcig phrang dkyil 'kho
186b4(rgyud): gcod sbas pa gang lag brtsa bas gsungaso// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i bdag po rab tu dgyes pas 'dzum pa mdzad// zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog lnga phyung ste
186b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te slar 'dus pas 'khod gyi dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyangs te bcom ldan 'das nyid la ba skor ba lan gsum byas nas spyi gtsug tu nub pa
186b6(rgyud): gyur to// de nas yang dbu'i gtsug tor gyi nor bu las zla ba dang kun da lnga bu'i 'od zer dkar po byung ste/ dbu'i steng du dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i rnam par bkod pa mngon sum du ma
186b7(rgyud): danas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'byung ba'i mdzod/ rdo rje sgeg pa chen po ral pa gcig pa'i gsang ba mcho ga zhus pa leg so legs so// rdo rje 'chang 'di ni khyod kyi dus yin zhing 'didi khyid kyi
186b8(rgyud): snang ba pyad pa mid/ nga ma tsu rdordzo po bos 'di du byang chub sems dpa' skang ma la dga' ba zhes bya bapar gyur ban/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes ral pa gcig po'i gsang bltan ci
187a1(rgyud): rnam par rol pas sems can dpag tu med pa smin par byas pa rje su drodo// de bas na khyod kyis snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi ngas bda' byung ba'i rtog pa 'di lags
187a2(rgyud): par nyon la yid la zung cig dang ngas khyod la bshad// byang chub sems dpa' phag rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi ljang nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM AHhUM/ oM oM hU~M trUM hU~M/ oM A
187a3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tatA sA rA dz+wA la hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHsarba ta thA ga to mA tri badz+ra da tA bA ya sar baM hUM phaT/ swAhA/ a~M AHbadz+ro d+hA ra hU~M phaT oM AHbadz+ra pA ya hU~M phaT/ oM AHbadz+ra tsakra a hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A
187a4(rgyud): badz+ra rat+na aM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra badz+ra u hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra bi shwa ya hUM phaT/ swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra hi mo ha oM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra war+N+Na I hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ra gra u hUM pha

187a8(rgyud): AHbadz+ram N+Da la~M hU~M Ta swAhA/ oM swAb+hA ba shu Sh+Tas pra d+hi mA b+ha ba shud+d+ho.a badz+ra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+heNeHbadz+ra shudz+dzadz+dza/ ma~M moka shud+d+ha/ sar+b+ba d+harmAHyig shu d+d+haH/ rdo rjem bskyod pal pa gcig/ sa baspyod pa
187b1(rgyud): bcas// rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje dang // rdo rje zhags pa rnam par sgom// gti mug bag chags 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor gnas/ ri rab nyi zla ba dan las// 'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin do// khams bzhir ba long / 
187b2(rgyud): bi bang dang // dri mchog zhal zas byung ba/ gzugs sgra dri ro rdo rje ma// mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ phyogs dral da bza' chos 'byung dang / maN+Dal mar ma las skyes pa// reg chos zhing dang sdang ba yis
187b3(rgyud): sgo ba'i lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu songs gyur pas// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs sgom// rang mtshan ka pA las rab mdzes// gtum drug chang tshing lakhrigs pa dang / 'ung 'ung 'bar bas
187b4(rgyud): pa dang / ke dus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyi// phogasu g.yon bskar gyis legs gnas/ ha har dgod pa dbang ldan du/ byin zang dpal gyi nags 'tsha'o// mun pa mi bzad bden bral du// rlung duka
187b5(rgyud): li ki lir sgrogs// mi mnyam med par zur bzhi yin// dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ bsam gtan bzhin rta ngabs bzhi/ rnam thar brgyad/ pir ka ba brgyad/ byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyi
187b6(rgyud): dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed// phyogs bzhir tshang med pa'i yin te/ pad+ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs/ rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag pa// de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad// zla ba me long nyi mnyam nyid// sa bon mtshan ma kun tu
187b7(rgyud): rtog/ yongs gyur bya ba sgrub pa ste/ der rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes yi/ lnga rung dang ni drim pazhid// chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad / rnam pa ni tshong ba rnam dag lnga/ ye shes bdag nyid 'khor la'o// dgas/ 
187b8(rgyud): dang pra khyud 'i khrig pa dag/ bu mamo ma gong dong // ka mo tro ko ka la ka ti// brags sun si ma ku/ ma'i tu rme / a i u e o oM/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par srid/ rnam par 'joms da ma
188a1(rgyud): mtshan bral// dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid// dgod dang brang 'khyud khrig pa dang // bde cher dag phyir dbus pa dang / gsang ba shes rab bad ba che// 
188a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po thob par 'gyur// dzaHhUM ba hoHdmigs pas du ba dang gzhan goms 'did// rnam par mi rtogs de bzhin bsgom/ rmi lam dmakha'i sbyor ba ni// zhi mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzhag/ spyi bo snying kha lde
188a3(rgyud): ni zla ba pad+ma nyi stad du/ haM dang hUM dang a zhes pa// yi ge bde gsal mi rtog rgyud// snying po 'pho dang thim dang gnas/ 'gyur dang 'gul dang 'phar ba dang // mdab bsnun bsdu dang 'gro 'ong sbyar// lus med sems
188a4(rgyud): can ci bded 'gro// bsgribs ras 'pho zhing 'bar bar byed// dbang du byed pa kha sbyar sgom// 'dun pas sgrub dang sa bon bsgyur// 'bed dran par dor dor sgrub 'gyur// cha 'di yin de bzhin du// nying mtsha bas sbyor
188a5(rgyud): srid mtshams yang // rnal 'byor rgyal po thabs ldan pas/ bad chen sa gsum ba blag 'gro// srid bzhi dag dang nges pa dang / rten 'bral la// byung dang zlog dang bsad// ni rgyas dbang dang zhil so/ 
188a6(rgyud): 'di la tha tsham mi byar/ gnyis sbyar rgyun mo 'chad bde dang / kun sa 'od gsal lhan cig skyes// bung bas me tog rtsi ltar ni// rnam pa kun tu sgrub pa'o// oM a kAr mu khang sar+b+ba d+ha rA NA A d+ya nu ta pan+da tratasar+b+ba
188a7(rgyud): ni pra b+hA ba hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor de dag thams cad rab tu yi rangs te/ tshig su bcad pa 'dog gis mngon
188a8(rgyud): ran ci ched pa ma rgyal khyab pa rnams cad kyis man pa la 'dzin par gyur / 'jog rtson pa ma ldan legs/ 'gros ca sangs rgya slang/ nga nying 'dzin rdza ma das min
188b1(rgyud): kyis byams chen srung bstan mdzad// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan legs/ sems can sdug bsngal bsgral sladu// zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas par// brtse chen rnam par 'phrul par mdzad/ bde chen rgyal po bco
188b2(rgyud): ldan lags// lus can bde dor sgrub smad// zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhol bar// dgyes chen kun tu sdang mdzad lags// gtso bo rdo rje rgyal po lags// skye bo dab pa ngal ba so'i phyir// bza' cig rgyun chad mi
188b3(rgyud): bzhugs par// ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub pa rmad// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs pal po che de dag dang // rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsa
188b4(rgyud): pa'i nges par gyur pa thabs dang shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du med pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas bzhin du thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i
188b5(rgyud): du cho 'phrul chen po dum bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i ga sang ba chen po rgyud kyi rgyal po nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa
188b6(rgyud): 'chang ba la sogs pa dag ni ngadang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyu ro// rdo rje 'bar ba khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor lnga bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang de'i pi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyu ro// dran pa tsam
188b7(rgyud): gyis che bas thams cad du ming byed par 'gyur/ mi'am mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa thams cadang / 'tshe ba dang / yang ba dang / brakra mi shes pa thams cad 'byung bar ba 'gyur// gang gi khyim rnas
188b8(rgyud): ba de yang mchodag rten du bya bar 'gyur/ rigs pa dang dngos grub thams cad kyi gter tshad med par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / lnga da
189a1(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rted yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstad// dpal bcob ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa brtag pa rdo rje'i rgyud
189a2(rgyud): chen po bla na med pa rdzog s+ho// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI tra ga Shabi tra A n+da'i bka' dri la brten das rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po badz+ra shr-i kha la ru tra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong byabs pa'i dpal gyis
189a3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar ska du/ shrI tsan+da gu h+ya ti la ka nA sa ma hA tan+t+ra ra dzA/ bod skad/ dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
189a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad ngamacheng char gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phag gang dang bcas pas thal po khong stod du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la gtsug gi 'dud pas gsol
189a5(rgyud): ba btab pa/ dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba yi/ zla gsang thig le dga' byed pa// gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyai gshadu gsol// sems can kun gyis ma skyes / 
189a6(rgyud): skye dang ma skyes rnang spang ba'i// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab 'byor pa'i// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ dri med na mkha' dang 'dra ba'i// rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng byas te// 
189a7(rgyud): mchen pos dbang bskung ba'o// chos kyi longs spyad yang dag 'byung / pad+ma mang sa mchog mdag/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang 'che/ thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi'i mchog/ A dang lang ni yang dag ldan/ yang
189a8(rgyud): dag mdzes pa 'gyi ba'i 'gros/ sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che// zla gas 'thig lo'i mchog nyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos de bzhidas/ 
189b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang pa'i gas sa pa btab pa mkhyen nas/ 'dag pacan par ye shes rdorjezhes pa bang kyang 'dzin pa mams par dugs ngas ca sa gsung bar btsun ma/ des de ban pa shags pas
189b2(rgyud): dab slang du byung sa yang zhus nas bcom ldan 'ongs kun tu bzang po chen pa del de yin nyid ngas kyis bsgrub te ba zhes par mdzod/ oM hUMHaHma skye ya shes 'de pa mchog dang ldan pa'i rol pa
189b3(rgyud): gsol/ a la la ho// sebs dpa' bad mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams la bslang ba'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i bde mchog mnga' mdzad pazhengs shig banabs// mchog tu gsang ba'i bde ba rol ci dam bcam
189b4(rgyud): 'jig rten sngal/ byang dub skye gnas bdes chog gyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gang mdzod cig a la lan sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang dang bskams can mongs gzing ba la// tshangs med pa na
189b5(rgyud): mchog rgyar dang ldan pas thabs kyis bskul zhig par mdzod/ 'gro kun mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo rang byang chub lam ston cing // bdesagabadud rtsi khyad par chad par 'dus pa'i tshogs la
189b6(rgyud): stsol cig/ a la la ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig la bskul
189b7(rgyud): bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig le las shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad
189b8(rgyud): gseng ba'i snying bzla ba'i thig la'i dbusu rgyas par byas te/ dam pa'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang ba byas/ steng dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa mad pa'i ri dang / sen rnams la gsal pa
190a1(rgyud): tu sa pacan pa sa sa pa byas nga du gas sa ga mas pacan pan de 'i bdag pa rnal pags
190a2(rgyud): thog lo dbus da 'dabang bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di rid gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba ra// gang mdzad cing rang rang gi
190a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin tu dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig la'i dbusu mchog tu gsang ba'i shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdabang gcig tu sdug por gyur pa bsgrubs te/ rang
190a4(rgyud): rang gi sku rung rid kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs gnas yang da bang byung bangar gyur te/ denas la la ni spyan pad+ma 'bang ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur zhing bzlog ste srid ngas g.yo bas/ @
190a5(rgyud): rgyas tshul gyis gang mdzad cing // sangs rgyas rnal 'a byo ma dkyil du// rdo rje rab dgyes gdon mi za// sems dpa' chel dgyes mdzad cing // sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis/ @
190a6(rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur// smid ma bsgyur zhing zhabs bsgyur ba// spyan bsgyur shin tu gnon pa yin// sor mo'i mtha' ma rnam bsgyur ba// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gang mdzad de/ rdo rje tshil mnyes mdzad cing
190a7(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byang ma dkyil du/ skad cig skad cig bskul ba yis/ bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par gyur/ brjid pa'i zhabs dang rin chen dbu/ dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing // zhal gyi dkyil 'khong napa
190a8(rgyud): bsgyung bas//  byed chen po mya ngan mdzad/ dung khrod man chags dgos/ bad+ma'i spyad gyis gzigs mdzad cing / bde ba bdag pa chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mdzes pa mdzad/ shin tu dgyes gas
190b1(rgyud): bdangs pa// pad+mo dmar la pa mdzad de// 'dod chags bul dgyes rnam bsgyur bar// pad+mo dra bas gar mdzad cing // pad+mo rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjid pa'i sbyar gyis kun gzigs te// bde ba che la mnyas mdzad cing
190b2(rgyud): bcom ldan pad+mor gnas par gyur// phag gi rtse mor sor ro'i mthar/ rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing // phyag sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis// glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i spyan gyis long long pos
190b3(rgyud): sna tshogs bde bad gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyi mnyes mdzad cing // sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa
190b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che gsang ba dang / bad+mo dang las kyi gsang ba chen po tha
190b5(rgyud): kyi bzhed pa/ bde ba chen po zhes bya ba// 'od zer chen po sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'dig thams cad la snang bas
190b6(rgyud): sdang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le la stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyis zla ba'i thig le'i dbus 'od zer das dgyes par bskyed cing drangs nas bcug ste/ gcig tu byas na
190b7(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba rnam par rgyal bzhis bya bar tong 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig
190b8(rgyud): le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi rgyal ba shin tud gyes pa'i bdab chen pa nyid kyi sku da / gsung dang thugs rdo rdul gsungs/ dkyil 'khor rgya ni nul gyi su// mog sbyang bas snga dra byas te/ zag da 'a
191a1(rgyud): // par dkyil 'khor ga dang / spyong pa'i gar gyis gdub zhing // ji ltar yang dag brtag bdubs/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor de khor// zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang / 
191a2(rgyud): brtag par nus pa ma yin// dkyil 'khong ye shes kyis brtags pa/ snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ lha yi sbyong bas rgyas btab pas// cho ga shes pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi da
191a3(rgyud): yang dag ldan// thig bzhi yongasu bris pa te// ka ba brgyad pachog yang dag gnas/ kun tu yongasu zlus pa ste/ zla ba de yi dbus bsam pa// bde ba chen po mi phyed pa// gtso bo de ste bri bar bya// de nas tshig drag bcas
191a4(rgyud): ba ste/ yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yi/ yi ge mchog tu bde ba ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang drag 'byung // shes rab can gyis de mdun du/ mi phyed yid byung dri ba te// drag pa' rog dang 'dred par bcas/ 
191a5(rgyud): yis gtsug tu byas pa'o// de mi lho yi phyog su ni// mi smrab mi ga mchog/ phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog thams cad// bsgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bri/ ha dang rang ldan tsheg drag bcas/ bzhi
191a6(rgyud): mis ni dpung byas pa// sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ga ni// nub kyi phyog su bri bar bya'o// khro ze'i yig ye shes che/ yi ga'i phyag rgya rmad byung ba/ brjid du bcas pa dgod pa yi// byang gi phyag su bri bdu
191a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad mchog dag dang // dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub bying// nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ gang gyis chud pas rdzog
191a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas/ sems can mchog gis ston pad na/ de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes
191b1(rgyud): chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la gang mdzad cing // rab tu spros pa spyan gdangs nas/ zhabs dang zhabs kyi gdon pa yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'jugs pas mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyi
191b2(rgyud): rje pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan// mdzes pa'i spyad tshugs rnams bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas gang mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen
191b3(rgyud): po dpa' bo la// dbyangs 'di yis de bskul mdzad cing / shin tu dgyes tha dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// dkyil 'tsha
191b4(rgyud): mchog tu dgyes pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// rngam pa kun tu skye med pa'i// bde bas rol cing rkub mdzad pa'i/ bdag cag gzu kyi dam dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyung ba med pa'i yid/ 
191b5(rgyud): bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis grub mchog ldan pa bde spyad bde la rol par mdzad// 'dir glu ru blangs pa yis
191b6(rgyud): shin tu sring bas ma ngan 'das/ dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams/ dkyil 'khor 'di la byir gyis rlob/ da nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa spyad ud
191b7(rgyud): 'kha bye ba zu dri smo pa dang chu dam par 'gyur ba/ klog dang su rlabs bzhid du/ 'gyur ba'i rnam pang gdan pas nyid kyi skud nga gsung dang thugs rdo rje de khan nyid 'di gsungs/ dkyilal lad kyil
191b8(rgyud): sa phyos du megs drugs lags/ dkyim 'khon rje'i bachag med de/ dag nyid byung bab lags pa yi/  rjid kyis badzin pa mi/ tsal kha kra ga pa dra pa / 
192a1(rgyud): / medzes/ byang chub sems mchog 'dra la mid/ dza dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khod na// mdzes pazlab khamapa mi// mawing ka'i 'bang ba kun rgyas pa/ me da zung gis zhus pa bzhin/ shin tu dgyes
192a2(rgyud): mchog sgrub pa// rdo rje rin tshon dkyil 'khor ni// dga' bad dkyil 'khob cwa brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa'i nye ba bzhin// dkyil 'kho dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa// pad+mo'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra// mdab ma brgyad po
192a3(rgyud): gyes pa yi// ge sar zla bas mdzes byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa/ rdo rje'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum te// rab du 'bar ba me dang 'dra// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas
192a4(rgyud): pa// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag bad+yab/ skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' sa N+Di de'i sgrub pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang bzhi sa nas brjid pa'i ngo gang dgis
192a5(rgyud): gar mdzad cing glu dang sil snyan gyis gling bu dang pi bang dang / rdza rnga dang / dunaH/ dang / kha na wa dang / ba li ka dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnapa sna tshogs kyis kun tu brdung ba dang / sil snyad la so
192a6(rgyud): pa'i rnam par rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / thag pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das
192a7(rgyud): bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin la bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas pas pad+mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad g.yon du btud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar mdzad pa'i
192a8(rgyud): dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad// shin tu bde ba'i byams pa kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' bas/ byang chub chen po snying por 'gro ba sgrol bas skyo yid mi mnga' ste// 'thun pa'i lam ston nyon mongs drug la
192b1(rgyud): bsgral pa'i phyir/ dam kha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs// e ma'o bde ba kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing banabs/ sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku 'id stong pas tshag
192b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos nyid rje bzhin de la reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston cing / snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro ba thams cad sgom// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dpal gyi snying po gzugasu bstan te/ rigs lnga'i ga
192b3(rgyud): rnams mnyes mdzad cing // dgyes pas drangs la banabs shing rab tu dgyes pas rol mo mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba mnos te bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gog med pa'i
192b4(rgyud): tshul dang rnam par ldaran/ gling rgyan pa rgyu dang bcas nas pade bachen pa spyad pa tshas yi dam ldar bzhin/ dkris pa mchog dpa la sprul pa'i lham skye mche dang / ral pas 'dus pa'i dmas la pa de sachog ma
192b5(rgyud): da pags ni ma m+bu thas bamachams/ ldan pa mi skyeb cag padi sa chang pa pa di sngal bkun kyal 'dabral ba byas pa
193a1(rgyud): // gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye bar gnas nas yang du skyes kyi mdab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyad gyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pad
193a2(rgyud): bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ yang chad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med
193a3(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzid dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshog
193a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cadang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshan dang dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po
193a5(rgyud): g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par 'dren par byed pa dang 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / da mkha' la 'gro ba chen po'i tshogs/ 
193a6(rgyud): grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrogs par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs la byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang
193a7(rgyud): namakha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnam par bad ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gang mdzad pa dang rnam par 'gyur pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas rna
193a8(rgyud): 'byung ba dang bcas pas 'degs shing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'bral ba'i phyogs gang mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pas
193b1(rgyud): ba dang / spyod pa da mi spyod par bcas pa'i rnams dang / kun tu 'dong ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes
193b2(rgyud): bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa// bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang / de bzhin lha yi de nyid // sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid ni// de yis dkyil 'khor
193b3(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das// rtog da mi rtog rnam spangs pa/ 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnams
193b4(rgyud): spyod pa// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag na mkha' 'dra ba yis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin/ 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu mi pad+ma dam
193b5(rgyud): 'dra rang sems bsod nams shin tu chags// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin// gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pa'i// gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba// sems ni chu dang bskul byed pa
193b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang // pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / namakha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / na mkha' laM 'gro ba
193b7(rgyud): chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa'
193b8(rgyud): mchog/ kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs mchog gi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba spyong che ba// rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med// 'jig gsum bde
194a1(rgyud): / mchog thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// rin chen pad+mo sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba gang mdzad pa/ rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du// rnam dag dkyil
194a2(rgyud): 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad gang dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+ma'i sor mo'i mdab ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid pag tu
194a3(rgyud): bcas pas 'grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs par bshad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa
194a4(rgyud): la 'degs shing g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyisa.oM hUM a la la la to// kun tu sdang zhing mo chags par// mi chags pa'i bde mchogs/ bdag gi rnal 'byor gzungs kyi
194a5(rgyud): rnams// stobs shing bdeb sbyin mdzad pas/ a la la la to// bsam gyis mi khyab dam kha'i rang bzhin te/ bzhings shing gzhan la stongs lagru ba mdzod/ chags pas ma~M gos dngas pa yi/ 
194a6(rgyud): bkun la rag par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol// de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs chen pos bskul bas thugs sa dbang gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen
194a7(rgyud): kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i gang sna tshogs shin tu
194a8(rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnon pag mdzad// shin tu dgras pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis mgur len// rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bshad pa chen pos
194b1(rgyud): bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil na// oM ma hA su kha hUM zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug ma phyung // steng du zla gam ldan pa
194b2(rgyud): yin// gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu/ mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa// ye shes gsal bar rnal 'byor ma'o// A li ka li 'dren bya ba// dbusu ri mo brtag byas te// de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu// khro bo gnyis po mchog
194b3(rgyud): bsam bya/ 'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o// 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // bsod nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur// a li gnyis dbus ri mor bri/ ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan// de sngang
194b4(rgyud): zla gam thig le dga'// mgon 'jug gnyi su gzhan yang traM// 'di ni don da/ ma gsal ba ste// rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin// dran pas bsod nams 'thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par bad/ a
194b5(rgyud): l-i gnyis dang ldan pas te// chag drag yig gnyi su bshad/ 'don rab dang / 'akun tu chags/ chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po bskal ba chen tha yaM// cho ga drag po dang bcas pa gzhan/ sangs rgyas
194b6(rgyud): kun gyi a li dzi // sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la' yang na gzhan/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pad na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ 'di ni dkyil 'a
194b7(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog/ yi ge'i phyag rgya'i mngon gnas pa'i// 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// a ma'o bde ba ye shes tsho// de yi ye shes tshe 'di la// 'dod pad bde ba bsten byed cing
194b8(rgyud): 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/ khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po yi sems can kun/ tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grug zla gsang 'thig legs
195a1(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi
195a2(rgyud): gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzogaso// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du byu
195a3(rgyud): dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas/ gang dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba gnyi su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba
195a4(rgyud): 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'dabs par gyur to// bde bad chen po bshad pa shod// bad ba chen po bshad pa shod/ gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dgyes pa chen po bsha
195a5(rgyud): bshod// khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung // khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste/ khyod las bde byang sdug bsngal dang / khyod las khams gsuM ma thams cad 'byung // khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang
195a6(rgyud): khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang // khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang // khyod las byang chub bla yod 'byung / khyod las na mkha' rlung dag dang // khyod las gzi brjid me yi khams// khyod las de bzhin rku dang
195a7(rgyud): sa khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun// khyod las sangs rgyas dpa' chen po// yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang // khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs// byang chub sede' sems
195a8(rgyud): dpa' chen dang / ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung / khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // khyod las dri ba da pa ng+ga da/ khyod las rin chen tshad med te// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung / khyod las phyag rgya sngan kyi rnams khyod las / 
195b1(rgyud): snying las 'byung / de nas bco ldan nas spyad pa 'dzums pang srid pa brkyang ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang nal 'khyong mtshad ma mol
195b2(rgyud): rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dpagazhan yang lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lngam yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho
195b3(rgyud): chen po dang yi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'das pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos// nyid kyi snying ka'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan pa'i phag rdo rje su rag+sa
195b4(rgyud): ba rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i lta bas 'khor thams ca dazil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs pad+mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge de'i thig le'i dkyil nas phyung ste kun tu sdang ba byin gyis brlabs nas
195b5(rgyud): tud gyes pa gdod mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gas ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs dza rje las byung ngo // dang po'i yige bcu gsum pa/ thig lang bcas pa bas
195b6(rgyud): byas te/ bde chen tshul bzhin bzhag byos la/ gzhan gyis mi byed thig ler bcas/ yi ge drug pa 'drad pa ru/ tshul bzhin 'og tu yongasu bdag/ 'di gsang ba chen po ste/ rmad byung mi ge'i phag rgya'o// 
195b7(rgyud): bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin/ ye shes kyi ni ngas rgya 'dis/ skad cig snyi'i pos rgyas pa yin// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa pa stad pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// 
195b8(rgyud): mchen po bskul byed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs par byed// yi ge ye shes grub pa yis/ ye shes dbang phyug nyi du 'gyur/ 'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che// mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed/ 
196a1(rgyud): sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po reg pa la// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'jobs bde ba'o// shes rab ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub myung du 'thob 'gyur te// 
196a2(rgyud): ma 'bub drag brgyas bskor cing // sems dpa' chen po de dang rtse/ rdo rje pad+ma panyam sbyor bas/ thal mo darkyang ste rol pa yis/ tshe dang lang tshe skal dang ldan// drad ba tsam gyis 'thob por 'gyur// 'dod pa yis ni dgos
196a3(rgyud): ba'i rnams// myur ba nyid 'grub par 'gyur// 'og dang stang gi namakha' la// bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug na su// stobs ched de 'dir 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la gnod bde// byang chu/ 
196a4(rgyud): bar ni gdon mi bya// bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas/ gzhom zhing de bzhin mang ba yi/ rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams// rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad bsgral/ bdeb chen po gtong ba yis/ skad cig nyid gsol
196a5(rgyud): byang grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che// dpa' bo chen pos dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par / rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po/ gnod byed stobs kyis dgon
196a6(rgyud): gnas par// rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis/ gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya// mtshon cha lnga yis rnams gnod pas// gzhan gyi bud bde brtsed par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas
196a7(rgyud): pa'i sems can chen pos grol byas te/ byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas/ sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// dam tshig rje su ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur/ skad cig mtho ris
196a8(rgyud): bar byed// rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams ca du// sems can skad cig 'di ru'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnasu 'gyur// san rnams dang grags chen po// thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang // pha rol phyin rnams skye gan
196b1(rgyud): de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin// de dag 'di la rab tu gnas// dbang por gyur ba brtan chen po// yon tan tshogs ni na mkha' bzhin/ de nyid dngos po thams cad la/ thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te/ rdo rjes
196b2(rgyud): mchog tu ba / sems dpa' thog pa tha med yin// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye she so// bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge
196b3(rgyud): ye shes thig la ldan pa ste// rdo rje yid 'byung lpags pa yi// ha la ra stags dbu bskor bya// 'di ni yid las skyes pa ste// shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yis// yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ gtso bo'i spyad sngar gas
196b4(rgyud): ba li// gsang ba'i snying gi pad+ma la// phyag rgya 'dim sa rgyas btab pas/ de ni de mi zag nyidu// shin tu gyes pa'i mnyes bar 'gyur// gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la/ de mi bdebs pa nyes
196b5(rgyud): te dbang po yi sbyong ba yis// de dang rol pas byung du 'grub// de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las/ shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te// reg 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang / lha mi kun gyis pa
196b6(rgyud): par 'gyur// de dang lhan cig rol pa ra// lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'i// bdag nyid cel phyag byed pa'o// nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi// shin tu sbyong ba'i rgyas
196b7(rgyud): btab pa/ sems cad ganga'i bad pa dang // sems dpa' chel mnyes par byed// de nis dang na mkha' la/ bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed// sde tshogs lha mo bde che ba'i// sna tshogs 'debs 'ang spyod/ phyag rgya
196b8(rgyud): gar gyis gang mdzad cing / sems cad myud du rtogs par byed// ral gring gyur pa gzi chen po// na mkha' kun tu phan rkun 'gro/ lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang // lha ming klu yi bu mo dang // gzhan yang 'phrul ldan ma
197a1(rgyud): de yis bud med kun bsgrub bya/ phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas// de'i dkun tu 'gro bde// ji tsas 'dod par dkyil 'khong du// rdo rje sems dpa' che gnaso// sangs rgyas thams cad byung
197a2(rgyud): du 'grub// thams cad chos ni bde chen po// dge 'dud chags med thams cad rnams// de dag thams cad de yon// dbang po 'i dbang dbang chen gyi// thogs med stobs kyis bkug nasu// rdo rje sems dpa
197a3(rgyud): gnas pas// gzhan gyi bud med brtson par byed/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phag rgya ye shes bsgrub pa ste// skad cig skad cig bstan pa yi// bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis pad sbyor ba 'di
197a4(rgyud): yis ni// de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te// bdag pa dang rgyal mda' gyur te// sdang ba med cing yig med// shin tu dbyas pa chen po'i// yid dang rjesu 'thun par mdzad pa'i yi ge'i bag rgya'i
197a5(rgyud): ye sheso// lha po rdo rje kI li ni// dang por oM gyis rnam rgyan pa/ bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni// dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad pa ste de yis bud med snying kha ru// bdag nyid kyis de bin rlabs
197a6(rgyud): te dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas rnal 'byor chen po de// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin rlabs pas// dmakha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu// mdzes pa'i spyan
197a7(rgyud): dang rol cing 'gro/ bdag pa 'od te gzhan dag la// phyag rgya de yis rgyas btab te// rdo rje 'ad+mo phye ba yis// sgrub pa pos ni byung du sgrub// pad+mo rnam par phe byas te// phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi// phyag rgya 'di yis
197a8(rgyud): rgyas btab na/ 'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzub byas te// sbyor ba chen po sgom byas na// de ma thag du na mkhar 'gro// bdag nyid gar rgyal gnas
197b1(rgyud): nyid kyi sngang du phyag rgya bzhag nyid kyis byin rlabs pag rgyal// sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod pa bya/ g.yas dpag mad gyi glo ga tu// dgyes dang 'dza' ba gnyis bzhugs par/ mi g.yeng byag rgya bamagu byas te/ 
197b2(rgyud): bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par sgom// 'di yis dngos grub 'thob 'gyur te// 'di dag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis// gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhad cig
197b3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// namakha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas// de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ nub gcig bdud rtsing byung byas te// gzungs pa'i
197b4(rgyud): phyag rgya la brten nas// rmang 'byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad/ mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'// dang por gnyi ga 'dug byas na// sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba/ de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro// byang
197b5(rgyud): yang na nam phyed na/ rig ma'i dbyingasu reg bya zhing // myur bas khros/ pa'i sgra sgrogs pas/ gyang gyi 'gyed pas brtsam par bya// bgye ba mjug du de ma thag 'o ma mchog ni btung byas na// de na
197b6(rgyud): de ni rdo rje 'grub// zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar byed// bya ba de bzhin pa zlog pa dang / ci bde brten pa byas pa las/ byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag/ 'phrog ma yi ni dngos gru'o// 'di yis rin chen
197b7(rgyud): gtsug nyid/ mi g.yang mtshan po byas 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas dngos grub 'jog pa// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis 'thob/ 'di yis snying kha'i zla gsang la// thig le 'du brtag byas na// don de ma thag
197b8(rgyud): yang zlags 'thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur/ 'di mis reg patsam gyis kyang / dngas grub gang dga' thob byeng / rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po// rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu// 'di sgrub pa'i dusu yang / rnam
198a1(rgyud): ga pa sa kri ba/ gtsu dag 'gyur bams/ na can gyis n-i sgrung ba bya// sdug bsngal ba ma sems can pa/ sbyid pa bzhin rtag tu sbyid// de la bde ba sbyid byas te/ mi slad dam yang tshu
198a2(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa'i sems pa chen po dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdorje grA mi hA lol shin tu gyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byeng pa'o// thog ma a ste 'ja' chen po// rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel/ 'din
198a3(rgyud): 'dod chags thams cad la// 'dod chags bde byed snyoms par 'thob/ rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la/ 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya// 'di yis 'gro ba gsub dag tu// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// padro kha pa rgya
198a4(rgyud): ba'i spyad/ sngags mkhan de ni skad cig 'gyur// gsab ni/  ni bde mchogs/ A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya// spros pa'i phyag rgyargyas btab ste/ skad cig skad cig spyad par bya// dus dag tu ni rag pa
198a5(rgyud): dang gzhug pa yang ni rtag tub/ bskyod nga mnyes pa de ni/ du/ mnyam du 'grogs pa'i chog pa// bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang /  cig skad cig bsnyen par bya// gang dang kunas bskong ba dang / 'jib
198a6(rgyud): de bzhin btung ba dang // the tsom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya 'dri yis rnal 'byong ba/ mi g.yo tsher ni dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang // bskal par gnas
198a7(rgyud): basmos ci dgos/ 'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma thag/ pad+mo 'dzin pa'i rjes 'gyur te/ lag na pad+mo rabang khyer bzhin// blo ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas/ brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig tu// bad ldan zhing du
198a8(rgyud): 'gro 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor chen po dang byin nas/ bde ldan gyi mchog gtso ba yi// pad+mo gzugs kyi dkyil 'khod du// de ni bde bang gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur ba/ dngos grub yis/ 
198b1(rgyud): bde song 'gyur/ yi ge yaM di phyag rgya 'dis/ pad+mo las skyes gzungs bzung ste// byin gyis brlabs nas bde mangs na// pad+mo bde pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas ba
198b2(rgyud): bsngod pas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyidu// sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdod min// sdug cing la sogs rgyan pa yi// nyi ma'i 'od thebs byung bzhin/ dri mad yangs pa'i lta ba yis/ pad+mo sems dpa' cha 'grub bo// ji tsam
198b3(rgyud): nam khar nye bar ni/ dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed// rig pa 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi// lha po yis ni mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na
198b4(rgyud): gnas pa'i tshe/ 'khor ba'i dri bas mo go so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rngag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// slar gyis pa ma sbyor ba yis// sbrul ri gsod par gyur pa bzhir// zla gsang thig
198b5(rgyud): dgang byed 'di/ cha 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur te/ 'di yis mthu yi ngo bas yis// dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo// gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa// 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// bzhu chen phyag rgya
198b6(rgyud): nyid kyis/ dran pa tsam gyi dadangos grub// shin tu dgyes pa pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye she so// dang por oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar bsgyings pa'i hUM nyid// dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag/ yi ge 'di
198b7(rgyud): rmad 'byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yi rgyas btab pas/ sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur/ khams gsub 'din dngos grub che// dpal gyi bsgyings po 'thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang 'dud las rjes 'jug pa/ mi thogs pa/ 
198b8(rgyud): rgyal ba // sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas// de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byeng / bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te// de yi khams gsum longs spyod// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// pad+mo rdo rje rab ldan pa/ 
199a1(rgyud): / ba phreng ba'i tshul gyi su// phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin/ 'di yis zin gyis brlabs byas te/ bsnyen du byung du dngos grub bo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi srid bsgyur bas// chu skyes cad ni sbyar
199a2(rgyud): te phyag rgyas btab ste rol bas// bla ma'i dngos grub thob pa byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis// rdo rje bdag nyid mchod byed de// de dag kun gyis bskor bas nas// dkyil 'khod da ni dbang bskur // rdo rje sems
199a3(rgyud): dpa' dpa' bo yis// 'jigs shing skrag pas bir byed pa// rang nyid kyis ni phyag rgya'i gzungs// nyid kyi dngos grub stobs par dang // gzhan ni yang dag pha rol par/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yod tan rgya// de yang de la
199a4(rgyud): 'jigs skrag nas/ rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed// bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang // che ba'i phani ngo bo ma dang / rdo rje 'jims gtogs rnams dang // rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed / 
199a5(rgyud): gshin rdo sha ka rgyal po yang // rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la/ 'ongs na/ bang gi sdug pa'i rnams// srog gi phyir yang bstobs par byed// gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams/ khams gsum lam la gnas
199a6(rgyud): ba dag/ myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // bdag nyid dngos grub sbyid par byed// sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che// dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed// de yang nyar 'ongs gtsug gtugs te// rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma spyir bang
199a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs// sha za yi dwags bu mo rnams// sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang bas te// brtag pa mcho gas brtag par bya// thams cad las byed dge ba yis// 'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub// lho dang
199a8(rgyud): klu yaM bu mo dang / lha min lha yi ma la skyes pa/ phyag rgya 'di yis byin rlabs na/ grub pa myung du dngos gru'o// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung / gang de bud med gzung byas pa/ rim pa 'di yi tshul gyi su// phyag
199b1(rgyud): brtag par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid// skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas/ tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i phreng ba zhes
199b2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// ba bcu gsum steng nyid// de bzhin thig le'i rgyal po ste// rab dgyes rdo rje lha che bde// mtha' ni yi ge haM sbyor ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde ched spyad ni dga' byed yin// phyag rgya'i yig
199b3(rgyud): 'di yis ni/ mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas nas// ngas ni des zag tu yang // bla med 'phrul gyis spyad du 'gyur/ spong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas shin tu phra ba mthong / slon ma rnams bsgyur rgyas pa
199b4(rgyud): lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing // 'gags byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang // pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gzungs ma'i tshogs rnam dang // rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' gro
199b5(rgyud): byi nang gi tshogs rnams dang / lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha mi dngas grub lus kyi mchog/ grul bum mi 'am ya~M dwags sam/ sha za 'dra gyi mi bu mo// 'di ni snying kharang bzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin
199b6(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang // pad+mo dra ba sna tshogs blo// lha dang lha mid mi dag dang // gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang // bad dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi// gzhan gyis 'phrog par yong mi nus// lha dang
199b7(rgyud): min gyis mchod cing // dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed// lnga dang lha min rted byed cing / skad cig nyidu 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu/ rig pa'i
199b8(rgyud): rigs ni brgya ga dang / don byin cing 'gro ba byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa/ rigs tham mid 'gyur // sangs rgyas rnams kyis pa khyedan skyong bas/ dgyes pa'i thad mchog gcig tu 'gyur
200a1(rgyud): / nang na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin chen dang ga rin chad 'gyur// pad+ma'i dang na pad+mor 'gyur// sna tshogs dang na sna tshogs pachog/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mnyam dang mi ma'am chos kyi byings// ngag
200a2(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes byin rlabs pas// dam pa sna tshogs nyid 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur// rig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur// da 'od pa yang sgra thos te// blan pa yang ni yid rdor 'gyur// de
200a3(rgyud): la sogs pa dpag med pa/ rig gi phyag rgyas ba ba par 'gyur// da yi lus la mon tan ni// yon tanangs pa mdangs cher 'gyur// rdzitsam de de nam khro mthongs// 'phur zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed// dono pa yang
200a4(rgyud): phug nas 'gro/ sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnamasabyed pas/ de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs mkha'agro'i dkyi la 'khor du// sngags mkhar 'gying bar gar byed
200a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can da ni 'jug par bad// mi g.yeng lta ba'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed/ 'degs pa dang ni lta ba yis// gang dang rnam par bskor ba dang
200a6(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed/ ri dang sems can thams cad la/ smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang // ci dga' bar ni mngag par byed // sdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams/ brdeg pa dang ni bsgral bar byed// gtum dang
200a7(rgyud): gdug 'jigs che ba dang // khro bo'i lta bas bsgral bar byed// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu tsharnam
200a8(rgyud): dang paM oM gyis rnam par brgya de// tha mar 'drug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku// bde ba skyed pad bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi// gang gis 'di ni bsgo
200b1(rgyud): ma thag// rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // 'di yis nyid kyi snying kha ru/ bsgom te gnyis med sbyor byas na// sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub/ bsgrubs nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ 
200b2(rgyud): bud med kun dang rtsen byed/ A li ka li mnyam sbyor bas// sems can dman yang dngos grub bo// shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang / sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur ste/ skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyi// chu skyes 'dra
200b3(rgyud): la bsnyen par byed// lha dang lha min bu po de'i// rig mas mthong na dga' bang // phyag rgya'i ye shes rgyan pa yi// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur// spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mo 'am
200b4(rgyud): ci dang skyes bu yi/ dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus/ de la sogs pas spod byed/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni// bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing / kun gyis bstod mtshad sde stang byed/ 
200b5(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog namakha' mtha' klas lha rnams dang / nyim bcu yi 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa 'gro sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun tu// 'od kyis thams
200b6(rgyud): mnyes byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed/ lha dang lha mi gral bum dang // tshangs pa gzha
200b7(rgyud): 'dod lha chen po// phyag rgya'i ye shes byid rlabs dang // 'jig shing skrag par 'ong bar byed// bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsa la stsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bka' blang gdul dka' rnams
200b8(rgyud): de dag thams cad sgrub par byed// mdong bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi// dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi/ zla gsang thag la'i mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid// rnam/ 
201a1(rgyud): ba ban pa thams cad thang// chu skyes dngas gru khyod 'bras drung/ 'tsho ba'i bar du bdag cag 'angangs/ khyod kyi spyad snga na 'bring du// ci bgyi zhes ni dka' dang/ phyag rgya 'di mas rgyas 'a
201a2(rgyud): spyod bcas mi spyod dga' bde// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/ shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong / rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen po bdeb dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzid to// 
201a3(rgyud): dang por oM steng thig la ste/ gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas// gnyis kyi dbus bzhag pa ni// gsung gi rdo rje shin tu dgyes// bde gsungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mchog tu don mong byad
201a4(rgyud): pa dam tshig sgra yis gang byas pa'i// gsung gsal nab dag bar byed// yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ byang chub chen por grub byed// yon tan mo sdug mtho ba'i// tshad med
201a5(rgyud): yon tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na// dpal ku na bdag pa dem thag/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob/ phyag rgya 'di yis bdag sa
201a6(rgyud): gzhan// rgyas btab 'dod pa sbyad byas na// dngos grub rma du byung ba yi// de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa pa yi bka' nyan te// ci sta rmongs pas 'dar byed de// 
201a7(rgyud): yi srog ni tha ma yin// de yis srung ba byas na dpal/ tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mi za bar 'thob parar gyur/ phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas// sgrub pa
201a8(rgyud): byad cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni// mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin rlangs la// sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang // chos dbyings mi mnyam rab klas/ 
201b1(rgyud): dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang // shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po de khrid// rang gi ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba// ji skad na mkha'i dkyil
201b2(rgyud): 'khod de/ 'dod pa thams cad spyod do// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing // ngan srong gsum yang mi 'gro byed// de chung zad 'og sdug bsngal// 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur/ rdo rje gsum de zad 'byung
201b3(rgyud): bas sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed// bag chag mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas// na mkha'i rim par 'gro 'ong bang // lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod// sems dpa'
201b4(rgyud): chen po 'gro 'dug kyang // bde byad kun gyis bdag nyid dge/ gnas pa zas dang btung la sogs// na mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed// bud med/ rin chen mchog mkha' las/ bsam pa tsam gyis
201b5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa/ de yis kham/ sa gsum thob par byed// rnal 'byor spyod pa dngas grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur/ 'di las
201b6(rgyud): brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka' thub 'di dang 'dra medo// bud med mchog tu bde ba las/ 'dod pa'i lags spyod spyad pas 'grub/ dag pa'i pad+man rigs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po dag dbang 'gyur
201b7(rgyud): gzugs ma kun gyi bde chen po/ rgyal po chen por de 'gyuraro// gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde' chen po 'thob par byed ba khams gsum
201b8(rgyud): kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o// oM bcas mi phyed tha mar ste// rab tu sems ni bdeb ste/ rdo rje rab dgyes par bye
202a1(rgyud): dbus su ma ni sbyar ba bya// ga rgya 'di yis dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab bsgrubs pa/ 'di mis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsa'i mchog mi dung bangar 'gyur// thams cad
202a2(rgyud): pa ldan pas na// de sde thams cad sems kyang rung / bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid // rdo rje dpa' bo nyidadu yang // lha mo'i phyabargyas bying rlabs
202a3(rgyud): skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur// lha po rnams dang gang byed cing // de ni rab dgyes bdag po khrid// pho brang dga' byed rab dgyes che// rab tu chen po bde 'thob tu// seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog pad do// bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog
202a4(rgyud): nyib kyi// rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzog sra sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yo da dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa/ de la phyag ni byeng bar 'gyu
202a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems mchog 'jog pade// rang gi spyad pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin pa thams cadad // sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor/ sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni/ sems dpa' chen pos
202a6(rgyud): ston byed pa/ ras 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa/ ras dga' khab nas 'byung ba dang // ras 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// ras dga' skye dang ngas dga' 'pho// res dga' spyod chen rol pa dang // ras 'ga'
202a7(rgyud): bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// ras 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo bskor mdzad// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad// res dga' dasu shin tu mdzes// res 'ga' bud med
202a8(rgyud): skyes pa dang / ris 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag/ ris 'ga' 'dod pang rgyal po ste/ ras dga' 'dod la rgyal gyis phyogs// ris dgal ni la ras 'ga' drag/ ras 'ga' gdod chen bgegs mdzad pa
202b1(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas pa ba pa/ ci dgar dngas grub 'dod pa la/ bdag gis nga zar ston par byed/ mi byang pog sbyor ba yis// 'dren pa mi phyed 'u byas te/ pa chur rig pa chen pa
202b2(rgyud): mis rdo rje cam gyis de 'bigs ma// gzungs ma mang ba tshogs kyi rnams/ bdu byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas mi spyod bdang pa pa// 'bad pa mi dgos 'thob par 'gyur/ brjid pos byang chub snying
202b3(rgyud): ga pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan paso// thams cad tshan rnam bral ba/ byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du// yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag 'di chen
202b4(rgyud): bor de 'gyuraro// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po tshim pa'i yid la skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// las thams cad grub par byed pa'o// dang por oM di sbyor ba ste/ tha ma pa gnyis
202b5(rgyud): bo rdza rnga'i sgra// rab dgyes rdo rje bid rlabs pa'i// lha mo dang byed de/ bus su bzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma/ rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa
202b6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par byed// sngags mkhan yig phyag rgya 'dis// bdag sa gzhan la rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'dab skyes bcug byas na// de nas de myung dngos grub po// thams cad
202b7(rgyud): byed dpal dang ldan/ tshe dpa lang tsho skal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzi dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sa pas dpa' rab tu 'grub/ sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi// sangs rgyas kun dang bya dbyed cing / sde dang
203a1(rgyud): thams cad byeng pa chen po gdan mi za ba'i gzhas gyis mi byed pa'o// tshangs pa'i gsungs gi bdod bcas// tham dril bu'i 'ang gnyis// dbus su ming gri dri'ang ste/ ma mtshan
203a2(rgyud): chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi dngos grub 'thob byeng// 'dod pa yid ni thams cad rnams// yig skad cig 'grub par byed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams// bdag dang rang
203a3(rgyud): gi slob ma'ang rung // de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na// rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myung du mkha' la 'gro byed de// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang / lha rnams
203a4(rgyud): kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha mo'i tshogs dang rtsen byed cing // lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jigs par byed dang chu/ byed pa// sems can kun
203a5(rgyud): gyi mchog das pa/ sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur// stug pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su no// brjid la sogs pas spyod pas 'gro// brjid che pad+mo chen po la~M/ thams cad kun tu ban
203a6(rgyud): ba yis// bde bad chen po myong byed// rab tu dgyes pas bsgrags pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgrin mkhyud pas// rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te// 'dini snying la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa 'a
203a7(rgyud): phyag rgya mu skyes btab byas te/ de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// 
203a8(rgyud): dang po nyid oM bya ste/ yig le'i rgyal pos nye bar rgyan// chag drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' ma nga bzhag byas te// derdo rje rab dgyes rgya nu byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbu su bas pa/ 'di sangs
203b1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes sdang ba rab bsgrub pa// yi ge yaM ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying kharang rgyas btab ra// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sde dbang lhar bcas lha rna
203b2(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang / sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa/ thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur// 'di ri 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste/ sna tshog
203b3(rgyud): rab 'byung yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing // spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten sdang byed// sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed// mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab tu
203b4(rgyud): dga'/ A li ka li pad+mo mchog la// myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed// 'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur// 'dis ni bde ba'i dzo de// 'di
203b5(rgyud): dngos grub grub par 'gyur/ skye ba'i sdug bsnga la rgyab phyogs pa/ tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa/ ye shes kyi sdang
203b6(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes 'grub par byang ba'o// / dang po oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dgyes pa'i yig gnyis// rdo rje shig tu dgyes pa re/ dbu sa
203b7(rgyud): gsal ba'i yi ga bsam/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yos ni/ sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin rlabs pa/ sna tshos
203b8(rgyud): sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur/ sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge/ kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub de/ 'di nyid kyis nirag tu 'grub/ sngo tshogs sgyu pa'i bde chen gyis/ sna tshogs chen po'i na
204a1(rgyud): / bar gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyan pa ye/ bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur// de nas de mi chos dbyings nas// dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub po// pad+mo'i mdun du thog pa'i lha/ byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya
204a2(rgyud): mthe bong srin lag debyung ste/ kha yi nang du bzhag par ba// chang bzhin mang bar byas na ni// mod la 'dod pa'i gzug su 'gyur/ a li ka li rab sbyor bas/ bud med rnams dang rtson par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' ma
204a3(rgyud): 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya// bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas/ dang po oM ni gnas pa ste// tra ta dang ldan tha ma bya// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che'o// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// di ni sangs rgya
204a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi// bsgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin// 'di dag mnyam par spyo/ ba yis// sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtag po yis/ bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mor gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa spyad pa
204a5(rgyud): bya ba myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te// 'od byed thams cad nye bar sgrub// sems can kun gyi 'dod skyed pa// / 'a chen por de 'gyuraro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog
204a6(rgyud): pad+mo'i tshul du skrag pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas// rdo rje chen po de dngos 'grub/ ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes 'thun spyod// bsgrubs na
204a7(rgyud): rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya// de ni dngas po kun yin te/ 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yi// sangs rgyas chen po de yi
204a8(rgyud): dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med// chos rnams kun gyi rje su 'thun// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad// 'di la khyad pa bcung zad med// shin tu/ 
204b1(rgyud): dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i mchog sku'o// dang po oM bcas lnga mo yi// tha mang tshig drug mi phyed gnyis// de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid// he zhes
204b2(rgyud): bya ba rnam rgyan te// shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje che// bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa/ dpal ldan des ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyis
204b3(rgyud): ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro// de ni de pir sangs rgyas mthong // chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas/ sangs rgyas rnams
204b4(rgyud): kyi 'de 'a che// gos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin/ byed pa da ni zlog pa da bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis/ rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas sha
204b5(rgyud): rab chen po la/ rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ bde ba chen po mgu bar byed/ bde ba thabs kyi ngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge maM ni phyag rgya 'di
204b6(rgyud): shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/ rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// las thams cad kyi don grub sbyin pa'o// oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya/ te
204b7(rgyud): skad snyan tha mar te// dbusu he dga' zhes bya ba// bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu gyes che yi// phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // dran pa yis kyang dngos grub steng / jig
204b8(rgyud): pa kun las grol byed cing // bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro// mi dag thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i yig rgyan te 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bskur sti byed/ rigs
205a1(rgyud): stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing // rig 'dzid bu srad bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yo ba byed pa'i// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel ba 'thob// blo ldan
205a2(rgyud): rnamakha' ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ yi du 'ong ba'i spyad ni rgyas pa dang / rdal 'bor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i 'byed pas rol par byed/ pi wang gri
205a3(rgyud): bu la mtshad sgra smad gyis// glu blangs dngas grub rgya ma thob par byed/ ji sbed yidu 'ong po'i glu dag re// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag bde ba'i sgo yis bskyed par rnam bsgyung ba'i// de dang 'thud pa'i bya
205a4(rgyud): 'dis sgrub par byed// 'aT ba dag 'i dub sa// g+hu ru blangs pas 'dro ga nas/ ngos grung byung du 'thob par byed/ 'di mis byin rlangs dag pa dang / 'di mis kyi rlabs bde ba'i rnams rgya
205a5(rgyud): 'di yis sbyar ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen mol da byangs dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i yi ga'i phyag rgya'o// 
205a6(rgyud): de bzhin oM ni dang por te/ dbus su te dgyes bde ba che// rdo rje gang byed dpe pa gnyis/ 'di ni thams cad bde 'di// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab tu dgyes nyid// rnal 'byor yi na rgyas 'dab na// bde dang ldan par byed cing
205a7(rgyud): 'gro/ 'og min gyi ni gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs gcig 'grogs/ bde byad chen po'i dbang chen dang // chos kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob/ ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las// bsgyur bu bad pa ba
205a8(rgyud): ba dang / ji snyed de snyed pag rgya'i rnams// gnyis min 'das pas 'dis dngos grub/ kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che// kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de
205b1(rgyud): ngatshad med la 'jig rnam gyi ni mo bang rnams/ pad+mo gsal ba bar gyis ni/ rnal 'byor gar bas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kur gyi ngag rgya 'di// sna tshogs gang ni sngor bad pas/ myur du gang ni mdubs pas// gar gyi
205b2(rgyud): gtsug lag dngos grub po// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' bya gang zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dar gsum pa'o// bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// rdo
205b3(rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa ni// rdo rje'i sku sna tshogs che/ tha mda' bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// da mkhar zla skad 'dra ba yi// rab rgya'i ye shes rmad 'byung ba'i 'di yi thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste// gzungs pag
205b4(rgyud): bar gzung ba yi// cha ba'i gser gyi gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying khang bsam par ba// na mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid // shin tu ma
205b5(rgyud): 'byung thob par 'gyur/ rnal 'bo kun gyi bde 'bral ba/ rdo rje blo mtsho ga dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi// sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas/ 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo// 'dod pa cha
205b6(rgyud): po ldan par bad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sgra dang med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i pa
205b7(rgyud): de bzhin oM ni bzhag pa ste/ rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen// rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'bral ba// tha mang khro bcas sbyang bdu ba// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcas pa yang thos par 'gyur// khams gsum ngo ba 'ang
205b8(rgyud): ni sgra yi thos pa dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ste/ bud med pad+mo u dpal dang // ma lus rgyal ba'i rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mod sbyar bas na// dga' bang myad da da
206a1(rgyud): grub pa/ rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i chad ma dpa'i yon tam gyi sgra dang med pa dang ldan pa zhes pa bdon gyi dpal thams cad grub ba byed pa'o// oM'i spyi gtsug thig ler thab sa
206a2(rgyud): rab gyes chen ma rdo rje can// rdo rje dri der 'brel ga za mar gnas shes rab sbyang ba// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mngon du 'gro// snga tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes klu
206a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje rgyan pa yi// de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen// de nas chas dbyings gnas pa des// A li ka li mnyam spyod pas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsam byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngas grub 'gyur// 
206a4(rgyud): ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// blo ldan rab tung rgyas zhes bya// rdo rje 'dri dmed pa dang ldan ma zhes pa pa'i yi gi'i phyag rgyal// oM mchog gtsug tang rnams byas te/ shin tu dgyes med dbus ni/ 
206a5(rgyud): rdo rje ron sbyong ba che// tha mar he ste thig le gnyis// 'di yi rab tu dgye sa par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo/ sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyong ba sna tshogs bdag
206a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis// mchod pa mi bzad dad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad// namakha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po ra
206a7(rgyud): mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad
206a8(rgyud): rgyal po las// chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes
206b1(rgyud): chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes pa pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
206b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i gzungs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor ba// rang rkub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdad du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i ramakha' la 'gro ba dang
206b3(rgyud): namakha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa// pi rang gi po nya dang po nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rma du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyad ni rgyas pa yi// bzhengs nas dgyes patshar po yi// brjid
206b4(rgyud): pa'i phyag gis gang mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid// ba zhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed // bskal ba yi ni dbangs 'di yis/ de dag gtso la mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni
206b5(rgyud): mtshar che// kye ma'o spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o sbas pa ngo mtshakye ma'o bde ba yang dga'abyung / kye mo'o kun tu bzang po'i don/ kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs kyi ma'o bde ba dag pa
206b6(rgyud): kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste/ kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs// kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol pir ma yin// kye ma
206b7(rgyud): ji ltar mthung rigam/ kye mar sna tshogs dgas pa che kye ma dag pa gsum sbyang ba// kye ma'i rnga rdzamanyam sbyang ba'i/ kye ma'o brje ma bye bas kyi ma dbang pa gnyis sbyang ba'i kyim mapa gdang mnyam par
206b8(rgyud): kye ma'o gar ni dag pa che/ kye ma'o glu rab dri ma med/ kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par brel/ kye ma'o brdab dang mun pa sal/ kye ma'o dag byed me tog phreng // kye ma'o pog snod dge ba ste/ kye ma'o mang me mun pa sel
207a1(rgyud): // kye ma'o dri ni shin tu bsil// kye ma'o rnal 'byong mnyam par sbyor// kye ma'o sgyung ba na mkha' 'dra// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog kye ma'o rin chen bde mchog bskyed/ kye ma'o sna tshogs pad mchog
207a2(rgyud): ldan kye ma'o sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang // kye ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar lha yi rnams// shin tung gyes me rdo rje la// rgyan pa kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje
207a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'gying ba yis// dga' dang 'de bad skyes par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te/ sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas// mchog dbyangs kyis bsta
207a4(rgyud): par byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis/ gang mdzad// pag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan sprin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyad zub gzi
207a5(rgyud): sha rgyas brla ni nu mar mdud// rked pa'i dbyibs ni rnam par yangs// snum gyi ngos kyang tshal mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon// tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin
207a6(rgyud): cing / rab tu dgyes ched dgyes par bstod// bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul ma
207a7(rgyud): cing // gsang ba'i thig la 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan te/ 'jig rten gsum po sbyar bar bya bo'i chos de bder gshegs don du mdzad// ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las
207a8(rgyud): 'byung bya bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzad// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad// byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskal la bsnyen par mdzod/ 
207b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs/ bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzem bcas pas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan pas kyang de de de la
207b2(rgyud): rag luso/ a la la ho// yangs pa'i spyadan can dngas shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus/ khams ma'i dang gzungs pa bdag nyid che dang rab tu rtsan
207b3(rgyud): mdzod la/ thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i tshungs bdag bskur cig/ mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob 'dod phyir/ dam tshig chen po gsum po gdi la gnas nas ni// zla gsang thig le'i
207b4(rgyud): dbyingasu bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi/ dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni/ shin tu srin pas skyo ba yi// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhir/ glu blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur// de nas bcom
207b5(rgyud): la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tung gyes te de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'ang bcas pa dang // rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs kyi bcud po de dag
207b6(rgyud): thams cad la rdo rje shin tu gyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang // byang chub dpa'ang bcas pa dang / #
207b7(rgyud): la 'gro ba dang / namakha' la 'gro ma'i chog su bcas pa'i rnams dang / pi rang gi rdo rje rigs las skyes pa rnams las shin tu dgyes pa dgyes pa chen po'i gang dang dbangs dang / rdung ba dang / zhi ba'i thal
207b8(rgyud): mo la sogs pa rnam par mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dnga'i go chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang mi gsung
208a1(rgyud): gyur to// de des de dag ku dgyes nas/ shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du// dbus mo'i lha'ang btsugs mdzad/ chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs/ dkyil 'khor
208a2(rgyud): tshig bdag nyid la/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pas// kha sha du gsol// gang gi sems cad 'de nyid kyi/ bde bas dkyil 'khor sgrub par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das das tshig 'dod pa zhi bar long spyod
208a3(rgyud): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir la skams par zhugs te// dkyil 'khor mdzad// pa gnyis gang dang bcas pa yis// mdun du thal mo bkan par bya// song po kun gyi rtse lo la/ pha rol phyid pa ra chags
