208a4(rgyud): rnams bsam// de dag ming gi brda yis ni// sor mi thams cad brtag par bya// sbom po phan chud bsnol byas te/ shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag/ rdo rje mchod rten sbyang byas te// lhag pa 'od bzhid sgra
208a5(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dge/ gang gis bcings pa tsam gyi kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub nyid rnam phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang
208a6(rgyud): 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas sdang mdzad dpal dang ldan// btso ma'i gsor gyi kha dog 'dzin// shes rab ldan pas sbyar byas na// 'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la/ 'di yis
208a7(rgyud): byin rlabs gar byas te// rdo rje pad+mo bzhag byas nas// sems ni bzhags pas bsgrub byas la// de nas sems de blangs byas te// blo ldan de yas btung byas te// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khod du// yang
208a8(rgyud): dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phral gyi 'am// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phral rtag 'thob// sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis/ kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus/ shin tu dgyes pa kun tu long
208b1(rgyud): spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa/ sbom po skyil krung bzhag byas te/ sna tshogs bong ba 'bar byed pa/ rnal 'byor gyis ni lhag ma spro/ 'di rdo rje thad kyang / 
208b2(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di mos myur du 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kya
208b3(rgyud): ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang // rdo rje 'dzir rje de 'gyur te/ rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab
208b4(rgyud): pas rjengs chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed/ 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje ri/ rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang // rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'kho du// rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur// ji lta ba
208b5(rgyud): grub 'dug pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams// skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang // rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang // gso bar byed dang za ba dang // phan tshun
208b6(rgyud): du mi skyed par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i tha
208b7(rgyud): mo de nyid las/ khro mo rgyab ni bsgrub byas te/ sor mo lhag ma snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// dam thag du 'phrog par byed// 'di ni bcings bcam
208b8(rgyud): gyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa 'thob/ 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang // 'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa/ 'di nyid kyis ni rgyal po che/ 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis/ 
208'a1(rgyud): yang dga' 'gug pa dngas grug la la 'di yis byi rdzams te/ ci ba byed du spyang byas na/ 'dzin de ma zag tu yang / dpal lda nga rjegazi brjid 'dzin/ zhi sa bcu gnyis 'ad drang 'byur/ 
208'a2(rgyud): bdud gyis 'gyur gzhan gyis min/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dul ba dang / dge ba thams cad dbang du byed// grol 'dod rnams kyi mud pa sel// blo lda pa rgya mchog tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
208'a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi// 'de rten pa gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ kha dang gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por// pha rol
208'a4(rgyud): phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ dge ba'i khrom dang bral ba/ par ma phyin pa chos min te/ tshig dang tshig rnams bral bal// brgya 'dzin bcings pa yis/ chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur
208'a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam par de' gyur te/ thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// bad+mod por po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo smra ba rnams mdzad pas// sna chags chen
208'a6(rgyud): bor de 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog pa byed/ sems can kun la thad sbyir// 'dod chags chen po nyes spangs te/ de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar byas pa/ sgrub par mi byed cung zad
208'a7(rgyud): med pa 'di ni pad+ma sbyor ba yis// bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mos par byed pa'i dpal pad+mo phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya
208'a8(rgyud): 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu// bsgyung nas bzhag par byas pa ni/ ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen por der 'gyur// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ khams gsum sna rgor byed par 'gyur// 
208'b1(rgyud): dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag / sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ thams cad 'di yis dngos sgyu'o// bud med la
208'b2(rgyud): yis byin rlabs nas/ sngo bsangs khu btsos dkar mo dang // de dang lhan cig gar byas pas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sngo bsangs zhing ma phreng ma dag/ byir gyis brlabs nas das gsum du// mtshan gyi
208'b3(rgyud): mthang ni bsnyen pas nas/ las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ rigs ngan can dang sme ma dang // gang ma khar de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgya ye shes byon rlabs te/ bsnyed dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu
208'b4(rgyud): dgyes pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyid par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byang ba thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya dag bstan pa'i rnams/ gar gyi tshul
208'b5(rgyud): gyis rang gi gnas// dam tshig mchog gi dam tshigis// dngos grub chen po'i mthub 'gyur// thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcings bas bcings par bya// de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed
208'b6(rgyud): 'dar yi tshul gyis bzung bar bya/ 'don rab dgyes gtso ba yi/ pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byos byed pa/ dpa' bo rnabs kyang rmongs par byed/ 'dod bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / 
208'b7(rgyud): mi shes byed pa 'jig pa byed/ las kyi don ni dka' bzhin du// dga' nas bra bzhin byed par 'gyur/ dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing // 'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu
208'b8(rgyud): dgyes pa kun tu bzang mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyi su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// snying kar gzung ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yis las kun byed 'gyur te/ bdad rnams thabs
209a1(rgyud): byang dbang pa nye dang dbapar rtse// gdug pa thams cad 'joms bde/ 'jibs byed drag ba chen pa yis/ gdub pa thams cad gdung bar byed/ rdo rje badz+ra bcug pa yis yomabs ma ma du bzu byas te/ 
209a2(rgyud): maM pam rkun bsngal ba yis/ dpung pa brkyang sta gar du ba/ sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas/ bde chen po yi bde 'thob/ 'dod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar par grub par te/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas
209a3(rgyud): btab na/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'phung bdu byed/ rab dgyes 'brel pas gang byas shing / na mkha' gzungs pa'i thabs nyid kyi// phan tshur bcu pa'i gnon pa yis// bcings na 'di yis dngos grub// de de ma thag tu ya
209a4(rgyud): lha dang lha yid patshang bde// dbang po nye dang 'dab ched dang // nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// skyin po yis dI phag byas nas/ rang gi dpal ma ga stobs pade// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang // nyid
209a5(rgyud): kyis dpal can stobs pa yis// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing / sangs rgyas dgos pa rab sgrub pang // 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// la sa dang rjesu mthun 'gyur te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam
209a6(rgyud): mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang ma nyas sbyor te// gzungs dang gnyis med sbyong ba yis/ yid la 'dod po'i las kur byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang / spyod pas gar gyis byas paso// gzhan dag kyang
209a7(rgyud): dngos grub che/ bla'i ma dang sa rnabs phyo bas/ bya'i chub sems ni rang sgrub pa/ sgrub pa pos ni 'acwo sdub/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde ba ga'i sumed pa'i dpal/ shin tu dgyes pa'i badz+ra
209b1(rgyud): mngab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'o// thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis/ bcings pa gyen du bzung bas te/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbre ba byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya
209b2(rgyud): phag rgya 'di na rku srin zhes/ rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ 'dod bral chags par sgrub pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yis bang ldan gyi// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// de du yin
209b3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par ni bskor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor// sdig spangs rnams ni bkug nas kyang // spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar bsnyen par byed// yang dag bya
209b4(rgyud): chub gnas pa yi/ sangs rgyas 'dadi yis mnyes par byed// de nas da gyes te sna tshogs che// snga tshogs ye shes skye ba yi// rang gi da/ mchog gsungs pa yi// sems dpa' chen po
209b5(rgyud): par byed// bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad grub bar byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin rlabs te/ snying khang nye bar bas pa byas na/ las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las
209b6(rgyud): bdu gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang // sil snyan brdung ba rnams bdang / pi wang gling bu rdza rnga yi// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dab med
209b7(rgyud): pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas/ 'gying zhing 'gying bas gar byas te// bcing ba chen po bcings byas nas/ sbyor ba chen po gnyi su t+ya/ khu chu gnyis po dku nyid/ 
209b8(rgyud): du 'gying bas brtan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byas te// 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gang byas na/ dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// 'gying pa tsam gyi sbyor ba mas// gyas
210a1(rgyud): 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha min rig ma yis// 'bum phrag rgya yis mchod par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gdubs gnas par 'gyur// klu mo lnga dang lha min dang / de ba
210a2(rgyud): mi 'am bdag por ba// namakha' 'gro ma'i khyod 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las kyi sbyar ba 'di yis ni// thams cad las
210a3(rgyud): ni byed par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsapa chen sbyor bas dngos gru'o// dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad
210a4(rgyud): 'grub pa'o// phyag rgya de nyid pa'am bzung ste// lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas// myur bar snyed du dong ba yis/ mgyogasu 'gro ba thos grubo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmang
210a5(rgyud): byung dam pa mcho dbyas pa/ sbyor ba gang gyis mchod byas na/ thabs cad las byed dngos grub/ gang dag dngas grub med pa dang / gang / bde ba med pa'i rnams// dag phyag rgya 'dis btab
210a6(rgyud): nanamakha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis thams cad las rnams ni// rmad 'byung dam pa 'grub par byed// btsun mo chen mo de bzhi gshegs// 'di yis deni 'grub par byed/ gzhan yang
210a7(rgyud): tu rgya che ba// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog drang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya
210a8(rgyud): de nyid 'og gi ngosu dong // stad da cung zad bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni chom byed pa// 'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur
210b1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis// skrag nas dngos grub sbyir bar byed// sangs rgyas dam tshigasum gnas pa'i// 'di yis mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas// mchog gi thabs/ 
210b2(rgyud): stobs par byed// phyag rgya bcings pa sbyor ba yis// 'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun tu bas na rnal 'byor pa// dngos po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog bde// bde ba pad+ma 'thob
210b3(rgyud): cing // tshe 'di dang ni pha rol du// phyag rgya'i gnasu de 'gro'o// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// dri ma thams cad spongs pa dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o// thal
210b4(rgyud): mo de nyid sbom po sbrang / lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhir// 'di ni sa ngas rgyas thams cad kyis// ye shes mchog tu sdang byed pa'o//  ga ma med nas bskor ba yi// 'di yis gti mug phro
210b5(rgyud): byed// mnyam par gzhag nas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mnyam nyid ye shes dri me dang / pad+mo dra ba dag 'a ba che// sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po/ bde byed chen
210b6(rgyud): po 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyi gang bya zhing // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar
210b7(rgyud): g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bong bzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad grub bo// thams cad don rnams grub pa dge/ bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam
210b8(rgyud): gyis kyang // mchad pa'i sprid nyid rgyas pa che// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos gru'o// phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te/ skad cig gcig gis gar byas nas// rdzogs sangs rgyas
211a1(rgyud): / dang sras mchog kyang // 'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro// phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'gru ba
211a2(rgyud): dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa
211a3(rgyud): chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyid pa/ gsang ba chen po
211a4(rgyud): de tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa/ rdo rje gdan mi za ba'i dkyil 'khoram ched po bskal pa'i mthas klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs// de nas
211a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dmachi ga gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas sla yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// 
211a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag thams cadang // pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen pa'i tshogs thams cad dang / namakha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas
211a7(rgyud): phyi nang gi rdo rje rigasu gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyad rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang ya
211a8(rgyud): lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'dis glu blangs te dgyes par byed do// rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis// skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa/ shin tu bde ba'i dkyil
211b1(rgyud): 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyung ste// rang bzhin dag pa'i gzungs ma'i dkyil 'khor nas bskyed par mdzad// ngo mtshar rmad byung bas bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'das pa rnams la 'bugs kyi
211b2(rgyud): cing du gsang ba'i thig la dngos nyid na mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgya las dbang mdzad pas// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing // ngad
211b3(rgyud): ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnams dag pa// nyon mongs mi go sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dngos nyid
211b4(rgyud): med pa'i chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungasu 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ras yan// ji ltar bde la rten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad// kye ma bde mchog bde bas rol
211b5(rgyud): ba tshul bzhin mdzod// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las cad bde bas tshim par mdzod// byams pa'i cad ldan thugs rje nyi mas 'gro/ ba kun la shar mdzad nas// gti mug thibs pa'i yun
211b6(rgyud): nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston// de ni 'das pa'i tshogs la bad sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po dbang bskur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis
211b7(rgyud): ni skad cig skad cig bskul byas na// rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyi// mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag pa kun tu bzang po rdo rje zla gas
211b8(rgyud): thig le chen po la// rdo rje dmakha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen po de rnams kyis bstod cing bskal bu byas pa dang / 
212a1(rgyud): / gsang ba thabs kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdod mi za ba
212a2(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // gru zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnams pa bzhi yis rgyan// dang dang dril bu'i chud po dang // nyi ma
212a3(rgyud): zla ba rnam par rgyad// rid tshod mu tig 'bras bus smras// do shal gad bu rnams kyis rgyad// snga tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa/ sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis rgyar// sras bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ ka ba brgya
212a4(rgyud): mchog yang dag gnas// dbus kyi dga' byed stan la ni// dngul la snyom pas rnam par rgyad// sna tshogs pad+ma dang gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan te dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes
212a5(rgyud): stan de la ni bdag par bya// tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba'i// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan/ rin chen gtsug gis rnam par mdzes// tshad med
212a6(rgyud): dang ni sbyangs pa yis// dbu la rkun pos mdzes par bya// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/ chu skyes spyad ni yid tsam gyis// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon tu 'dung / 
212a7(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che// snying kar gsor la shin tu brtson// de la sogs pa'i yon ldan// thog ma nyid rnam par gzhag/ slob mo 'ab yang na gzhan yang rung / mtshon kun gyis ni rnam rgyun pa/ du
212a8(rgyud): bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste/ dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ dbus kyi skad la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhesu smra// des ni slob/ 
212b1(rgyud): byin rlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskuraro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldaran/ yid 'ong bu mo btsal bas te// 'grin pa dpral
212b2(rgyud): ba snying spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te/ mtshad ma phyag rgya pa rab 'bar ba// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya/ mdun du lha mo
212b3(rgyud): smos byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dam pa kha dog 'dres pa yi// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug len pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du bzhag/ g.ya su l-I mo
212b4(rgyud): gsod byed ma// mtshod cha'i mda' ni 'dren par btsod// do shal rkang pa/ dub dag gis rgyar// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes sbyin ni yid tsam sngo// seda'
212b5(rgyud): la dgyes mdzad cing / 'di tshul bzhin bzhag par bya// rgyab tu lham rmongs byed ma/ pad+ma dmang po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga'
212b6(rgyud): byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pad+ma sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs bzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo
212b7(rgyud): sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni bcus ldan// rnal 'byor pa la shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnar
212b8(rgyud): klubs// sna tshogs dang gyi na bza' gsol// grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad// gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams// bdug pa me tog gsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni bzhag
213a1(rgyud): sgo la phyogs rnams thams cad du/ rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldadan/ skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa/ sgo srung bzhini bzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam par sna chags rnams// pi wang
213a2(rgyud): bu brdab pa dang // rnga rnga rje che bu ku dang // mu mdza dang dang dang // gang dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/ rol mo'i sa byang sna tshogs rnams// dga' bed dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams
213a3(rgyud): cang// dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyi rol du// rdo rje na mkha' 'gro ma bzhag/ oM dwags rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ skal ldan rang gi lag car ldan// gdug pa'i sems
213a4(rgyud): kyis bsdigs byed cing // sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ 
213a5(rgyud): gsod par byedang spro bar byed// rdo rje mkha'agro tshogasakyi rnams// shar gyi phyogasu bzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'jigs byed bong bu'i lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu
213a6(rgyud): yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bzhag par bya/ chags chen mo dang chags bral dang / 'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo// rab tu sbyor bas spyong byas te// ci rigs nub tu bzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang // gnod sbyin
213a7(rgyud): ma dang yang dag 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin rlangs te/ sngags mkhan ci rigs byang chub bzhag/ shar gyi grwa ru bzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing // 'jigs pa'i mag dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ji ltar
213a8(rgyud): rje su 'thun byas te/ mi dwags stan la yang dag 'dug sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te/ lag 'dri dang kheng gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrig za pa'o// nu dang lho la mtshams bzhag pa/ bzha dang dug/ 
213b1(rgyud): 'i na mang ba/ khros pa du'i dang pag gi gdang / gsum dzamal sngo 'byungs pa rub byang gan ma tshams dag tu rnam pa tsu gang 'dzin dang / khyas pa'i dadang byi la'i budang / sgyu ba'i mganas byang rnams
213b2(rgyud): shang du bang gsang bas ngag tu/ keng dus dkang po 'dzidang ste// khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klungs// lto 'drangs mo la bum pa 'dzin// phan dun 'thab par brtson pa yi/ lce sbyang gi na 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs
213b3(rgyud): byed gdong de mche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sgra srung gi ri phyogs kun tu// sgra bani rnam su bzhag bya ba/ byang gi ngog su'i'adong 'grogs te/ bum pa rna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jig pa
213b4(rgyud): mA ra di ga shi rje rgyal po bzhag// de dang gi'adas rgyal thal cig/ rnam khong 'gro bas kun tu bskur/ bus pa rnam pa ste tshogs te// gsar dang dngul las byas pa la/ sna tshogs gos kyis yang
213b5(rgyud): dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyad/ bdud rtsi lnga yis gdubs pa// sman lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// ri/ chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru rnams lnga yis rgyad bas pa'i// bub pa buH
213b6(rgyud): drug bzhag pas te// bcwa gnyis brgyad dpa yang na pyad// tha ra chung du gcig tsam yang // ji ltar ribs bzhin bzhag pas te// dbusu bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig rkus ni gang bas pa// gsar rab dngul lam za
213b7(rgyud): kyang rung // lcags sam sa la su bas pa la/ zla ba nyim dri chu dang // btung ba sgrub por ldun pa yi// dbang po kun las 'thung ba rnams/ sha sang gcig gis rab bsres pa/ kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog/ 
213b8(rgyud): kyang dusu bsgrub sa pa 'chu ze bdi du mangs pa mi'i ri ma ldang bzhim pa yi sa rnam pa rna lags 'i bas khabar ba dngani bza' das pa dang / mdzang pa'i ba las lnga da / Na pa dpa
214a1(rgyud): ldas/ da pe rnal byung ma chags pa / skang cig nad cig sa tshang ba bya/ sngags sa khang dun bzhi ma ma gnag ste// 'byung ba rnams la gtang ba byi/ rnams kyi ni thams cad la
214a2(rgyud): ka yi phyag rgya yis/ nyid kyi gtor ma bon rlabs te/ spyan drangs gtsang sgras byas pa dbul// gzungs kyi tshogs nidang rnams la// mnyes pa byas nas/ slar gshegaso// rnal 'bor ma chen dkyil 'khor du// slob ma
214a3(rgyud): mchog ni gzhugs par bya// mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma/ sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris/ lag pa g.yon gyis bzung byas te// rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yis gra'i du// blo
214a4(rgyud): ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya// 'di las mi bya cung zad med// thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag tu dogs pa med byas te// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tad spyod// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa da
214a5(rgyud): skye bo gang dag dam la gnon// brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drangs te/ khrag chen po ni btung bar bya// gang dag slob dpo/ smod bye dang // gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa/ deg khros nas khrag chen
214a6(rgyud): tha~Mng blo ldan snying las btung bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa/ rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yi// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam tshig blung byas te/ dza
214a7(rgyud): bdud rtsim mo mchog/ dung chen podzin padag par bya/ rdo rje 'dud rtsi'i chu drud/ kye dmyal ba yin mu 'di ste/ khyod kyi snying la kun tu gnas/ dam tshig bsrungs pas dngas grub ste/ nga rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung // 
214a8(rgyud): oM 'bra su dag hUM Ta/ dam tshig la ni brgyar po zlas pa'i// byin gyis brlabs te'i thung du gzhug gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te/ ngangs grub du'ang 'di 'gyur/ bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' gas/ slobs snga
214b1(rgyud): ni brjod du zhugs/ sgo grang gnas nas bri ba ba/ kye khod dga' bcil dang // 'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba/ bdag ni skal ldan pa de mchog la/ rab dgyes 'bral la bdag dga' ste/ mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'o/ 
214b2(rgyud): de nas rna la 'bong ma mchog gis// dkyil du me tog bo rlabs te// me tog gang la ltung ba yi// lha nyi ni dngos gru'o// dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis// de nas skye bong dbang bskur ba// bus pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang / 
214b3(rgyud): mnyam par banag ste lnga po yis// pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhugs pas te// de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs para'i gzungs ma'i rnams// bdag ni skal ldan zhes sgra/ gang dag 'gro bar gyur pa yi/ lha de da na
214b4(rgyud): bstan pa ba// dga' bar byed pa'i gzugs ma de'i/ khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang gi sbas pa bsdus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis// spyor dang ldan
214b5(rgyud): bas dbang bskud ba// rdo rje pad+mo las drangs pa/ sbom bau dang ni dbang gis blangs// rdo rje dkan du bzhag pas nas// rtag pa dge ba bde ba che// kye ma'od pa tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma bdang blang
214b6(rgyud): 'dra ba// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba yi thabs pa ga/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che'i// rang gau khang ni rdo rje bzhag/ sems dpa' chen po drangs byas na// sems kyis byang rkub bde ba 'thob// 'dir
214b7(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba ste/ dbang bskur ba yi bde 'o// slob sa mi shes pa rnams la/ 'di dag thams cad bsgrags mi bya// rdo rje slob dpodan gyis bya ba/ yang nas yang du brtag par ba// 'di yis dbang ni bsku
214b8(rgyud): ma thag/ slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// slob dpa nyid bde bar 'gyur// gzungs pa rnams kyi dga' ba'i bdag / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjo bshad/ mkha' la 'dzin
215a1(rgyud): klu 'du da zlal sa la gyu pa sum ma dan sa ma kya / nas klu
215a2(rgyud): 'tha'u gyis/ ngas la ni skyon bdubya// deng bskung shin tu sbas pa yis/ rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo lnga na'i tsham me pa'i phyir/ rnam pa zan pa ma skyed//  chus cad ni slab ma la/ rgyud ku ni las na ga
215a3(rgyud): zadang mo de'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams// gsang ba mchog ni bstan pa bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te/ sleb dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas/ rgyal po dbang phyug bdedas pa/ thams cad yan ni dbul
215a4(rgyud): bar bya// gzungs de dag thams cad la/ ci dga' bar ni yon yang 'bul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung / dam tshig 'das pas 'jigs sa yis// de dag thams na/ 
215a5(rgyud): dbul bar bya/ slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyab par dbul byas te// seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyi/ sa ma// sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin// glang po rin chen gser sa/ 
215a6(rgyud): dag sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog yin// rdo rje sem sa dpa'i rigs yin te// yon dmachog gi yon yin// rin chen pad+ma'i chung ma dang // shing rtarta ni shin tu rgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa/ 
215a7(rgyud): mu tig phreng bas shin tu mdzes/ bu mo rin chen dra ba'i yis// rgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang / chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi gzhon pa sna tshogs pa// glang po rta ni shi
215a8(rgyud): tu rgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya// bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di/ rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis/ ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis pa// de la
215b1(rgyud): sogs pa'i sbyong ba yis rabang gyis gdod mi za ba'i bde/ gang gis myung du 'thob 'gyur te/ slob dpon gcom chog 'i du 'gyur/ chos rnams kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal/ rdo rje blo ldad mchog tu 'gyur sa
215b2(rgyud): chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhi sna tshogs rigs kun tu/ pad+ma'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang / rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur/ 
215b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar// nyi dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog par ba// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i
215b4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje cha yi thabs gnas te/ ma kha 'gro kun la mchod par ba// pi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs/ rang gi mchod pa mchog rnams/ phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshu
215b5(rgyud): bzhid rgyas pa dbul bdu ba// lus dang ngag sa mas bde bad kyis// mchod po'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 2dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yi// myangs na mchod pa 'thab par 'gyur/ 
215b6(rgyud): bkur gyi cho ga yis// rang rigs khyad par shes byas te/ sgrub po thams cad sgrub byas nas// dngos grub thams cad myung du 'thob/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgu rangs pa'i
215b7(rgyud): yid kyis ni// dza rje sems la dag bying cing / rang gi dkyila'i khong gsol ba 'di bas/ bde byed ched po'i skyel ma brgya/ rig kyi khyad par gyis ri wa/ lha rnams kyang ni ring yang / sems kyi khyang
215b8(rgyud): mchog mthar yas/ 'das po'i dus nam byung ba/ mtha' yas chas ni langs pa bsdad/ 'dod chags rnams kyis dgas pa 'i// sdug bsngal gzing ba'i mtha' das 'dra/ 'dod pa ma ga la myong
216a1(rgyud): mos pa'i rje su zhugs shing spyod/ kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing // bde bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// das bcas rnams dang sems kyiso// de das bcom
216a2(rgyud): ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po// rab tu bzhad cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa kun tu long spyod pa'i dkyil mo krung gi dpal zhes
216a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// skyil mo krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // g.yas dang g.yor gyis tshul gyis ni// rkang pa
216a4(rgyud): gnyis ka bteg byas te/ bdag nyid bad+ma ni mi sdang ba dazhin/ rtsa ba skyil mo bcing bar ba// sbyong ba gang mkhan tshul gyis ni/ gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdan gyi bdab che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal
216a5(rgyud): ngar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad// skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis/ yang da ga byang chub myud du thob/ mi byed pa ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phogasu mi
216a6(rgyud): ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas// 'byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad// pad+mo mi pad 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyor bar bya// mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan// tshig dag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med
216a7(rgyud): la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yis rtsen par byas pa na// na mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad// gzungs kyi
216a8(rgyud): pad+ma las byung ba// bde byad mchog gi dbang bskur// de nas rab dga' bde thob pa/ sems dpa' deng ni dngos grub// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par/ 'dod pa thams cad de long spyod// cha dang dpal dang phun sum ldan/ 
216b1(rgyud): dang dug dpa cha ba'i nang // mkha 'gros 'bang gtses pa dang // sdig can 'khor ba las grol te// sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu// gzi brjid 'i ma shar dang 'dra// sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas// sna tshogs 'ang
216b2(rgyud): snang bad cing // de yi sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yis sbyar ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bstan par bya// rtsa ba'i bskyil mo zhes bya ba/ phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don
216b3(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// bang gi rkang pa dbu su bsdu/ do yi rkang pas bcings byas te/ sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin// yig
216b4(rgyud): rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas/ bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung // sngags pa 'di yis dngos grub ste/ sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi// zhag bdun sgom pa sgom
216b5(rgyud): byas nas/ yang dag dngos grub 'du 'gyur/ phag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab te// sbyor ba shin tu bsten byas nas// gdo/ ma za bar rgyal po 'thob/ yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed// rdo
216b6(rgyud): rje skyil mo kru // gzungs ma sde bcing ba ni// don pa che ltar sbyar byas te/ rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya// rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung / 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul zhing tshangs pa 'jongs pad / sngags
216b7(rgyud): thang 'phrag byed pa pachang ba'i dug kur 'phrog par byed/ gdul ba thams cad thongs byed/ blagra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ khro ba thams cad 'jum byed/ gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs na/ 
216b8(rgyud): g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni/ 'a yis rgyal ba dngas grub/ yod pazhin las rnams thaMthang byed/ ma ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru// mtshob tu mad 'byung sgrub 'ad/ don chen sems kyi rin chen macan/ gsang ba'i pa
217a1(rgyud): la ga su rnal pa 'das gdu tu grums kyis grus 'gyus ma ma rgyam ma rgang ca mam pas pa 'ju sa
217a2(rgyud): gdang yang rung // rje lde padro bde bsgrub pa/ 'di yis sems can thams cad dang / mdong na sangs rgyas rnams dpa dang / rdo rje'i ma ma lus kyang / dbang du 'gyur pa gdang mi za/ bde ldar po dra chen po yis// bde ba
217a3(rgyud): 'joms 'thob par byeng / sems cad khams rnams thad du/ sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed/ badrar skyil lo'o// de bzhi skyil pa rgyas byas te// snga tshogs tshul gyis sbyang ba bya// sngags mkhan ma
217a4(rgyud): sbyar ba yid// sngags mkhar yi ge shin tu brtsor// zlos pa byed cing rnams bsgoms ni// dngos grub rtag pa 'thob par 'gyur// mi g.yang sngor gyi gdug pa yi// las rnams thams cad 'phrog pa
217a5(rgyud): sngo tshogs skyil du gnas pa yis// bla mad dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o// de nas mkha' gro'i skyil mo rgyas thams cad khrag ni 'phrog pas te/ gzungs pa yin
217a6(rgyud): rkang pa gnyis// yid kyi gnya' ba brka' pa 'dig// rdo rje mkha'agro sbyong ba yis// bsnyen pa khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par gzhag nas gzungs ma yi// rkang pa gcig ni mgul zhing // sbyor dang ldan
217a7(rgyud): pas bteg byas na/ zas rnabs thams cad 'phrog byed// btud dang bza' ba bca' ba dang // gos kyi rgyaran gyis klubs pa yis// de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang // thams cad las byeng gdon mi za// tshangs pa
217a8(rgyud): gtogs 'dod dbang po yi// dpal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed// lag pa sgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// khams gsum rim pa rgal bar byed// mig ni btsums par byed 'gyur ba// 'gro ba gsum po rnam pa
217b1(rgyud): 'jig rus sbal bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na// gdug pa'i srog chags thams cadang / drag dang spyad ba cas mi spyad dog/ sngal ba bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ dkyil 'kho dul
217b2(rgyud): gyis bskor bar bya'o// sa lus rnams kyang rmongs pade// khams gsum dmas kyang rgal bar byed// gtogs 'dod kyi ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdang ba// gar dbang gi ni mnyam gzhag ste
217b3(rgyud): sa gsum rnams ni gar dad gzhag/ dril bu yi ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhona'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed// skyil mo pad ni mnyam gzhag nas// bany+dzi
217b4(rgyud): pa yis ni ba du byas / khams gsum thams cad gdod 'gyur zhing / 'dod byed thams cad dngas grub// dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas skyil po rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed pa yi ma
217b5(rgyud): 'ongam/ khabs gsum zad dngas gru'o/ rigs 'dzin rnam par gnas/ byas te/ khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i// mdang 'dus
217b6(rgyud): gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis/ 'jog rten gsum ni rnang rgyal te/ skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phan tshun 'brel pa yis// dpung pa gnyis ni skum byas te// thams cad sde
217b7(rgyud): 'gegs pa yis/ mche ba sbob po rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi brkyang bskub tshul gyis ni// gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te/ mi phyed spyong bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sebs kyis mya bar bya/ kham
217b8(rgyud): ba'i brkyang bsgrub sbyang ba bya// myu dgam nan pas bteg bya zhing / mthe'u chung bang ba'i lcags kyu yis/ mdzub po lce la rig byas te/ sa bzhi tshig drag rje lda pa'i// thig lo'i skye bar rgya nubs pas// 'das
218a1(rgyud): 'amadi rig sa drang bya/ lce mi thog mang sto byas te/ 'dre pa'i tshul gyis drang ba bya// dza rdza gdang sbya mnyal gnas ste/ lam rgya gsums thams/ zlum po lce dang 'du byas te// khrum pa
218a2(rgyud): mcheb sbyong ba yis// mar mo zad pa bzhin byas nas// khrag mang ba ni btung ba bya// yo ge dang mi oM dang ldan// spyi bor thig le ldang byas te/ 'og gi phyog su ra yis gdags// u 'dran pa ros brgyan pa
218a3(rgyud): bya 'od ni kho bo'i snying po ste// mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang // tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur
218a4(rgyud): shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas/ rang gi lus ni bsku dam byas te/ bum bu lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yi// dag rnams thams cad bas dpar bya// nga ro dang po yang dag ldan// bdag nyid nga ba thams cad bya// sa
218a5(rgyud): rgyas chen po sgom byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung sgra de yi lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// de yi sems can thams cad kyi/ mab gdon dang dug la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' gro'i mche ba dang // 'chi
218a6(rgyud): ba thang bral bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyis ri tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// sdug bsngal dogs par 'phrog par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ 
218a7(rgyud): namamakha' sa stang las kyi rnams// snying khar rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag/ yid bzhin thaMd byed par 'gyur/ myur du rdo rje slob dpon la/ sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus pa zhes sar bcas pa yi/ 
218a8(rgyud): tu rgyas par byags bdud nas ya blas pan gyi sems na krug pa sa bya ste/ ci ste shes pa'i la bas khyed khyung dus 'i ltung bar 'grug / 'dadal 'a grag/ dag gad ma dun
218b1(rgyud): slob dpor zhabs la sdong bang pa// gti mug chen por de 'chi'o// bla ma las ni dngos grub 'thob// bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde// de bas nan tan thams cad kyi// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa
218b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shing tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdong mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig
218b3(rgyud): bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dpagasung dang thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig la'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa
218b4(rgyud): che pe'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs// rdo rje rnal 'bor pa dang / rnal 'ab
218b5(rgyud): dang rnal 'bor gyi dang 'phyug ched thar tshogs dang rdo rdza namakha' la 'gro ba dang / ramakha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams pa rog tu dga' ba chad ba skyes te/ caco 'brid ci
218b6(rgyud): dbangs chen pa brjod par gyur to// kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shing tu dgyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed de/ sna tshogs ye shes bde ba 'i// kye ma kun tu bzang po yoM/ dge ba'i ye shes pa
218b7(rgyud): thom gang ba de'i rim ma ma// badralas 'i gnas pa mdzad/ kye ma rig pa shid tu bab/ shes rab par la phyin pa bde/ sems can ku la shes rab kyi/ mun pa'i thibs pa sel bar badzad / kye ma rga
218b8(rgyud): dam yo'i 'dra drangs gang ba cing / rab par dzad du nga ba dang / mna'i ngan 'bras ma mtsha sa ma shing tu ba tung gyis nal ldan mal la spang ba dang / ldam las sam pas 'du
219a1(rgyud): sna chags rdo rje shin tu mdzes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang ba shin tung dgyes pa chen po kun tu lang spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shi tu dgyes pa bde ba chedan po la gnas pa la ral 'a
219a2(rgyud): mthang dang // mchog gi pha rol phyin pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te// shin tu dgyes pa
219a3(rgyud): chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad// sgyu ma'i bde bas na mkha' kun tu gang ba yi// sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog go bde ba sten te// rjesu chags pa'i bad+ma
219a4(rgyud): dga' bas kun khyab cing / chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btab stoms mdzad/ i ma'o// 'di lta'i gzugs ma bad mchog dpal dang dam ldan ma/ byams pa'i phyogasum gtang ye shes nyid kyi
219a5(rgyud): 'jug 'dod pa'i yon 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag/ dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral bang snying por bgrod// de nas bcom
219a6(rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyar rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad+mo dang gnyi su medapa' sbyar ba'i dpal chen po zhes pa pa
219a7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chang mi gsung ba mnyam par zhugs te/ dbugs mi rngub dbugs mi byed/ dbugs rab tu gtang bar mi mdzad/ kun tu mi gzigs kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bane
219a8(rgyud): par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par ma mdzad/ gshegs par mi mdzag / gsung ba yang mi mdzad/ rnam pa rtag pa yang mi mdzad/ pazhin du bcom ldan nas shin tu bdib chen pas nas pa' dgas ma
219b1(rgyud): shin tu khyab pang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na// deng de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i man tan gyis mnyes
219b2(rgyud): ba byas te bzhags par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang / 
219b3(rgyud): gnyi su med pa 'i long spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs te// bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kang zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la yang thim par
219b4(rgyud): khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang // 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa yang mang/ 
219b5(rgyud): khros pa dang gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa chen po sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog
219b6(rgyud): 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang // gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chubs pa dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang // nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gces pa dang // gcig gi sha/ 
219b7(rgyud): gcig za ba dang // thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis// kye ma'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlago zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
219b8(rgyud): gzigaso// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam ched pon pa la'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ dge
220a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa shin tu dgyes pa chen pa'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang ba chen po dpal dza sems dpa' la drabyangs kyi rgyal ba 'dis bskul
220a2(rgyud): ba mdzad// ho rang bzhin dag pa dag pa pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba// thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad// bskal ba mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i khams pas gzugs kyis
220a3(rgyud): brjid pa dang // byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus/ a la la la ho/ pad+mor 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngal kun sel ba yin thugs rjes 'jig
220a4(rgyud): gsum la gzigs/ dga' ba'i rol pas gang dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod/ a la la la ho/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrags gsang ba'i 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gas
220a5(rgyud): chen 'di phyung ste// rna ma dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'a phrogs namakha' la// dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'bang ba zhi/ ngas shing mdzad du gsol// e la la la ho// skad cig ma yi spyod
220a6(rgyud): yul 'dis// mun pa thams cad sel ba'i pir// gzhan la thugs rjes dgongs nasu// bying ba'i lha rnams basman du gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskal bas na// pad+ma
220a7(rgyud): dra ba rdo rje dang // bde bar sbyor bar bzheng su gsol / bde ba chen po bde gnas pa/ gtsol 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te/ rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad// de nas
220a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das da ba chen po kun tu bzang ba dang la rdo rje 'dzin la 'dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'di' chen pos rgyan pa'i da la zhes bya ba ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs sa
220b1(rgyud): mtha' yas rab 'byab mtha'as klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams gsub 'di stong so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams da
220b2(rgyud): bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'dig nye bar gtses// gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cadang / na dang / 'che ba dang gdon chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i 'od yongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos
220b3(rgyud): zhes dgongs pa na// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi sku dang / 
220b4(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bdu ba ste// nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung // thog mar ma~M ni thig le
220b5(rgyud): bsam byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug/ sgra 'byin pa/ mi byed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ 'di/ ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid/ phyung nas rnam pa'i dbyings
220b6(rgyud): thad da gang ba'i spro bas sdang ba byas te/ slar yang 'das nas rdo rje lta bur gan so// yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas slar 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sad
220b7(rgyud): lta bur gyur nas/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbu su bzhugs par gyur pa na/ hUM hUM hU zhes bzhad pa chen po bzhad cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam 'a
220b8(rgyud): bas 'dud pa// g.yas kyi dajug so zhing 'jus dang bcos shing spyad rgyas pa/ che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan/ sna tshogs sku'i mchog 'dzin pa/ kha dog rnas lnga gzi brji ma/ 
221a1(rgyud): ma rnams pa sna tshogs 'dzin rdo rje sgrum ma rab tu gnas/ mkhas pa gang gis snyi pa nyid/ mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin bas na/ rdo rje bad+ma bde tshe yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde srung 'thong
221a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha'ang 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs
221a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis zla gsang thig le las na mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung / oM yi gtsug tu thig le ste/ 
221a4(rgyud): byed thig ler bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag/ bcas// mthar ni dra ste chag drag bcas// 'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog tu rmad 'byung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni dmala'
221a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu// 'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te/ slang yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang // lnga yis tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// 
221a6(rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha dog rnams lnga yangs par spyan// chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs
221a7(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying khang rin chen 'dzin// brgyad gnyis phyag rgya ngo bo yis// dri ma gsum spangs rgyan pa ste/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tsho
221a8(rgyud): ru gnas par 'gyur/ rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa'i// nad kyis blangs pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzi brjid chen mo mdangs cha ba// dbul dang nadang gan
221b1(rgyud): sems ca kun gyi 'brog par byed/ sa 'chang ba'i dus nyid dang / nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyidadu/ phyid kyi snyingag pa'adu byas te/ nong bu ma chen slos nA// zhag 'du gyis ni nges par yang / bas grub ngan ma
221b2(rgyud): spyod mdzad de// dbang pa gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ kye ma'i bdebs dbang bskur ba// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pa mchog tu ri ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i
221b3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang gi dngal 'as pa pa'i ting 'dzin la spoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i long spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ye
221b4(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig la las 'di byung dang por oM dang ldan byas te// mi byang rab brtags 'dren par bcas/ tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pa thams cad yongasu bskor
221b5(rgyud): sngags ma khan gang gis ma'as gzhag ste/ snying kheng 'dod spyang byas nas/ bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing / ba tra sbyar bas bsgom par bya/ mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu/ 
221b6(rgyud): dam tshig 'dir spyad byas na/ zla ba byed kyi rang log su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob/ pad+mo cha las byung nas kyang / thams cad do rgyas 'gyur te/ 'di 'dud slar zhugs nas/ pad+mo'i tshul gyis gangs
221b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ de nas 'dod chags babs nas kyang / pad+mo'i dbus zhugs par gyur/ dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab ras
221b8(rgyud): sumachis marjod co/ 'dzum bcos bajug pa sa/ zugs kyi dbu myi mi cam 'dud/ pal dang ldan pa gal lnga 'dzims phyag na ci shing bzhis mi bltam/ mtshan tshangs pa sngachags sa
222a1(rgyud): / tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba/ brjid pas gang ni mdzad cing bzhugs/ 'di yis pad+mo'o gnas 'du// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gA
222a2(rgyud): dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyi// gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul/ da ras bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen
222a3(rgyud): po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu long spyod pa'i rnam pab 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gas pab
222a4(rgyud): zla gsang thig le chen po las phyung // sna tshogs chen po oM chen po/ steng du thig ler yang dag ldan// 'di ni dbus te lha 'og khro/ snga kyi mchog ni bzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di ni thu
222a5(rgyud): kang grags/ sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kur mnyes byas// de nyid slar 'khor bar bzhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas// skad cig
222a6(rgyud): sku gnas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas rgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin/ sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong // phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phogs/ kha 'byengad sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong // zhal
222a7(rgyud): lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs slob thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas bang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs khar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag ga
222a8(rgyud): sngags mkhan zhag bdan nyid sgom byas na// sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs de la bab/ sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 
222b1(rgyud): dbangs chen po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa mdzad// gtso bo bin gyis brlab pa'i ping // ye shes lnga yi dngos po dge/ rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas sku
222b2(rgyud): l-i bstod pag 'tshal / sngags rigs pag rgya yan lag bcas lha yi de nyid pa rol pin// bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs so// sna tshogs ye shes bsgod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+ma yang dag ldan/ 'dod byed thugs
222b3(rgyud): kyi mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol pan sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod pag 'tshalo// chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me long ye shes yang
222b4(rgyud): dag 'byung / bya ba nad tan sems cad don// rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod// de nyid rig pas sems can kun/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs rgyas
222b5(rgyud): gsum re dab du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyi su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gsheg
222b6(rgyud): bathad kyis bin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang // thugs rdo rje las byung / oM b+h+rUM/ spong ba chen po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra tsahrI hUM/ oM badz+ra kA ya a~M oM/ badz+ra bAka AHoM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ 
222b7(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma yang // de nas de ba'i dgashegs pa thams cad shin tu mag/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phag pas te// 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rab
222b8(rgyud): gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen por tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad// dga'o dpe'o rgyal ba kun/ 
223a1(rgyud): dpe 'ong ga'i rgyal ba mchog 'a'i dga'i legs pa'i las dag dge rdzun grog / dge'i she logs pa/ shing kyi 'a su sa te/ ngag gsangs bshad pa mdzad gang
223a2(rgyud): gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ bde ba'i yid ni rgud par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi stong pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
223a3(rgyud): byung oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA/ shA n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi stong po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las b+h+ya
223a4(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga Na ma ti de'i dz+nyA na badz+ra sI b+hA ba at+ma kato// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas so kun tu gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po cid
223a5(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung// i sar+b+ba Sha dzA tI ma hAb tu pra be k+Sha dz+nyAn badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kaNi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das maHma panyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
223a6(rgyud): ra'og snying po nyid kyi sku gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phying // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma hAdz+nyAn badz+ra swa b+hA ba a hAkatsaM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pa banan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang
223a7(rgyud): snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kr-i t+ya a nu sta ne dz+nyA ni badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko tsa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad
223a8(rgyud): oM dge 'o dga' stong pa che/ oM dge'o dge'o thugs chen po/ oM dge'o dge'o sku chen po// oM dge'o dge'o gsung chen po// oM dge'o dge'o rin po che'o// dge'o dga'o sna tshogs che// de nas bac+doMs de
223b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te// dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// dga' bad bcom ldan cid
223b2(rgyud): kyis shod// gang gis sems cad bde nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu thob par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'a
223b3(rgyud): byung bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid de// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor rgyan pa'i bdag nyid// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyi gsung
223b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par// gtso bo chen po nyid kyi sa shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// 
223b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa yis// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba
223b6(rgyud): ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs
223b7(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung // gzugs dpalang tshos rgyan pa yi// bu mo mig yangs bzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin rlabs 'bras// mnyam par gzhag ste byir rlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag
223b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo bzhag/ gnyis po mdun du bzhag byas pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru
224a1(rgyud): / bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid bzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag
224a2(rgyud): gnas dang rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma yin// bzod pa chen mo byang du ste// bsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdan ma za// dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i// grwa dag
224a3(rgyud): tu ni thams cad// snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs/ sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad// sgo srung rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod pa ste// slob ma mchog ni gzhags par bya// phyag rgyas lag
224a4(rgyud): brgyan byas te/ 'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par daklubs// spro ba chebs gang bya zhing // lha yi 'gying ba'i 'dun pa yis/ dga' byed dkyil 'kho
224a5(rgyud): gzhug par bya// mig ni dang gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te lag bas bzung nas kyang // sgo yi grang yang gzhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni smra ru gzhugs// rdo rje chen po bdag
224a6(rgyud): ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rang gi dgyes gnas las byung ba'i// bde byed chen mos mnyes par bgyi// ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob// me tog phreng ba dang byas te// lha mo chen mo
224a7(rgyud): bzhe su gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshalo// lha mo gang la lhung ba yi// de ya~M lag nas bskor ba bya// lha mo 'di ni khyo dang 'thun/ sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni
224a8(rgyud): bdagi rab dgyes smra bya zhing // de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi phrad phaT// mtha' ni ho zhes sbyar bar bya// 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje phyung ba yi// 
224b1(rgyud): mkhas pas don blang byas te// bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas/ bla ma la ni dang bor dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang / ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya// spyi bos zhabs la btugasu pas te/ bla ma la ni dbang
224b2(rgyud): blangs bya// shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang // bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor ba chen po yi// snyoms par bzhugs te de bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te/ spyi bor rab tu bzhag
224b3(rgyud): pa ba// lag pa yis ni ma reg par// kha la rab tu sbyid par ba// khyad pa dang ni dang byas te// ci bde bar ni btung bar bya// gzungs ma de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyid pa rub// de nas slob ma mchog
224b4(rgyud): nyid kyi// bla ba la ni yon dbul ba// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ri rgyal srid dang // de bzhin long spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang
224b5(rgyud): glang po rta dang shing rta dag / bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// pi yaM sbas pa gsang ba dang // de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad // rdo rje dang ni gzung
224b6(rgyud): ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'i dngos grub dri bar ba// snying po yang dag shes gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di// ci ste
224b7(rgyud): rmongs pas smra byas na// slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du zla phyed chun can du// bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ dang por dab tshig gzhag pas te/ phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan
224b8(rgyud): pad+ya bya// gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams/ dmyal bar bskal par gengs med smin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/ dam tshig
225a1(rgyud): / srung la brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub/ lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi// gsal yang bzhe su mi gamang ste/ 'jig rten 'di ru sdug
225a2(rgyud): bsngal che/ 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das paso// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'tho'o// slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ des na sngags kyi don ma
225a3(rgyud): smin pa lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde// dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyuraro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang / 
225a4(rgyud): de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams// dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis/ dmyal ba ngan song bzla ga pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyid par byed// sngags
225a5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur de bzhin gsheg pa kun gyi dal/ dkyil 'khong tshul bzhin du byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon// dam tshis
225a6(rgyud): slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhags bya// dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang // rdo rje las byung chub sgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor
225a7(rgyud): la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/ dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yi/ myur du dam tshig sgrub byas na// dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs
225a8(rgyud): te 'dzin pa yis ni mtha' ru 'gyur// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po cher// blo ldan dba' bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas
225b1(rgyud): kun gyi 'thob 'gyur te/ dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// 
225b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'deb so// bdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs par
225b3(rgyud): byed pa chen po 'di// rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/ dkyil 'khor chen po rnams bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpos gyi// gsang
225b4(rgyud): ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang / la rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa 'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
225b5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di byung // oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN+DA sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na dang pa tsa hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi
225b6(rgyud): stob chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drag tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yas/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nas kha'i lding dang / mau 'am ci dang / lha
225b7(rgyud): 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyid dang / srid po thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyis tha du lhags na brgya bi bdag nyid kyang skyabs med
225b8(rgyud): bong mthong nas tshangs pa'i thadu phyid tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin te/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i 'du bor te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'dzegs byed/ 
226a1(rgyud): chen po'i gzugasu byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shin
226a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyad par 'di lta bu
226a3(rgyud): gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas mnos shig ces dbugs phyung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal
226a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gsheg/ dab thams cad kyi khro bar khro gnye chen po zhes pa ba// khro ba chen pa'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
226a5(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes las pung // oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra khAM dz+yaM b+haM dza/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa hUM/ b+h+rUM b+h+rU~M/ brad+d+ha/ ya brad+d+hA ya/ b+h+r-i ku n+ya no sar+b+ba pA ra t+na sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ 
226a6(rgyud): ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hUM bruM/ hUM tra~MHtraT traT/ b+h+r-i hUM traM/ hUM traM traT/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thaMd du nye bar lhags// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag
226a7(rgyud): che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che ba'i lha chen po ste// gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag pa yin// rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug
226a8(rgyud): de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i dgad pa'i gdas
226b1(rgyud): / 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
226b2(rgyud): te snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba 'chang ba'i khro bo thang slang log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kang zhug so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'o snying por bdag nyid bir gyis brlabs nas/ bac+doMs
226b3(rgyud): kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i kha nas phyung / oM pad+ma ma hA dz+wa la ma hA kro d+ha ba ta ba ru kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ khA hi khA hi sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta~M nA~M// da ma dam/ badz+ra daSh+To ta ka Ta ma~M ta ma ta/ k+Sho Ta k+Sho Ta/ badz+ra khar
226b4(rgyud): tsa ba la duH be ga tras tras/ mahA badz+ra ba Da ba mu kha pra ma ta pram ta hUM phaT/ hri haha hi ti/ tsa tu mu khe be sha pra NA sha na/ hUM hri hU~M hrI ha// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu tshangs ris chen
226b5(rgyud): po 'dar pad pad cing kha bub tu 'gyel te/ rngab 'tshalo// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te// dbang phyug chen po la dris pa// lha 'di ni shin tu mtshar du snang // de nas dang
226b6(rgyud): phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems cad kun gyi gtso bo// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po// khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i pir
226b7(rgyud): khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis shig de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang // tshangs pa chen po srin po'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas// 'dzi
226b8(rgyud): byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa// me lce stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus mgal ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdag pa thams cad la nye bar stod cing gan so// de nas ba
227a1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes pa khro bo ched po'i ting 'dzin la yang dag khar sgoms pa bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen par
227a2(rgyud): po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs kha nas phyung // oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba duShA na sa ma b+hak+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha ha na han hUM phaT/ de nas 'dri byung ma thag tu brgya
227a3(rgyud): byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par gyur// brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa yang kha bub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal
227a4(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul pa// khyod ni lha'i tshogs tha mas cad kyi bdag po ste// mthu che ba yid la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
227a5(rgyud): lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gan
227a6(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po'i gzugs nye bar spyan cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag la 'jigs shig nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyi 'azil gyis gnan mi nuso zhes dbugs 'byin
227a7(rgyud): nga / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de dag thad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las
227a8(rgyud): 'jug par mdzad// bcug nas kya 'khro ba chen po thaMd phyag rgya chen po mngon par bsgru nas bdag nyid kyang khro ba thams cad 'byin pa zla ba chen po'i gzug su dmigs te/ mche ba chen po byin gnas mi sdu
227b1(rgyud): sman steng ga/ nyi ma chen po stong gis gzi brjid can/ rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i mi rlung gis 'das pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dung khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyis phyag rgya mo'i keng rus dang / khrag dang / sha dang / klang ba da
227b2(rgyud): rkang dang / tshil rnams zasu gsol ba/ mi'i lpags pa rnam g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce sbrang dang / ra
227b3(rgyud): khi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas pang ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs
227b4(rgyud): na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang // zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byang ba'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs kyi
227b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnaso// lho'i dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang 'khyil bar gyur te gan so// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad+ma
227b6(rgyud): bo rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang ma'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas// bang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje 'ung 'u chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang/ 'a khyil
227b7(rgyud): gyur te gan so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu gyes pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i
227b8(rgyud): ba chen pos kun tu spyad cing khro bo chen pa'i rnam par brgya stong me tha' ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas// mamakha'i dbyings pa 'byam thams cad du gang bar byas te// stong gsum gyi skang chem pa
228a1(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang ga/ ngabadub so// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs spangs skyabs ma mtho das// rab rang gi bdag po'o 'dus
228a2(rgyud): ste rje cig rje cig nyid kyi bdag la skyobs shig/ de ras dbang phyug cher po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongasu
228a3(rgyud): bsgom du bcug nas// 'jigs byang gdungs pa ngal skyabasu song zhes bsgo yang skyabasu 'gro ba mi len cing / slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de// 'jigs pad chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba byang
228a4(rgyud): ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar snyad cing // dag pa chen po lang ro 'byin par gyur to// oM ma hA b+hai rab baSh+Ti nA~M/ Ta Ta ta T+Ta ta/ ta ta i ti/ 'on kyang nga spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung che
228a5(rgyud): yang ma 'gul to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo das he ru ka'i ngar 'byin cing mgo bor mngon nas bsnur te// he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'dzi
228a6(rgyud): byed chen ba bar 'byin cing sgyu ma'i sbub bu drangs nas/ khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams zazhi 'che mchem mdzad pas// de'i 'khor la rab tu ston papa mdzad de// um dang 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam pa na
228a7(rgyud): ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgred mar byas te sma phab nas/ khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar sprul cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul// skyabs lan du yang bcug/ dam tshig la yang gnas par byas te yang
228a8(rgyud): dag par zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag pa bshad pas bshad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyed khro ba chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig ce
228b1(rgyud): dbugs 'byir bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tud+ya thA/ oM
228b2(rgyud): bo d+ha bo d+ha a hA b+hai ra ba dang ba pa hA ri ha ra yar/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ shI g+h+raM ma hA badz+ra/ tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ ma tha ma tha hUM paT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs
228b3(rgyud): chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku na mkha'i dbyings kyi tshe du bskyed// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bskor ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te// 'khyil zhing bsgyung ba pag brgya stong mang po la mchodan chasna
228b4(rgyud): tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong ma lce bzhin du rab tu 'bang ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po gan ba der song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad
228b5(rgyud): cing mdun na gnaso// oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra aHTA hA sa hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hUM ha/ i ti/ da nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po bshad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par
228b6(rgyud): khas bub du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas// mgo la zhabs kyis bstan te gtong bar mdzad// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ha ma ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ ma ta ma ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sUr+ya sa ha pra ha sti/ re ka ba su rA dza la
228b7(rgyud): la rtsi pra dz+wa la ti/ ma hA rmu rti A ka b+ha A kaD+D+h+ya a ba wa ma b+ha wa ma kr-i na ba tsakra b+hai ra ba hri da yaM hUM b+hI/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo'o chen pos bzhad pas gzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khya
228b8(rgyud): pa'i gzugasu mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to// de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyan te/ khas bub du 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje cig bdag cag la
229a1(rgyud): skyobs shig ces smra zhing // skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabasu song // de nas biSh+Tas kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar snyan cing shin tu dgye
229a2(rgyud): ba chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugaso/ kA 'e kwa' gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnasu song shig/ de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtu
229a3(rgyud): bor gyur nas/ de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te// de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad/ oM badz+ra ba sUr+ya b+h+ri ku Te kro d+ha ma
229a4(rgyud): tAgra ha tang pa tang ba su su d+he/ ra ma sa med mad dzen oM b+hU d+ha b+hI/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlab par gyur te gnas// de'i chu'am rug min dang / ma hA sh+lo dang / lag
229a5(rgyud): spri yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdang chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas
229a6(rgyud): bar mdzad/ oM badz+ra ba ba ba mu kha kha kha khA hi khA ti/ tsa tu mu kha kha~M ba bi ba/ a t+ya ru d+hi ra~M/ A kaD+D+h+ya AM kar+N+Na/ hri da yAM tA na/ ta ma he/ badz+ra b+ha ga ba mu ka/ ti tiSh+Tha ma hA/ shwa shwe shwa ra tsA hrIM/ de nas rdo rje
229a7(rgyud): rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis na mkha' bkang nas rgyu bar byed de// de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khod
229a8(rgyud): khas bug tu 'gyel nas/ rje cog skyobs shig/ rje cig skyobs shig ces smras// kA ro kA re gdug pa'i gdongs sgyu dang song song // khyod kyi rgyab tu non te mdul ro zhes smras// de nas rdo rje rta gdo 'a chen po/ 
229b1(rgyud): rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas// tshangs pa chen po de'i mgong brdzis te// snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang / klad ba dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams myangs nas phyogs bcung pa
229b2(rgyud): de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ras ti dang / shAn+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom// de'i tshogs kyang gtul nas// dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa
229b3(rgyud): chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te/ gtong bar mdzad// a~M gu la gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya sha kra hri da yaM/ ma hA badz+ra daMSh+TA ya/ hUM b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha
229b4(rgyud): ya hUM/ he nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos na mkha'i ngos kun bkang te// brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas brgya byid 'gying ba chen pos 'gyings te/ mi bzad pa
229b5(rgyud): khras gnad sbyin chen 'a khyod du'i brad yin zhes de la smras// de nas rdo rje gnang skyed chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te// snying nas gtsug nong bu phyung sring yang yang dral te/ de
229b6(rgyud): dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang tshil bu dang / rus pa dang / bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhug so// de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing sngangs pa'i yid gyur te// skyab su nye bar 'gyuraro// de'i lha mo'i tshogs
229b7(rgyud): rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i
229b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen pa na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad/ oM ma hA su pa ta badz+ra ma hA kr-i d+ha sa car
230a1(rgyud): pa saM ha ra sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sham/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ ut+ta ma kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da la/ s+thA pa ya s+thA pa ya/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta bi ba ya khi dza ya bi dza ya
230a2(rgyud): kra pad+ma biSh+Nu ma hA shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga ba~M/ su ra ta sa~M kha kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sad+d+he na sa ma ma~M tse ho/ su ra ta sa ma ya i ti// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro za chen pos khro bo wa
230a3(rgyud): 'dren pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung // oM dzaHhUM baM ho/ Tak+ki hUM dz+dzaHTak+ki hUM dz+dzaHhUM Tak+ki hUM dz+dza/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya / bi d+ha ya
230a4(rgyud): ba shi ku ru/ sar+b+ba krod+ha/ sa ma ya/ dzaHhUM \u0f7f kr-i/ hUMdz+dza/ hUM k+ki dz+dza/ de nas khro ba chen po dam tshig dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khang langa' khyil
230a5(rgyud): par gyur te// kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam
230a6(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung / oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hUM phaT/ de nas deg la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po
230a7(rgyud): la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams gsos zhes gsol nas// de nas cang mi
230a8(rgyud): gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te brtsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta/ ma hA kro d+he shwa ri u
230b1(rgyud): shrI dzaHuta shrI dzaHbadz+ra a mr-i ti hUM a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen po de dag kun tu khros te sman ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa// ru lu ru lu zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo
230b2(rgyud): la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'o rig ma 'di phyung / oM aM mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni ma hA mr-i ta mu khaM/ pra ba sha ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra pad+ma sad yaM gau/ ma hA bo d+ha tsit+ta/ 
230b3(rgyud): pi tha bi tha/ mUrti a// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor la
