230b4(rgyud): thams cad mthong nas nga mchar bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro ba la skyab su gdangs bya'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams
230b5(rgyud): gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis// bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de// khyod ni seMn kun gyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te/ gtso bo 'dus pas
230b6(rgyud): bdag cag rnams/ 'jigs pa che las skyo pa ste/ rdza bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje/ khams gsum 'di ni bye dang gtong // che ba cha khyod skye bo skyong // thog ma mang khyad
230b7(rgyud): ngango thigs// nga rol stong ni cha yang med// gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi yi// rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yis// 'gro ba kun la phan ba'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnam// rab dgyes 'gro la
230b8(rgyud): ba'i phyir// mgon pa khyod kyis gtong ba mdzad// sems can 'das gyis mi gos shing / bla na med pa byang chub lam/ sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// sems can sgom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'a
231a1(rgyud): kha dpa' grong grol mdzad// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad/ rgyal ba kun gyi mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam par zhing 'gyur ba// rdul dang bral ba 'jug pa spangs
231a2(rgyud): namakha' sgrom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog drims ma gos te/ sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa/ gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la
231a3(rgyud): byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar// bdag cag skyabasu rab tu mchi// ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du// ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa/ khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang
231a4(rgyud): chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang // dri med skal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde ba chen pos stsal du gas la// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen
231a5(rgyud): bas de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te// zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis
231a6(rgyud): bde ba dang yid bsgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste// bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i 'phrul chen po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te// de nas dbang phyug chen po
231a7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtugs nas bskor bu byas te// ji lta
231a8(rgyud): ba bzhin du kun du yong su bskor nas gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor/ 
231b1(rgyud): ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ da ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang thugs
231b2(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra kro d+he shwa ri sar+b+baduSh+TA na mu dra Ni/ ma hA pa la yAn la sh+ma shAn b+hi Sha Ne/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha daMSh+Ta ka rA la kr-i ta ba da ne/ sar+b+ba sha hUM/ pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM ma hA kro d+ha sha
231b3(rgyud): hUM phaT phar/ 'dis ji lta bzhin du byir gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste// dpung po bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa mngag in+d+ra rI la'i
231b4(rgyud): 'di 'ab ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dngathong po'i khang pa dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / sgra gr-i dang / zhags pa dang / rtsi gsum pa dang / be tsan dang / mu su nga dang / 'khar lo dang / ka na ya She/ ta ma
231b5(rgyud): dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa nyi ma brgya dang me 'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen
231b6(rgyud): ma de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis bzhag par bya'o// oM ma hA badz+ra d+harma kro d+he shwa ri ma hA shwa shAn b+hi Sha Ni ni lA dzA las ha sra pra dz+wa li ta mU dza~M d+hi re ka pA la mA lA// b+hU
231b7(rgyud): 'i tam gu te/ nang du ti ra ba tra/ pa ri pu ri/ Shaka pA la/ a ste kha T+wAM ga/ badz+ra tri shu la gan+d+ha ma hA kro d+ha ma hA hUM hUM nU trA hU/ he he run+ta mun+ta pri ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa tshwa
231b8(rgyud): po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i mi khri mo'i dbang mo chen ma nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung / oM hUM tra~M ma hA sU
232a1(rgyud): / badz+ra kro d+da shwa ri bi d+ham/ ma tham pa/ gra sa gra sa/ sa r+b+ba ny+dza/ khAduSh+Ta~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+hudzatra/ tra tratra/ khro ma chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen por
232a2(rgyud): gtong zhing // shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rnaM ba ste// dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs par bya// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson// gdugs pa thams
232a3(rgyud): cad 'cha' byed cing / yi dwags chen po'i stan la zhon/ rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
232a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug sa rdo rje las phyung / oM hriHbadz+ra pad+ma ma hA ban+d+ha mu khe/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma to// d+ha ra bi ko be hUM hahUM hUM ta ha/ hUM hUM hri/ hai sha hiH
232a5(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra ba dang mu la mi hAt+ya t+ye/ hU~M nA Ni ta hUM hrIHhUM/ da kyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid// 'di ni rgyab tu bzhag par bya// rdo ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo chen mo
232a6(rgyud): dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdang / mo ro'i rtal yang dag bzhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs/ 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing
232a7(rgyud): g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan te gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khrom gnyi su med par 'dra ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang
232a8(rgyud): ldan ma 'as bya ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dardza las byung // oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA bi shaM sha hU d+hurtA/ he ha~Mta/ ma hA kro d+ha gu mu khe/ ma hA bi shwe ba da NaM/ bang+ku du Sh+pa pra sha mi ni nus
232b1(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag pas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongasu bskor nas gnas
232b2(rgyud): bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gtong // rab tu drag la ro mang zhing // gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor bas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro ma chen mo gdong gsum pa// za byed pa bzhin lta ba yi/ de yi ngo bo thad
232b3(rgyud): kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// bskor bang shes rab can gyis bzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mang ldan// dpung pa brgya dang ldan pa yi// don cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrad
232b4(rgyud): bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ phyi yi rnal 'byong ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yang su bskor// bzhag gas bri bdu ba yang rung / don de lta'i stan la gnas/ bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo// gdus
232b5(rgyud): ba'i khro mo rnam bsgru bcas/ de la sogs pa'i rnam ba ldan/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bdu ba// de nas rnal 'a bar gyi dang 'phrug char mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phag
232b6(rgyud): 'chal te// yang dang yangarang rang gis mngon pa gang bar byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'deb so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang // ngag rgya ma ni ci rigs pa // gsang ba'i gang ni bod can
232b7(rgyud): mo bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyi gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dbu pas
232b8(rgyud): rgya sbas pa dang / de khon nyi dang / gas ba rnams/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung // oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra sa tA a nur p+l-i ni ma hA kro d+ha hU phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra A kaR+Sha Ni la hA kro d+hi shAr hUM hUM dz+dzaHhUM
233a1(rgyud): nA ma~M sar+tha badz+ra d+ha dgu la a nu dgrani ma kru d+d+he shA DU ba rdul/ oM badz+ra badz+ra gram bAklo ng+ku shar dus sa rdzu sa sa d+ma badra sa Tha A d+d+hiShe/ d+hUHdz+dza a~M r+b+ba dz+ra
233a2(rgyud): hAsUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Te ka ro ke tra ta Ta ta hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu ke tu kro d+hi shwa raM ma hA bi dza yotA ye hUM hUM tra~M tra~M phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha AT+Ta A sa hU dzA hriM tr-i hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+hA maH
233a3(rgyud): kro d+ha b+hakA~M No hU~MhU~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hU~M tri/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha sa hA tIr+m+ma/ kro d+he shwa ra ts+tshirA ts+tshi hU~M hU badz+ra tik+Sha ha sne ts+tshe da ye hU~M dz+nyA Ta ma Ta/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha tsakra d+ha ri Ni ma ho gra drA pi ni hUM hU~M/ ba ta ya pa ta ya mahA badz+ra tsakre Nats+tshaH
233a4(rgyud): tsUN+Da ya/ hUM hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha da ma hA shA ga pra b+hAHhUM hUM ma ta ma tha phaT/ oM sir+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA bI shwa mu khi hUM hU~M phaT/ sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pA Ni hUM ha~M haM phaT raH/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ram
233a5(rgyud): badz+ra yar+m+ma Ne hUM hU~M/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ A bi b+ha A ba~M b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra b+ha da ma hA ke d+hi/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ pi ta ya bi ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM sad+d+h+ya badz+ra d+ha ra ta la da ni mahA
233a6(rgyud): d+hi shwa ri hUM hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mA li ni hUM hUM g+hu g+h+raM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he gan+d+ha ba hi hUM ga gr-i/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha rI ma hA kro d+he shwa ri ma hA lo ka d+ha dziH/ dI pa yaM dI pa ye hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro/ 
233a7(rgyud): shwa ri ma hA lA s+ya hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he mA lo d+hA di Ni hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA gI ti ni hUM he haM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha na rti ke hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya dz+nyA dz+nyA hUM hUM dz+dza/ oM
233a8(rgyud): sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi ba d+ha bi d+ha baM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+re d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA badz+ra ba shin hUM hUM/ oM sir+b+ba dz+ra d+ha dA mA hA kro d+hi sh+ya sh+ye hUM ta/ oM hU trA trA~MHoMH da nas rnal 'byong ma de dag mgu bas dga' ba gyur te// yang bya
233b1(rgyud): 'dis gsol 'dab so// bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgong su gsol// bsam gyis mi khab pad mchog dbyings dang ldan// mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbangs snyan pas// gzungs la rol pa'i bde ba ban su gsol// 
233b2(rgyud): mtshar chen po cho 'phral snang mdzad cing / snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te/ rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rted pa/ bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod// ra mu ma hA su hU dzo hi sing+ga la
233b3(rgyud): su sru~M hA mU ma sA su hU~M dza~M oM ni dz+wa la su hUM pa b+hA dz+nyA rbA su~M trA/ oM ri dz+wa la su d+hu su dz+r-i u badz+ra su dz+nyAH/ dza oM drA su hU/ a la la la to// mahA su hru ba ra ba hA su thA/ a la la la to/ kha n+da su traH/ de sa
233b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje namakha' la 'gro ma chen po dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la spobs par zhugs te/ rdo rje dam kha 'al 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
233b5(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las byung / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha gi ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki rI ma hA he ma ba ti hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki ni ku mA ra pri ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra rA rkan
233b6(rgyud): dri sh+ye mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki ni ma hA badz+ra muSh+Ti Than/ b+hI ta ya b+h+r-i ta ya/ suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ya ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki ni btwe kr-i d+ha tsakr-i ts+tshin+dats+tshan+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+raH
233b7(rgyud): ki rI ba s+t+ra pri Shog pa sha ki hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA sa~M mA kro d+he hU~M paN/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra tan+ti hUM phaT/ e badz+ra DA ki nA~M ma hA pA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki rI ma hA mr-i te ka pa la hA se hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
233b8(rgyud): rI pa sA sa~M mya kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki ni ma hA a mr-i Sha bu dang d+ha hU phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki nI badz+ra bing ga li hUM paT/ badz+ra bI ki nA~M bi ba bi ka pu d+hi ra ma hA badz+ra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nA ma hA badz+ra sha tha
234a1(rgyud): / b+hak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma tra bAdz+ra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki nI ma hA badz+ra pA she hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA kin+da An ya A na sa hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra ba b+hi ni gu gu mA ra la hUM phaT/ 
234a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra DA ki hI ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la ya b+ha smr-i ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki nI ma hA badz+ra bi ga ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki nI ma hA badz+ra daMSh+Ti hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki nI
234a3(rgyud): puSh+Ta mAM sA sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra ba badz+ra d+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nA~M A kaR+Sha Ni ma hA pad+mo rA li mu ku hUM dz+nyA dz+nyAHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ki n+ya A bi sha ne hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ban+d+ha hUM
234a4(rgyud): sbu pa hUM/ oM badz+raM DA ki nI ma hA to Sha Nis ma ye hU~Mt+ma.A ya/ oM 'adz+ra ma hArA k+Sha sa mAs du d+hi med pri ya ma d+hA ku~M b+ha/ dU n+duts+tshing+ku k+Sha/ oM bzlam thaM k+Shas A b+hAb ba shegs r+b+ba
234a5(rgyud): badz+ra kA la shi ni ban d+hermAhUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+rad/ k+Sha sa ba~M d+ha ba d+hA ya/ bi sha ya bi sha Na sar+b+ba na hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA rA ShAs/ baR+Sha ya ban+d+ha ya/ sad+d+h+yan ma hA bi kr-i tA nan/ Nas
234a6(rgyud): gr-I ba hU phaT/ de nas rdo rje na mkhar la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgunas/ mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'odadi 'byin par gyur te// kye ma rdo rje sems dpa'
234a7(rgyud): mi rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ ci bde bas ni sgrub pang byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar
234a8(rgyud): bsgrub bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung / oM rdza kinA~M A kar+Na sa pa be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya to Sha ya/ a/ satwAn badz+ra bA ki tsI hri da ya~M hUM dz+dza/ \u0f7fhUM ba~M ha~MHtsak+ki hU~M dz+dzaHa~M heH
234b1(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ be ba sha ya pra be sha ya/ bi d+ha ya bi d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pad+ma ma hA ba ba ba mu kha/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ta Sha ya ha ha ti/ 
234b2(rgyud): bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'dis rdo rje rnal 'bor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'drog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgugs pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sog
234b3(rgyud): pa'i las bya ste/ gtong ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dang tshig ce ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / ni rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyid te/ las thams cad la sbyad do// rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta
234b4(rgyud): bzhin bcings te/ khro ba gnyis lcags kyu lA \u0f7f/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyang zhing // ni la gnyis kyang rab tu sbreng // lhag/ ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer lta bang ba'
234b5(rgyud): ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin// phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che/ lha dang lha min phag byas pa/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sog sa/ bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin// bcings par
234b6(rgyud): da 'bebs pa dang // thams cad tshogs ni 'jud par byed// gdug pa thams cad gsong bad ma// srin mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis// 'di yis las rnams thams cad
234b7(rgyud): byad las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan pos grub mi 'gyur te/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ bskyed pas mangs grub myung du 'thob/ rdo rje bcings pa gnyi su byas te// mtha'u
234b8(rgyud): gnyis brkyang ste/ phan tshun bsngal khros pa gnyis kye dang sbrang ste snying kar bstan nas/ btung bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis thams cad las kyi rnams// ji tsam nga
235a1(rgyud): 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe 'di sdig pa gdubyas pa/ 'di yis thams cad 'brog par byed// de dag thams cad myang 'gyur te/ dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen// ji srid rnam pa'i la
235a2(rgyud): ngag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phrul par byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang // cho ga grub pa slang yang 'ong // thal mo sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbusu spang // lhag ma mdab ma kha ba bltar
235a3(rgyud): byas pa ni pad+ma'i gad no// sbom po gnyis rtse mo thung du bstan pa di/ rta gdong gi'o// gang gis spong byas skad cig du// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag tu 'phung 'gyur pa// 'dod
235a4(rgyud): pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro// sa la sogs dngos 'do ba bzhin// myur du slang yang ldog par 'gyur/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge/ 'di bstan nga rgyal ba'i rnam
235a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma na mas thams cad kyang // phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar// de nas dmakha' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir brdas
235a6(rgyud): rangs te// rang gi gzugs ni bskyung ba yis// bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing // dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du// mgu bo chen pos brtags par byang // phyag na thod pa gri dag dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM rnam par
235a7(rgyud): 'dzin skal ldan rang gi phya ga rgyas mtshan// dbu skrag rnam par bskor ba'i 'al// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yi// bde ba dmapa longs spyod myong // rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing // rab dgyes
235a8(rgyud): khro la gsol ba 'debs/ zla ba drim stong pas shin tu rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// thugs rje'i dbyings dum nyid bdag cag bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshabs gdangs pa yi// byang chu
235b1(rgyud): des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod// a la la la ho// mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing // byang chub mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyis ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan te// rmongs
235b2(rgyud): shing bying ba'i rnams la thugs rjes sgrol/ a la la la to// che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngang ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs/ bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas
235b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'da' ba'ang long spyod bsten pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang // rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i ngos ma mthong // kye ma ho ma skyes chos te snying po las 'byung ba
235b4(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab na mkha' dang mnyam/ rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bang ba'i gtso// rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs// sngon med rol mo 'di la rol ma
235b5(rgyud): cing dung khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal pa mdzod// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod// a la la la ho// ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med bzhin// sdug pa
235b6(rgyud): bcings pas ma zin rnams grol te// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shig sdang ba'i rnams// mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba
235b7(rgyud): bzhengs du gsol// 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// na mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas/ khams kyi rang bzhin banabs shing rnams khro yang / byams pa'i thugs rdza
235b8(rgyud): kun tu gnas khyab mdzad/ e ma ho bde sbyin phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol/ chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis/ dam tshig spyod med bdag cag
236a1(rgyud): rol pa mdzod// thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des/ 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs// rgyu dang rkyen lam brten rang bzhin grub/ ma chags dri med yongasu gsal zla
236a2(rgyud): ba bzhin// 'jig rten gsum po 'di ni mnga' mdzad do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas brtson// 'di yis gtso la bskul bas na// dkyil 'khor nyid dngos gru'o// yid gdung gnyen pa
236a3(rgyud): b.ro yis// dpyid kyi rgyal po klu blangs te// mkha' 'gro drag pa dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad bstan pas te// rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ong ba'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde bad chen po 'di yis ni// 
236a4(rgyud): bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ge ldan// dus gsum rab tu spyang bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i
236a5(rgyud): longs spyod dpal gyi bde bzhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thabs cad la rje su mgu ba ma dzad/ g.yod gyi lag pas gzung bas te/ gsang skyes bad+ma
236a6(rgyud): ba las/ rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis// bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te/ mkha' la 'gro 'dra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'dres nas das grub 'thob/ oM dang oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde/ mthar du piT kyis
236a7(rgyud): stobs rab spyod pa yis/ kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che// rab dgyes dbang po bde bad pade stabs mdzod// dal 'byong ma tshogs gsal rnams la/ 'di yis brjed pa rnam pas na// bde char bde ba dgyes
236a8(rgyud): ba yi// rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byang ma'i che ba rje su mnyes bong byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes// mgo la thad mo phyed sbyid te/ chu skyes la ni yongasu rdzogs/ rdo rje bcings pa
236b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ pad+mod dkyil mo bcings par bya// 'di yis brtson par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen pos gang byed cing // rab dgyes pade byed gnod byed dang // kun tu 'khyud pa
236b2(rgyud): sprod pa dang // sna tshogs gang gyis gang byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings pas te// sangs rgyas sbyong ba bde chen po// myur ba'i
236b3(rgyud): thal mos bsgrub par bya/ gsum gyis mtsham su rabu pa zhing // 'khur cos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung // 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye// g.ya' byed pad+mo rnams bzhi pa// pad+mo
236b4(rgyud): phyir rab mnye zhing / ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyad // sen mos mtshan khung sum mdo dang // rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugasadal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing // khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed par bya
236b5(rgyud): g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod pas nas// g.yon pa yis ni btang ba bya// spong ba 'di yis brtson pa yis// mkha' gro 'khor lo mdza bdubya// kye mdze bde zhes rab brjod do// 
236b6(rgyud): ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskal// yang dang yang da 'dzin pa na// blo ldar sgrub pas sgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba ye sheso// de dag / thams cad mgu nas ni/ rdo rje
236b7(rgyud): 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs// nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin nye ba 'os byad rnams/ bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po// sna tshogs chen po bsgom par gsol// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// ga
236b8(rgyud): mi za dka' rtag bgyid pas// gang gis myur du mnyam spor bas/ dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad pa
237a1(rgyud): yi thams cadag/ gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o// nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad medo// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis
237a2(rgyud): mchod pa byas pa na// mkha'agro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i// 'o ma dab pas thod pa dgang // mkha'agro ma kun dbul byas na// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur// 
237a3(rgyud): ma'i mchod pa'i ma khyod kyi ye shes// denas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gas
237a4(rgyud): ba 'debaso// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan// rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda' rnams dran 'gyur @/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshud gsol// de nas bcom ldan
237a5(rgyud): 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rwa myong ba dngalabrel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i
237a6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te// gti mug mdongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong de// lag pa
237a7(rgyud): g.yas pa btung byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis// rang gi num rab bsdams na// mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa dkur brtan na// de
237a8(rgyud): yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi// g.yan du 'dud pas phyag la no// g.yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis// myu dang phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis// g.yas/ 
237b1(rgyud): kyi smin las phyag las ba/ g.yas kyi lag pas snyil kha ru// spyong dang ldan pas mnye byas na// 'di rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de yi mtshan par shes pa bya// g.yon gyi khro ma sgre ba yi/ nam zhig de ltar bstan
237b2(rgyud): byas na// lus ched na khros 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes pa// g.yon du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yos// lag pa snying kar brkyang bya ste// dbang mo dgyen du rnam bstan na// de cha mdza' bar rab tu
237b3(rgyud): brtag/ chung du rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bstod pa mthong ba ni// datsho rig ma rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje pad+mo rtsen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la ston mo sbyid par bya// gang tshe shin tu mthor
237b4(rgyud): ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khwa ma lcags kyu 'dra byas te// gang che sngags mkhan gyis bstan na/ de tshe nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung // de nyid rje
237b5(rgyud): bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhar gyis ni ma bstan na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te/ gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams/ gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bsku
237b6(rgyud): nang las kyi sbyong ba shes pa yis/ las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yis phyag rgya'i ye sheso// 'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag/ rtag tu tshig drag rnam bral ba
237b7(rgyud): 'drin tshul rnal 'byor ma yi'o// oM ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda'// sbyong ba sngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog// sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par
237b8(rgyud): sbyor bas rje su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye sheso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'das
238a1(rgyud): pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol du phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs
238a2(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung // rdo rje thal lo mnyam gzhag te/ sbom po skyil mo bcing ba bya// khro bo gnyis ni sbyang bya ste// lhag ma 'od bzhin btang bar bya// snying karang phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas// thams cad las ni rab sbyar te/ 
238a3(rgyud): sna tshogs mkha'agro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed// thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te/ mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de// snying khar de bzhid sbom po sbyar
238a4(rgyud): 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'jigs byed rapa mdzad cing // sems can thams cad pan mdzadas/ dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// da nyid las ni rdo rje dang / mchog
238a5(rgyud): nyid sgreng ba'i tshul byas te/ rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yaus// drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na// mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo// gdang byed yang dag ldan pa 'angs// rgyal ba mchog
238a6(rgyud): kyang 'dren 'gyur na/ lha dang mi yi bu mo dang // lha min la sogs smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur du 'dren par
238a7(rgyud): 'gyur pathal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te/ lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin// des ni mos byed thob pa yin// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na// 
238a8(rgyud): yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos/ ci dgang 'dod chags sbyong ba yis// de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te/ yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub/ sbyor dang mi ldan dngas grub ces
238b1(rgyud): snying kar 'di nyid kyis byas te// mgu ba'i sbyong ba bde chen pos/ rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur/ mchog gi bcings pa 'di kun dang // 'di yis las rnams thams cadang // yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob
238b2(rgyud): pham tshun du ni mgu byed cing // mgu bar dngos grub myur du thob/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// rdo rje bkug nas sbom por basbyar// lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtong // dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngas
238b3(rgyud): grub 'thob/ rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhin dong bu 'di dngos grub// de ni dam thag tu yang // lha dang lha mid mchod par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir
238b4(rgyud): gnas ldang rab tu sbyong ba yis/ spyi bong dbang ni bskur bya/ sa na// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang // de nas de ni nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyong bas/ phan tshur du ni dbang bskur bas
238b5(rgyud): khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yang 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskod byas te// snying kar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyas sbyong bas
238b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu sgrub// de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te/ rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni mnyam gzhag pas// 'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyang // mnyam
238b7(rgyud): gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis/ las rnams thams cad rang grub pa// bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo nga nyid mnyam bzhag ste/ rtse mo kha phyang rnams bsgru bas/ sbom po ze bar rnam byas te
238b8(rgyud): lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste/ bde bad thams cad grub par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid snying kar spang // mchog
239a1(rgyud): / dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgugs// sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis// 'di yis zla ba gcig byas ra// 'jig rten gsum las
239a2(rgyud): rnam rgyal rjed// dpa' bo chen po de 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ rang gi snying kar bskor bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur// sbom po lha yaM tshul bzhag pa
239a3(rgyud): de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang // dbyigs dang gseng dang gos la sogs/ bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog
239a4(rgyud): byed/ 'grub par 'azung ba gdon ma za/ thal mo de nyid maHma sbyad te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis/ sbyad te snying kar rab tu gzhug/ yid la dga'
239a5(rgyud): ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis// khams pa/ sum rgyal srid mthu chem thob par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid ma
239a6(rgyud): sbyad te/ rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nas/ sbom por 'thob tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag sgo// zhag bdud du ni bsgribs pa yis/ 'di yis khrag 'dred dngos grub ste/ sha zas bza' ba las kun bang
239a7(rgyud): thal mo 'ad ni bcings pas na/ rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mod spong // sbor por zung ni sbrel nas kyang / chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang // thams cad las ni sbyad byas te/ 'di yis gdugs
239a8(rgyud): pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya/ sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhag// khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya// 'di yis gdag
239b1(rgyud): pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums pa rab tu byas par 'gyur/ skad cig tu ni gnon byed/ de bzhin bsdus dang 'bying bar 'gyur/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// deni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po
239b2(rgyud): bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// ris par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig gi ni sbyong ba yis/ las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma
239b3(rgyud): rnams kun gyi las thams cad byang pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar du gyur te// rnam par 'gyur bas gang mdzad cing / ti hi zhes pas glu ru len// ha ha zhes pas rab
239b4(rgyud): tu mgu/ ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// te he zhes pas 'a bod bar byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed// hA hI zhes pas skyong bang byed/ phaT phaT zhes pas bsad par khyad / hUM hUM zhes pas
239b5(rgyud): phung bus 'debs/ dzA dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa sa zhes pas dam par byed // dge ba dbang po ro mchog/ hUM b+h+rUM zhes pa gsod par byed/ hUM b+hU hUM buM/ hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar 'a byed/ hUM
239b6(rgyud): traM zhes pas gzi brjid byed// tr-i tr-i zhes pas 'dren par byed/ tr-i traM zhes pas mchod par byed/ dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu sIr// traM hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed/ d+h+r-i d+hi zhes pas 'dzums par byed// hri hri zhes
239b7(rgyud): pos 'dren par byung / hUM hUM zhes pas 'phyar par byed// tri tswi zhes pas rmongs par byed/ tra hri zhes pas gnon par byed// ha tse zhes pas mnyes par byed/ haM haM zhes pas srung bar byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gsod pa
239b8(rgyud): bad// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// g+h+r-i g+haM zhes pas phreng bar byed// gaM gaM zhes pas tri ru byed/ raM raM zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs ngo mtshar cher gyub
240a1(rgyud): rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
240a2(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te/ gsol ba 'dab so// gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid bshadu gsol// gang gis sems cad grub pa 'di// gas
240a3(rgyud): ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gang dang glu dang bzhad pa che// skrag mo rol pa bde ba mchog/ sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs// brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phru
240a4(rgyud): blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis/ sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshadu gsol// de nas bcom ldan pas rgyas rnams/ thams cad bdag pa rgyal po che// thog ma med/ 
240a5(rgyud): nas spyod rmad byung / sna tshogs chen po rnams mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes yon tam che// bla med chos kun dbang po ste/ rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mcho
240a6(rgyud): blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'bebs te/ rgyas 'debs rmongs byed zab bo// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// skyong ba sdig pa 'phrog par byang / sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed// dus ngan 'dod pad khros pa po/ 
240a7(rgyud): gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed/ sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la sbyin/ tshangs dang gtog/ sa 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod par byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gas
240a8(rgyud): ba'i gsang ba bdeb che// zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad// skad ldan nye bar longs spyod kun/ bud med thad da
240b1(rgyud): byed rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste/ bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan// 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyis ri rgyal po 'du// 'od zeng gzi brjid 'brang ba can// rang las myu gur 'dra ba yi// 'og
240b2(rgyud): gi phyogasu bzhag pa ni// hri byas myur du dra bar bya// dang po drang ba gnyis drang bas// tsheg drags des ni lcags kyu byas/ lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag// khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed // 'di yi
240b3(rgyud): tshul gyis sbyor ba yi// phamarkun du ni sgrub byas nas// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dngos grub byed pa sbyid par byed// bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya/ spyod ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid// de ste sa bon
240b4(rgyud): bzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas/ sngags kye sbyong ba rab sbyong bas// de nas sngags mkhan deng 'gro'o// de nyid sngags dang snying po dang // phyag rgya rig dang mi ldang po// sangs rgyas
240b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yang // 'grub pa nyi du yong mi 'gyur/ de nyid na du sbyar bas na// snying po snying ka sbyong ba yis/ phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyang bar byas// sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgom
240b6(rgyud): te rig ma rig pa nyid spyad// 'di yis myur du dngos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyis char bor/ 'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur ba nye// rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po
240b7(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong bad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di sgrogaso// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// rdo rje'i thag pa bla na med// bshad pa gsang
240b8(rgyud): bzhes bzhi pa/ de nyid don du sgrub pa ste// snying po phyag rgya dam tshig ni// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid// bdag gi nga nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs/ dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshigs
241a1(rgyud): gsang ba sbas pa de nyid de// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim// dpa' bo chen pos rab tu sgrogs// rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas/ rig pa dang ni lhan cig rtsen// gdug pa thams
241a2(rgyud): cad mnya byang dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang // gzungs ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thabs cad bskyed pa dang // rab dgyes bdag nyid bskal ba dang / sdig
241a3(rgyud): pa thams cad sbyang ba dang // bud med thams cad 'dod pa dang // bdud rnams thams cad drang ba dang // rdo rje kun tu gzhug pa dang / pad+mo'i gnas ni dgang bya dang // sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang // shin tu sbyong dang
241a4(rgyud): sbyo che ba// sbyor ba rab spyod spyod skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhan pa'o// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs/ sgrub pa yi ni sbyong che ba// spyod dang spyod mar yang dag spyod// de nyid gsal ba
241a5(rgyud): sems dpa' che/ pan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsu ngas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rje su dris pa// rang gi thugs la bzhag
241a6(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga yis rje su bskyed// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya
241a7(rgyud): bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen pos rje su bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad// kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung // snying po ye shes zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag
241a8(rgyud): rgya che// dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis sgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs// bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid// de dag de nyid ci bzhin par// nga ma
241b1(rgyud): gsang ba rab tu bsgrags/ dam tshig ma yin mi shes la/ sngags rig pas ni bstad mi bya// phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de nyid lha yi sbyong ba ni// gsang ba gas
241b2(rgyud): ba rab tu sgrub// rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas// rol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig brtson bya ba// spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang // de bzhin mchu ni so yis bzung // rdo rje brtan pa gzhug par bya// gas
241b3(rgyud): dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// bskyod cing rnam pa ga du bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye ba ste/ nub ma mtshan khung khur bcos gnyis/ 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab/ rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyi
241b4(rgyud): mnyes pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen po 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang / dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzham
241b5(rgyud): gzhan yang bza'// rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang / bla ma smod rnams bsgral bya ba sha dang khrag dang klad pa'i rnams/ drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya// 'di ni bsad pa drag po ste/ 
241b6(rgyud): slob dpon smod pa dang // bla ma smod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs byed nye bar 'tshe ba
241b7(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po sdong bod cing / 'odod 'thod par sbrul gyi bdag/ bsting med chen po brlag par 'gro// lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa/ rigs kun la bskyod byas te/ byang chub cher
241b8(rgyud): po bde ba yi// tshul po zhid du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te/ rje zhes skad cig skad cig du/ rang gi gangs nas gnas pa yis// de nyid las ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan/ zlar
242a1(rgyud): / gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste/ de bzhin du yang bskal bar bya// rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub pa
242a2(rgyud): byang bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni/ lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang // de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rje su sgrub pa lha mo'i don// sgrub pa
242a3(rgyud): bo gnyi ga'i rtsa// mnyam par skyong ba rdo rje'i mchog/ nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas/ shin tu sgrub pa bded ma pa/ so yi rtse mos mthu bzung ste/ ma mthu mchog ni bsdam par ba/ sbyor ba rab spyong skal ldan pa'o// ra
242a4(rgyud): dgyes ro myang ba dam pa/ lha dang lha nyid yang dag spyod/ 'di ni gnyi su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// bdag ni sems dpa'o zhes bsams na
242a5(rgyud): 'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra la so/ ba'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sbyod sbyor che ba/ rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gi gsung / bcom ldan rdo rje sbyong ba ste/ 
242a6(rgyud): rab tu skyong ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag rgya de dag rab sbyong ba// sbyong ba chen po bsgrags pa yin/ 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyong ba// sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che/ tshe 'di nyid la 'gro
242a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis// 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang dag sbyor ba sbyang tshul gyis// drangs te rab tu bcug nas/ 
242a8(rgyud): kyang // rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te/ shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa skyed/ mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de bzhin zag par bya/ 'di ni yang dag sbyong ba zlas// sbas pa rnal 'byangs dkyi
242b1(rgyud): 'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang / rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang / byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob// gsang ba chen po rmad 'byung ba// de dag de nyid sbas pa che// sangs
242b2(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang // bdag po chen po mchod bdar// de yis stong pa ku mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la mchod bar 'gyur// srir ba
242b3(rgyud): gcod pa por 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de la lha kun mchod ded cing // skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed// ji ltar stod pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// pa gad 'jig rted skyes gyur pa// snga tshogs
242b4(rgyud): shes rjes bsdus pas// ral 'bor chen por de bzhin 'gyur/ rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' ba skye ba rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod ldad pas// dngos grub chen po des 'thob
242b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btang la/ cung zad pi 'grub yong med de// phyag rgya kun gyi 'deb che/ bdag nyid so sor rdzasu 'grub/ rab dgyes ma chad dang mdza' chan mo// ro dang reg pa'i cha
242b6(rgyud): ba'i tshe// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dbang mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag lag 'gyur te/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba// sbyong ba 'dod pa'i gzir ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad
242b7(rgyud): ram ra ma sa ma tho ma hA sa twa// rab dgyes gdod pa za la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun dang ma nam sbyong gau/ zla gsang thig leng yang dag ldad// bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal lnga dri med dab dgyes kyi// rnal
242b8(rgyud): 'byor ma snying mchog nyid// spyod che nyid kyis rol pa mdzad// theg pa chen po bde ma yi// pad+ma rdo rje'i rim tshan gyis/ ral 'byongs ku dkyil 'khod du// rab dgyes long spyod gnyis bsten mdzod/ bdag cag tha
243a1(rgyud): nyes bral te// gnod med don gser dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po// rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod// spros pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang // gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i ma
243a2(rgyud): 'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis// ded dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes pa chos thang
243a3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu mkhyud pa dang / sprod pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba da
243a4(rgyud): mnye ba dang / thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / kun tu bskyod pa dang bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen po mnyam du spyod ba la yang dag pa/ zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde
243a5(rgyud): bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca dang / gzungs ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang / rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes
243a6(rgyud): pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam nyid kyi tshogs kyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas te/ gan so// de nas rnal 'byor ma ched mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde ba
243a7(rgyud): gyur te kye ma'o bde 'a bde ba che// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mgu ba che/ bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur/ kye ma'o bde ba 'deb che/ bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chad po// mgu
243a8(rgyud): ba chen po'i bde dang ldan// kye ma'o bde ba 'deb che// 'jigs shing skrag pas sdud par byed// khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma/ rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis// bde byed che la mtshan
243b1(rgyud): par byed/ skal ba chen po sring mo dang / bde byed bde bas rab rmongs pa// mchod pa'i spri pung bde ldan pa'i// rgya che mchog gis mchod par byed// drag mo chen mo ma lta bu/ rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba// 'ongs nas bde bad
243b2(rgyud): chen mo yis// gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed// lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang // klu mo dang ni rtag dong yang // 'ongs nas bde ba spong ba yis/ yid 'ongs pas mchod par byed/ de ras dbang po lha chen po bdag nyid
243b3(rgyud): chen po lha yi lha/ kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che// mgu zhi rab tu rangs pa yis// lha yi lha ni sngon du 'gro/ dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rang gi bde bas
243b4(rgyud): mngod pachod cing // 'jigs shing skrag pas mazhes par byed// tshad med rangs pa gzhad pa che/ glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang /  za' dang bca' ba sha chen dang / sil snyam drang bar chad da
243b5(rgyud): gling bu rgyu dang rdza rnga dang // pi wang ngal kaM ga ha la le// stag dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang // zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs bye dang // bdag dang khros dang spyad rgyas pas// skad cig skad cig mchod
243b6(rgyud): byed cing / byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // srid ces pa dang hUM hUM dang // ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing // rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi// rang gi chu'ams mnyes par byed// de nas bac+doMs
243b7(rgyud): kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa chen pos namakha'i dang na mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cadang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis
243b8(rgyud): 'gag pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskung nas shi tu dgyes pa chen po'i bden
244a1(rgyud): ting 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa dang / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bad pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjesu skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ namakha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
244a2(rgyud): chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnam su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas// 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad/ sems can dang / rigs thams cad dang / gnas thaMd
244a3(rgyud): dang spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mche dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / 5/

244a8(rgyud): pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang / dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang cha med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la
244b1(rgyud): ba med pa dang / rtag pa dang zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang / thar pa dang / thang byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / na mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug por gyur te/ dzar phye
244b2(rgyud): nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gan so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyir ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma
244b3(rgyud): rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu gyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po phyag mdzad// mdor sum du yang
244b4(rgyud): dag par bskul nas dris pa/ sur ta staM sta ma si ha/ gang pir 'dod pa bde ba che// gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje9// gang gis
244b5(rgyud): gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dod chags pad+mod 'gyur/ gang gis brgyal na mkha'i bdag gang gis phrag dag gdon mi za// byang chub sems ni ji ltar da // gang gis bde bang mchod pa
244b6(rgyud): 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyong bas/ yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bstan pa yis ni myung du 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor
244b7(rgyud): bas rmad 'byung ba'i dang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang // dmar dang snang mdzad cher po yis/ das tshig nyid ji ltar 'gyur
244b8(rgyud): ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes pa ra byas
245a1(rgyud): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung // ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byang du/ san
245a2(rgyud): mongs sdang byed pas/ de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste/ rtag pa thub pa mchog yin// thabs
245a3(rgyud): dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing // pad+mo'i tshul tu rab rtogs phyir/ de pying 'dod chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sprir gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal skyar
245a4(rgyud): namakha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir/ de phyir mkha' chen brgyal yin// ro la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dag rdo rje gdon mi za/ sna tshogs pad+mor ba 'jug phyir// de yaM bya
245a5(rgyud): sna tshogs che/ 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir/ bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che/ 'dod pa ma gtogs bde byad med/ bde che 'dod pa pa yimano// 'dod chags med par byang chub mang / 
245a6(rgyud): chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te// sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi// bad ba mchog tu rmad 'byung 'gyur// byang chub sems
245a7(rgyud): med 'de byed gzhan/ 'jig rten gsum po 'dir mdo// thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo// ba ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad/ d+hI zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog/ ci zhes pa na
245a8(rgyud): zag par bshad// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa med pas bde bad med// bde ba med pas mgu pa med// mas pas das grub thob par 'gyur// grub ma bde byed rtag pa yi// phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dor
245b1(rgyud): pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing / tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde ba kun gyis gzhir gyur pa'i// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma yin/ hI zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin/ 'di
245b2(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba yi// yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin// mkha'agro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de// de phyir 'dod du
245b3(rgyud): yon tan lnga/ nga yis bstan na grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo// rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad// de
245b4(rgyud): mnyan du spyod ba yis// mchog gi dbang de bskur ba 'gyur// pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur no'o// dab tshig sbas pa
245b5(rgyud): tshogs kyi rnams/ khrin byang chub dmang po'i mchog/ shachen sbrang rtsi mang nyid kyis// lus la kun tu khyab gnas te// de yi phyir mo dam tshig cha/ dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste/ @
245b6(rgyud): tshig yi geng ldan pa yis// spyod ces sbyang dang bskrad pas na// bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyinam kun// pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi// 'dzum bcas g.yod nas gang mdzad cing lha
245b7(rgyud): ba la ni yang gsol pa/ rigs mi rnam par du bstan// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi/ sna tshogs chen po deng gakun// bde la gnas pas bshadu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
245b8(rgyud): kyi gnyisu med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde bo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te// de nyid kyi sku dang gsung ba zugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang 'a pha rol tu
246a1(rgyud): phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung // nga nyid stong pa bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyi// rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis// spyod ba cas mi spyong rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod
246a2(rgyud): chen mchog/ 'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bstan te// mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'
246a3(rgyud): bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'deb so// sdob pa dngos grub kur sbyir pa/ brtul zhubs
246a4(rgyud): dka' thub sngags mkhar gyi/ dam tshig mchog tu srung ba'i rnams/ bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas baHma ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la
246a5(rgyud): mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te// zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'odi phyung // sku dang
246a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs sbas pas/ nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya// bsrangs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'o// yid kyis kha dog dbyings chen gyi// phyag rgya
246a7(rgyud): bcings la sogs pas btab/ sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsu dang rab sbyor bas/ chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgya brjod// ngag sbas gsang bang brjod pa ni// bad spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'di
246a8(rgyud): ba yis/ zla ba rdo rje rnam par spros// rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom/ 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin/ 'dzin de nyid rgya chen mchog rgyun tu sgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 
246b1(rgyud): gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// sbas gsum la sogs cho ba yis// byab rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyi// sgras gsum rnam par spang ba ba// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang

246b8(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba// nga nyid sbyong bas 'grub par 'gyur/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyi 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na/ ji tsam 'dod par nam khang 'phung // snying khang rdo rdza gu chung bcings
247a1(rgyud): rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te/ dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bstan byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur// rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas/ rab dgyes sang ni 'gro bad// sangs

247a4(rgyud): dka' gnod pa 'jigs byeng ba'i// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// me 'bang nyi ma'i dbus nyid// khro bo hUM mdzad sgo/ byas na/ myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir// 'jig rtem gsum
247a5(rgyud): bo rnam rgyal 'gyur/ lha mo bzhi dang ma'am sbyang bas/ su ra tas+t+waM zhes smra zhing // ha ra thib le tshul sbyar na// rab dgyes dam thag tu 'gyur// rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi/ 
247a6(rgyud): sa tshan rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don kun byeng // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa// thal
247a7(rgyud): mo yang dag sbyar byas te/ phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shong / rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs/ bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod pang shod/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang / ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje
247a8(rgyud): bos bsgrub pa yis// dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan pa byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che/ phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che// de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad/ dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste
247b1(rgyud): gnyis pa dam tshig pag rgya yin// gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rje su dag/ sna tshogs
247b2(rgyud): chen pos 'chad par mdzad// rtag pa'i sku ni seng po ste// mi bskyod rdo rje dkang po yin// na mkha'i snying po mthing ka che// tshe dpag med pa pad+mo dmar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog/ 'od zer phreng ba rmadang byung ba'i
247b3(rgyud): gdon mi za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed pa bsam par bya// rabang rigs kyi gnas nyid// myur du mamakha' 'gro byad cing / rigs kyi lha mo pa'i rnams kyis/ rol pa dang mi mchod par byed// sna tshogs skyo ba
247b4(rgyud): bde che ba'i// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sbyor ba la/ bsgoms byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rjes mas sogs sems dpa' mchog rdo rje la sogs gdas

247b6(rgyud): byas pas// sbas pa chel ba byed na// 'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nya ba/ sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad 'gru
247b7(rgyud): pa'i spong ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya bcings bshad// rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na// gang gis myang du bcings pa yi// sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'ag
247b8(rgyud): thabs ni g.yas kyi log su ba// de bzhin shes rab g.yon pa te// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyi/ sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar byed// sor mo thams cad bang bad du// mnyan sbyong bas khang par sbyor/ 
248a1(rgyud): rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid sprul/ 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / namakha'i snying po'i gnasu 'gro// 'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yi// gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa
248a2(rgyud): de nyid las ni sor mo kun/ kun tu bskum te bcings par bya// rdo rje'i bcings pa bsdus pa ni// bcing ba ldan par rnam bsgrur te/ de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas/ khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug 'di ni rdo rje ngogs kyi
248a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed// de bzhin bcing ba rnam bzhag ste/ sbom po khro ma'i rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni bcing ba bci'i 'cha/ namakhar 'gro ba nye bar sgrub// de nyid bcing bas bcing byis te// khro mo gnyis pa
248a4(rgyud): mtshan bzhin du// rtse mo sprang de dkag bya ba/ bcing ba 'di yis pad mo sgrub// bcing ba de nyid rab tu sgom// bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te/ las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// don yod ma ma
248a5(rgyud): gi rigasu 'gro// bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te// sbom dang khro ba'i rtsa ma sbyang / g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis// de yi dbus su bcu gu bya ba// de 'di bcing ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ron spru
248a6(rgyud): byed pa// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// rab tu dgyes pa nyid 'thob bo// dngos grub thams cad bde ba che// de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te// phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu
248a7(rgyud): gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o// bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya/ drug ni sbyor bas sbyong byas na// de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur// bcing ba lnga yi
248a8(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon gyi snying khang bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo sgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis bzung ba bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
248b1(rgyud): tu sgrub// gdon mi za bar tshe 'di la// rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// g.yon pa de nyid snying khang bzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa/ sa la bde bar rol pa yis// 'di yis mi zad 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin snying
248b2(rgyud): khar g.yon pa bzhag rtag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs// nas kha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khang bzhag/ g.yas kyang bzhag ste ting 'dzem gnas
248b3(rgyud): 'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khang sbyar// lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sdig pa gdag pa 'jigs pa cha
248b4(rgyud): 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par ba // gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yis// / da ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te// ga yon pa g.yod pa spyang bar bya// g.yas ni snying khang gzu
248b5(rgyud): byas te// brjod pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thab sa gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid sgrub pa po// tshe 'di nyid la the tshom mang // de bzhin
248b6(rgyud): bcing ba bcing byas te/ spror dang ldan pas bstan par bya// sbob po'i rtse mo bad+mo'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar // g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis// mngos sum rdo rje byas pa yis// bcug nas bde ba spyong
248b7(rgyud): bya zhing / skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob// rang dgyes ba
248b8(rgyud): mchog 'ongs spyod kyi// btsun mo dngas grub zhidu 'gyur// g.yas ni mtshan mas drang byas te/ lcags kyu'i tshul du bzhag par bya/ rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu'i ste// rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi// dang bor 'dren pa de
249a1(rgyud): nyid bzhag/ tha mar har thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbus bri bad+yab// 'di yis snying khang bas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi
249a2(rgyud): 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes spong bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyab 'grogs shing // rdo rje lagying la sogs sprod pas/ rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa
249a3(rgyud): yis rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa/ rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis/ skad cig nyid du 'dran par 'gyur// de bzhin sbom mo'i rtse mor sbyar// snying rje chen po dang bzhag pa// skal ba chen po rdo rje sbyan// 
249a4(rgyud): ni 'don kun stan byed ma/ 'di ni yang dag bcings pa mi sa// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur/ yod dang mad pa rnam spangs pa/ ngos po thams ca mthong bar 'gyur/ rdodza'i thal mo bsti bya
249a5(rgyud): ste khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis// mthon por mtshan dang / 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa che// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje 'ad+mo'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor 'di ni btsa
249a6(rgyud): ba yis// sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing / rdo rje bde bad bdag nyid la// bdud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yige thabs gnas nas/ 
249a7(rgyud): nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs/ chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan pa shad gsol// sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims na/ gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis myur du byin rlabs pas/ sa
249a8(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ste// bad byed gnyis kyis spro che ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku
249b1(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste// thig la ltar ni yang dag ldan// tha ma ra ha ra thig ler gnas// rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes
249b2(rgyud): snying khar phag rgya 'di byas nas// dga' bang lhan cig rtsan bad cing // sprod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'a'o// de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog// ha ra thig la yang dag
249b3(rgyud): ldan cha gnyis gsum pa sbyang byas pa/ 'di ni snying kar ba zhag byas nas/ bde bang na mkha'ang 'gro 'gyur to// bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu das gru'o// 'dred pa de nyid thob mar bzhag/ ltos
249b4(rgyud): ltos zhes pa hUM dang ldan/ skal pa chen po rdo rje spyan// da bus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyar lnga na che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dgyes
249b5(rgyud): ba che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// da bor 'dren pa de nyid bzhag/ tha ma hang thig le bya// rdo rje dgyes ba bad 'thob byed/ ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying la
249b6(rgyud): byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'gogs pa yis// lus 'dis 'di tshe 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes spong bar yang dag zhon/ phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing
249b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'gying la sogs spyod pas// bcom ldan 'jod ma 'grub par 'gyur/ chos kyi de khor nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug pa zang
249b8(rgyud): gdul ba'i phyir/ rdo rje khro bor de 'gyuraro// mdudang thog ma'i lha zhi// rdo rje hUM mdzad nyi ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che// ma 'bar rab tu 'bar bang ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kur/ dur khrod
250a1(rgyud): kyi na rgyar mchog gis// brgyar te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la// de di yang dag rol pa mdzad// khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di/ sngags ni rang gi snying khang sgom// khro mal bu mos mdun tu
250a2(rgyud): bskor khro mo chen mo de 'gru'o// 'di yis gdag pa thams cad rnams// hUM byas myur du brgyab par 'gyur// de dag gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig// skyobs shig skyobs shig ces
250a3(rgyud): smra zhing // rdo rje gco la dran par byung / phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/ 'gro de thams cad dang bya bya ste/ las mchog thang sgrub pa pos// ngag yi rnabs ni bzhig pa bya/ spyod dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te/ las rjes
250a4(rgyud): thams cad byung ba na// gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te// dza rdza sems dpa'ang sgrub par nus/ zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye sha so// dngas
250a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas che de dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/ gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi// dga'
250a6(rgyud): bas 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te/ rang gi bde byed skyes par 'bral/ skal ba chen mo rtsen par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs
250a7(rgyud): rnams la yang dang yang du gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdung ba mdzad do// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha/ du ru du ru/ a h+ye hi kan+d+ha bi kaD+D+h+ya sar+b+ba nA rAH tsakra sany+tsa ya/ 
250a8(rgyud): badz+ra ang+ku sha hUM phaT// 'ong yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi/ bcings pa gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya// rdo rje'i khro ba rab sbyang ba/ rdo rje kyo ba zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ra bo sems can rnams// phyag
250b1(rgyud): 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams/ mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste// g.yon gyi stang du de bzhin bzhag/ dbus su sbom mo bzhag par ba/ rdo rje
250b2(rgyud): 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas te// rdo rje slob mo rtsa po sprad/ bdag ni rdo rje zhes sgom zhing // bcing ba de ni dgrol bdubya// de nyid bcing ba das pas te/ dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mar mas
250b3(rgyud): rdo rje sbom mo nus byas te// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed// mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// gzhug pa dang ni 'dran pa'i mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas/ 
250b4(rgyud): rnal 'byong bya ba rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bcuganos ba byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad dras bcug bcings dga' ba bskyed ra// rang gi rab tu dgyes
250b5(rgyud): pa'i bde ba chen pos// rang gi rgyal srid rje su skyong zhing rje chos la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kum gyi tshul chen po/ dga' byed zla gsang thig la yaM/ rab dgyes bdag nyi gas
250b6(rgyud): ba 'di// sems dpa' cher po khyod kyis zung // de nas gangam las myung ba khengs te// thal mo sbyang te phyag bzhes nas/ chos kyi ngo bo tshig smras pa/ bde ba chen po bdagyis blangs/ rang bde long spong bdubs
250b7(rgyud): rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras/ rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che/ sna tshogs pang po gang rab byed // dengs pha rol phyin de kun/ rab dkyus longs spyod gang byed cing // bde byad chen po'i bdag nyid rje/ legs pa sa pa
250b8(rgyud): sbyir byung ngo // leg so la gso bde ba che// lag so leg so ye shes che/ leg so lagis sna tshogs che/ ligaso legaso dgyes pache/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyi de skad ces bka' stsal ras
251a1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen po de dag mngon par dpa' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba yong su rdzogaso// lots+tsha ba rim chen bzang
251a2(rgyud): bos bsgyur ba'o// gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la// ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems bde thob par spor// / rgya gar skad// sarba
251a3(rgyud): thA ta ga tat+na se grata mAm ma ya na sU tra/ bod skadad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dang
251a4(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi rdo rje bin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig gi ye shes
251a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis kham sa gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba mnga' brnyas
251a6(rgyud): ba de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thams cad mkhan pa'i ye shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zad mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud cing thams cad kyi dgos
251a7(rgyud): ba mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa ma ba thams cad kyi rab thams cad yongasu skong ba'i phrin las mdzad// thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag par dus gsum du 'a
251a8(rgyud): shing sku dang gsung thugs thad rdo rje lta bud gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs
251b1(rgyud): shing gi dril bu btags pa/ dang dang / 'pham dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed ma dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bcu
251b2(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag ma rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / rab kha'i snying po dang / rdo rje lu
251b3(rgyud): dang 'jam dpal dang /  bskyang ba thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rnam pa'i mdzo dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po bye ba
251b4(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / ga ga'i klung gi byed ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa chad
251b5(rgyud): med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin tu kun tu gang bar snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa rnam snang
251b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid 'chang // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po mamakha'i dbyings thabs cad bzhin du rtag par zhugs shing sku dang gsung ba thu
251b7(rgyud): rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid 'jug pas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugasu chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
251b8(rgyud): phra ma rdo rje'i phyir gyis brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po// de bzhin gshegs mtha' yas pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rim po cha
252a1(rgyud): du grub pa ma mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa 'di bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid dag par nyid kyis chos thams cad
252a2(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin dag par thugasu chud pa/ namakha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par stod pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med ba'i khams rnams 'dul ba'i spyod
252a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog tugyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyi thams cadang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i phyid las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
252a4(rgyud): kyis byang chub chen po sems dpa' brjod pa dang / de bzhin/ gshegs pa thams cad spyad drang ba'i tshig dang / de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhi
252a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi leg so zhes bya ba dang / de ba'i na gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyinyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang
252a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nong bu'i rgyal po ring po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba'ad 'a chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga'
252a7(rgyud): ba'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chang pa dang / de bzhin
252a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdod mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bzhim nyu brtan po dang / de bzhis gshegs pa thams cad kyi
252b1(rgyud): srung zhing bsrung ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams// kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za// bdud dang yang dgyes gtso bo dang / 
252b2(rgyud): mkha' skyes shin tu gzi ched dang // rinam chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che// kun tu gzis pa'i dbang chen dang/ 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsu ba dang thams cad laMs/ brtson 'grus ma rungs dang
252b3(rgyud): du bzung // rdo rje lcags kyu mdara' gzhu dang // rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung // las dang go cha 'jigs byang bcas/ thog ma tha ma med cing zhing // ma rungs khro ba bzod pa che// gnod sbyin
252b4(rgyud): srin po dam pa brdan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che/ u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dngas// 'jig rten gsum
252b5(rgyud): dang khams gsum dang / 'byung cher sems cad don rab ma dzad// thams cad gu langatshangs pa dang // 'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che/ sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa
252b6(rgyud): chesrid gsum rtag pa'ang de bzhi no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang // bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sa de'i rnam thar dang // spyad pa
252b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun// sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs/ byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal dang mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' tshe dang phyag rgya che// ting 'jim
252b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad// yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po 'deb che/ thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po/ 
253a1(rgyud): byang chub chen po'i thugs bya chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi
253a2(rgyud): shing 'di dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin tu yong su gang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bang chub kyi
253a3(rgyud): snying po la bzhugs pa gang da ba dang gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la tshad rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bsnyad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gis par de bzhin gshegs
253a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i ba'achub mngon par rdzogs padu bya snyam/ 
253a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sa der sems dpa' chen po don thams cadagrub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting 'dzod de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
253a6(rgyud): thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bka' stsal par gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
253a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos
253a8(rgyud): sgrub par gyis shig/ oM tsit+ta pra ti 'o d+ha ka ro mi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dod thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
253b1(rgyud): bdag gi snying gan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bung dga' ba bdag gis rtog so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems 'di ni rang bdir gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar sbyas
253b2(rgyud): bde lta bur 'gyur te/ dbang nangs dkar ba tshon gyis bsgyung ba yid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM ba d+hi tsit+ta ung+ku da yA mi
253b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sa dnga' sems dpa' chen po dbyang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
253b4(rgyud): bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa da ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyidu mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis
253b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying bo sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur kyis de legs pa bsgrubs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
253b6(rgyud): kyi sems bskyed pa kum tu bzang po dbartad par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbying su soms shig/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bac+doMs da
253b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje bdagis mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems
253b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko tsa/ de nas namakha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings
254a1(rgyud): snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bir gyis brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje dang bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang
254a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di
254a3(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
254a4(rgyud): can sa byam la sa sa da mas / ba ga kyis sgru pa rdzugs
254a5(rgyud): zlos la bsgoms shi / oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tasta thA a haM/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
254a6(rgyud): par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis
254a7(rgyud): rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje dang bzhag so//
