254a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin la
254b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye she
254b2(rgyud): kyi 'byung gan su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems
254b3(rgyud): dpa'i rdo rje las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed// namakha'i snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/ kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chos kyi
254b4(rgyud): ye shes ni bskyeng // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu banag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo dang na ba dang khang bu rtsi mo rdo rje de'i 'dong du'i rin po che las byas pa gang
254b5(rgyud): na ba der gshegs nye bon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnga rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlab sa te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan
254b6(rgyud): la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang
254b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gdon po za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
254b8(rgyud): mnyam pa nyidu dmigs nas mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhi bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshags
255a1(rgyud): pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa/ dba'id bshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes pa nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na mkha' las byung ba'i
255a2(rgyud): nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad
255a3(rgyud): kyi phrin las thams cad nyid kyis gdon ni za zhing thogs pa med par ston pa// dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid la ra ba yongasu rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas
255a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes pa'i dam tshig las byung ba sa mas dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
255a5(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying 'di rang gi thugs kha na
255a6(rgyud): byung // oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ba thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po nyid do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyung nas byung ste/ sid thams
255a7(rgyud): kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogasu 'khod do// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
255a8(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thug su zhug so// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu brten pa nyidang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
255b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshe dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
255b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbyingasu gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ phyaganyisu gan so// de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten
255b3(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du spong bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung / rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung
255b4(rgyud): ste chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / nam kha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cadang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad de bzhin ga
255b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par bya nga chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tsha
255b6(rgyud): grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdad thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi
255b7(rgyud): byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar
255b8(rgyud): mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub thob pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyi khang du
256a1(rgyud): bstan nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang / shin tu bstan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu brtsa
256a2(rgyud): bo'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i kun tu bzanga' po sems dpa' brtan/ da ni brtan pir lus min
256a3(rgyud): yang rnga sems dpa'i lus gyur pa yin// de nas bang chub se de'i chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyad sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
256a4(rgyud): la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'arjed la snyoms par
256a5(rgyud): zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sen
256a6(rgyud): gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang thams cad kyi dbang po
256a7(rgyud): bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong ba bya ba nas// ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa'i thag pa chen po
256a8(rgyud): mngon par rtogs par 'grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi ping byang chub sade' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dbazhi/ 
256b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / dang dbang gyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje dada'i lag par byin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
256b2(rgyud): cad kyis lag na rdo rje zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yod pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje thugs khang
256b3(rgyud): gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing tsha du brjod pas 'di du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas/ de nas bcom
256b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems da pa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la smos
256b5(rgyud): bar bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbran drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyu // badz+ra rA dza/ de
256b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das pag na rdo rje nga nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas bcom
256b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'o dbying su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyisu gnas// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen
256b8(rgyud): bo de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sang+yas thaMd kyi
257a1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu gdod mi za ba'i rgyal ba nyid yin pa dang / shin tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dras par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po
257a2(rgyud): shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lasu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ tshe du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i// lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po dag/ gang phying kun
257a3(rgyud): tu sangs rgyas khyab// grub phyi kun nas spyad 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal bar sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kanas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
257a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil khong la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing 'azhugs par gyur to// den sa bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skye/ 
257a5(rgyud): 'dren pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus
257a6(rgyud): ba med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bda' myong bar bye ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dra ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar gyi phyir ro lpags kyu bsu/ 
257a7(rgyud): sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po da'i lag par de bzhin du byon// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems
257a8(rgyud): dnga' chen po rdo rje 'gugs pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing tsha du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rdo rje yi// ye shes bla na med pa 'di/ sangs rgyas kun gyi/ 
257b1(rgyud): grub par// kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
257b2(rgyud): la spobs pa zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad panyes pa byeng po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ngo bo'ir gshegs pa thabs cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra dAgA// de das de bzhidag kyi
257b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzid pa de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi metog gi bang gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dpa par sdang mdzad kyi thug su
257b4(rgyud): zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i da'i su gyur te/ phyag gnyi su gan so// de nas rdo rje'i mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shing tu
257b5(rgyud): phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su mnyes padu bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang
257b6(rgyud): 'phral rnam subs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'jed ni shin tu bdud byed pa nyi dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan
257b7(rgyud): 'das dam par sngang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di tsha du brjod/ e mo'o bdag gi rang bzhin dag/ rang byung ba dag dgyes byed na// 'dod chags bral rnam dag pa'i pir/ 'dod chags kyis ni
257b8(rgyud): 'dul ba bang // da nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kanas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yod phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas
258a1(rgyud): / yang bka' dod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes parlab ba'i bir gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
258a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dud kyi rdo rje'i dam tshigs dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba mong bar bya ba nas de bzhin la
258a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bdadu 'bras bu de dag gi ping rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshe
258a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje gzhu zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen pa rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' das
258a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// sangs rgyas kur gyi 'dod chags kyi/ ye shes 'di dri ma med// 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral
258a6(rgyud): bcom/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis ba
258a7(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
258a8(rgyud): byung // badz+ra sA d+hu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ legaso zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das dam par snang mtsha
258b1(rgyud): thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyib su gyur te phyag gnyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
258b2(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis leg so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i
258b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dras par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lusu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
258b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ che du ba rjod pa 'di che du brjod// e ma'o thams cad mkhan kun gyi/ lag sa smin nang na 'dag mchog pas/ rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/ nge
258b5(rgyud): par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin// de nas bya 'chub sams dpa' chen pa rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyai thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
258b6(rgyud): kyi rgya ba na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhags par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la smos
258b7(rgyud): bar zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang
258b8(rgyud): thams cad bdab dang / yid bde ba mos par bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bang du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa dbyang chub seMng
259a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur// de na/ 
259a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la leg so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par 'ad cing ched brjod pa 'di ched brjod/ sang+yas
259a3(rgyud): kun gyi legs sbyin pa// 'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas// rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyar drang ba'i
259a4(rgyud): dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byang ba'i ye shes dang / ngagyes pa chen po dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o// 
259a5(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen tha namakha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ring po che'i nyid kyi sa brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi la snyoms
259a6(rgyud): par bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyu'o// badz+ra rAt+ma/ de bzhin ga
259a7(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi thugs las byung ba thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
259a8(rgyud): ba de nyid// namakha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung // na mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba bas nas thams cad namakha'i dbyings lta bur gyur
259b1(rgyud): denas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis na mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu
259b2(rgyud): bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir yang namakha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyingasu gyur nas de bzhir ga
259b3(rgyud): ba'i rtsa gnyis gan so// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shim tu phra mo dang / mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa
259b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cadadu byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'
259b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shi na tu byung ba dang / rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dras par gyurate/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po
259b6(rgyud): skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched brjod pa 'di ched brjod// oM ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang // khams gsum bdag por dgongs pas na/ rdo rje rin chen
259b7(rgyud): dam pa yi// dbang gis mchog ni bdag yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyar snga
259b8(rgyud): nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas yang dag pa'i bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
260a1(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs bdub pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad
260a2(rgyud): yongasu grub pa ba pa dang / thams cad kyi khade pa dang yid bde ba myong bar bya pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i pir byang chub sems dpa' chen po
260a3(rgyud): namakha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo
260a4(rgyud): rdza ming gi dbang gis dbang bskung// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bo rdo rje snying pos rdo rje'i nang bu dang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas 'jog cing tsha du brjod pa 'di che du brjodad do/ sang+yas
260a5(rgyud): kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyings// dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te/ bdag gi lag du byin pas na// rim tshan la na mchen pan ga/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub med
260a6(rgyud): chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po cha'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bgyid
260a7(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra te dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'din bcom ldan 'das phyag rang
260a8(rgyud): rjid nyid/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khong chen por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyu nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dbying su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyags
260b1(rgyud): gnaso// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra lo dang // mnyam pa'i nga bzhim gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas de bzhin bshags pa thams cad kyi 'od
260b2(rgyud): 'gyang ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'jidzim ni shin tu gzi brjid che' nyi dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dras par gyur
260b3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te che brjod pa 'di cha du brjod// e ma'o san khams kun tu// snang bang gzi brjid
260b4(rgyud): dpe med bdag/ gang phying sangs rgyas dag pa yi// 'dren pa rnams dang spyo byed pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las
260b5(rgyud): byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs pa gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhim ga
260b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byim gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang sen gyi khams ma lus pa med
260b7(rgyud): rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa mang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'ongad 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bang du 'bras bu de dag gi rgya
260b8(rgyud): rdo rje'im de byang chub sa de'i chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byon// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskuro// denas bya
261a1(rgyud): / chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba bang cing che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba
261a2(rgyud): 'dir mi shes mun nag 'joms byung bas/ shin tu pra rdul ji snyed pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi 'am
261a3(rgyud): tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig
261a4(rgyud): ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dang gi thugs ka nas phyungango // badz+ra ke tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma
261a5(rgyud): thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyalam tshan kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang / dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das
261a6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyingasu gyur te phyaganyi su gan so// de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi kha
261a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas
261a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rin po che chen po'i dpal nyid/ shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sed / 
261b1(rgyud): po rin po che'i dpal gyi skud gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ e ma'o don kun grub pa dang / dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yos
261b2(rgyud): don rnams thams cad rdzogs byeng pa'i// 'dra med dpal ni bdag yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
261b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan
261b4(rgyud): gyis byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms bang zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan spang
261b5(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig dang / san gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thang yongasu bskang ba dub ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba mo bar bya ba nas
261b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam pa thob pa'i bdang 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sede' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du
261b7(rgyud): byim no// de nas nga bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur// de nas byang chub sa de sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis
261b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ngas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod du bcug nas tsha du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun/ yong su rdzogs par byed pa yaM/ yid bzhinas
262a1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan 'di// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar byed pa'i dbang po'i dam tshig las
262a2(rgyud): byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di
262a3(rgyud): rang gi thugs ka nas phyung / badz+ra ha sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te/ 
262a4(rgyud): byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar hu/ gas te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyib su gyu nas phyaganyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i
262a5(rgyud): dbyibs des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rma dang byung ba la so/ 
262a6(rgyud): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / tshe 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres
262a7(rgyud): par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lusu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te che du brjod pa 'di du brjod// rtag tu ma
262a8(rgyud): bar gzhag rnams kyis// sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phying // e mo'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/ gzhad chen rmad du byung chen yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu rA/ 
262b1(rgyud): dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de das bcom ldan 'das kyis
262b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rma du byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rma du byung ba bskrad pa'i dab tshig dang / sar
262b3(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong ba drab pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dbang po yongasu sbyang ba'i ye shes dang mdzon
262b4(rgyud): ba shes pa'i bdadu 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' 'i b.rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rjel dzub pa de de bzhin du bri na// de nas de bzhin gshes
262b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dga' rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur// de nas byang chub sade' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs
262b6(rgyud): pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing che du brjod pa 'di cha brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung spyad ston pa po// dgyes chen bde pa'i ye shes te/ gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus// da
262b7(rgyud): bskur ba chen po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgrub pa chen po'i sems dpa'o// dam
262b8(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi pir gyis rlabs rdo rje'as bya ba'i ting 'dzid la snyoms par zhubs nas/ de ga
263a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kanas bya // badz+ra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
263a2(rgyud): las byung ma thag pa 'din bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od ze de dag
263a3(rgyud): gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu sdang bar byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to// chos kyi dbyings de dag thaMd kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad kyi thubasu zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par
263a4(rgyud): gyung nas namakha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam pa 'a drug pa'i tshad cam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyingasu gyur te phyag gnyi sug/ naso// de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thad kyi
263a5(rgyud): rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes dang mngon pang shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thaMd kyi rdzu 'phru
263a6(rgyud): dang chos 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cadadu byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa nyid nga / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub
263a7(rgyud): sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched brjod pa 'di ched du brjod// a ma'o rab byung gdod nas dag
263a8(rgyud): dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/ gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams la/ rnam par dag pa dmigs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ris gzigs kyi lus da bcom ldan 'das rnam par sna
263b1(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyad snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khong la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pathang kyi/ 
263b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams
263b3(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par
263b4(rgyud): pa drug thob pa'i bang du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid // de bzhin gshegs pa zad
263b5(rgyud): kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas da'i lag tu rdorjebad+mod pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyad rdo rje'i spyan zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur// de nas babarkub
263b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyi rdo rje'i pad+mo'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid gzigs shing che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'ad
263b7(rgyud): chags kyi// de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste bdag lag tu byin// chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig
263b8(rgyud): las byung ba chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin ga sh+ye ba tha
264a1(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung // badz+ra tIk+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid / shes rab kyi
264a2(rgyud): shes kyi ral gring gyur te/ byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dras par gyur nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibasu gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phya gnyisu gan so// de das rdo rje ral
264a3(rgyud): gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs
264a4(rgyud): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang / shin tu rtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub
264a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhan nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas che du dz+ra/ rjod pa 'di che du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams
264a6(rgyud): cad kyi/ 'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs// gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang // dbyangs nyid ni dmigs pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi
264a7(rgyud): thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gsheg
264a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ya shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dam tshig dang / sen gyi
264b1(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thad bcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rje su 'brang ba'i shes rab dang
264b2(rgyud): pa yong su rdzogs par bya pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo
264b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i blo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur// de nas byang chub sa mas dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'dres
264b4(rgyud): shing che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ dag rnams thams cad gcod byed cing // sdig pa thams cad 'jom pa'i mtsha
264b5(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
264b6(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
264b7(rgyud): thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid/ rdo rje 'khong long gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje
264b8(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dbab su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyi su gan so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
265a1(rgyud): rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams
265a2(rgyud): byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni sems bsnyad pa thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i pir gcig tu 'dres par gyur ras pa brkub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed
265a3(rgyud): mthag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bsgob pa zhes bya ba'i skud gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjo dang/ rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi/ e ma'o rdo rje 'tsha
265a4(rgyud): lo bdag/ gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po se mas bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
265a5(rgyud): sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas gnas nas yang bka' dod cing bzhun par
265a6(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig
265a7(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing rus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams cad kyi bda' dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi/ 
265a8(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bdadu 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje 'khor lo de byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis
265b1(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyidadu
265b2(rgyud): 'jog cing che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos rnams thams cad rnam par spyod// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang // byang chub snying po yin par dgongs// de nas yang
265b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mo gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
265b4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byu // badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa
265b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi gang gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam bang sdang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu
265b6(rgyud): 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyib su gyur te phyag gnyi su gnaso// de nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gash+ye pa'i sku
265b7(rgyud): rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu tshig
265b8(rgyud): yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i slad gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa sdang mdzad kyi thun la gnas tend brjod pa 'di rdul
266a1(rgyud): e la'o rang 'byung rnams kyi gsang // ldem po ngag tu bdag dgongs te// gang pi das pa'i chos 'chad pa// tshig tu spros las rnam par bral// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig sa
266a2(rgyud): yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
266a3(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshis
266a4(rgyud): dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / yang thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba nas de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob
266a5(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa/ chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig ces rdo
266a6(rgyud): mi 'gi dbang gis dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdzarje tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la rdo rje'i bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched brjod pa 'di chedadu brjod// 'di des ng+yas thad/ 
266a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ni chos nyid kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / 
266a8(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhini de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sade' chen/ 
266b1(rgyud): be'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes
266b2(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rang gi thugs ka nas phyu // badz+ra karma/ de nas rdo rje sems dang
266b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin ni las thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid/ de bzhin
266b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zed du gyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zeng de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
266b5(rgyud): snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs lnga bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir las kyi dbyibs ma lus pa de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam
266b6(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te ra mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs de las kyi rdo rje'i dbyib su gyur nas phyag gnyisu
266b7(rgyud): gan so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang bzhim ga
266b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams ngas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mtha'
267a1(rgyud): ba yin pa m+b+hi/ shig tu brtan pa yin pa'i phying gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ nga chub sems dpa' chen po de bden gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces pab
267a2(rgyud): srung gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam por snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched brjod pa 'di dad brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// 'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin// sangs rgyas da ni
267a3(rgyud): lhun grub phyir// rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bang rkub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las
267a4(rgyud): byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spya sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thang
267a5(rgyud): kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya
267a6(rgyud): ba la sogs pa gdon mi za ba tshad med pa dang / las kyi log rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang / thang
267a7(rgyud): kyi bde ba dang / yid bdab myong ba bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyidang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir
267a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbang gis
267b1(rgyud): bskur nas de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje dade bzhin du byir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje sna tshogs zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur// denas byang chub seMdal
267b2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya bas rdo rje da rang gi snying kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyong zhing che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las
267b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// las rnams thams cad byeb tu bcug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'
267b4(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las gyi phyir gyis brlab sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de
267b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dir gi thugs ka nas phyu// badz+ra rak+kha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan
267b6(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha brtan ba gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyib su gyur te phaganyi su
267b7(rgyud): gan so// de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung
267b8(rgyud): nga'i cho ga rgyas pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir/ 
268a1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thung dka' ba'i lusu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te che du brjod pa 'di che
268a2(rgyud): brjod// e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha 'di// brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/ de ni brtan phyir lus min yang // rdo rje'i lus byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub dka'
268a3(rgyud): lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' rong cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
268a4(rgyud): kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus
268a5(rgyud): shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bskyang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog
268a6(rgyud): grub par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i go cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje
268a7(rgyud): grogs po rdo rje'i grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bsku ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i grogs po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha bskon zhi
268a8(rgyud): che du brjod pa 'di med brjod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste// brtson 'grus brtan pas srung ba che// grogs po chen por brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
268b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig byung ba las las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
268b2(rgyud): thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyungo // badz+ra yak+Shak+kha/ de nas nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom lda
268b3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mchom ma chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa bsnang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyingasu gyur te byung
268b4(rgyud): phyaganyi su gan so// de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshes
268b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas tham sa cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje seM ting 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa mi
268b6(rgyud): pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lusu gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te cha du
268b7(rgyud): ba 'di che du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/ zhi yang sems can don du ni// ma rungs pa ni ston par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams
268b8(rgyud): cad das tu 'joms pa'i lusu bcom ldan las kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi gaman phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'kho la gnas nas yang bzhi 'dod cing bzhugs par gyur / 
269a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtag tug tum tha' rdo rjen su tshal ting nge 'dzid la rnams bzhugs das de bad gshegs pa thams cad kyim rungs
269a2(rgyud): 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
269a3(rgyud): kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i mchod chad byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'dang thams cad rab tu 'jom
269a4(rgyud): bde'i lag tung bzhin du byi// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro rdo rje khro za zhes rdo rje mo gi dbang gis dbang bsku'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dzaH
269a5(rgyud): khro ba rnga rdza mche ba'i mtshon che dbang gi khang bzhag nas de bzhin gtu pa thams cad la bsdigs shing / tshe du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ 'dri de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rus tham
269a6(rgyud): cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te/ thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i rab
269a7(rgyud): tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i dam tshig cesu
269a8(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs gnas byung // badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jim pa cad
269b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dras par gyur nas/ rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyib su
269b2(rgyud): gyur te phyag gnyisu gan so// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas 'jig rten
269b3(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
269b4(rgyud): 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu brtsi ngas pa dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
269b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi khu rkur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'ang/ sa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te che du brjod pa 'a ched brjod do// e ma'o rab tu brtam bcings pa'i
269b6(rgyud): dam tshig bdag ste brtan bdag nyid// bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir / grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur
269b7(rgyud): gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'a
269b8(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i dam tshig dang
270a1(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadang / lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtags pa dang / grub pa thams cadang / thams cad
270a2(rgyud): kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba mo' bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rnga rje
270a3(rgyud): bcings pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byi 'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur
270a4(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dzaHkhu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs
270a5(rgyud): pa thams cad la 'ching zhing che du brjod pa 'di che shu brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya ba ci nges pa che zhing brtan// sangs rgyas kun gyi myur grub phyir
270a6(rgyud): dam tshig shin tu 'ang bang bka'// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang
270a7(rgyud): bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o// / 
270a8(rgyud): bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrub
270b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje 'byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
270b2(rgyud): ba zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung / satwa badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin sa
270b3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i 'od zed gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid// 'od zeng de dag las kyang 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
270b4(rgyud): shin tu bra mo dang mnyam pa nga bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas
270b5(rgyud): banas yang gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig khams thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i tsha tsam gying rdzo byung sa chen pong myub ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par mam
270b6(rgyud): spyan sngas zla ba'i dkyil la gnas nas ca du brjod pa 'dzin du brjod/ e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa bdag gang phyir btam pas lus med kyang // rdo rje'i lus rgya
270b7(rgyud): ba sad// dernam can gshegs pa ma cher 'byung bzhis bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la bya
270b8(rgyud): rgyas phyir gyis brlabs pa bya ba du rgya ba rab tsha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dang tshig las byung ba rda du phyir gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'drim la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rdza rin po che'i dam po
271a1(rgyud): ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung // rasna badz+ri de ba'i ra gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'dri byung sa thag tu rin po che'i 'od zeng du gyur nas byung ste/ badz+ra
271a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rter gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gyur te de bzhin gshegs
271a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyib su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
271a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje rin can bdag nyid
271a5(rgyud): gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasapa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa rngab
271a6(rgyud): bar snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa'i ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byir
271a7(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung / d+harmA badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi thugs las
271a8(rgyud): 'di byung ma thag tu pad+mo 'od zad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de
271b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam
271b2(rgyud): gyi rdo rje pad+mo chen po'i dbyingasu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched brjod pa 'di che du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos
271b3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje gtsang ma dag/ gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas// 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhim gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan
271b4(rgyud): 'das rnam par bsnang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i
271b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pabazhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
271b6(rgyud): kar+m+ma badz+rI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// las thams cad kyi 'od
271b7(rgyud): zer dad pa las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la
271b8(rgyud): phyag rgyas btab ste/ yang gcig tu 'dres nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i phyibasu gyub te/ bcom ldan 'das rna snga
272a1(rgyud): mdzad kyi g.yod phyogs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di tsha du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag/ gang phyir gcig kyang se
272a2(rgyud): khams// ma lus par ni las bzang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje'i chos nyi dang // mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
272a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnam so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo
272a4(rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
272a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag/ tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje/ 'dzin pa dacad // rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo dadag las kyang
272a6(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo
272a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par gyur
272a8(rgyud): rdo rje se de'i lha mor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ e ma'o rang byung rnams kyin/ 
272b1(rgyud): bdag 'dra gzhan med de// gang pir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas// mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig
272b2(rgyud): las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra mA la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad
272b3(rgyud): kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid// rin po che'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shi
272b4(rgyud): tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje phrang bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i
272b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyog su zla ba'i dkyil 'kho ra laM gnas nas che du brjod/ e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes// bad ga dang 'dra bar grags pa med// gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mtsha
272b6(rgyud): kyang / rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi klu'i mchog gi dngam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
272b7(rgyud): par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas bya // badz+ra gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thab tu de bzhin
272b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
273a1(rgyud): kyi rdul shis tu mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha ma chen po dang grung gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rte dab bor rgyal za
273a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i// glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin// ga phyir sgra snyar 'dra ba yi// mchod
273a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de
273a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'dirang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra dr-i ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs pas 'i zungam thag tu de bzhin gshegs
273a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gang gyi mcho pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
273a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dras te/ rdo rje lha mo chen po rdo rje gar gyi
273a7(rgyud): skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yor phyog su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ e ma'o mchod kur dza/ 
273a8(rgyud): mdzad pa'i// mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te/ gang phyir rdo rje gar tshogs/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin
273b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi drang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyir las bla na med pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
273b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thad
273b3(rgyud): kyi rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas bya // badz+ra d+hU pe/ de nas
273b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ 'dug pa'i mchod ba'i sprin gyi bkod pa rnam pa du mas rdo rje'i dbyings thang khya
273b5(rgyud): par gyur te byung nas bdug pa'i mchod pa'i mchod pa rgya mchod las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shi na tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku
273b6(rgyud): gyur nas byung ste/ yang gcig tu 'das nas rdo rje bdag pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon po gsu khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i
273b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che bu brjod do// a ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che// rab tu sim ldan dge ba yi// gang phyir sems can dba' ldan pas/ myung du byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcwa
273b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lam du slang mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyam gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tid
274a1(rgyud): / 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung // badz+ra puSh+pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las chu
274a2(rgyud): ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung // me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin
274a3(rgyud): gyi bkod pa de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje'i me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas
274a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse/ mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grang ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'dri che du brjod
274a5(rgyud): e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag// thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de/ nga phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs// rin chen nyid myur du 'grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
274a6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes
274a7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra A lo ka/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las 'di
274a8(rgyud): byung ma thag tu thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// thams cad du snang ba'i mcho
274b1(rgyud): bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skud gyur nas/ bcom ldan
274b2(rgyud): 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu khang bu brtsegs brtse mo rdo rje dang / nong bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i gran zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// a ma'o mchod pa'i mang ma ni// rgya che
274b3(rgyud): dge ba bdag yin te// gang pir snang bcas myur du ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
274b4(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lam du slang mtshad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas
274b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'ding gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tudri thams cad kyi ma
274b6(rgyud): ba bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed bar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
274b7(rgyud): shis tu bra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnamos byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skung gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yor phyog su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje
274b8(rgyud): nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i gran zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas me du brjod pa 'din du brjod de/ e mi 'dra yi rang bzhin gyi// mchod pa'i lha rdzas yid 'ong bdag/ ga phyor de bzhin gshegs pa
276a1(rgyud): lus rnams kun la 'byin par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
276a2(rgyud): kyi chos kun tu snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ba'i dbyeng po
276a3(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje'i zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
276a4(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs tha mas cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung / badz+ra aM ku sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
276a5(rgyud): 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya tshogs mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
276a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo
276a7(rgyud): kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs brtsa mo rdo rje dang / nong bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa
276a8(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pa// dkyil 'khor kun la brten par la
276b1(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
276b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'jug pa'i gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung / badz+ra pA sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
276b3(rgyud): la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogasu gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
276b4(rgyud): kyi rdul shin tu pha mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skud gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rgya
276b5(rgyud): khang bu brtsegs brtse po rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jub
276b6(rgyud): che du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang // bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
276b7(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
276b8(rgyud): bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung / badz+ra s+phoT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thang kyi
278a1(rgyud): tshig bsdams pa'i bas rgya mang bar gyungs byung ste/ bcom ldan das rdorje 'dzin pa de 'i dang / de bzhi gshegs pa thams cang kyi dam tshig las bsdams pa'i phyag rgya 'a ba de dag las
278a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dpas nyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skud pas byung ngas/ gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur te
278a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse bo rdo rje dang / dong bu dang / rim po che la sabs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo gang gi dang pazla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'aching zhing zhe
278a4(rgyud): brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ e pa'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyai// rdo rje lcags sgrog dang po bdag/ 'ching bkur las grol ba rnams// sems cad don du 'ching bar 'dod// de nas yang bcom
278a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang ba ni/ bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzid la sgoms par zhugs ras de bzhin
278a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phya'o// badz+ra A ba sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thang
278a7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad tu gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las 'jig rten gyi khams tha
278a8(rgyud): kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dpa mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ gcig tu 'dres nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse
278b1(rgyud): nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'beb shing che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
278b2(rgyud): rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdang / kun gyi bdag tu gyur nas kyang // bran da yang ni gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhag pa dang / 'ching ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshen
278b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'iri se gol gyi mtshar ma mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa zang
278b4(rgyud): kyis bsdu ba'i byir gyis brlabs 'di gsung so// badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas skad cig thab cig yud tsam do'i tshe de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad sa gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang / 'jig rten
278b5(rgyud): gyi khams rab 'bas sprir gyi rgya mtsho yi thams cad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
278b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa gang na pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sngang mdzad gang na ba dang sa
278b7(rgyud): nas kyang che du oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA ban+da naM ka ro mi zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di gang zlos shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas che du brjod pa 'di che du
278b8(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' yi// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes// de nas de skad ces gsung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
280a1(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
280a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis byiran gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
280a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i pogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ 
280a4(rgyud): zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// e ma 'o sa rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med// rdul phran thams cad ji snyed pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur// de nas ba
280a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bsku ba pa dang / thams cad la par pa dang / bde ba bstabs pa nas de
280a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rkub pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
280a7(rgyud): bo 'di bin gyis brlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ra gi rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol pa
280a8(rgyud): btab po// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang // phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o// rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ 
280b1(rgyud): don mong rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la// rdo rje chags pa ba chen po// rnga rdza mdang ni dbang byed ba// bdud kyi 'dod pa dza rjeH// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyong la'o// rdo rje legs pa sems da'i
280b2(rgyud): mchog rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che// rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la/ rdo rje rin chen rdo rje doni// rdo rje na mkha'i norang bu che// na mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug phyag 'tshal rdo rje stong khyod la
280b3(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'ab ba/ rdo rje nyim rgyal ba'i 'od/ rdo rje'i 'od zer gzi brjid che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la/ sems can don dab rdo rje dpal/ rdo rje rgyal mtsham rab dag byang/ rdo rje chen po mchen dpa
280b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la// rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa tshe rdo rje 'dzum pa mtshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje snod// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la// rdo rje chos rab de nyid do// rdo rje pang po
280b5(rgyud): dga' byed// rdo rje dbang rab rdo rje'i sbyar// phyag 'tshal dza rje spyar khyod la// rdo rje rdo ba thag 'che// rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zag// phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la/ 
280b6(rgyud): rgyu dang snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chem po// rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la// rdo rje gsung ba dang rig mchog/ rdo rje zlos pa rab sgrub sbyin// ma~M gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa// phyag
280b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsung khyod la// rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i bka'// las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro/ rdo rje ngas pa'i rgya che ba/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la/ rdo rje srung ba brtan pa che// rdo rje go cha sra ba che// brtson 'grus mtsham
280b8(rgyud): thub pa dka'// phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gdod sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzang ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la/ rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab sdung nyid/ 
281a1(rgyud): / rdo rje 'ching bar rab grol byed/ rdo rje khu du padam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la// su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ri/ zhi ba brgya ngo rtsa brgyad 'di/ rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs/ 
281a2(rgyud): mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur// gang zhig yod ming rnams kyis// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la// rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'jig gis/ bdag
281a3(rgyud): cag gis ni bstod pa yin// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon ma khyod la gsol ba ri// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi// cho ga mchog
281a4(rgyud): ni bshad par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba'i tshig thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba
