281a5(rgyud): rdo rje byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzig la s+ho/ mas par zhugs nas rdo rje byings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshang // deras yang dag pa shad bya ba// dkyil 'tsha
281a6(rgyud): po dam po ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags// sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher// sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus 'di// mi rigs par ri ma
281a7(rgyud): nas kyang / phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bskor// sar pa legs par bkal nas kyang // tshad dang 'thu
281a8(rgyud): bar mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas ni nus kyi/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing // grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dang da ma
281b1(rgyud): bas rgyan/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen smras par ni/ dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gang ba po// de yi ris pa'i nang zhugs la/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi/ thig gis
281b2(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa// rdo rje ka ba'i nang log su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas rgyan pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor dbus ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs bzhag cing // sangs rgyas
281b3(rgyud): kyi ni phyogs kun gyi/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus das su// ris bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog bzhi po legs par bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu/ rdo rdza gos pas song das ni// maM g.yo ba la
281b4(rgyud): pa yi/ sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khod du// rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag rim chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs pa
281b5(rgyud): gzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khod du// rdo rje spyar sogs dag par gzhag// gdon mi za grub dkyil 'khod du// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs ga'aga'akhor lo yi ri grarnam su// rdo rje lha mo
281b6(rgyud): rnams kyang gzhag// dkyil 'khor pha rol-i grwa rnam su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag sgo rnams kun gyi na dang ni// sgo bsrungs pa'i yang gzhag par bgyi/ dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyog su naM// sad
281b7(rgyud): chen po rnams kyang gzhag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni// cho ga bzhin bcings bzhugs nas kyang // s+pho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi// de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po
281b8(rgyud): 'di lag so// a// bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs// ji lta bar ni dka' nong ngo // de ltar bgyis na bdag ming brjod// de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba// rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi// rdo rje lcags kyu bcig/ 
282a1(rgyud): nas ni// se gol mang po 'jab bgyis la// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams
282a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam su 'dus par gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// cung zad par du brjod par bgyi// de nas 'dus par gyes pas na// de bzhin ga
282a3(rgyud): rnams brtan par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa grogs po 'ad nye bang gnas// de nas sgo rnams thams cad// lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas// las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis// dam tshig rnams na
282a4(rgyud): gzhag par bgyi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang // sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa// de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub/ dzaHd+hU ba to// zhes brjod cing // de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ sems da
282a5(rgyud): chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug/ bcings nas de yi dbang tu 'gyur// de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la// thams cad don kun
282a6(rgyud): grub pa'i phyir// thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'a
282a7(rgyud): du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchiso// de la dang por ni gzhag pa lags te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasasu bskyabs pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dngos
282a8(rgyud): grub mchog gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi sladada'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la sdod du gyur pa dang / sno du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshalo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin sa
282b1(rgyud): ba rnams sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bzhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das nor pa
282b2(rgyud): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar sbyang ba la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ dag kyang 'di ji ltar 'tshal ba
282b3(rgyud): du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gang mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas kyi spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshen
282b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid kho du ma chung ba la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
282b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du re ba thams cad yong su rdzogs pa/ yang dag par bsdu sa par gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni bslab pa'i gnyis 'chi
282b6(rgyud): shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang yid
282b7(rgyud): bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyu thams cad du 'jug par kha b.las pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i sladadu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung // bcom ldan 'das chos
282b8(rgyud): gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa
283a1(rgyud): la sogs pa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyis dkyil 'khong chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grus
283a2(rgyud): par yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho na re shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phag pa'i bgyi'o// de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal
283a3(rgyud): mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza bas+thA nA ya At+ma na ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa pA zhes brjod// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying
283a4(rgyud): bzhag ste/ pral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad dre/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA kA ta pU dza a b+hi She kA la At+ma nanir+yA tra sa mi par+b+bata thA gaNaShadz+ra rany+dza a b+hiShIny+tsa mAM zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du
283a5(rgyud): 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal ma spyi ba sbyar te// khas phyag la zhing sngags 'dris du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bat+tA rA ya AHt+manani r+yeHmA mi sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harmA pra bat+tA ya mI zhes brjod pa/ 
283a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying kar bzhag nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skadadu/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA dza karma Ni At+ma ne nir+ye tra yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku rumaM
283a7(rgyud): zhes brjod do// de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon la gdong dmar pos dkris nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi
283a8(rgyud): phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la dra zhing snying po 'di brjod/ sa ma ya hU/ danas bcug ma thag tu 'di sa du sgo shig/ de byad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis
283b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la mi smra shi
283b2(rgyud): dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang du bstan pa dang / phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bong bzhag ste/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi
283b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyidang / mna'i chu'i snying pos bsngags la slob ma nga 'thung du gzhugo// de la mna'i snying po
283b4(rgyud): 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni dang / khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs/ gal te tshul de sman ni/ de ma thag tu dral te ga shegs/ oM badz+redz+rod ka tha// de nas slob ma la 'di skad du bsgo shig/ 
283b5(rgyud): deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rjeng yin gyis// ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgo so// khyod kyis ngal bsdus pa ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas
283b6(rgyud): dmyal bar ltung bar gyur tang zhes smras la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smos shig par bsgo'o// daras rdo rje slob
283b7(rgyud): dpon gyis mya dang sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhag// 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje ye shes bla med ni// de ring nyid 'bab par shog/ oM badz+ra
283b8(rgyud): A be sha a// de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ sems dpa' rdo rje mi'i phyag rgya mdud cing dras la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhu'o// debs babs te babs ma thas
284a1(rgyud): lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes nges pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyuraro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
284a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro// de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyuraro// sems dpa' thang
284a3(rgyud): ngang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mangs sum du 'gyur/ rgyu med par sngon pa byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par byed pa'i
284a4(rgyud): bde ba thams cad 'di la skye bar 'gyur// bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur// kha cig gis ni gzungs/ kha cig gis ni ra ba thams cad song su rdzogs pa na
284a5(rgyud): kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'i bang du yang 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya bcings la ra gi snying kang dgrol zhing snying po 'di yang brjod du gzhug
284a6(rgyud): dr-i D+ho me b+ha ga/ shA shwa to ma b+ha ba hr-i da yaM me/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha haHho// de nas me tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'kho chen por dong zhing snying po 'di brjod du gzhug/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra
284a7(rgyud): de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'gru'o// de nas phreng ba 'di blangs te/ snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la 'di brjod du gzhugo/ oM pra ti gr-it+ta swa mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ de bcings pas sems dpa
284a8(rgyud): chen po des bdag byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas de lta babs bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di yang brjo gzhugo// oM badz+ra satwa sa yan+de t+yaT+Tak+Sha gtan tadapa
284b1(rgyud): ba su g+ha Ta ya tis rbA k+Sho/ badz+ra tsuk+Sha a nut+ta ra he badz+ra pA sh+ya/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim bzhin du bstan to// dkyil 'khong chen po mthong sa thag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
284b2(rgyud): brlabs par 'gyuraro// rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i snying ka na gan so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba
284b3(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phel dang / cho 'drul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur// gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku cig ston par 'gyuraro// de phyin chad don thang
284b4(rgyud): dang yid kyi 'dod pa'i dgas pa thams cadang / dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyidas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khang chen po mthong ba'i 'o// 
284b5(rgyud): tu rdo rjes bir gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi/ dri'i chu dang / snying po 'dis dnga' bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a b+hi'imo// de nas phyag rgya dang / phreng ba gang yang rung ba cig bcings la/ 
284b6(rgyud): gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par byed/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang / nga ra'i khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'dir khyod kyis long // oM badz+ra a d+hiH
284b7(rgyud): tistA ab+hi Shiny+tsa mi// tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya ste/ de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gi dba'agis dbang bskur bar byed // oM badz+ra satwa twe a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod
284b8(rgyud): bad kye nas brjod pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug pa'i chog rgyas pa'o de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i ngangs grub kyi ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi 'os grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang / ting gyi
285a1(rgyud): // dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi das grub kyi mchog grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod pa
285a2(rgyud): bya'o// de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter nus na// snying kar yongasu bsgom pa ba// bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi// gter ni de
285a3(rgyud): yis mthong bar 'gyur/ rdo rje'i phyims cig bris nas kyang / namakha'i ngasu bsgom par bya// ga'adu ltung ba mthong ba dang / gter yod pa ni rnam par bshad/ blo ldan ma mas rdo rje byibs/ lce yi steng du bsam
285a4(rgyud): nas ni/ 'di ni yid ces bdag nyid kyis/ bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi lus ni thams cad la// rdo rje dang su bsgoms nas ni// babs par gyur nas gang gnas pa// gter ni dan yod par bshad// 
285a5(rgyud): ngag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ oM badz+ran d+hi/ oM pA naH oM d+harmA ni d+hi/ oM gaR+Ya d+ha/ de nas rdo rdo rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub gru pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje dbab ba byas na/ 
285a6(rgyud): ni tshul rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar// bsgoms nachu yi steng na par// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob// de ltar dpa' ba byas nas kyang // gang gi gzugasu bdagi lus/ bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni// sa
285a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur// de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni namakhar ni// bsgoms par 'gyur na ji srid du// 'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje dbab bab bdag 'gyur nas// rdo rje yin
285a8(rgyud): bar bdag bsgoms na// gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dgi snying po ni 'dig yino// badz+ra dz+wa la/ 'adz+ra rU pa/ badz+ra A ka sha/ badz+ra ma hA/ de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub sku
285b1(rgyud): bag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni// steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te/ lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug nas ni/ 
285b2(rgyud): rdo rje mchen rab bsgoms na// bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dong // de srid skad cig lding bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i dbyibs kyi sdeng 'dug nas// rdo rje pad+mo lag gnas par/ bsgoms nas rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni// rig 'dzir ro// 
285b3(rgyud): 'phang sbyin par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// las kyi rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur// de dgi snying po 'dig yino// badz+ra d+har/ rat+na d+har/ 
285b4(rgyud): d+harma d+ha ra/ kar+m+ma d+ha ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa bya ste/ rdo rje kur gyi ting 'dzin// namakha'i dbyingasu bsams nas
285b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid par du lding bar 'gyur kun la dag pa'i ting 'dzin// bsgoms na bla mad de bzhin du// ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje ses
285b6(rgyud): 'dra bar ni// na mkha' thams cad dran byas na// bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing // rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur// namakha'i dbyings ni thams cad// sangs rgyas gzugasu bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas kur gyi ting 'a
285b7(rgyud): las sangs rgyas nyi 'grub par 'gyur// de dag gi sgring po ni 'di dag yino// badz+ra badz+ra/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi yang shes 'grub pa rnam so// de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas
285b8(rgyud): la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba sa yan+te/ hr-id las ma bsti ta mi ngid+yA Thata k+Sha NAM/ yA yAng sa ti bru yang mi dar yaM/ de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'ad bar bu byed cig khyod kyis rna
286a1(rgyud): bam spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar gyur tere/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje dbab pa ba bskyed
286a2(rgyud): nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje'i thal/ mo'i ngos kyi dal brdabs na// ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngos gnyis ni// dal gyi bdab par sbyor ba yi
286a3(rgyud): ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa brkya nas ni// song mo'i rtse mo ma'am brdabs na// rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur// phra mo dbab pa'i cho ga byas/ song mo thams
286a4(rgyud): cad mnyam gzhag cing // rdo rje bsdams la sgrol ba ni/ gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog/ des na de dag gis gsang sgrub pa yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// bu ga'i nang du 'jug par bya// 
286a5(rgyud): kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang / de'i lus kun khyab pa ba bsam// de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'dig yin no// badz+ra pA sha/ badz+ra A be sha ShA dzA ha na/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas snying po byid la rang gi rigs kyi
286a6(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// cho ga 'di ska du bsgo bar bya ste/ khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil
286a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba bas na de'i tshed dpe de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur// de nas de dag the tsom du gyur te/ gnod ba ma spangs pas myung ba nyid dus byas nas bya
286a8(rgyud): chen po mnad med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur// khyod nyid kyang ngan song du ltung bar 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bshad// sems rtogs pas
286b1(rgyud): brtsams ni// rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag bsgyur la// rdo rje nyid ma bsgoms par bya'o// grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni// ye shes che stobs na tshod dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid rnams 'thong
286b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung thu
286b3(rgyud): kyai rdo rje yis// rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed de// bsgyings bcas rdo rje gser byed na// rdo rje sems dpang bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa kun bdag bde chan dang // rdzu 'phral che stobs gzugs
286b4(rgyud): mchog rnams/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji lta bar mo'i rjes 'thum zhing / mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnam sa ldan par// sems dpa' chen po bsgrub pa bya// de nas
286b5(rgyud): ni tog kun gyi// sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang // grub pa rnams kyi la sa chen rnams// go rims bzhin tu bshad par bya// dang po nyin de dus bzhin du// rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs// byas nas
286b6(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub pa ste// de yi 'og tu ci dag bya// de la phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin// bcings nas de yi mdan pogasu// sade'
286b7(rgyud): po de sgom mo// ye shes sems dpa' dmathong nas// rang gi lusu bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'jig yino// badz+ra satwa a rdo rje dab bahUM
286b8(rgyud): snying po'o// badz+ra sa dr-i sh+ya'o// sems dpa' chen po rje su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o/ dzaHhUMHba~M taM/ sems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / da'adad bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ 
287a1(rgyud): zhes brjod pas// rgyab tu zla ba glunas ni// deng bdag sems dpa'i lusu sgom/ sa ma ya/ s+t+waM a ha brjod// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang / de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas
287a2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o// gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod la/ legs pa'i cho ga yid kyis ni// lus l-i sangs rgyas kun gzhugo// de nas bla med rdo rje las// de dag gi ni
287a3(rgyud): las bshad// sangs rgyas rjesu dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyidadi myud du 'gyur// sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur// 
287a4(rgyud): chos kyi rdo rje ma grub na// sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par #
287a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje 'dzin par spyan 'dren/ 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches// sangs rgyas thams cad/ mnyes par byed// rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams
287a6(rgyud): cad dgyes par byed// rim chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed// rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis// rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'gyur// rdo rje dpal 'dzin bstan pa yi// re ba rnams ni yongasu
287a7(rgyud): skong rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yoM// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad// rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis// rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje
287a8(rgyud): lo 'dzin bsten pas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob/ rdo rje las chog bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje'i las skyes myur du 'gyur// rdo rje gom
287b1(rgyud): bskon pas na/ rdo rje sku thob par gyur// rdo rje gnang sbyin bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje gnad sbyin mnyam par 'gyur/ rdo rje khu chu bcings pas ma/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'jimam grub pas ni/ ngo/ 
287b2(rgyud): chen po dga' ba thob// rdo rje phreng ba bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje glu yi cho ga yis// rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur// rdo rje gang ni bskyang ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod do
287b3(rgyud): rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshim ba byed // rdo rje'i me tog spyong byed pas// des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed// rdo rje snang ba'i phyag rgya ches// rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed// rdo rje dri yi tsho gas ni// sdug
287b4(rgyud): bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu drangs bas na// 'dras pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ rdo rje zhags pa'igs ni// thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags smras/ 
287b5(rgyud): sbyor bas ni// thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur/ rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub den ga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dab tshig phag rgya
287b6(rgyud): ye shes bshad/ thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// ser mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las
287b7(rgyud): byung bas na// de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yis// bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// gung mo myu gu ljang mnyam sbrang / gung mo mang du gzhibs pa ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par
287b8(rgyud): bshad/ gung mo rim chen 'dra ba dang // gung mo pad+ma 'dra ba dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya ni// de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgya bcin
288a1(rgyud): // dang ngos grub dang / las rnams yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis// gung mo bta' bar gyur pa mi// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor sbed // sems dpa' rdo rje sbeng doH/ 
288a2(rgyud): mdzub mo'i lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyang // legaso sbyi pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi// phyag rgya mang po dngos grub 'dri// mthe bong gzhibs la mdzub gnyis bcag/ rtse sbrang rdo rje rin chen yin// de nyid gu
288a3(rgyud): mo srin lag dang / mtha'u chu rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o// de la srin log mthe'u chung gnyis/ mnyam pa'i gshibs pa rgyal mtshan// de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang // de yi phyogasu bzhag pa'o// mthe bong gnyis
288a4(rgyud): mnyam par gshebs// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug ba dang // de nyid gung mo sgreng rtsomo// bkug pa rdo rje ral gri'o// de las snyi lag mthe'u chung ga shibs// 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin/ 
288a5(rgyud): bsdams pas mtha bong gnyis grol ba// bkan ta kha phyogs bzhag pa'i// mthe ba'i mthe'u nung rtse sprad bkyed/ sa kyi rdo rje yin pa bshad// de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pa
288a6(rgyud): snying kar brkyang ste bzhag pa'o// mdzub mo rtse bcug che ba la// mthe'u chung gshibs pa brkyang ba'o// mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis// mdzub mo gnyis kyis brtsing ba'o// snying kar mthe bong bsnyams
288a7(rgyud): la bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o// thal mo sbyang te kha nas dbyung // gang las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje bcing ba thung ngu klags// rang gi thal sbya gyen du gtong // mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams// rab
288a8(rgyud): tu brkyang nas byugs pa'o// mdzub mo gcig pu bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dong / mthe bo mdzub mo bdu bur bcing // rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad// rdo rje sprub/ 
288b1(rgyud): ba dam pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi phyag rgya snying kar bzhag/ de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa// rdo rje'i las ni bla na med// rdo rje dbyings sogs phyag rgya ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus
288b2(rgyud): ba yin// dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar bcas// de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad kun
288b3(rgyud): nas 'gugs// 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun/ lagaso bas ni bstod par ded / rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na/ sangs rgyas kun gyis
288b4(rgyud): dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching 'gyur bas// re ba kun yang rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni// sangs
288b5(rgyud): rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad // chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i ral gri thogs bas ni// nyon mongs thams cad des gtsang ngo do// rdo rje 'khor lo
288b6(rgyud): brtan byas pas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur/ rdo rje smra ba'i sbyong bas ni// rdo rje'i ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje go cha ba
288b7(rgyud): byas pas// lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas// ba rungs bdud ni ngas 'joms// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pas// phyag rgya kun kyang dbang du 'gyur// 'dzum pas lha yi dga'
288b8(rgyud): ba rnams// phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyi rnams// klu yis rtag tu skad gsal ba/ gar gyis mchod pa brnyas par 'gyur// bdug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed// me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs/ mang mes
289a1(rgyud): rdzam bags mas sasan lcags kyis 'jugs pa/  rgyagags par 'jug pa byed/  rgyam sa zlas yong /  dzus zus 'ams pa
289a2(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad// badz+ra drA ra sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje shings ni brtan par byed// da nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ chas kyi phyag rgya chog bzhin/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na phyag rgya kun gyi dang
289a3(rgyud): 'gyur// A na ya swa zhes brjod na// gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas 'gugs// a ho su khaM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur// swa b+hu sA d+hu zhes smras nas// legs pa'i tshig gis dag
289a4(rgyud): byed sum ha ta tAM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bsrung thob/ rU pa d+yo ta zhes smras na/ chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur ahA prap+te zhes smras na/ reb kyang rdzogs par byed/ 
289a5(rgyud): ha ha hUM te zhes bgad na// sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur// sarba ka ri zhes smras na// mi bya ba yi rnams kyang spyong // du khaHts+tshe da zhes smras ni// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// bud+d+ha
289a6(rgyud): bo d+hi zhes smras na/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// pra ti sha b+da zhes smras na// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig sgra// su b+ha Shi tAM zhes smras na// kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur// nir b+ha ya staM zhes
289a7(rgyud): smras na// de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur/ sha tru b+hak+Sha zhes smras na// dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur// sarba sid+d+hi zhes smras na// thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma hA pa hi lha yi dga'/ ru ban
289a8(rgyud): skyes gzugs bzang nyid / sho tra so kha bang ba sbyin/ sarba pU dza mchod par byed// prahA don yid bdeng 'gyur// pha lA gA mi 'bras bu thob/ su te dzA gr-i gzi brjid che/ su gan+d+ha rmi dri mchod can/ A ya ti dza 'gugs
289b1(rgyud): ba bang / A ya hi hUM 'jug par byed// he s+pho Ta ba 'ching ba che// g+har+N+Na a a rab bskyod pa// de nas de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa dge ba bshad// lnga la rdo rje dge bsgoms na// las rnams thams cad
289b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// g.yas pa'i mang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag gya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub spyir byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yis sa reg pa// de bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin
289b3(rgyud): mchog/ gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste// bsgyings bcas gse
289b4(rgyud): ba gnyi ga yis/ lcags kyu 'dzin ltang gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi tshul gyis ni// legaso zhes pa snying kang gzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying gang nyi ma brdar bar bya// g.yo
289b5(rgyud): ba la ni gru mo gzugs/ de bzhin khwa phyogs bskor ba bya/ ga ya sa pa yis ni g.yon pa bya// snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdud/ mgal ma'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rdo rje gnyi ba
289b6(rgyud): nas dra byung // rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje la gying ba'i tshal gyi su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdad par
289b7(rgyud): bya/ phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gang ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur ngur gyis ni// 'dub pa las gas de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa~M yi// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa yi// mdzub
289b8(rgyud): mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni// mthe'u chung la ste lcags kyu che// mkhril ma mdung pa mdzug gnyis gdab/ rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnams te mnang// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad pa/ rdo rje las ri bang dang mnyam/ 
290a1(rgyud): / rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni// rang gi snying kar goms par bya// de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya// rdo rje'i las ni rnam pa mang // ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par
290a2(rgyud): 'gyur// mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni// yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis// gzhan la phar byed ldan par 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo
290a3(rgyud): bskor bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs mchog gis myung ba ni// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyor// rdo rje 'gying ba brda du byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bde brnyed // rdo rje lcags kyu skad cig tu// de bzhin pa
290a4(rgyud): ba kun kyang 'gugs// rdo rje mda' yis rdo rje yi/ lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal bkur// legaso zhes pas tshig kyang sbyid// rdo rje chen po nong bu sbyid// ston pa rnams kyis
290a5(rgyud): de dbang srung // rdo rje nyim bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'dra ba 'a/ gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan snang bas ni// des ni rin chen char yang 'a babs// rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni/ sangs rgyas
290a6(rgyud): 'dra ba sgrung ba da 'gyur// rdo rje me tog bcings pas ni// rdo rjel chos nyid de yis mthong // rdo rje ral gri brtan bcings na// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni// chos kyi
290a7(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gang gyi mtshang ba yis/ sangs rgyas kyang ni dab tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i go chas lus bcings pas/ 
290a8(rgyud): rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje'i mche ba bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdags tshams// rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing // phyag rgya grub pa kun bye da// rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin// rdo rje phreng bas gzugs bca
290b1(rgyud): rdorjeglu yis glu snyan cing // rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed// bdug pa yis ni yid tshim pa/ me tog gis mi rgyan rnams te// mang ma yis ni gzi chen po// rdo rje dris ni dri bar ldan/ rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste/ 
290b2(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog gis ni bcing // rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad// de la thog ma nyidu rdo rje bcing pa'i
290b3(rgyud): sor mo snying kar brdab ba bya ste/ snying po ni 'di brjod do// badz+ra ban+d+ha traT/ de nas pag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshi gi phyag rgya bci
290b4(rgyud): la snying po brjod// a de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs ba ny-i nye bar gnas par gyur// de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig gis mas dpa' chen po rje su dran pang ba ste snying po 'di badz+ra
290b5(rgyud): ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM/ 'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/ phyaHrgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas spyi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad// nga la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings
290b6(rgyud): ras rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dbang bdag snying po 'dis sgo mo// sa ma yo haM/ de nas rang phyag rgya'i sems dpang bdag sgoms nas/ sngams 'dis bir gyis brlab bo// sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sA mAM/ de nas
290b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad// de la thog mar bzhig nod grub par 'ad bar snying po 'di yi ro// ar+tha sid+d+hi/ 'dis phyag rgya grub ro chen po skye ba
290b8(rgyud): 'gyur de nas rdo rje grub par 'dodar snying pa'ang ma 'o// badz+ra sa~M d+hi/ 'dis ci 'dod pa ba'i du rdo rje grub par 'gyur/ nas rag 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod na snying po nga yin// badz+ra'i dA byung sid+d+hi/ 'dis ji ltar 'a
291a1(rgyud): bzhin du rig 'dzin 'gru'o// de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos smra'o// dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dpa
291a2(rgyud): dang sems rdo rje bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa bshad/ nam pag rgya'i byir gyis brlabs lhod gyur tam/ bdag rang gtong bar 'dod na de nas snying po 'di brtad par bya'o// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra
291a3(rgyud): satwa twe no ba tiShA dr-i D+ho mo b+ha wa/ su toSh+yo ma b+ha wa/ a nu dak+to me b+ha wa/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sar+b+baM sid+d+hi m+ba pra yan+ta/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa ma/ tsit+ta shre yaHku ru hU/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA ma
291a4(rgyud): muny+tsa badz+ri b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH'dis ni ma tshams med pa byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslu sa pa dang / dam par chos smod pa dang / nyes pa thams cad byas
291a5(rgyud): pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtam par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji lar 'dod pa'i ras grub thams cad ngas/ ngos grub pa
291a6(rgyud): ba 'am/ rdo rje dngos grub bam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar du myur du tho bo zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rdo rje
291a7(rgyud): sems dpas gsung so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad// de la thog ma nyid phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas snying po 'dis dgro'o// oM
291a8(rgyud): badz+ra muHde nas snying ka nas byung ba rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis bskor zhing bcings nas/ de bzhin du go cha yang snying po
291b1(rgyud): bci // oM badz+ra rahA a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba mu dra me tri d+hi ku ru ba raka ba tson po/ de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa gtang la/ thal mo mnyam par 'ardabs te snying po 'dis mnyes bdu ba'o// badz+ra tu Sh+ya ho// cha
291b2(rgyud): ga 'dis pag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang / bcings pa dang / mnyes par byas nas rdo rje lta bur 'gyur// yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas// ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar
291b3(rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsung so// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// sgrub pa dang ni las kun la// 'phe
291b4(rgyud): ni ci dgar bzlas na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob/ snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ rtog pa las bshad dang byas pa 'am// sgrub pa 'di ba ni thams
291b5(rgyud): // de nas gsang ba'i mtshang brjod cing / rdo rje ba stong pa 'dis glu blangs te gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o// oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na/ rdo rje rimachen bla na med/ dzarje
291b6(rgyud): chos ni glu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gang lag pa gnyis gshibs pa gsang ba bya'o// bdug pa la sogs
291b7(rgyud): bas mchod pa bya ste/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gan su gzhago// de nas thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgo nas de nas
291b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stsol ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la/ ji ltar bzhugs pa rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang / kha zas la sogs pa tha dang / kyi
292a1(rgyud): 'khor chen por phul bar yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyi
292a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+he badz+ra sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha e Sha tre d+ha ra yA mi/ badz+ra satwa hi ti hi hi hUM/ de nas thams
292a3(rgyud): cad du su la yang ma bzla cig ces bsgo la mna'i snying po yang bstan to// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams slad ba kye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol gdab cing sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag
292a4(rgyud): rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzla/ sa shing grol nas/ oM khyed kyis sems can dan kun mdzad// rjes 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdza
292a5(rgyud): slar yang byon par mdzad gsol// badz+ra satwa muHde ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol ba bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
292a6(rgyud): cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs// // bam po gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi/ 
292a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
292a8(rgyud): kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzungs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnam su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten/ 
292b1(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i gzugasu
292b2(rgyud): gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod de cha du brjod pa 'di ched brjod// oM ma'o gang phyir byang
292b3(rgyud): chub sems/ sems can kun la phan bzhed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang // bud med gzug su'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thang
292b4(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra d+hU tI shwa
292b5(rgyud): hUM badz+ra Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi ga yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems da pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bar
292b6(rgyud): gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'drim la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thar
292b7(rgyud): kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byir gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'od smras pa/ oM rat+na badz+ri dzi hUM/ 
292b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'jam la snyoms pa
293a1(rgyud): zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma badz+ri tri hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ye shes
293a2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma badz+ri Ni ts+tsha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
293a3(rgyud): na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad// oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM gu t+ya rat+na a ku shi hUM gu t+yai rA ga~M rA gA ya hUM/ oM badz+raT+Ta
293a4(rgyud): d+ya badz+ra sA d+hI shwa ri tsU/ kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs ba'i lcags kyu ma dang / dga' ba la chags pa dang / legs ldan ma ste/ rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnamaso// i badz+ra gu h+ya rat+nas
293a5(rgyud): ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hA dza a gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra hA sa badz+rI hUM/ rin po che'i gtso mo dang / rin po che'isgron ma dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan
293a6(rgyud): ma dang / bzhad pa dang ldan ma rnams te/ rin po che'i gzungs rnam so// oM badz+ra d+harma guh+ya sa mi ye hUM/ oM badz+ra ko Sha gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ma tA ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya wa tsas ma
293a7(rgyud): hUM/ rdo rje pad+ma dang / kun 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo thams cad ma dang / stong du zlos ma ste/ chos kyi gzungs ma rnam so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gut+ya ka btse hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya daSh+Ta d+hA
293a8(rgyud): rAHhUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya muSh+NI hUM/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso mo dang / thams cad srung ba ma dang / mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste/ thams cad kyi gzungs rnam so// de nas ya phyen
293b1(rgyud): rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshad/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya satwa badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na badz+ri Ni hUM
293b2(rgyud): oM badz+ra gu h+ya d+ha ma badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya kam badz+rI Ni hUM/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams
293b3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyud ma dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo 'dug par bzhago// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gas
293b4(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyar rgya bzhi po bshad/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra ti pA dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta nA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya a b+hi Sha ka pU dza sa ma ya sarba pU dza pra ba
293b5(rgyud): sa hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya gI ti bA dzA sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta nA maM hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya nr-i t+ya pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dz+ra pra brta rA ya hUM/ rdo rje 'jimam la sogs pa de dag nyid ngo 'bar ba
293b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnamasu dgod do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po
293b7(rgyud): 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad // dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri
293b8(rgyud): ba bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbusu ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// mchod rten khri la lags 'dug pa/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ khri yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs// rdo rje sems zhes
294a1(rgyud): bshad pa'o// rdo rje rin chen khri yi sde// rang gi dbang ni bskur bar bshad// rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng // mtshomacha zhes ni bya bar bshad// las kyi rdo rje khri yaM steng // rdo rje kun zhes bya
294a2(rgyud): bar bshad// pad+mo'i steng du bri bar ni/ 'od kyi 'khor lo brten pa'o// khri yi steng du rdo rje bri// lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin// rdo rje rdo rje la skyes par// legs par spyir ba gnyis de bzhin// rin
294a3(rgyud): chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya// nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// phyag mtshan rtse mo 'bar bar bcas/ rdo rje gnyis par so ya phreng // rdo rje dbusu pad+mo bri/ ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin// rdo rje 'khor la rdo rje rtsal
294a4(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'od ze tsan gyi lce// rdo rje kun tu rtse mo dang // go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan// rdo rje mche ba yang dag bri/ lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgya bya// sems ma rdo rje la sogs ni// dbyings kyi
294a5(rgyud): 'khor ji bzhin du// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khod du/ phyi rol du yang ci rigs par bya// ra ngagi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri// byams pa las// 
294a6(rgyud): rang gi mtshan// ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag
294a7(rgyud): rgya rang gi rigs bcings te/ 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas la gcig bskor te/ phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas// rang gi snying kar tshul bzhin du bkrol te// sgo bzhir rdo rje lcaT
294a8(rgyud): kyu la sogs pas ji lta ba'i las rnams byas te phyir byung // phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzung ngo do// de nas bcud nas dngos gru
294b1(rgyud): gyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'chang bas g.yogs la byin te// rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// de la dang po'i re zhig rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil
294b2(rgyud): 'khor dbusu ni// dang lag thal mo sbyang nas kha// glal cing rdo rje bsgoms byas na// rdo rje ma yang chags par byed// dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang // mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya// lag pa yis
294b3(rgyud): ni 'bod byed cing // lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par byed// mda' 'pher ba yi tshul gyis ni/ glal zhing snying khar 'phangs nas ni// nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang // bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byang
294b4(rgyud): bdag lus kyi snying ka ru// rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni// dpung pa bsnol bar bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// badz+ra
294b5(rgyud): ga ma ho// badz+ra a ku shi dza/ badz+ra mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT/ badz+ra ban d+ha ra k+Sha he/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni/ dga' bas
294b6(rgyud): mig ni rab tu bgrang // de yis bud med bltas pas ni// rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin// rab tu myang bar mig bsgral zhing // mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi ca yin par bshang // 'gro ba
294b7(rgyud): 'gugs byeng pa'o khro gnyer gnyer ma rab bsdus pa/ khro bo'i mig ni btsums pa ste// khro bo'i lta bas byas nas ni/ khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed/ ri rab ri yi brag 'dra ba/ brtan
294b8(rgyud): bang 'dzums pa med pa'i mig byams pa'i lte ba yin par bshad/ nad dang gdon da dug sel to// da nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'jig yino// badz+ra dr-i'i maH dI p+na drASh+Ta a~M ku shi rdza ka dr-in tsI dr-i
295a1(rgyud): de nas rdo rjegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// tsha tsa tsa ta zhes smras na// sgra dang bral bas dem thag sems can kun ni mgu bar byed/ den rdo rje tshig gsal ba'o// dza dza dz+ra zhes pa
295a2(rgyud): na/ khro ba'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba ste/ skya bo kun kyang 'gags par byed// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis/ ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yi// sems can kun la bdud pado// taM ta ta ta
295a3(rgyud): zhes smras na/ pra ba'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// 'jig rten 'di kun srung byed pa// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'abasrung // da la snying po 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra ha/ badz+ra dzaHbadz+ra hUM/ badz+ra te/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi
295a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/ rnam pa thams cad mchog/ ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni slob byas la sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan
295a5(rgyud): pa rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la/ bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na// phyog na rdo rje 'gugs par byed / rnam pa thams cad mchon ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i spyad ni bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni sgom byas
295a6(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad des btud byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid la/ bdag nyid kyis ni sgom byas na// rdo rje thams cad des srung // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin// badz+ra pA Ni sarba
295a7(rgyud): sha ma na ya sarba bud+d+ha to// badz+ra gar+b+he badz+ra pA ne shI g+h+raM A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHbadz+ra ne tra sadza d+harma na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra bi shwa rAg+na satwA na hUM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// bdag gis bdag snying / 
295a8(rgyud): ni \u0f7f sems dpa' na rdza bcing byas la/ rdo rje bas bltas nan// 'gro ba thams cad 'bab par byed/ bdag gis bdag snying ga n-i/ rin chen rdo rje bcing byas la/ bang pa'i lta bas bltas na ni/ thams cad dbadu
295b1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// bdag gis bdag gi snying gar ni/ chos kyi rdo rje bcing byas la// khro bo'i lte bas bltas na ni/ 'gro ba thams cad des sdung byeng // bdag gis bdag gi snying ka ni/ las kyi rdo rje bcing bas la/ 
295b2(rgyud): byams pa'i lta bas bltas na ni/ 'gro ba thams cad srung bar byed// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'od dag yino// badz+ra guh+ya sa ma ya to// badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya dza/ badz+ra gu h+yas pa
295b3(rgyud): swa hUM/ badz+ra gu h+ya sa pa ya haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bsdang ngo // rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad// phag rgya chen po mdo bsdus pa/ de dag gi ni bcing ba bshad
295b4(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol bas la// mdzub mo rtse mo bku ga pas ni// gung mo bstams pa'i tshig su sbyar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dab 'bor bshad// de nyid gung po rdo rje drab// phung mo gnyis ri ror bu
295b5(rgyud): byas/ pad+ma sri lag ma'i chung gung / lag pa'i song mi rab tu 'argya // mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis che// de nyid ban po nga gnyis kyis sbas/ legs pa sbyin pa mdzub chen/ mdzu
295b6(rgyud): mo ron chen can 'od 'bar// srin lag gzhibs mthe'u chung rin chen// de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o// kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gyed// mthe bo mthe'u chub rab tu gzhug/ sor mo bar du 'khor lo brkyang // de nyid kyang ni
295b7(rgyud): nas dra byung // mthe bong btub ste rdo rjes dga'// mdzub mo bsnams nas nang du gzhug/ mtheb gnyis dbye ba de nyid las// de nas nang du rdo rje ru bya// rdo rje gsang ba de rnams ni// rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin
295b8(rgyud): chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni// thal mo nad du bkug pas// las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i// mtshan ma lu su bstan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa'o// chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa/ 
296a1(rgyud): a dz+dza tos oM e tra ha d+hI hUM ma re ke Na/ hUM bad gsang pa'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/ las kyi phyag rgya rnam su bya// dam tshig mchog na ji snyed pa// gnyis bral nas deng
296a2(rgyud): de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad// sa ma ya sta zhes smras zhing // bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni// 'dod la chags pa bde ba'i bdag/ 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni// dus kun tu ni bcing mi
296a3(rgyud): gsang ba'am ni dan chen la// mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya// 'di rnams kun la bdag nyid gnas// rang byung rnams kyi lha mo brtan// sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na// rang gi bdag po bta' bang // de nas pag
296a4(rgyud): rgya 'di rnams bcing ba la sogs pa'i las rnams yi no// bdag ma 'on te gzhan yang rung // rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// snyi por bcas pa 'di yis ni// bcing ngam 'ching du gzhug kyang rung
296a5(rgyud): ba chu bad+ha/ de nas dgrol ba ma// mngod na drug d+ha/ thams cadani/ snying ba ga mdzigad kyis// ga' bag nas byung ba yi// de dang nas dgrol 'dubya/ oM baidz+ra
296a6(rgyud): brtan par bya ba yin te/ rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te// snying ka nas ni spyi bor dgrol// mdzub mo yis ni go cha bcing / snying por bya ba 'di nyid// oM dr-i D+ha badz+ra ka ba tsa dr-i b+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin// 
296a7(rgyud): ji ltar gnas pa rnamasu dgrol// go cha yis ni brtan par bya// thal mo brdabs pas kun sbyang la// snying por bya ba 'di nyid// oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tra/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dag pa bzlas/ dkyil 'khor dang
296a8(rgyud): las kun la// dus 'di nyid sbyar bar bya// thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje gas
296b1(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi
296b2(rgyud): gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhags nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM suk+ka badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
296b3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM satwa sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa
296b4(rgyud): ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes
296b5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM hA sAk+Sha badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin
296b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bar gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+ham
296b7(rgyud): sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bor gyis brlabs
296b8(rgyud): rdo rje nas bye ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
297a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'as bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugasaso// bcom ldan 'das stobs par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshed de bzhin gshegs
297a2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rna me phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khabs thams cad sdang ba bas te/ sems cad thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i
297a3(rgyud): 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan paradu byas te/ yang gcig tu gyur nas ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rnga rje'i srung dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyurab te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
297a4(rgyud): snang mjed kyi thug su zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pagar rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thug su zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes pa
297a5(rgyud): mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di sbas pa/ sU k+ku badz+ra/ de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas brtsa ldan 'das phag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas de bzhin gshegs
297a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogasu gnas nas tshad brjod pa 'di che du brjod// e ma'o// sa
297a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che// ga phyir pra yang che ba'i phyir// khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed// de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po pag na
297a8(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs na rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi
297b1(rgyud): dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad darab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyi khab par byaso// namakha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de bzhin gtsu
297b2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbabasu bdag nyid byin gyis rlabs te 'dug go// de nas de nyid kyi chen de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shas kyi rdo rje'i dbusu
297b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i chos nyid dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyis brlangs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi
297b4(rgyud): ye shes kyi rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di phyung / badz+ranA bI ta thA ga ShahUM/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ye
297b5(rgyud): shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skud zhugs nas thugs ka rdo rje'i dbyibasu gyur te gnas de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems
297b6(rgyud): rdo rje de las ye shes chen po 'di bzhi phyung/ badz+ra At+maka dr-i b+ha badz+ra aM ku sha tiSh+Tha rA ga badz+ra pA be sha hr-i da yaM/ a ho badz+ra duSh+Ta~M/ rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
297b7(rgyud): bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
297b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnam so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thug su zhugs te snying ka'i rdo rje'i dbyibasu
298a1(rgyud): // bdag nyid drin gyis brlabs te bzhug so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibasu de las snying po 'di bzhi byung / badz+ra rAhA At+ma ka hr-id ya/ badz+ra sUr+ya tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra d+hA dzA gra ba hr-i da ya/ badz+ra hAs/ de bzhin gshegs pa
298a2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phag rgya dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phag rgya dang
298a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis ra
298a4(rgyud): snying ga rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhug so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'dra gzhi byung // badz+ra pad+ma ut+ma ko hr-i da ya badz+ra ko Sha/ tiSh+Tha
298a5(rgyud): nakra hr-i da yaM pra be sha badz+ra dzi hA gra hr-i da la/ chos thams cad mnyab nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo
298a6(rgyud): chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting 'dzin to// de nas
298a7(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs deng zhugs nas yang rdo rje shin tu phra mo'i dbyib su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugaso
298a8(rgyud): de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byu // sarba badz+ra At+ma ka hr-id badz+raka pa tsa/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra kA hr-i dam/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-id la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi los sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi
298b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste
298b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting 'dzin to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
298b3(rgyud): byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang gi mtshan ma nyid kyi thubs kar
298b4(rgyud): bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying po'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste bzhug so// de nas yang
298b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ya sa kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bsha
298b6(rgyud): bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag/ rdo rje dbusu sangs rgyas bri/ sang
298b7(rgyud): rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam su yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing / de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya// ting 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcings par bcings// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi
298b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ dkyil 'khob chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas rang gi sems
299a1(rgyud): la su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bsla'o// lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi rtse mo bas mu bya ba// rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur
299a2(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa'i// mtshan ma gal te byang ba na// mtshan ma de ni khab bya ba// sems de kun tu khyab par bya// ji tsam 'dod pas sems kha ba nas// khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas de yang bsdu
299a3(rgyud): ba ni// sna yi rtse mo'i bar du gnas// de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag// gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba// de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ ting 'dzin ye shes kyi brtag pa'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'od
299a4(rgyud): yin// sUk+Sha badz+ra s+pha raH/ se ha ra Na badz+ra/ badz+ra hr-id tiSh+Tha sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis// sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can
299a5(rgyud): kun la des khyab bya// byams pas khyab pa'i tshul rgya sa ni// snying rje can ni gang yin pa/ sems can kun don ldan pa yin// sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhin 'odags
299a6(rgyud): ba gdod nas dge bas na mkha' bzhin// chos sam yang na chos ma yin// bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur// gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de dag rtogs par
299a7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po goms par bya// de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yino// ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ mahA kA ru Na s+pha raH/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ho pra mo ha pha barba/ sar+b+ba satwa saM bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
299a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi rje su dran pa'i ye shes bsla'o// namakha'i yi ni phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// 'greng ngam yang na 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya// de bzhin du yang gnas kun/ 
299b1(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo sbyor ba yis// mnyam par gzhag pas snying kar ni// rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom// ji lta ba yi rim bzhin du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po// gnas rnams kun tu
299b2(rgyud): bsgoms par bya// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dus kun tu/ ji lta ba'i go rims bzhin// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yid// badz+ra mu khi b+hA
299b3(rgyud): ba ma hA bo d+hi satwa A be sha/ badz+ra pA Ni d+ha ra sha ya sA ru pa/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i ti A be sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis na// goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis/ zla ba'i dbyibasu bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems kyis
299b4(rgyud): ba'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu no// bdag nyid rdo/ rje'i dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid gyis ni bsgom bya ba// sems dpa'i rdo rje sgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul spyad la// bdag nyid snying
299b5(rgyud): kar rdo rje sems// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ rdorje sems dpa' sgom pa'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag nyid ni/ bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba
299b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sgom pa'o// de la snying po ni 'di rnam so// sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha/ badz+ra sarba badz+ra A be sha/ badz+ra sarba sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na A be sha ta thA ga to he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
299b7(rgyud): chos nyid gsal ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sems can thams cad chags par byed
299b8(rgyud): bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyang bas// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs/ bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam// rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang / 
300a1(rgyud): / gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig bdag ni sna tshogs las dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// las rnams thang
300a2(rgyud): des sgrub bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i dbusu bsgom pa
300a3(rgyud): bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid// des ni sangs rgyas nyid 'grub// de nas rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// snying kar rdo rje la sogs 'khor// bsgoms na rdo rje las/ 
300a4(rgyud): pas/ rang gi dngos grub sbyid par byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab// rdo rje bcings las lags byung
300a5(rgyud): bcu drug rnamasu bshad pa ste// ting nge 'dzin ni das che/ mchog/ de rnams kyi ni bcings pa bshad/ dkyil mo krung 'du ga gan rgyal du// g.yas bcus de bzhin slar bcus pa/ 
300a6(rgyud): kar gnas pa bzhi pa ste// rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor// dpral bar gzhag dang lhag pa dang // 'phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar// khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang // snying kar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung // 
300a7(rgyud): spyi'o thong ka khar bzhag pa// mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// Tak+kiHgra grang maT a gra tAM tAM/ aM e baM ba tri TahrIHTa/ b+h+r-i Ta/ kra sha haH
300a8(rgyud): bi ba khe ber phaTang pra sa de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog phra mo ra rdo rje can rnams bslab// ye shes khu chur dam tshig las/ gnyis byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa tshan
300b1(rgyud): bo mngon par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod
300b2(rgyud): pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga
300b3(rgyud): badz+ra d+hA tu a nutA ra pU dza karba s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'o cho ga rgyas pas khyab
300b4(rgyud): las kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i ma cho ga 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a nut+tA pU dza kam+ba
300b5(rgyud): s+phar tsa sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rar chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla pad pa'i chos rgyas pas khyab pa'i las
300b6(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs shes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a nut+ta pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha rau Na sa ma ye hUM
300b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa cha chad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pa khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byer gyis brlabs zhes bya
300b8(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+b+ba s+phar rdzas pa ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba
301a1(rgyud): grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting
301a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kar+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de
301a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma
301a4(rgyud): thag tu de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa na mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ rnam pa
301a5(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnamasu gyur te/ byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bum sprin rgya mtsho rnams
301a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
301a7(rgyud): rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdad thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
301a8(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang / khams gsum thad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi/ 
301b1(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhug so// mchod pa
301b2(rgyud): spror rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchad de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshu
301b3(rgyud): du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// e ma'o// sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag mchod pa kun ni bad pa yin// gang phyir sangs rgyas nyid chen du// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub pa
301b4(rgyud): mdzad// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad// 
301b5(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+ya tan pU dza s+pha ra Na karma/ badz+rI Ni hUM A/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+ya ta na pU dza s+pha ra Tha karma gr-i dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni rA tan a nu rA ga
301b6(rgyud): pU dza s+pha ra Na kerma bA Ne hUM ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na swe d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti a/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham
301b7(rgyud): cad spyan 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyas par byed pa mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa che
301b8(rgyud): po rnam so// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi Sha ka rAt+ne b+ho badz+ra mo Ni au/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye badz+ra ti dzo ni dzA la hrIHoM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sha ba ri pU ra Ni/ tsin+ta ma Ni d+ha dza a pre b+ho badz+ra d+haH
302a1(rgyud): a gr-i trA~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pr-i ti pra lo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ye ta/ dbang ma chen mo dang / snang ba chen po dang / ring po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dgal zhi mgu ma rngas
302a2(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harmA tA sa mA d+hi b+hiHston mi mat+pa d+harmA gr-i d+hIHoM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ning ha raM/ stu do mi me hA
302a3(rgyud): ShA nu ge d+hi/ oM sarba thA ga ta tsakra akA ra ba badz+rad sarba su trAn+d+ha na ye/ stu no mo sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sar+b+bo b+ha Sha bud+d+ha saM gI taM b+hirga yi/ snyun mi badz+ra bA tse bo/ ye shes chen mo'i
302a4(rgyud): gru dang / dbyangs chen mo'i rjes 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang / sngags kyi spyod ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod pa'o// 
302a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga Shad+hu ba ma g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra/ ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sar s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke dz+wa la s+pha raH pU dza ka pa
302a6(rgyud): ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa su dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ku ru ku ru/ sems can ma dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag can ma dang / mig ldan ma dang / dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa
302a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o// de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad// de nas rab tu bshad pa
302a8(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje byings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ sangs rgyas sku rnams bzhag par bya// rdo rje sems la sogs tshul du// lha mo phyog rgya
302b1(rgyud): bcas pa bri// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rngu bya ba 'ding gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pabashad/ de la dang po rdo rje byings kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ba// bcug nas kyang 'a
302b2(rgyud): skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis// mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyini re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol
302b3(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyi su sbyid// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// dadas byang chub cher po'i sems sgrub
302b4(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ bdag ni sangs rgyas yin pa sam zhing / dga' bas bdag ni mcho byung na// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba
302b5(rgyud): 'thob// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdog ni sangs rgyas yin pasam zhing // phreng ba la sogs rab mchod pas/ mchod na dani dbang yang bskur/ byang chub sems ni brtan bskyengs
302b6(rgyud): bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // snyan pa'i glu yis rab mchod pas// mchod na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // gang gyi mchod pas ba/ 
302b7(rgyud): mchod na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin/ bud+d+ha At+ma kauti/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ bud+d+ha stu ti ka ro ma~M/ bud+d+ha pU dza ka ra mi// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag
302b8(rgyud): rgya'i ya shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing / de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchod na// rtag tu phyag ba 'os par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bam
303a1(rgyud): nams che// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// rje su yi rang bas mchod na/ myung du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul ba'i// mchod pa kur gyi sa
303a2(rgyud): rgyas rnams// mchod na de yang mchod par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// dge bo'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni// yongasu bsngo ba'i mchod pa yi// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la snying po na
303a3(rgyud): rnams yin no// prA NA mi na ta po da bud+d+ha pA dza pa ri nA ma/ de nas chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag/ chos 'di dag gis mchod pas ni
303a4(rgyud): dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi// a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de mi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod / 'di chos rnams thang
303a5(rgyud): kyi rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste// dam chos 'khor lo'i mtshadapa yis// mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// sgra brnyan dag dang 'drar
303a6(rgyud): bshad// chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis// mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin/ sarba shud+d+ha sa man+ta b+ha dra/ d+har+m+ma tsakra nik+Sha pany+tsa/ de nas ting 'dzin gyi mchod bI
303a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dngangag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje'i dbyibasu bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra
303a8(rgyud): mo rnams// sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na ni// chos kyi skur ni myur du 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yo// rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyu/ 
303b1(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rang gi lus ni pa mo rnams// sangs rgyas kyi ni skad bsgoms na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// badz+ra kA ya/ d+har+m+ma kA ya/ sar+b+ba
303b2(rgyud): kA ya bud+d+ha kA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rang 'byung la ni las kun gyis// 'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni// phul na rdo rje sems dpa' dang // 'dra bar da ni
303b3(rgyud): myung du 'gyur// shin tu chags par sbyor ba yis// dam du bzung ba'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas rnams la phul 'gyur na// rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas// brtan par gyur
303b4(rgyud): pa'i mchod bde bas// sangs rgyas rnams la phul da ni// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'i// kun tu sgo ra ba'i bde ba ni// mchod pa'i pir ni phul bas na
303b5(rgyud): rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po ni 'di ngag yino// ra ti badz+ra/ rA ga badz+ra/ pra ti badz+ra/ karma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phrin
303b6(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya chen po'o ye shes bslab par bya ste/ snying ka rtsi logs rgyab spong ba// dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du// kha dang rna ba mgo lhag pa// spyi bor 'phrag pa kha rked bzhag/ de nas de bzhin gshes
303b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// phag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje bcings pa dam pas la/ snying ka la sogs gnas tshul tu// bzhag nas rgyal ba
303b8(rgyud): rnams mchod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// oM kra sa ya sI trai kra na kha na hUM hUM sha do shI sde// las kyi phyag rgya mdob bsdus
304a1(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya gnyis bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las rtog pa chen po'i rgyal ba rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho brtsa
