304a2(rgyud): ba rdzogaso// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byir gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
304a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyagargya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga Sha muSh+Ti sa/ de
304a4(rgyud): nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bar gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thud
304a5(rgyud): du rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po chen por tshag/ rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin pa shegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM
304a6(rgyud): badz+ra satwa suSh+Ti sa ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs par/ chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas
304a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal por cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra
304a8(rgyud): rAH muSh+NI tra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs
304b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra d+harma muSh+Ti khe/ de nas de
304b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
304b3(rgyud): dum bu'i rgyal po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngas grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra karma muSh+NI he/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
304b4(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis pa com ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum
304b5(rgyud): bu'i rgyal po chen po'i chog rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub tha mas cad bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bani ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba
304b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul da ni// mkhas pas rab tu bri bar bya// thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs
304b7(rgyud): bzhag ste// de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/ de nas rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga
304b8(rgyud): rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du bcu de 'di skad smra bar bya'o// khyod kyi gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la yang ma bstan cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par lta ba dang / sdig pa'i las byed pa'i sems can rnams/ 
305a1(rgyud): kyang yod do// brtson 'grus chung ba dang / sbyor ba med pa dang / ri bo mi shes pa de dag rdo rje'i dbyings la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnam su
305a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig du gyur pa 'di ma lus
305a3(rgyud): shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad song bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i
305a4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi bdang byin gyis brlab so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dad par ma byed cig/ sa
305a5(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / khyol song dang / yi dwags kyi khamasu daltung bar gyur pa 'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin/ par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la gdong g.yogs bkrol te
305a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig smos shig/ bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa// bzlas pa'i snying po
305a7(rgyud): don tu ni// der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya// ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ phyag na rdo rjes gsung ba bzhin// bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya kun// de dag kun gyis grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thad
305a8(rgyud): kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang po gshibs nas ni/ rdo rje bcings pas bzung bar bya// de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa// dam thag tu de dbang bskur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid
305b1(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbar la// ye shes pag rgya bcing bar bya// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par ba'o// glu dang gar
305b2(rgyud): zas dang br-i// spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams// sangs rgyas rnams la dul na ni// las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par
305b3(rgyud): bya'o/  mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas/ dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas// batshan ma mchod rten byin rlabs te// bdag nyid rdo rje dbyingasu sgom// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// gung ma myu gu bzhin
305b4(rgyud): du gshi // mthe'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse sgreng // dam tshi ga mchog gi dam tshig go// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni// rab tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor de// ting
305b5(rgyud): 'dzin dbang du 'gyur ba'i tshul// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung // mdzub ma'i mthe'u chung bsdu la ba ni// rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor lo// de nas sede'
305b6(rgyud): rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bzhi lta ba bzhin du rlabs nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshig rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i
305b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnamasu bris ni dngos grub thams
305b8(rgyud): cad kyang 'grub bo// de ltar ras dang / rtsig pa dang / na mkha' dang / gnas thams cad dbris na dngos grub thams cad 'gru'o// dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te la la ni dkyil 'kho nga du
306a1(rgyud): pa nyid kyi tshe ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub/ la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis/ la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas
306a2(rgyud): pa yang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjesu dga' ba dang / ro dang / zas dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams mong bar bde bzhin du yang lo gcig gis mchog 'grub/ 
306a3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
306a4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par brtogs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung // badz+ra
306a5(rgyud): satwa de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems da / sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang / pha
306a6(rgyud): pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du thag pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil
306a7(rgyud): 'khor 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad bya bo// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'drabs na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyi/ 
306a8(rgyud): 'khor phyi ma thig gdab bo// zla ba 'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag par bya// de nis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de bzhin gshi ba
306b1(rgyud): kyi dngas grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o// de la thog ma pa di skad khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / khong du ma chud ba su la yang gsung ba 'di sa smra shig/ khyod ngan song thams cad ltu
306b2(rgyud): ba 'am/ mi bdeb ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur te re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes bslab po// zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug
306b3(rgyud): ste phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung bas// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ni// bsgobs na byung du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i dam tshig ye shes
306b4(rgyud): bsla'o// 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu/ kha mas gsum na yang gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags brag/ bar/ khyod ni nam yang ma byed cing // ma hA sa ma ya ha na paH
306b5(rgyud): ces mna'i snying po sbyin// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnamasu dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che
306b6(rgyud): po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o// dngos grub kyang de bzhin no// ri mo la sogs pa dang / lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos
306b7(rgyud): grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta bo bzhin du yang bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gci/ 
306b8(rgyud): tu 'das nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs pa
307a1(rgyud): gsol to// oM lagaso rdo rje sems dpa' khod// rdo rje rin chan khod lagaso// rdo rje chos khong lags pa ste// rdo rje las ni khong lagaso// rdo rje theg pa blar med// de bzhin gshegs pa
307a2(rgyud): kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshar gyis kyang // dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dag par byas nas bsgrubs da ri/ sa
307a3(rgyud): rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'grub// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni 'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na// khad ba mi zad med mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
307a4(rgyud): nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal bo chen po 'as bya pa rdzogaso// bab po bzhi pa/ de nas yang
307a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thab sa cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa
307a6(rgyud): brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba bta'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje cha// rdo rje mgon po rab bsgrub mdzad// rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od// rdo rje dpal khod phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po/ rdo rje ral gri mtsho/ 
307a7(rgyud): chen po'i// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog spros med khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// rdo rje las dang srung ba che// gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshalo// 
307a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dang byang chub che// sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che// theg chen khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// don kun gyi ni de nyid don// sems can don chen kun rig pa/ kun
307b1(rgyud): mkhyen kun byas thams cad de// kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang // dam tshig chen po de nyid don// sems chen khyod la phag 'tshalo// rdo rje lcags
307b2(rgyud): kyu 'dod pa che// rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po// rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba// sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog/ rig mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchod chen
307b3(rgyud): mchog/ rig mchog khod la phag 'tshalo// rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che// rdo rje gsang po rab gsang 'chang // rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che// rdo rje dgos la phag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje
307b4(rgyud): mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che// sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod pag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che// sems dpa' mchod par
307b5(rgyud): mchod pa// thabs chen dpo ni dngos grub che// rdo rje sgrub khong phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po//  bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbangs te// de bzhin gshegs
307b6(rgyud): pa'i sems chen po/ rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgya sa gci ba rgyal bka' nyan// sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal ma cho ga skyes/ rnam par snang mdzad cha dang khang // stod 'i khro la phyab
307b7(rgyud): 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid cha// yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul// pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa// don dang khyod la phag 'tshalo// kun tu bzang dang spong ba mchog/ bdud dang bdud ri rab 'dul ba
307b8(rgyud): kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid ma khyen// kun tu 'gro khyod phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas hUMnas hUM zhes pa/ rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba bo// rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog phyag na rdo rje khyod 'cha'o/ dgu ba motsha
308a1(rgyud): / brjed pa dang / rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas bya// gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod pa// rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus// kun gzigs yab ni khang yir
308a2(rgyud): byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing // glu blangs gang zhig mchod byed pa// de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'dra
308a3(rgyud): 'gyural sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir// rang gi rigs ni skyed pab mdzod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgya
308a4(rgyud): gtso bo phag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ga sol ba'i tshig thos nas rdo rje de dag nyid kyi snying kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad pos
308a5(rgyud): 'di skad gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzir bas smras pa/ bcom ldan
308a6(rgyud): 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas gdul bar mi spyod pa de dag la bdag ji ltar sgrub par bgyi
308a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
308a8(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyi/ ri rab
308b1(rgyud): ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
308b2(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi ba'u bzhug so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugasu bdag byin gyis brlabs
308b3(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongasu bsgrub pa dang / pad pa dang / bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'brub pa dang / ma
308b4(rgyud): rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i
308b5(rgyud): thabs khro bo'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhi
308b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin/ gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung // hUMHde nas de phyung ma thag tu phag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las
308b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can/ smin ma bcum zhing dpral bskur ba// mche ba lhag ger byung zhing so gtsigs pa// rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / ral gri nga
308b8(rgyud): zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje ma lha 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang / rgyar sna tshogs kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
309a1(rgyud): du shin tum rus pa thams cad gdul ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rnga rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'kho
309a2(rgyud): la 'dug ste tshad brjod pa 'di cha du brjod do// e ma thabs kyis 'dul ba yi// thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te// gong phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir// dri ma med pa'i khro gnyer rab// de nas de bac+doMs
309a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig
309a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhug/ sa te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i mtsha
309a5(rgyud): 'di smras pa/ oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha ni hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A ra ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas deb zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha mas
309a6(rgyud): byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te/ byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byab rgya mtsho'i spyad thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'tsha
309a7(rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ spyan drangs nas rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres
309a8(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lu su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar 'dug ste tshe du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// oM ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni// kun tu bzang zhing sdig men
309b1(rgyud): gang pir sems can 'dul don du/ khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyad sngar zla
309b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhug so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stong
309b3(rgyud): par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung / hU Tak+ki dza/ de nas de byung ma
309b4(rgyud): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam spyir rgya mtsho zad na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thad
309b5(rgyud): gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus pa med par mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcag/ sa kyus bkug nas ri rab ri'i gangs pa dang / rtse mo dza
309b6(rgyud): dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang du brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las bas pa thams cad
309b7(rgyud): du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas pag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje dablangs te gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji snyed pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor
309b8(rgyud): l-i la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bkar yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cags
310a1(rgyud): ji ltar sgrub par 'gyi/ bcom ldan 'das pag mardo rjes gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ skyab su 'gro ba sgrung par byos// kun mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir// khroH
310a2(rgyud): bo rnams kyis sgrub par byos// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po tha~Md kyi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po tha~Md kyi bdag por gyur pas dregs te char khros par
310a3(rgyud): ston cing 'di skad ces smraso// kye gnod sbyid pa ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo// dbang phyug chen po ba pa po// 'jig pa po// 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po// lha'i lha chen po yin
310a4(rgyud): gnod spyod khyod kyi ngag tso'i phyir 38// de nas yang phyag mdza rdo rje gsong zhing 'aka' sprul pa/ kye sems can ma rungs par kyi la 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la ga
310a5(rgyud): bar gyis shig/ de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sem sa can dbang phyug chen po la de skad bka' stsol ba
310a6(rgyud): 'di su zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsub gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad gsungs// grogs po rnams dkon mchog
310a7(rgyud): gsum la skyab su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa la sgrub par gyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod spyir khro bo ma rungs pa gtum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'ab bas khad
310a8(rgyud): khams gsum po 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas sar// de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang / rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor long po

310b2(rgyud): bas nas 'dziska smoso//  na 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag pa pas khyad kyis pa la tso'i ping bka' stsal/ dedas pagar rdo rjes rdo rje sems pa dang bcas pas gas pa zhing 'jug ste 'dus
310b3(rgyud): ces smraso// kye lus srel po mi'i sha za ba/ zasu ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang / ma la dang / gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig// de nas lnga chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jib
310b4(rgyud): rten gsum po mtha' dag dang / dmakha' rnams khro bo chen pos no/ par bin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces smraso// khyod kyang nga'i bka' 'od la dam tshig kyang longs shig/ de nas phag na rdo rje lde
310b5(rgyud): po chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to// bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'di ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang / dbang phyug chen
310b6(rgyud): po'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na// de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad kyi thugs ka/ 
310b7(rgyud): nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig drad par bso// oM su b+he badz+ra hU~M phaT/ de ras byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do// hUM de nas de brjod pa thag tu khams gsum pa zang
310b8(rgyud): nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te/ 1ba thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing bcom ldan 'das pag na rdo rje la skabasu dong ngo // lha chen po zhes bya ba'i
311a1(rgyud): mA denis la 'phel te dran pa med par gyur te sha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen ban du byang chub sems dpang phyag rdordza la de skad ces bka' stsal to// ga rdo rdo rje 'jig
311a2(rgyud): gsum po'i 'khang la 'di thams cad la skyabs skyid pa bos 'am pasad cig/ de ngas phyag na rdo rje khro'i chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas lha thams cad bos te 'di skad ces bsum
311a3(rgyud): gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabasu dong la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun pag rgya'i
311a4(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas pa la skyab su mchi'o// khyod kyi bstan pa'i ba/ 'ani bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag pas
311a5(rgyud): te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye lha rnams 'di ni nged de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
311a6(rgyud): bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thub po bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ san thams cad gdul ba'i don pa pa'i phyir tho
311a7(rgyud): po'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen// khyad kyi nang na yang rgya chen po la sogs pa ma dus pa'i sems can mo dang /  dpas de ba'i da gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang da pang badzad pas
311a8(rgyud): sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyad pa'i sdig pa sems cand dmas char bcad par phying byin gyis badras so// de bsar byang rnams 'dza dam tshig la gdas 'gyis shig pa ga' stsal to/ nga pags / 
311b1(rgyud): rkang ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cam phrog sal ba las bskyab tu gsol// bang sa cas kya bka' stsal ba bzhin du 'gyur cing mchis/ bcom ldan las kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyi zhugs
311b2(rgyud): rnams sa rgya bcu sa sa kyis ku tu rdzob kyis gan myos dpa yid// de das khams gsus su mas dus pa spyod pa gsum gyi bdan pa'i rnams bcas ldam las 'dzid bdes/ 
311b3(rgyud): ga la ba de log su bzlas nas nyam thag pa che ni pa'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu bskyab par gsol// bde bar gsha
311b4(rgyud): ba kun tu bskyab par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag rdo rje lha la sogs pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan
311b5(rgyud): pa la zhugs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar ba sa nas khang zad kyang thal bar byas sa re/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu
311b6(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa'i gdul ba/ sems can thams cad la pa dpang ba'ad pa/ sen thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad bcom ldan 'das
311b7(rgyud): kyis bdag cag sreg par 'gyur// de nas phyag rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkar bzhin du byed
311b8(rgyud): bdo gro ni cu bzang ba stid/ khyed kyi pams ca ma lus pa'i patshul ca rdzog pa'i sems ma par ltung ba'i bye gal sa ring ma'im ma 'das dun pa ca 'dzur/ dam tsho
312a1(rgyud): bzhin du bgyi'o//  ras pagan rdo rje khro bo rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

312a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la ba kar stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po lnga'i dbang po lnga chen po 'di ma bslabang/ 'di srog da chud gzan par gyur te ci rung
312a5(rgyud): gsos na ni de yang skyes budamo par 'gyuraro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di sla so// ba dzA yuHde nas 'di smras pa thag tu lha chen po lnga'i sa/ 
312a6(rgyud): po shi ba las so sa te ldang 'dod na ldang ni ma nus// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di lta bus 'dul lem/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

312a8(rgyud): mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'di bskyab mi na'o// gsol pa/ ci'i slad/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir rngonarga/

312b4(rgyud): bshi bar bzod kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to// de nas byang chub sem sa dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par sdon cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas rdo rje'i rjesu spyong pa 'di phyung /

313a1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra kra ma to// de nas de skad ces/

313a3(rgyud): A be sha tan pa te tr-iT/ de nas de slas ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas rang gi lag pa sdong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go// de nas rdo rje'i ring bu rin po che'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las
313a4(rgyud): byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rolan srid pa gsum po tham sa cad kyi dad kyi dbang po de bdag nyid chen po des btulo zhes zla chen po byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po

313a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur te/ de yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas bde ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang / ting 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes dang / mngon

313a8(rgyud): 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa'i bdabo myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhangs la phul nas 'gro gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi/

313b2(rgyud): lha chen po'i lus dalas che du brjod pa 'di byung // a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med// yi ge'i tshig gis mnan rasu// mya ngan las ni 'das par bzhag/ de nas pang
313b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams de bzhin
313b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bzhugs shig/ zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thang kyi dam tshig srungs shig/ de dag gis 'di skad ce
313b5(rgyud): gsol to// bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa ga sum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsu
313b6(rgyud): grog po rnams yang gsum la skyabasu 'dong ba dang / bskyab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa bzung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'tshal na/ bdag car
313b7(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar brgung ngo do// de das phyag rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'dri byiro// byang chub sems ni rims bzhin du// bskyed nas nga yi 'og tu ni// byang rkub cher por ci nus
313b8(rgyud): par 'a shin tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de pas 'jug pa'i dmachog chen po'i phyag rgya btsong ba bas nas dam tshig
314a1(rgyud): chen ma bas rgya'i snying ba 'dis 'ching dug tsu'o/ oM 'adz+ras ma la gre hA ste bar byas pa ya/ brdzas sbas pa ye/ a nu s+tha ra/ sarba la thA ga tA sa pa ya sta/ dri b+ho ma b+ha ga s+thi ros b+ha bas
314a2(rgyud): thA me rdza ba/ a pra'i tsAng ma thA ga sarba karba su na me tsit+ta shra yaH/ ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha gcod de nas 'di smras ma thag tu khams gsum kyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo 'i dzi
314a3(rgyud): r-i'i phyag rgya lag tu babs nas ngam du 'chi bang gyur to// de nas phya gor rdo rjes tshul ba'id du bcud nas dkyil 'khor cher ba theng go ribs bzhin du bsdad la rdo rje ring po che'i dbang bskung bas dang
314a4(rgyud): bsgrub nas rdo rje mtsha ma 'ang lag tu bor nas rdo rje mi gi dbang bskung bas dbang bsku nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi dod la bkod do// de nas 'jig rten gsu
314a5(rgyud): gyi bdag po thams cad kyi ming rnams yin te/ 'di lha ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o// mthu bo che'i sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o// sgra gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu'o// tshangs pa ri thub pa'i rnga
314a6(rgyud): rje'o// dbang po ni rdo rje mtshon cha ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnamasu dbang bskur// de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bdag po rnams la rje su byid pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil ba'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// 
314a7(rgyud): dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni dbyig pa'o// seng smug ni rdo rje se bskug ste/ de la sogs rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskuro// de nas namakha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ sbrang
314a8(rgyud): rtsis mos pa ni rdo rje glang po'i sngo'o// sbrang rtsir byed pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang po'o// rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bsgo/ 
314b1(rgyud): de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byid pa 'di la ste/ mdzod sbyang na rdo rje tho ba'o// de rdo rje de'o// rlung ni rdo rje rlung / ku bai ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o// de la sogs par rdo rje po nyang dbang bsku // de nas sa'o// 
314b2(rgyud): gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag rdo rje lcags kyu'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje duso// gtsug pungs ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o// ba ru Na ni klu'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa'i rdo rje brab zhes pa
314b3(rgyud): ba'i dbang bskuro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma la rdo rjer byir gyis brlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskubs
314b4(rgyud): dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu bkod do// 'di lnga ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o// rug mai n+ye ni rdo rje gsar ro// 3k+ShA ni rdo rje ga'o du ma'o// 
314b5(rgyud): tshangs ra'i rdo rje zhi ba ma'o// dbang mo ri rdo rje khu tshur // de la sogs pa ni rdo rje rgyal por dbang bskur// de nas par snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ oM 'a
314b6(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje mi 'chi ba'o// ro tsa ni ni rdo rje mngang so// dmig pa 'dzin pa raM rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'o// skye ba 'phrog mo ni rdo rje sked 'ching ma swa/ de la sogs pa ni khro mo zhes bya bar dbang bskuro// de ras ramakha'
314b7(rgyud): la spyong ba'i bu ma thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ gsong ma rdo rje 'ju ma'o// za ba ma ni rdo rje zab ma'o// bgo ba rdo rjebabo ba pa'o// dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang ngo // de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mo
314b8(rgyud): btsu / de ras pa la spyod pa'i bung mi thams cad 'byin pa 'di lta ste/ zhi ba ma na rdo rje po nyama'o// rlu 'gyogs pa'i dzi rgya ma 'o pon rdo rje 'bar b.ra'o// ku bar ma rirdo rje'ababam ste// de lasags
315a1(rgyud): nardo rje pon mong dbang bsku// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag mo de rdo rje'i kha'o// ma mun dzi na rdo rje duso// snga chad pa ni rdo rje rul ba mar/ 
315a2(rgyud): bdum ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ rdo rje bram por dbang bskur// de nas bya chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams bskyed nas phyag rgya bcings pa
315a3(rgyud): thams cad bslabs te/ rdo rje dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no// rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje cha// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni// rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed/ 
315a4(rgyud): oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas snying po gzung ba bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin no// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni// gcu 'ang phyir yang bcu pa ru
315a5(rgyud): dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa// de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// dgos pa 'grub phyi 'dug par byos/ khyod / srog ni la rus pang / dam tshig 'dis ni gyur tar// rdo rje bcing ba
315a6(rgyud): byas te/ mdzub mo 'gugs nas rab tu mnan// mthe bor gnyis ka mtshams sbyor bas// gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa las// gal te 'ga'
315a7(rgyud): yis bcings gyur na// dam tshig 'dis ni khyed gsod do// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ga yis// mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni// mdzub mo sor rgyab nas ni mdud// ldog ste mgo bor bzhag par bya// bdag
315a8(rgyud): nyid che ba'i dam tshig 'di// rdo rje rig 'dzin bcings nas ni/ khros te gang la bltas pa yi// de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yi// srung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni// dod gsang ba'i
315b1(rgyud): dam tshig ste// sems can thams cad srung ba'o// gang zhig gang la bskyab pa'i phyir// khro bor ldan pas bcings na ni// sems can gang la srung ba yi// de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byos// rdo rje'i phyag rgya ga
315b2(rgyud): bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mthe'u chung gis ni bsdam byas// gcu zhing slar gcu drag bkrol nas// spyi bor mnyam zhugs gang yin pa'i// dam tshig 'di yang sbyar byas na// khyod kyis de mi
315b3(rgyud): mdun du ni/ dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod// rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni/ mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por bya// mthe bo gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang // bzlog ste dpral bar
315b4(rgyud): bzhig par ba// gal te gsod par 'dod na ni// dgus dpa bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag tu 'drug// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
315b5(rgyud): dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM pa li tod pa li ta badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya hU~M dzaHdzaHrdo rje gcu pa'i phyag rgyalha dgug pa'i snying po'o// hUM badz+ra a gra dI pa ya sa ma ya hUM/ ba
315b6(rgyud): sdang nas spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA a gra baM/ phreng ba can rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pA tA la b+hany+dzi b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM
315b7(rgyud): ruka badz+ra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dwe b+hany+dza ka hUM phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
315b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ bcings pa'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar sgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal par gsol
316a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sen tha
316a2(rgyud): bskyab pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da lam badz+ra d+ha ra sad t+ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te// 
316a3(rgyud): snying kar yongasu bskor bar bya// mdzub gnyis lcags kyus pi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor 'gug pa mchog yi no// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ci'i rtse mo'i phyi rol
316a4(rgyud): kun tu bskor te 'khod// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyi la 'khor 'dus pa dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsu ngaso// kye grogs po dag srog gcod pa dag spang
316a5(rgyud): zhing dam tshig gzung ba la sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dam tshig gi sems can de rnams kyi sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
316a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig/ de nas bang rku
316a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsung so// oM duSh+Ta badz+ra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+ha na sa ya bi ka ra sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA maN+Da la/ b+hany+dza b+hany+tsa/ mar dmar do/ khA ra
316a8(rgyud): khA da pa ra man+ta bzlas ma ya hU~M paT/ rdo rje khro mdzub legs par ni// sen mo sbrang de dkris nas kyang // rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba// phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms// de nas 'di smras ma thag tum rungs pa'i
316b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa rnam padams gtsa'i bral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag bcings pa yang drab las rus pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang bsregs shing tu
316b2(rgyud): pas 'dod cher 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ga la ba dang thal mo sbyad te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog dang mi dbral bar skyabs mdzad
316b3(rgyud): du gsol// de nas pagar rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces to// bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la sbrul du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
316b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ oM naM suM b+ha ha nad ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phag na rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo mi bzad pa 'di gsungs// oM mahA badz+ra khu ra kro d+ha pa ta ye sarba duH
316b5(rgyud): le baM nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya b+hik+ki ra bi d+hAd si yai s+pho Ta yarmAHya sarba duMSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA bad+d+ha gr-ih+Na ha dad ha ba tsa sarba dukhyAs ma ya satwa bzlas ma ya hUM paT/ de nas gsu
316b6(rgyud): ma thag tu ma rungs pa'odam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho chen por ltu // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom lda/ 
316b7(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/ 'dra men pa dang gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis
316b8(rgyud): ji ltar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM ha na han badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag rdo rjes yang 'phra med pa la sogs pa
317a1(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa thad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya shrI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra haM/ badz+ra d+ha ra satwen hUM dza de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phra men pa la sogs pa
317a2(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i pha rol bskor te rakho dado// de nas byang chub sems dpe' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'phra med ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos
317a3(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// kye bzod ldan rnams srog gcod pa spangs pa'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa gzung bar byos shig/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang rab tu 'bar ba dang gcig pu 'bar
317a4(rgyud): bar gyur pas khyod kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs sa ra/ de nas 'phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas
317a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na rdo rje la
317a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje sems can 'di dag rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la thabs sbyin pa sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs rje chen pos sems can zad
317a7(rgyud): 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-id ya mA kaR+Sha ya/ yad tA ye ma to mA ma d+hA ra d+ha na mi ya ta/ tad+ya s+ya hr-i da ye ni skra mi du sa ma ya hUM/ 
317a8(rgyud): dzang de nas dor phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// snying kar rdo rje lag ngang gnyis// shin tu dam por bcings nas ni// rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse mo yis// reng go mtshan khung brud par bya// khyed dmas kyis phyag rgya
317b1(rgyud): 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snying dus la zo shig/ de nas 'phra med ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchod rgal te rang gi gnasu dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'a
317b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdag la bka' stsal na/ nga bcom ldan
317b3(rgyud): 'das rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams la ji ltar bgyi// bdag / la bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
317b4(rgyud): rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i phyag rgya 'di gsu ngas pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya/ A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wa ra d+hi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu rims las
317b5(rgyud): pa'i nad thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i pha rol tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad 'di rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye bzod ldan
317b6(rgyud): rnams sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa long cig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs phogs te 'tsho bar bgyid na/ da
317b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying
317b8(rgyud): po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A ba rA Na ni bud+d+ha sa t+ye na sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang // mthe bong
318a1(rgyud): mnyams te sbyar nas ni// mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa// phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i nang thams cad kyi gang btab pa la las byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis thong
318a2(rgyud): khyad bdag srog dang bral la re// de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol to slar dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad
318a3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung na de la bcom ldan 'das sen dmyal
318a4(rgyud): ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM k+Sha pa ya badz+ra sAhA// de nas byang chub sod
318a5(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan/ song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad dgag pa'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM sarba a pa ya A kaR+Sha Ni bi sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma
318a6(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
318a7(rgyud): mardo rjes ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// kye bzod ldan rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa dang
318a8(rgyud): ngan song thams cad las thar pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung shig/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal bgyis gzing ba 'di
318b1(rgyud): las bsgrub tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dur dang / khyod la skyabasu mchi'o// de nas phag na rdo rje ngan song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying
318b2(rgyud): po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya bskrad ni pra mo kA ya/ sarbA pA ya ga'i b+h+yaHsarba satwa sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya traT/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa bshad // rdo rje bcing ba
318b3(rgyud): dam bcas te/ gung mo gnyis ka sbrang na su/ tha ma bzhi ri rtse mo sbar/ sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin// de nas ngan song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i
318b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skye so// ngan song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen pong bor ro// 
318b5(rgyud): nas yang bang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams pa lus shing lus pa med pa'i sku
318b6(rgyud): dang par pa dang / bde ba thad mong bar bgyi ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu'i thob par bya ba'i bdad 'tshol cig par bdag la bcom ldan 'angs
318b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka'
318b8(rgyud): stsol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badz+ra pA Ni ma hA paN+Da le pra ba sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro tranI ba ra ya pra ba bya pa mo sha ya trur dr-iSh+Ti
319a1(rgyud): brgya ba ma bi sho d+ha ya nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ta ha ha ha hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
319a2(rgyud): lus pa med par bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang / dngos grub dam pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i
319a3(rgyud): bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad bya
319a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// rdo rje dam tshig la byung ba// sangs rgya
319a5(rgyud): byang chub 'byin byed pa'i// ma rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU NA mA ti kra ma ho// gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhing gdod
319a6(rgyud): rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu rgyan/ srang bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ dang dang phreng bas shin tu rgyam/ dkyil 'khor kum gyi grwa rnams// sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen rgyan par ni/ dkyil
319a7(rgyud): 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre// shes rab can gyis de nang du// rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan te// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/ rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu// dkyil 'khor lnga
319a8(rgyud): yis rgyan byas te/ de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre// srang bu bres pa tshon rtsis dgang // de la tshon la bzlas pa ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje
319b1(rgyud): slob dpon mnyam gzhag pa// rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po// yid kyis su ni dpe bar ba// de la sgo rnams dpe ba'i sngags ni 'di'o// oM badz+red g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ gser ram dngul las bas pa'am/ sa yang rung
319b2(rgyud): ste legs bris pa'i// pa gu grwa bzhir byas pa la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra dz+wa la a g+ni pa drip+ta A kaR+Sha ya
319b3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ ma hA badz+re sa ma ya hUM dza/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ri// 'bang bas bskor bas bzhag par ba// de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba// pad+mo rdo rje kun de bzhin// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnaMs
319b4(rgyud): dgod pa'i snying po 'di yin// hUM satwa badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM phaT/ oM pA badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM tra/ oM d+harmA badz+ri dz+wA la mA lA hUM hrIHa~M karma badz+ri dz+wa la mA lA hUM a/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
319b5(rgyud): niHsangs rgyas spyan sngang de bzhin du// shes pas cho ga bzhin bri ba rdo rje hUM gis dkyil 'khor ro// de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ 'di bzhin du rdo
319b6(rgyud): rje darings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srang bu la brgal te thams cad du 'gro bar ba'o// de nas de'i phyag rgya bshad// yid kyis ri mo btegs nas ni// rdo rje srang bu 'am
319b7(rgyud): gzhan yang rung // phyir phyung dang du zhugs kyang ni// dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni// ud pal cher sngo 'char ba'i mdog/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar
319b8(rgyud): 'dus// mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal// khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal// g.yon brkyang tshul du bzhugs pa ste// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// g.yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// dbang
320a1(rgyud): phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u ma yi/ nu ma'i steng du gnon pa bri// de yi snying po ni 'di yin no// hUM de yaM phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni// khros pa
320a2(rgyud): mche ba byung ba ni// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od // de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra satwa kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra
320a3(rgyud): duSh+TiM kro d+ha sA d+hu hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis bzhal nas kyang // deng ni rdo rjer dbang bskur bas// rdo rje khro bos bskob bar bri// de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'od bshad// 
320a4(rgyud): badz+re b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ho ta ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dzA la mA lA kr-i d+ha dz+wA la ya sar+b+ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ke tu de ti hUM phaT/ a~M badz+ra hA sa kro d+ha ta haha ta hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa
320a5(rgyud): ni rdo rje shugs kyis 'argal nas kyang // rdo rje sde ni dri b+ha ba khro bo bdag nyid chen pos bskor// de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad// hrIHoM badz+ra d+harma kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi sho d+ha ya hA
320a6(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sha kro d+ha ts+tshin+dats+tshiR+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra he tu kro d+ha pr-i ba sha ya maN+Da le sarba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ba ta ba ta hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
320a7(rgyud): kyang rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni// rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi bskor// de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad// AHhUM badz+ra kar+m+me hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ba tsakro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yar+tha kro d+ha khA da khA da hUM phaT/ 
320a8(rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha mul+li sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnamasu// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du// ji ltar gi rims bzhin du ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa kun dri'o// de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya'ing
320b1(rgyud): yin no// oM badz+ra lA s+ye rA ga ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gI She gA ta gA tra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dz+r-i t+ye ba sha~M ku ru hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dab pa'i phyi rol tu// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
320b2(rgyud): de yi grwa rnams nyid ni// mchod pa'i lha mo ba'i rnams bzhag/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin// oM badz+ra d+hU ba bu dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puk+ka pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra A/ 
320b3(rgyud): lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pu dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni// lcags kyu la sogs bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnamasu// phyi rol rdo rje
320b4(rgyud): rigs rnam so// de nas de dag gi snying po rnams pa shad// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba sa ma ya hUM dzaHoM badz+ra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha dra ba sha ya sar+b+ba sa ma ya hU~M hUM/ oM badz+ra
320b5(rgyud): s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha daR+Sha ban+d+ha sar+b+ba sa pa ye hUM be/ oM badz+ra A ba sha ma hA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM a/ de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
320b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad// de la dang po nyid rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rdo rje khro bo ta rin ti ri'i phyag rgyas bcings te/ zhugs shing zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
320b7(rgyud): gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang dad mchis te tshar bcad par rigs pa rnams ni tshar bcad// bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdu na de ni
320b8(rgyud): ji ltar bgyi bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas rdo rje khro bo tad ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gang ji ltab pa'imadu bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas/ 
321a1(rgyud): yang dam tshig gi ngag rgyu thams cad bcings shing de nas thams cad bon par 'gyur// de nas yang gas pa'i ma dong pa bsgribs nas bdug pa la sogs pa yang de zad do// danas
321a2(rgyud): ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chub shig/ rdo rje slob dpor de rang gis khro bo rdo rje ti rid ti r-i'i phyag rgya bcings pa slob ma la yang snying po 'di dang 'chi bachug shig/ oM gr-ih+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM be/ de nas gos
321a3(rgyud): sngon po bags la mgo la gtsug tor sngon pos bcings te dang sngon pos gdong dkris la sngags 'dis chug shig/ oM badz+ras pa ya ye ma pra bi shwa mi/ de ras bcug ste rdo rje babab pa'i dam tshig
321a4(rgyud): phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra A be sha a/ de nas bababs nas de ltar babs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bir gyis brlabs
321a5(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cadakyang skad cig gis sheso// gnod pa yang med par 'gyuraro// sems can/ thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur// hUM zhes byas pas kyang san
321a6(rgyud): thams cad la tshar bcad pa dang / phan gdags pa bad nas bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje yang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub po// de nas mna'i snying po bin cig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te dkyil 'khor
321a7(rgyud): chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar nus para'agyur// hUM zhes bas
321a8(rgyud): pas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnan par nus par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang bac+doMs
321b1(rgyud): bang chub sems dpa' bag na rdo rjes rag tung ba'ir 'brang 'ing rang gi dngos grub sbyidan par mdzad// de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur// rang gi par dam rdo rje rdor po dzaM lnga ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis
321b2(rgyud): sbyor ro// oM badz+ra pA Thi badz+ra kar+m+ma ka rod+b+ha ba/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gis dbang bsku ro// oM badz+ra kro d+ha tAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra rA pa a b+hi Sha ka ta he badz+ra rA ma/ de nas gang la ming btags pa de la kye zhes pa
321b3(rgyud): ba'i sgra dang sbar ba ba'o// de nas ye shes rnams bsnyad de// rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas// 'bar ba mang po 'od can gyi// rdo rje dbyibs ni snying khar bsam// skye bo kun la 'bebs par bad// rdo rje khro bong mnyam
321b4(rgyud): gzhag nas// dpral bar rdo rje rin chen yang // de bzhin du ni bsabs pas na// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mo mgul du
321b5(rgyud): bsam// sems cad thams cad brlag par byed / rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ jo/ rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag/ skye bo 'di dag thams cad bsrungs
321b6(rgyud): de nas ye shes kyi phag rgya 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yi// hUM sar+b+ba badz+ra kro d+ha a be sha a/ ho rat+na badz+ra kro d+ha b+ha Sha ma nA ya traM hUM/ badz+ra d+hA rmA kro d+ha nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM karma badz+ra krod+ha rAk+Sha/ de nas lnga
321b7(rgyud): thams cad dgag pa'i ye shes kyi phag rgya bslab// hUM zhes pa ba bcings nas ni// lag pardo rjer lcags kyur ba sem// khros nas mdzub mo bskul des ni// lha rnams 'gag pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// rang
321b8(rgyud): gi rkang mthil dbu su ri// rdo rje lcags kyu bris dasu// de nyid kyis ni rtags ma dang na/ lha rnams ngas pa nyid du 'dur// rdo rje'i lcags kyu nyid pag rgya// legs par be ste bzhig dasu/ bskal na u ma laso/ 
322a1(rgyud): / pa bud med thams cad 'gags par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni/ mjug de nyid de bzhin te// des mnan lha yi gang yin pa/ de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di
322a2(rgyud): min/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra karba a~M ku sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha daMSh+Ti a gra AR+tha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha se gats+tsha AM kaR+Sha ya mi ta badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu smar hUM phaT/ 
322a3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya rnapa bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo// brkyang zhing bskum pas gnas na su// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// hUM tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis// skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed// rdo rje ngag ni legs pa
322a4(rgyud): smras hUM zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis// thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gug// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ rdo rje khro bo lta mchog gis// skye bo kun gyi bdud
322a5(rgyud): byed de// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor to// yid kyis lus la go bgo ba// bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste// go cha chen pol sbyor bas ni// skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung // de nas de rnams kyi snyi
322a6(rgyud): bau ni 'di dag yon no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha kA yA be shA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bid+yot+ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa bi rA shA ya hUM/ kA re Na pA ta ya badz+ra sa ma ya hUM pha
322a7(rgyud): oM ma no dr-iT+Ta badz+ra ka ba tsakro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas// badz+ra hU~M zhes bzlas pa yis// gang dang gang la kun
322a8(rgyud): zhugs pa/ phyag rgyas btab par de 'gyur// sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba/ Tak+ki hU~M phaT khros nasu// lan gcig gang la smras pa ni// rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug/ rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin cing // rdo rje lta bas bltas
322b1(rgyud): pa yi// sems can gang dang gang yin pa// de nas don dran nyams 'gyur// yid la bsad ces bsams nasu// snying ka rnga rje sgom par byed// hUM zhes bya ba nyid kyis kun/ rang gi rgyas ni btab par dgongs/ sen
322b2(rgyud): gang dang gang dag la/ yid kyi rgyas ni 'dabs pa gang // phyag rgya 'dis ni shin tu yang / las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag go// Tak+ki hUM phaT/ Tak+ki a/ Dak+ki dza/ Tak+ki haM/ phyag
322b3(rgyud): rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyang // de nas gsang ba khro bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsla'o// yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni// hUM zhes gang la sbyar bya ba// dbang po gnyis ri sprad
322b4(rgyud): byas na// de yi srog ni ma rungs 'gyur// hUM zhes bya dbang ldan pa yis// mchu spyang sos ni brku bzung nas// dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa// gang yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur// hUM zhes sbyor ba gang
322b5(rgyud): yin pa// de ni bde ba mong bar 'gyur/ dbang po ga nyis ni sprad gyur na/ gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob// hUM zhes bya ba rang sbyor zhing // dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang / yan lag kun gyi
322b6(rgyud): gcir gyur na// de moM lus ni bsrungs par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di go hUM a hUM dzaHhUM ho/ hUM ha hUM haM/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi
322b7(rgyud): de kho na nyid pag rgya'i ye shes bslab// gang gis sems can la phan phyir// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas rjesu dranu bas na/ da ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang / 
322b8(rgyud): sa la bris pa de ltar mnan// ji ltar dris pa'i go rims bzhin// u pal che song 'tsher ba'i mdog/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // de ni 'jig rten gsum
323a1(rgyud): rgyal ba// rdo rje hUM dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub// ji ltar ri mo bri ba bzhin// 'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa/ sku gsu thugs ni rdo rje yis// sems dpa'i phyag
323a2(rgyud): rgya bcing bar bya// de nas de rnams las bshad// rdo rje las ni bla na med/ sangs rgyas rje su drang grub pas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo// 'jig rten dag las rgyal bcings na// 'jig rten gsum las rje rgyal
323a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ rdo rje cha dang kun tu 'gro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba 'dra// rdo rje dbang 'i rgyal por 'gyur // chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rted dbang // las kyi rdo rje khro ba che/ rdo rje las de byed par 'gyur// sems dpa' khrab
323a4(rgyud): rab tu brtan/ khro bo lcags kyu yang dge 'gug/ khro ste chags pas chags par byed// khro bo lags pas dga' ba star/ khro gnyer gyis kun ma rung byed// khro bo nya mas gzi brjid mchog/ 
323a5(rgyud): dpal gyi khro ba don rnams sdud// ha hargod pas bdud du byed// chos kyi khro ba chos rnams sdud// rdo rje ral gris gcod par byed// rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog khro bo smra ba'i tshig 'brog
323a6(rgyud): las kyi khro bo las rab ste// srung ba yis ni srung bar byed// khro bo gnod sbyin dag yang za// khro bo khu tshur dngos grub ster// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phag rgya bcing ba bshad// rdo rje gnyi su gyur pa ni// dam tshig
323a7(rgyud): mchog tu grags pa yin// de dag bcing ba bshad par bya// khro bo bcing ba bla na med// lag ngar rdo rjer byas na su// mthe'u chung lcags kyung bcing bar ba// mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni// 'jig rten pa
323a8(rgyud): las rgyal zhes bya// de bzhin mdzub mo ngos spyad te// nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgag/ gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mod bya// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdogs// mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rje ra bya// g.yas pa lcags kyus
323b1(rgyud): dgug par ba// de nyid hUM zhes bya bas 'dung // legs pa sbyin pa de yin te/ mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mang bzhag/ snying khar mdzub mo nyi mas bskor // lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag mdzub mo kha nas dasod
323b2(rgyud): ltar ba// mdzub mo sen mo sbar ba ste// g.yas pa ral gri bcings pa'o// gung mdzub mnyam sbreng 'khor lo yi// kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang // mdzub mo gungad mo rdo rjer sbyar// mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bsko/ 
323b3(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che// mdzub mo bkug pas rdo rje bcings// rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa/ sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hUM// zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste// hUM zhes bya bar lhan ci'o// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi cho
323b4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad// hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje ya tron rdo rje snying po yi/ hrIHni rdo rje sde yi'o// a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi hU~M 3/ tra~M (tra~M/ Shid+he ha/ d+hi ka d+hid+d+ha/ gre kri ba tri AHrdo rje khro bo mang
323b5(rgyud): yi chos kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phag rgya rnams bshad// rdo rje rigs ni che/ po yi/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// rdo rje 'gying la sogs
323b6(rgyud): tshul gyis// khro bo khu tshur gnyisu bshad// gang dang gang gis phyag rgya rnams// las kyi phyogs ni ga du bya// de dang der ni bsgrur nas kyang // phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de
323b7(rgyud): nas 'di 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'a kha ma chen po zhun mong ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// 'jig rtes gsung rgyal phyug rgyani// rdo rje mdzub mau ma tshig gi/ rdoHhUM zhes sngangs
323b8(rgyud): kyi ste// dngos grub thams cad yud kyi 'thob/ mthe'u chung gnyis ka lcags byung bcing // rdo rje gnyis ka steng 'og tu// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs// rig par
324a1(rgyud): / pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// thams cad kyang ni gnod pa ste// de bzhin lngas rnams thad byed// rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis lags pa// rab mnyam gzhag pa ma
324a2(rgyud): nas ni/ shi ba thams cad slong ba ste// rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o// rdo rje mdzub gnyis legs par ni// rdo rje bcing bas bcings na suM// bsgyur te gtsug tu bzhag pa ni// tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam ba
324a3(rgyud): te/ mthe bong ma nyams nas nang du gzhug// mdzub mo dam por bkug na su// bcus pas zhab su 'dug pa'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings na su// gang gi gzugs la rkang g.yod pas// legs par gdan
324a4(rgyud): pa'i sems can de// zla ba phrad kyis 'grub par 'a gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// gcig la gcig gis brdab sa pas ni// sems can gang gi lus la ni// babs nas de yang rdob pa
324a5(rgyud): byed mardo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag sa pha rol go cha bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na/ sa pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje mthil du bcings na su// yid kyis
324a6(rgyud): khros nas dga' bya ba// mthe bong rdo rje dam pa ste// rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan// mthe'u chung rdo rje rtsem ni// rnon po dam tshig 'dzi
324a7(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings na su// gcu zhing phyir bcu byas pa ni// lha 'gags pa yi dam pa yin// rdo rje bcing ba dam pas te// mdzub mo gnyis dkug rab tu ma// 
324a8(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis ka sbyang ba mi// dbus bci ba bar snang gi/ rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las// mdze'u chung gnyis ka gtsongs nas kyang / rgyab sbyang mdzub mo gnyis sgrol te// bsgyung ba mkha' la spyad pa'o// 
324b1(rgyud): bcings pa bsdams nasu// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// 'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje'i phag rgya gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mthe'u chung mdud cing
324b2(rgyud): drag du gtogs// 'di ni sa 'og 'gag pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dab por ste// gung mo mthe bo rdo rje ni// gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// maH
324b3(rgyud): gzhag ste ni snying kar bzhag/ khro bo khu chur gtsir ba ni// pi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o// g.yon po'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas gzung // rab tu khros nas drag gtogs
324b4(rgyud): nang ri rab kyang ni ltung bar byed// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus gzung // rab tu khro zhing 'akug pa yis// gdod rnams kun la dbang du byed// rdo rje bcing ba
324b5(rgyud): byas na su// lag ngang snying khang shin tu bsngam/ rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis mtshan khung / brud pa yis ni snying 'byin to// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis// mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du ni// yi
324b6(rgyud): kyis khros nas bcing bya ba// rims la sogs 'gags dam pa'o// rdo rje thal mo das sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nasu// mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar ba// mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje pag rgya
324b7(rgyud): gnyis nang du// mdzub mo gnyis ni sbas nas kyang / legs par byen du 'phangs pa ni// skyel ba slong ba'i dab pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ gung mo gnyi ga ngos sgyur nas// mtha' ba bzhi y-i ngos spyad
324b8(rgyud): bar skad cog tu de sdig 'dral to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni/ dkyil 'khor dang po dri/ 
325a1(rgyud): bus bre// srad bus shes la phi nas ni// srad bu ji ba'i dbye bar bshad// rdo rje da ba rgya gnyi ga yi// mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyar ba// bas nas tshod rnams thams cad la// 'bar ba'i lta bas dgu
325a2(rgyud): ba bya// rdo rje mdzub mo legs par no// sbyar la bkan te bsdams nasu rab tu khros nas dpe ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi mchog mi'o// de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bshad// brkyang bsgrum gyis
325a3(rgyud): ni tshul byas te// khro bo yo na skad 'byin cing // khro zhing khro bo'i lta bas naM// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dmachog rtag gi tshad po'i las 'jig rten gsu
325a4(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po re chog rgyas pa rdzog so// bam po lnga pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba de
325a5(rgyud): rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyo mas par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba badz+ri Ni/ badz+ra mA te A na ya sar+b+ba badz+ra satwA na hUM dzaHde nas 'di gsu
325a6(rgyud): ba tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kha nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje 'dra ba/ kunas 'bar bas bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha ma
325a7(rgyud): rnam su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thun rdo
325a8(rgyud): rje'i phyag rgya'i gzug su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khong chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khobo la 'dug nas rjed brjod pa 'a
325b1(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thad kyi// gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i pir// btsun mo nyid gyur pa yin/ hi/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi pa brgya'i dkyil
325b2(rgyud): 'khor rdo rjegs pa ba zhes bya ba 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad pa pa// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgal du ni// dkyil
325b3(rgyud): 'khor thams cad srad bu de// dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnamasu// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kya
325b4(rgyud): ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // phyag ra rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dor// dbusu padang rtse zhing bris la// rdo rje rab tu gnas bzhid // 'od 'bar dbusu bri ba ri// de yi
325b5(rgyud): go rims ji bzhin te// rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang // mdang dang dga' bde ba'i do// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'kho nga ma pa gnyis par yang / 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ rdo rje dza
325b6(rgyud): chen bri bar ba// khro gnye dbus rdo rje bri// de bzhin rdo rje gnyis rgyal mtshan// de bzhin so yi phreng ba do // ngo su rdo rje bri bang bya// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ni// pad+ma'i dbusu gnas pas
325b7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+mo lho rdzas bri/ 'bang ba'i dbu su pad+mo bri/ ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin// rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du// rtag tu de ya~M phog su bzhag/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal ras ni// dkyil 'khor ba'i pa dam par yang / rdo rje bsngal
325b8(rgyud): la rdo rje bri/ rdo rje 'di de chen por bskor// de yi phyogs ni thad// 'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go Na'i mchodag/ rdo rje batshal khu rgar mchog grwa dang pi yi gangs rnam su// tshul bzhin pa ni bri ba drug
326a1(rgyud): / de nas rab tu bshadu ba ba/ phyag rgya'i rig pa mdor bsdus na/ dza oM badz+ra ko d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badz+ra krod+ha rol e ku sha A na ya sar+b+bany+tsi/ oM badz+ra po'i kA ma badz+ri Na~M ba sha ma A na ya ti dzi
326a2(rgyud): duSh+Ta kro d+ha to Sha ya sad+g+ha dzaM/ rdo rje dzi zhes pa de'i dkyil 'khor ro// dzaM oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku TI krod+ha sar sar+b+ba ar+thany+dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wA la mA lA pra ba sha ma hA kro d+ha a g+ni dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba ra bi bo'i dzaM/ oM badz+ra d+hA dzA gra ke s+phu ra pa
326a3(rgyud): kro d+ha ti me sar+b+ba swany+dzi/ oM badz+ra an+naT+Ta hA sa naM hA sa hA sa t+te Ta hA sa nA pA ra ya dza~M/ rdo rje rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ de/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha kro d+hi Shad a ra pA ra ya duSh+pA di/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+hinIR+Sha kro d+ha sha na sar+b+ba
326a4(rgyud): d+ha oM badz+ra he Shu ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha tsa kre/ pra be sha ya sar+b+ba R+R-i/ oM badz+ra dzi tA mahA kro d+hi ba shaM ba tse muny+dza di haM/ rdo rje di zhes bya ba'i dkyil lakho ha~M/ ha~M/ oM badz+ra sar+b+ba mu kha kar+m+ma badz+ri Ni ma hA kro d+ha
326a5(rgyud): ru ku ru sar+b+ba na ha~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hid+ha rAk+Sha min+ti/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da kro d+he mahAyak+Shi Ni badz+ra daSh+Ta a kA la bi sha ne pa ya haM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha puSh+Ti be d+ha ti/ rdo rje haM zhes pa pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dmas
326a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnam su rdo rje gang la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra hUM khe/ badz+ra hUM k+Sh+mAM badz+ra hUMte/ badz+ra hUM traM/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i snyi
326a7(rgyud): po rnams brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra ti te/ badz+ra nan+ta/ badz+ra d+hA tu/ badz+ra Da~M ta/ de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams gsungs pa/ badz+ra dza dza/ badz+ra hUM hUM/ badz+ra da baM/ badz+ra a a da nas
326a8(rgyud): 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad// de nas de la thog ma 'du re zhig 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'jug pa'i cho ga
326b1(rgyud): du bcug ste/ rdo rje thogs rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod
326b2(rgyud): par bya'o// de la gar dang / lan gyi gar dang / nye ba'i gar dang / ye shes kyi gong rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi gar rnams ni 'di yino// de la dang po nyid rdo rje dbyingasu bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu
326b3(rgyud): len cing // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gtog par bya'o// de nas ji skad zhugs pa rnams pag rgya rnams kyis yang
326b4(rgyud): dag par dbab par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khra mamadzub mo gnyis// rdo rje hUM mdzad pag rgya ni// snying gang shin tu bcing bar bya// de nas gar gyi cho ga yi// rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis
326b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drong // rdo rje mnga' ri 'phab bar bya// rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs pas kyang // rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin bkrol te// thal mo brdab
326b6(rgyud): cing bcing bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// phyag rgya rdo rje mnyes par bya// mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni// 'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub// de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di
326b7(rgyud): rnams yir/ sid+d+ha badz+ra/ A rA ya badz+ra/ rA gA ya badz+ra/ sA b+hA badz+ra/ de'i 'og tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gyi g.yor pa ri// khu tshur g.yas pas bzung ras ni// bsgyur zhing mdzub
326b8(rgyud): mo'i ngos kyis ni// dpral ba nyid la bzhag par bya// de bzhir gar byed nyi ma yang // bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshar bslang nas ni// rdo rje ha ha zhes dgod cing // mchod pa 'di mi cha
327a1(rgyud): ga yis// rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang // dbang dab rab kyi gzi brjid pa// sgyid dang dgod pas mnyes par byed// de la 'di rnams ni 'dra ba'i pal rgya'i snying po 'di rnams yin no// e
327a2(rgyud): hi badz+ra/ dz+wA lA ya badz+ra/ de hi badz+ra/ hA sa badz+ra/ de bzhir gar kyang bkrol nas ni// pad+ma kha dbus spang ba yi// mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying khang bzhag/ bsam pa g.yos par gdudang pa ru ba// nga ba'izhi na gang bang rdo rje
327a3(rgyud): ral gris bgegs ri gcod ltar bya// mgal ma'i 'khor lo bskor ba yi// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdo rje'i tshig du glu lan ltar// phag ra rdo rje mchod par bya// mchod pa 'di mi cho ga yis
327a4(rgyud): thams cad mnyes pa'i du 'gyur// de la 'di rnams ni nye ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yido// ga pA ya badz+ra/ ts+tshi n+da ya badz+ra/ brah+ma ya badz+ra khru hi badz+ra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dag
327a5(rgyud): baban nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang / bsgrur bde nas gra/ gto tu/ mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzhag par bya// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni// lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khod du// gar gyi cho ga
327a6(rgyud): brtan par ba// snying khar rab tu bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas bdad par bya// mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ 
327a7(rgyud): las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur// mchod pa rnam pa'i byas nas ni// cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dgrol// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yi no// rA t+ya badz+ra/ rak+Sha badz+ra/ khA da badz+ra khan+d+ha badz+ra/ de nas khro bo
327a8(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ya shes bsla'o// rdo rje gsang ba'i la gnyis kyis/ khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtogs pa// skye bo gang gi ping smos pas// de yi snying ni 'gas par 'gyur/ ma mras so yis bzung na/ 
327b1(rgyud): ri gang gi ming smos gzer ba ni// de yi mgo yang myur 'gas te// gang gi bka' las 'da' ba'o// khro bo chen po 'di lta ba'i// mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa ni// gang gi ming ri spos bltas pa// de yi ming
327b2(rgyud): ni rdol bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag la// bdag rang gi ni snying khar yang // rdo rje bcings pas gcing nas ni// de yi sems ni 'jig par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin// hUM badz+ra
327b3(rgyud): s+phoH wa shru badz+re puka badz+ra tha/ hUM badz+ra trA rba/ hU badz+ra pa tha/ de ras rdo rje chen pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag chu'i ye shes bslob/ de la dang po par 'ag phyag rgya ra ba 'di bcing ba ba shang e
327b4(rgyud): chung lcags kyu bcings ras ro// rdo rje khro bor bzhag bdu ba// gson pa rtse gsum rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal gyis bshad// gsor pa'i mdzub mo thad kar brkyang // de
327b5(rgyud): bzhin bkan ba bad+mo'o// de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas nagayon pa'i rdo rjer bzhag ba ba// rdo rje mthil du bcing byas te/ khros pa'i yid kyis dgapa pa ni// mthe bo rdo rje ngas paso// khroH
327b6(rgyud): ti rin ti ri bshad/ mdzub mo lcags kyus bkug pa nyid // mdzub po ngos ni sbyar ba'o// de bzhin mdzub gnyis legs sbyar ba// mdzub mo sprad de dpral bar bzhag/ snying kha 'i ma rab tu bstan// mdzub mo// 
327b7(rgyud): bsdams nas spyi bor bzhag/ bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag pa ru nga// mdzub bsnams pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin// gnyis ka ral gri chang bar 'dzir// mdzub mo 'khor lor bcings pa'o// mdzub mo
327b8(rgyud): mnyams te kha nas 'byung // mdzub mo lags par brkyang ba dang // mdzub mos mgul tu bcing bar ba// de gnyis kha 'gram mche bar bzhag khu chung dam du bcings pa ni// phyag rgya chen po yin
328a1(rgyud): bar bshad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung ba// dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags// de rnams bcing ba ba
328a2(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje bcing ba bla na med// snyib khar bzhag nas rtsibs logs bcu// mda' drangs pa ni g.yon pa nas// snying kha nas ni dra byung bar ba// khro gnyer du ni bsgyur ras te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
328a3(rgyud): ston pa dang // spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang // bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag par bya// kha yi dbusu rab bzhag pa// mdzub mo ral gris 'babs bar ba// 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang // kha nas ra ba
328a4(rgyud): tu 'byin pa ste// spyi bo lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro// dpung ba snying ka rtsibs logs rnams// rdo rje gsung ba de bzhin pa/ mche ba 'i gan su bzhag pa dang // khu tshur ngam du bsdams pa'o
328a5(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgyan// mtshan ma'i go rims bzhi/ du bcings// dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa la/ de bzhin rdo rje khu tshwa bzhag// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang por chos kyi bya/ 
328a6(rgyud): rgya rnams ba shong // phaT Sha/ sha taT/ ma ta ha/ sa tata/ ra Ta ta/ ta Ta ta/ hr-i ta ta/ ha ta ta/ pa ta ta/ tra tata/ ka ta ta/ b+ha ta ta/ ku ta ta/ ri ta ta/ kha Thata kha tata/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi byaH
