328a7(rgyud): rgya bcings pa bshad// mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te// gnas gang yin par gzhag par bya// khro bo'i lta ba khro dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam
328a8(rgyud): tshig gi rtog pa chen po rgyal po las khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs
328b1(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phab rgya byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas phag na rdo rje
328b2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje pha mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas beng chub sems dpar rdo rje snying pos 'jig
328b3(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra rAt+nakro d+ha kra pa hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sbyid gyis 'jig rnyed gsum las dam par rgya
328b4(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje pa mo'i rig pa dab pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra sUHpad+ma kro d+ha kra me hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sde tshokyis 'jig rter gsum las rngam par rgyal ba'i
328b5(rgyud): phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sUr+m+ma badz+ra karma kr-i d+hA kra ma hUM paT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po ngal na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje
328b6(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ba da de/ de rnams kyi rang gi snying po gsung so// oM sUr+m+ma badz+ra satwa su dz+nyA na krod+ha hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra e ku sha A R+Sha ya ma hA kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
328b7(rgyud): sU k+ShA rA gA kro d+ha a nu rA ga ya ti kra ma hUM paM ma/ oM badz+ra sUr+m+ma badz+ra puSh+pe kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sha beSh+pe d+h+r-i kuSh+Ti kro d+ha ser ar hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+wa la maN+Dal kr-i sU r+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra
328b8(rgyud): kro d+ha sar+b+ba ar+tha mA me pra yats+tsha shI kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma hA sa kro d+ha ma ny+dza Ta Ta hA sa ha ha haH hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sha badz+ra d+harmA badz+ra kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra ts+tshe nga kro d+ha ts+tshirA b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sha
329a1(rgyud): / kro d+ha ma hA tsakra ts+tshin+da pa ta ya shrI pra be sha ya hri da ya b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra hU kA ra ha na tA ya bA ka trer+ya hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra kar+tha kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma ka rod+ha ga/ sar+b+ba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hUM paH
329a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra sUk+Sha ka ba tsakro d+ha rAk+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ i sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha han b+ha ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAny+tsit+ta mA tra badz+ra g+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUkrA muSh+Ti ko d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ da nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs kyi
329a3(rgyud): ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bsha bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad/ dkyil
329a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bus bre// nga yi dbus sangs rgyas bri// ye shes rdo rje'i dbus na'o/ sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// phyag rgya de nyid kun
329a5(rgyud): shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa rnam su yang // 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs/ rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun
329a6(rgyud): tu rdo rje khro bo'i cho ga bzhin// de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad// de la dang po nyidi re zhig bcug nas bsgo ba ni de ring khyod la de bzhin ga
329a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bor bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur gyis de la nan tan gyis shig sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lus pa med pa yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir nas de bzhin gshe
329a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dam pa thob pa'i 'bras bu'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje khro bos sems can thaMd yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta zhig smos kyang
329b1(rgyud): ci dgos/ de skad sgo nas gdong g.yogs dgrol te de rnams kyil 'khor chen po thams cad bstan nas rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyi su sbyin ro// de nas rdo rje khro bo'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs shig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'a
329b2(rgyud): gyis// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas la// hUM zhes bya bas gang sbyar bas// de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje pa po brtad byas te// cho ga bzhin du mchod pa ni// dgra 'di 'jig rdo rje hUM pi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rjephra mo tshul spyar
329b3(rgyud): bas// khro bor ldan pa ci srid pa reng // de snyed sems can pa rungs byed// de ltar de bzhin gsol ba yang // rnal 'byor car gyis 'dod na ni// ma lus pa ni thabs cad kyang // de dag par zhing 'tshe bar 'gyur// de la de dag
329b4(rgyud): bi snying po ni 'di dag mid// hUM hU drA sha ya badz+ra/ hUM bi rA sha ya saHsuk+Sha badz+ra pA t+ya nA ya shI ts+tsha hUM/ sems can gang gis dgra la ri/ na cig gyur pa che bstan pas// khams pa mched pa'i ral
329b5(rgyud): 'byor gyis// rdo rje 'phrobs 'jog pade 'gyur// rdo rje 'phro ba ringal 'byor gyis// snying rje can gyi su gang la// snying rje rdul 'byor da yis ro// gdug pa thams cad de 'jig go// chos pa yang ra chos
329b6(rgyud): min pa// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// de ltar bsgoms ras sems can la// hUM zhes bya ngas 'jigs par byed// gdul bar dka' ba'i sems cad gang // sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa// de rnams yang dag
329b7(rgyud): ba'i pir/ hUM zhes bya bas 'jigs par byed// da la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin// b+hai ra badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ga ru Na badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM be shud+d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM bi sho d+ha na badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i dab
329b8(rgyud): ri bris nas kyang // yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi// khyim gyi dbusu lhung bsams nas// de yi rigs de 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhir rdo rje 'phra tshul gyis// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' cha
330a1(rgyud): / lo'i gzugs/ lhung na rigs 'jig par 'gyur/ phyag rdo rje'i gzugs chen po// bsgobs ngas gang du lhung ba dor/ sngang srid nyes pa sna tshogs kyis// bcun mong bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ 
330a2(rgyud): ba kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni// sdang ba gang la lhung ba ri// de yi snang srid nges par 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yi do// hUM badz+ra pA baM ta/ hUM bo d+hi satwa pra ba ta/ hUM
330a3(rgyud): badz+ra b+ha pra ba ta/ hUM bud+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje rtse por rab sbyor bas// zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgobs nasu ni bdag rang kyang // gang du lhung ba de ltung 'gyur// zla bar rdo rje bdag rang gis// bsgoms nasu ni bdag rang yang / 
330a4(rgyud): tu khros nas gang ltung ba// de yi rigs mod la lhung / khad/ rang phyag na rdo rjed/ bsgoms dasu bdag rang yang / gang du lhung ba de yi ma ring bong mo thogs 'jigs par 'gyur/ bdag ra nga sangs rgyas bcu
330a5(rgyud): nyid// bsgoms nasu ni bdag nyid kyang // gang du lhung ba de yau ni// snang srid ring po mi thogs 'jig// de la dag go snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin// bo d+hA gr-i pra ba Tha ya hU~M/ sar+b+ba badz+ra pra ba ta ya hUM 3
330a6(rgyud): satwa pra ba ta ya hUM/ bud+d+ha pra ba ta ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la// rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba// rdo rje hUM byas 'khyud nas ni// gang gi
330a7(rgyud): mi smos de 'chi'o// rdo rje khro bor snyoms par zhug/ sna nas phra mo thang gcig tu// dbugs btang hUM zhes pa tshul gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang lhung bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo tshul sbyar la// khros nas rdo rje lta ba yin// 
330a8(rgyud): ba yis ni mun par 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur// bu gu nas ni zhugs nasu// yid kyis gang yang rung ba ni// snying nas drangs pa de yis ni// rabang ma don dbang du 'gyur/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs pa / 
330b1(rgyud): badz+ra ba li kro d+ha mA ra ya hUM phaH/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra shA sa bi shra ba tA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Na bi sha bi tA sha ya hU phaT/ hUM hr-id sa r+b+ba Thakro d+ha pra ti bi sha ka ye hr-i da lats+tshi b+hiR+Ya ka ta ka ta phaT phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi
330b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab// de la re zhig phyag rgya bcing de bshad// rdo rje ye shes sbyong ba yis// 'bang ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas dem thag tu 'grub// de nas rdo rje ri
330b3(rgyud): kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabo// ting 'dzin ye shes dam tshig las/ hUM zhes bya dang ldan gyur pa// ci rigs gnasu bzhag na ni// grub pa thaMd steng ba'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam
330b4(rgyud): tshig gi chos kyi phag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// phaT/ sham Da/ sa Ta/ ra Da/ ta Ta/ hri Da/ ta Ta/ pra Ta/ traT/ da Ta/ b+hA Da/ kri Ta/ ri Dakha Ta/ ba Ta/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa'o// de nas
330b5(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shas bsla'o// chos kyi khu chur gnyis pas te// ji ltar rigs pa'i gnasu sbyang // las kyi phyag rgya mdong bsdus na// cho ga bzhin du
330b6(rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzog s+ho// danas
330b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byir gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa das pa 'dri gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga Na
330b8(rgyud): karma shwa ra hUM/ de nas byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+harmA d+ha tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ya tra lo kya bi dz+ra ya gi ra sar+b+ba da nA
331a1(rgyud): / sa ma ya badz+riHhUM/ de sa byang chub sadang sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dang pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba thA ga Sha kA yang 'dus pa ya spang ar+tha pU dzA karmA bi dzI bstings pa
331a2(rgyud): hUM de nas yang bang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po rdo rje spyad gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+har+m+ma d+ha tu s+pha ra Na ba hA pU dz+ra kar+m+ma bi d+hi bstir tha sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang rkub sa
331a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snga tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba a lo ka d+hA tu mi bi ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bsti ri sa ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
331a4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed 'jig rten gyi khams tha de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyar drang ba dang / dang 'du bya
331a5(rgyud): dang mnyes par bya ba dang / las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid yang dag pa'i spyong ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshig/ sa pa thad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul par byas te/ slar yang bcom
331a6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas
331a7(rgyud): ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad// dkyil 'khor chen por tshul du ni// dkyi
331a8(rgyud): 'khor thad srad bu bre// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas nani// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs kun tu/ dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal
331b1(rgyud): nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnam su ni// rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po rnams// ji ltar rims bzhin bzhag par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu// mchod pa chen po rnams bzhago// de nas las kyi dkyil 'a
331b2(rgyud): 'dir// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad// oM badz+ra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na kar+b+ba sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha Na karmA d+hA rA sa ma ya hUM dza/ oM badz+ra ra ti rA ga kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM dza/ oM badz+ra sA d+ha kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa me ye
331b3(rgyud): hUM dza/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shI ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya patwa le ba shrI ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra d+h+wa dzA gra ka s+phu ru re ba shI ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra da ta hA se ba shrI ku ru hU~M/ oM badz+ra pang+ga rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sha ra ge
331b4(rgyud): rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra patA le rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra bA gA rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma sa pa ya tsa ya hUM/ oM badz+ra ka ba tse be d+hi rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ oM badz+ra yak+Shi Ni mA ra ya badz+ra daMSh+ma ya
331b5(rgyud): b+hiR+Sha d+hi ng+ga ya mu ga s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kaR+sha muSh+Ti sa d+hA hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta pa bzhin byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bsku
331b6(rgyud): de la dang po nyid zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgyu'i ye shes bslab bo// yam shing mngar po rnams kyi me// rab sbrang rdo rje khro bo yis// mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la// til bsregs par ni
331b7(rgyud): sdig bsregs shing // yam shing dag nyid kyis ni// byir za rab tu spang nas kyang // rtag tu 'bras ni sbyid bsregs ra// gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur// yas shing mang ba po rnams kyis kyang // mkhas pas
331b8(rgyud): rab tu me sbar te/ dung ba'i yal ga mar bcas pas/ sreg pa bas na tshe'anga'o// yam shing dag nyid kyis ni/ byin za rab tu sdang byas la/ ku sha'i yal ga 'bra mar gyis// sreg bar bas dnges par srung de
332a1(rgyud): / dge slong ba na 'di rnams yino// oM sar+b+ba pA be da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra A su She swA hA/ oM badz+ra pra Shin Sha badz+ra ya swA hA/ yam shi mapas dang pordar rjerje
332a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// ma sbar nas kyang sa pa yi// tsher ma can gyis 'gugs para'i gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ri// khro dang ldan pas me sbar re// me tog dper ram 'bras bu'ang rung // spyir sreg bas
332a3(rgyud): rengs rnal 'byor can gyis khros ras kyang // yam shing des de me sbar te// lcags kyi phye ma bsregs nas na// rdo rje bcing ba nyid du 'gyur// yam shing de nyid kyi su ni// mnyam par gzhag ste ya bus la// 'bras
332a4(rgyud): bu kha ba khros bzhin bsreg/ skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ re te ba ru sa mi b+hi d+hu l+yag ni sa ma hris/ dzu heHti ga zha pa lAM ku to ma ri pU thab ta ye// de la de dgi snying po ni 'di dag yi'o// hUM
332a5(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra rA gA ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra ban+d+ha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra mA ra Na ya swA hA/ mkhas pas yas shing skyur mo ma sa/ khros nas byin za sngar das ri// 'bras bu lo pa skyang bsregs
332a6(rgyud): dbang du bya ba dam pa'o// yam shing de dag nyid kyis kyang // mnyam par gzhag ste me sbar la// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na// 'dod pa bzhin gyi gzugs rnye do// de 'dra ba yi yam shing gis// bi za rang
332a7(rgyud): tu spang nas kyang // mi snang me tog sdong bu yis// bsregs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par gzhag ste ma spang la// dmakha' lcug ma'i me tog gis// spyir sreg pas
332a8(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro// da la dag gi snying po na 'di dgo/ oM badz+ra ba she kA ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma rU ba badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM Ad+hi sh+ya badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kha ba tsa ra Ni swA hA/ khro bo ba mnyam gzhig yam shing
332b1(rgyud): shin tu kha bas me spang la// badz+ra me tog bsregs byas na// rdo rje bka' bzhin bde par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan la ye spang la// lha yi phreng ba gang bsregs pa/ de yang bka' bzhinanya
332b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// khro bo nyid mnyam gzhag ste// yam shing des ni ma sbab te// phyog na rdo rje'i phreng ba sreg/ da yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros tam spang la// chos
332b3(rgyud): gos bsregs pa sangs rgyas kyang / skad cig tu ni bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying po ra 'di dag yi'o// hUM badz+ra ba sha~M ka rA ya swAhA/ hUM so ri ba shaM kA ra badz+ra ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra pA Ni ba she kA ra ya swA
332b4(rgyud): hUM bud+d+ha ba she kA ra badz+rA ya swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i la sa kyi phyag rgya'i ya shes bsla'o// yid 'ong bud med dang lha cig/ gnas shing bu gar e dza ra// bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang // de yi mig
332b5(rgyud): bskus dbang du 'gyur// ldong ros bu gang bcug nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi sa ni// dngos grub rnam pa bzhi 'gyur// go la tsar bu gar bcu
332b6(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsir nas// bzhag na de ni 'bar 'gyur ra// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ gur gum bu gar bcug nas ni// bu gar sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bka' das 'bar bar gyur ras ni rdo rje
332b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di go/ a~M gu h+ya ra bi badz+ra ba shaM ka ra sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu t+yai sid+d+ha hUM/ a~M gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra d+ha gu h+ya sid+d+ha hU~M/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi pa
332b8(rgyud): rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab// rdo rje bgos pa'i tshul gyis ni// phag rgya chen po mdor bsdus ro// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bor mnyam par bzhag/ hUM zhes mdzub ro'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mcho
333a1(rgyud): / 'dir de bzhin// oM zhes dang po yi ge as/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'ding de bzhin// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// thang grub byed dag pa ste// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyi
333a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi rdo rje dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'kho gyi log rgyas pa rdzogs// rinas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhis gshegs brda
333a3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa shugs nas rang gi rig pa dpa pa 'di gsung so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa pa ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
333a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya 'di gsung so// hUM badz+ra ma tha/ de ras byang chub sems dpa chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
333a5(rgyud): gsung so// hUM b+h+r-i ku TI badz+ra ta/ de nas byang chub se chen po rdo rje sbyar gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsu ngoso// d+hU ma hA pad+ma badz+ra dr-iT+Ta/ de nas byang chub sengal chen po rdo rje snga
333a6(rgyud): kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma oM gra krita/ de nas yang byang chub se dang sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
333a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad b+ha ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor tha
333a8(rgyud): srad bus bre// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs bri// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// sangs rgyas phyogs kun tu bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di dkyil 'kho
333b1(rgyud): bo'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas te bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// rang gi phyag rgya ba'i dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag
333b2(rgyud): brjod la// bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni// grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya ba'i dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos dag rab brjod la// chags pas bud med la bltas na// grub pa yang ni thob
333b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rang gis phyag rgya bani dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub// rang gi phyag rgya bani dkyil 'khorakhris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// lhar cig/ 
333b4(rgyud): 'khyud na kun 'grub 'thob// de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'dig yin// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta be shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma ta ho// oM badz+ra bi shud+d+ha dr-iSh+Ti dza/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha mu ke hUM/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha kA yA
333b5(rgyud): bA ma na karma badz+ri hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbas pa'i phyag rgya bsla'o// dkyil 'khor 'dir n-i zhugs nas kyang // 'dod pa'i stod lnga yis ni// bud med mchog
333b6(rgyud): mgu byas nas// shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i snying po brjod/ ho badz+ra kA ma/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje mdan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig phyag rgya ba'i rnams cha
333b7(rgyud): gdang bcas par rgyas par bslab bar ba ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dis rdo rje sil snyan dang / rnga dang / brdung ba dang / brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'dus pa'i snying po'i glu blangs te/ de phul nas
333b8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang gang gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de la gang gyi mchod pas ni mchod pa 'di yin// rdo rje gar gyi spyod ba yin// rdo rje khro bor so
334a1(rgyud): / mo yis// rdo rje hUM gis phyag rgya ni// snying kha nyi du bcing bar bya// de bzhin gang bas g.yod pa ni// g.yas pa'i chang pas bzung bar bya// bsgrub das dpral ba nyid ni// mdzub mo'i ngos kyis bzhag par bya/ 
334a2(rgyud): de bzhin gar yang bskor nas ni// mnyam par pad+mo kha dbus sbyar// mdzub mo snying kar bzhag nas ni// bsam pa g.yos pas gdung par ba// rdo rje khri bo mdzub mnyams te/ bkar nas rtse mo sprang bya zhing // de las
334a3(rgyud): bsgyur zhing gtsug to du// mdzub mo'i rtse mo sgru ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po phag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo gsungs pa hUM de nas de'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa// de nas rab
334a4(rgyud): ba shad bya ba// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'kho/ ra chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thang bri bar bya// de yi dbus
334a5(rgyud): lags bri ba/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin/ rdorje hU~Mn phyag rgya che// lag par 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas// brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang / kha dog gzugs ni ji ba'i na bya// de nas 'di
334a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo yis/ 
334a7(rgyud): bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs na ni// las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya kr-i ta/ de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab// dkyil
334a8(rgyud): 'khor zhugs nas legs par ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa/ gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya// las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ de la 'di sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas
334b1(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs te/ de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang / lugs me la sogs pa gzugs thad kyi dngos grub ni
334b2(rgyud): thun mong ngo // phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis bdag
334b3(rgyud): 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyis kyang dngos gab thams cad thob par 'gyur par bgyi ba'i slada'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de banyi/ 
334b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod
334b5(rgyud): leg so// rdo rje rin chen khod kyang lags// rdo rje chos kyang khyod legs pa// rdo rje las khyod rab tu lags/ mdo sde 'di ni leHbshad pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba
334b6(rgyud): sta thag pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsha
334b7(rgyud): pa thams cad gcig tu 'das te mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang
334b8(rgyud): phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas btang bar byos// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rus
335a1(rgyud): pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bskub lags pa ji ltar de bdag gis btang bar bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis 'jig rten gsum po mthA
335a2(rgyud): ngag gis bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso bo'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyu // oM badz+ra satwa hU dza/ de nas de'i phag rgya bcing ba bshad// gas
335a3(rgyud): ba'i lcags kyu bsdam pa ste// tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang / shi ba'i mgo bong bzhag ni ni// srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur// de nas nga thos pa thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i
335a4(rgyud): dbang po'i dbyangs de/ thal bas khabs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slang phyin te dbang phyug gi lus dang zhugs nas tshe du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// a ma'o sangs rgyas thad kyi/ 
335a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang phyir shi ba'i lu sa 'di yang // 'tsho ba'i khamasu gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub se di sems dpa' chen po pag ra rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes pa hAM
335a6(rgyud): snying po 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra muHde nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par// zung sprang bsdams pa bzhag pa ni// rdo rje dag bsgyur byas shing // 'og nas dge 'byin par byed // de nas des/ 
335a7(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar pa rang gis shes par gyur to// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byir gyis brlabs te/ 'jig
335a8(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'dir sen thams cad kyi don dang / ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phying nyid kyi rgyal tshag tu bcugo/ de nas phag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshen pa
335b1(rgyud): kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phag rgya byung // oM tsan+dod+d+hang sa man+ta b+ha dra kir Ni ma hA badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mthe'u chung mthe'u chub mnyam par ni// mnyams rwa
335b2(rgyud): legs par brkyang nani// rdo rje ri mo zhes kyang grags// de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen po de'i mgo la phyag na rdo rje'i 'a
335b3(rgyud): kyis mnan pa'i rjesu zla ba phad pa gnas par gyur te g.yon logs 'du'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogasu lag na rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdo
335b4(rgyud): rje'i rig pa dam pa'is rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bsku bas dbang bsku// de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sede' sems da bra' chen po rdo rje mdang rtse ngas 'gal ma'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing
335b5(rgyud): gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas che du brjod pa 'di che du brjod/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sa mas ni bla na med // zhabs mchog gis ni gang reg pa// sang+yas
335b6(rgyud): 'dri grub pa thob/ de nas byang chub sede sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
335b7(rgyud): ba thams cad kyis bdag sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phag na rdo rje nyid dbang bskur bas lha la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
335b8(rgyud): la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sad de rnams par mi ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshen ba dag
336a1(rgyud): / pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tong 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra satwa uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs
336a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das pag na rdo rje'i kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phag na rdo
336a3(rgyud): gtsug gi mtsham su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul du 'phungs nas 'khod do// de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gas pa tha~Md kyi gtsug tong 'di phyung // oM sar+b+ba
336a4(rgyud): ThathA ga to Sh+Ti Sha a na a ba lo ka mUdz+nyA ni ta dzo hA shi/ oM hAHla dz+wa la/ d+hi b+ha ga d+ha/ ka/ dang dang khi dang bi da bats+tshin+dats+tshin+da b+hiHd+hIHhUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas byang chub sa de sems
336a5(rgyud): chen po phage na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// i ni su b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung // oM Tik+ka dza~M// de nas byang chub se dang/ 
336a6(rgyud): chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra rat+na uSh+Ta ma dz+wa la ya hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM swa b+hA ba
336a7(rgyud): badz+ra pad+ma sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba bi d+yo ta ta ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ut+ta ma badz+ra d+hA ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sum+b+ha ni
336a8(rgyud): sum+b+ha A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ A baM sha ya/ pan+d+ha ya/ sa ma yaM/ gra ha ya/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma NaM me ku ru ma hA satwa hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sa da' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig po'i dam pas rang gi snying po
336b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha badz+ra bi d+yot+ta ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i rig pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phag
336b2(rgyud): 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra shU la/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sar+b+ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i
336b3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs// oM badz+ra g+har+b+ha raN ra rba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra mo na ma hA bad+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po 'a
336b4(rgyud): phul ba/ oM badz+ra s+phu d+ha dA ma ka hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnamaso// de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phu'o
336b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra kuN+Da li ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na/ ha na ha na/ da ha daha/ pa tsa bid+h+wan sa ya badz+re Na mu dan pa la ya ti b+h+r-i tas hr-i da ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po
336b6(rgyud): 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra bA b+ha mA ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phulo// oM badz+ra daN+DA ya sar+b+ba duSh+pe kha hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ da nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje sar pos rang gi
336b7(rgyud): snying po 'di pu'o// oM badz+ra bing+ga la bi sha ya sar+b+ba du khA I ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT rdo rje khro ba rnam so// de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na dza rjel snying po 'di phu'o// oM badz+ra
336b8(rgyud): d+ha ma hA ga Na pa ti rak+Sha sar+b+ba duSh+pe b+h+yo// badz+ra d+ha ra Ad+b+ha pa ya hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje phreng bas rang gi snying po 'di phu lo// oM mA la ga Na pa ti mA la ya A kAR+Sha ya/ pra ba sha ya ba she ku ru mA ra ya hUM/ den
337a1(rgyud): // rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra ba shi ma hA ga Na pa ti ba shaM ku ru hUM paT/ de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po 'dri phu'o// oM badz+ra bi dza ya bi
337a2(rgyud): ya ma hA ga Na pa tri hUM phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnam so// de nas rdo rje tho ba rdo rje po nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phu lo// oM badz+ra mu sa la ku ru sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi
337a3(rgyud): snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra mI la ma hA be ga ga Na pa ti sar+b+ba duSh+pe hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje ma'i po nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra a na la ma hA duSh+Ta dz+wa la ya sar+b+ba b+hasmi ku ru sar+b+ba duk+Sh+ma hUM phaT
337a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs pa'i po mtshan pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba oM badz+ra b+hai ba badz+re hUM da pa sha ya sar+b+ba du khyA ma hA yak+Sha hU~M phaH/ po na rnams// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje drin gyi rang
337a5(rgyud): snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phulo// oM badz+ra a d+hu sha A kaR+Sha ya/ sar+b+ba ma hA ts+tsha tra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dus kyi ra gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra kA la ma hA mr-i t+yu muSh+mA
337a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje ngan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra bi nA ya ka s+ya big+h+nAM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phu lo// oM badz+ra rA
337a7(rgyud): ga badz+ra A na ya sar+b+ba da na da na hir+ya gar+b+ha ne muk+ta a lang+ga ra b+hi ni sarba ba kA ra Na na~M badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ka ta/ b+hiR+Ya b+hin+da ha ra ta ra prA NA mahAts+tshe da hUM phaT/ bran rnam so// de nas byang chub sada' sems dpa'
337a8(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thaMd 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra ang+ku shadza A kaR+Sha ya hUM phag/ de nas de gzhig pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs/ oM badz+ra pA shA kAD+D+h+ya hUM/ de nas zang/ 
337b1(rgyud): bcing ba gsungs pa/ hUM badz+ra s+phoT baM/ de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma sa ma kr-ita/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad// de nas
337b2(rgyud): rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de la 'di ni srad bu bre ba'i snying po yino// oM sar+b+ba badz+ra sU tra e traM
337b3(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba maN+Da la hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus yang // seng ljang phur bu btab nas ni// de nas srad pu nyis rim du/ byas nas de yis sras bus bre// de la 'di ni phung bu'i snying po yin// oM badz+ra tA
337b4(rgyud): la ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang / dkyil 'khor zlum po srad bu bre// de yi phyi rol byung nas ni// gnyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin// de yi rim pa gsum da ni/ phyi rol dkyil
337b5(rgyud): 'khor srad bus bre/ phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du// gra yi ri mo srad bu bre// srad bu bre ba'i cho ga'o// de nas srad bu bres pa dang // dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang ba
337b6(rgyud): g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyid// cho ga bzhin du bzung ba bya// dang po bris nas phyis ci bder// de la 'di ni tshan gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra rang+ga sa ma ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon yang // mnyam par gzhan
337b7(rgyud): la dbus 'dug nas// rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams// yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar ba// de la sgo dbye ba'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ung+ga ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+raM smar badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gas ma yang / 
337b8(rgyud): dngul yang rung / sa la rab tu bris pa 'am// pha gu gru bzhi'i steng du ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di'i// oM sar+b+ba bid/ sangs rgyas kyi ni phan kun/ 
338a1(rgyud): // sems dpa' chen po bzhi bzhago// mdud du phyag na rdo rje ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes pa// de la sems dpa' chen po snying po'i ni 'di rnams yid/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ts+tsha
338a2(rgyud): gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA ba ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga~M bAM badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku TI kro d+ha A ra ya sar+b+ba rat+na hri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti kro d+ha dr-ik+Sha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sar+b+be
338a3(rgyud): rU pa tA ya sid+d+ha ye hUM phaT/ 'jug ma phyir ni byung ba na// srad bu'i 'og 'jug yid bsams nas// rdo rje shugasu brjod pa ste/ de yis ri mo brgal bar bya// de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM
338a4(rgyud): badz+ra ba grA kra ma hU/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang po de bzhin du// lnga 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rdo rjeHma la sogs bri/ de la dam tshig gi snying pon 'od rnam
338a5(rgyud): yi// oM badz+ra kra hUM/ oM badz+ra g+har+b+ba hUM/ oM badz+rad d+haka shahUM/ oM badz+ra a yu d+hI hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ kyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te/ rdo rje 'khyil pa
338a6(rgyud): la sogs pa// rdo rje khro bo bdag par bya// de la de dag gi snying ba ni 'di rnams yon// oM br-i dz+wa li Sha dI b+ha badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra sa~M me hUM/ oM badz+rad d+hA hUM/ oM badz+ra bi kr-iSha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis
338a7(rgyud): brgal nas ni// smon ba'i po rnam su yang // rdo rje glang sA la sogs pa// thams cad rim pa bzhin du bri// dag gi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin/ oM badz+ra d+ha ma hUM/ oM badz+ra pA la hUM/ 
338a8(rgyud): badz+ra ar+tha hUM/ oM badz+ra a si hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum par bri ba ni// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams/ 
338b1(rgyud): yin// oM badz+ra mu sa la hUM/ oM badz+ra bA ta hUM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ oM badz+ra graha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal ras ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi par bri ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bran// lha 'og rim pa
338b2(rgyud): bzhin du'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yiro// oM badz+ra daMk+Sha hUM/ oM badz+ra mA ra tra hUM/ oM badz+ra ba ga hUM/ oM badz+ra ta ra Na hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// pha rol dkyil 'khor bzhag pa
338b3(rgyud): lha 'og rim pa rdzi bzhin du// ma mo thams cad bri bar bya// de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang / sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin// de nas rab tu bshad ba ni// cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o// de nas 'jig rten gsum po
338b4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ches po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje tshwa ba ti rin r-i'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad sgo'i gangs khyod la
338b5(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par byas// de khyod kyi su la yang ma smra shig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod das byas te dmal bar ltung ro zhes bsgo ste mna'i snying po 'di sbyino// rdo rje khro ba
338b6(rgyud): ti rin ti ri'i phag rgya yang ston cig/ gal te dam tshig las 'das na rdo rje khro bo chen po yis// dam tshig khyod kyi rigs bsregs pas/ klad pa nas ni brtsams nas kyang // lus rnams ma rungs par yang bad// dam
338b7(rgyud): tshig bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phag rgya'i snying po 'dis bcing // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA ra/ gr-ih+Na bi d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad // la gnyis zla za 'og tu btang / ma
338b8(rgyud): bo ma the 'u chung sbrel ba dang / las kyi phyag rgyad mchog 'di/ rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang bshad// de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te/ snying po ni 'di yin// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shag a b+hiShiny+tsa badz+ra d+ha nga shes ma gra gre des
339a1(rgyud): // g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ snying po 'dis gzhug/ oM badz+ra pra ba sha ya badz+ra pA be sha ya/ badz+ra A bi sha a bi sha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcug nas snying po 'dis me tog gtod/ oM praH
339a2(rgyud): a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// de nas de dag lhung ba de 'dis 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rims bzhin du bstan te/ lha gang yin pa da ni de la mi bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhan/ sen
339a3(rgyud): log par lta ba dag yod de gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dmas kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rig su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid pa khas pa
339a4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni dam tshi go// gzhan du na lha gang la dad pa deg la mda'i snying po 'di byin nas bstan par ba'o// de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo rje
339a5(rgyud): lag pa gnyisu byin la/ rdo rje ming btags 'ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcu nga ba bsla'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam pas te// mthe bong na
339a6(rgyud): smang nas ni// mdzub mo bkug nas gnyi gas bkab// sa de'i gtsug tong zhes bya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bas nas ni// mthe bo gung mo mthe'u chung sgreng // gzi brjid phung po zhes pa ste// gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o// rdo rje
339a7(rgyud): phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni// dam du lcags kyu bcings pa ste// rig pa chen po dam pa'o// rig pa chen po dam pa yi// phyag rgya bcings nas rab bcing ba// snying kar mthe bo' dzas kya
339a8(rgyud): sems dpa' mon snying por bshad/ de nyid las su ma grin sngag/ so mo rab tu bsdams nas ni// rdo rje na chen rdul du ni// bsgyur nas gdong du bzhag pa bya// de nyid bskyed pazhag nas ni// snying gang yang na
339b1(rgyud): bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste/ pad+ma'i rig pa dam pa'o// de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje las ni rab sgrub pa'o// sems ma'i rdo rje dam pas
339b2(rgyud): mthe'u chung rdo rje sgreng ba ni// thaMd rig pa'i snying po 'di// phyag rgya 'din thams cad sgrub// mthe bo mthe'u chung bcings na ni// g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum// rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse/ rdo rje phyag rgya gzung ba ste
339b3(rgyud): rdo rje rig paM dam pa 'di// rdo rje dung zhes bya ba'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs brtags// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing ba bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad// rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi
339b4(rgyud): 'di'o// rdo rje don gnyis byas te/ mtshan ma kun kyang ngas pa ga/  rigs ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgyu rnams kyang 'byung ba ste/ song brkyang steng du bzhag pa dang / mdzub mos mthebs
339b5(rgyud): sbyang ba dang // oM zhes pa ba spyir bzhag nas// rdo rje sbed du bzhag badz+ra rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnam so// rab tu brkya nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i rgyab du de bzhin te// 
339b6(rgyud): bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum// kha yi phogasu bskong ba bya// rdo rje khro bo phyag rgya'i tshogs// g.yon pa'i mthe bong steng du bzhag/ phreng ba'i bcing ba'i thabasu sbyang gnod sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste// ral gri'i phyag
339b7(rgyud): rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o// g.yas pa mdun tu gtun rings 'dzin// lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te// g.yas pa'i 'ad ni 'bar bar bstan// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod par bya
339b8(rgyud): po nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i chog so// bsgyings bcas mdzub mo'i khang mche ba// dbyug ba snun cing gnas pa dang / dpung pa bskum zhing sbyang ba dang // g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o// brang gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen
340a1(rgyud): / dkyil 'khor kun tu bya ba ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje zung naso// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ sgrub pa dang ni las nyid// sems dpa' gang gi pa brgya gang // don bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang // bdag nyid ga pa
340a2(rgyud): par gyur na ni// phyag rgya dab par 'grub par 'gyur// gcig tor chen po srung ba che// gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster// rdo rje hUM zhes ba kun byed// snying kar bzhag pa thed 'gug/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya maso
340a3(rgyud): thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub// rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o// rdo rje mdung di phyag rgya che// grub pa chen po sbyin par byed// sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub pa// dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs// dbyug pa'i shing gis
340a4(rgyud): ngan 'dar// rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed// rig pa'i rgyal po rnamaso// 'bar ba'i mchog ni ma rungs 'dul// zhi ba'i mchog ni thad gsod// dbyu ga pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste// 'jigs pa'i mig na
340a5(rgyud): skrag par byed/ rdo rje khro bo phyag rgya rnam so// mos pas rab/ tu mos par byed// phreng ba kun na byed par bshad// 'dod byed dga' ba dbyed pa ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o// tshogs
340a6(rgyud): phyag rgya rnam so// tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyi rgyungs de ba'o te// 'bor ba'i mchog ni gdug pa bsreg// mnod spyod ma ni gdon spod do// po nyi'i pag rgyad paso// rdo rje'i mche ba zab ste// gsod pa
340a7(rgyud): zed gsod ma'o// bgegs byed ma ni rab tu 'gags// 'phrog ma yang ni thad 'phrog/ bran gyi phyag rgya rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsu
340a8(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhesaH/ 
340b1(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra ba si tre swA hA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra d+ha ri hUM
340b2(rgyud): badz+ra bi kra me hUM paT/ yang byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra dan+ta kro d+he swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub se de'i chen po rdo rje spur gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa
340b3(rgyud): 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra pad+ma re traM swAhA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ka ra swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub seda' sems pa
340b4(rgyud): chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs// oM badz+ra shU lA gre swAhA/ de nas rdo rje byung ba'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs/ oM badz+ra tsakre hUM/ rdo rje dril
340b5(rgyud): bus smras pa/ oM badz+ra g+har+b+ha ke hUM/ thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa oM badz+ra dan+ta kASh+Te hUM/ rdo rje mtshon chas smras pa/ oM badz+re hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnam so// de nas rdo
340b6(rgyud): 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig go pheg rgya 'di smras/ oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra so me hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbyig pas smras pa/ oM badz+ra daN+Te hUM/ rdo rje seng smug
340b7(rgyud): smras pa/ oM badz+ra bI ra Ni hUM/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnam so// de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phag rgya smras pa// oM badz+ra me da hUM/ rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/ oM badz+ra mA lai hUM/ rdo rje dang
340b8(rgyud): gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra a b+hi'i hUM rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra a ba rA dziHhUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyis bdag po dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnam so// de nas rdo rje gtun rings rang gi dam tshig phag rgya
341a1(rgyud): / rnams smras pa/ oM badz+ra mu sa la gra ha hUM/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi smras pa/ oM badz+ra bA te hUM/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/ oM badz+ra gra he hUM/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig pa
341a2(rgyud): rgya rnam so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/ oM badz+ra da dz+hi hUM rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra ba shi hU~M/ rdo rje na khrod kyis smras pa/ oM bidz+ra big+h+ra hUM/ rdo rjeklus smras pa/ oM badz+raH do hUM/ rdo rje bran gyi dam chogs
341a3(rgyud): phyag rgya rnam so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad pa bo// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// grwa bzhi pa la bang phyogs sgo// pha rol dkyil 'khor sra
341a4(rgyud): bus bre// de yi nadadu deng yang ni// de bzhin sgo ni shang phyogs gdong / de yi dbus ci rigs par// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa// bzhi po de yi phog
341a5(rgyud): kun bzhag/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang // rdo rje'i phag rgya bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad// rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar ba// rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// bzhi po rnams ni
341a6(rgyud): sgo srung so// 'jig ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang // dung ga g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas// phyi ya~M grwa rnams phyag rgya ni// de rnams nyid ni bri ba 'o// de nas cho ga rgyas pa'i rnams// ji bzhin bang ni bshad par bya// de nas rdorje
341a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun
341a8(rgyud): du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgyad de rnams ma smra shig/ gsang ba 'phel babam pad cig ces bsgo shig/ de nas las kyi rdo rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i stang du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du chug shig/ zhags nas rdo rje
341b1(rgyud): de bzhin du'od cig/ gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te// des las thams cad byed// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya
341b2(rgyud): gsang ba smras shig/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi// rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma bu mo 'dra ba'o// de la do'i snying po ni 'di dag yin// oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bag+h+nAM sAhA
341b3(rgyud): ya gu h+ya badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas tha spyad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyuraro// ci dga' bar thang spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas sems can thad dag par phyag rgya
341b4(rgyud): thams cad yid kyis shes nas las dam pa thams cad kya bod zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsung so// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dam tshig khro bo mdzub bcus
341b5(rgyud): dang snying kar yang ni bsdam pad+ya bya// ngos kyi mdzod spu khu nas dring // spyi bong gzhag nas gnyisu bya// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yaM sa// mdung rtse rtsa gsum mnan par bya'o// 'di bcings pas
341b6(rgyud): ni yang dag par rig pa dam pa 'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus/ dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor la
341b7(rgyud): mdzub rtse bcu ma// dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhi no// de bzhin oM gi phyag rgya dang // seng+ge'i rna ba bya ba ste// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnam so// 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa dang // 'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyug pA
341b8(rgyud): khu tshur 'dzin pa dang // kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro bo'i dam tshig rnam so// gtum pa'i phyag rgya phreng ba dang // rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin// spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi raM srung ba'o// 
342a1(rgyud): / tshogs rnams kyi dmachig/ lag pa bskum pa khang bzhag ste// rgyab tu yang ni bskor ba ba// 'byung ba ma stag gdong ba ste// bye nas khang yang gnas par ba// po nya'i dam tshig rnamaso// mtha'
342a2(rgyud): ma gnyis ni khang bcug dang // btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o// dpung bas stsol bas bsnol ba dang // myur du 'phrogs pa'ing de bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje dam tshig
342a3(rgyud): gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi chos kyi dam tshig
342a4(rgyud): las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ti / dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ran/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig na

342a7(rgyud): rje sgyu mas smras pa/ oM ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM A bi sha A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM b+hu b+hu ba swa hUM phaT/ oM b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// oM da ma da ma hUM phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM g+ha/ 
342a8(rgyud): ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hUM phaT/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// oM d+ha ma d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ba shI b+ha ba hU~M phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hUM phaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o// oM b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM g+hu g+ha hUM
342b1(rgyud): oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM khA da khA da hUM phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o// oM kha na kha na hUM phaT/ oM ma ra ma ra hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ oM bi b+ha bi b+ha hUM phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje
342b2(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor de// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin// dkyil 'khor thang bri
342b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu// snying kar mtshan ma yang dag bzhag/ de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du la
342b4(rgyud): byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcangs pa brtsi ngas te 'di skad smos shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig pa mthong ba dang / lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra shig ces
342b5(rgyud): 'dril bu dkrol du chug shig 'di skad bsgos nas kyang mna'i snying rtsa byin la/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba'i// de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa// de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod// mi brtag par ni ma rungs cad
342b6(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon sti stang med// rdo rje gros dang mi mdza' dang // gdug la byams dang skye bar ni// gal te khyod kyis byas na'o// de nas gdong gsogs grol la/ dkyil 'khor bstan te// chos kyi dam tshig gi phyaH
342b7(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes slob shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhino// thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsam pa// rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste// 'gro ba 'jig sgyu ma bzhin// de bzhin sdug
342b8(rgyud): bsngal dril bu 'dra// sdug bsngal thang ma ngan 'dar// rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med/ rig pa'i rgyal po ting 'dzin rnamaso// sen gdab pir khro bo mchog/ zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod// dbyug pa 'dral 'tsho ra ba
343a1(rgyud): log par lta ba 'jigs par byed// khro bo ting 'dzin rnam so// rango 'dra bar dpa' ba med// phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med/ dud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pas/ 
343a2(rgyud): tshogs kyi ting 'dzin rnam so// 'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te/ reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o// gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog/ zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// pho nya'i ting 'dzin rnam so// mche ba dgra
343a3(rgyud): par zhugs pa ste// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug/ 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// bran gyi ting 'dzin rnam so// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
343a4(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyasardzogaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

343b1(rgyud): pa oM badz+ra kro d+ha badz+ra ag+ne dz+wa la tri shU lan bi na hr-i da ya badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lnga chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smraso// oM badz+ra he mats+tshin+da tsakr-i Na badz+ri dzi hU Ta/ de nas rdo rje gzhon mas rang
343b2(rgyud): gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras/ oM badz+ra ku mA ra shI b+he A be sha ya gan+d+ha sharjen badz+ra pA Ni pri ye badz+ra sa ma ye ma nu sma barba hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje'i bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smraso// oM badz+ra
343b3(rgyud): shwe Shi dza ba dza pa a g+ha ma la ya sar+b+ba ka mA ra ya shAM Shadz+ra h+ye hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smra so// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti shad man badz+ra b+hiR+Sha b+hin+da pA Di ya/ pI Da ya/ sar+b+ba duk+ShA tra~M
343b4(rgyud): yA ni oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU paH/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o// de nas dardo rje mi 'chi ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras/ oM a mr-i te badz+ra duSh+To g+h+nAM h+Na baR+Sha ha na sar+b+ba bi d+hi sa ya~M kha~Mn
343b5(rgyud): sha yats+tshin+da ba bi ku ru mut+ta ni/ ta ya badz+ren ye ke tsi 'am ma mu ka/ ra bi nA yA ka taR+Sha ma dIp+ta kro d+ha badz+ri hU~M phaT/ da nas rdo rje mdengs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smra so// oM badz+ra kAn+ti pA ra
343b6(rgyud): sa sau me rA pa pra ti ba ta rA ge na shI g+he s+pho Ta ya badz+ra d+ha ra t+ye na ma hA dz+nyA s+t+ra kA ra le shI Sharasmi badz+ra Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dra byug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra dat+na kr-i g+hA Sha ya hUM phaT

344a1(rgyud): duSh+Ta badz+ra da sha ne sha ga ti d+ha ra Ni ma nu sha ma nu sha ma na se a ha re Na ra ru tis shuta tsi pra ya ma dza ba sa nu la ba na bi le ba ta gra tre/ a nA ya sar+b+ba dan+d+han+ta ya haM r+ya Na ya ti ru \u0f7f su bat+tA a dzaH

344a3(rgyud): badz+ra ko Sha d+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras/ oM badz+ra ba shrI A na ya ba sha~M ku ru sar+b+ba pr-i ya sar+b+ba bu ru Shan da si ku ru krung dpra se de ya sang+ge b+h+yaHba ha re b+h+yo d+ha ya bi tsar ya

344b2(rgyud): nI badz+ra shAM kha le sar+b+ba de ba ga Na mA tr-i b+hU te/ ha ra ha ra prA dz+dza/ a mu ka s+ya ka pA la mA lA le kr-i ta sar+b+ba ka ye kany+tsi ra ya saM badz+ra kha T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ni pre ta ma nu la sha rI re shI g+h+ra A ba sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya mA ra

344b8(rgyud): 'khor tshul bzhin du// rang gi pag rgya phyag rgya 'dra// gang bad par yang bri bar ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje ma mchod par// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyiso// grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnam su// bdag pa la sogs rim pa bzhin/ 
345a1(rgyud): nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dgug pa la sogs pa'i lasu bas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig pag rgya ji lnga ba bzhid bcings te 'di skad smos shig/ khyod kyis lnga'i rib pa pa
