345a3(rgyud): lta bas blta zhing 'di skad brjod do// oM badz+ra satwar+ya A be sha ya bri be sha a br-i ba ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+ham+ba pra yats+tsha hUM/ AHhUM a la la la la badz+ri/ de nas yang bdag la babs das bdag nyid kyis 'jug
345a4(rgyud): phag rgyu dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchidabang ba'o// de pin chad lus dang / ngag dang / lba ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin bde
345a5(rgyud): de'o de nas gdang g.yogs pa dkrol legar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i yo shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'jim sogs kyi/ dam tshig mchog ni gnyisu bas te/ rdo rje mo pa
345a6(rgyud): ba la/ rdo rje la gyi la sogs mtshad/ rig pa 'di rnams thaMd kyang / lhung gi go rims ji bzhid du// gar gyi mtsha ba'i phyag rgya yis/ las kyi dkyil 'khong mtshad bdubya/ rdo rje gang kyi tshul gyis
345a7(rgyud): chen pa pang gyur/ da bachim mamam ga nyis byas nas las kyi pag rgya gro 'dug khyor rgya mcha pa mos / mas pa thang mtsha rdo rje dzin pam sems kyi las dzub pa la so
345a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba de ba'i gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzo da cig gi rtog pa chen pa las rdo rje rigs cad kyi lcas kyi tshu la 'khong kyi 'og rgyas brdzogs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'a sa pag du
345b1(rgyud): rigs de dag thaMd sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas pir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste mkhan bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshen pa tha/ 
345b2(rgyud): kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags/ bka' stsol cig de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsapa
345b3(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsung so// sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar
345b4(rgyud): sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs// sems can thaMd phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa
345b5(rgyud): phyir/ sems can thams cad bsad kyang ni// sdig gis go/ sa bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos ra ngagi nor bu gsang ba 'di gsung so// sen thams cad
345b6(rgyud): phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis// pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi gsang ba'i pad+ma 'di gsung so// 'dod cha
345b7(rgyud): 'dra ba'i bde ba med// rgyal ba la ni phul ba// gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir// bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi gsang ba
345b8(rgyud): 'di gsung so// sems can thad pa na phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan po yi/ las rnams thams cad byas pa yis/ bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de// 
346a1(rgyud): / bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba leg so zhes bstan pa/ legaso rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khod leg so// rdo rje chos khyong legs pa ste/ 
346a2(rgyud): rje las ni khod leg so// mdo'ang legs par smras pa ste/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kur gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi de kho na nyid bsku
346a3(rgyud): pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzog so// bab po drug pa// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 
346a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mtshar brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa// pad+mo sems dpa'
346a5(rgyud): pad+mo che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ spyad ras gzi/ dbang bstan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chos la phag 'tshalo// chos kyi rgya la po dag pa che// se de'i rgyal po blo gros che// pad+ma'i
346a6(rgyud): bdag nyid pad+ma che// pad+ma'i mgos khyod phag 'tshalo// pad+mo las byung bad+ma'i 'ong // pad+mo dag par rab dga' bang // rdo rje pad+ma pang mchog lus// pad+mo pong+ga khod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs chen po snang ba che// dgas
346a7(rgyud): pa chen po che dang mtshungs// brtan pa chen po dpa' ba che// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sems can bsam pa theg pa che// rnal 'byor chen po mes po tsho// bde za bde byed dag pa'i don// sangs rgyas pa
346a8(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal/ chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dag pa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin/ chos chen shin tu chos mchog pa/ chos kyi 'khor la khyod phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas seMd sems mchogs
346b1(rgyud): chos kyi sems dpa' chos bachog 'dzin// seda' dab pa sems mchog 'dzin// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// spyan ras gzigs dbang mtshon pa'i mchog mgon po chen po rnam gzi
346b2(rgyud): gtso// 'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten dor// 'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten yig yige tshe// yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra// yig yi ge thad gzigs/ 'khor lo'i yi ge khyod pag
346b3(rgyud): 'tshal// pag na pad+mo pa chen po// dbugs 'byin pa ni srid pa po// sangs rgyas chos ri sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po// rdo rje'i gzu
346b4(rgyud): gzugs bzang ldan// chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog/ gnyen sdang khod phyag 'tshalo// pad+mo'i dpal ni mgon po gtso/ chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa// tshangs pa'i mtsha
346b5(rgyud): tshangs chen po// tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// snang ba sdang ma cho ga sdang ba'i gtso// snang gsal shin tu sdang ba'o// sdang ba'i mgo/ po mgon po che// sangs rgyas sdang khyod pag 'tsha
346b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog/ sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas spyad de spyan chen po/ 
346b7(rgyud): spyan gzigs pa chen po yis// ting 'dzin ye shes thad pa// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshalo// bdag nyid kun gyi ston 'di// khyad ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams/ bstod nas goms par byed pa ni// 'jig rten
346b8(rgyud): dbang po thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol gdab pa// rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor l-i dam pa ni/ thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol// de nas byang chub se la seng
347a1(rgyud): bo spyan ras gzigs dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba dang mngon du
347a2(rgyud): phyogs te 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mo de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste tshe du brjod pa 'di che brjod// a ma'o rab tu dag pa ni// bdag gi rdo rje pad+mo 'di// pha yon 'di ni bdagi bu// rigs 'di byin gyis brlab
347a3(rgyud): par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
347a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thu gas kha nas phyung // hrIHde nas de byung ma thag tu
347a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi thugs kha nas pad+mo lta bu'i 'o// zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / 'od rnam pa dam byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams the
347a6(rgyud): 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par spangs nas yang slar log ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs kar zhug so// de nas bac+doMs
347a7(rgyud): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra pad+mot+ta ma hU~MHde nas byang chub se da'i phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
347a8(rgyud): gsung sa// oM badz+ra bid+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sedel sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs// oM badz+ra rat+na t+na ma tra/ de nas byang chub se del sa chen po
347b1(rgyud): / sbyar gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra bid+hot+ta ma hrI/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra ba d+ha ma a/ de nas byang chub po
347b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thaMd stong po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi snying
347b3(rgyud): po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra hU~M hrIHho// de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pa
347b4(rgyud): po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma la bzhugs te/ phyag rgya'i ma/ nam pad+mo 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / rgyar sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa las
347b5(rgyud): pa seda' thad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa/ byang chub se de'i lus gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thadu sems can tham/ sa cang ji ltar 'dul babs so'i gzugasu sa/ 
347b6(rgyud): nas ma lus pa lus med pa'i sen gyi khabs gdul bar byas te yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
347b7(rgyud): phyogs thaMd kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas che du brjod pa 'di ched brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs ni snying rje bdag nyid/ gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzas
347b8(rgyud): lha rnamasu yang 'gyur ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sedang seMda' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang pos rang gi rig pa bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad/ 
348a1(rgyud): la sen thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyid pa dang / don dang / grub pa dab pa dang / rdo rje chos nyi dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu rgyu rnyeng pa'i phyir phul nas 'gro ba
348a2(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ste/ gru bzhi
348a3(rgyud): la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni brgyan pa dang / srang bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dang dang phreng bas rgyan pa dang // dkyil 'khor grwa ni thad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan
348a4(rgyud): par/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bri// de yi nang du srad du ni/ gru bzhi pa ni bri ba bya// gnyis pa'i dra ni sgo gdod cing // pad+mo 'dra bdub ba yin// ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni// pad+mo 'dab ma brgyad pa
348a5(rgyud): gri/ de ya~M gsar dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs bzhag/ de lasangs rgyas bzhag pa'i snying po ni yin// bud+d+ha hUM/ sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni/ pad+mo'i dbus su gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin
348a6(rgyud): tshan pad+mo dang / sna tshogs pad+mo'ang de bzhin no// de la nga rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM hUM hrIHkr-i/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ de 'i spyad ras gzigs dbang bri// gzu
348a7(rgyud): thams cad 'byin pa ste/ de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ rdo rje bgying la sogs tshul du// sangs rgyas la sogs sa de'i che// mtshamaH pad+ma 'chang bu bri// da dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yid/ a oM ta thA ga tAd+harma hUM/ oM
348a8(rgyud): pad+ma e ku sha ko Sha d+hA ra badz+ra satwa hU~M phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ g+ha ku sum a yud+har a mo g+ha sha ho/ oM pad+ma sa b+ha pad+ma hasta sA d+hu hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// 
348b1(rgyud): de yi dbus su bri ba ni// tho tshugs dbus na'a'ade bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni// mtshan mar pad+mo'achang bri ba// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin pa// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di
348b2(rgyud): rnams yin no/ hUM/ oM pad+me bA ku Ti Ti Ti tra/ oM bad+ma sUr+ya dzA ma hUM/ oM pad+ma ma Niki tu d+ha ra tsan+da pra had la a ba lo ki ti shwa de ti me sar+b+ba ar+d+ha na shI k+She sa ma ya hUM/ oM padz+ra aT+TA \u0f7fsa e ka da sha mu ka Sha
348b3(rgyud): 5hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor sa sum pa'ang de bzhin te// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par/ pad+ma sdad du bzhag par br-i/ de mi phyogs ni thams ca du/ lnga 'og go rims ji bzhin
348b4(rgyud): pad+ma la sogs tshul du ni/ sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// hriHoM tA pad+ma a ba lo ka ya mA mA sa ma ya sadz+dza hUM/ oM pad+ma ku pA pa pad+ma shAk+Sha
348b5(rgyud): d+ha ra kha ba ge rats+tshid+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma nI la kan+na shar atsakrag ta pad+ma pA Ni b+hA g+h+ra ha tsarma Nib sa ni kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nye bI ta a dzin rma ba tsa tsan+dod/ d+hA ri ya nA rA ya na du ba dang tre ni mu kha arma
348b6(rgyud): hAs na pra be sha ya sa ma ya na/ de hi me sid+d+hi e ba l-i ki te shwa bad+hU/ aM prah+ma pad+ma saM b+ha badza ba rde be pad+ma b+ha sha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te/ der ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa/ pad+mo mdung
348b7(rgyud): rtse thogs par bri/ de yi phyogs ni thangad du// rdo rje gar la sogs rdul du// mtshon pa pad+mo 'dzin bri ba// sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga bzhir// de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hri oM pad+ma na NaM shwa ra nA thA pU dza ya
348b8(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma sa ma ya/ A rA ya pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya A be sha sarba karma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki She shwa ra tAM/ oM ba ya na d+ha tad a ba lo ki te shwa ra rak+Sha baR+Sha ya ka ba tse sa pa ye hUM/ oM maH
349a1(rgyud): pra tsan+de bi shwa rU ba cig/ pad+ma daSh+Ta A ka ra la bi shwan badz+ra dzid ya pad+ma yak+Sha khA da khA da d+hi m+b+hik+Sh+mI ka/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti sa ma ya s+t+waM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// gru rnams kun tu bri ba ni/ 
349a2(rgyud): rje skrag mo la sogs tshul// pad+ma pa sgeg mo la sogs lte/ de dag gi ni pag rgya 'di rnam so// oM pad+ma lA sau rA ga ya ma hA de rI ga ma hA pU dza sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma mA la a b+hi Shany+dzi/ a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ya hUM/ 
349a3(rgyud): oM pad+ma gIH pU dza sa pa ya hUM/ oM badras ne mri d+ye sarba prA dza pra bar+d+ha na sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis gal nas ni// phyi rol dkyi la 'khong grwa rnam su// pad+ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i// mchod pa'i lha
349a4(rgyud): bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma d+hU pe bU dza sa ma ye pra hrid ya pad+ma ku la da yi te ma hA ga Ni pad+mar ti hUM/ oM pad+ma dpUSh+pe pU dza sa ma ye pad+ma ba si ma hA bIr+ya pad+ma ku la pra
349a5(rgyud): sha ri sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma dI ba pU dza sa ma ye pad+ma ku la sun+d+hu many+dzu tuthA A lo ka badz+ra pa tsin ya pad+ma sa ra swa ti hUM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha pU dze sa ma ye ma hA pad+ma ku la tsi ku ru karmA Ni
349a6(rgyud): pad+ma sid+d+ha hU~M/ de nas pad+ma'i sgo bzhi po// kun tu tshogs sogs ji bzhin du// ji lta ba bzhin legs bri ba// de dag snying po'i don gyis ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// oM ha ya grI ba ma hA pad+ma e ku sha A kaR+Sha
349a7(rgyud): ya shI g+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma ya na pad+ma e ku sha d+ha hU dzaHoM a ma~M g+ha pA sha kro d+ha A karA ya pra be sha ya ma hA ba shu pa ti ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra pra be sha d+ha ra pad+ma ku la sa ma ye hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta swo/ 
349a8(rgyud): ban+d+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma ye shI g+he hUM baM/ oM khe mu khe san ta ku mA ra be Sha d+ha pad+ma g+har+b+he A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma ye sarba mu dra ma ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+him+bi pra yats+tsha pad+ma a be sha a a a a/ de nas
349b1(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad// de la dang por pad+mar slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad+mo'i dam tshig gi phag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/ rdo rje dbyings
349b2(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams pa'o// oM ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta s+pho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha a/ de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ pad+mor dbyibs
349b3(rgyud): bslabs nas rang gi 'ad+mo mong brjod la pad+mo lpags kyu la sogs pas las rnams pa'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgyad dag gis sed pa chen po rnams bsgrub pa bya'o// de ras dngos grub rnams kyang ngo ba'i na
349b4(rgyud): de nas pad po slob pa rnams gzhug par bya ste/ de nas dang por pang mo'i slob ma rnams/ mni'i snying po bin la 'di skad bsgo ba bya'o// de ni khyod kyi snying ka ma/ pad+ma sems dpa' nyid bzhugs
349b5(rgyud): te'aji ste tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo 'dra ba ste/ gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang sa smra shig/ khyod kyis mi bde ba pa spangs
349b6(rgyud): pas dus byas nas seMn dmal bar ltung bar gyur tare/ de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar ba'o// oM badz+ra pad+ma sa ma ya ste/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dang dkar pos gdong g.yogs pa
349b7(rgyud): gzhug par bya ste/ snying po 'di yin/ oM pad+ma sa ma ya sta/ de nas las rnams ji lta bzhin du byas nas bad+mo'i dang bas lag tu sbyor no// oM pad+ma ta sA d+ha ma han pA lA ya he ne/ de nas 'di skad du pad+mo chos nyid jiH
349b8(rgyud): bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o// de la yang 'di skad brjod par bya'o// ji ltar pad+mo dkar po 'ang/ 'dod pa'i nyes pas po chags bzhin// thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni// de ba'i sdig pas chags mi 'gyur/ 
350a1(rgyud): la chos nyid ni 'di yin// de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ snying la pad+mo bris nas kyang // pad+mo bsgoms na snying ka ya~M/ pad+mo dpal yang dbang 'gyur na// bud
350a2(rgyud): phal la smos ci dgos// dpral bar sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te// rtag tu bsgoms pa bas na ni// sgom pa des ni myur du yang // dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// kha yi nad du lce steng du// sangs rgyas
350a3(rgyud): dbyibs ni rab bsgoms na/ sgra dbang lha mo bdag nyid kyis// rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur// gtsug tor dbus su pad+ma ni// snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang // gtsug tor pad+ma bsgribs nas ni/ 
350a4(rgyud): mkhar la 'gro ba'ang de dbang 'gyur// bdag gi snying ba ni 'di/ rnams yin no// oM pad+ma shre ye b+ha Sha ya to// oM pad+ma a b+hi Sha ka pra sats+tsha ga/ oM pad+ma sa ra s+thi bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/ oM 'dra
350a5(rgyud): b+hagr-i ba sha~M ku re dza rtsig pa 'am yang na mkha' la'ang rung / pad+ma dam pa bsgobs na ni// 'don sems can thad kyang // dbang du byed pa dam pa'o// mkha' 'am yang na phyogs bzhan
350a6(rgyud): pad+mo dam pa bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe mthong ba de tshe brangs// ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyur// rtsig pa 'am yang na mkha' la/ pad+ma rgya gram bris na no// gang tshe mthong nas blangs pa yi// de tshe sna tshor gzu
350a7(rgyud): de 'gyur// mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // da brangs skad cig nyid kyis ni// pad+mo'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yino// oM badz+ra dza gad bshi
350a8(rgyud): kadz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha ya oM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tiSh+Tha a shan ba ku ru be/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha ru be na d+ha ra sha ya b+ha ga bA baM/ oM sa mA d+hi badz+ra pad+mony+dza a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI g+h+raM hi/ dkyil 'khor los 3
350b1(rgyud): spyad ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni// de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi// phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya// dkyil 'khor la sogs thadadu// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri ba ba/ nges pa'i zhags pa phag rgya
350b2(rgyud): yos pa 'gro ba thams cad des dbang byed// dkyil 'khor lo sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar gde yi mdun du pad+ma yi// lcags sgrog mchog gau phyag rgya bcings// dkyil 'khor
350b3(rgyud): la sogs thaMd/ spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi// mdun du pad mo dril bu yis// thams cad 'babs pa'i dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying po ri 'di rnams yin// oM pad+mo A kaR+Sha ya sarba mahA satwa na hUM dza
350b4(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha hU~M hota/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta be/ oM pad+ma g+haN+Ta a ba sha ya sarba aHbdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// pad+ma zhal bani sems dpar yang // bsgoms te de nas grub
350b5(rgyud): nas ni/ skad cig gis ni gzugs pa 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas// pad+mo par mo bsgoms na ni// zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob/ spyan
350b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang bcug tor dbus bdags sangs rgyas gzugasun// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms gyur na/ tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur/ sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzid gnas/ sna
350b7(rgyud): gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas ni// spyan ras gzigs dbapa mnyam par 'gyur// de la de dag snying po rnams ni 'di yi// pad+mo bi shwa/ d+harma kA ya pad+ma/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Sha ka a lo / 
350b8(rgyud): rade das dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya cher po'i ye shes yod te/ ji lta ba mo'i tshul du ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dadus gnas shing // padz+ra
351a1(rgyud): la gnas sems dpar ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid sgom// de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yido// sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings nas// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje
351a2(rgyud): pad+mo bcings da ni// sman ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings da ni// bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur// pad+mo pad+mo'i ting 'dzin thob// sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshe/ 
351a3(rgyud): mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur// pad mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// pang po khro bo dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// pad+mo
351a4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje pad+ma grub mchog sbyin// 'dod pa'i pad+mo pa 'dod ldan dga' ba yis ni legs pa sbyid// khro gnyer gyis
351a5(rgyud): khro 'i 'gyur// pad+ma'i nyim gzi brjid bachog/ pad+mo zla ba sa mdzes pa che// bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob/ grol bas da ngos grub mchog 'thob po// pad+ma ral gris long
351a6(rgyud): spyod thob/ mgrin sngor gyis ni 'gugs pa che// gos dkar gyis ni dngos grub thob/ pad+mo gang dbang gis 'grub ste// mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med// rab gtum gyis de pa rungs 'dul// badz+ra
351a7(rgyud): khu tshur rab tu sgrub// skrag mo dge'i shing phreng ba'i dang // glung blangs gang bde 'dug pas tshim// me tog mdzes shing ma tog lha// dris ni mchog gis dring yang 'gyur// rta 'grir gyis ni yang dag 'gug
351a8(rgyud): gdon mi za bar dab du byed// pad+mo lcags sgrog bcing 'che// dril bus kun nas 'babs pa'o// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te// rdo rje bslab pa bcings nas ni/ man
351b1(rgyud): bo mthe'u chung mnyam par spasbyang // phyag rgyu 'di ni chos dam tshig/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// mdzub mo gung mo srin lag mnyam// sangs rgyas rigs mchog
351b2(rgyud): phyag rgya de// sangs rgyas nyidu 'grub par byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// gung mo rdo rje rab mnyams pa// 'di ni rdo rje rig dam pa'i// phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub// de nas gung mo rin chen 'dra/ 
351b3(rgyud): rje rin chan rab 'grub byed// gung mo pad+ma'i tshul du byas// pang mo'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas ni// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje bcings ni ni// skad cig gi ni
351b4(rgyud): dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje bsdams las mdzub mnyam pas/ sangs rgyas dngos grung thob par byed// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du// rdo rje thal
351b5(rgyud): bsdams nas kyang // gung mo mnyab par bsdams nas ni/ mthe bo mthe'u chung po ba ni/ sna tshogs pad+mor bshad pa yin// de las mthe bo gnyis bsngal te/ mdzub gnyis / 
351b6(rgyud): mo sprad la 'gug/ dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug bud// gtsug pud sangs rgyas yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa dam pas la// mthe bo mnyams nas btud nas ni// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgu ga/ 
351b7(rgyud): bkan nas ting 'dzin du bcug// thal mo pad+me mnyam sbyang la// mdzub mo rdo rje mnyams nas ni// mthe bo ngos la spyad pa 'di // nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas ni/ l-i5
351b8(rgyud): bkan te bcings nas kyang / mthe bo gnyis ni pad+mod sprong / sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par bshad/ mthe bo gnyis ni rdo rje mnyas// mdzub mo lcags kyu ral gris bya// mthe'u chung gnyis ni song dbye/ gung mo / 
352a1(rgyud): // lag par mod ba// pad+mo mnyam par rab sbyang la/ mthe bos mthe'u bzung dgug pas// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bzung ba ni// pad+ma'o brdas ni 'gugs par byed// thal po mnyam par sbyar nas ni// @
352a2(rgyud): legs phyag rgya bcings nas ni// leg so zhes pa sbrid par byed// pad+mo'i legs pa yin par grags// thal mo mnyam par rab spang la mdzub mo rtse mo mnyams te dgug/ mthe'u chung pha nas mdzod pu
352a3(rgyud): bzhag/ pad+ma khro gnyer zhes pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam bso la// sor mo thad dkyil 'khor du// snying ka rab tu btang ba ni// pad mo'i nyi ma yin par bshad// thal mo rab tu das sbyar lo// mdzub gnyis
352a4(rgyud): rin chen 'dra ba bya// dpung pa'i spyi bong dbargyad pa// pod+ma mi chenargyal ba rar byed// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bong bzhag/ kha dang bcas dbang rab btung nas/ nyid kyi kha ras dgod pa dang / 
352a5(rgyud): re bcu gcig nyi du 'gyur// ting 'dzin pad+mor bcings nas ni/ mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'gyud// pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las/ mdzu ba gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du dgug/ pad+mo sprul pa'i phyag

352a7(rgyud): gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya// rdo rje thal mo ngas pas la// g.yas pa oM dunang du gzhug/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas pa ba// song kun chus skyes khu bye 'dra// rdo rje thal mo mnyam spyar la/ 
352a8(rgyud): gisen dang g.yas nas de bzhin du// 'gying bcas gor byed bsta nas ni/ spyi ba bzhig po badz+ra can/ dza rje thal ma dam byas la/ bye ma thang kha bye ba/ bai sno te pad+ma seM sa bzhag nas brtan par byed pa / 
352b1(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo dam pas la// gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni// thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni// khang bzhag pad+ma'i gnod sbyin ma// rdo rje khu chur bcings nas kyang // gung po gnyis ni phyir bkug ste/ rang gi mthe bo
352b2(rgyud): rgyab mnan pa/ pang+ga'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// mchod pa'i lha mo thed kyi/ dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la// mdzub

352b7(rgyud): chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byir gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bang chub sang
352b8(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs oM ma Ni
353a1(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sede'i chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sede' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa
353a2(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsung so// oM karma sa ma ya hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sada' sems dpa' chen po spyad ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di
353a3(rgyud): gsung so// de nas rab tu bshadu ba ba/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// pad+ma'i gsang ba zhes bshad// dkyil 'khong chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad srad
353a4(rgyud): bus bre// de dbus pad+mo'i steng du ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri/ de yi phyogs rnams tha du// dam tshig mchog rnams lhag ma bzhin// rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par// chos kyi rdo rje la so br-i/

354a1(rgyud): dz+ra pa/ d+harma A lo ke pU d+hA ya hU/ oM pad+ma gar d+ha hUM/ mchod pa rnamaso// oM pad+ma e ku sha A karA ya ba tA bad+ba ku la ma/ ta ya gr-I ba sa ma ye hUM dza oM a bo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra be sha
354a2(rgyud): ya sarba satwa sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma shI ke la ba~M/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha d+ha ri shIg+h+raM A ba sha ya/ sa ma ye sha na mu ki a/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil 'khor dgug pa la sogs pa'i chog rgyas par byas nas// pad+mor

354a5(rgyud): yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub pa'i ye shes bsla'o// ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rje su dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bsla bo// ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes

355a1(rgyud): bsgoms 'a ni// bud meng thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang // pad+mo blangs te ji lta ba// rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas// 'jig rten tha~Md des mgur 'gyur/

355a6(rgyud): ya ho phaT/ e sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/ oM d+harmA ped+ma ts+tshe da bi rA shaM ya pre ta ya phaT/ oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya dzI bi Sha ma sa kr-i ta paDa/ da nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis ni 'di

355a8(rgyud): rgyan sangs rgyas ni// bsgoms na des ni de 'gru'o// bud mod ta ni pad+mo bsam// de stong pad+mod bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing pad+mo pang po mchog// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ bud med de ni pad+mo bsam/ de steng sa
355b1(rgyud): tshogs bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing sna tshogs pad+mo mchog/ sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM badz+ra pad+ma se yau ga sA d+ha ya hriHoM bud+d+ha ma ku Ta se yo ga sA d+ha ya shri/ oM
355b2(rgyud): pad+ma pad+ma sa yo ge sA d+ha ya d+hi/ oM bi shwa pad+ma sa yo ga sA d+hA ya sI/ de nas pad+ma rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bsla'o// sor mo rtse sprad pad mor bya/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis
355b3(rgyud): spradapa rtsa gnyis nor bu'i pad+mo ltar// rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni myu gur sgang // mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'o// phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i ba
355b4(rgyud): chos kyi rdo rje snying kar bzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang / ting 'dzin tshul pang du bzhag/ bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag par bya//  rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la// mchi rjer pad+mo
355b5(rgyud): tshul duni/ gung mo'i gnyis de btso 'gyuran/ sangs rgyas pad+ma min par bshad// de las mthe bo rdo rje dang// mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags gyu bya// pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / gsang ba'i phyag rgya
355b6(rgyud): yin par bshad// de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang // mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la// drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad// leg so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bsdam pa dam pas las// mthe bo gas
355b7(rgyud): mnyam bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni// dpral bzhag gung mo pad+modar bya// de nyid las ni snying kar yang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // de nyid las ni rgyal mtshom bcing / lhag par
355b8(rgyud): tu brkyang bar bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+ma dgug/ de bzhin pad+mo la gri ste/ mdzub mo pad+mo byabyas pas sbyad// rdo rje bsdam pa dam pas la/ mthe bo g.yod pa na du gzhug/ 
356a1(rgyud): dung ste mthe bo tho bar sbreng / sor mo bskum bskyang 'bru mtha'u chung // de las thang bcu ma nas kyang // mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi/ mdzub mor rong bu bgrang bdu ba
356a2(rgyud): rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la// mthe'u rgyu ba pad+mo lta bur bya// mdzub mo sbreng ste gang byed pa/ pad mo spyan gyi yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ mthe'u chub pad+mo lnga bu ngu ba// dam du mdzub mo ga
356a3(rgyud): bkug ste// mthe bo gnyis ni tha cha byaM// de las mtheb gnyis mche bar ba// so thab gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu ba 'du bya ba// dam tshig mcho go na bla med de/ rdo rjen du bsdams nas
356a4(rgyud): / mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'dra byas la// mtha bo phan tshun bsnol ba nau// gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad // de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung gung mo mnyam sbre la// mtha'
356a5(rgyud): mos rdo rje sbyang ba ni// gcur bud dbus na de bzhin gshegs/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bo pad+mo 'drang byas la/ kha nas dbyung lda rlabs nas kyang // dbang tu ting 'a
356a6(rgyud): ltar bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// song mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni// mnyam pa dam du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rdo rje mnyam pa'o// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub gnyis
356a7(rgyud): pad+mo 'drar byas la// mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni// gung mo gnyis ni rtse sbyang bkug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtha' gnyis rdo rjer rab spyar la// mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya// mtha'
356a8(rgyud): pad+mo 'drar byas la// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mo g.yon pa sgreng ba la// mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sbyang ba// dam du bzung ste dgag ltar ba// de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la// mthe bong gnyis kyi
356b1(rgyud): bsnan pa ni// pad+mo dgyes pa bdag nyid che// leg so zhes pa sbyin byed kyi// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos sgyur la// mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// mdzub mo mnyam par spyad
356b2(rgyud): ba'o// de nyid snying kar nyi ma ru bya// spyi bor pad+mo rgyal mtshan bya// phob ste kha yi 'gram bzhag pa// pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa yin// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la// chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni// mthe'u chu
356b3(rgyud): mthe bo rab bsdams pa// 'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mdzub gung pad+mo ral grir bya// de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya// zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin// de ba'i na rdo rje bsdus
356b4(rgyud): ba las sa mtheb mdzub ste gnyisu bya// de nas snying dkar spyang ba ni/ gsang ba'i srung ba yin par bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/  the'u chung pad+mo 'drang bas la/ mjug gnyis shig tu bstuH
356b5(rgyud): nas kyang // mtheb gnyis pir bskyed mche ba can// de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni// mtha' gnyis ngos kyi bcing ba yi// pad+mogs pa'i khu tshur tshe// dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o// pad+ma lA
356b6(rgyud): saM la sogs pa// de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje nang du bsdams pas la// nga 'dra ba ni bcing bar bya// de nas pad+mo gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/ tA grA prA tA/ shrA sA d+ha hA/ gA dA krA bA/ dA rA ShA sA
356b7(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdun du chur gnyisu bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kye dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po cher po las chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// 
356b8(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs// / 
357a1(rgyud): / d+ham sa A d+hid+hA nA thA gta hUM/ pheMs byang chub sems pa 'a chen po phyag rdo rjes yang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig bdam pa 'a gsung mo/ oM badz+rad+ha trAdz+dza de su byang chub de'i sems pa
357a2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs// oM rat+na d+harmA hUM/ de nas byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM d+harmad+ha rma hA/ da nas byang chub sems dpa' sang
357a3(rgyud): chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM karma d+harmA hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sade chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'od kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ba
357a4(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad ba pa// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ dza rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'kho chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thang srang bus bre/ 
357a5(rgyud): yi dbus bri ba ni// ye shes rdo rje bzhin gshegs/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad/ sems dpa' che rnams mog bzhin// sna chags da dbyug la sogs ga/ ting 'dzin la stobs zhugs
357a6(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnam so// oM dz+nyA ra bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha mu ku Da hUM/ oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo g+ha shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA ra pad+ma badz+ra d+ha bahUM/ oM dz+nyA ma pad+mes
357a7(rgyud): rahUM/ oM dz+nyA na bad+ma dug+h+nAM hUM/ aM d+hA na pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma su rA hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma rba Da hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma wA sa hUM/ oM d+hA na pad+ma t+te hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ku mA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nA rA ya hUM oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tra sa hUM/ oM
357a8(rgyud): dz+nyA na pad+ma nad+he shwa ra hUM oM dz+nyA na pad+me rAk+Sha hUM oM dz+nyA na pad+ma yAk+Sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bad+ma muSh+Ti hUM/ oM d+hAn pad+ma lA s+ye hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA le hAM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gI te hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i tre hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+hA pe hrI/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma puSh+peny+tsa
357b1(rgyud): oM dz+nyA na pad+ma dI pe hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gan+d+he hUM/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra e ku sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a mo g+ha bA sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra s+pho Ta hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha hUM/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa
357b2(rgyud): cho ga rgyas brlabs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis gnyen su la yang ma brjod cig khyed seMn dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur yang/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste 'jim
357b3(rgyud): dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la// snying kar pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // pad+mo'i ting 'dzin thob na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar lding // 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// dpral bar pad+mo sgom pas te// goms nas shin tu
357b4(rgyud): brtan gyur na// de ma thag tu mkha' la lding // 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// lce la pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na phyung bar ya nga// na mkha' la deng 'grol// 'jig rten dbang po ring
357b5(rgyud): gyis// gtsug tu pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur du ni// skad cig gis ni stang du lding // de dag gi snying po 'di rnams/ oM pa drA dz+nyA na hr-id ya a be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi Sha ka A
357b6(rgyud): be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na bi dod+ha ma A be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na uSh+NI Sha a be sha/ na mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgobs nas kyang // cho ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na// skad cig gis ri paM sdang ra' gyur/ 
357b7(rgyud): nam mkha' 'am ni pogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // de yi steng de bdag 'dug par// bsgoms par gyur na mi sdang 'gyur// na mkha'i 'am ni pogs gzhan da// pad+ma'i dbyibs shig
357b8(rgyud): bsgoms byas la// gang tshe mthong ba daN blang so// mi snang b.ra'i myung du 'gyur// dmakha' 'am ni phyogs gsad du// pad+ma dbyings ni tha sgoms pas la// mthong ba'i brjod zaso // des thag tu mi snang 'gyur// dal dag/ 
358a1(rgyud): // gi snying po ni 'di rnams/ oM pad+ma a kaR+Sha/ oM pad+ma thA/ oM bad+ma dz+nyA na gra tAn oM padrangs la hUM phaT/ phyag rgya che bcings pad+ma na// kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs pa'i// dbyibs de lag pa
358a2(rgyud): bzung na ni// gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbyibs bris la// de nyid bsgom bu bas ni ni// gzungs mang 'chang bar de 'gyuraro// na mkha'
358a3(rgyud): 'amani phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibasu bsgoms na yang / sgra yi gzugasu de 'gyuraro// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibasu byas kyang ni// de la zhon nas
358a4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro zhing // ci dga' gzugasu ngas par 'gyur// de la ngag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi shwa rA pa pra brta ya A be sha/ oM bi shwa pad+ma pra brta ya mA oM sa mA d+hi bi shra pad+ma A ba
358a5(rgyud): oM bi shwa pad+ma mnod k+Shi pa A kA sha bi shwa rU pe a d+hi tiSh+Tha mA~M/ gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin gyis legs bcings la pad+mo blangs te rab byir na// gdon mi za bar dbang du
358a6(rgyud): 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya zhes bya bcing sa na ni// de ni pad+mo blangs nas kyang / byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur// ting 'dzin skyes dge ba yi// phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la// 
358a7(rgyud): ye shes pad+mo gang byin pa// de ni de yis myur dbang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// pad+ma byin pa gang yin pa// de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur// de la de dgi snying po/ 
358a8(rgyud): 'di rnam so// oM ma hA dz+nyAn pad+ma to// oM sa ma ya pad+ma ha~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho// oM karma pad+ma 'o// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ 
358b1(rgyud): rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas rab tu bshang ba ba/ dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// pad+ma'i pad+mo bzhag par bya// chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la// las kyi phyag rgya
358b2(rgyud): gnyi su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog s+ho// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
358b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba
358b4(rgyud): thA ga tA rba kr-i d+hu/ de nas phyag rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi/ las 'byung ba rang po rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs// oM hU~M d+hi/  nas byang chub se rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig
358b5(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsungs// oM rA karmas pa ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sada' rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM pad+ma karma/ hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs
358b6(rgyud): kyis rang gi rig pa 'di gsung so// oM bi shwa kaR+Sha hUM/ de nas byang chub seda' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad// de nas rab tu bshad pa
358b7(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni// pad+ma'i las zhes bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thang sra dbus bre// sangs rgyas pogs kun pad+ma ya
358b8(rgyud): mtshan ma 'dzin par thad bre// de la de dgi rig pa'i snying po ma 'di rnam so// oM buM riHhUM/ bi shwa karma shwa ri hUM/ oM ta thA ga to shwa ra a bi Sha ka karma khrid hUM/ oM d+harma ka rbo shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dza sa ma ya/ 
359a1(rgyud): / hUM/ oM a mo g+ha karme shwa rI hUM/ oM pad+ma karma bud+d+ha hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma badz+ra \u0f7fhUM/ oM pad+ma ka mi Ni mA ra \u0f7f pU dza/ rma sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma duSh+Ti hUM/ oM pad+ma karma b+h+r-i ku TI hUM tra/ oM pad+ma karma s+yAH
359a2(rgyud): hUM oM pad+ma karma d+hA dza hUM/ oM pad+ma rma hA sa hUM/ oM pad+ma karma tAr hUM/ oM pad+ma karma ku mA ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma nA rA ya ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma brah+ma hUM/ oM pad+ma karman te shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+ma k+Sha rAk+Sha karma sa ma ya
359a3(rgyud): oM ma hA pra tsaN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma da b+hA karma ka ri hUM/ oM pad+ma ka ma mu g+ni ga tA ya hUM/ oM ra ta~M pU dzi hUM dzaHa~M a b+hi She ka pU dze hUM dzaHa~M gI ta pU dzA hU d+hA/ oM nai wi d+ye pU dz+re hUM be oM d+hU bi pU dza hUM a oM puSh+pa pU
359a4(rgyud): dz+re dzU tra/ oM A li ka pUdzAhU d+hi/ oM gan+d+he pU dze hUM baM/ a~M Tham gr-I ba a na ya hU dza/ oM a mo g+ha bA sha~M kr-i d+hi pa~M DA ya hUM phaT/ oM/ pad+ma sha~M ka la bamaHhU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma gan+d+he a be na
359a5(rgyud): ye hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dang dgug pa lasoHpa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'dis du pa kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang la smra shigs
359a6(rgyud): dmyal par ltung bar gyur tar zhes bsgo shig/ de nis ye shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten dang phyug phyag rgya tshor/ shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgom
359a7(rgyud): nas kyang // sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni/ sdig pa kun lo de 'dog 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gis ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te/ sdig pa thaMd bshags na ni// mtshams med
359a8(rgyud): lnga las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam par gzhag bsgoms la// sdig pa thad bshags na ni// sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms// mdang na gang yang rung ba yi// la
359b1(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la// las rnams thams cad bshags na ni// las rnams kun las rnam par 'dag/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// oM sarba pA paM se sho d+ha na ma hA pad+ma/ oM sarba a ngan
359b2(rgyud): t+ya shwa d+ha na sa ma ya pad+ma/ oM sarba pA pa pra Na sha Na d+harma pad+ma/ oM sarba pad+ma a ba raH bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/ de nas sgrib pa thang yong su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bsla 'o// 'jig rten dbang gi phag rgya
359b3(rgyud): shin tu ma'am gzhag bsgoms byas la/ shud d+h+ya shud d+ha nas brjodad/ las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi dang tshig bcings nani// bung d+ha bungad b+h+yonas badz+ra/ 
359b4(rgyud): las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por sgo dmas zhags la// chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni// d+hi d+hi d+ha d+hi zhes brjod na rje las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dang
359b5(rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / trAN+Ta hA hU~M zhes brjod na// lngas rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// da la ded ga gi snying po na 'di rnam so// oM pA pa k+Sha ya pad+ma a~M
359b6(rgyud): A ba ra tak+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM karma kA ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad la mchod pa'i ye shes bsla'o// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/ rab tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la// oM a~M oM oM
359b7(rgyud): brjod na// mchod pa thad rab tu byed// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / b+hu b+hU b+hA b+hU zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thad de mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs
359b8(rgyud): la chos kyi bad+ma grums nas kyang / ti ti hi ti zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas thad des mchod 'gyur/ 'ang+ga'i las kyi phyog sbyin/ shin tu ma'am par gzhag bcings la// d+he d+ye d+hid+he zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas the
360a1(rgyud): / des mchod 'gyur/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM b+hA kA ra pad+ma/ oM te ka ra pad+ma/ oM d+ha kA ra pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bsla'o// 'jig rten dbang po phag rgya cher
360a2(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // hri hri hri triM zhes brjodan// 'jig rted dbang por grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang / shrI shr-i shri shri zhes
360a3(rgyud): brjod na// dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i mnyam gzhag par// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // d+hi ga d+hig d+hig d+hi ga zhes brjod na// pad+mo khro bor 'grub par 'gyur
360a4(rgyud): bad+ma chen po dge ba yi/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / sr-i/ sgra smai smi zhes brjod/ ngos grub zad 'thob par 'gyur// de dgi snying pa na 'di rnams/ oM dz+dza/ sid d+h+ya/ oM shri sa
360a5(rgyud): d+ha oM d+hig sid d+h+ya/ oM saM sid d+ha/ de nas las gsang ba'i phyag/ rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ 'jig rten dbang bar snyoms zhugs la/ bud med kun dang rje byed cing // oM to su khe zhe/ 
360a6(rgyud): brjod na// sangs rgyas thad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ bud med kun dang rje byed cing // pri ya bri ya zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgyeso// 'jig rten
360a7(rgyud): dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse khyad cing / a ho ra ti zhes brjod na// de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por stobs zhugs la/ bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // su kha su kha zhes
360a8(rgyud): brjodan// de mi bde ba nyams mi 'gyur/ de la dadag go snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM sarba bud+ha pU dzA pra brtan pAd+ma/ oM prAHkA ra bad+ma/ oM ra ti pra brtan pad+ma/ a~M mahA su kha pad+ma dr-iT hU~M/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po/ 
360b1(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de nas pad+mo thal sbyar te// dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs// las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya// de nas pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phag rgyan
360b2(rgyud): bu zhes bya ba brjod par ba// las kyi phyag rgya des sgrub// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas yang
360b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byir gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra d+harma pad+ma hU/ de nas phyag na rdo rje
360b4(rgyud): rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra d+hI/ de nas byang chub sadang rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra rAt+na hU~M/ de nas bang rkub sems dpa' rdo rje snying gis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsus
360b5(rgyud): oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/ de nas byang chub sadang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs/ oM sarba mu khe hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
360b6(rgyud): kyi dbang pos phag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya ba'i mchog dkyil 'khor ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya
360b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par ba// de yi phyogs rnams thadu// rdo rje pad+mo la sogs bri// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya
360b8(rgyud): nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang / mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus nas sen dmal bar lhung bar zhes bsgo shog de
361a1(rgyud): nas de yi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ lag pas pad+ma bzung nas kyang / bsgrims te legs par bsdams par ba// dri de sangs rgyas rnams mchod na// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// maH
361a2(rgyud): gzhag par gtsug pu dbus// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab gzhag la// 'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// pad+mo'i pad+mo chen po'i gzugs// ting 'dzin 'dug ji lnga bzhin// 
361a3(rgyud): yid kyis su ni de bsadado// gang du phog par de rgyas pa'i// sa so// pa yi las bod// pad+ma pad+mo chen po'i gzugs// pad+mo rgya grangs nyidu ni/ byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang // bskur nas dba' la
361a4(rgyud): sogs de byed// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM badz+ra/ rat+nahUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A shA pa ri pU raH ma hA rat+na hUM/ aM badz+ra hU tra/ oM gan+d+ha pU dzA sad+ha ya hriHoM pad+ma mu kU
361a5(rgyud): Tata thA ga thai ba sha~M ku ru satwAn lo ka shwa ra a b+hi Sha ka sa ma ya ho/ oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ya sarba pre t+yAr+thi kan se mA d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-i ka/ oM bi shwa bad+ma sarba karma kAr b+hA bai la li lu la la li hUM phaT
361a6(rgyud): nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslabo// chags pa dgos pa thams cad ni// bsgrub par bya ste dpe tshig 'di/ sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang // rnal 'byor gyis ni myed de 'grub// de la 'di'i dam tshig
361a7(rgyud): gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// oM sA d+ha ya pad+mangag sa ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po thang bslab par bya'o phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog s+ho// de na/ 
361a8(rgyud): byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzin kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs// oM sarba dza gad bi nA ya ma hA satwa a/ A gan+d+ha shI g+h+ra bi shwa rU pa sa/ 
361b1(rgyud): d+hA ra ya ma ma tsa sarba sid d+hA ya pra yats+tsha tri/ de nas byang chub sede' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshang ba pa/ 'gro ba 'dul
361b2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du n-i// phyi ya~M dkyil 'khor bri bar ba// de yi nang du pad+mo yang // de bzhin du ni bri bar ba// deng ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i// sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya// de nas
361b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di pacho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsung nas// de bzhin du bsgo te 'gro ba tha~Mng 'dul ba'i ye gas bsla'o// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang / phag rgya cher
361b4(rgyud): po bsgoms na ni// sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'jim du// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / 
361b5(rgyud): ngo gnyis ni spyang bdub/ dkyil 'khor dos de gru'o// danas phyag rgya che/ po la sogs pa// phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab pa du ba'o// dngos gru pa rnams kyang de bzhi no// de bzhin du ngas la sor pa la
361b6(rgyud): ba'o// dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'drab par 'gyu ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub seda' spyan ngas gzigs kyi dang
361b7(rgyud): po la lagaso zhes bya ba zin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// rdo rje thag pa bla med kyi// mdo sde 'di ni lags bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khod legs pa/ rdo rje ri
361b8(rgyud): khyod lag so// rdo rje las ni khod lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzog so// 
362a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM ma tri hUM/ de nas byang chub se de'i chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM
362a2(rgyud): pad+ma hrI/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs// oM bi shwa ra rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub se de' chen po 'phags pa ra mkha'i snying pos de bzhin
362a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nong bu rin po
362a4(rgyud): che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sen thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang
362a5(rgyud): gcig tu gyur te bac+doMs byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhug so// de nas rnam pa'i snying por thugs las bcom ldan 'das pag na rdo rje
362a6(rgyud): de nyid kun sa 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin pa tsha sna tshogs kyis dbang la sogs pa bkod pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma
362a7(rgyud): phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub seda' chen po'i sku rnamasu gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyi san rnams
362a8(rgyud): mgu bar byas nas yang srang byan nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas chud brjod pa sa
362b1(rgyud): che du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thad kyi/ rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid// 'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi
362b2(rgyud): bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thad yong su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad pa ba// dkyil
362b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// thad grub pa zhes bshad po// glu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rgyan pa ste// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la// ngar dang phreng ba lnga ldis rgyan// 
362b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang // sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnam su// rdo rje na chen spras par ni/ pi yi dkyil 'khor srad pus bri/ de yi nang du rdo rje la// rin chen las byung gnas
362b5(rgyud): bya zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni// rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor lnga por rgyan gyur par// der ni srad bu bre bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi// dang na
362b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bzhag par ba~M// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM bud+d+ha rat+na hUM/ oM badz+ra ma Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ oM ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na pad+ma tAM/ oM badz+ra rat+na baR+Sha hUM/ ra ba kun grub dkyil
362b7(rgyud): du rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // rdo rje snying po deng gnas shig/ rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri// de yi phyogs rnams thedu// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// 
362b8(rgyud): chen po rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams/ oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha pra da hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma Ni tsitA A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bAn sid d+ha sid d+ha hUM/ oM rat+na a~M ku sha a~M kaR+Sha ya sarba ar+than sa/ 
363a1(rgyud): bam po bdun pa/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thad gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa'
363a2(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba bta'o// na mkha'i snying po sems can dor// sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po// rim chenache ba'i rin chen mchog/ rdo rje rin chen
363a3(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// dbang bskur rin chen chen po ni// dag pa che zhing dge ba che// sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag ska// rin chen rin chen khyod pag 'tshal// na mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba// na mkha' kun gyi 'od
363a4(rgyud): che ba na mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kur gyi// ra kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal// rim chen mdze spu rin chen 'byung / sangs rgya sa mdzod kyin chen 'byung // sangs rgyas mdzod spu de
363a5(rgyud): gshegs// rin chen thad rab kun mchog/ rin chen dgos pa dpag 'tshal// rin chen rin chen gtsa rin drag/ de bzhin gags pa kun rin chen// rin chen pad+ma na mkha' cha
363a6(rgyud): mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che// mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing dag pa'i ngan// sprin mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chos rin chen ni rnam dag
363a7(rgyud): mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don// don sprin khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// sbyin pa rab spyid sbyin pa'i mchog/ gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa// sen kun da/ 
363a8(rgyud): de nyid don// don chen don ni khyod 'tshal// bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de bzhin gshar pa thad che// sangs rgyas kun te khod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gsha Da pa rin
363b1(rgyud): chen che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi mchog/ dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste// 'jig rten gco
363b2(rgyud): 'jig rten mchog/ 'jig rten nyi ma khod pag 'tshal// rin chen phul bas rab kyi mchog/ rin chen rgyan te rin chen 'dzin// rin chen snang bas snang ba chen// rin chen grags pa khyod pag 'tshal// rin chen
363b3(rgyud): phung po rin chen don// nor bu rdo rje nong bu yi// rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'bar// rin chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal// tshe nyid shing ste rin chen dbang // ra ba thad skong mdzad pa// bsam pa thams cad le Da pa
363b4(rgyud): mnyes// rin chen phung po khod phyag 'tshal// srid rtse khyab par bdag nyid kun// mchog par smin zhing mchog che ba// phun sum thad 'byor pa'o// rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba
363b5(rgyud): 'dis su yang rung ba 'chang byed na// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang pa bskur ba// skad cig tu ni sdig med 'thob// rim chen khyod la gso la ba ni// nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs su
363b6(rgyud): gyi dbang gi mchog/ nges pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas byang chub seda' na mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thang kyi
363b7(rgyud): dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa/ 
363b8(rgyud): 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a sha pa ri pU bar+Na ma hA rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sede'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra hU traM/ de nas byang chub seMd/ 
364a1(rgyud): ma ya shI g+h+raM sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma nu smar hUM/ oM ta rA ga ba sha~M ku ru sarba na kA sha gar+b+ha hU~M/ oM rat+na duSh+Ti hUM/ rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khod du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ ri// 
364a2(rgyud): phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri// de yi phyogs rnams thad du// lha 'og gi rims ji bzhin par/ nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thob pa'i// sanga' chen po rnams bri'o// 
364a3(rgyud): de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin// oM rat+na toSh+Tha tra/ oM sarba ta thA gau ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA la hUM/ oM rat+na ma Ni sUr+ye hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni d+h+wa dza sarbA sha pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hU~M/ oM rAg+hA hAH/ 
364a4(rgyud): rdzas hUM/ rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi sa rgal nas ni// rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa/ de dbus gnas par bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams tha // lha
364a5(rgyud): 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba maM/ sede' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM hA pad+ma hUM/ oM haM ga sa pA d+hi dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rAH
364a6(rgyud): ko Sha gra hUM/ oM ma Ni tsakra pra ba ta ya hUM/ oM rA ba shi hUM/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khod du// rdo rje shugs kyi rgal nas ni// rin chen chang ni rab 'bebs pa'i// sade' chen po dang yang pra/ de/ 
364a7(rgyud): phyogs rnams thang // mdongon lag na phyag rgya yang // rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi// sede'i tshe rnams cho ga bzhin// deg gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti baR+Sha/ ya sarba brtas b+ha d+ho b+ha ga tA/ 
364a8(rgyud): Ni ta to hUM/ oM ma tra~M pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba tse hUM/ oM maNi deSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA yak+Sha ha ra ta ra satwA d+hun ti sha ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rAt+na ban+d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// gra
364b1(rgyud): phyogs rnams thadu// lte 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rin chen lA s+yai la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnamaso// oM rany+dza ra Shi hUM/ oM rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na gI t+ye hUM/ oM rA nr-i t+ye hUM/ phyi yid kyi
364b2(rgyud): 'khor dam pa ni// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnam su// bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM rat+na d+hU pa rAN+De/ oM puSh+pa ma \u0f7f/ a~M
364b3(rgyud): rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma thi gan+d+ha/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbusu ni// sgo ba rnams ni bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying pa ni 'odi rnamaso// oM sarba rat+na A kaR+Sha ru Na ma hA satwa b+ha ga bAn taM A kaR+Sha dzaHoM sa
364b4(rgyud): rat+na pra bai shA ya/ sa ma ya pra khe sha ya sa ma ya ma hA ma NaM rA dza ku la rat+na bA shA hAM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha hUM baM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha ya a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob
364b5(rgyud): dpon nyid ji ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang \u0f7f'i nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur ste// rdo rje nang bu'i
364b6(rgyud): dam tshig gi phag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod/ oM badz+ra me Ni sa ma ya ba/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i gos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de dang 'dra bas mig g.yogs la snyi
364b7(rgyud): po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o// oM ma Ni rA dza ku lAn/ de nas de ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma brjod cig/ khong che rabs thad du dbul bor gyur tar/ sdug bsngal
364b8(rgyud): las maM thar bar gyur tar// seMn dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur tar zhes bsgo la dam tshig gnyisu bya'o// theg pa chen po mngon par 'das pa yang brjod par bya'o// de nas babs pa dang gta
365a1(rgyud): / chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bang ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po namakha'i snying pos thang sbrang stsol cig ces smras
365a2(rgyud): ma thag tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar da dkyil 'khor chen po bsta/ 
365a3(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas ci 'byar pas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgyan 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas
365a4(rgyud): bcings// gter brkos nas ni gang dag na/ gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur// dam tshig gis ni mchog bcings la/ gang nag tor rnams yod gyur pa// deng ni phyag rgya btsir na// 
365a5(rgyud): de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/ shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// gang na gter rnams yod pa // yid kyis shes pa'i du 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying / 
365a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na// de nas gter yod shes par ba// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnam so// oM ma hA ma NaM rat+na A bi sha hUM/ oM ma Ni biM Da pa
365a7(rgyud): ri sha ya hUM/ oM rat+na sa mA d+hi pra ti/ oM rat+na A bi sha dor sha ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/ ga du lus ni khor gyur pa// da na rin chen gter yod par// dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya// da
365a8(rgyud): tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa// de nas rin chen chen po yi// gter yod par ni shes par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang la babs pa bdag nyid kyi/ 
365b1(rgyud): rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis// gtar ni gang na yod par smra// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du// babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa// de nas gter ni yod par
365b2(rgyud): bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dang sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na// oM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ya nau d+hi/ oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM bru ti/ oM pu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dang sha ya
365b3(rgyud): swAhA/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni// de bzhin gang du dgos gyur pa// de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi// gter yod ye shes shes par bya// gang du rigs song dang yang ni/ dam tshig mchog ni mchog
365b4(rgyud): bcings la// gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa// de na gter ni yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gad nges par dogs gyur pa/ de na nges par gter yod par// ye shes bskyed de
365b5(rgyud): pad+ya hA// gang na yang dang yang dogs par// las kyi phyag rgya tsha ga bzhin// dong bcings don gnyis gyung ba/ gtang yod par ni shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'ang rnams/ 
365b6(rgyud): ni d+ha~M dz+nyA na A bi sha/ oM rAt+na na sa ma ya muny+tsa ni d+hi ban d+hi/ a~M d+harma rAt+na pU ti ni d+ha ne/ oM sarba karma Ni s+pho Ta ya dang sha ya d+hi ban+d+ho dA k+Shi ga/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// gter rnams
365b7(rgyud): kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na gnas pa deng babs na// de na yod par rnam par bshad// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni// gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa// de na
365b8(rgyud): gter ni yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par rtag tu shes// de na gtar ni yod par bshad// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ 
366a1(rgyud): rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba den yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying pa ni 'di rnam so// oM rat+na sa ma ya hri da dang sha ya/ oM rat+na pa rId+hadz+nyA
366a2(rgyud): na A bi sha/ oM ma Ni karma prah+ma ya/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam spar la// gter rnams kun tu tshol bad cing // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na na/ 
366a3(rgyud): babs par gyur na gter // dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / bud med dang ni rtse byed cing // gang du phyag rgya dam gyur tam// de na gter ni yod par bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbar na// 
366a4(rgyud): gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // ye shes phyag rgya bsgra mas nas ni// gtor gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// dbang po ga nyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings
366a5(rgyud): nas ni/ gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa// de nas gter ni yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM mahA/ ma Ni saM yo gla bi sha/ oM sa ma ya~M saM yo go dr-iSh+Ta
366a6(rgyud): me b+ha ba/ oM di ni dz+nyA na A bi sha saM yo ga/ oM sarba ka thas s+pho Ta sa yo ga/ da nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thad bslab// de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khon
366a7(rgyud): dbus gnas par// ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yino// sangs rgyas phyag
366a8(rgyud): rgya sangs rgyas nyid/ rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub// rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren// nor bu dga' bar rjes dgang byed// nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed// nor bu lta bas nor thob/ nor bu
366b1(rgyud): phreng bas dbang bskur zhing // nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar sbyin// rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur// rin chen chos kyis chos kyang thob// gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa
366b2(rgyud): rnyed pa rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po// rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur// smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob/ rin chen char gyi nor chen po/ nor bu'i mchod pas rab mched nyid// rin che mchos
366b3(rgyud): kyis brtan par byed// rin chen mche bas nor tho bo// khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'ang yin no// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni
366b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'thob// rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas// rdo rje rin chen grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gnyis las nong bur byas// rdo rje 'dzin las dong 'thob bo// de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis/ nor bu sbyang 'i
366b5(rgyud): kar bzhag// mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i nor bur bcings// 'jig rten dang nga gis nor byin 'byung // rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyis/ nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sprin// rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis
366b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob/ mdzub mo mnyam snga phyir bkug la/ mthe bo rdo rje bcings pa yi// rdo rje snying po'i phyag las byung / 'di ni rdo rje'i no bu gsungs// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / rdo rje na
366b7(rgyud): bu chen po 'thob/ mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drang bcings la// gung mo myu gur sgreng ba ste// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur// de nas gung mo srin lag dang // mthe'u chung rnams ni pad+mo
366b8(rgyud): bya/ 'dis ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs/ mtshan 'dzin pas ni nang sbyin 'gyur// mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams/ rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya// gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyang / srin lag myu gu 'dra bar sgreng / rdo rje bsnga
367a1(rgyud): ba dam pas la/ mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang // mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying ka/ don kun grub par sbyin par byed// rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni nor bu
367a2(rgyud): bya nor bu mtshan kyi phyag rgya 'di// nor bu chen po rab sbyin// de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis// lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni// don kun 'gug pa'i phyag rgya ste// nor bu rin cher lcags kyur bshad// de nyid
367a3(rgyud): las ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mos mdzub mo gzung nas ni// mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul byas la// drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed// de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis// sbyar ba legaso zhes pa'o// de nas
367a4(rgyud): mtha' gnyis sbyar ba yis// mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang // mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la// mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni// nor bu lta ba bshad pa ste// lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog bang po/ 
367a5(rgyud): don kun grub pa'i phreng ba ni// rang gi dbang ni la sbyin 'gyur//  nyid snying gar mthe bo gnyis// sbreng stongs kyi spyang ba ni/ nor bu nyi ma snying gang bzhag/ gzi brjid chen por ra sbyin
367a6(rgyud): 'gyur du srin lag mnyams te smang nas ni// pha ste spyi bong bzhag par bya// rdo rje nong bu chen po gtso// re ba thad rdzogs pa'o// de nyid las ni 'gyong byed cing // kha 'gram dgod par bskor ba ste/ rin
367a7(rgyud): cher dgod zhes pa ba// bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub/ ting 'dzin du sor mo sgom// nong bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i// de nas mtha' nas grol ba ni// sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed// mthe bo gnyis ni nang du drug/ 
367a8(rgyud): mdzub gnyis ning bur byas pa ni// nong bu ral gri yin te mthus// 'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje bsdams las 'khor lor bya// mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis nor bung 'dra
367b1(rgyud): byas pa// 'khor los bsgyung ba thob par byed// de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas// de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas// kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni// de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang // rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog
367b2(rgyud): rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te// sor mo thod sgreng ba ni// phyogs bzhinas ni nor char 'babs// rdo rje nor bu cha bcings la// bar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag nas// kun la cho ga bzhin
367b3(rgyud): mchod na// rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phag rgyas ni// mgrin pa'i bogasul khyud par ba// nor bu bcings pa zhes pa ste// sring ba yin cho bar grags// don kun grub pa de nyid las
367b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin tshul du khang bzhag pa// nong bu mche ba zhes pa ste/ 2jigs byed don kun 'phrog pa yi// rdo rje bsdams pa dam pas la// mdzub bkug mthe ba gnyis kyis ni// lags par mnan te/ 
367b5(rgyud): btsir ba ni// nor bu'i khu chur dngas grub 'thob// dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ri// ji ba'i gdor bu ldan pa la// 'di ni dam tshig pa rog tu btags/ 
367b6(rgyud): gung po dong bu'i tshul du bya// de dag nyid la rngam par btags/ lcags kyu gcig sogs tshul gyi ri// las rnams thed rab 'grub byed// de nas dong bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di
367b7(rgyud): yin no// tra gra tri dz+re/ shrI oM ro d+hA dgr-i bi ri Da ya a rin chen phag rgya gnyis pas la/ las kyi phag rgya bri bang bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las don thaMd gas
367b8(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'a kho chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po tsha'i bar gyis
368a1(rgyud): brlabs 'as pa pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs ras rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM badz+radatA d+hU be hUM/ de nas byang chub sada' cher po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i papa rgya 'ad sasu
368a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra a b+hi She ka mA lo ab+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bdub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsung so// oM rat+na a b+hi Sha ka hUM/ de nas pang chub sida'i si 'a chen po
368a3(rgyud): rdo rje sbrad gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM d+harma a b+hi Shaka hU~M/ de nas bya brkub sadang sems dpa' chen pa rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga Sha a b+hi She ka pU dzas pa
368a4(rgyud): ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sada' sems dpa' chen po 'phab pa na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dri gsung so// de nas rab tu bshang ba pa// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam
368a5(rgyud): ba ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen gsang zhes bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor zad srad bus bres// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas
368a6(rgyud): phyag rgya bri ba ste/ khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i go/ rnga rje dbyings kyi mdun dun/ nor bu'i phreng ba pad+ma nang/ na bus bskong pa'i nong bu'i/ mas/ de la de dag gi snying po na 'ong rnas so// oM tra~M/ oM ma chis ma
368a7(rgyud): ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rAt+na a b+hi She ka mA le hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+mo hUM/ oM me Ne raMt+na br-i ti sa ma ya hUM/ thad grub pa'i dkyil 'khod du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rdo rje rin chan dbusu ni// rdo rje nor bu rin po pra
368a8(rgyud): de yi phyogs ni thaMd// lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan// rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri/ de la da dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnam so// oM sarba at+pa sid+d+hi pra be ma hA badz+rI ratA sa ma ya
368b1(rgyud): mchi sarba ar+thAn me sAdz+dzadz+nyAHhU~M/ oM ma Ni shA A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ oM mdza hA sa ma ye a ku sha ma ta~M ku la dza/ oM sa Ni rA ga sa ma ye hUM i sa Ni sA d+hA d+hu/ de bzhin dkyil 'khong gnyis par yang / rdo rje shug
368b2(rgyud): kyis rgal nas no// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin/ nor bu de yi dbu su bri// de yi phyogs rnams thad// lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ nong bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o// de la da
368b3(rgyud): dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di go// oM ma ma thi bA ne tra A na ya ba she ku ru sarba ar+tha sa bA dA nA shI g+ho ti ShI a ku shi hUM/ oM ma Ni rAt+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shany+tsi hUM/ oM maNi rA sur+ya dz+wa la ya sarba ma hA rA dzi d+hU
368b4(rgyud): oM ma ti nAn+da d+h+wa dzA gr-i hU~M a~M ma Ni hA sa hA sa hU dzashugs kyis rgal nas ni// neng bu pad+me bra bar bya// dmi phyogs rnams zad du// ldag 'og go rims ji bzhin pa// de la dag gi snying tha
368b5(rgyud): rnamaso// oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+me nai tAM/ oM ma Ni rAt+na drA gra sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya ko She hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsakrany+dza.oM ma Ni bA sha gri hUM dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni// rdo rje
368b6(rgyud): shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi/ rin cha mchang 'babs deng gnas shing / las kyi pabargya ji bzhin pas/ yongasu bskor bang bri bar bya'o// nang bu'i mtsham mang ldan pa rnams// lnga 'ag
368b7(rgyud): garims ji ba'i nu ga/ de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnam so// oM rAt+na br-i Sh+Ti sA d+ha ya ma hA ma Ni hU/ oM ma hA b+ho dza sa ma ye ne tra A oM ma hA pA dza sa pa na sa ma ye rAk+Sha/ oM badz+ra ma thi raShA b+hA ka rA le Sha
368b8(rgyud): hUM oM ma Ni sa ma ya muSh+NI hUM/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams bcad de 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// khyod kyis tshul 'ang su la yangs
369a1(rgyud): smra zhig/ khod rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmal bar lhung ngar zhes bsgo la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ya shas bskrad par ba'o// rdo rje rin chan ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la rdo
369a2(rgyud): rje rin chen po// bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang // gzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur// don chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// rang gi gnas bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po nyid 'gyur// rdo rje
369a3(rgyud): rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/ ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na/ nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// mkha' la rdo rje ri chen bri// rang gi gan su de bas/ 
369a4(rgyud): na 'a nyid kyi grub pa'i rgyal por ra gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// ma hA badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma~M/ sa ma ya rAt+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ karma rAk+Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsam
369a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen ba'i snying kar ni/ rdo rje rimatshan bsgom par bya/ par+tha mas nas mngon par dang du bskur/ mchog tu rmad du 'byung ba 'gronamanyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi/ rim chen dpral
369a6(rgyud): bsgoms nas ni// rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na// thad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// lha la rdo rje rin chen sgom// chos kyi rgyal po nyid ni// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// rab maH
369a7(rgyud): bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen gtsug gtong bsgoms nas kyang // las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// las legs bde pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM badz+ra rarAt+na hr-i da ya a
369a8(rgyud): b+hi Shiny+tsa to/ oM badz+ra rAt+na a b+hi She ka dra/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa baM/ oM badz+ra rAt+na uSh+NI Sha a d+hiSh+Tha nas man// phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang // ras la sogs pas bris nas/ 
369b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen por de 'gyuraro// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// ras la sogs pa bri nas kyang / se de rdo rje bsgoms na ni// dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// ras la sogs la bris
369b2(rgyud): nas kyang // bsam gtan pag rgya bsgoms na ni// nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// ras la sogs pa rdo rje yi// rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi// phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni// bdag nyid las kyi
369b3(rgyud): bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnam so// badz+ra rarASh+Ta bir d+ha a d+hi tiSh+ThaHoM badz+ra rAt+na bim pa a b+hi She ka/ badz+ra rAt+na bi ma ba ku ru ga ser mo yang na dadu nga yang rung // rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur
369b4(rgyud): tam yang na rin chen gzhan yang rung / snying kar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// gser ram rin chen gzhan las bya sa/ rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni// nor che ba yi rgyal
369b5(rgyud): bor 'gyur// gsar ram rin chen gzhan dag gi// rdo rje rin chen/ bsgoms nas kyang / rang gi khar yang bcug na ni// tshig la dbang ba de 'gyuraro// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi rdo rje
369b6(rgyud): rin chen bsgoms na ni// gtsag tor da ni yang bsgoms na/ las rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM badz+ra rat+na hr-id ya A ba ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka ma hA
369b7(rgyud): ar+tha pA da/ oM badz+ra ratA pa tsa bA de/ oM badz+ra rAt+na ma hA karma bA de/ de nas nong bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bsla'o// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje nong bu che bcings la
369b8(rgyud): nor bu bud med bu gar bcug// de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni/ bud mad bu gang bcug nas kyang // dam tshig mchog bcings thad kyi// dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur
370a1(rgyud): rdo rje nong bu che bcings la/ chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nong bu// de ni bud mad bu gar bcug/ bla med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings/ bud pang bu gar las phyag rgya
