370a2(rgyud): bcings par 'gyur na las kun gyi// dngos grub bla na med bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnam so// oM ma hA sid d+hi oM sa ma ya a b+hi She ka sid+d+hi/ oM d+harmA sing+gi/ a~M karma sid+d+hi/ de nas dkyil
370a3(rgyud): 'khor 'dir phyag rgya chen po bcings bshad/ rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcings// gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams// sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob/ rdo rje bsdam pa
370a4(rgyud): byas nas kyang // mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang / srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni// mdzod spring bzhag pa dbang thob rdo rje na tshan tshul byas la// mdzub gnyis ngos dang mthab ngos
370a5(rgyud): sprad de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob// de nyid mtha ba gnyis mdzub gnyis ni// chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni// bcings nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni// chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ 
370a6(rgyud): kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste// bsgyung nas dpral ba nyid yang // bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang // bcings nas
370a7(rgyud): rin chen dbral bar ni/ bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ mthab gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni// mdzub gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni/ rdo rje nong bu chen po 'thob/ rdo rje bsdam pa byas na/ 
370a8(rgyud): kyangs rdo rje khu tshur gung mo gnyis/ nong bu 'dra bar byas nas ni// nor bu phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni/ gung mo nor bu 'drang bas la/ mdzub ma srin lag gnyis pad+mo// kha bya 'dras
370b1(rgyud): byas pas 'grub// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcings// sor mo theng sgreng ba rnams// nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni// 'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yis// rin chen tshul du byas
370b2(rgyud): nas kyang // srin lag mthe'u chung mnyams pa yi// khang bzhag lce ste nor bu sbyin// de la mdzub gnyis rdo rje ba// de ltar de gnyis lcags kyur bya// mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang // de nyid dga' bar rab
370b3(rgyud): sbyin pa'o// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing // mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste// srin lag ngos gnyis 'dud pa la// mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste// de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor// dpung pa'i spyi bor btu
370b4(rgyud): ba bya// nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyan// bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o// rdo rje bsdam pa bas na ni// mdzub mo srin lag gyen du smyung // de dag pad+mo 'dra bar bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur ba// de las
370b5(rgyud): mtha' mang rab sbyir bya// rdo rje rol gyi sbyar ba dang / dza rje khong mo tshul du bya// de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya// mdzub ga/ nyis don chen myu gu ru bya/ sor mo zad btung ba dang / de dag
370b6(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag pa ni// rin chen char gyis char 'bebs// de nyid go cha'i tshul du ni// snying kar rin chen gnyis byas pa/ mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba// dbus su mnyams pa khu tshur ro// de nas
370b7(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab// phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid// sgom pa sbyang ba bcing sa na ni// mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi// dngos grub bzhir 'gyur sbyin par byed// ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang ba'i
370b8(rgyud): sbyin/ dus rnams kun tu bcings mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o// rje gr-i traM saM gra kha d+hir taM shaM de kr-i be kra ra A/ me gsang ba gsang pa'i khu chung mchag/ gnyis bya
371a1(rgyud): las kun da// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las rin po che phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas
371a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa de
371a3(rgyud): ba 'di gsungaso// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She kadz+nyA no ta ta ma hUM/ de nas byang chub sada' chen po pag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'od gsung so// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na a b+hi Sheka sa ma ya hUM/ de nas
371a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sada' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa das pa 'di gsung so// oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU~M/ de nas byang chub sed sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sbyar gyis rang gi rig pa dang
371a5(rgyud): ba 'di gsung so// oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chubasems dpa' seng 'a chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba a rtsi She ka dz+nyA na
371a6(rgyud): hUM de nas byang chub sed sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ 
371a7(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bre// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// snying ka'i mtshan ma bri ba
371a8(rgyud): byang di nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying pa 'di rnams/ oM dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+ha dz+nyA ne trAM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma d+hi dz+nyA na a~M ku sha dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rA ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyAn duMSh+Ta/ a~M sa rbaM dz+nyAn duSh+yo mdzun
371b1(rgyud): oM dz+nyA na a b+hi Sha ka/ oM ma Ni d+hA na sUr+ya/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na d+ha dza/ aT+TaT+TA tA sa/ ma tsi dz+nyA na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma rbi t+ye ga/ oM ma tsi dz+nyA na ko Sha aM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsakra/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+ha Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni ratA baR+Sha hUM/ oM ma \u0f7f
371b2(rgyud): dz+nyA na nr-i t+yai pU dza sa ma ya tAM/ oM me Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM me NaM dz+nyA na muSh+NI/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o// khyod kyis chos ma mthong
371b3(rgyud): su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur tere zhes bsgo la norang bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris
371b4(rgyud): nas ni// bsgoms nas rim tshon don 'byin ces// sgra zhing gsol/ ba gdab par bya/ ting 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po zla sa nas ni// bsgoms nas rim chen byin cig ces/ 
371b5(rgyud): tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang / rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la/ dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po
371b6(rgyud): ras sogs la/ mnyam par gzhag pas bris nas kyang // bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes// las la gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM de ti sarba aH
371b7(rgyud): b+ha ga bI badz+ra gar+b+ha/ oM de ti sarba rAt+nab+ha ga bA badz+ra gar+b+ha/ i de hi sA d+ha d+harma na b+ha ga bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha satwa/ aM de ti sA d+ha karma b+ha ga~M bA badz+ra gar+b+ha/ nam kho'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// rnamakha'i snying
371b8(rgyud): po legs sems pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nasu// phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya// na mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // nor bsar pa ni/ 
372a1(rgyud): gsol bar ba// na mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// namakha'i snying po legs sems pa'i// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // pun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gangag/ nam
372a2(rgyud): pogs sam phyogs gzhan du// namakha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / las sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnam so// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha
372a3(rgyud): te sarba ar+d+ha na/ oM d+hA da gad+d+hi do ta sarba hAhA/ oM dz+nyA na gad+hA do ti sarba d+harma/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba karma mAM/ rdo rje snying po bris nas kyang // snying ga yong su sgom byas la/ gang gi tshen snying 'phang ba// de tshe grub
372a4(rgyud): pas nor ster// rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni// dris rnam par bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe mgo bo 'ang babyung ba// des ni ma don par dbang thog/ rdo rje snying po khar bcug la// de nyid du ni bsgoms
372a5(rgyud): nas kyang / gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa// de tshe des ni nga ga 'gru'o// rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor/ rab tu bzhag ste bsgobs nas kyang / gang tshe don 'bar gyur pa// de tshe de ni 'phang du lding bar 'gyur/ 
372a6(rgyud): la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM hr-i da ya gar+b+he de hi d+ha ne/ oM rA a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ oM b+ha ga gar+b+ha sid+d+ha/ oM rat+na gad+d+hoSh+NI Sha A kA shA gan+d+ha/ rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam gzhag/ 
372a7(rgyud): bas bsgoms na ni// bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la// i li rAt+na zhes brjod 'grub// namakha'i snying po'i dam tshig no// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la/ mi
372a8(rgyud): li rAt+na zhes brjod 'thob/ rdo rje snang ba ting 'dzin du/ rab mnyam gnag pas bsgoms nas ni// chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la/ tsi li rAny+dza zhes brjod 'thob/ nam kha'i snying po las kyi mchag rab man
372b1(rgyud): gzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams cad gsol btab la/ ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// oM i li/ oM mi li/ oM tsi li/ oM ki la~M/ de nas nong bu ye shes gsang
372b2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla'o// na mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sprad na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin
372b3(rgyud): rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyang la/ sdug pa de dang gang brtsas pa/ 'dzi
372b4(rgyud): rten kun gyis de dgang byed// namakha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam spyong la// thaMd 'grub par nges par 'gyur// de la dadag gi slong po na'ang
372b5(rgyud): rnam so// A kA sha gu h+ya dz+nyAn sa ma ya hUM/ tsit+ta gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ pri yA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA ra gu h+ya sarba lo ka rA gA ya hUM/ sarba gr-i t+ya dz+nyA ma sarba sid+d+him+ba pra yats+tsha hUM/ de nas phyag rgya che
372b6(rgyud): po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o// dngas grub kyang dadang 'dra'o// de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab/ rdo rje nor bu'i rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du brdeg par ba'o//  nas
372b7(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin// sA bA ra sa ra te ka ha de ti he ba ka na ya a de nas mdod na las kyi phyag rgya na gnas ci bzhin bang bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po
372b8(rgyud): chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dbang bskang ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs 'a
373a1(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di gsung so// sarbaHthA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de ngas byang chub sede sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba
373a2(rgyud): bdam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra hA kA ra a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen brdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM sarba ta thA ga nas man+ta a b+hi She ke trA/ de nas
373a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sed 'chen po rdo rje spyad gyis rang gi rig pa dpe ba 'dri gsung so// oM sarbad+harma a b+hi She ka rahI/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snga chags kyis ra ga ri
373a4(rgyud): padam pa 'di gsung so// oM bi shwa ya b+hi Sha/ nas byang chub sa dar sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa na mkha' myong ba ngas rang gi rig kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs// de nas rab tu shad
373a5(rgyud): ba las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje ngas dang 'dra ba la/ rin chen dgos pa nas bshad// dkyil 'khon po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil 'khor thang srang bus bre// de yi ngo
373a6(rgyud): su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni// rin chen mchod pa rnams dri'o// de lang dag gi phyag rgyan 'di rnam so// oM ma Ni rAt+na pu dzA gA/ oM sarba
373a7(rgyud): ar+g+haM sad+d+hi badz+ra rAH a b+hi She ka hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+ne hUM/ oM mthipA A kaR+Sha karba sa maM ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti karma pU dze pra bar+d+ha/ oM ma Ni rAhI sA d+ha ka ra pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na tiSh+Tha
373a8(rgyud): kapale/ oM ma Ni pA mA la pU dza~M/ oM maNi n+de s+phu r+ya lo ka pU rbe/ oM maNi Sh+Ta p+na dza bang+ka pU dza/ oM mchi k+She ar+thar+tha trAs pU dzi/ oM bad+mam gyis ni sa ma mo hU~M/ oM sadz+ra dzA gA du ta sa A d+hi ga rma/ 
373b1(rgyud): hUM/ oM mad+hi rAHtik+Sha sa ma ye ts+tshin+dahUM/ oM ma Ni rats+tsha \u0f7fkra sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma tsi rat+na b+hU She b+ha dab+hA hUM/ oM maNi rat+na karbi tri hUM/ oM ma Ni rAhA ka ba tse rAb+da mAM/ oM sa Ni rat+nadr-iSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM/ oM matigaH
373b2(rgyud): muSh+Ti hUM/ oM ma No shwa lA s+ye pU dzA ya to// oM ma Ni mA la a b+hi ra ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rAny+dza gI te pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rAhA nr-i t+yai pU dzA ya/ oM maNi ra d+hU pa pU dza ya oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dzA ya/ oM maH
373b3(rgyud): rAt+na A lo kaM pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/ oM ma tsi rat+na aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya dza/ oM ma ma Ni rarAt+na pA she hUM oM ma tsi rat+na s+pho Ta baM/ oM mi Ni rat+na A ba sha a/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
373b4(rgyud): 'dir cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas bcug ste/ 'di skad du bsgo bar ba'o// 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/ las
373b5(rgyud): kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam gzhag pa bsgoms nas kyang // mchod pa kun gyis mched na ni// sangs rgyas thad dbang du 'gyur// ting 'dzin
373b6(rgyud): gyi dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la// sangs rgyas thad mchod na ni// dbang bskur ba ni des 'thob bo/ rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin tu// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas
373b7(rgyud): thang rab mtshad na/ 'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas thaMd mchod gyur na// skad cig tu ni ngan kun 'thob// de la de dag
373b8(rgyud): rnying po na 'ang rnams e swAhA pU dza ba shi ku ru/ oM rAhA pU dzas ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM rAH pU dzA sad+ha rmA nA shA ya bA da~M/ oM rAH pU dza karma sarba a r+tha me swA d+ha/ denas gsong ba'i phyag rgya'i ye
374a1(rgyud): ni 'ang yin te/ rdo rje snying po cing 'dzin gyis/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas thang ma chang mni// 'jig rten thad des mgur 'gyur// dengs pag rgya chen po'i ye shes tu
374a2(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni// lhag 'og
374a3(rgyud): rims ji bzhin pa// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ tu d+hU ga dur+Na dza satha ra kA sha rba k+Sha kr-i te/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la/ las kyi phag rgya smra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi las
374a4(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog s+ho// de nas nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis rin po
374a5(rgyud): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhu gas nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so/ oM badz+ra rAhrI trA~M/ de na sa byang chub se der sems dpa' chen po pag nardo rjes rab gi
374a6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di gsungs/ oM badz+ra mA la/ de nas byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya'ong gsungaso// oM ma Ni rAt+na/ de nas byang chub seMdar sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sbyar
374a7(rgyud): gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra d+harma rat+na/ de nas byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rang gi phyag rgya 'ding gsungaso// oM bai shwa dr-i Sh+T+ri/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
374a8(rgyud): sede' chen po na mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bon pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyog rgya bzhi pa'i tshul da ni/ 
374b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yongasu brtag par bya// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste// khyod kyis su la ya'am smra shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje rin chen
374b2(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// dpral ba rab tu ba nag na ni// dngos grub tha~Md thob por 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin/ oM badz+ra raSh+Ti ba sho ka/ sarba sid+d+ha pra yats+tsha hU tra/ da nas
374b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab brlab ste/ khyod 'am yang na sdug pa 'am// bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // dpral ba gnyis ni sprad nas kyang / gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la ra sgrub pa'i snying
374b4(rgyud): bo ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra rat+na sa khi bid+yA d+hA ra be pra yats+tsha shAM g+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya ti ta ha hatra/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab/ dngos grub thad kyang
374b5(rgyud): de ba'in// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'a chenab na mkha'o snying pos don tha~Md grub pa zhes pa de'i snying po 'di gsu ngaso// oM badz+ra ma Ni b+hang sarba a tri sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha ho/ b+ha ga
374b6(rgyud): bAn badz+ra rAt+na hUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te/ de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes gas
374b7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams// chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas
374b8(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi ye shes bslab par bya'o// ras la sogs pa la yang sede' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub/ 
375a1(rgyud): // sems dpa' namakha'i snying po la lagaso zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod // legs rdo rje seda' khrong/ rdo rje rin chen khyod legs// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ rdo rje las ni khyod leg so/ 
375a2(rgyud): rdo rje thag pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/ mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin
375a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogaso// bam po brgyad pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi
375a4(rgyud): rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la ra shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya che// bcis
375a5(rgyud): nas mkha' dbyings tha du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin rlabs la/ rang gi snying du bcug nas ni// ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la/ zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas nyid 'thob des 'di
375a6(rgyud): sgrub// ci ste mi 'dod dngas grub bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // nga nyid chen po tshog ra rang // brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang // thad bdag ni yin bsgoms na// ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des
375a7(rgyud): dbye ba khri can dge ba yi// go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/ mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa// de ltar bdag
375a8(rgyud): ces bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob/ mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// chos rnams thad rang bzhin gyis// dag ces
375b1(rgyud): brjod na ngas par yang / sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur/ mi 'dod dngas grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngas grub kyi rgyud bshad / thad kyi ni kun dag par// las rnams thad
375b2(rgyud): sbyangs na ni// sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnam so// de nas phag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i dngas grub
375b3(rgyud): kun gyi rgyud 'di gsung so// dngos grub kun spyod sangs rgyas kyi/ bkas ni sen kun don tu// phyag rgya chen por bsgrubs na ni// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dab pa'i
375b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// phag rgya chen pa'i tshul du ni// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa// de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ skad cig gis ni gzo chen thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam
375b5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yod min te// chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing // bsgoms na gzi can nyid 'gyur// de nas las kyi
375b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dam pa'i dngas grub kyi rgyud bshad/ dge ba 'am yang na mi dge ba'i// gang gis las rnams byas pa ni// rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na/ skad cig gis ni gzo can 'gyur// de nas byang chub
375b7(rgyud): sedang sada' chen po phag na rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la dang po ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngas grub kyi rgyud bshad// 'dang chan ngo ba nyid kyis dag mu stegs ca
375b8(rgyud): gyi smad gyur la/ de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni// theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyog rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'od yin te// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni// khams
376a1(rgyud): / chen po bsgoms nas kyang / cho ga bzhin ldan khab byas nas/ skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad/ 'dod chags
376a2(rgyud): ngo bo nyid dag ces// smra bar gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni// 'dod chags pha rol pan rnyed de// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi brgyud bshad// bdagi lnga pa
376a3(rgyud): reg pa dang // mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung // sems can rnams ni thad kyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar pir 'gyur// de nas byang chub sadar sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi
376a4(rgyud): dam pa'i ngongos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs// de la phyag rgya chen pa dam pa'i dngas grub kyi rgyud 'di yon te// rdo rje po ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces// bskam
376a5(rgyud): babya ba rnams bsgoms nas// skad cig gi/ ni gzi can 'thob// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// na mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni// sen kun
376a6(rgyud): gyi re ba kun// yong su rdzogs par byed gyur cig/ skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad/ bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang // nor byin ra
376a7(rgyud): tu dga' byed cing // chos byung phyag rgya sman ni// gzi can tshe 'di nyid la 'thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad// dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nor sgrub pa la
376a8(rgyud): btsun ldan na/ gzi can 'gyur ci ste meng// mi 'dod dngas grub gang ma bzhin// rigs thaMd kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMd dam pa rnams kyi dngas grub thob pa'i tshas rgya
376b1(rgyud): pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po pag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
376b2(rgyud): yin te/ gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa// de la 'dod pas sbyong bar byed// sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi// ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub
376b3(rgyud): kyi rgyud bshad // 'dod pa rnams la chags bral mis// dam tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje dgas kyi dam tshig gi dngos gru
376b4(rgyud): rgyud ri 'di yin te/ sems cad don du khro min yang khro bo chen por rab tu ston// rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka'o// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di
376b5(rgyud): yin te/ rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang // de mi dgos pa de byed de/ pad+ma'i rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'da' ba dga' ba'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni
376b6(rgyud): 'di yin no// nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung // ci tsam nus pa nyid dud ni// smin pas nyi ma stong par ni// ba min dam tshig 'di yino// rigs tha~Md kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po
376b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phag d+hA'i ye shes kyi dngas grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yidan no// sal
376b8(rgyud): rgyas chos zhes gagaso zhes// brjod na chos nyid yig ni// sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che// ye shes mchog gi tshul yino// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin// da
377a1(rgyud): / chags las ni dag pa'i chos// bde ba thams cad dab sprid byed / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i cho ga 'di'o// de la rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin// sa
377a2(rgyud): rgyas bka' ni spang ba dang // sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir// de la khro bar ma gyur yang // ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub 'thob// de la pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'ang yin no// pad+mo chu yis pa chag
377a3(rgyud): ba de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes/ smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyuraro// de la nang bu rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med do// 
377a4(rgyud): sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni// nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi/ dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
377a5(rgyud): seMde' chen po phag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ 
377a6(rgyud): sems can tha~Md sangs rgyas dang // byang chub se dang nyid rnam su// ji bzhin du ni brtul nas su// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud na
377a7(rgyud): 'di yin no// dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang // byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje rigs kyi lus kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin// 
377a8(rgyud): ma rungs sems can gnang bye'i phyir// dgos pa gang dang gang byed de// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'od yin/ 'dzi/ 
377b1(rgyud): pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin// ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o// de la nor bu rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yino// sangs rgyas/ 
377b2(rgyud): dbang bskur de bzhin du// lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang // ra ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// las kyi don du bsgrubs pa'o// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub
377b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sede' chen po phyag na rdo rje nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos
377b4(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs// 'od ni sangs rgya sa sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med// de la
377b5(rgyud): 'dzi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ phyag rgya chen por bsgom sa na ne// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de bzhin
377b6(rgyud): gshegs rigs kyi// chos nyid dngos grub dam pa 'thog/ de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// phyag rgya chen por tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni bcings
377b7(rgyud): nas kyang // las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ de la 'di ri pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyi ni/ chos kyi
377b8(rgyud): phyag rgya brjod par cing // rdo rje tsha sa'i chos rnams kyi// chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ 
378a1(rgyud): / las kyi rdo rje snying gang bzhag chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms da // las kyi chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ rigs thams cad bya chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas pa
378a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sa 'char pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi ye shes rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
378a3(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sa de'i ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni// ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// nga ltar 'jig rten kun shes te// ngag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal/ 
378a4(rgyud): chags la dmar dang dmar sar khro// shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i// de yi bdag nyid nyid 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudade/ zla ba'i dkyil 'a
378a5(rgyud): 'od bcas pa'i// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// de ltar 'gro ba'i yid she so//  'dzin rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngas grub kyi rgyu de// dpal
378a6(rgyud): 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba// de lta bur ni yid she so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de// na mkha' 'am sa
378a7(rgyud): phyogs phra mo 'am/ yi ge phreng ba mtho ba 'gyur na/ mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar// shes pa de 'drar der sems shas/ de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud // 'jig rten kun la
378a8(rgyud): bltas nas kyang // ji lta bur ni snang 'gyur cing // mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par ba// de gnyis snyoms par zhugs nas ni// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang // byed pa dang ni 'chags pa/ 
378b1(rgyud): rung 'ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs/ snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na ni// sen gang dang gang yin pa'i// de dang de ni de bzhin du// sems can thang rtogs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
378b2(rgyud): pas gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub sade' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
378b3(rgyud): 'di gsung so// seda' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas gzugasu bdag bsgoms na// ye shes kyi ni tshul da yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di mi de bzhin gshig
378b4(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya mthong // seda' 'di ni phyag rgya nyid// mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur ro
378b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// de ltar bu yi dbyibs gyur pa'i// dbus na sngo sangs snang na ni// rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob// de la 'di ni pad+mo
378b6(rgyud): rigs kyi dngos grub ye shes yin te/ de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i'o// pad+ma sngon po rigs grub pa'i// dngos grub de ni legs par 'gyur// de la 'di ni nong bu rigs kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nas
378b7(rgyud): 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med las// 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro bar ni// mthong na dngas grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje sems sogs sems pa'i rnams/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od
378b8(rgyud): bcas par// dngos grub nas su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi mdun mthong na'o// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub sedar sems dpa' chen po phyag
379a1(rgyud): // rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'don de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par shes
379a2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sa de'i ting 'dzin gnas// lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o// de la
379a3(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// rdo rje sede'u phyag rgya che// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni// sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni// mngon shes ldan
379a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// mig gi rnams shas bskyed nas kyang // gang yang rung ba ngas bsams na/ 
379a5(rgyud): tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'ad sa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // ngas ni dgos pa gang bsam
379a6(rgyud): kyang shin tu ring na gnas thos zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sangs gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // sen gang la des brtags na// de yi sems ni ngas
379a7(rgyud): shes 'gyur// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// bdag gam sems can gang yang rung // yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa// gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pa ga
379a8(rgyud): rdo rjes gsung so// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa/ de nas gang yang rung bar ni// ting 'dzin gyis ni
379b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni// rab ma
379b2(rgyud): gzhag pas bcings nas kyang // cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// khros nas dgos pa thang ni// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin pa// rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis// ma
379b3(rgyud): shas kun bdag nyid du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sengs gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog rab mnyam
379b4(rgyud): gzhag pas bcings na no// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags/ 'phrul gyi mig la sogs
379b5(rgyud): tshul gyis// mngon shes thang thob 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs// de la 'di ni nor bu riHkyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub
379b6(rgyud): pa'i phag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// 'phral gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas
379b7(rgyud): rnams la mchod pas la/ mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsung so// rigs thad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ya shas kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas ba
379b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' se chen po pag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyo bden pa'i
380a1(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yino// bden pa'i rjesu 'jug pa yis/ tshig gis mna' ni 'dod byed cing // bden pa chen po bsrungs na ni// myung du sangs rgyas cing 'thob pa zhes sangs rgyas bcom
380a2(rgyud): rnams kyis gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'o// dam tshig la ni mna' bor la// rdo rje'i bden pa bsru
380a3(rgyud): na ni dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de la 'di ni rdo rje rags kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// shin tu 'di la
380a4(rgyud): 'dar bar dka'// rdo rje 'dzin la mna' do cing // bden pa 'di la bsrung bar ba zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzim gyis gsung so// de la 'don 'drar rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub rtsa
380a5(rgyud): rgyud do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+mo cha/ po rigs mchog gi/ pad+mo'i chos la mna' 'dong zhing / bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya// zhes bac+doMs rdo rje chos kyis gsungs/ 
380a6(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// 'di las shin tu 'dar dka' bar/ sangs rgyas chos la mna' mdor zhing // bden pa mchog 'di gsungs na ni// dbang bskur ba ni 'thob par
380a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po phag na rdo rjes de bzhin
380a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya swA/ 
380b1(rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas/ rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams// nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni
380b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod na// de nyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che// ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun// nyid kyis bcings na 'grub
380b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// hU~M zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thad ni/ 
380b4(rgyud): bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung // de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho natha~Md kyi dngas grub kyi rgyud// sarba shud+d+ha zhes brjod na// bdag gam yang na
380b5(rgyud): gzhan dag gis// bud med chags la sogs ldan na// thad du ni grol mi 'gyur/ de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi/ dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// oM zhes bya bas
380b6(rgyud): mdor bsdun// phag rgya thed 'grub 'gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga
380b7(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dngas grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub
380b8(rgyud): kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran pad cing // sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang / bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin ga
381a1(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/ rdo rje sede'i phyag rgya che// bcings nas de yi mdun du yang / rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni/ shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'din rdo rje
381a2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na// rdo rje sada' bsgoms na ni// nyid rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi
381a3(rgyud): rgyud/ 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / 'jig rten ma gan po bsgoms na ni// nyi ram du ni dngos grub 'thob/ rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas hA
381a4(rgyud): rgyud// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sedang chen da ba phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di na de bzhin gshes
381a5(rgyud): rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams casgrub pa'i rgyud// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ bdag ca dang ni mdun du yang // sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom// de nas dam
381a6(rgyud): thag tu 'grub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de la 'do ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyudado// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni
381a7(rgyud): 'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang / phyag rgya tha~Md bsgrubs nas ni/ grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sa des gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thad
381a8(rgyud): sgrub ba'i rgyud/ bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje byings/ rab mnyam gzhag pas sgom byed cing / phyag rgya zad bcings nani// dam thag tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyin
381b1(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi// pad+mo chen po'i rigs la gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/ pad+ma'i dbyibasu bsgom
381b2(rgyud): par ba zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub thad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud do// nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar// bdag nyid nyid kyis
381b3(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod pa/ kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsung so// rigs thaMd kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu
381b4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs hA
381b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/ rje dbyings dbang phyug rgya ni/ rang mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / snying ka mdzod spu mgrin skye bor// bzhag nas sangs rgyas
381b6(rgyud): byin rlob bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud yin// rdo rje sede'i ting 'dzin gyis/ sems dpa' rdo rje dam
381b7(rgyud): byas la/ snying ka mdzod spu mgrin pa dang // spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sengs gsung so// de la 'di nani rdo rje rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// rdo rje hUM gaM
381b8(rgyud): phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / stong ka mdzod bu mgrin spro bor/ bzhag na nyidadu byin gyis rlobs ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi byin
382a1(rgyud): / gyis brlabs pa bas grub kyi rgyud// 'jig rten dbang ba mating 'dzin gyis/ rdo rje brjod ma byas la/ snying ga mdzad bu mgrin skya bang/ byin gyis brlab par bzhag par bzhes bac+doMn
382a2(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// snying ka mdzod bu mgrin spyi bor// 
382a3(rgyud): gyis brlab par bzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub seda' chen po phag na
382a4(rgyud): rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nga bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
382a5(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// dpral bar ratu bzhag byas na// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis// dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsum
382a6(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa// sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni// brtsam kha byas nas ngos gzhir yang
382a7(rgyud): phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur// da la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni// bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang // phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin no// 
382a8(rgyud): rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dbang bskung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi rdo rje btsongs nas kyang // mgo bor bzhag te dbang bskur/ sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig
382b1(rgyud): rten gyi/ dbang phyug gi ni dbang bskung zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen byu gu bcing
382b2(rgyud): dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi// dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungs// rigs thad kyi dbang bskur
382b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sede' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring
382b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyu dado// rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni/ phyag rgya mnyam par gzhag pa btsongs// zlos shis sngags kyi rig pa ni// myur du dngos grub
382b5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasakyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud// sa de'i byon rlabs chu
382b6(rgyud): gyis ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// zlos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyung zhes bac+doMs sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdorje
382b7(rgyud): rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyis rgyud// 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste/ bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur
382b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngongos grub kyi rgyudo// 'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas// khams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ snying
383a1(rgyud): la sogs bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos
383a2(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud// mkha' kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rab mnyam gzhag par bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das namakha'i snyid
383a3(rgyud): bas gsung so// rigs tha~Md kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag
383a4(rgyud): rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// rab tu ma gzhag pas dang por ni// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/ 
383a5(rgyud): de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs nad sa grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ga sung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa
383a6(rgyud): dngas grub kyi rgyud do// gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis// gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod byed cing // bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi// mchod pa bas na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje saH
383a7(rgyud): dpas gsung so// de la 'dren rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// khro ba rdo rje mchod chen pa// khro bo gsang ba brjod byed cing / khro bo'i khu chur rab sbyar na// myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub zhes
383a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'din pad mi 'jigs kyi mchod pa'i dngas grub kyi rgyudado// mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i// tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang / maud dang gi gos su/ 
383b1(rgyud): nas ni// dngas grub myub tu 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'dzin nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// gdugs dang 'phan da
383b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyis// rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing // sbyin pa thad byin na ni// nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs// nyid la byin gyis brlabs so/ 
383b3(rgyud): ldan rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur// cho 'phral rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi// dngos grub thad 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sengs gsung so// rigs thams
383b4(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu de// da nas byang chub seMda' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin pa
383b5(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung sa// de la 'dini de bzhin gshegs nga'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yim
383b6(rgyud): lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin no// 'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes// de na rab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa mi dngas grub 'thob/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
383b7(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngan/ 
383b8(rgyud): shes ldan dag gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur nas bac+doMs rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/ khro ba
384a1(rgyud): mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam gnag pas bsgoms na yang / mngon shes ldan bdag gyur nas// dngas grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
384a2(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga ni bdag
384a3(rgyud): gyur nas/ dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyi gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud// mchod pa'i mtshan
384a4(rgyud): shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgo mas na ni// mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas/ dngos grung kun gyi mcho ga tu gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// rigs tha
384a5(rgyud): kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grang rgya cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub seda' chen po phyag na rdorjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye
384a6(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sa de'i ting 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing
384a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i
384a8(rgyud): shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud// rdo rje sode'i ting 'dzin gnas/ phyag rgya chen por sgoms byed cing // byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bac+doMs byang chub sed 'a chen
384b1(rgyud): pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la// byang chub chen po'i ye
384b2(rgyud): 'di bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang
384b3(rgyud): phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas bzlas// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
384b4(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas// las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed// byang chub chen po'i yeng shes 'di
384b5(rgyud): bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes pa ma ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsung so// rigs thaMd kyi dang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu
384b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ma
384b7(rgyud): bar bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sen don rnams rab 'byed cing // sangs rgyas rje su dran gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das
384b8(rgyud): rdo rje chags pas gsungs de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngas grub kyi rgyud// ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas// sangs rgyas zad mnyes byed ces \u0f7f
385a1(rgyud): sems dpa' skams byed cing / dacid bsrung du byung bad/ mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub tho gas bcom ldan 'das rje sems dpas gsungs de la 'dzin rdo rdzogs kyi
385a2(rgyud): par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba dang / sen don ni sbyang ba'i phyir// rngas pas mngon spyod pas na ni// rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
385a3(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsung so// de la 'dri na pa d+mo rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ chags pas kun tum pa dang / khyams dang snying rjes chos sgra dang // mi 'jigs su/ 
385a4(rgyud): sgyid byed pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis ma nyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyad gyis gsungs// la 'di nor bu'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ 
385a5(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang / nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing // de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor// 'di ni sa ngas rgyas mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
385a6(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying pos gsung so// rigs thad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyad // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshags pa thad kyi rigs kyi dang
385a7(rgyud): du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin pa// 'dod chags la ni mnyas mi bya
385a8(rgyud): son kun gyi don du brtson// 'di ni sangs rgyas dab du byed ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngas grub kyi rgyud// 
385b1(rgyud): sten bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis// su rata s+tho zhes smra zhing / rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsung so// de la 'dir rdo rje rigs
385b2(rgyud): kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams/ dag pa lus can skyabs sbyin dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// bsad na yang na dbang du 'gyur zhes ba
385b3(rgyud): rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// pad+mo 'dab ma kha 'byed cing // 'dod chags dag la kun rtog la// gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing
385b4(rgyud): 'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs// de la 'a ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado// sangs
385b5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje ran chen nyin re rer// spyi bor bzhag te dbang bskur na// sangs rgyas tha dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsum
385b6(rgyud): rigs zad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas byang chub sed chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs/ 
385b7(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyis bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// sems can kun don ma mthong zhing // sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la/ yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni// bsad na
385b8(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// dang
386a1(rgyud): / grub thams cad ma thob la/ rigs rnams kyang nami brtson zhing / rdo rje kun tu brtags nas ni/ bsad da dngos grub byung du thob ces bcom ldan 'das pagan rdo rjes gsung mo/ de la
386a2(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// ma rungs mi brtul khro med cing / de bzhin sed mi 'dul la/ bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thob bang na// hUM zhes pa bas bsad par bya zhes bcom lda/ 
386a3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// snying rje med cing byams med la/ sems can ma rungs mi spong 'ang // bdag nyid kyi ni bslus na yang // 
386a4(rgyud): bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nong bu rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi
386a5(rgyud): rgyudo// mi gtong bdag la nor med cing / nar m+b+ha/ ra ba dang gnad byed la/ dbul por gyur la sen rnams/ bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams
386a6(rgyud): cad yongasu skong bas gsung so// kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na/ de dag drang bar bya ba'i per// bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das
386a7(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub seda' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
386a8(rgyud): kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// sin thams cad mi gtong zhing // rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag
386b1(rgyud): rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni srung ba rmad kyi mchog ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 
386b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig/ lan gcig tsam yang brjod gyur na// 'di ni srung ba brtag chen po/ skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de
386b3(rgyud): la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi srung ba'i dngas grub kyi rgyud// rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi// rdo rje hUM la mos byed pa/ 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la srung zhes
386b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// 'dod cha/ gas dag cing byams pa che// thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin
386b5(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang gis mtshan bzlos pa// srung ba 'di ni rmad du che zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsu nga so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ 
386b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can gtong bad par// ci nus par de sbyor byed cing // nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// srung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung bas gsung so// rigs thad kyi srung
386b7(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
386b8(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhes par gsol// gang gis sems can thams cad brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon/ 
387a1(rgyud): bda'atsha rgya ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ba chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ phagan rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing zin
387a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyis legaso leg so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs po thad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba bin te/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhi
387a3(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni lags bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs// rdo rje chos ni khyod legaso// rdo rje las ni khyod la
387a4(rgyud): song de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzog so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin ga
387a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig sa pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// sangs rgyas byang chub ting
387a6(rgyud): nge 'dzin// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms na ni// byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur/ bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni dban/ 
387a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// se de'i rdo rje snying kar bcings// nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs bya ste/ 
387a8(rgyud): ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ rang gis las rnams ma grub kyang // gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungaso// de la 'din rdo rje rje/ 
387b1(rgyud): dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudo// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub thob par ma gyur na// hUM gis phyag rgyas bsad na ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
387b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsung so// de bzhin 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud// ting 'dzin pag rgya bcings nas kyang / rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang / bdags
387b3(rgyud): chung ma 'am gzhan chung ma// sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dod pas gsungaso// dral 'di ni nor bu rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// dbang po gnyis ni
387b4(rgyud): mnyam sbyar la// bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing / sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po// phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhad pas gsungaso// rigs dam pa thams
387b5(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas bang rkub se de'i chen po pag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegapa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung
387b6(rgyud): so/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyudado// sa ma ya ste zhes brjod cing // bud med kun la chags byas la// sen don gyis mi skyon// nges par sangs rgyas
387b7(rgyud): des mnyas zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// 'dod chags la ni brnyas pi ba/ bud med
387b8(rgyud): kun dang rje byed pa/ rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsungs// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang nAM/ 
388a1(rgyud): rgyud dong ngagasod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod/ lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa/ 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsu
388a2(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/ mu sdigs rnal 'byor ma dag la// dag pa'i bdag nyid da
388a3(rgyud): tshig ni/ bsrungs na dngas grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyudo// rdo rje snying
388a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nong bu sngar bcings la/ ma rung sa rnams kyi nang phrogs na// dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin pa chas gsung so// rigs thams
388a5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chu ba seda' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di
388a6(rgyud): gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dgos pa thad bas nas kyang // sangs rgyas
388a7(rgyud): ba yi dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// sems can kun la chags byed cing // yul
388a8(rgyud): skyo ba ma gyur pa/ bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni// gosang tshas pas grub papa sbyin na// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsung so// de la 'di rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngas grub gsang ba'i rgyud/ rna ba
388b1(rgyud): / rnal 'bor hUM zhes pa// phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzid gnas// mi 'grangs rnal 'bor 'di bsad ces// rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes dgyel// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsung
388b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi ngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud med kun dang rtse bad cing // chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
388b3(rgyud): 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di de nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyis ni mnyab sbyar la/ ra ba thad yongs bskangs nas/ bud
388b4(rgyud): pad dam ni sdug pa yi/ dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsung so// rigs tha mas cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu // de nas bang
388b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po pag rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di ga sung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos
388b6(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// rdo rje sapas dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rje su dran bsgoms la// bud med lus kyi bu gar blugs// bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
388b7(rgyud): mdzad kyis gsungaso// de la 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub bsang ba'i rgyud// rdo rje sa de'i ting 'dzin gnas/ bu gnas ni de bzhin zhugs// bud mang lus su lags kha
388b8(rgyud): byas sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam gzhog/ 
389a1(rgyud): bas bcings nas kyang / khros nas bu gang zhugs na ni// yid kyis de ni dbab bar bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub
389a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud// chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad+mor ting 'dzin gyis// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrungs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mod+mas gsum
389a3(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings/ bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// nyid phab nas gang byed 'gyur zhes
389a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsu rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'i rgyud// denas byang chub sada' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin ga
389a5(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khong dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin pa/ shigs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang
389a6(rgyud): ba'i rgyud de/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bo zhing // phyag rgya bud med rnams kyi bskor// deng ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya// gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang / 
389a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas la ni nyid smra// pad+yabye ta bsnyungs pa bi bo da ta swa mA ma sarba// rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni// tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod/ sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i// gsang ba'i// 
389a8(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud// rdo rje da
389b1(rgyud): dang 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni// thams cad kyi ni mchog tshul te// dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas myung bar ni/ 
389b2(rgyud): su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+wa~M hau// badz+ra satwa Ad+ya sid+d+h+ya mAM/ tsos brjod snying po 'di bzlas te/ bsgrubs na thad 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni// mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bac+doMs
389b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni// dkyil 'kha
389b4(rgyud): thams cad 'jug par yang // mkhas pas lags par bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang // dngos grub 'di/ bas pa gsol dad cing // rA ga tra si sa b+ha ta// 'dod chags las ni
389b5(rgyud): khyod gyur zhes smra na kun tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs// de la 'di ni pad+mo rags kyi dkyil 'khor thad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu de// pad+mo'i
389b6(rgyud): ni thams cad kyi// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod pa ba// rA ga d+harma ma hA pad+ma pra sing b+ha la ga ma bi bo// de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor
389b7(rgyud): ni/ kun gyi des ni dngos grub bo// ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// nong bu chen po
389b8(rgyud): rigs rnams ni// don kun 'grub pa'i tshul du yang / dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni/ zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya/ sarba pri ya sid+d+hi mA/ rA ga shi sid+d+hi mA/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ma hA satwa/ de skad
390a1(rgyud): / smras nas dkyil 'khod kun/ zhugs nas mchod gsad bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis/ bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub pa
390a2(rgyud): 'gyur ga tsho myur du mi 'grub na// de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// rigs thad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
390a3(rgyud): rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gsha
390a4(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu dngade/ ta thA ga ta ma hA de bI ta/ pri ya sarba su kha pra ta/ ba dan las byung ba'i tshig bden pas/ bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhi
390a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i da ngos grub kyi rgyud do// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// 'don de nyid gsang ba yi// rdo rje tshul gyis
390a6(rgyud): 'di smros shig/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya haM/ tA me bar+ya ti tiSh+Tha/ sarba kA ya mA ma ri shwa ra dza/ badz+ra gar+b+he sa mu tak+Shi pa// rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che// de nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas// lus kun la ni brtan
390a7(rgyud): 'gyur nas// ji bzhin myur du dngos grub po// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshigs gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha sa ma ye/ 
390a8(rgyud): sa ma yo he taM pri ya mAM// zhes bskul myur du chags gyur na// rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang
390b1(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud+d+ha bud+d+ha ma hA satwa/ bAr+ya ta me a ti bri ya// zhes ni bskul na byung ba yang / rje su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor
390b2(rgyud): bu rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sarba karma ma dbad+ya wa tA ma me sid+d+ha d+ha badz+ra tsi// rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar/ rjesu chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das
390b3(rgyud): na mkha'i snying pos gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// de nas byang chub seda' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba
390b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos gru rab kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir// ri mo'i par
390b5(rgyud): rgya'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas btsun mo rab spa bar// shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsung so// de la
390b6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sen kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun la bde sprin zhing / sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni// dam tshig mchog gi
390b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung so// 'di ni sangs rgyas thad kyi// gsang ba'i mchog ste smad che ba// dad ldan shes nas dang byas nas// bsgrub dka'
390b8(rgyud): ba yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pa'i dag pa'i chags bral gyi// sa ni don gyi yid
391a1(rgyud): phyung nas// mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste// lta ba ngan pa'i gtsong rong ljang // theg pa tsha la dgod pa'i phyir// gsod pa'i tha tshigs mchog yin te/ de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur zhes
391a2(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de lo 'di ni pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // mi gtsang
391a3(rgyud): zhes ni ci phyir brjod// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bud med chags
391a4(rgyud): phyir rimatshan rnams// rtag tu legs par bsag par bya// bud na/ dad bla med rin chen zhes// bsams nas de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas
391a5(rgyud): gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos gru kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa zad
391a6(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bud med chags rnams yongs bskor la/ kun nas
391a7(rgyud): rtses pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang / mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
391a8(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i dngas grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rab dgas rab skyo ba na// rab dga' las byung bad pa de/ phyag bzhis pos ni mchod pa'i phying // phul na myur du grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
391b1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ hUM gis dam tshig bcings nas ni// skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni// 'khyud par gyur pa'i bde ba de// 
391b2(rgyud): mdini 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gad
391b3(rgyud): du bltas nas ni/ bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de yi 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo spyad gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu
391b4(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgya/ nas kyang / bud meda' khyad pa'i longs spyod de/ mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
391b5(rgyud): rin chen gyis gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dang / grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub se da' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa zang
391b6(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud dade// rdzogs sangs rgyasu bdag bsgoms la/ 
391b7(rgyud): nas sus kyang mi tshor bar// gzhan gyi bud med rtse byed/ mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
391b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang / rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing / de nas rdo rje glu blangs la/ rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bsrung mchog glu dang / 
392a1(rgyud): gar gyis bde ba las// bde ba gzhan gyis mong min te// de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten gsum
392a2(rgyud): las rnam rgyal sgom// cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang // gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs// de la 'di ni pad mo
392a3(rgyud): rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas/ gsang ba'i tshul ni ci bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par/ 
392a4(rgyud): 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi gsang ba'i mtsha pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud dade/ don kun grub pa'i
392a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis/ gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi par rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsung so// 
392a6(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i
392a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las/ sen rnams la chags tshul gyis// sa pa
392a8(rgyud): rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur na// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i das
392b1(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud/ sems can thog ma tha ma med// namakha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'dod pa 'gro ba kun bdag po// sems can kun gyi sems gang ni// brtan phyir
392b2(rgyud): sems dpa' 'asdu bya'o// rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na/ ngas pa rdo rje nyid gyur pa/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sada' nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan sa da' de nyid de/ rdo rje bzhed pa de bzhi
392b3(rgyud): gshegs// nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// thams cad kyi ni rigasu 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma
392b4(rgyud): med pa'i sems dpas gsungaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad+mo'i rigs dag pa/ de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog ces bcom ldan
392b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungs rigs thad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rgyu do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seMdal
392b6(rgyud): chen po pag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs po'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon pa
392b7(rgyud): brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni/ rdo rje seder thugs la gnas// mnyam par gzhag las ting 'dzin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub ces sangs rgyas
392b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyudade/ rab tu rtoT phyir rdo rje ste// bzung ba'i tshul gyis lhags
393a1(rgyud): g+hu yin// phra la rtags phying mngar yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya/ smras pa'i phyir ya da chen gsungs// gzi brji tshul gyis nyis ste/ rgyal mtshan legs par
393a2(rgyud): sgreng ba gsungs// 'dzub phyir bzhad par grags pa la// 'dod chags dag par pad+mo yin// ral gris nyon mongs dag gcod yin// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste// tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes
393a3(rgyud): bye rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje/ mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin// 'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa/ rdo rje seda'i kun
393a4(rgyud): 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs// bsgoms nu myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsung so// rigs
393a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub pa sang ba'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub se de'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ga
393a6(rgyud): ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// 
393a7(rgyud): rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la/ lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
393a8(rgyud): rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya// rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs ni
393b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i// gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang / nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni// bdag nyid tsha ba'i phyag rgya cherab/ shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs// 
393b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni// skye bo 'gas ni bcings gyur na// shin tu 'da' bar mi bya ba// de ltar de bzhin
393b3(rgyud): gshegs kun gyi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na// ma shi bar du mi mnga' bar/ shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam
393b4(rgyud): tshig gis gsung so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdo rgyal bas rdo rje'i ngag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin
