393b5(rgyud): 'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang // des ni chos kyi dngas grwa ba 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba
393b6(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud/ rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // bka' nyan pa yi las don// shas na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
393b7(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyu// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sede' chen
393b8(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongasu gzung zhing byin gyis brlab so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thad gcig tu 'dus nas/ brtse/ 
394a1(rgyud): // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po pag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba yin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po sngon
394a2(rgyud): 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rjes deng khyod legaso// rdo rje rim chen khyod lags// rnga rje chos ni khyod legaso// rdo rje las ni khyod legs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
394a3(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rigs thams cad kyi brtag pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas po'i rgyud rdzogaso// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po phag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
394a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos gru/ kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sa kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rjesu
394a5(rgyud): dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'dzin ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms na yang // bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
394a6(rgyud): gshegs pas gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu dang / chags pas rjesu dran tshul gyis// sems dpa' thang ting 'dzin gnas/ rab
394a7(rgyud): mnyam gzhag pas bskams na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsung so// de la 'din rdo rje rigs kyi chos dam/ 
394a8(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugasu// bsgoms nas 'dun dang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bcom lnga/ 
394b1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni// bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog
394b2(rgyud): ldan par// 'dul bar de ni rab byed ces// bcom ldan rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni// bsgoms na
394b3(rgyud): mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// phun tshogs don ni ngas 'thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs// rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
394b4(rgyud): cha ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas byang chub sa mas dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi tshe sa kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'dzin
394b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cha sa kyi dam tshig dngos grub kyi rgyud/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran gyur/ la/ rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na// sangs
394b6(rgyud): rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sa dang
394b7(rgyud): ting 'dzin du// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing // badz+ra satwa zhes brjod na/ rdo rje seder nyid 'gru bo zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub
394b8(rgyud): kyi rgyud// khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lug su// dran pad mdun du de bzhin te// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na/ dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsung so// dpadzin
395a1(rgyud): pad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing // sid+d+ha sid+d+ha zhes brjod na// dngos grub das pa thob par 'gyur
395a2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// da la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud dade// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang // sid+d+ha sa~M
395a3(rgyud): zhes brjod de// don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos kyis gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi tshig rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas pa
395a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshe gas pa thad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'a/ gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
395a5(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu/ da de/ dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med// ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung / ste/ a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni// skye ba med par dgongs pa
395a6(rgyud): ste/ phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang / yi ge kun gyi ye shas ni/ bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dang / 
395a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde
395a8(rgyud): 'di ni dad pa yis// dad nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na/ dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi/ 
395b1(rgyud): ya shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa'i sems can phan don du// sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang // sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba'i phyir// bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
395b2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsung so// de la 'dod pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes/ dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang // thog ma
395b3(rgyud): tha mar 'dri bsgoms na/ chos kyi dngos grub thob par gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// ngal 'di ni nong bu rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub
395b4(rgyud): kyi rgyud de/ sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing / bsam pa thad rdzogs byed cing / chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das
395b5(rgyud): chos rin chen gyis gsungs// rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// nas byang chub se de'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
395b6(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi lab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi ni ting
395b7(rgyud): 'dzin las/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa// 'dir sgom par byas na kyas dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshes
395b8(rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngas grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyis// bla med dang ni las mang rnams// sems dpa' kun 'gyur thad dang // shes na yang ni grub par 'gyu/ 
396a1(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa dag pa rgyu yi phyir// 'tshams med byed las mi
396a2(rgyud): zlogs na// gsod pa'i las la dad pa na/ das ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdiH
396a3(rgyud): kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ kun dag pas na dgos pa kun// des pad las 'di yin no bar// shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs
396a4(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// srid ldan dbul po thang kyi// rtag tu bsam pa kun bskang la// don kun grub pas kun bdag ni// grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// nas
396a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsung so// rigasathams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'char
396a6(rgyud): bo phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos
396a7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyudade// rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul// 'brang pa kun gyi sbyor na ni// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bac+doMs kyi gsung so// de la 'di ni da
396a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i e shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob ma yin bu yin pa yi// mdun phyag rgya mi brjod de// de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'gru/ 
396b1(rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sna nas hUM byung ldan gyur la// rdo rje khra zo'i ting ba
396b2(rgyud): gyis dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs// de la 'di ni pang mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'o ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad+ma chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ 
396b3(rgyud): rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni/ 'dod pa'i dngas grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rigs kyi phra mo'i rigs ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo
396b4(rgyud): rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ shin tu phra ba'i lha 'bar bas// don ni thad 'dre na par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsung so// rigasaH/ mas cad phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas
396b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po phag na rdo rjes de bzhin gsheg sa thams cad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyad gyi
396b6(rgyud): ye shes kyi ngos grub kyi rgyudade// gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin// sgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na// gang tshe mkha' la ska sa 'dra/ dkar po rgyug par des des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gi/ 
396b7(rgyud): thob 'gyur zhes/ khyer cang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// rtog pa kun las bsgrub par byanas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de la 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyadan gyi ye shes kyi das
396b8(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud/ gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed dngos po yod par 'gyur// de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams// mkha' rgyug 'gro ba 'am 'ong yang rung // mthong na rdo rje spyad dag par/ shes pas mchod na dngos grub/ 
397a1(rgyud): / ni bla na med pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ g.yas pa 'ab ni g.yon phyogs kyi/ mkha' la
397a2(rgyud): namakha'i dbyings nyid ni// sprin 'drang byung du 'khor ba yang // mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang / rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de// mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la// phyag rgya de ni bzung da ni// rdo rje spyad ni 'grub par 'gyur
397a3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs// de la 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi spyad gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ gang tshe skya 'ab dpar ba dang // dkar ba 'ab ser ba 'am sna tshogs kyi// dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i
397a4(rgyud): tshe dgongs 'gyung 'khor lo'i spyad 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo/ rdza pad+mos gsung so// de la 'di ni dang bu rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de// mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang // gas
397a5(rgyud): ba 'dra ba ni// gang cha mkha' mthong mkha'i mig/ do ni 'grub par 'argyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas/ 
397a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyu de/ de nas bya chub sade' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dpa
397a7(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud dade/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// 'dod chags bde ba rnams smin phyir// gtso bo thad mchod byas pa// sangs rgyas dngas grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
397a8(rgyud): gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags bdag ces sgom rnyed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na// rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can ma'am// dngos grub
397b1(rgyud): dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhed pas gsung so// de la 'din rdo rje rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod par bu byas pa/ 
397b2(rgyud): gsum rnam rgyal ba 'dra ba'i// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ nang du song ba'i
397b3(rgyud): kyi ni// 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing // dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis// sangs rgyas mngon par mchod na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu sbyin ras gzigs kyi
397b4(rgyud): dbang pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ rdo rje snying por mnyam gzhag la// bsam pa g.yos pas bdud na ni// phag la rtag tu brtson pas la// dbang
397b5(rgyud): bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin tha/ chos gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi tshi ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub seda'achen
397b6(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshigo gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 
397b7(rgyud): 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas/ e ma'o sems can don rnams la// skyo bar gyur pa gang bshad rmang // 'di ni las kyi dam tshig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du/ 
397b8(rgyud): bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob parar gyur zhes sangs rgyas bac+doMldas kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
398a1(rgyud): rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems cad kun la bde sbyid pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa
398a2(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje hUM gi rdal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos grub thob
398a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag da rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni bang mo rags kyi las kyi dab tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ bde ba thad rab sbyir ba'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag
398a4(rgyud): yin te// bdag nyid 'gro 'dul bskur gnas la mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pa chags pas gsung so// de la 'di nong bu rigs kyi las dam
398a5(rgyud): tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sen ku nal don chen sbyid// kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te// don kun gru ba pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur
398a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudado// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phag na
398a7(rgyud): rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudade/ rang gi ting nge nge 'dzin
398a8(rgyud): ba yis// g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni// go char bcings te spyi bar bzhag/ shin tu yang bsrungs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
398b1(rgyud): ba'i las kyi rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/ ri mor bris nas mtshan bsring ste/ mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa/ de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'ad/ 
398b2(rgyud): 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris la// de yi mig gi phyog su ni// mdzub mo'i sen mo bcugs na yang / bud med/ 
398b3(rgyud): mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de// lag pa gnyis pad+mo blangs// 'dod chags dag pa lta byed/ 
398b4(rgyud): cing // rdo rje lta bas bud med de// bltas na yang dga' bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs// de la 'odoni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu
398b5(rgyud): rdo rjen chen ting 'dzin gnas/ lag pa gta dang bu bzung / hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med dkun la 'du byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUMgs gsung so// rigs / 
398b6(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyang ngo // de nas byang chub se 'a chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin ga
398b7(rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grungab kyi rgyudade/ mchod pa'i las kyi cho gang sbyang/ gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa// de dang de ni gsol btab ste// mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// zhes
398b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudade/ rdo rje se de'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mchod ba cha gar spyad// 
399a1(rgyud): / dgos pa gang zhig smras pa de/ myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu
399a2(rgyud): khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang / rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod che nubs// mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa// de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs// 
399a3(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad+mo'o rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang // mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de yi dngos grub
399a4(rgyud): thams cad thob// ces bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzi na pas gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gdug pa la
399a5(rgyud): mchod byas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang bas mas pa// de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'a des rdo rje snying pos gsungs// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi
399a6(rgyud): dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
399a7(rgyud): ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/ dngos grub das pa 'thob pa
399a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sode'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado// kun gyi
399b1(rgyud): bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste/ sems dpa' bdag ces byin rlabs la/ bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
399b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi brlangs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyudade/ sems dpa' ji bzhin pas
399b3(rgyud): rgya bzhin/ phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya thang bsgrubs par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'din pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis
399b4(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyu dang / chos kyi phyagargya'i tshul gyis ni/ rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la/ ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun/ senga' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// ces bcom ldan 'a
399b5(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang \u0f7fsa gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi byin gyis brlab/ sa pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kun la dbang bsku
399b6(rgyud): dang mchod pa dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsung so// rigs thad kyi phyag rgya
399b7(rgyud): sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa tha
399b8(rgyud): kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gas // theg pa chen po mngon 'dul pa'i/ mdo 'di lags par bshad pas ma/ 
400a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khyad legs/ rdo rje na chen khyod legs/ rdo rje chos ni khyod legs// rdo rje las ni khyod leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las ba/ 
400a2(rgyud): bathams cad kyi gsang ba rgyu pa ma chag rgyas brdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi na lan cing 'grus pa// bam pa dgu gdanas kyang chub sems pa 'acan du phyag ni rje tshigs
400a3(rgyud): bcad pa 'di gsung so// lta ba ngan cing chags bral la// gsang ba 'din mi rigs te// sems can kun la phan dod du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas yang byang chub seda' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
400a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byadang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs// de la 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud/ de la 'dzi
400a5(rgyud): ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje
400a6(rgyud): tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/ dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas
400a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs po thang la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la
400a8(rgyud): 'dri bzhes bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba t+ya thA ga ta pU dz+ra bas+tha nA la/ At+ma nan n+yA t+ya yA ma sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ras ShA a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mA~M/ oM sarbo ta thA ga tA pU rdzas te/ She kA ya AH/ 
400b1(rgyud): / nir+yAH yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra hA a b+hiShiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra ba nA ya At+ma na ni drArA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hapra pra bta ya mA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karba Na Ad+hA na ni r+yA ta yA ni/ 
400b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mA~M/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thad la chags pa dang ma brel la khe zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzun brnyan mdun du
400b3(rgyud): tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myung bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems pas gsung so// ci ste bla na med par
400b4(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod na ni de nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs// de'i seda' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bri zhing sed
400b5(rgyud): chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnam suM bri'o// de nas ri mo'i sku gzu gsal mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzub b+ha ba'i tshul ji lta ba
400b6(rgyud): bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nas langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs
400b7(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bci/ 
400b8(rgyud): lang ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyad sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing grol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthara' mtshan thog zag ngal mi gso ba cung zad
401a1(rgyud): // tsam zhig phyag rgya grol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas phyag rgya 'bang zhing 'dab la 'phang zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyuraro// de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin
401a2(rgyud): du na mkha' la lding bar 'gyur// gzugs ci dga' ba dang / mi snang ba dang las thams cad kyang byeng par 'gyuraro// bcings ma thag du/ phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las thad ji lta ba bzhin byed
401a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// yang na ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi
401a4(rgyud): tshul du/ zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o// de nas nas langs pa dang / de bzhin gash+ye/ 
401a5(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thad mngon sum du 'gyuraro// de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems pas gsung so// ci ste las sgrub
401a6(rgyud): par 'dod na yang // de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de na las thad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdorje
401a7(rgyud): 'dzin pas gsung so// ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang / lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis/ bdag dang gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur
401a8(rgyud): dbab pa yang bya ste tsan dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang gdon gyi ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang / lag pa dang / mda' thogs pa dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / san
401b1(rgyud): phreng ba dang / bad mo dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang / go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu chung dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad lan gcig brjod pas 'bebs par byed
401b2(rgyud): sgyu ma'i las kyang byed/ rma ba'i mjug sgo'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro des de'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje
401b3(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rma ba'i mjug sgo las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/ de phyin can rma ba'i mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin
401b4(rgyud): du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgo de nyid la lan gcig bzlas te bskor bas kyang // bdag nyid las ga/ zugs thang snang bar 'gyuraro// mjug sgo de nyid kyis 'jig
401b5(rgyud): rten pa'i sgyu ma rnams kyang ston// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/ bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs
401b6(rgyud): ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas
401b7(rgyud): bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thaMd dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston po'i bar du'o// ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems ma rdo rje ma'i
401b8(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed na sede ga
402a1(rgyud): lnga smos kyang ci dgos ci ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na yang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la/ 
402a2(rgyud): de nas mthar pag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o// dper chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang
402a3(rgyud): yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo bya dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// // de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di
402a4(rgyud): yin te de la dang por na sngar brten pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas la de phyin chad sen thams cad la
402a5(rgyud): phan gdags pa dang / chad pas btsod pa nus bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung // 'o// tesgrub par 'dod na yang / des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs
402a6(rgyud): bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas par dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos zhing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang
402a7(rgyud): ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po la phyag rgya bcings pa de las hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dag
402a8(rgyud): po dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par gyur to// de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos she/ 
402b1(rgyud): ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig/ de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/ yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka'
402b2(rgyud): stsol cing bskor te slang 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcod pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha zang
402b3(rgyud): dbang po'i bud med la sogs pa bud med thaMd mgu bar byas nas nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nas pa med de hUM zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thod gnon cing de nas
402b4(rgyud): bskab pa chung ngu'i stong gi bang du 'tsho bar 'gyurar-I// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// ci ste phyag rgya skyes bar 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'jab byas la zla ba'i mthar rdo rje hUM
402b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta
402b6(rgyud): ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcings na na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs rnams ston pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang / thad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang
402b7(rgyud): kyi dgag pa skyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thad bsdu ba dang 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang / gad mo cher bgad pa dang / sen thams cad sbyang ba dang / bcad pa
402b8(rgyud): dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / ji lta bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las thams cad la 'jug pa dang / dgag pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / sen thams cad phyag rgyas
403a1(rgyud): / gdab pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dngos po thams cad glu lan du gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgag pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang
403a2(rgyud): dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// tsaM ste rdo rje phra mo sgrub par 'dod ni yang des rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du sgo ba zhing de
403a3(rgyud): bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste de nas mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sen
403a4(rgyud): thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar bcad ba nus par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// nr-i ste las sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs
403a5(rgyud): la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thad 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'a ngas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// de nas las rnams byed par 'arung
403a6(rgyud): na yang lan cig brjod de yid kyis bsams pas srung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas brdzogs// de nas pad+ma gas kyi yo byed dang cho ga
403a7(rgyud): rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bac+doMs 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris pa der phyogs thad du dkyil
403a8(rgyud): 'khong bzhin chul du sa dang bani bris la grwa rnam su lto ma rnams bri'o// denas bzlas pa'i tshig de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthang mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas brji/ 
403b1(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// ci sde phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du pad+mo rdo rje ma'i phag
403b2(rgyud): rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad chang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus pazhing bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa bas la nam nangs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// de nas
403b3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// ci ste ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin
403b4(rgyud): du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltaradaga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa ba'o// de nas nab langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngos sum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'dra
403b5(rgyud): rdo rje chos kyis gsung so// tsaM sta las sgrub par 'do na yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thad nus par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
403b6(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo bad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// de nas nor bu rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thad la bya/ 
403b7(rgyud): rnam pa ni bas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thang grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la// de nas de bzhin du mchod pa bas te de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla
403b8(rgyud): ba'i mthang mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dbang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pa byonas
404a1(rgyud): // dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad/ dbang bskung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams deng rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// sa bcom ldan 'das
404a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// ci sde phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin tu chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thad kyi las byed par 'gyur// zhes
404a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// tso ste nor bu ye shes sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin tu rin po che 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin rim pa bzhin tu sgom par byas te dngos po med pa'i dmakha' las 'i/ 
404a4(rgyud): bo che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub se sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas zla ba'i
404a5(rgyud): mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig zla ga thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshe gas pa thad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bsku ro// zhes
404a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungaso// de nas las sgrub pa bshad/ de bzhin du bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan
404a7(rgyud): 'das na mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// nor bu rigs kyi nye bar spyad pa'i cho ga rgyas
404a8(rgyud): brdzogaso// / de nas rigs thad kyi thun mong du sgrub po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad// snying po sgrub par 'dod na de
404b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga pa'o// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste phyag rgya thams cad bdag la
404b2(rgyud): dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o// de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// de la 'di ni sngags thad kyi yo ba dang cho
404b3(rgyud): ga rgyas pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi ting 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub
404b4(rgyud): bong de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang tshig rgyas ste/ kye ma sen 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par gyur de bzhin gshegs pa thang ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyu/ 
404b5(rgyud): to/ zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje rje nabs gsung so// de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya
404b6(rgyud): rig pa thaMd ce ltar sgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'od yin to// sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba
404b7(rgyud): de ni bdag gam sa dang bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rigs thad kyi thun mongs du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// 
404b8(rgyud): de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang po kho na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i des grub dang / 
405a1(rgyud): // 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid 'grub pa dang / dngos grub chen po rnamaso// de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gdan gter yod par dogs pa dang phyag rgya bcings la rang gi
405a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas deng rdo rje blta bas lta bon ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na dan gter yod par shes par bya'o// de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings tes
405a3(rgyud): la ji ltar dgar ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur// zhes bac+doMs rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la 'dir rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na bcwa
405a4(rgyud): sid+d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos/ grub de dam pa bzhi yod de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas par 'gro zhing 'dug pa lasaDa pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa tha
405a5(rgyud): kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / namakhar la 'gro ba dang / dpag tshad ste/ ngag stang du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyoT zad du
405a6(rgyud): dpag tshad stong du mi dga' bar song la bskor ste slar 'ong ba dang / dpag tshad stong khong yug gi sen thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rnabs thos pa
405a7(rgyud): dang phyogs tha~Md du dpag tshad stong khong yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar pa dadu blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cadang / 
405a8(rgyud): nong thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chu zad kyang rgal mi nus te bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lha smos kyang rtsici dgas/ skyes bu stong phrag bcu ba sdams pa'i snga/ 
405b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dang la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje seda' dang bcas pa'i dab
405b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi bar 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjer
405b3(rgyud): 'dzin gyis dngos grub kyis gsung so// de la 'din rdo rje rigs 'dzim gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor
405b4(rgyud): bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thaMd la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gos pa skor te/ slar 'ong zhing bde ba thad la songasu spyad pa dang / lo brtsa
405b5(rgyud): brgyad pa'i mchod dang ldan pa dang / sku 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong la
405b6(rgyud): bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rigs 'dzin gyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phag
405b7(rgyud): rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sa de'i gzugasu gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis
405b8(rgyud): sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpang bcas pa tha~Md mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams ca dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod na/ 
406a1(rgyud): ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te 'jig rten gyi khams thad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cadang / bde ba dang / yi
406a2(rgyud): bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sada' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das
406a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / 
406a4(rgyud): dbang thams cad kyi dngas grub dang / bde ba dang yid bad ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam parda/ sa// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
406a5(rgyud): dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgya la ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po'i rkang pa g.yon sa mnan te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang
406a6(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// d+hU zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thaMd kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang
406a7(rgyud): du 'gyur// de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te na mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te slar 'ongs nas lham
406a8(rgyud): rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thang hUM zhes byas pas 'dul bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po zad la bka'
406b1(rgyud): stsol cing rdo rjes dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tshe bar byed par 'gyur bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bde pas gsung so// de la 'di
406b2(rgyud): ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub pa
406b3(rgyud): bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnam so// de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rdo rje
406b4(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur// rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thaMd kyi rgyal por 'gyur// las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig
406b5(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i las zad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsung so// de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid
406b6(rgyud): bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste// de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thad la mchod pa byas la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang
406b7(rgyud): yid 'de ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsung so// de la 'di ni dngos grub dam
406b8(rgyud): ste// de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyamo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzim pas gsung so// de la 'di dag ni pad mo rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ da ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba
407a1(rgyud): // dbang du bya ba dang / srung ba dang / pad+mo'i dngos grub rnam so// de la mnyes pa bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yid te/ ji ltar pad mo 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems cad
407a2(rgyud): mnyes par byed nus par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rje su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'du nus par 'gyuraro// byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thad srung ba dang / sba ba dang / 
407a3(rgyud): bskyab nus par 'gyur// bdag nyid pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la pad mo lag par blangs to bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir
407a4(rgyud): 'tsho ba tshu zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi brgyas gsu so// de la 'jig ni na bumakyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ma rigs thams cad kyi dang / 
407a5(rgyud): dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnamaso// de la rna bzhin gshegs bcad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nyid
407a6(rgyud): kyis dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring / 
407a7(rgyud): po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogaso// / 
407a8(rgyud): nas brtag pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsung so// de la dang po kho na ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/ 'jig rten 'dul ba/ 
407b1(rgyud): ji lta bar// de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de yi thabs ni phag rgya ste/ dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no// de la 'di ni phag rgya'i thabs kyi ngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min// phyag rgya'i dngos
407b2(rgyud): grub chags las skyes// de yi thabs ni sgom pa ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/ bdon las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob
407b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa thams cad dngos grub kyi rgyudade// ma rig mun chags 'di la ni/ rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te// de yi thabs
407b4(rgyud): ni rgya che bas/ dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo// ba/ dag pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan
407b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsu ngaso// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// bsod nams chen pa
407b6(rgyud): thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod dmas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud dade/ dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni// bsod nams chen
407b7(rgyud): po thob 'gyur te// bsod napas med kya byung bar ni/ dam tshig bsrungs ma myur du 'grub/ de la 'din sngags kyi bsod rnams kyi ngos grub kyi rgyu dang sangs rgyas mtshan la sags brjod na// bsad nams chen
407b8(rgyud): ba thob 'gyur te// bsod na pas med kyang byung ba ni/ chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thab/ de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/ byin na bsod napa/ 
408a1(rgyud): / thob 'gyur te// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub// brtag pa zad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grwa
408a2(rgyud): kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung so// de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud/ yi ge a la 'jug byed cing // yi ge thad na
408a3(rgyud): bsgoms la/ rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du// bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'grub zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sede chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsung so// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi
408a4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud/ shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba/ ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste/ des ni phag rgya myur 'grub par// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das shes
408a5(rgyud): rab mchog gis gsung so// de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos gru ba kyi rgyud/ shes rab sgra yau rjes 'brang ba// ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa// de bsgoms na ni myung ba yang // sngag
408a6(rgyud): kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs// de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rig dang sngags dang khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ shes rab
408a7(rgyud): bsgoms nu myur bar ni// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyis gsung so// brtag pa thad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub tu
408a8(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyu do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur// 
408b1(rgyud): la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu dang / 'khor lo mang po shugs pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang ba bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngas grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ 
408b2(rgyud): la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rje su yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas na no// nges par sngags ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di na
408b3(rgyud): rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las// tshogs ni yong su rdzogs nas kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ rtog pa thams cad kyi cha
408b4(rgyud): ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogaso// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sed 'a chen po phag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsu
408b5(rgyud): de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// thams cad sems de nyid bdag po// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje / sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi/ sems da
408b6(rgyud): kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khang rab bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te// 'od la rdo rje rab tu gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'ong // 
408b7(rgyud): snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te// khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed// de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje sku ni de rnams las// rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur// 
408b8(rgyud): sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thad yang dag 'byung / mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che// de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung // gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byed snyid
409a1(rgyud): khang yang rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// de ni myur du grub pa thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba
409a2(rgyud): ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la dang po kho nar de ba'i
409a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i// ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i// mi rtog pa yi ye shes las// brtags pas rtog pa na
409a4(rgyud): brjod do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag nyid// brtag/ sa pa rtog pa byung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' sem
409a5(rgyud): dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'dzin rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ cho ga bzhin du ri mo bris/ rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rtog las// dzag las/ 
409a6(rgyud): bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu do// rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung // pad+mo la ni da gnas te// de phyir rtog/ 
409a7(rgyud): la gnas pa ni// grub pa nyid de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu de/ rtag pa med pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa/ 
409a8(rgyud): lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyu // de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes
409b1(rgyud): kyi rgyud de/ yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis/ yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te// ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas// de phyir snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thaMd kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud
409b2(rgyud): rje ljang rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin// bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis/ mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog pa thad kyi sngags 'byung ba'i yeng shes
409b3(rgyud): kyi rgyud de/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na// de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod// de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// ma rig pa ni
409b4(rgyud): gzhom pa dang // ngag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// rtog pa thang
409b5(rgyud): snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu // de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyudade/ de la dang po kho nar snying por ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/ snying po bzlas te
409b6(rgyud): bdag gam ni// gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni// mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdags cho ga
409b7(rgyud): ji bzhin du// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings// 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni// gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// de la 'od sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan cig tsam yang sngags brjod na
409b8(rgyud): 'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin// rang gi lha la smras 'gyur ba/ de dag thad bded par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ngas gzigs kyi dbang pos gsung so// de la 'do ni rig pa'i ye shes skye bI/ 
410a1(rgyud): / rgyu de/ rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyi don shes par 'gyur// rtog pa thad kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga
410a2(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzog so// de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku
410a3(rgyud): phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug nas kyang skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul bas nas/ sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sangs gsungs// 
410a4(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mor tshul du ni// brkyang bskum tshul tu gnas byas te// shi/ tu khros nas sgrub pas na// the tshom med par 'grub
410a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs/ de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang de'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud na te/ rdo rje skyil mau krung bcas la// lag gnyis
410a6(rgyud): rdo rje bcings nas kyang // ting 'dzin gyi skur gyur la// pad+mor byung ba bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo sems dpas gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin
410a7(rgyud): te ji ltar 'dug gamanyam pa 'am/ 'tshag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// rdo rjen chen dbang bsgrub na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs// de la 'di ni de bzhin
410a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lce rtse shin tu mi bsgral zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni// rtog pa zad bsgrub bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin// zhes
410b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gis gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags// khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan// rdo rje chen po khro
410b2(rgyud): bo rigasal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'gru'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ dbugs mi 'byin lngar da
410b3(rgyud): 'byin cing // phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal// ting 'dzin ye shes snying pa yis// zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi ting 'dzin gyi yeng shes
410b4(rgyud): kyi snying pos gsung so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyu de// shin tu yongasu gsal tshig gis// rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing // tshul 'ang
410b5(rgyud): bzlas par gyur dan// myur du tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur// zhes brtsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi rdo rjes gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
410b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyu de// rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das// san thams cad bde sbyid pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du la grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
410b7(rgyud): 'das 'dod pas gsung so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i/ 
410b8(rgyud): ping/ khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsung so// de la 'di na pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyu/ 
411a1(rgyud): / ji ltar pad+mo'i rab chags la/ dgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa// de ltar bdag gis chags skyod yang // srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsungs
411a2(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems can thad kyi// dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing // rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes// grub na myur bar
411a3(rgyud): de 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das namakha'i snying pos gsung so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa 'am/ 
411a4(rgyud): 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// lag pa g.yon phyag rgya mchog/ thang byed na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag
411a5(rgyud): phyang rjes gsungs// de la 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi/ sang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud// de lta de ltar gnas ma // dzi sa ji ltang byud kyang rung / rdo rje khro ba mdzub po bcings/ 
411a6(rgyud): gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsung so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub par/ 
411a7(rgyud): rgyud de/ lag pa g.yon pas pad+mo yis// khu chur bcings te sbas nas ni// ji dgar myur du pad+mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
411a8(rgyud): gsung so// de la 'di ni dang bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni// bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la/ ci dga' bar ni rim gror byed/ rin / 
411b1(rgyud): / dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das namakha'i snying pos gsung so// de la 'dzin rigs thad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ phyag
411b2(rgyud): rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/ rdo rje bag dang rdo rje'i lha// ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// rigs thad kyi ga
411b3(rgyud): ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ngos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan
411b4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang lag
411b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'dri ba no// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsapa// theg pa chen po mngon 'du sa pa'i// mdo 'di lags par bshad pas na/ rdo rje se 'a khyod
411b6(rgyud): leg so// rdo rje na chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos ni khyod leg so// rdo rje las ni khyod lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rgyud zad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogaso// 
411b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad po 'dis gsol ba btag rdo rje byings kyi seM tshe// sems can dang mchog bdag
411b8(rgyud): can shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes tshe// rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ se der 'byung ba nyid don/ sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po/ sems can don chen dgongs pa'i dang/ sems dpa' se rgyang/ 
412a1(rgyud): / phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skong ba/ smra ba chen po rab rig mchog// sada' chen po khyod pag 'tshal/ las chen srung ba chen po ste/ 
412a2(rgyud): las rnams thams cad rab bsgrubs pa// bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog/ sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshalo// pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa// kun mkhan ye shes mkhyen pa po// sada' kun tu
412a3(rgyud): thabs chen po// shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong ba byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal
412a4(rgyud): shAkya sang ge shAkya che/ shAkya shAkya thub pa 'dul ba chen po khyab pa po// 'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam brnyes pa/ chos dbyings de bzhin pa
412a5(rgyud): ba ste/ rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po// sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen snang ba chen po s+ho// brgyan 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa'
412a6(rgyud): mchog/ bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// na mkha'i sku ste
412a7(rgyud): sku yi mchog/ sku gsum sku min sgom pa po// kun gyi sku ste sku che ba// rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag 'tsha lo// gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog/ gsung gsung gsung min ston pa po// gsung kon
412a8(rgyud): bzhin tu gsung tshi ba// rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal/ sems min sems te sems kyi mchog/ sems gsum sems min ston pa po// thad sems te sems che ba/ rdo rje sems khyed bya
412b1(rgyud): 'tshalo// rngo min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog rdo rje gsum pa rjod min spyod// rdo rje thaMd rdo rjeH/ rdo rje rdo rje khod phyag 'tshal/ kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog khade gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni/ khams gsum pa
412b2(rgyud): yi rgyal po che/ snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang gis skad cig nyan byed dam// klog gam yang na sgom pa'ang rung / kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// marganas
412b3(rgyud): khyang la gsol ba ni// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshe
412b4(rgyud): pa thad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa'i tshig ga/ san nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
412b5(rgyud): yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par gsol//  nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus na sa tshig su bcad pa 'ang gsung so// rtag par 'jig rten thadu/ 
412b6(rgyud): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
412b7(rgyud): cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo
412b8(rgyud): rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba snga
413a1(rgyud): tshogs pa'i//  rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bsko// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra ma thams cad ji sred pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam su bac+doMs
413a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thad rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i
413a3(rgyud): tshetshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sen kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ khro ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag
413a4(rgyud): tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil da'akhor rnamasu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin
413a5(rgyud): ba thad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang / chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs
413a6(rgyud): rtag par 'jig rten thams cad// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i// pad+mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ni
413a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo'i ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po sa pad+mor 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub
413a8(rgyud): sems dpa'achen pa 'phags pa nas kha'i snying pos tshegasu bcad pa 'di gsungs// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad tu// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji lta 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// nang du'i
413b1(rgyud): / 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas do'i tshesangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongasu gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba'am sbom pa yang rung / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i
413b2(rgyud): rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las bas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi gdad la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor ba
413b3(rgyud): phyogs kun nas mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// mi yi nang du babs nas kyang // dgos phying sems can kun gyi don// rdo rje'i 'khor
413b4(rgyud): lo mchog bskor zhing // mgon po rab tu sgrub par mdzod// de nas ya~M 'bacom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
413b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thaMd yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
413b6(rgyud): sdang mdzad kyi thugasu zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid
413b7(rgyud): gyur par mkhan nas pagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsung so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thang dang / rigs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cadang / de bzhin
413b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug su zhugs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang nas tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// mdor na
414a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams
414a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re ras kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
414a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ma dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
414a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams ca dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gan sa dang / sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cadang
414a5(rgyud): rdorje'i tshul thams cadadang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad gnas thams cad / mtshan thams cadang / dpe byed bzang po tha mas cadang / ba skur khung bu dzad dang / rdul shin
414a6(rgyud): tu phra mo skad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnamasu zhugs nas bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na de bzhin gshe
414a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshegs nas che du bcom
414a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas me brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// a ma'o sems can brtan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ 
414b1(rgyud): gang phyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams// mu stegs lha la gnas par mdzad// mdar na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa/ lta ba ngan pas mdongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang
414b2(rgyud): chub thob par 'gyur/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad kye dge sbyong ji byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa la
414b3(rgyud): bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtswa de bting ste stang du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs
414b4(rgyud): shig/ de nas 'dod par spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba deng dong nas ched lha rnams kyi dbang po
414b5(rgyud): brgya byin la de ltar byung ba 'di brjod// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po
414b6(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po la de dag brjod do// de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cadang / lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po
414b7(rgyud): la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras// grogs po rnams
414b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'o thun par mdzad cing yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis 'di ltang 'jig rten/ 
415a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed cing lnga nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis// lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
415a2(rgyud): ma yin no// de legs kyi dengar mchod pa la 'dong bar sgrub bo// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag por dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
415a3(rgyud): pa'i snying por byang chub par bzhugs pa gang na ba der dang nas ched bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
415a4(rgyud): la thugs brtse bar dgongs te rin gyi gdan di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te bla na med pa ya dang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
415a5(rgyud): rgya bar mdzad du gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rna sa kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin
415a6(rgyud): bar bsgrubs shig/ de nas 'di dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi nus ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag
415a7(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// de ni gzugs min gzugs min min// bden min
415a8(rgyud): brdzun mi gtsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogs na rgyal ba nyid 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
415b1(rgyud): rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba sgrubs shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdzam
415b2(rgyud): thog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshig su bcad pa 'di gsung so// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na// byang chub sems ni brtan par bos// sems dpa' rdo rje bstan pas
415b3(rgyud): la/ sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms shig/ de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu lag so// zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang
415b4(rgyud): 'thun par bya ba'i phyir bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
415b5(rgyud): thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa pa ga na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhags pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad / 'dis mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
415b6(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che// snang ba tshon zhing dag pa che// snang ba chen zhang dag po che// mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sems
415b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che// kun gyi bde nga bde ba che// bde mchog thog ma tha ma med// gzheng chen khod la pog 'tshal
415b8(rgyud): lo/ rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs zhes bya bar rab mnyes pa// mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che// rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin cher rgyal po che// dbang
416a1(rgyud): bkrung bzang po bdag pa che// rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che// rnam rgya mkhyud la phyag 'tshal lo//  rje gzi brjod gzi brjid cha/  chen ldas
416a2(rgyud): ba chen po ste// rgyal ba'i 'od 'bar ba che// sangs rgyas 'od khyod pag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba// rgyal mtshan che bas nor rab gtong // na mkha'i rgyal
416a3(rgyud): mtshan yu ba che// gtong ba'i mtshan khang phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes/ 
416a4(rgyud): chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal mo// rdo rje chos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos ni ba sbyor ba// sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog
416a5(rgyud): 'dod chos khyod la phyago 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste// sangs rgyas
416a6(rgyud): mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po// dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor
416a7(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// spros med yi ge chen po ste// yi ge med pa bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 
416a8(rgyud): rdo rje las te las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje srung
416b1(rgyud): go cha che// go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che// srang ba che zhing snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro ba che// ma rungs thams cad skrag bad pa// sangs
416b2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te// srung ba mchog khyod phrag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcing ba che// khu tshur chen po phyag rgyo che// rnga
416b3(rgyud): rje khu tshur khyod pag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa pag bya zhing // brjod de mchod de sti stang bya// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// byang chub sems ni yin te// khyod
416b4(rgyud): la brten nas rgyal ba dang // dpa bo byang chub sems dpa' kun// byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ 
416b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' khong phrag 'tshalo// rdo rje rin chen khyod pag 'tshal// rdo rje chos khod pag 'cha/ lo// rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal// yang dag par na
416b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i// bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
416b7(rgyud): dam pa ni// ba dad pas ni lan gcig tsam// gang gis legs par brjod pa ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
416b8(rgyud): kyis gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ gsung gcig tu legs so/
